title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: If you look deep in her eyes, she will put you in trances!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Yeah, was that supposed to scare us?!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Wicked, wicked zebra!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: ... it's a curse.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Then what will she do?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Just you wait, Twilight; some pony tales really are true.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Then she'll gobble you up in a big tasty stew! Soooo... Watch out!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Ugh... what a dream... Curses, schmurses. Whoa! [chuckle] Maybe Zecora cursed my hair. [Laughs nervously and then gasps] Or she cursed my horn!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: No no no no no! None of these books have a cure! Ugh! There has to be a real reason for this! An illness? An allergy?!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: A curse!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: I said a real reason. Something that points to something real.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: How about this one?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: "Supernaturals"? Spike, the word supernatural refers to things like ghosts and spirits and zombies, which are as make-believe as curses. This book is just a bunch of hooey!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: But what if you're wrong, Twilight? What if this really is a-

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Ah pfurse!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: A purse? How could it be a purse?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Pinkie? What happened?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Pee pah Zthecora! Sthe put a cursthe on me!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Hey, say it, don't spray it, Pinkie!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: [thud] Ow! [thud] Oh! She's [thud] trying to say-ow!- Zecora [thud]-oh!-[crash] she slapped us all with a-ow- curse!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: [high pitched voice] I hate to say I told ya so, Twilight, but I told ya so!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: It's a curse, I tells ya!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: But Fluttershy... seems just fine!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Yes, there doesn't seem to be a thing wrong with her.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Fluttershy? Are you okay? Is there something wrong with you? Would you care to tell us? So... you're not going to tell us? Yes you're not, or yes you will?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Good gravy, girl! What's wrong with you?!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: [deep male voice] I don't want to talk about it.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: This is hilarious! [laughs] Look at all of you! We got: Hairity, Rainbow Crash, Spitty Pie, Apple Teeny, Flutterguy, and... uh... I got nothin'... Twilight Sparkle. I mean seriously, I can't even work with that.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: [Sarcastic laughter] This is no joke, Spike. Now start looking for more books so I can find a cure!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: [groans] I think we'll find a cure to this curse at Zecora's place!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: It's not a curse!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: I agree with Dash! We'll go to Zecora's and force her to remove this hex!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: It's not a hex either!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: This is all my fault. If I hadn't followed Zecora in the first place, none of this would have happened. I just gotta fix this.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Now where does she think she's goin' this time?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: I don't care what you say, Twilight. It's time to pony up and confront Zecora. Come on, girls. Are you with me?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Ah am-pft!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: And I as well.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Uh, I don't know. Seems awfully dangerous.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: How about you, Applejack? Applejack?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Pf-she's gone-pft!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Aah! Or somepony stepped on her!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: ... or sat on her?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Rarity's hair!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Oh! OH! Pinkie, what are you doing? Ah, really. Aah! You ever hear of personal space?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Nopthe.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Apple Bloom is gone too!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: I bet they went after Zecora.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Well we better go find them. Come on girls, let's go.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: [grunt] Oh dear. Oh, this is so unseemly. Auuuaah!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Hey, a little help here?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Oopsie! Sorry.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: [crash] OW!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Uh... Spike? Are you coming?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Nope! Uh... gotta stay here and look for a cure. [gasp] Twilight Flopple!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Stop right there! Turn around right now, missy!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: No.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: No?! You can't ignore a direct order from your big sister!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Hehehe. Sorry, Applejack, but I'm the big sister now.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Apple Bloom, you come back here right this instant! I'm gonna tell Big McIntosh on you! Aw, pony feathers.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: C'mon girls. We've got to get to Zecora's. Hurry!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Ooh... Ahaha. Easier said than done.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Rainbow! Thank Celestia! There's no time to lose! I need to get to Zecora's pronto! Giddy-up pony!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Ex-CUSE me?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: YEEE-HAW!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: What the...

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: No, Rainbow Dash. Other way!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Oh. I look horrible!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Plis place plooks horrible!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Oh my. That place really does look horrible. Nice decorations, if you like creepy!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Sthe sthtole my sthong! Shthe shtole mm mm!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: She stole your song?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Oh Pinkie. Doesn't sound anything like your song.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: You saw those terrible things. Now do you believe us Twilight?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Scary looking masks, confusing incantations, and a great big bubbling cauldron? [sigh] Everything is pointing to Zecora being... bad. Or... what if Zecora is just making soup?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Mmm! The perfect temperature for ponies, I presume. Now, where is that little Apple Bloom?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Or... what if she's making Apple Bloom soup?!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: What if she's making Apple Bloom soup?!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: I'm comin' for ya, Apple Bloom!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Aaah!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Whoa there. Easy, Rainbow Crash.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: What have you done with Apple Bloom?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Ahh!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Ponies! What is this you...

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: No! You know not what you do! You've gone and spilled my precious brew!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: We're onto you Zecora. I didn't want to believe that you cursed us, but the evidence is overwhelming!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: You made me look ridiculous.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: You made me sound ridiculous!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: [incoherent] You made me speak ridiculous!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: You ruined my horn!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: How dare you! You destroy my home, destroy my work, then rudely accuse me of being a jerk?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: You put this curse on us, now you're gonna uncurse us.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: It is unwise to venture down this road. Your actions will make my anger explode!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Where is Apple Bloom!?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Zecora! I think I found all the things ya asked for. What in Ponyville is goin' on here?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: [gasp] Apple Bloom! You're okay!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Why wouldn't I be?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Because Zecora is an evil enchantress who cursed us and was gonna cook you up into soup!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Oh Twilight. Did those silly fillies finally get in yer head? You know there's no such thing as a curse.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Apple Bloom, sweetie. You can't just stand there and tell me this isn't a curse.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: This isn't a curse.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: If you will remember back, the words I spoke were quite exact. [flashback]: Beware, beware you pony folk. Those leaves of blue are not a joke.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: It was a warnin'. About that blue plant. It's called Poison Joke.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: That plant is much like poison oak. But its results are like a joke.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: What in the hay does that mean?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: It means this plant does not breed wrath. Instead this plant just wants a laugh.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Will somepony please talk normal?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: I think what she's saying is that when we ran in to save Apple Bloom, we ran into the poison joke. All our problems are just little jokes it played on us.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Little jokes?! Very funny.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Okay, fine. But what about the cauldron?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: And the chanting?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: And the creepy d<e9>cor?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Treasures of the native land where I am from. This one speaks 'hello', and this 'welcome'.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Not welcoming at all, if you ask me.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: The words I chanted were from olden times. Something you call a nursery rhyme.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: But the cauldron... The Apple Bloom soup?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Lookie here Twilight. That pot of water wasn't for me, it was for all these herbal ingredients. The cure for poison joke is a simple old-natural remedy. You just gotta take a bubble bath!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: But I tried to find a cure in all my books and couldn't find anything. What book has this natural remedy?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Here is the book, you see? Sad that you lack it in your library.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Actually, I do have this book, but I didn't look inside because the title was so... Weird. Supernaturals: Natural Remedies and Cure-alls That Are Simply Super. I...I... I'm so sorry, Zecora. I had the answer the whole time, if only I had bothered to look inside.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: [chuckle] Maybe next time you will take a second look, and not judge the cover of the book.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Hahaha.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Zecora? Would you be kind enough to mix up another batch of the herbal bath?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Mix it up I certainly will. Yet I am missing an herb from Ponyville.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: But whenever Zecora comes to town, all the shops are mysteriously closed.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Oh, well... I think we can help you with that.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Daisy, we need to talk.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: My friends and I all learned an important lesson this week: Never judge a book by its cover. Someone may look unusual, or funny, or scary. But you have to look past that and learn who they are inside. Real friends don't care what your "cover" is; it's the "contents" of a pony that count. And a good friend, like a good book, is something that will last forever.

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Applejack! Hey, where's Applejack?!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: [normal voice] I'm right here, little sis. I ain't tiny no more!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Oh! I have never felt so lovely in all my life!

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: Oh, my gosh! I never realized how horrible it is not to be able to talk. I mean, I love talking so much, and when I couldn't talk anymore, my tongue was all 'ehhhh'! It was the worst! Don't you agree, Fluttershy?

title: Bridle Gossip
dialog: [normal voice] ... Yes.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: La, la la, la la, la la, la la. Thank you little squirrel, but remember: these flowers are for Princess Celestia. Only the prettiest ones will do. La, la la, la la, la la, la la.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Gah!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Hello, little guy. I've never seen anything like you before.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Oh, are you hungry? Here you go. [gasp] I guess you were hungry.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: You're the cutest thing ever! I can't wait to show you to my friends.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Oh! Hurry up, Spike! This place isn't gonna clean itself.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: It also didn't mess itself up.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Princess Celestia will be here tomorrow!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: I thought this was just an unofficial casual visit.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: There's nothing casual about a visit from royalty. I want this place to be spotless, and you've barely made a dent in the clutter.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Maybe you should, ugh, start reading them one at a time-- whoa ho! Aw.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Everything's got to be perfect. No time for fooling around.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: You know, this would be an awful lot easier if there weren't two of us here getting under each other's feet.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Great idea. You clean, I'll go see how everyone else's preparations are coming.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: What happened to the rest of her name?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: You can't hang a banner that says "Welcome Princess Celest". Take it down and try again.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: That looks perfect. Keep up the good work.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Hello, Mr. and Mrs. Cake. How's the banquet coming?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Mrs. Uh...it would be coming a little better if...

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Pinkie! What are you doing? Those sweets are supposed to be for the princess.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: I know. That's why I'm tasting them. Somepony needs to make sure that everything is tasty enough to touch the royal tongue, and I, Pinkie Pie, declare that these treats are fit for a king, or a queen, or a princess.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Twilight, Pinkie, you won't believe... oh, I'm sorry. Uh, am I interrupting?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: No, not at all. Come on in and make yourself at home. [slurp] What's going on, Fluttershy?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: You won't believe what I found at the edge of the Everfree Forest. Come on out, little guy. It's okay.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: [gasp] Three?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: They're amazing. What are they?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: I'm not sure. I'm also not sure where these other two came from.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: I'll take one off your hooves. I've never seen anything so... adorable. Besides, it'll be nice to have a companion for Spike so he won't bother me so much while I'm studying.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Pinkie, do you want the other one?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ugh! A parasprite? Are you kidding?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ugh?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: A para-what?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: How could you not like...

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ugh. Now I gotta go find a trombone.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: A what?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ahhh, typical Pinkie.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Stand still, Rainbow Dash.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ugh, I caaan't, I need to flyyy! This is waaay too boring for me.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Do you want to look nice for Princess Celestia or not?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Wow. Rarity, those outfits are gorgeous.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Mmhmm. Thank you, Twilight. Nice to know someone appreciates my talents.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ugh, sooo boooring.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Huh?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: What's that sound, Twilight?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Wow, what are they?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: The better question is, where did they come from? I only had one a minute ago.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Uh, I'll take one.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Me too, oh, they're perfect.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Does anypony know where I can find an accordion?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Girls! Hello! This is important. Durgh! Thanks a lot.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: [sigh] The decorations, the banquet, I really hope everything comes together in time for tomorrow.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Oh, [yawn] what's there to worry about?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Spike! Wake up! What happened?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Huh? Whaaa! What's going on?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Where did they come from?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: I don't know. The little guy got hungry in the night, so I gave him a snack, but... I have no idea where these others came from. Oh no! They're messing up all my hard work!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: The princess will be here in a few hours.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ugh.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Spike, help me round up these little guys.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ugh, what does it look like I'm doin'? Ooow, waaah! D'oh. I know, I know, "stop fooling around".

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Huh? Huh?! [screech] [grunt] [groan] Get off me! [groan] [grunt] Waaa!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Not only are you adorable, but you're also quite useful.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Oh! Are you okay? Aaah! [gasp] Eewww. Aaah! Gross gross gross! No creature that behaves so revoltingly is allowed in my boutique!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Look Rarity, Applejack loaned me a harmonica. [plays harmonica] Isn't that great?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: [gasp] And not a moment too soon.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ugh, Pinkie, I'm a little busy right now.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: And I'm not? You know how many more instruments I've gotta find? A lot, that's how many. Now if we split the list between us, we might just make it in time.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Please, Pinkie, I don't have time for some silly scavenger hunt. I've got a real problem.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: You've got a real problem, all right. And a banjo is the only answer!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: [gasp] I see we're having the same problem.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ditto!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Fluttershy knows everything about animals, I'm sure she can tell us how to stop them from multiplying.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: ...or not.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ugh, do something Fluttershy, can't you control them?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: I've tried everything I know: I've tried begging, and pleading, and beseeching, and asking politely and...

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Guh.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: If we can't get them under control before the princess arrives, it'll be a total disaster.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ew! If you ask me, it's already a total disaster.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Here's all those apples you wanted, Fluttershy, but I still can't figure why y'need so many. Hey!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: What do we do?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: [gasp] I got it! Nopony can herd like Applejack.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Yeah! We can drive 'em back into the forest.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: [scoffs] I'll rastle 'em up, but I need everypony's help to do it. Twilight, you and Rarity wait over there. I'll herd the little critters straight at ya like a funnel. Rainbow Dash, you and Fluttershy stay on top of 'em, don't let 'em fly away.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Aye aye.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Yeeeeeee-haw!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Alright y'all, here goes nothin'. Look out Rarity, that one's fixin' to get away. Keep a lead on 'em, Rainbow Dash! Hold on girls, we're almost there.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Pinkie!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Twilight, we don't have much time.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: You're telling me. The princess could arrive at any moment.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Exactly. That's why I need you gals to drop what you're doing and help me find some maracas.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Maracas? Pinkie, we've got much bigger problems than missing maracas.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: [gasp] You're right! Getting a tuba has to be our number one goal. Follow me. I said, follow me!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Pinkie Pie, you are so random.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: And you are all so stubborn!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Forget her ladies. Focus. Head 'em up and move 'em out.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ouch.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: We did it. Nice work, Applejack.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Couldn't a'done it without y'all.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Now let's get back and clean up the mess they made before the princess arrives.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Okay, everyone knows what to do, right? We gotta work extra hard to make up for lost time.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Where did they come from?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Well, I may have kept just one. Heh. I couldn't help myself. They're just so cute.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: We don't have time to keep rounding up these things. What do we do now?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Time to take out the adorable trash. YAAAAAA!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: [grunt] Way to go, Rainbow Dash!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Looks like our problems are solved.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: They will be with these cymbals. [crash] Hey! Give me those back!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Whoa. Yaa! Yow! Whoa! Wow! I can't hold it! She's breaking up.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Pinkie Pie, what have you done?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: I've lost a brand new pair of cymbals, that's what I've done.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Will you forget about your silly instruments for one second? You're ruining our efforts to save Ponyville.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Me? Ruin? I'm not the ruiner, I'm the ruin-ee! Or is it ruiness? Ruinette?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Come on girls, there's no reasoning with that one. She's a few apples short of a bushel.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Hey! I'm trying to tell you all that the ruining is on the other hoof. If you'd just slow down and listen to me!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: What do we do? They're eating all the food in town.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: [gasp] My apples!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: We've gotta do something. [gasps] I got it! I'll cast a spell to make them stop eating all the food.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Heh. Hey, it worked. They're not eating the food anymore.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Oh no... if they get inside my store... Everypony for herself!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: I'll save you!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: No woodland creature's gonna eat the Apple Family's crop.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Brace yourself, y'all, here they come. [gasp] Didn't see that one comin'.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Help!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Help...

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ugh. Have you gone mad?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Zecora, these little guys are devouring Ponyville, and the princess is on her way. Can you help us, please?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Oh, monster of so little size. Is that a parasprite before my eyes?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: I don't know! Is it?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Tales of crops and harvests consumed. If these creatures are in Ponyville, you're doomed.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: [grunts] Oh no, here she comes.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Okay, here's the plan. Rainbow Dash, you distract them.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: YAAAA!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Good. Everyone else, we need to build an exact copy of Ponyville right over there. We've got less than a minute. Zecora was right, we're doomed. Oh no, the princess's procession is here. It's all over!

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Pinkie? We're in the middle of a crisis here. This is no time for your... nonsense?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Look.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Twilight Sparkle, my prized pupil.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Hello, princess.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: So lovely to see you again, as well as your friends.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: So... how was the trip? Hit much traffic?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Ah, what is this? Oh ho ho, these creatures are adorable.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: They're not that adorable.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: I'm terribly honored that you and the good citizens of Ponyville have organized a parade in honor of my visit.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Parade? Oh. Yes, the parade.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Unfortunately, that visit is going to have to wait for another time. I'm afraid an emergency has come up in Fillydelphia. Apparently there's been some sort of infestation.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: An... infestation?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Yes, a swarm of incredibly bothersome creatures has invaded the poor town. I'm sorry Twilight, to have to put you all through so much trouble.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Trouble? What trouble?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Before I have to go, would you care to give me your latest report on the magic of friendship in person?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: My... report?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Haven't you learned anything about friendship?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Actually, I have. I've learned that sometimes the solution to your problems can come from where you least expect it. It's a good idea to stop and listen to your friends' opinions and perspectives...

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Even when they don't always seem to make sense.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: I'm so proud of you, Twilight Sparkle, and I'm very impressed with your friends as well. It sounds like you're all learning so much from each other.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Thank you, princess.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Hey, what happened to the princess?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Emergency in Fillydelphia.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Some sort of infestation.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Oh no! Have they got parasprites too? Well, have tuba, will travel.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: I think the princess can handle it.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: So you knew what those critters were all along, huh Pinkie Pie?

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Well, duh! Why do you think I was so frantic to get my hooves on all these instruments? I tried to tell you.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: We know, Pinkie Pie, and we're sorry we didn't listen.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: You're a great friend, even if we don't always understand you.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: Thanks guys, you're all great friends too, even when I don't understand me.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: You saved my reputation with Princess Celestia, and more importantly, you saved Ponyville.

title: Swarm of the Century
dialog: ...Or not.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: [gasp] Spike, wake up. Wake up, wake up, it's Winter Wrap Up day!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Huh? Mommy?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Winter Wrap Up!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: You're not mommy.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Spike, the first day of spring is tomorrow, so everypony in Ponyville needs to clean up winter. Now help me get ready.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Clean up winter? Who cleans up winter? Don't they just use magic to change the seasons like they do in Canterlot?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: It's ridiculous. No magic... Fuh.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Okay, let's see: scarf, check; saddle, check; boots, check; Spike refusing to get up and going back to sleep, check. It's a good thing I'm so organized, I'm ready. Bright and early. Oh... maybe a little too early.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Those must be the team vests Rarity designed. Blue for the weather team, green for the plant team, and tan for the animal team. I wonder which team vest I'll be wearing.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: I'll take a blue vest, same color as my blankie, which I think I hear calling my name. "Spike! Spike! Come to bed!" Ugh, it's too early.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Thank you, everypony, for being here bright and early. We need every single pony's help to wrap up winter, and bring in spring.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Now, all of you have your vests, and have been assigned to your teams, so let's do even better than last year, and have the quickest Winter Wrap Up ever!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Oh, this is so exciting.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: All right everypony, find your team leader, and let's get galloping!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Oh gosh, where should I go? I'm not sure where I fit in. What exactly does everypony do?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Three months of winter coolness And awesome holidays

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: We've kept our hoovsies warm at home Time off from work to play

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: But the food we've stored is runnin' out And we can't grow in this cold

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: And even though I love my boots This fashion's getting old

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: The time has come to welcome spring And all things warm and green But it's also time to say goodbye It's winter we must clean How can I help? I'm new, you see What does everypony do? How do I fit in without magic? I haven't got a clue!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: 'Cause tomorrow spring<U+0096>

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: <U+0096>is here!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Bringing home the southern birds A Pegasus' job begins And clearing all the gloomy skies To let the sunshine in We move the clouds And we melt the white snow

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Little critters hibernate Under the snow and ice

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: We wake up all their sleepy heads So quietly and nice

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: We help them gather up their food Fix their homes below

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: We welcome back the southern birds

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: No easy task to clear the ground Plant our tiny seeds With proper care and sunshine Everyone it feeds Apples, carrots, celery stalks Colorful flowers too We must work so very hard

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: 'Cause tomorrow spring is here

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Now that I know what they all do I have to find my place And help with all of my heart Tough task ahead I face How will I do without my magic Help the Earth pony way I wanna belong so I must Do my best today, Do my best today!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: 'Cause tomorrow spring is here 'Cause tomorrow spring is here 'Cause tomorrow spring is here!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Everypony belongs to a team. What should I do? Where should I go?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: All right team, you're clear for takeoff.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Rainbow Dash!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Oh, hey Twilight, what's up?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: What are you doing?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Sending off one of my flight crews to retrieve the birds that have flown south for the winter.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Oh, can I help? How about if I help clear out the clouds?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Um...

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Right. No wings.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Sorry, Twilight.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: [gasp] Great, now what do we do?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Come on Spike, this is serious business. Winter needs to be wrapped up, and I'm determined to do my part. Somehow.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Rarity, please tell me there's something, anything I can help you with.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Well, how would you like to help create Ponyville's finest birds' nests?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Birds' nests?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Why yes. When the weather team guides the birds back north for the spring, they'll need a place to live and lay their eggs.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Wow, Rarity, that one's really beautiful.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Oh why, thank you most sincerely. Would you like to try your hoof at a nest?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Would I? Yes! Where do I begin?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Okay. Now... uh, take some of that straw and hay over there, and a little bit of branch. Now, weave them through there, yes. Uh, take some ribbon, yes, oh uh, n... not there, oooh, yes, uh, tuck it in over there, uh but be careful not to... I don't know I guess that would do... oh dear.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: There! It looks just like... yours. Oh my.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: That nest needs to be condemned.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Oh, Spa-ha-hike, it's not so bad, ah, maybe birds can use it as a...

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: An outhouse?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Hw...

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: I think we lost her.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Ah, and we need to weave the string...

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Hellooooooo, Twilight! Wheeeeeeee!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Wow, Pinkie Pie, you're quite the skater. Probably the best skater I've ever seen.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Thanks Twilight, I've been doing this since I was an itty-bitty little-wittle Twinkie-Pinkie. Just comes natural. Which is probably why they designated me the lake scorer. I cut lines in the lakes with my skates. That way, when the rest of the weather team comes here to break the ice, it'll be easy as pie.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: How clever. When the thick ice begins to melt, it'll break along the lines. Well, you sure have a lot of work ahead of you, there's quite a few lakes in Ponyville.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Ha, tell me about it. Hey, Twilight, wanna help me out?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Would I?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Come on, put on those skates over there. I bet you'll be a natural too.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Okay.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Uh... maybe on second thought.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: What are you talking about? You said you wanted to be helpful.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Yippie!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Now get out there.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Oh no, whoa, wow...

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Twilight, steer! Steer!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Yaaaaa!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Oh boy...

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Pwuh.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Twilight, you did a great job your first time around. I'm sure my first time was just as wobbly and bobbly and crasheriffic as yours.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Really?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: No.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: But did I make you feel better?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Mm-hmm, yeah, I guess.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: I think you'll be super awesome at something that keeps your hooves on the ground. I know, Fluttershy could probably use your help with the critters.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Well... I'm pretty good with little animals. Yeah, I'll go help her.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Uh... it's, ah, that a-way.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Yaaaaaa!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Wake up, little sleepy heads. Hope you had some wonderful dreams and restful hibernation, but it's time to get up now, spring is coming.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Awww, how cute.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Aren't they? This is my favorite task the whole season, when I get to see all my little animal friends again.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Uh, what's "hibernation"?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: It's like a long sleep.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Long sleep?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Yes. [bell rings] Wake up, little porcupines. Animals often hibernate through the winter to save their energy and eat less food.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: I definitely like the idea of hibernation, uh, except for the "eat less food" part.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Oh, would you just look at all these warrens and dens? I'm worried that I won't be able to wake up every animal before spring comes.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Well, I'll help, Fluttershy.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: You will? Oh, that would be wonderful.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Okay, let's start there.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Hello? Wake up little friends, wherever you are. Spring is coming. [bell rings] I wonder which cute little furry creatures I've awoken.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Waaa! Snakes! Snakes! [scream] Ugh! [grunt] [scream] Ugh!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Good morning, friends.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: [sigh] All this Winter Wrap Up stuff is a lot harder than it looks.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: [nasally] Right, because there's no magic. Why don't you just use magic, Twilight, and get it done the right way?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: No, Spike, I have to do it the traditional way. Ponyville has never needed magic to wrap up winter.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: [nasally] Well, they never had you here before, either. Think how much quicker they could wrap up winter with your magic.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Keep pushin', Caramel. That's it, Bumpkin. I know it's hard work, but you guys are doin' great. Yee-haw!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Hey, Applejack. How's everything going?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Oh, just dandy. A little slow startin', but peachy all the same. There's a lot of ground to clear, ya hear? We can't even start the plantin' and the waterin' until we git all these heap a' snow hightailed outta here.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Well, I'd like to help.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Well, I... I dunno Twilight.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Just give me a chance.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Well, I never turn down a hard worker, but...

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Think of how much quicker they could wrap up winter with your magic.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: I could use a come-to-life spell. Hwww... Here goes...

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Hmm. She's awful strong for such a little pony.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: That's my girl, following my advice.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: And what in tarnation does that mean?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: [gasp] Uh-oh. Slow down. Slow down!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: What's going on? Wha'd'ya do? You used magic, didn't you?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Nuts, Twilight, you used magic.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: The nerve. Can you believe her?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: That's not how we do it 'round here, Twilight, and especially not on MY FARM!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Come on, Twilight. Come on out.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: I'm a winter mess up.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Well you're good at a lot of things, just not nest-making, ice-skating, animal-waking, snow-clearing.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: [whine] Thanks a lot for making me feel so much better.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: That's what I'm here for, sister.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Rainbow Dash, y'all on the weather team need to melt the rest of the snow here on the ground and the trees, pronto.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Got it.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Wait. My poor little animals' homes will get flooded if the snow melts too fast.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Got it.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: I'm tellin' you, Rainbow, you gotta melt that snow now.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: No, you simply must wait.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Okay.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Go.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Stop.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Go.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Stop.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: GO!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: STOP!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Ugh! Make up your minds!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Oh! What in Equestria are all you arguing about? This sort of silliness is why we were late for spring last year, and the year before that, and the year before that.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Did she say late?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: I was hoping my amazingly inspirational speech would urge everyone to do better than last year, but now it looks like we're going to be later than ever. I mean just look at this catastrophe. The ice scorers made the ice chunks too big to melt. The nest designer is horrendously behind, we need several hundred, and she's only made one.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: And don't get me started on all the clouds in the sky, the icicles on the trees... This isn't good, not at all!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: And it's gonna be all to pieces disastrous if we can't get our seeds all planted.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Chillax Applejack, we're bustin' our chops as fast as we can.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: No, not fast, we have to wake animals slowly.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Uh, AJ?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Oh good gravy, Caramel lost the grass seeds again, didn't he?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Oh that featherbrain. Didn't she learn her lesson last year when she went west?

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Stop this at once. We don't have time to argue. It's almost sundown. Spring is going to be late again. Another year of scandal and shame. If only we could be more organized.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Spike! Get my checklist and clipboard, STAT!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Eh, yes, ma'am.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Stop, everypony!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Stop!

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Sorry. I know you all want to complete your jobs on time, but arguing is no way to go about it. What you need is organization, and I'm just the pony for the job.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: I can't believe it. Spring is here! On time! And we have you to thank for it. If it weren't for your organizing skills we would still be arguing.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: It was a team effort.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: And since you helped every team, we have an official vest for you. We give you the title, "All-Team Organizer".

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Gosh, I don't even know what to say. Thank you, everypony.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: And hereby I declare that winter is... wrapped up on time.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Spike's sure gonna be in for a hog-sized surprised when that last piece a' ice melts.

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Winter Wrap Up
dialog: Winter Wrap Up was one of the most special things I've ever been a part of here in Ponyville. It helped me to learn we all have hidden talents, and if we're patient and diligent, we're sure to find them, and as always, with good friendship and teamwork, ponies can accomplish anything. How's that, Spike? Spike?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Let's quiet down please. We have a very important lesson to get to. [class quiets down] Thank you. Today we are going to be talking about cutie marks.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: You can all see my cutie mark, can't you? Like all ponies, I wasn't born with a cutie mark. My flank was blank.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Then one day, when I was about your age, I woke up to find that a cutie mark had appeared.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Yes I know, but honestly, that's how everypony was wearing their mane back then. I had decided to become a teacher, and the flowers symbolized my hope that I could help my future students bloom if I nurture them with knowledge. The smiles represented the cheer I hope to bring to my little ponies while they were learning. Now, can anyone tell me when a pony gets his or her cutie mark?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: That's right, Twist. A cutie mark appears on a pony's flank when he or she finds that certain something that makes them different from every other pony. Discovering what makes you unique isn't something [Diamond Tiara: Pssst!] that happens overnight, and no amount of hoping, wishing, [Diamond Tiara: Pssst!] or begging, would make a cutie mark appear before its time.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Pssst!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: What?!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Apple Bloom! Are you passing a note?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Uh, I... Um...

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: What could be so important that it couldn't wait until after class? [gasp] It's blank.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Mm-mm.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: No...

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I don't know why we had to sit through a lecture about getting a cutie mark. I mean, waiting for your cutie mark is sooo last week. You got yours, I just got mine. We all have them already. [gasp] I mean, almost all of us have them already. Don't worry, you two, you're still totally invited to my cute-cea<f1>era this weekend.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: It's going to be amazing.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: It's a party celebrating me and my fantastic cutie mark. How could it not be?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Gimme a break.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: See you this weekend...

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: It's not fair! It's just not fair!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Don't get your mane in a tangle. You'll get your cutie mark. Everypony gets one eventually.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: But I don't want one eventually! I want one right now! I can't go to Diamond Tiara's cute-cea<f1>era without one, I just can't!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: 'Course you can. Y'know, I was the last pony in my class to get my cutie mark, and I couldn't be prouder of it. I knew my future was to run Sweet Apple Acres, and these bright shiny apples sealed the deal. [gasp] Come to think of it, Granny Smith was the last one in her class, too. Huh, same as Big McIntosh.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I really don't see how that's supposed to make me feel better. It probably means that being the last one in your class to get a cutie mark runs in the family. ...runs in the family. Runs in the family! Runs in the family! You've got apples for your cutie mark, Granny Smith has an apple pie, Big McIntosh has an apple half, my unique talent must has som'n to do with apples! Apples apples apples! [crash] Oops... apples.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Get your delicious, nutritious apples here!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Create fine art for your home with 'em. You have to be crazy not to get a bushel of your very own.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Heh... she's so creative, heh.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: You, sir, care t' buy some apples?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Why not?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Are you sure?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: You're pretty sure, but you're not absolutely positively completely super-duper sure, are you?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: All right!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: You forgot your change!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Woo-hoo! That's how you sell s'm apples and get a cutie mark! So, what does my cutie mark look like? A shoppin' bag full of apples? A satisfied customer eating an apple? Hmm... maybe I gotta increase my sales figures first. You touch it, you buy it! We take cash or credit.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I'm sorry, ma'am. Ma'am! Aww... Now Apple Bloom, you can't just...

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: That'll be four bits.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I didn't put those in my bag.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Likely story. Four bits, lady!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Apple Bloom! I am really really sorry about that. She's new. Here, take these. No charge. And these. And these.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Y'all come back now, y'hear?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: What?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Sorry, little sis, but your apple-sellin' days are over.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: What? But how else am I gonna get my cutie mark?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Home. Now.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Hm!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Ugh. Listen, sugarcube, I know it's hard to wait for your very own cutie mark, but, you just can't force it. Besides, you're not that grown-up just yet. Ain't there other fillies in your class without one?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Well... Twist doesn't have hers yet.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Do you think you'd feel better if you went to the party with her?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Mmm-hmm.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Well there you go. Bet you and Twist would have a great time together. Now run along and find your friend.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: You're sure you don't want me to stick around 'til the end of th' market?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Yeah. I'm sure.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: So I was thinkin'... maybe we could go to Diamond Tiara's cute-cea<f1>era together. I don't have a cutie mark, you don't have a cutie mark.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Yeah, pretty... sweet.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Of course she will.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Whoa, looks like somepony's got a dark cloud hanging over her head. Let me do something about that. What's the matter, kid?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: [inhales] There's a cute-cea<f1>era this afternoon and everypony in my class will be there and they'll all have their cutie marks and I wanna get my cutie mark but I'm no good at sellin' apples but I really wanna go to the party but how can I go to the party if I don't have my cutie mark which my big sister says I'm gonna get eventually but... I WANT IT NOW!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Applejack says these things take time. I have to just wait for it to happen.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Why wait for something to happen when you can make it happen?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: But Applejack says th...

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Hey, who are you gonna listen to, Applejack, or the pony who was first in her class to get a cutie mark? I always liked flying an' all, but I was going nowhere in a hurry. It wasn't until my very first race that I discovered a serious need for speed, and KAZAM, this sweet baby appeared as fast as lightning.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: That's right, stretch out those legs. Gotta be nice and loose. The key here is to try as many things as possible as quickly as possible. One of them is bound to lead to your cutie mark. Are you ready?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I'm ready!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I said: Are! You! Ready!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I'M READY!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Ah!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Whoa!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Hi-ya! Ee...

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Whoaaa! Whoa...

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Tried that one... tried that one... tried that one...

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Your new outfit is, like, perfect for the party.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I know. It totally shows off my cutie mark.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I love being special.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Can you imagine how embarrassing it must be to be... not special?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I don't even want to, like, think about it.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Tried that one... tried that one...

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I'm doomed. Doomed! I'll never find sumth'n I'm good at.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: You look like you'd be good at eating cupcakes.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Eatin' cupcakes?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Eating cupcakes?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Eating cupcaaakes!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I really appreciate all your help, Rainbow Dash. You're a really great coach and I really learned a lot from you and I'm sure I can learn a lot more but... I've got some cupcakes to eat! See you at the cute-cea<f1>era! Hold on, Pinkie Pie, I'm comin'.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I can't believe I didn't think of this. A cupcake-eating cutie mark, it's sooo obvious. Now, where are those cupcakes? I'm ready t' chow down!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I don't have any cupcakes.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Oh.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: [gasp] But you look like you'd be good at helping me make some.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I guess, uh, making-cupcakes cutie mark could work too.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: All you have to do is take a cup of flour! Add it to the mix! Now just take a little something sweet, not sour! A bit of salt, just a pinch!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: [cough] Hot, hot, hot!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Oooh, those look much better than the last batch. [chomp] Mmm...

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Ugh! I guess I'm not cut out to be a baker either. [sigh] I just have to face it, I'm gonna have a blank flank forever.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: What about that?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: What about what? Is there something on my flank? Is there, is there, is there? [gasp] A cutie mark! It's a... a measuring cup? No. A mixin' bowl? No... Are those cupcakes? A tower of cupcakes maybe.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: [blow] Flour. It's flour! Yay! I guessed it. What game you wanna play next? Please say bingo, please say bingo.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Whoa, what's been going on in here?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: We've been making cupcakes, wanna try them?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Nnnno thank you... not that they don't look, heh, delicious.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Twilight, you have to help me!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: What's the matter?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: [inhales] Tiara's cute-cea<f1>era's today and everypony in my class will be there and they'll all have their cutie marks and I want to get my cutie mark but I'm no good at selling apples or hang-gliding or making cupcakes, but I wanna go to the party but how can I go to the party if I don't have my cutie mark, which Pinkie Pie says I can't just make appear, but I need it to appear, right now!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Uhhh... I don't follow. How can I help you?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: You can use your magic to make my cutie mark appear.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Oh no, Apple Bloom. A cutie mark is something a pony has to discover for herself.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Please Twilight, jus' trah.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I'm sorry, but-

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Oh please, please, please please please!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: All right, all right!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Oh thank you thank you thank you. [pwing] Yes! I knew you could do... it.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I'm sorry, sweetie, but I told you-

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Try again, try again!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Told you that not even magic can make a cutie mark appear before its time.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: It's hopeless, hopeless! I just won't go to the party, I can't go. Everyone will just laugh at me and make fun of me and call me names. It will be the worst night of my life.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I'm sure it won't be as bad as all that.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Forget it, there's no way I'm going to that [gulp] party.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: How could I have forgotten the time? How could I have forgotten Pinkie Pie was hosting the party? How could I have forgotten it was at Sugarcube Corner?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Don't forget your party hat, Forgetty Forgetterson!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I have to get out of here before anypony sees me.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Hey! It's my cute-cea<f1>era, I'm supposed to get the first bite at cake.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Okay, Apple Bloom, almost there.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Apple Bloom, you made it. After I heard about Twist, I was afraid you wouldn't show up. I sure am glad you came to your senses about this whole cutie mark thing. These things happen when these things are supposed to happen. Trying to rush 'em just drives you crazy. I'll let you be, looks like your friends want to talk to you.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Well well well, look who's here.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Nice outfit.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Just sumt'n I, uh, pulled together last minute.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: It really shows off your cutie mark. Oh wait, that's right, you don't have one.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Uh, I have a cutie mark.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Eh, what? Since when?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Since... Um... Earlier today.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Oh really? Let's see it.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I shouldn't. I couldn't. My cutie mark is so unbelievably amazing, I'm afraid that if I show it off, everyone will start paying attention to me instead of you. Outshined at your own cute-cea<f1>era. Can you imagine how embarrassing that would be?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Uh, forget it, I didn't really want to see it anyway.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Oh no.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Wow, that is an amazing cutie mark.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Nice try...

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: [offscreen] You got a problem with blank flanks?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I said, you got a problem with blank flanks?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: The problem is, I mean, she's like, totally not special.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: No, it means she's full of potential.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: It means she could be great at anything. The possibilities are, [mocking] like, endless.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: She could be a great scientist, or an amazing artist, or a famous writer. She could even be mayor of Ponyville someday.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: And she's not stuck being stuck-up like you two.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Hey, this is my party, why are you two on her side?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Because...

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: [gasp] You don't have your cutie marks either? I thought I was the only one.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: We thought we were the only two.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I for one think you are three very lucky fillies.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Lucky? How can they be lucky?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: They still get to experience the thrill of discovering who they are, and what they're meant to be.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: And they got all the time in the world to figure it out, not just an afternoon.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Hey, what's everypony doing? This is my party, everypony is supposed to be paying attention to me.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Whatever. We still think you're losers, right, Diamond Tiara? Bump, bump, sugar... lump...

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Not now, Silver Spoon.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Name's Scootaloo.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: And I'm Sweetie Belle.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Apple Bloom.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: So I was thinking, now that we're friends... I mean, we are friends, right?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: How could we not be? We're totally alike. We don't have cutie marks, Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon drive us crazy--

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Totally crazy.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Well, now that we're friends, what if the three of us work together to find out who we are and what we're supposed to be?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Ooh! Ooh! We could form our own secret society.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: I'm liking this idea.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: A secret society. Yeah. We need a name for it though.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: The Cutie Mark Three?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: The Cutastically Fantastics?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: How about... The Cutie Mark Crusaders?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: It's perfect!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: This is gonna be so great!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: We're gonna be unstoppable!

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: What do you say we celebrate with some of these delicious cupcakes?

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Not the cupcakes. Trust me.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Let's see if there are any cookies.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Yeah! Come on.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Dearest Princess Celestia,

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: ...can actually be the thing that helps you make your closest friends and realize how special you are. Hmm...

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [grunt] Whoo-hoo!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Hoo-wee! Not a bad pitch for a pony who works with her head in the clouds.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Oh yeah? Think you can do better, cowgirl?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I know I can. [grunt] Oh, for Pete's sake!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Heh! Looks like this Pegasus can pitch better than the workhorse. The object of the game is to get the closest to the stake.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: All right, all right. You got another throw there, pony girl.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [sarcastically] Wow, Rainbow, heh. You couldn't hit a barn door with that kind of a throw!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Yeah, yeah. I still have the closest throw, Applesmack. Just try and beat it.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [grunt] Yee-haw! It's a ringer. That's how you do it down here on the farm.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I lost.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Ah, don't feel bad, Rainbow. It's all in good fun.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I hate losing.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Besides, you're a mighty good athlete. I'm just better. Heh heh heh.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: All right, Applejack, you think you're the top athlete in all of Ponyville?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Well, I was gonna say in all of Equestria, but that might be gildin' the lily.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: ...and I think I'm the top athlete. So let's prove it.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Prove what?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I challenge you to an Iron Pony competition. A series of athletic contests to decide who's the best, once and for all.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: You know what, Rainbow? You're on.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: So you two are doing what, now?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: An Iron<U+0097>

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Iron Pony competition.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: See, we've set up a bunch of events to decide which one of us is<U+0097>

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: And I'm here to...?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [grunt] I don't know. Why is she here?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: To be our judge and keep score.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Hello everypony, and welcome to the first annual Iron Pony competition!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Uh, Spike, who are you talking to?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Um... Uh, them! Let the games begin!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Ready. Set. Go!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [gasp] Dagnabbit.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Time, Spike?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: 17 seconds.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: You're kiddin'! That breaks my record from last year's rodeo.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: But you got a five second penalty for nudging the barrel.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [sigh] Nuts and chews! Still, that's 22 seconds. Not too shabby. Hey, don't be nervous. Remember, it's all in good fun. Now git on up there.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Ready. Set. Go!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Woo! That was some fancy hoofwork there, Rainbow!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Thanks, but I [pant] couldn't have been as fast as you.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: What was the time on that, Spike?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: 18 seconds!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: 18 seconds. Rainbow, are you sure you're not secretly a rodeo pony?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Rainbow Dash wins the barrel lead!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Oh, I can't believe I won.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Yeah, well, don't you go gettin' used to it.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Years of applebuckin'.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Ugh.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Waa-hoo!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Whoo-hoo!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Why me?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Go!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa-hoa! Whoa! Whoaaa! Ouch.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Ready for another pony ride?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: No.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Go!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Guh guh guh guh guh guh guh guh guh guh guh guhwhoaaaaaa!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Rainbow Dash wins the bronco-buck.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: And I lose.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Whoa! [grunt] How do I get roped into these things?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [grunt] Does this count?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [grunt] Wah!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Yeah.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Fillies and gentlecolts, at the halfway point, our competitors are tied at five and five.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Who are you talking to?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Them!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Yes!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Be a good sport, Applejack.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: All right, you two. This is the final event. Give it all you've got.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Looks like the workhorse might come out ahead in this one.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [mumbling] That's not fair. You can't use your wings to help you win.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Huh?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [mumbling] You're cheatin'!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I can't understand you with that rope in your mouth.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Whoo-hoo! I win by a landslide... or mudslide in your case. [chuckles] I am the Iron Pony!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Only 'cause you cheated.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: What?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: You used your wingpower to help you win over half those contests.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Sounds like sour apples to me.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Are you sayin' you didn't use your wings?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Well... no. But you never said I couldn't use my wings.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I didn't think I needed to tell you to play fair.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I still would have won even without my wings.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Hah! Prove it.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Gladly. How?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Tomorrow is the annual Runnin' of the Leaves. I challenge you to race me in it.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Heh! Easy shmeasy.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Hold on! There is one condition: the point is to run, so no wings allowed.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: No wings? No problem.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Twilight, hurry up, we're gonna be late for the race.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Why are you so excited about the race? It's only for ponies.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Yeah, but I'm hoping I can be the announcer again. Just listen: Fillies and gentlecolts, welcome to the annual Running of the--

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Welcome to the annual Running of the Leaves! This is Pinkie Pie, your official p-eye-in-the-sky announcer.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Sorry, Spike. I guess that job's already taken.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: As everypony knows, the Running is a very important tradition, for without it, the autumn leaves of Equestria would never fall. So get ready, ponies. The Running of the Leaves will begin in five minutes.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Pardon me, excuse me. Make way for the Iron Pony.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: The Iron Phony, you mean.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: So, Applejack, you ready to win second place?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I'm ready to run a good, clean race.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Yeah, yeah...

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: You are not allowed to use your wings.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I could win this race with both wings tied behind my back.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [grunts] Trussed up like a turkey. Well, a turkey who can't fly, that is.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Very funny.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: 'Least now we know we're racin' fair and square.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Racers! Please take your positions!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Um... Pinkie Pie?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Uh, yeah. I know you're doing the announcing today and stuff and... I'm sure you're gonna do a great job and all, but... I was just wondering...

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: What?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Aw... Forget it.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Spike! Would you like to be my co-reporter? We could comment on the action together.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: We could?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Climb on up.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Twilight? What in tarnation are you doin' up here?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I'm racing.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [laughs] Good one, Twilight.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I'm not joking.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: What? You're not an athlete, you're a... well... you're an egghead.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I am not an egghead, I am well-read.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [softly] Egghead.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [snickers] But have you ever run a race?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Well, no, but I do know a lot about running.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: And you know this from...

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Books. I've read several on the subject.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: What'd you read, "The Egghead's Guide to Running"? Did you stretch out your eye muscles to warm up? [laugh] Get it? Eye muscles.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Scoff if you must, Rainbow. But the Running of the Leaves is a Ponyville tradition, and since I'm here to learn, I've decided I should experience it myself.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Yeah. See you at the finish line... Tomorrow.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: All right, ponies, are you ready?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Get set.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: And they're off!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Welcome to the official coverage of the Running of the Leaves! You know, Spike, despite its name, the leaves don't do any of the actual running. No, that's left to my little ponies.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Why, yes, Pinkie, it's the running of the ponies that causes the leaves to fall.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Ugh. Those lazy, lazy leaves. But this year, the run is about more than the weather. It's about the race to the finish and the two runners who want to win it: Applejack and Rainbow Dash.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: You know, Pinkie, these two ponies have a bit of a grudge match they're trying to settle. Trying to prove who's the most athletic.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Yes, and "grudge" rhymes with "fudge".

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Yes, it... does. What?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: And I like fudge. But if I eat too much fudge I get a pudge and then I can't budge.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: So... no fudge?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Oh, no thanks. I had a big breakfast. Let's check in with our two competitive ponies, Applejack and Rainbow Dash. Having come fast out of the gate, Applejack and Rainbow Dash are evenly matched running neck and neck. But what's this? Applejack is making a move, she's now ahead by a nose. But Rainbow Dash won't let Applejack have it and takes the lead. She's ahead by half a nose. Or maybe three quarters of a nose. No, about sixty-three point seven percent of a nose... roughly speaking. Applejack sees this move and pushes forth with her strong workhorse legs slinking ahead by three hundred and fifty noses!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Not so easy without wings, is it?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Come on, Rainbow. Show 'em a little dash.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Ho-hold your horses, Pinkie! Rainbow Dash is catching up the frontrunner Applejack!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: What an upset. I thought Applejack had this in the bag.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: You didn't think I was gonna let you off that easily, did you?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Whoa! I don't believe it.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I know, it's beautiful, isn't it?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Not the scenery, Twilight. Rainbow Dash just tripped me.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: She did not.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: She did too!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: She did not, and if you slowed down and looked where you're going, like me, you'd see that you tripped over a rock.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: What? Oh, hayseed! Now I got a lot of ground to make up to catch Rainbow.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Just be careful!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: See you at the finish line!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I don't believe it. After a huge setback, Applejack is back at the front of the pack.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: She's the head of the pack, all right. The pick of the litter! The cat's pajamas! Oh wait, why would Applejack take some poor kitty's PJs? That's not very sporting of her.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Oookay... Let's get back to the race.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Not so fast, Applejack! This race isn't over yet!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: It is for you. Heh.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Whoa! Guh, I don't believe it, Applejack tripped me.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Don't you ponies ever look where you're going? You tripped on a stump. See?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Oh, I see. A big cheater is what I see.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Rainbow, Applejack would never cheat. It was just an accident.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Sure it was. I mean, yeah, I'm sure it was.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Remember, Rainbow, this is just a game.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Yes, but the rules have changed, and two can play at that game.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Welcome back, Ponyvillians, it's me, Pinkie Pie.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: And Spike. Looks like Rainbow is doing her best to catch up.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I'm not sure how ketchup is going to help her in this contest. Now, in a hot dog eating contest it can make them doggies nice and slippery, but personally, I prefer mustard. How about you, Spike?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Uh... I... like... pickles?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Aaand it looks like Applejack has found herself in quite a pickle as Rainbow overtakes her.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Look, ma, no wings.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: As the racers enter Equestria's Whitetail Wood, Rainbow Dash is back in the lead.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Ugh. Hey, Rainbow!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [gasp] Why, that little cheater did that on purpose. It's on.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Nice one, Rainbow.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Later!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [gasp] Aaa!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Oh my, Whitetail Wood is just lovely. Hey, Rainbow, shouldn't you be up ahead?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [chuckling] I'm sure I'll win now.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Except that the other racers just passed you.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Oh horse apples... See ya!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Applejack, what are you doing up here?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: There aren't even any trees.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Er, no, but the sign's pointed this way... Rainbow. Mind giving me a lift?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: What the hay?! You said no flying!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: No, I said no wings.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I must say, Spike, that this has been the most interesting Running of the Leaves in Equestria history!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: With the most interesting announcing.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: But it isn't the running that's been fascinating. It's the lack of running!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: [grunt] Aaa!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Whoa!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Whoa!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Forgive me, girls. I know I'm not an athlete, but shouldn't the Running of the Leaves actually involve running?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: You know, I think Twilight's right.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: You do?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Yeah! If you wanna beat me, you better... RUUUN!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Once again, Rainbow Dash and Applejack are neck and neck, jockeying for position. Applejack inches ahead, now it's Rainbow, it's Applejack, it's Rainbow Dash, it's Applejack--

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Oh no, she di'int!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Oh yes, she di'id!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Cut it out!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: No, you cut it out!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: You started it.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: And now I'm gonna finish it.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Oh no, you won't.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Oh yes, I will. [grunt] That's it! All bets are off!
