title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Oh no, you don't.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: It's Applejack, it's Rainbow Dash, it's Applejack, it's Rainbow Dash--

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I won!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: No, I won!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I won!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: You tied!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: For first?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: For last!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Last?!

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Then who won?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Oh no, but I did get fifth place, which is rather good considering I've never run a race before.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: What? How's that even possible?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: You ran so slow, and looked at the scenery.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Exactly. I paced myself, just like my book said. Then at the end, when all the other ponies were worn out, I sprinted to the finish.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I don't believe it. Twilight beat us.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Well, with all your horsing around, it was quite easy.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: You're right, Twilight. Our behavior was just terrible.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: We weren't very good sports.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Sounds to me that an important lesson was learned.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: W-What are you doin' here?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Fall is one of my favorite seasons, so I came to celebrate the Running of the Leaves.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I'm sorry you had to see us being such poor sports, Princess.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: That's all right, Applejack. Anypony can get swept up in the excitement of competition.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: It's important to remember that the friendship is always more important than the competition.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Exactly, Twilight. Now, unfortunately, because the two of you were busy tricking each other instead of shaking down leaves, many of the lovely trees of Equestria are still covered.

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: Why, Princess, I bet we can knock those leaves down for you lickety-split. Whaddya say, friend? Wanna go for another run?

title: Fall Weather Friends
dialog: I'd love to stretch my legs.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, Opalescence. Can't you just picture it? Moi, stepping out in a stunning new gown at the Grand Galloping Gala in Canterlot!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Why, yes! I did make it myself. Thank you so much for asking.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, Opal, of course you can help me. Thank you. What's that? You want to help me more? Oh, aren't you the sweetest thing? Careful now. Don't move. This shouldn't take long at all.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Howdy, Rarity!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Shh... Can't you see Rarity is trying to concentrate?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: What do you think she's makin'?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Looks like a dress.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Well, that makes sense. Since this is a dressmaker's shop and all.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Is there something I can help you with?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, so very sorry to trouble you, Rarity, but I need a quick favor. Could you please fix the button for me? It's my dress for the Grand Galloping Gala.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, no, no, no! You can't wear this... old thing. You need a glamorous new outfit for the Gala and I'll make it for you. No problem at all. It will be my pleasure!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, that's really sweet of you to offer, Rarity, but I can't let you do that. It would be so much work. This dress is fine.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Twilight Sparkle. I insist on making you a new dress.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: But...

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Not another word! I won't take no for an answer.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Well, in that case... Thank you for your generosity, Rarity. Knowing your handiwork, I'm sure it will be absolutely beautiful.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Let me guess, Applejack. You don't want a new gown either.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Gown? Shoot. I was just gonna wear my old work duds.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: You can't possibly be serious, Applejack! You absolutely must wear formal attire.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Hm... Nah.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: What if I just spruce up your... duds for you a little bit?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Okay, sure. Why not? Since you're up for it and all. Just don't make them too... frou-frou-y.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Deal!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Look out below!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Sorry. New trick. Didn't quite work.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Hmm... [gasp] Idea! I'll make you an outfit for the Gala too, Rainbow Dash.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Outfit for the what now?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: I'll make one for you and you and all of you. Oh! And of course Pinkie and Fluttershy too. Oh, and when I'm done, we can hold our very own fashion show!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: What a great idea! If you're sure you can handle it.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, it'll be a little bit of work, but it will be a wonderful boost for my business. Plus, fun!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, I love fun things!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Then it's settled. We'll have a fashion show starring us.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: So all you have to do is make a different, stunning, original, amazing outfit for one, two, three, four, five... plus yourself, six ponies? And lickety split?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, Applejack. You make it sound as if it's going to be hard.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Thread by thread, stitching it together Twilight's dress, cutting out the pattern snip by snip Making sure the fabric folds nicely It's the perfect color and so hip Always gotta keep in mind my pacing Making sure the clothes' correctly facing I'm stitching Twilight's dress

title: Suited For Success
dialog: That's it. Keep them closed. Don't look. Okay, you can look now!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: These are your new outfits. What do you think of your old duds now, Applejack? Pretty swanky, are they not? And Twilight! I made this dress for you and I designed each outfit theme to perfectly reflect each pony's unique personality. Oh, it took me forever to get the colors right on this one, Rainbow Dash, but I did it. Oh, and it turned out beautiful, don't you think? And I know you are going to love yours, Fluttershy. It just sings spring! And Pinkie Pie, look! Pink! Your favorite! Aren't they all amazing?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Wow... They're...

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Yeah, they're...

title: Suited For Success
dialog: They sure are... somethin'.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Yes! Something.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: I love something! Something is my favorite!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: It's... nice.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: But what's the matter? Don't you like them?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: They're very nice...

title: Suited For Success
dialog: And we're plumb grateful 'cause you worked so hard on them.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Mine's just not as cool as I was imagining. She asked.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: I guess what we're all saying is that they're just not what we had in mind.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: That's okay. Not a problem. There's plenty more where that came from. They were only a first pass. You're my friends and I want you to be 110% satisfied. Not to worry, I'll redo them.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, Rarity. You don't have to do that. They're fine.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: I want them to be better than just fine. I want you to think they're absolutely perfect.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Are you sure? I mean, we wouldn't wanna impose.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, it's no imposition. Really, I insist.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Well, in that case... Thank you again, Rarity.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: What have I gotten myself into?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Hello? You wanted to see me, Rarity?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Fluttershy! Your new-new gown's ready. I completely revised it and I know you're going to love it. What do you think?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: I... love it.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, you're just saying that.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: No, no. I do. It's... nice.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: "Nice"?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Nice.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: If you don't like it, you should just tell me.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, but I do like it.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Like it or love it?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Um... both?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Which is it?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Please stop asking me this, I...

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Well, just tell me what you really think.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: No, that's okay...

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Tell me.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: No... it's fine...

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Tell me!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: I... like it...

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Tell me, tell me, tell-me-tell-me-tell-me!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: All right! Since you really wanna know... [inhales] The armscye's tight, the middy collar doesn't go with the shawl lapel, the hems are clearly machine-stitched, the pleats are uneven, the fabric looks like toile, you used a backstitch here when it clearly called for a topstitch or maybe a traditional blanket stitch, and the overdesign is reminiscent of pr<ea>t-<e0>-porter and not true French haute couture. [pauses] But, uh... you know... um, whatever you want to do is fine.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Now, the stars on my belt need to be technically accurate. Orion has three stars on his belt, not four.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Stitch by stitch, stitching it together Deadline looms, don't you know the client's always right? Even if my fabric choice was perfect Gotta get them all done by tonight Pinkie Pie, that color's too obtrusive Wait until you see it in the light I'm sewing them together!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Don't you think my gown would be more "me" with some lollipops?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Well, I think...

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Balloons?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Well...

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Do it!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Hour by hour, one more change I'm sewing them together, take great pains Fluttershy, you're putting me in a bind Rainbow Dash, what is on your mind? Oh my gosh, there's simply not much time Don't forget, Applejack's duds must shine

title: Suited For Success
dialog: That constellation is Canis Major, not Minor.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: French haute couture, please.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Ugh...

title: Suited For Success
dialog: What if it rains? Galoshes!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: More balloons! Oh no, that's too many balloons. More candy! Oh, less candy. Oh wait, I know. Streamers!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Streamers?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Whose dress is this?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Streamers it is.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: What?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Aren't you going to tell me to change something too?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: No, I just want my dress to be cool.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Do you not like the color?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: The color's fine, just make it look cooler.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Do you not like the shape?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: The shape's fine, just make the whole thing... you know, cooler. It needs to be about 20% cooler.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: All we ever want is indecision

title: Suited For Success
dialog: All we really like is what we know

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Gotta balance style with adherence

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Making sure we make a good appearance

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Even if you simply have to fudge it

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Got to overcome intimidation Remember, it's all in the presentation!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, Opal. These are the ugliest dresses I've ever made.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Okay. I did exactly what each of you asked for. Now don't hold back. Let me know what you really think.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh my!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: It's... perfect!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: It's cool!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Why, they're the best duds I ever did see.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Thank you, Rarity.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Are you as happy with them as we are? Huh? Huh? Huh?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Well, I'm... happy that all of you are happy. I'm just relieved to finally be done.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: You are never gonna believe this! You've heard of Hoity Toity?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: The bigwig fashion hotshot in Canterlot?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Uh-huh. He heard about your fashion show. Well, maybe I happened to mention it to him... He's coming here all the way from Canterlot to see your work, Rarity!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Whoa, Nelly! You could sell a ton o' dresses to this guy. Your business will be boomin'!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Wow!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: That's so cool!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: I don't believe it!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Hoity Toity? He's coming here? To see THESE dresses?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Yep! Get ready for all of your dreams to come true.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh. [gasp] There he is! [deep breaths] Okay. Relax, Rarity. Your friends like their outfits and so will he. [squeals] What's wrong with the lights?! Oh, yes. That means the show's starting. Good.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Since the beginning of time, the elite of Equestria have longed for pony fashions that truly expressed the essence of their very souls. Patiently waiting decades -- no, centuries -- for the perfect pony gown. Today, at long last, Equestria, your wait is over! Let's hear it for the breathtaking designs of Ponyville's own Rarity!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Why's everypony lookin' at us like that?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh dear.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: You think we overdid it?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Nah. [pause] Okay, maybe a little.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, those amateurish designs look like a piled-on mishmash of everything but a kitchen sink! It's a travesty is what it is. Those outfits are the ugliest things I've ever seen, oh for shame. Who is responsible for subjecting our eyes to these horrors? Not to mention wasting my valuable time.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Come on out and take a bow, Rarity. You worked really hard for this. Yes! All right, woo-hoo! Go, Rarity!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Rarity? You okay in there? You haven't come out for days.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: You're not a laughing stock, Rarity...

title: Suited For Success
dialog: She kind of is.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Shhh! Come on out and talk to us.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: [sobbing] Leave me alone! I vant to be alone! I want to wallow in... whatever it is that ponies are supposed to wallow in! Do ponies wallow in pity? Oh, listen to me, I don't even know what I'm supposed to wallow in! I'm so pathetic!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Now what do we do?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Uh... panic?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: That's your answer for everything!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Well, we can't just leave Rarity like this.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: She'll become a crazy cat lady!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: She only has one cat.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Give her time.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Exile... I guess technically I'd have to move away to live in exile. Where would I go? And what would I pack? Oh, it's going to take me forever to do all of that packing. What are you supposed to pack when you go to exile? Are you supposed to pack warm?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Huh? Opal?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Opal, how did you get up there? Hang on, you poor dear! Mama's coming!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Rainbow Dash?! How dare you strand my poor Opal in a tree?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Well, how else were we gonna get you out here to show you this?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: We all finished your dress for you.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Thanks to Fluttershy's freaky knowledge of sewing.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Do you like it?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Like it? Like it?!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Uh-uh. She doesn't like it.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: No, I don't like it.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: I love it!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: You ponies did an amazing job. It's exactly the way I imagined it.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: We just followed your brilliant design.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Like we should have let you do for our outfits. Those first dresses you designed were perfect.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: We're so super sorry.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: You worked really hard to make our dresses exactly the way we wanted them. We all saw how well that turned out.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, I forgive you.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Well, that's mighty big of you.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: But my whole career is still ruined!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, right. That.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Maybe not.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: All right, I haven't got all day.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Take two.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Hello... Oh, this can't be the same designer.

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Simply magnificent! And I suddenly have a fierce craving for some Dutch apple pie, candied apples on a stick, apple turnovers, apple cobbler...

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Brilliant!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, spectacular!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Now this is a fashion show! All of these dresses are absolutely amazing. Who is responsible? Step forward, show yourself!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Brava! Brava! Magnifico! Encore!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Oh, thank you. Thank you! Oh, thank you so much!

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Rarity, my congratulations to you on a most impressive fashion debut. Would you do me the great honor of allowing me to feature your couture in my Best of the Best Boutique in Canterlot?

title: Suited For Success
dialog: Now, I'll need you to make a dozen of each dress for me by next Tuesday.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Tuh! Nuh! Uh! Nyuh!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Eyes over here, Spike!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Uh, sorry.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: For this to work, it's crucial we keep our concentration totally on the-

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Ooh!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Nyuh!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Spike! This magic needs our full attention to make it happen. There's no other way!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I can't help it. Look!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Ugh, never mind her. She's just being Pinkie Pie.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Super-extra Pinkie Pie today.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Hmm... Twitchy twitcha twitcha twitch.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Pinkie Pie? What in the wide, wide world of Equestria are you up to?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh! It's my tail! It's my tail! It's a-twitch a-twitchin'! And you know what that means!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Actually, Pinkie, I haven't the slightest idea.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: The twitchin' means my Pinkie Sense is telling me that stuff's gonna start falling! You two better duck for cover.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh, Pinkie, it's not gonna rain. Why, there's barely even a cloud in the-ugh!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: He just said "nice catch" in Frog.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh, I'm so, so sorry. You okay, Twilight Sparkle? I just couldn't stand to see the pond getting so over-populated, what with the frogs all hopping into each other and all, so I decided to fly as many as I can on over to Froggy Bottom Bogg.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Of course you did.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: [muffled] Bye-bye!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Um... Twilight? You gotta little somethin' on your face there.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh, really? Did your Pinkie Sense tell you that, too?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Nah! I could just see it. La-la-la-la-la...

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: C'mon, Spike, let's continue our practice session where there's a little less commotion.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Wow! That was amazing! Pinkie Pie predicted something would fall, and it did!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh, come on. She said that something would fall, and a frog just happened to fall right around the same time. A coincidence, nothing else to it.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: My tail! My tail! Twitch-a-twitch! Twitch-a-twitch! Somethin' else is gonna fall!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh, Pinkie, please. Nothing else is gonna fa-aaah!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh no, Twilight fell! Is it... safe to go help her?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: It's okay, my tail stopped twitching. La-la-la-la-la, la-la-la...

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Ha ha! That was amazing!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh, please.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Uh, Twilight? Why are you hanging out in a ditch?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Because, Pinkie Pie predicted it!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Honestly, Spike, she did not. Two coincidences in a row like this may be unlikely, but it's still easier to believe than twitchy tails that predict the future.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: [gasp] Twitchy tail? Pinkie Sense? Whoa! Nyu-uh!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Don't worry, it's safe. Prediction already came true.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh, wait. Don't tell me you believe in this stuff, too?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I know it doesn't make much sense, but those of us who have been in Ponyville a while, have learned over time that, if Pinkie's a-twichin', you better listen.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: My ears are flopping! My ears are flopping!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Nyuh! What does that mean?!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I'll start a bath for you.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Huh? [chuckles] A bath? This thing keeps on getting more ridiculous by the minute!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Phhhhft.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Sooo, basically, it works like this: I get different, little, niggly feelings and they mean different things. Like when my back is itchy, it means it's my lucky day. And, when my knee gets pinchy, that means something scary's about to happen.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Is your knee pinchy now?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: No, but my shoulder's achy. That means there's an alligator in the tub.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: [scream] How come your knee didn't get pinchy?! That isn't just scary, it's downright dangerous!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: No, it's not, silly! This is my pet alligator, Gummy. He's got no teeth. See? Haha!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Okay, okay... I get it.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Well, I still don't believe all this... "special power" stuff. It's just a bunch of mumbo-jumbo.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: What's not to believe? You do magic, what's the difference?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Huge! For one thing, [clears throat] magic is something you study and practice. It only happens when you decide to do it, and it's meant to make something specific that you choose to happen, happen. With you, uh, it makes no sense at all!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: That's so not true, Twilight! Sometimes it's a bunch of random things happening to my body at random times that supposedly predict the future. I call 'em "combos".

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Combos?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Sure! You know, like, ear flop, then knee twitch, then eye flutter. That means the sky is about to be graced with a beautiful rainbow!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Yeah, sure.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Uh-oh, I feel a combo coming on. Ear flop, eye flutter, knee twitch!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Ugh!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Ughhh... You said that combo meant "beautiful rainbow".

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh no-no-no-no-no. You're thinking of an ear flop, then knee twitch, then eye flutter. This was an ear flop, then eye flutter, then knee twitch. That usually means "look out for opening doors". You okay?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I don't believe this.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: You don't believe because you don't understand.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Hmm...

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Okay. Now when you get another twitch, we'll have all kinds of scientific information.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Okie-dokie-lokie!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Any twitches yet?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Nopey-dopey!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Now? Anything?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Wait! Hold on! Uhh, no.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Are you kidding me?! After a whole day of nonstop twitching, now that I've got you all hooked up, you're not getting a single one?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I don't control it, they just come and go.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: That makes no sense!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Sometimes you just have to believe in things, even when you can't figure 'em out.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I will not believe in anything I cannot explain.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Wait, hold on, I'm feeling something...

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh my gosh, what? What is it?!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: It's my tummy! That usually means I'm hungry! Let's eat!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Urgh... You know what? [bite] [snap] Just forget it! I don't need to know if this is real or not. I don't need to understand it! I don't even care!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Okie-dokie-lokie. [gasp] Uh-oh. [gasp] Hu-bu-bu-bu-buh!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Pinkie? Have you seen Twilight?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Uh-huh.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Twilight? What are ya doing back there?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Rrrrgh... Did you two plan this?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Plan what?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Urgh! This is ridiculous. This can't be happening. This makes no sense. I have to figure this out.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Twilight?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Ah!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Whoa-oh-uh!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Honestly, Spike, don't you know better than to sneak up on ponies?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh, sorry, but, um, well, isn't that what you're doing?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: [gasp] No! I'm doing scientific research. I'm observing Pinkie Pie, scientific name: Pinkius Pieicus, in its natural habitat.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Pinkius-whoicus? Hh!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: There's something fishy going on with the whole twitchy prediction thing, and I'm getting to the bottom of it. So, shh. Come on, Pinkius Pieicus is on the move.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Hm... Itchy nose...

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Aha! That makes no sense. See? She's hiding like something's about to fall from the sky, but a twitchy tail means something's gonna fall from the sky, not an itchy nose.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: This proves...

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: ...perhaps conclusively, that<U+0097>

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Gah!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Spike! Where are you going? I'm trying to teach you the value of scientific<U+0097>

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: What's she doing now?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Smelling a flower.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Holy guacamole! I wonder what that means?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Probably that the flower smells good. Wait. I'm getting something. Ear flop, eye flutter, knee twitch.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Hold on... You told me that's the combo that says "watch out for opening doors"!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh-ho. You really, really believe this stuff, don't you? Here, let me show you there's nothing to be afraid of. You see? I promise you there's nothing to fear from that<U+0097> Wo-o-ah! Ow! Ugh! Ow! Ow!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Twilight! You came to visit my new apple cellar, how nice. Twi? You okay? Uh, Twi?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Here, let me help you.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Okay, take this down: twitchy tail.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Twitchy tail? [gasp] Twitchy tail!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Hush, Spike! We can't let Pinkie know we're here, remember?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Something's gonna fall, something's gonna fall! Run for your lives. Ah-ha-ha!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Ugh, Spike honestly, you're overreact<U+0097>

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Ugh!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: [humming] Hey, Applejack. Whatcha doin'?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Takin' more apples to my new apple cellar. How 'bout you, Pinkie? Whatchu doin'?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh, letting Twilight secretly follow me all day without me knowing.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: You mean you knew all along?! Why didn't you tell me?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: [giggles] Silly, that would've spoiled the secret!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Urgh!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Tail... still twitching?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: All done, clear skies from here on in, as far as I can tell<U+0097> Hu-bu-bu-bu-bu-bu!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh no! What does that one mean?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Dunno, never gotten any like it before, but whatever that shudder's about, it's a doozy. Something you'd never expect to happen is gonna happen! Hu-bu-bu-bu-bu hu-bu-bu-bu! And it's gonna happen... at Froggy Bottom Bogg!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: [gasp] That's where Fluttershy's headed!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh no! Is it about her?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Uh, I'm not sure.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: We better go and make sure she's okay.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Calm down, everypony. All we know right now is that Pinkie Pie just got a case of the shivers. That's all.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Guh<U+0097> Hey! I thought you didn't believe in this stuff?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I don't. I just want to be there to see the look on Pinkie's face when we find out nothing's wrong.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Okie-dokie!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: [shivers] Hu-bu-bu-bu-bu-bu!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Cold? Need a jacket or something?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: No thanks, I'm fine. [shivers] Hu-bu-bu-bu-bu-bu!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: So... Whadda'ya think happened to Fluttershy?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I hope nothin'.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I know, but, whadda'ya think happened?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I'm tryin' not to think about it.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Me too. But I'm thinkin' about it anyway. Like, what if she exploded?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Just exploded? For no reason?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Yeah, like boom!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Whoa!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I know.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: What if... What if she exploded, and then... and then exploded again!?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Can you do that? Can you explode twice?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Of course not.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: But what if she exploded, and exploded again, and then<U+0097> ugh!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Will you two stop? She's fine, I'm sure of it.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I hope you're right, for Fluttershy's sake. Look! There's Froggy Bottom Bogg!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Fluttershy?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Fluttershy! You're okay!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Of course.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Phew, what a relief.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I'm so glad everything's all right.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Sorry, I know it's not nice to gloat but... Aha! I told you there was nothing to worry about, and I was right. Pinkie Pie said whatever she was shuddering about was a [cough] doozy, and [cough] and the only [cough] doozy here is how right I am.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Um... Twilight?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Pinkie's made a lot of predictions today but [cough] ugh, what is that smell? But what we've shown here is that there's no point in believing [cough] in anything you can't see for yourself.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: W-Well t-then, s-see what's b-b-behind you, Twilight!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I see it... But I don't believe it!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Is that a hydra!?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Who cares? Run!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Pinkie! Come on!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh, I'm so sorry.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Ah!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Everypony up that hill!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: He-e-elp!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Coming, Spike! Hang on!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I think we're gonna make it.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: But Pinkie's still shuddering!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh, lookie there, it stopped. O-h-h-h, t-h-e-r-e i-t i-s a-g-a-i-n.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Ugh, he'll be up here in no time! Quick, one at a time, cross!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Nyu-uh! Uh, do you know any spells for turning a hydra into a mouse?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: No.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: How about a squirrel?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: No!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: How 'bout<U+0097>

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: No small rodents of any kind!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: That's too bad.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: A hop, skip, and a... jump!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Whoa-ho!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Whoa-oa-oa-oa-oa!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh... What would a brave pony like Rainbow Dash do? Chaaarge!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: T-T-T-twilight!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: T-T-T-twilight! You have to jump!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I'll never make it!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: You'll be fine!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I will not!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: It's your only ho-o-ope! You have to take a leap of faith!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Y-ugh! No! Oh no! Noooo! WA-A-A-AH! Ugh! Blegh!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I knew you could do it, Twilight!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I don't know how it happened; coincidence, dumb luck, or what, but you said there'd be a doozy here at Froggy Bottom Bogg, and I'd say we just had ourselves one heck of a doozy. I mean that hydra<U+0097>

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Pinkie?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: That wasn't it.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Huh?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: What wasn't what?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: What are you talking about, Pink?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: The hydra wasn't the doozy.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I'm still getting the shudders. Oo-o-oh, oo-o-oh. You see? There it is again. Whatever the doozy was at Froggy Bottom Bogg, my Pinkie Sense says it still hasn't happened.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Huh? But I<U+0097> WHAT?! The hydra wasn't the doozy?! How could it not be the doozy?! What could be doozier than that?!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Dunno, but it just wasn't it.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Rrrgh... [flames and growls] Ooh... I give up...

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Give what up, Twi?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: The fight. I can't fight it anymore. I don't understand how, why, or what, but Pinkie Sense somehow... makes sense. I don't see how it does, but it just does. Just because I don't understand doesn't mean it's not true.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Y-Y-Y-You m-m-mean you b-b-b-believe?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Eeyup, I guess I do.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oo-woo-oo-oo-oo, woo-oo-oo-oo-oh, woo-oo-oo-oo-oo-oo-ooh. Ooh! [gasp] That was it. That's the doozy.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Bbrrbbrrbbrr.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: What? What is?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: You believing. I never expected that to happen. That was the doozy, oh and, oh what a doozy of a doozy it was! La-la-la-la-la...

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Oh, good, Spike, you're here. Take a letter.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: With pleasure, Twilight.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia, I'm happy to report that<U+0097> Spike, what have I been saying about focus?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Spike: I know, but I... Well...

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: What's wrong, Spike? Never thought you'd see me with an umbrella hat on?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Not really, no.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Pinkie's tail's a-twitchin'. What else can I do?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I am happy to report that I now realize there are wonderful things in this world you just can't explain, but that doesn't necessarily make them any less true. It just means you have to choose to believe in them, and sometimes it takes a friend to show you the way.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Honk!

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Honk.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Always your faithful student, Twilight Sparkle.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: There it goes again.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: I wonder what's gonna drop outta the sky this time?

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: You never know.

title: Feeling Pinkie Keen
dialog: Twitchy tail? Holy guacamole!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Now, what have we learned?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Loss of control.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Good.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Screaming and hollering.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Yes, and most importantly?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Passion!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Right! So now that you know the elements of a good cheer, let's hear one.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [inhales] Yay.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: ... Ugh. You're gonna cheer for me like that? Louder.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Yay.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Louder!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Yay.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Louder!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [deep breath] [quietly] Yaaay.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Ugh...

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Too loud?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Yay.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [deep breath] And now, phase one of my routine.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Wooo.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Phase two.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Way to go.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [sigh] Last one. Thank you so much for helping me clean up all these books, guys. It was a crazy week of studying.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Rainbow Dash, you rock! Woohoo. [gasp] Did my cheering do that?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Hehe. Sorry about that ladies. That was a truly feeble performance.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Actually, it wasn't all bad. I particularly liked it when you made the clouds spin.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Ugh. I'm not talking about my performance, I'm talking about yours. That feeble cheering!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: What are you two arguing about?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Were we arguing? I'm sorry.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [grunt] I wish you guys could come to Cloudsdale to see me compete in the Best Young Flyer Competition.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: What's that?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: It's where all the greatest Pegasus flyers get together and show off their different flying styles! Some are fast! [makes car sounds] And some are graceful. Whoa, whoa, whoa!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Golly. I'd love to see you strut yer stuff in that competition.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Yeah. I wish you guys could be there. Fluttershy's a great support, but her cheering isn't exactly inspirational.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Ooh! I'd love to see you make a sonic rainboom! It's like, the most coolest thing ever! Even though I've never actually seen it, but I mean come on! It's a sonic rainboom! How not cool could it possibly not be?!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: What's a sonic rainboom?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: You really need to get out more. The sonic rainboom is legendary! When a Pegasus like Rainbow Dash gets going sooo fast... Boom! A sonic boom and a rainbow can happen all at once!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: And Rainbow Dash here's the only pony to ever pull it off!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: It was a long time ago... I was just a filly.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Yeah, but you're gonna do it again, right?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Are... you kidding? I'm the greatest flyer to ever come out of Cloudsdale! I could do sonic rainbooms in my sleep.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Wow. If you pull that off, you'll win the crown for sure!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: The grand prize is an entire day with the Wonderbolts. A whole day of flying with my lifelong heroes... It'll be a dream come true!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Yay.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I'm gonna go rest up. Don't wanna over prepare myself, y'know. Hehe. You, on the other hand, better keep practicing. I need a cheering section to match my spectacular performance.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: She's practiced that move a hundred times, and she's never even come close to doing it. I don't know if I can cheer loud enough to help her.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Well, guess we better get this cleaned up... again.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Go on, go on.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Go on what?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Find a spell that will get us wingless ponies into Cloudsdale. Didn't you see how nervous she was?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Nervous? Have you spit yer bit or somethin'? She was tootin' her own horn louder than the brass section of a marching band!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Oh, puh-lease. I have put on enough fashion shows to recognize stage fright when I see it. We've got to find a way to be there for her. Now go on!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Owaa! Ugh. How am I supposed to find a flight spell in this mess?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: A flight spell? One sec. Page twenty-seven.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: How'd you do that?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: It landed on my face when Rainbow Dash knocked me into the bookcase.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Here it is! A spell that will allow Earth ponies to fly for three days. Ooh, it looks really difficult... I'm not sure I can do it.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: You've got to try!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Okay... But who's gonna volunteer to be the test subject?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I will! For Rainbow Dash, I will go first.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I think it worked!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: You've got to learn to be assertive, Fluttershy. Don't be afraid to speak up.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I didn't get kicked out.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Now wait just a minute! Oh, I'm sorry. I'm trying to be more assertive. Anyhow... She is going to do a sonic rainboom!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Then show up at the Cloudeseum and see for yourself! ...If you're free.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Did you see that? I was so assertive!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [sigh] Those guys are right. I'll never be able to do it.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: But, Rainbow Dash. Just because you've failed the sonic rainboom a hundred thousand times in practice doesn't mean you won't be able to do it in front of an entire stadium, full of impatient, super-critical sportsfan ponies.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Aaaaaah! What do I do?! Everypony's gonna see me fail! The Wonderbolts will never let a loser like me join. Princess Celestia will probably banish me to the Everfree Forest! My life is ruined!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Rare...

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Rare?! The sonic rainboom is way more than rare!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Rarity?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Rarity! Are you... flying?!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I most certainly am! Aren't my wings smashing?! Twilight made them for me. I just adore them! Why so shocked? We couldn't leave our favorite flyer without a big cheering section!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: "We"? I... I can't believe it!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: It's incredible!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: This is so cool! You guys made it!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Sure did!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Wait! How'd you do that? Only Pegasus ponies can walk on clouds.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Haha. Pretty cool, huh?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I found a spell that makes temporary wings, but it was too difficult to do more than once. So I found an easier spell that lets the rest of us walk on clouds.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: And we came to cheer you to victory!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: To be honest, I was starting to get just the teeniest, tiniest bit nervous. But I feel a lot better now that you guys are here. Hey, we've got some time before the competition. Why don't Fluttershy and I show you around Cloudsdale?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Here it is: the greatest city in the sky!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [in mirror] Oooh! Aaah!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Uhh... Some of the greatest Pegasi in history came from Cloudsdale!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Oh, wait for me!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Why, thank you!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Be careful with those wings, Rarity. They're made from gossamer and morning dew, and they're incredibly delicate.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Don't worry, Twilight. I'm sure they can't get worn out from too much attention.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Since we're up here, I'd sure like to get a look at where the weather's made.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Great idea! C'mon, girls. To the weather factory!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: This is where they make the snowflakes. Each one is hoofmade. As you can see, it's a delicate operation.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [gasp] Ooh, the snowflakes look even better from up here.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: We better move on before Rarity ruins winter and causes a drought.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: And here's where they make the rainbows!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [slurp] [pants] Spicyyyyyy!...

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Yeah, rainbows aren't really known for their flavor.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Hmm... Yeah, I guess I could see that.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Rarity! What're you doing talking to these guys?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Oh, they were just admiring my wings, Rainbow Dash.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Oohh...

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Uhh... C'mon, girls. Why don't we go see how clouds are made? Don't listen to them. You're gonna win that competition for sure!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Are you kidding? I can't do the sonic rainboom, and just look at these boring, plain old feathered wings. I'm doomed!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: What, these old things? Go ahead, everypony. Photos are encouraged.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Rarity, we're supposed to be helping Rainbow Dash relax, remember? Put your wings away and stop showing off!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Oh, pfft. How can you ask me to put away perfection?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Waa-haa-haa!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Rainbow Dash, are you okay? You don't look so good.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [panting] Of course! Why wouldn't I be okay? Everyone's so in love with Rarity's wings that they won't even notice when I totally blow it in the Best Young Flyer's Competition.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: There really isn't anypony who uses their wings quite like me. Perhaps I should compete.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: WHAT?!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: What am I gonna DO?! I'll never win the competition now...

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I'm going to be a while!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Eyah!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Umm...

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: She's talking to you!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I'm number four, and I need just one more itsy-bitsy minute. Be a dear and have somepony go ahead of me, hmm?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Uhh... What am I gonna do?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I loved number seven. Doing fifteen barrel rolls in a row can't be easy.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: My favorite is number ten. She just looked like such a nice pony.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Hmm... Wonder how come we haven't seen Rainbow Dash or Rarity yet. The competition's almost over.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Rarity... is ready!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Well, Rainbow Dash? Shall we?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Good luck, Rainbow Dash. Just do your best. I hope you don't mind, but I took the liberty of changing our music. That "rock and roll" doesn't really match my wings.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [gulp] C'mon, Rainbow Dash. You can do this. Just remember the routine. Phase one.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Oof. Waaah!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Time for phase two.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Look! Phase two is working.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: And now for my grand finale. I will fly right up to the sun and beam my beautiful wings over the whole city of Cloudsdale! [gasp and squeal] They'll be talking about it for years!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Looks like this is my last chance to turn things around. Phase three. The sonic [gulp] rainboom. Wings, don't fail me now!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [panting] Look upon me, Equestria, for I... am... Rarity!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Oh no! Her wings evaporated into thin air!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Aah!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Uuh!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Hold on, Rarity! I'm coming!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Oh, I can't look!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: A sonic rainboom! She did it! She did it! Wooo!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Whoa.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: A sonic rainboom! Wooo! Yeah!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I did it. I did it!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [sigh] You sure did. Oh thank you, Rainbow Dash. You saved my life!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Oh yeah. I did that too. Ha, best day ever!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I want to apologize to all of you for getting so carried away with my... beautiful wings. I guess I just lost my head.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: It's okay.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Oh, don't worry about it, kiddo.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: We still love you.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: And I'm especially sorry that I was so thoughtless as to jump into the contest at the last minute after you had worked so hard to win it. Can you ever ever forgive me?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Aw, it's okay. Everything turned out all right, right? I just wish I could have met the Wonderbolts when they were awake.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: [gasp] Ohmygoshohmygoshohmygoshohmygoshohmygosh!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: So you're the little pony who saved our lives. We really wanted to meet you, and say thanks.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Ohmygoshohmygoshohmygoshohmygoshohmygosh!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Princess.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Hello, Twilight Sparkle, and hello to your friends too.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Princess Celestia, I am sorry I ruined the competition. Rainbow Dash here really is the best flyer in Equestria.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I know she is, my dear. That's why, for her incredible act of bravery and her spectacular sonic rainboom, I'm presenting the grand prize for Best Young Flyer to this year's winner, Miss Rainbow Dash!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh ohmygosh!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: So Twilight Sparkle, did you learn anything about friendship from this experience?

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I did Princess, but I think Rarity learned even more than me.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: I certainly did. I learned how important it is to keep your hooves on the ground, and be there for your friends.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Excellent. Well done, Rarity.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: This really is the best day ever!

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Heh, thanks, guys.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Aww, that's okay. Don't worry about it.

title: Sonic Rainboom
dialog: Sorry, boys... But I've got plans!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Where'd I put that? Ohh, I thought I already...

title: Stare Master
dialog: Ohh, and I can't forget I've got to... oh, how am I ever gonna get this done?

title: Stare Master
dialog: Are you sure I can't help? I could<U+0097>

title: Stare Master
dialog: No!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Maybe just a<U+0097>

title: Stare Master
dialog: No thanks!

title: Stare Master
dialog: How about<U+0097>

title: Stare Master
dialog: Just stand over there.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Where you'll be out of the way. Ribbon, ribbon! Where's the ribbon?!

title: Stare Master
dialog: I got it!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Whoa!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Aah!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Um, I-I'll just go and stand over there, where I'll be... out of the way.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Won't you at least let me help you clean up?

title: Stare Master
dialog: No. You've helped me quite enough.

title: Stare Master
dialog: I'm sorry, sis! I just thought that if I could help, I might find my special gift and finally earn my cutie mark.

title: Stare Master
dialog: I understand. It's just that... I need this time to fill this order without any... complications.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Okay, all done. Now, back to work. I've lost a lot of time, and I cannot have any more interruptions.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Oh, what now?!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Oh, sorry. I thought the "open" sign meant you were open, but I must have been mistaken.

title: Stare Master
dialog: [gasps] Fluttershy! Forgive me! I was so wrapped up in my work that I forgot you were bringing Opalescence back from her grooming!

title: Stare Master
dialog: No worries, Rarity. I've left her there in the basket.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Oh, she looks great! I just don't understand how you're able to do it! I can't get near her without getting a swipe from her claws.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Ahh! Did you use... the Stare on her?

title: Stare Master
dialog: Oh, no! I wouldn't! I couldn't! I-I don't really have any control over when that happens. I-It just happens. No, I'm just good with animals. It's my special gift, you know?

title: Stare Master
dialog: Well, you should have a picture of Opal as a cutie mark instead of those butterflies.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Ooh, ooh, oh, oh, oh, oh! Maybe I can be good with animals, too!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Or not.

title: Stare Master
dialog: I'm sorry I can't invite you to stay and chat, Fluttershy. I've bitten off a bit more than I can chew with this order.

title: Stare Master
dialog: But you're not eating anything.

title: Stare Master
dialog: No, Sweetie, it's an expression. It means that I've taken on more work than I can handle. I've got twenty of these special robes to make tonight! They're due in Trottingham tomorrow morning.

title: Stare Master
dialog: See? I've lined them in a special gold silk. It took so long to make, but I think it adds just the right touch, don't you?

title: Stare Master
dialog: These are lovely, but twenty by tonight? How will you get it all done?

title: Stare Master
dialog: Well, I, uh...

title: Stare Master
dialog: Oh, oh, oh! Maybe I could... just... just stand over here and watch.

title: Stare Master
dialog: I'll manage.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Well, maybe I should get out of your mane so you can work.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Hello, uh, girls...

title: Stare Master
dialog: Scootaloo! Apple Bloom!

title: Stare Master
dialog: You ready for tonight?

title: Stare Master
dialog: Yup! Cutie mark planning session is a go!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Tonight is the night we each try to find our own special talent.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Even if it takes us all night!

title: Stare Master
dialog: I'm ready! You ready?

title: Stare Master
dialog: Very ready!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Cutie Mark Crusader sleepover at Rarity's! Yay!

title: Stare Master
dialog: And... look what I made us!

title: Stare Master
dialog: What does that patch on your cape mean?

title: Stare Master
dialog: The Cutie Mark Crusaders! Yay!

title: Stare Master
dialog: We're on a crusade, a mission!

title: Stare Master
dialog: To find our cutie marks!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Yup. And look. I lined them with this special gold silk. It took sooo long to make, but I think it adds just the right touch, don't you?

title: Stare Master
dialog: Sweetie Belle! What have you done? That was the last of the gold silk! Oh, now I'll have to make more! Oh, I hope I can make more. I'm gonna have to work all night! Which means... Sorry, girls, I'm afraid the Crusaders sleepover is cancelled.

title: Stare Master
dialog: What?!

title: Stare Master
dialog: I just won't have any time to watch you if I want to get these robes delivered on time.

title: Stare Master
dialog: No buts this time. I'm sorry, Sweetie Belle. It's just the way it has to be.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Awwww...

title: Stare Master
dialog: I, uh, I suppose I could take them for the night.

title: Stare Master
dialog: I couldn't ask you to do that.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Oh, it's no problem at all.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Have you met my sister and her friends? A problem is all it would be.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Did I have a problem with Opal? You've seen how well I handle small creatures!

title: Stare Master
dialog: I suppose that's true... and I do have a lot of work to do...

title: Stare Master
dialog: Come on, it'll be fun.

title: Stare Master
dialog: I assure you, they're quite a handful.

title: Stare Master
dialog: These sweet little angels?

title: Stare Master
dialog: Well... all right.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Cutie Mark Crusader sleepover at Fluttershy's cottage! Yay!

title: Stare Master
dialog: So cute. W-wait for me!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Hmmm...

title: Stare Master
dialog: Oh, won't this be ever so fun? We can have a nice little tea party, and braid each others' tails, and sit quietly and color, and tell each other fairy tales, and<U+0097>

title: Stare Master
dialog: Hello, Fluttershy.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Oh! Hello, Twilight. Where are you off to?

title: Stare Master
dialog: I'm heading to the Everfree Forest to Zecora's to get some of my favorite tea.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Th-The Everfree Forest? Ah, you'll be careful, won't you?

title: Stare Master
dialog: Of course! How about you? What are you doing with the girls?

title: Stare Master
dialog: Rarity has a big order to fill tonight, so I volunteered to take the girls over to my cottage for a sleepover.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Wow. Sounds like everypony has their hooves full today. Taking care of those three fillies all by yourself? You sure you can handle it?

title: Stare Master
dialog: What? These sweet little angels? They'll be no problem at all.

title: Stare Master
dialog: Wow! Look at this place! What's that? Are those chickens?

title: Stare Master
dialog: [to herself] No... problem at all. [normal] Okay, girls, uh, what should we do?

title: Stare Master
dialog: I'm gonna get my mark first!

title: Stare Master
dialog: Girls?

title: Stare Master

dialog: Sweetie Belle! What a thing to say!

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: No, no, no. You see, in the theater it's considered bad luck to say "good luck". So you say "break a leg" instead.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: My little ponies! How are you doing?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Nervous...

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Don't worry. You're gonna be amazing. Remember, just stick to what you know best. I can't wait to hear you sing, Sweetie Belle.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Why does everypony always think I'm gonna sing?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Actually, Twilight Sparkle, I'm the main singer tonight.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Oh?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: And I'm the main dancer. Hi-ya!

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Oh?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: And I'm in charge of...

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Costumes?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: And sets and props. How'd you know?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Really, girls? Are you sure...?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Cutie Mark Crusaders, you're on next. Break a leg.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Break a le<U+0097>

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Ugh!

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Uh... good luck!

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Look, here, are three little ponies, Ready to sing for this crowd, Listen up, 'cause here's our story I'm gonna sing it

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Very loud!

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: When you're a younger pony And your flank is very bare Feels like the sun will never come When your cutie mark's not there

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: 'Til our cutie marks are here!

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: They all say that you'll get your mark When the time is really right And you know just what you're supposed to do And your talent comes to light

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Until our face is blue

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Wow. That did not go as well as I expected.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: I can't believe they're laughin' at us.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Was it that bad?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Back on stage, girls. It's time for the awards.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Back on stage? No.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: They'll just laugh some more.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Yeah, what's the point?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Now girls, let's be good sports. You made a great effort. You should be proud. Now come on!

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Let's hear it for all our talented fillies and colts.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Our first award goes to... Snips and Snails for best magic act.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Hey! Mine's at least shinier.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Well, mine's bigger.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Oh yeah, well... Well, mine is, um... heavier?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: The next award goes to... Sunny Daze and Peachy Pie for best dramatic performance.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: And finally, the last award of the night goes to... the Cutie Mark Crusaders!

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: What?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: For best comedy act.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Can you believe it? We won!

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: I knew our act was awesome.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: You know what would be the best? If we won and we got our cutie marks.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Congratulations, ponies! Job well done.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: [sadly] Thanks, Twilight.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Hey, you don't sound too excited.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: [sigh] We worked really hard and won a prize, but we still don't have our cutie marks.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Which is the prize we really wanted.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Oh, girls...

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: But we think we know why.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Yes. We know why.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Oh? Tell me. I'd love to make a special report to the Princess.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Well, maybe we were trying too hard.

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Yes? And?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: And instead of forcing ourselves to do something that's not meant for us...

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Yes? Yes?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: We each should be embracing our true talent!

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: And that is...?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Comedy!

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Apple Bloom! You did it!

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: Did you see our award? Weren't we funny?

title: The Show Stoppers
dialog: One day... [giggle] One day...

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Perfect!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Coming! Welcome to Carousel Boutique, where every garment is chic, unique, and magnifique. [gasp] Sapphire Shores! The pony of pop!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: You yah... Y-y-you know my name?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh my stars. If I'm dreaming, do not wake me up. How may I help you, Miss Shores?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: [giggle] How may I help you, Sapphire?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: I have just what you need. Sapphire Shores, prepare yourself for the pi<e8>ce de r<e9>sistance de la haute couture. I used every last diamond I found on this one garment.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Really?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Beg pardon?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh my gosh! Sapphire Shores! The pony of pop! She is awesome! I mean, she's gorgeous and talented and <U+0097> heh... and not even half the pony you are. I mean, you're ten times more gorgeous and talented and<U+0097>

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Spike, a lady is never jealous.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Eh, of course not. But were you totally flipping out or what?!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Ladies do not "flip out", Spike. However, I was quite in awe. Oh, I need to find more jewels than ever before to decorate her costumes. Oh, aha!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Did you find some?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Yes, Spike! Right there!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Ooooo! You look so delicious...

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Spike! I promised I'd give you gems to snack on, but we need to collect more first or I'll never be able to make these outfits for Sapphire.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Hm... I will miss you, my sweets.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Come along, Spike. We have many jewels to find.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: At your service, milady.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Spike!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: You've been very patient today, Spike. And for that you get the finest reward. This is from me to you.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Is something wrong, Spike?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: No. It's perfect.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Ooo, bring the cart, Spike. There are more over here.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: For me. From Rarity.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Yesss, gemsss. Gemsss!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Preciousss gemsss! He is the gem hunter. With him we can have all those gems... and more! Let's get the dragon.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Spike! Where are you?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Wait! Who is that?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: You know, it's terrible to keep a lady waiting.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Coming!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Jackpot!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh, it's not the dragon we want. It's the pony!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Well, Spike, I think that's all we can do for today. And these will certainly get me well on my way with Sapphire's outfits. Why don't we start headi... Oh! What's this? Another jewel. Oh.. Oh, strange. It's in the trees. Oooo... Ewww! Uh... uh... Good day, gentle... uh, fellow. Uh, I am Rarity and this is my friend Spike.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Ehe...

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: And you are...

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: A Diamond Dog.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh really? Oh well, that explains your fine taste in jewelry. I mean I-I-I know that diamonds are a girl's best friend and now I know that they're a dog's best friend too, ha ha ha. So, um, [cough] you're out hunting for gems as well?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Yes. We hunt.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Uh... we?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: We hunt for gems. But you are a better hunter. So now we hunt... for you!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: [grunt] Run, Rarity! Run! Aaaah! Uh!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Spike! Come on! Hurry!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Gotcha!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Waah! Spike!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Got him, Rarity! I got him!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Wait! Rarity?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Unhand me this instant, you ruffians. Stop! Put me down, you thugs! You brutes!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: [gasp] Rarity!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Spike! Ah, dirt! Aaaaah, Spiiiike!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Which, what, where?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Save me...!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Nooooooooooo!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Spike, can you breathe now?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Yes... [pant] I think so.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Good. Now tell us what you know.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Yeah. 'Cause all you said earlier was...

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: [pant] Aaaah! Rarity... woods... jewels... dogs... hole... taken... Save her!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Not a whole lot to go on there, sport.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Sorry. Rarity and I were in the woods looking for jewels when these creepy guys showed up.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Creepy guys?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: They called themselves the Diamond Dogs. They grabbed Rarity and disappeared down a hole in the ground.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Well, this sounds mighty easy. Just take us to that there hole and we'll save Rarity.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Holy moly, that's a lotta holeys.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Come on, girls! Let's get started.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Hello?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: [gasp] Puh!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Yuck! Ugh!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Puh!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Quick! We gotta get down one before they're all filled up.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh! Oh my. Oh, oh!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: We can't muscle through it!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Whew. Heavens to Betsy. Now I'm used to pickin' myself up and dustin' myself off, but Rarity won't even touch mud 'less it's imported.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh, Rarity...

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh, woe is me! Whatever shall I do? Ah! Dirt, dirt! Get away, dirt! Oh! Make it stop, make it stop! Ah! Filthy, disgusting dirt. It stings, it burns. Help! Oh, somepony save me, save me!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: We gotta save her.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: But they blocked up all the holes.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Don't mean we can't dig 'em out. Come on!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Ow!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oof!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: [panting] Whoa! Oof!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Get 'em!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Whoooaaa!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Come on!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: All those scary monsters popping up everywhere. Oh, poor Rarity must be terrified.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: [worryingly] Ooh.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Ah!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Aah!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Where are the trinkets?!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Aaaah!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Poor Rarity. What are we gonna do?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: I got it! I'll save you, my sweet.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Spike, it is very noble of you...

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Shhh!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: [quieter] ...to sacrifice the gem Rarity gave you.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh, Lady Rarity. My damsel in distress.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Hoho there, lover boy.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Whoa! Whoa whoa whoawhoawhoa... I got a bite! I got a bite!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Hold on there, little fella.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Applejack!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Twilight!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh my goodness, oh my goodness...

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Wait for me!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Whee!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Whee! Ha, ha, ha!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh, oh!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Ha ha, it worked! We're in! Now we can finally save Rarity!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Um... Which way do we go?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Nooooooooooo!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: All these tunnels... How are we ever gonna find Rarity?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Guess we're just gonna have to start going down them one by one.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: That could take forever! There's gotta be way to narrow it down.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: I know! I bet they've taken Rarity down the tunnel with the most gems.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: But Spike, Rarity is the only one who knows how to find gems.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: No, Twilight. You can! You can copy Rarity's gem-finding spell.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh my gosh! You're right! Rarity showed me how she did it a while back. If I can just remember...

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: That's it. You did it, Twilight! Come on! We're coming, Rarity. We'll save you. Just hold on.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh please, Diamond Dogs. Please let me go.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Forever! Muhahahaha!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: But whatever do you want from me?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Gemsss!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh! Is that all?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: There. A lovely pocket of jewels are right there. Now, if you'd be so kind as to show me the exit?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Good! [laugh] Now, dig them up, pony.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: What? But you said you wanted me to find the gems.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Dig?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh, for goodness<U+0097> Fine! Just stop. Stop! Dig, dogs! Dig! And fast.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: I beg your pardon, but what, pray tell, are you doing?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Well, somebody certainly needs proper nail care. When was the last time you two had a manicure? You're scratching up my coat with those jagged things!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Please be quiet!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Good heavens, what is that smell?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Smeeeeeell?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Ah, mystery solved. It's your breath.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Enough! Search, pony!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Well, since you insist... But I must say the working conditions in here are simply dreadful. Musty and damp, it's going to wreak havoc on my mane. And this air is stifling, suffocating. And when I try to take a deep breath, the stench of all you dogs makes me nauseated.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: You look and smell like you haven't bathed in weeks. Have you never heard of soap? You could all do with a good round of soap and water. Oh water, oh water, I'm terribly thirsty. Could I please have some water?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: And that's another thing. I would appreciate if you stopped calling me "pony". I am a lady and I wish to be addressed as such. So you may call me "Miss" or "Rarity" or "Miss Rarity".

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Enough! Your whining! It-it-it hurts!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Whining? I am not whining. I am complaining. Do you want to hear whining? Thiiis iiis whiiining! Oooh, this harness is too tiiight! It's going to chafe. Can't you loosen it? Oooh, it hurts and it's sooo ruuusty! Why didn't you clean it first? It's gonna leave a staaain! And the wagon's getting heeeavy, why do I have to pull it?!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Stop whining!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: But I thought you wanted whiiining!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Geh! We'll do anything, pony!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: [dreamily] Anything?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: [sigh] This water is hardly sparkling. But I suppose it will have to do.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: [panting] Wait! Why are we doing this?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Yes, yes, I know. This is ridiculous! Letting a pony order us around. What are we? Mice or dogs?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Dogs do not pull. Ponies pull. Let her make the awful noises.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: What are you doing? Hey, you spilled my drink. Oh! [whining] Not sooo tiiight!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Ha! Make the noises all you want. But move while you make them. Hyah, mule!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Did you just call me a... mule?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Ehh...

title: A Dog and Pony Show
