dialog: He called me ugly!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: No! Mule! I said mule!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: An old ugly mule! And it's true! Just look at me. I used to be beautiful, but, but nooow...

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: You're just saying that!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh, uh, uh, nice. Yeah.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Oh, I've had just about enough of this!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: We're getting close. I can feel it.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: It's coming from down here. Come on!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: She must be in there. Let's go!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Hoh, doggies. If you can take this bull by the horns, you better be ready for a ride. Come on, ponies! Kick 'em up, kick 'em out. Buck 'em up, buck 'em down.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Yeehaw! Get along, little doggies!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: I'm coming for you, milady. Hi-ho, Twilight! Away!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: And just what do you think you're doing?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Please, Twilight. Just give me this.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Lady Rarity, I'm here to save you!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Excuse me?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: We, uh, give her back. Yes.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Rarity! You're safe!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Why, yes. Hello, girls. You arrived just in time to assist me.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Assist you with what?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: With those.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: You're letting her leave with all these... jewels?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Yes. Take them. And her with them.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: I can't believe you found all these gems!

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Heh. I can't believe you tricked all those dogs.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Just because I'm a lady doesn't mean I cannot handle myself in a sticky situation. I had them wrapped around my hoof the entire time.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: I can't wait to write to Princess Celestia to tell her what you taught me today.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Me? What did I teach you?

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Just because somepony is ladylike doesn't make her weak. In fact, by using her wits, a seemingly defenseless pony can be the one who outsmarts and outshines them all.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Hm... "Outshines" is right. Now you have enough gems to cover Sapphire Shores' costumes.

title: A Dog and Pony Show
dialog: Not if you eat them all, Spike.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: So sorry, Fluttershy. I hate being late for our weekly get-together. The usual!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: But you will not believe what happened to me.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Is everything all right?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, it's much more than all right. I was on my way here, wearing my latest hat creation, when who should stop me on the street but Photo Finish!?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Photo Finish?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: She is the most famous fashion photographer in all of Equestria. Anywho, she saw my hat and said it was absolutely marvelous!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: What a lovely compliment.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: She was so impressed that she wants to take some pictures of my shop featuring some of my clothes!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: [squee] That's wonderful.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: [vibrating] Do you know what this could mean for my fashion career?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, Rarity, I'm so happy for you.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: But I'm going to need somepony fabulous to model for me. Somepony with beauty. Somepony with grace. Somepony... like you?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, goodness. I don't know.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, this is such a huge opportunity. And it would mean so much to me.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I'm flattered, really.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Nopony is going to have your elegance and poise.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: But...

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Nopony!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: There has to be somepony more quali-

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Please!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Somepony more into fashion.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Please!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Somepony more comfortable in the spotlight.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Please, please, pleeease!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, if it's that important to you, of course I'll do it.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, thankyouthankyouthankyouthankyou! You are the best friend a pony could ever have!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: [sigh] What a wonderful way to spend an afternoon.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Isn't it? Though I was so afraid you wouldn't agree to model for me that I felt completely frazzled. I think I feel a pimple coming on. Oh! Only one solution! The usual!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Hm... She's going to want to see attitude and pizzazz.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: A-a-attitude and, um... pizzazz.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: More light! It has to catch the sequins just so or the whole outfit is just a disaster. Oh, and the headdress needs more feathers. Pinkie Pie! More feathers! And sequins! More sequins!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: And more ribbon! Oh no! Less ribbon. No! More ribbon.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, this hem is completely off. Pincushion! Thank you all for helping me. I'm sorry to be so short with you, but I'm... I'm just so nervous.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, doesn't that hurt?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Thick scales. Can't feel a thing. And even if I could, there is no pain that would keep me from assisting the most beautiful creature in the world. I'm gonna tell you two a secret. But you have to promise not to tell anyone.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I promise.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Cross my heart and hope to fly, stick a cupcake in my eye.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I have a crush on Rarity!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: [gasp] We won't say a word!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Give me a break. Everypony already knows how you-

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Twilight! You promised Spike you wouldn't say anything. He trusts you. And losing a friend's trust is the fastest way to lose a friend forever!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: But-

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Forever!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: My lips are sealed. Though I'm pretty sure Rarity is gonna pick up on your feelings.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I, Photo Finish... have arrived.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Let me just say, what an honor!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: We begin... now!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Attitude and pizzazz!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Yes! Show Photo Finish something. No! Yeees. No! Yeees. No! Yeees. Enough!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: She hardly took any pictures.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I'm so sorry. I tried my best.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Well, the headdress is too big for you and cape had too much sparkle. I can't believe I ever thought I could impress her.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: It seems that I, Photo Finish, have found the next fashion star here in Ponyville.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Really?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Yes. Really. And I, Photo Finish, am going to help her to shine all over Eqvestria. Tomorrow, a photo shoot in ze park. [pause] I go!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Did you hear that? I am going to "shine all over Equestria".

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, Rarity. I was so worried I'd ruined everything.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: No, no, no, yes! That is definitely the one. Photo Finish is going to love it. Everypony is going to love it!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, I am so excited for you. Just don't forget us little ponies when you become the most famous designer in all of Equestria.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Never.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Put me down here. Oh, nonononononono. The model should be in something simple! Something inspired by... the nature!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: That's just what I was thinking. Um... give me a moment and I'll, uh, put a little something together.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Yes... that will not be necessary.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: But... but... how are you going to help me "shine across Equestria" if I don't design something new for these pictures?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I am not going to help you shine across Equestria. I am going to help her shine. She is my star. You! Go!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I can't, Rarity.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, but you must, Fluttershy. Photo Finish wants to make you a star. This is the opportunity of a lifetime. I know we were both hoping it would be my lifetime, but nonetheless you can't throw away this chance. You must do this for me. You must. You must! You must!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Floottershy! It is time to make... the magics! Oh, wunderbar! You are like a delicate flower. So much more alluring without all those sparkles und feathers.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: How'd it go? How'd it go?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: It didn't. Photo Finish wanted to work with Fluttershy, not me.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, Rarity. I'm so sorry. Is there anything we can do?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I just vant to be alone right now.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: You heard her. She vants to be... alone. What? I didn't think she meant alone alone.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Too much blush. Not enough. Too much. Not enough. Perfect.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, yes! Even her schneezes are graceful. Now go! How do you feel? Excited? Overjoyed? Thrilled beyond your wildest dreams?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: N... nervous.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Nervous? Dun be ridiculous. You're only facing a large crowd of ponies who will be watching your every move and silently judging you.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Your cue! Now go!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: You can't let Rarity down. You must do this. You must. You must. You must.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: So perfect for my new advertisement.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Wow. Look how popular you are. I'm so excited for you. You must be having the best time ever.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, yes. Best time ever...

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Floottershy! I have been looking for you everywhere. We have the thing at the place.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I'll see you at the spa? Our usual time?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Of course! I can't wait to hear all about the... "thing at the place".

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I'm the one who should be mobbed by strangers wherever I go.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Welcome to Carousel Boutique!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Is she still here? We heard Fluttershy was here.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Sorry. You just missed her. But you're still in luck. I'm having a huge sale on some of my best designs.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: And you are...?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Rarity, of course.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Never heard of you.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Obviously I, Photo Finish, am thwilled to have found her.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Photo Finish?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: She's a natural in front of the camera.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Um... Photo Finish?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I only need to point and shoot, and I capture... the magics!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Photo Finish, I'm so sorry to interrupt. It's just that I'm running late.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: [gasp] How could I have forgotten?! Your appearance at the ballet opening! Everypony who is anypony will be there.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, actually I'm supposed to be meeting my friend...

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: We go!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: My hooves are getting positively pruney, I've been waiting here so long. Obviously Fluttershy's just too busy with her new career to spend time with her best friend.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I'm sure she just got tied up.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Of course she did. She's a big bright shining star! I wish that star would burn out.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Rarity! Fluttershy is your friend.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I know, I know. And I should be happy for her, but instead I'm just... jealous! Oh, please promise you won't tell her I feel this way. Please, please, pleasepleaseplease!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: You have my word. Losing a friend's trust is the fastest way to lose a friend.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Forever!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Wow! You look great!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Fluttershy may be the one who's famous, but that doesn't mean I have to stop looking fabulous.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Rarity! I'm so sorry I'm... Oh no. She's already gone, isn't she?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Sorry.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Feel better?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: [sighs] No. Can I tell you something?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Of course.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: You promise not to tell Rarity?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I swear.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Pinkie Pie Swear?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Cross my heart and hope to fly, stick a cupcake in my [poke] Ooowwwww!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I don't like being a model. No, I hate being a model. All this attention is awful, just awful. And I'm only doing it because Rarity told me I must. I must! I must! [sigh] I must...

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, really? Well... If you wanna know the truth, Rarity...

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, what were you about to say?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: [quietly] Forever!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Nothing!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I was just thinking. If you really don't like being a model, you could always quit.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, no. I could never do such a thing. Rarity would be devastated.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: [chomp] Mmm... Juicy!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Uhhhhhh!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh, if only all these ponies didn't like me so much. Photo Finish wouldn't want me to model anymore. She'd find somepony else with... the magic!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I guess you're right. [pause] You're right. You're right, you're right, you're right!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Don't you see? On her own, Fluttershy could never do something unattractive. But if I used my magic to help her do something unattractive at her next fashion show, no one will ever want her to model again. And if Fluttershy no longer has to be a model, Rarity will no longer have to be jealous of her. And I'll no longer have to keep their secrets! It's the perfect plan! You can't tell anyone about it. Promise me you won't tell anyone?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: So you do promise or you don't?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Obviously.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: You really think it'll work?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: They love you for being you. So all I have to do is make you not be you. Just leave it to me.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Guess it's time to see what all the fuss is about.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oof!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: [gasp] Ooh... Aah!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Oh no.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I, Photo Finish, have made a terrible mistake!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Bravo! I say bravo!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Such attitude! Such pizzazz! She's invented an entirely new kind of modeling! Bravo!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: This is awful. Just awful! Somehow I've become more popular than ever. Oh, I'm so frustrated I could just kick something!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: If only Rarity didn't want me to be a model so badly.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Ugh! But Rarity...!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Fluttershy! Are you all right?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I'm great! I'm a super famous fashion model. Why wouldn't I be great?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Because you ha...!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Out there on the runway, everyone was turning on you and... Oh... Oh, Fluttershy. It's so awful. I wanted them to.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: You did?!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Of course she did! Because...!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I'm jealous! I wanted all the attention. And instead it was going to you. I even started hoping that you would do something silly so your modeling career would be over. But then, when it started happening, all I could think was how could I want you to fail at something you love so much?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: But... Fluttershy doesn't... Ugh!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Love? Oh, Rarity. I hate being a model.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: You do?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: More than anything.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Then why did you keep doing it?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I was afraid if I quit, you'd be mad at me for not wanting to... "shine all over Equestria".

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: And I thought if I told you how jealous I was of your success, you'd think I was a terrible friend.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Never!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: All this time!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: If we'd just told each other the truth.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I promise never to keep my feelings in secret again.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Me too.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: You were brilliant. Brilliant! I've already got six photo shoots lined up for tomorrow alone.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I'm sorry, Photo Finish, but I don't think I'll be able to make any of them.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Whaaat?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Vat has just happened?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Spike has a crush on Rarity!

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: [sigh] And you were doing so well.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Now this is a wonderful way to spend an afternoon.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Isn't it, though?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Being a good friend means being able to keep a secret. But you should never be afraid to share your true feelings with a good friend. Did you get all that, Spike?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: No. I did not. I still can't believe you told someone about my secret feelings for Rarity.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: You're right. That was wrong of me, and I'm very sorry.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Apology accepted.

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: Now will you take down my letter to Princess Celestia?

title: Green Isn't Your Color
dialog: I would love to. But... I'm a little busy at the moment.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: And that's when the yellow birdie thought to himself, "Hmm. My favorite little tree isn't such a little tree anymore." So she sang her song, big and strong, and they all lived in that great, big tree happily ever after. The... end.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Applejack! Were you reading a bedtime story to... an apple tree?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Heh... uh... Well, ya know, bein' replanted in a whole new place is very upsettin' for a tree... and Bloomberg here is one of my favorites.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: No fair, Applejack! You've got a luxurious, private sleeper car for a tree, while I am crowded and cramped in the same car with all the other ponies. How am I supposed to get my beauty sleep?!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: But Bloomberg's the whole reason we're makin' this trip. He needs his rest so we can give him as a gift to my relatives in Appleloosa.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Hmph! You talk about it as if it's your baby or something.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Who you callin' a baby?! Bloomberg's no baby! Don't wet widdle Rarity make you all saddy-waddy. Bloomberg's a big and strong apple tree. Yes, he is. A-coochie-coochie-coo-coo-coo!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: It's widdle Rarity who's all "saddy-waddy"! Urgh!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Oh man, we're going fast! This is so exciting, I can't even wait!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Oh my goodness...

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [sigh] For crying out loud in the morning!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [groan] Do you guys mind? I was up early fire-roasting those snacks you're all eating, and I'm pooped!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Uh, speaking of, some of these popcorn kernels didn't get popped.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Okay, fine...

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Ghk...

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Good night!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Uhh... maybe it's time we all got a little shut-eye. We've got a big day ahead of us tomorrow.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [whispering] Psst! Pinkie Pie, you asleep yet?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [whispering] No, are you asleep yet?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [whispering] If I was sleeping, how could I have asked you if you were asleep?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [whispering] When we get to Appleloosa, you think we'll have to carry that heavy tree all the way from the train to the orchard?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [whispering] What tree? You mean Bloomberg?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [whispering and sarcastically] ...No, Fluttershy.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [whispering] Fluttershy's not a tree, silly!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: What's going on?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Rainbow Dash thinks Fluttershy's a tree!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [whispering] I do not think she's a tree! I was just<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Did you say she was a tree?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [whispering] No. Well.. Yes. But not exactly<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Ya know she's not a tree, right?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: She's not a tree, Dashie!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: I'd like to be a tree...

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Oh, for Pete's sake!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Well that was kind of huffy.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Huffy the magic dragon!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Would you all be quiet... now?!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: A buffalo stampede!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: I just love their accessories!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: They're getting awfully close to the train.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: I want to speak to the manager!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Oooh, looky! Now they're doing tricks! Ooh! Ooh! Ooh! Now do a backflip!... Or... Just jump?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Hmm.. Something tells me this isn't a circus act. Hey there!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Where ya headed in such a hurry? Wow, you're pretty quick for someone so... bulky. No offense.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [gasp] They've got Bloomberg!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Heeeelp!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: And Spike!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Ugggh..

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [distant] Heeeelp!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Dragon-napping Spike. I'll show her! Ow...

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Hey there! Welcome ta A-A-ppleloosa!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Braeburn, listen<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Cousin Applejack, mind yer manners, you have yet ta introduce me to your compadres! Shame on you!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Braeburn, listen, somethin' terrible's happened<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Terrible is right, your train is a full seven minutes late! That's seven minutes less for you to delight in the pleasures and wonders of... A-A-A-ppleloosa! Boggles the mind, we settler ponies built all this in just the past year, don't it?! And as you can see, we have all of the finest comforts. Like horse-drawn carriages!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: And those there are horse-drawn horse-drawn carriages.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: ...Listen, Braeburn, I<U+0096> Oof!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: And here's our local waterin' hole, the Salt Block.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Over there's the office of Sheriff Silverstar. And here's where we have our wild west dances! And here's where we have our mild west dances!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: But, Braeburn, we<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: And here's the most wonderful sight in all of... A-A-A-ppleloosa! Our apple orchard.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Braeburn!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: First harvest should be any day now.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Braebu<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Good thing too!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Brae<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: 'Cause we need that grub to live on.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Braeburn!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Uh, yes, cuz?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: You have a very nice town an' all, but we have a hu-uge problem! Some of our friends are missin'!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: A stampede of buffalo.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: They took Spike!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Rainbow Dash went after them!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: And we can't find Pinkie Pie.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: And we had an apple tree with us for your orchard, but they took that too!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Did you say... buffalo? [sigh] Them buffalo, they want us settler ponies to take every single tree you see here off this land. They sure as hay don't want any new ones added in.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: But why?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Beats me. We put a lot of hard work into this land, so we can feed our town, our families, our foals! And now they're sayin' all these trees have to go? T'ain't fair...

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Ooh, I can't wait to get my hooves on that little buffalo... Hnnh... Ow! Nobody tricks Rainbow Dash and gets away with it.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Boo!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Yah! ...Pinkie Pie!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Ah, ya caught me! Looks like I tricked you and didn't get away with it either! You're good.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Shhshh! What do you think you're doing?! You gotta get out of here!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: I do?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: You're gonna blow my cover.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: I am?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: I'm trying to save Spike!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Oh my gosh! So am I!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: And the more of us there are out here, the more chances of us getting... caught. Run, Pinkie, I'll hold 'em off. Save yourself!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Stop! Dash, Pinkie, 'sup? Hey, no worries, I know those guys. They're cool.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Seems they took me by mistake. And they feel awful about it too, poor guys. Fortunately, they totally respect dragons, so they treat me like an honored guest.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [sniff] Ugh...

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Still don't like ponies much, though... But you're with me, so it's cool.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Huh. Well, I still don't trust them. I say we turn tail and bail while we still<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Mmm! [munching] Before we finish eating? Are you loco in the coco?! Can I please have more of that mushy stuff, whatever it was?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Turquoise. Mmm! [munching] Heh hah! This here is Little Strongheart, and these are my friends Pinkie Pie and Rainbow Dash.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: You!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: That's it! We are outta here!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Yeah, right.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: I think it's time they met Chief Thunderhooves.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Well that's not very nice. Right, Rainbow Dash?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Hmph...

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: See, Rainbow Dash? They had a good reason to<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Huh... Ah!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: I'll say they had a good reason! C'mon. We have some apple-pickin' Appleloosans to talk to!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Ow! [groaning] Gently, please!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Sorry, Rarity, but our friends are out there and we have ta' be ready for a long hike into buffalo territory if we're gonna save 'em! Let's go!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Hi, guys!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Pinkie! We're so glad you're safe.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: How did you escape from the buffalo?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: We didn't!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: We promised the buffalo a chance to talk.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Oh, yeah? 'Bout what?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: We brought our new pal Little Strongheart here to explain to the Appleloosans why they should move the apple trees off buffalo land.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: That information would be quite help<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: That's weird. 'Cause my cousin Braeburn here wants to explain to the buffalo why they should let the apple trees stay.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: The land is theirs! You planted the trees not knowing that. Honest mistake. Now, you just gotta move 'em, that's all.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Well... heh...

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: They busted their rumps here! An' now they're supposed ta bust their rumps again, just 'cause some buffalo won't stampede someplace else?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Plant the trees somewhere else!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Where?! It's the only flatland around these parts!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: The buffalo had it first!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: The settler ponies need it to live!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Come on, Applejack!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [over Rainbow Dash] You're bein' unreasonable!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [over Applejack] I put my hoof down!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Look! Both the settlers and the buffalo have good reasons to use this land. There must be something we can do.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Hey! I've got an idea!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: We may be divided But of you all, I beg To remember we're all hoofed At the end of each leg

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [applauds] All right, Pinkie Pie! That was fantastic! What a great song! Yeah, right on!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: But, Sheriff...

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Oh... That wasn't the message of my song at all...

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: I want my kin ta' have what they need to live... but a storm's a-brewin' here. And I don't like the look of it.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: We've just got to talk some sense into them before somepony gets hurt. Listen, maybe if you would just reconsider, we<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: About the trees. Now if you could<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: If we could just sit down and talk we could<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [gasp] Why won't anybody be rational and reasonable?!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Sheriff, if we could only<U+0096>

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Isn't there someway to stop this?

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: I know you don't want to do this.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: I don't know... but it's never too late to think of something.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Come on, think! Think, think, think, think, think, think, think!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: [gasp] He's not gonna do it!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: <U+0096>what do you say? You gotta share You gotta care It's the right thing to do

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Wah-ahh! Whoa-oo-oo-oo-ooa!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: I'd rather eat turquoise any day of the week. [chomp] Auhh...!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Bloomberg, this is yer special day. Mama's so proud of you!

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Friendship is a wondrous and powerful thing. Even the worst of enemies can become friends. You need understanding and compromise. You've got to share. You've got to care.

title: Over a Barrel
dialog: Hey! That's what I said!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: There you go, Mr. Mousey. Now you stay off that leg and do everything I told you. And it will be just like new in no time at all.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh, you're welcome. Happy to be able to help.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: You... found a watch? You... wanna be a watch? You're running! Running out of time? No. You're... late?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: [gasp] I'm late for a very important date! The big brunch for Princess Celestia at Sugarcube Corner. Oh, the princess is here in Ponyville for a party, and we all promised we'd be there. But I'm not there! Oh, do I look all right? Do I need to bring anything? Maybe I shouldn't go.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Aah! It's starting! I'm missing it!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh, thanks, Angel. I mean, if you hadn't reminded me, I might have not remembered, and then I wouldn't be there, and everypony would be wondering where I was and... Oh, right. I'm late.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh, okay then. See you later.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: So... what do I have to do to get to be one of the Princess's royal guards, anyway? Is the pay good? Hellooo? Anybody home? [babbles] Wah-wah! [babbles] Ooh, you're good. [pause] Too good. I'm bored.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: [gulp] No one. Never mind. I'll go home.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: It's all right, sirs. She's on the list.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Thanks, Twilight.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I'm so glad you could make it, Fluttershy. It wouldn't be the same without you.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Mr. How's everypony doing? Good? Good.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Mrs. Anything else we can get for you, dearies...? Ooh, I-I mean, esteemed guests.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Everything is fine, Mr. and Mrs. Cake.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Sorry I'm late. I had to finish taking care of a patient first.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh, you and your tender loving care of little animals. I just know Princess Celestia is gonna love that about you. I mean, I hope she will... I mean, of course she will!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Wow, Twilight. I thought I was the only one who got nervous at social gatherings.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh, it's not that. I just want the princess to approve of my friends.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: But she's met us all before.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: And read about you in my letters. But this is the first time she's spent any real time with you. I want everypony to make a good impression.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Well, I'm sure you have nothing to worry about. Besides, it's just a casual get-together, right?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Don't touch me! Watch the dress! Careful, you're gonna spill that on me! Oh, oh, that looks delicious. What is it? Oh, does it stain?! Keep it away from me!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Or... perhaps not that casual.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Uh... which is the salad and which is the appetizer again? And which am I supposed to eat first? Oh, never mind. I'm not hungry.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: It's okay, Twilight. So our friends' manners aren't perfect. I doubt the princess will even notice.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Hey!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Mr. A thousand pardons, Your Majesty.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Mrs. Empty teacup at 4 o'clock!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Mr. Uh, I see it, honey bun!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh, um... thank you.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Mr. Not at all, Your Highness.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: [sips] Thank you again.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Mrs. Oh, but of course, Your Majesty.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: [sips] [sips] [sips] Gotcha!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh...

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: And what about you, dear? Fluttershy, is it?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Me? Oh yes, Your Highness.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I understand from Twilight Sparkle's letters that you enjoy tending to the needs of woodland creatures.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Yes, I love to take care of animals.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: As do I. As Princess, I care deeply about all creatures, great and small.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Nothing means more to me than the well-being of all my subjects.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Ah, Philomena, my pet. You're awake. Do say hello to our gracious hosts.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh... my.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: She is quite a sight, isn't she?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I... I... I've never seen anything like it.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Really? Well, if I must... I'm sorry, everypony. I'm afraid I have to cut the party short. The mayor has requested an audience with me. Royal duty calls. Thank you for a wonderful time. It's been a joy getting to know you all better.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Phew! Now I can eat someth'n! I'm starved! Oh...

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Stay right where you are. All I want is a clear path to the exit. Nobody move and my dress won't get hurt! Stay back! Back, I say!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: [sigh] Well, Spike, I don't know for sure how things went with the princess, but at least no big disasters happened.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh, you poor little thing. How did you ever get in such bad condition? Don't you worry, Philomena. I'll nurse you back to health. As a favor to the princess, who's obviously just far too busy to care for you properly.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: This is far worse than I thought. What you need is some medicine. Stat!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Here you go, Philomena. This will fix you right up.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Doctor Fluttershy expected that.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Always works. [gasp] Uh... Almost always.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: There's nothing like homemade soup to cure what ails you. Come on now. You're not gonna get better if you don't cooperate. Mmm... See? It's delicious. Good and good for you. Here comes the choo-choo train. Chugga-chugga, chugga-chugga, whoo-whoo!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh dear. Don't worry, Philomena. I know what'll make you feel better. Wait right here. I have just the thing.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Look, Philomena. I brought a fellow feathered friend by to cheer you up. Hummingway here was sick once too, but he let me help him and got better in no time. Didn't you, boy?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Say hello to your new friend Philomena.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Your turn now, Philomena. Go ahead. You can do it. [vocalizes My Little Pony theme] Oh! Um... good try?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I know what'll clear up that tickle in your throat. A humidifier. [deep breath] Refreshing. How's that feeling now for you, Philomena? Better?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh... That's okay. I know lots of other ways to take care of you. Don't worry. You're gonna get better. How about...

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Aromatherapy?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Warm bath?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Ointment?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Scalpel. Surgical tape. Feathers.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh, Philomena. I thought it would be easy to nurse you back to health. I've tried everything I know. And look at you. You're worse than ever.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Hi, Fluttershy! I just wanted to drop by and say thank you so very much for making such a good impression on the princess today... [gasp] What is Celestia's pet doing here?!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I couldn't leave the poor thing there. She needed my help.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh no. Nonononononono! This is bad.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: How could I just walk away and not do anything?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: But... but... she doesn't belong to you!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I had to do something.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Without telling anypony?! Without asking permission?!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: But...

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I know you had good intentions, but you have got to return the princess's pet!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: But...

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: [sigh] You're right. Okay, let's...

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: It's that dry night air?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: But it's daytime.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Well... day air's even drier. You guards better be on your way if you're gonna find the princess's missing pet. Philomena, was it? Thank you ever so much for keeping me in the loop. Bye! [pants] Phew... What are you doing?!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Going to return Philomena, remember?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: We can't now!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Why not?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: You have no idea what the princess is gonna do if she finds you're the one who took her pet, do you?!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Do you?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Well... no. But it can't be anything good. She might banish you from Equestria. Or throw you in a dungeon. Or banish you and then throw you in a dungeon in the place that she banishes you to!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: You really think the princess would do that?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Okay. Granted that probably won't happen, but do you wanna take any chances?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: All that really matters to me is that poor little Philomena here gets well.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: That's very noble of you. I'll write to you when you're banished. Unless I'm banished too somewhere there's no post office. Then you'll have to write to me. Deal?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Please, Twilight. You just have to help me get Philomena healthy and then we can return her to the princess. And everything will be fine.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Did you give her any kind of medicine?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I tried to, but she wouldn't take it.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: [groan] Then you have to make her take it. You can't be such a pushover, Fluttershy! You need to show this patient who's the boss. Make her straighten up and fly right!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: She can't fly.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: No excuses!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Done. Okay, what else?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Uh... well, she keeps pulling her feathers off. The ones that haven't fallen out yet from all her coughing, I mean.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: There you go.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I don't think she likes it.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Tough love, baby. You want her to get well, don't you?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Of course, but...

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Next!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Well, she desperately needs some bed rest, but I can't get her to stay put.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: One step ahead of you.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: It's for your own good, Philomena, I promise. Please, just relax and try to get some sleep.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: What's this soup over here? Smells delicious.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I made it for Philomena. But she wouldn't eat it.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh, she'll eat it, all right.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Hey! Where are you going?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: No! Philomena! Come back!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: What are you two doing? Are you having a race? Oh, can I play? One, two, three, go!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Excuse me!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Hi!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Beg your pardon!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Put me down!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: What in tarnation?!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Sorry, but we've gotta find...

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Philomena, come down from there! You'll hurt yourself!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I'll catch you!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: What is going on here? Twilight?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Yes, your Majesty, there's been a terrible accident.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: It's all my fault.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: No, Princess. Fluttershy didn't know any better. It was my fault.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I'm the one who did it.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: But you were only trying to help.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Some help I was.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Will ya let me do this? She'll go easier on me.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: But it's my fault!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: No, it's my fault!

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: No, it's my fault! Wait, what are we talking about?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Thanks for trying to protect me, Twilight, but... Princess Celestia, I'm the one who took your pet bird. I really was only trying to help the poor little thing. Then I was gonna bring it right back to you, honest. So, if you wanna banish me and then throw me in a dungeon in the place that you banish me to, then that's what I deserve.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Oh, stop fooling around, Philomena. You're scaring everypony.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I don't understand! What is that thing? What happened to Philomena?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: This is Philomena. She's quite a sight, as I said. But nothing unusual for a phoenix. Isn't that right, Philomena?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: A... A phoenix?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: A phoenix is a majestic and magical bird. While it appears healthy and happy most of the time, every so often it must renew itself by shedding all of its feathers and bursting into flame. [silently] Rather melodramatic, if you ask me. [loud again] It then rises from the ashes, fresh as a daisy. All just a normal part of the life cycle of a phoenix. I'm afraid mischievous little Philomena here took the occasion to have a little fun with you, Fluttershy. Say you're sorry, young lady.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: So... aren't you gonna banish me? Or throw me in a dungeon? Or banish me and then throw me in a dungeon in the place that you banish me to?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Of course not, my little pony. Where on Earth would you get such an idea?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I guess I have some imagination.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Fluttershy really did do everything she could to try to take care of Philomena for you.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: And I do appreciate that your heart was in the right place, child. But all you had to do was ask me and I could have told you Philomena was a phoenix and saved you all this trouble.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: I know. I shouldn't have jumped to conclusions. Next time I'll ask before taking matters into my own hooves.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Should I write you a letter about that lesson, Princess?

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: No, that's quite all right. I think I can remember.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: It's beautiful. Thank you, Philomena. No hard feelings.

title: A Bird in the Hoof
dialog: Hmm... [indistinct whispers] Hey, you know what you should do? You should go over there and tickle them!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [gulp] Are you sure about this, Scootaloo? I've never even heard of a pony zip lining before.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Neither have I, but Spike told me it was awesome!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Whoa!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Oh!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Wah!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Ow!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: See anything?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Tree sap and pine needles but no cutie mark.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Plan B?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Yeah. You know where we can find a cannon at this hour? It's no use! No matter what we try, we always end up without our cutie marks. And, surprisingly often, covered in tree sap.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Maybe we should do something less dangerous, like pillow testing or flower sniffing.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: This town is full of ponies who have their cutie marks. Why don't we ask them how they did it?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: That's a great safe idea.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Yeah! And we can start with the coolest pony in Ponyville.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Applejack!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Rarity!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Come on, guys, I said "cool"! You know who I'm talking about. She's fast. She's tough. She's not afraid of anything!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: No! The greatest flyer ever to come out of Cloudsdale.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: No! Rainbow Dash!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Oh! Yeah, that makes much more sense.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Of course!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Let's do it. Let's find out how Rainbow Dash earned her cutie mark!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Aah! Uuh!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Get back here, you thievin' varmints!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Thievin' what now?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Apple Bloom?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Hey sis! How'd you get your cutie mark?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: I never told you that story?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Hey! I thought we were gonna ask Rainbow Dash.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: We need all the help we can get.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Ugh. Fine.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Why, shoot. I was just a little filly. Even littler than y'all.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] I didn't want to spend my life on a muddy old apple farm. I wanted to live the sophisticated life, like my Aunt n' Uncle Orange. So I set out to try my luck in the big city, Manehattan! The most cosmopolitan city in all of Equestria.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] I knew I'd find out who I was meant to be in Manehattan.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Aunt Orange! Uncle Orange! Thank y'all so much for lettin' me stay!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Oh, it's simply divine.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Although, I must admit the city noise took some getting used to. Where I'm from, nights are so quiet, you seldom hear a peep until the roosters wake you.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] What's he talking about? What do I say? I don't wanna look like a fool.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Thank goodness. Being a city pony's hard work. I'm so hungry I could eat a...

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Cock-a-doodle-doo... Oh, I wonder what Granny Smith and Big McIntosh are up to. I bet they're applebuckin' their way through the Red Delicious trees. Oh, what I wouldn't give for just one bite...

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] I never felt so homesick in all my days as I did right then.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] It was amazin'! A rainbow pointin' right back to... home. In that moment, it all became clear. I knew right then just who I was supposed to be. That's when this here appeared.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: I've been happily workin' in the farm ever since.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: There they are! Get back here, ya thievin' varmints!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Aw. That was such a sweet story!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Sweet? Try sappy. [mock-gags] Come on! We've got to find Rainbow Dash and hear the cool way to get a cutie mark.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: All right, little ones. This way. This way. You really should be more careful. Somepony could get hurt. Why are you in such a hurry anyway?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: We're trying to find Rainbow Dash, so we can hear how she earned her cutie mark.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Oh, that would be interesting. You know, I wouldn't have gotten my cutie mark if it weren't for her.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Rainbow Dash?! Really?!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Oh yes. It all started at Summer Flight Camp.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] You'd never guess, but when I was little I was very shy. And a very weak flyer.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] It was the most humiliating moment of my life. And then, out of nowhere...

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Leave her alone!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Keep making fun of her and find out!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Whaddya have in mind?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: In history, maybe. See you boys at the finish line!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] I had never seen such beautiful creatures. Butterflies don't fly as high as my cloud home. And I'd never been near the ground before.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] Somehow I had the ability to communicate with the animals on a different level.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Wait, wait, wait. What happened to Rainbow Dash? What about the race?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Oh. Well, I wasn't there, so I don't really know what happened.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Come on, Crusaders. We've gotta find her. Besides, I can't take anymore singing.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Maybe my sister knows where she is. Bye, Fluttershy!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Bye, girls!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: How did we get roped into this? Oh, we'll never hear Rainbow Dash's story.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Are you girls still obsessing over your cutie marks?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Of course! Most of the fillies at school already have theirs.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Mmm, I know how you feel. For the longest time I couldn't figure out why I didn't have mine.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] I tried every trick I could think of, but nothing seemed to work. The costumes just weren't right. And the play opened that night.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] I had no idea where my horn was taking me. But unicorn magic doesn't happen without a reason. I knew this had to do with my love of fashion and maybe even my cutie mark! I knew that this was... My destiny!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Ugh! These namby-pamby stories aren't getting us any closer to our cutie marks! They're all about finding who you really are and boring stuff like that.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Yes, Scootaloo, that's exactly...

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Come on, girls! We need action! We need Rainbow Dash!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: As a young filly in Canterlot, I always wanted to go to the Summer Sun Celebration, where Princess Celestia raises the sun.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] And I saw the most amazing, most wonderful thing I've ever seen.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] I poured myself into learning everything I could about magic.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] My parents decided to enroll me in Princess Celestia's School for Gifted Unicorns. It was a dream come true! Except for one thing... I had to pass an entrance exam!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] I knew it was the most important day of my life, that my entire future would be affected by the outcome of this day and I was about to blow it!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Twilight Sparkle.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: You have a very special gift. I don't think I've ever come across a unicorn with your raw abilities.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: But you need to learn to tame these abilities through focused study.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Twilight Sparkle, I'd like to make you my own personal prot<e9>g<e9> here at the school.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Well?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: One other thing, Twilight.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: ...yesyesyesyes...

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Okay, okay.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: We're happy for you, Twilight.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Yeah, thrilled. Let's get out of here while we still can.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: ...yesyes, yeeees!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [giggle] Um... yes.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Ugh! Why don't we ever smash into Rainbow Dash?!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: You're looking for Rainbow Dash? If I was her, I'd be at Sugarcube Corner. Of course, if I was anyone, I'd be at Sugarcube Corner. Hey! I have an idea! Wanna go to Sugarcube Corner?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Well, we're sort of looking for Rainbow Dash, so we can hear how she got her cutie mark.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Cutie mark? Come with me and I'll tell you how I got mine!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [sigh] Why not?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: All right!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] My sisters and I were raised on a rock farm outside of Ponyville. We spent our days working the fields. There was no talking. There was no smiling. [sigh] There were only rocks. We were in the south field, preparing to rotate the rocks to the east field when all of a sudden...

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] I'd never felt joy like that before! It felt so good I just wanted to keep smiling forever! And I wanted everyone I knew to smile too, but rainbows don't come along that often. I wondered, how else could I create some smiles?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: And that's how Equestria was made!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Wha... huh?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Look! We're here!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Maybe on the way home I can tell you the story of how I got my cutie mark. It's a gem!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Oh, come on. She's just being Pinkie Pie.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Ugh...

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Rainbow Dash! You're here!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: I hear you're looking for my cutie mark story.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [sigh] You have no idea what I've been through today to hear that story.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: It all happened during the race at Flight Camp...

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] ...where I stood alone against all odds to defend Fluttershy's honor.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] I've never flown like that before! That freedom was unlike anything I've ever felt! The speed, the adrenaline, the wind in my mane... I liked it... a lot!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Ow!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Hey!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] Turns out the only thing I liked more than flying fast... was winning!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: [voiceover] Most people thought that the sonic rainboom was just an old mare's tale. But that day... The day I discovered racing... I proved that the legends were true. I made the impossible happen!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: And that, little ones, is how you earn a cutie mark.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Whooooaaaa...

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Wait a second. I heard that explosion. And I saw the rainbow too. Rainbow Dash, if you hadn't scared the animals, I never would have learned I could communicate with them and gotten my cutie mark.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: I heard that boom! And right afterwards, there was this amazing rainbow that taught me to smile.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: When I got my cutie mark, I saw a rainbow that pointed me home. I bet it was your sonic rainboom!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: There was an explosion I could never explain when I got my cutie mark.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: This is uncanny! If that explosion didn't happen when it did, I would have blown my entrance exam. Rainbow Dash, I think you helped me earn my cutie mark too!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Whoa!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: We all owe our cutie marks to you!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Do you realize what this means? All of us had a special connection before we even met.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: We've been BFFs forever and we didn't even know it!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Come here, y'all.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: I'm so glad we're friends!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: I love you, guys!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Hey. How about a song?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Definitely!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Nooooo!

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Today I learned something amazing. Everypony everywhere has a special magical connection with her friends, maybe even before she's met them. If you're feeling lonely and you're still searching for your true friends, just look up in the sky. Who knows? Maybe you and your future best friends are all looking at the same rainbow.

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Gross! When did you get so cheesy?

title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
dialog: Just write it, Spike.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: This meteor shower tonight's gonna be amazing!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Awesome!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: You know, this shower only happens once every 100 years.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: A centennial celebration!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: We better get a move on!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Don't wanna be late! Whoa, whoa, whoa! [sigh] There.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Spike, did you grab my quill and ink?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Check!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Scrolls?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Check! I've also packed a telescope, apples, bananas, fruit punch, and my freshly baked homemade triple-decker nut-crazy vanilla cream cookies!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: [giggle] I can see that. Once again you've read my mind, Spike. And that is why you are my number one assistant.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: I'm sorry. I didn't hear you.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: That is why you are my number one assistant.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Missed that! Huh...?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: I said... [giggle] Come on, let's get going. Wait! I almost forgot! I wanna bring the "Astronomical Astronomer's Almanac to All Things Astronomy".

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: The Astronomo-lomo homono what?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: You know that really old big blue book on stars, moons, planets, the universe...?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Hey! What's taking my number one assistant so long?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: I was sure I put the astronomer's guide back. The book would have helped me identify different planets and stars tonight.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Well... Maybe someone borrowed it? Besides, you don't need that book. You can already name all the planets and stars, 'cause you're super smart and astronomically awesome!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Thanks, Spike. You're such a flatterer.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Yeah, I'm a sweet talker.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: And a number one assistant, right?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Check!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: [munch] [gulp] Wow, Twilight! You're lucky to have such a rad assistant. I wish I had someone to do whatever I told them.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Ooh! Ooh! Me! Me! Me! I'll do whatever you want, Rainbow Dash!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Oh yeah, pipsqueak? How about taking out the trash?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Yes ma'am!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Do we have Spike to thank again for this amazing spread? Isn't he simply amazing?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Oh, come on. [pause] I said come on.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Little Spikey-wikey! Who knew that big ferocious dragon started off so cutesy wootsy?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Spike, you are such a little star that I had to make a little bow tie for you.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Gosh. You guys are embarrassing me. Stop it. [pause] Twilight, your turn.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Spike, that's enough.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Oh, right. That's enough.

dialog: Hey, everypony! The show is starting!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: [yawn] Huh?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Mmm. Wow! These cookies are delish!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Spike made them. Speaking of, Spike, can you bring us some punch? Spike?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Oh, poor little thing.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Aww... He's worked himself to the bone.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: And now the punch has been... "spiked"!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Goodnight, Spike. [giggle] Sweet dreams, number one assistant. [sigh] "The Study of Comets. Comets are small, irregularly shaped bodies that are made of nonvolatile grains and frozen gases. They..."

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Huh.<U+00A0>"...have body structures that are fragile and diverse..."

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Shoot! Oh... This is a job for Spike. If only he were awake...

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Wait! Don't go! Don't be afraid. Thank you for returning my scroll.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Gosh, it's cold tonight. Say, would you like to relax in here and keep me company while I work?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Now, where was I? Oh, yes. "...fragile and diverse with a surrounding cloud of material called a coma, that grows in size and brightness as the comet approaches the sun..."

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: [snoring] Huh? Waah! I overslept! I know it's already ten, but I'm scaly-tailed and bright-eyed and ready to work twice as fast! Oh please, don't be upset, Twilight! And what do you want for breakfast? Oatmeal? How about a sunflower smoothie? Grass pancakes?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Spike, don't worry.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: But my morning chores...

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: It's okay. Owlowiscious did them for you.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Who?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: He's our new junior assistant. He's gonna help out with your chores so you won't be so tired all the time.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Wha... Wh... What do we need a junior assistant for? I'm not tired. I do fine on my own. I don't need sleep, I...

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Spike, don't worry. He's just here to help out a little. Now, I have to go out, so why don't you introduce yourself to Owlowiscious? He's in the library.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Worried? Do I look worried? I'm not worried. Who's worried? Hello? Hellooo! Whoa! Dude, that's creepy. Uh... Hi there! I'm Spike. I'm sure Twilight has told you all about me.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Uh, Spike? You know, assistant number one?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: I'm Spike! And who are you? What are you?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Who?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: I thought your name was Owlowiscious!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Okay, "Who", "Owlowiscious", whatever. I'm Spike, okay? Look! All you need to know is that I'm number one and you're number two. Got it?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: So, a man of mystery, huh? I'm keeping my eye on you! I've got eyes in the back of my head too, you know? [crash] Well, not really, but... You know what I mean!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: That bird is out for my job. He wants to be number one. I'll prove to Twilight that I deserve to be number one. Not Freaky Feathers over there. I won't let him have my job if it's the last thing I do!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Oh, what a fantastical, flufflicious feathery little friend! I'm... Hooked!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: He's just wonderful.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: [mocking] "He's just wonderful." Uh, yes. Wonderful. He's quite... the charmer.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: And Owlowiscious is just such a star I just had to make this little bow for you.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Grrr!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: What's he all saddle sore about?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: He's probably just jealous of Owlowiscious.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Maybe Spike feels threatened or worried that Owlowiscious will replace him?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Replace him? Hah! That's crazy! Spike knows he can't be replaced.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: They're trying to replace me! I better step it up and make sure that Twilight and Owlowiscious know that I'm still number one!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Hey, Spike! Can you fetch me that book called "Two-headed Myth<U+0097>

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: ...Mythological Mysteries!" I know where it is.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Thanks, Owlowiscious. Hey, Spike, no worries. Owlowiscious flew up and got the book for me. Oh, and gee! I guess I need "Ferrets of Fairyland" too.

dialog: Hey! Whoa! Whoa!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Climb down from there before you fall.

dialog: Grrr!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Shoot!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Yes, sir!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: My last writing quill. It's broken.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Never fear! Spike, your number one assistant, is here! [under his breath] Quill... Quill... Where is it? Not here... Quill... Quill, where is it...?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Where am I gonna get a quill?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Spike, wait! Wait!

dialog: But the store is called "Quills and Sofas". You only sell two things!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: I swore I had one here somewhere. Ah, here it is! A quince!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Not a quince. A quill!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Not a quiche. [pronounced correctly] A quill!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Nope. Sorry. All outta quills.

dialog: [sigh] Shoot.
