dialog: Come on, chicken! Here, chicky-chicky-chicky! Here, chick-chick-chick-chicky! Come here! Ugh! Come here! [grunting] Not the face, not the face! No! Hey! Stop! Quit it!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: [panting] Spike... to the rescue.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Oh, Spike. I was calling out for you when you were turning this place upside down. Owlowiscious gave me one of his feathers to use as a quill.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: That's just great. Perfect! Sweet! I think I'll just, uh... finish up the rest of my chores! Or did Owlowiscious already do them?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Oh, no no. There are quite a lot of them.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Poor Spike. He'll come around. He's genuinely a good little guy.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Huh?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Spike. What is this? You said this book was missing. Well, Owlowiscious found it right where it belongs, but like this. How did it get this way?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Uh... Well, um... You see, I... I just didn't wanna disappoint you and, uh... Have you ever seen a dragon sneeze?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: I've seen a dragon lie. I'm very disappointed in you, Spike.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: [to Owlowiscious] You set me up! Well, two can play that game.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Not "who"! Two! Urgh!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Owlowiscious is out to take my place, I just know it! I've gotta stop him. But how?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Ah... Muahahaha!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Come along, Opal. Let's hurry up and get to Fluttershy's tea party.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: So lifelike. And when Twilight discovers it shredded up on her floor, she'll think mouse-eating Owlowiscious is to blame. And I'll be number one... again! Muhahaha!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: [evil laugh]<U+00A0>That poor little field mouse! Torn to pieces! It must have been Owlowiscious! You know, since owls eat, you know, mice. What a terrible, terrible bird! He must be punished! Right?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Spike! I don't know what upsets me more. That you deliberately tried to set up Owlowiscious or that you actually thought this pathetic attempt would work! You've let your jealousy get the best of you, Spike. I am truly disappointed. This is not the Spike I know and love.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: She... She doesn't love me anymore.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Twilight hates me. I'm cold, hungry, tired and lonely. Could it get any worse?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: I guess that's a yes.<U+00A0>Hello? Hello?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: What is that?<U+00A0>If this is what running away is all about, I never wanna go home! Gems! Mmm... Woohoo!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: [hiccup] Even if my tummy's full, the rest of me is still empty. I miss Twilight and the pony gang. But she doesn't love me anymore. So, I'm better off here, all by myself. Wow. Seems to be getting warmer. The steam is great for my complexion, but it's sure getting hot in here.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Heyah bro! I didn't know this was your cave. And I didn't know these were your gems, but... we're cool, right?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Whoa, whoa! Hey... We're like brothers, you know? I mean, you're a dragon, I'm a dragon... It's us against the world, right?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: You don't scare me! So you're big.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Really big. And your claws are super sharp. Tail... extra spiky. But, uh... You don't scare me! Ha! How'd you like that? Uh... I'd love to stay, but gotta go! See ya! Wouldn't wanna be ya! Aah!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Spike! Over here!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Am I glad to see you!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Hurry! Hop on! It's too dark! I can't see!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: [pants] Spike. We were so worried about you. I was so worried about you. Why did you run away?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: I thought you didn't need me anymore. And that you didn't love me anymore.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Spike. Sure, I was disappointed, but you are my number one assistant! And friend. And you always will be. It's just that sometimes I need some help at night. I can't ask you to stay up late. You're a baby dragon and you need your rest. Owls are nocturnal. So I asked Owlowiscious to help. But not to take your place. No one could ever replace you, Spike. Not even when you are being a jealous numbskull.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: I'm sorry, Twilight. I never should have been so jealous.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: And I'm sorry too, Spike. I should have been more sensitive.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: And Owlowiscious... I know now that you weren't out to take my job. Forgive me?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Me. Forgive me, Spike.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: [giggle] He forgives you, Spike.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Hey! How did you guys know where I was?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: It was your ketchup-covered feet. Owlowiscious discovered your footprints and we followed them all the way to the cave.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: I know Princess Celestia will wanna read about what happened today...

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: I'm ready when you are.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Hey, Spike. Why don't you write to Princess Celestia? And tell her what you've learned?

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Really? Why, that's a big responsibility!

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: I know. But nothing my number one assistant can't handle.

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Owl's Well That Ends Well
dialog: Oh, Spike.

title: Party of One
dialog: Oh! Hi, Pinkie Pie...

title: Party of One
dialog: This is your singing telegram I hope it finds you well You're invited to a party 'Cause we think you're really swell

title: Party of One
dialog: [rasping voice] Next time, I think I'll just pass out written invitations.

title: Party of One
dialog: Nice one! Now, let me show you how it's really done.

title: Party of One
dialog: Hey, girls!

title: Party of One
dialog: Hey, Pinkie Pie!

title: Party of One
dialog: Howdy!

title: Party of One
dialog: [squeal] Just wanted to tell you how happy I am that you could make it to Gummy's party.

title: Party of One
dialog: Are you kiddin'? I wouldn't have missed it for the world.

title: Party of One
dialog: Me neither. When Pinkie Pie throws a party, I am there! Ta-da!

title: Party of One
dialog: Aw! It's just a boring old apple. Don't worry, there are plenty of other surprises in there.

title: Party of One
dialog: [spits] What kind of surprises?

title: Party of One
dialog: I can't tell you that, silly. Then it wouldn't be a surprise.

title: Party of One
dialog: This punch is simply divine. Is this the same recipe you used for your "Spring Has Sprung" party?

title: Party of One
dialog: Nope! Something new.

title: Party of One
dialog: It's Gummy's favorite.

title: Party of One
dialog: Ooh, this is my jam!

title: Party of One
dialog: Having fun?

title: Party of One
dialog: A blast!

title: Party of One
dialog: You always throw the best parties, Pinkie Pie.

title: Party of One
dialog: They're always the best parties 'cause my best friends are always there!

title: Party of One
dialog: Yah!

title: Party of One
dialog: C'mon, everypony! Gummy wants to dance! Go, Gummy! It's your birthday! Go, Gummy! It's your birthday!

title: Party of One
dialog: Hoo-wee! I am beat! I haven't danced that much since... Well, since your last party. Thanks again for the invite!

title: Party of One
dialog: See ya later, birthday alligator!

title: Party of One
dialog: Bravo for hosting yet another delightful soiree.

title: Party of One
dialog: It's been lovely.

title: Party of One
dialog: You sure you don't wanna stay? There's still some cake left.

title: Party of One
dialog: Uh, I think I'm gonna pass. Great party though. We should do this again soon.

title: Party of One
dialog: [gasp] We should do this again soon!

title: Party of One
dialog: Oh! Hi, Pinki-

title: Party of One
dialog: It's soon!

title: Party of One
dialog: Pardon me?

title: Party of One
dialog: You said we should have another party soon, and... it's soon! Here's your invitation!

title: Party of One
dialog: "You're invited to Gummy's 'after-birthday' party. This afternoon at 3 o'clock."

title: Party of One
dialog: All our bestest friends are invited, and there's gonna be dancing, and games, and cake, and ice-cream, and punch!

title: Party of One
dialog: This afternoon? As in, "this afternoon" this afternoon?

title: Party of One
dialog: Yes, indeedy!

title: Party of One
dialog: Oh, gosh. I wish I could make it, but I've gotten a bit behind in my studies. I've really gotta hit the books.

title: Party of One
dialog: I understand. Your studies come first. But don't worry, we'll be sure to save you some cake.

title: Party of One
dialog: Please do.

title: Party of One
dialog: Oh! And Twilight, you shouldn't hit the books. You should really just read them.

title: Party of One
dialog: I'll keep that in mind.

title: Party of One
dialog: Huh? Oh, hi, Pinkie Pie! What brings you 'round these parts?

title: Party of One
dialog: Who's ready to shake their hoof-thang?! It's an invitation to Gummy's "after-birthday" party this afternoon. There's gonna be dancing, and games, and cake, and ice-cream, and punch!

title: Party of One
dialog: This afternoon? A-as in, "this afternoon" this afternoon?

title: Party of One
dialog: That's funny. That's just what Twilight said, and the answer is, "Yes! It's this afternoon!"

title: Party of One
dialog: Uh, well, I... I... uh... I don't think I can make it 'cause... uh... I have to... uh... uh, you know what? I... uh... pick apples! Yep, apples! 'Cause that's what we do! With the... apples. We, uh... pick 'em!

title: Party of One
dialog: Okey-dokey-lokey! A party is still a party, even if there are only three guests.

title: Party of One
dialog: [grunts] Anything else I can do for you, most beautiful one?

title: Party of One
dialog: [sniff] [whimper] Hmm... perhaps you could take a bath. How do I put this delicately? You smell like a rotten apple core that's been wrapped in moldy hay and dipped in dragon perspiration.

title: Party of One
dialog: Ooh! Love the new hat. Very modern. What's the occasion?

title: Party of One
dialog: Gummy's "after-birthday" party is this afternoon. I'm delivering the invitations.

title: Party of One
dialog: The party is this afternoon? As in, "this afternoon" this afternoon?

title: Party of One
dialog: It's so strange. Everypony keeps saying that.

title: Party of One
dialog: Oh... do they?

title: Party of One
dialog: I know it's short notice, but we had such a great time at his birthday party, I thought we could have even more fun at his after-birthday party.

title: Party of One
dialog: And I'm sure that we would, but I'm going to have to decline. I have to... wash my hair!

title: Party of One
dialog: Don't be silly, your hair doesn't look dirty.

title: Party of One
dialog: It doesn't?

title: Party of One
dialog: Nope!

title: Party of One
dialog: See? [gag] Dirty! I have to go!

title: Party of One
dialog: Huh... No Twilight, no Applejack, no Rarity. Oh well, a party is still a party even with only two guests.

title: Party of One
dialog: This afternoon?

title: Party of One
dialog: As in...?

title: Party of One
dialog: Yes! As in, "this afternoon" this afternoon!

dialog: Oh, man! We'd love to, but... we're... house-sitting this afternoon.

dialog: [sigh] Both of you?

dialog: It's... uh... a big house.

dialog: Uh, look at the time! We'd really better get going.

dialog: Wait! Maybe I could bring you some after-birthday cake and ice-cream. Who're you house-sitting for?

dialog: Harry.

dialog: Harry?

dialog: Yeah, I don't think you know him.

dialog: That's strange. I know just about everypony around here.

dialog: He's... a bear.

dialog: A bear?

dialog: Yup! He's a bear all right, and he'll be pretty upset if we don't get over to his house soon.

dialog: Wait! There's a bear around here who lives in a house?

dialog: It's, uh, really more of a cave.

title: Party of One
dialog: But he's fixed up the place so much, it feels like a house.

title: Party of One
dialog: And, uh, he wants us to look after his house... uh, cave... while he's, uh...

title: Party of One
dialog: A-at the beach!

title: Party of One
dialog: He's vacationing at the beach?

title: Party of One
dialog: Yup! He loves to...

title: Party of One
dialog: Gotta go!

title: Party of One
dialog: Something strange is definitely going on around here, Gummy. Sure Rainbow Dash and Fluttershy had to house-sit for that vacationing bear, but what are the chances all my other friends would have plans this afternoon too? Rarity has to wash her hair? Applejack has to pick apples? Twilight is behind on her studies and has to hit the books? The more I think about it, the more those are starting to sound like... [gasp] excuses!

title: Party of One
dialog: That doesn't look like studying... or hitting!

title: Party of One
dialog: Mrs. Ooh! You must be here for...

dialog: Shh! Is Pinkie Pie around?

dialog: Mrs. Oh, I don't think so.

title: Party of One
dialog: Good. I don't wanna her to know anything about this.

title: Party of One
dialog: Mrs. Yes, of course. I'll be right back.

title: Party of One
dialog: But... we're friends. What wouldn't Twilight want me to know anything about? [gasp] She's coming back.

title: Party of One
dialog: Mrs. There you go.

title: Party of One
dialog: Time to get to the bottom of things! [gasp] I think our cover's been blown! We'll need a new disguise.

title: Party of One
dialog: She didn't see you at the sweet shop, did she?

title: Party of One
dialog: I don't think so.

title: Party of One
dialog: Oh, good. I'd hate for her to ruin everything.

title: Party of One
dialog: Me too.

title: Party of One
dialog: Have you seen her?

title: Party of One
dialog: Not since this morning.

title: Party of One
dialog: Me neither. Can you believe she was planning on throwing an after-birthday party today?

title: Party of One
dialog: I'm just glad I was able to come up with an excuse for why I couldn't be there.

title: Party of One
dialog: Me too! This is obviously going to be so much better.

title: Party of One
dialog: As long as we keep her from finding out about it, it will.

title: Party of One
dialog: [whispering] See you later!

dialog: I thought everypony loved my parties.

dialog: Hi, Pinkie Pie! Uh-oh!

dialog: Rainbow Dash! Wait!

dialog: Phew...

dialog: Where're you going?!

dialog: Ah!

dialog: What's the real reason you didn't want to come to Gummy's party?!

dialog: What's in those bags?!

dialog: Applejack! We have a problem!

dialog: I know you're IN THERE!

dialog: Oh! Howdy, pardner!

dialog: Mind if I... take a look inside the barn?

dialog: No! Uh, I mean, yes, I mean... you can't come in here!

dialog: Rainbow Dash just went in there.

dialog: Oh, well, she was just bringin' in some... supplies! Yup, supplies for the... renovation! Fixin' up the whole thing, top to bottom... uh, lots of construction goin' on in there right now.

dialog: [whispering] You heard her! Construction!

dialog: Okey... dokey... lokey.

title: Party of One
dialog: Secrets and lies! It's all secrets and lies with those ponies! They're up to something, Gummy! Something they don't want me to know about! Well, I'm gonna know about it! I'm gonna know about it big time! And I know just who's gonna tell me all about it. Tell me all about it big time!

title: Party of One
dialog: Wow! Nice spread!

title: Party of One
dialog: It's all yours, Spike. All you have to do is talk.

title: Party of One
dialog: That's it? Oh, you got it. Okay... uh, beautiful weather we're having, eh? I love a sunny spring day, don't you? The birds chirpin' and the flowers bloomin'.

title: Party of One
dialog: No, no, no. Talk about our friends.

title: Party of One
dialog: Oh, okay. Let's see, there's Twilight Sparkle. She's a unicorn. Good with magic. A real brainiac. And then you got Rarity. Total knockout. Twilight seems to think I don't even have a chance with her, but... eh, what does she know? Let's see. There's... there's Fluttershy, a Pegasus who's afraid of heights. Heh, what's up with that?

title: Party of One
dialog: Grr! No! You're not understanding me! I want you to confess!

dialog: Confess?

title: Party of One
dialog: Confess!

dialog: I'm the one who spilled juice all over Twilight's copy of "Magical Mysteries and Practical Potions"!

title: Party of One
dialog: And?

dialog: And I'm the one who used up all the hot water in Ponyville yesterday when I took a seven-hour bubble bath!

title: Party of One
dialog: Aaand?

dialog: And sometimes... when no one's around... I do this: Lookin' good, Spike! Lookin' real good!

title: Party of One
dialog: No! No! No! No!

dialog: W-What do you wanna hear? Tell me what you want me to say, and I'll say it!

title: Party of One
dialog: Your friends are all lying to you and avoiding you 'cause they don't like your parties and they don't want to be your friends anymore!

title: Party of One
dialog: Aha! I knew it! [balloon deflating noise] Oh no, my friends don't like my parties and they don't want to be my friends anymore.

dialog: Thank you all so much for coming! It means so much to Gummy.

dialog: Why, thank you, Rocky.

dialog: Oh, they're not so bad.

dialog: Oh, c'mon now. "Losers" might be a little strong, dont'cha think?

dialog: Well, it was pretty rude...

dialog: It was, wasn't it?

title: Party of One
dialog: You know what? I'm not gonna speak to them ever again. And I'm not gonna invite them to another party as long as I live! They don't deserve to be invited to my parties. [plink] Not after the way they've been acting.

title: Party of One
dialog: Who could that be?

dialog: Hey there, Pinkie Pie! Sorry I was in such a rush earlier. Had some place to be and couldn't slow down and say, "Hello." You know how it goes.

title: Party of One
dialog: Farewell party?

dialog: Yes! You don't like me anymore, so you decided to kick me out of the group and throw a great, big party to celebrate! A "Farewell to Pinkie Pie" party!

dialog: Why in the world would you think we didn't like you anymore, sugarcube?

dialog: Uh, yeah! Because we wanted your party to be a surprise.

dialog: We'd been planning this party for such a long time, we had to make excuses for why we couldn't attend Gummy's party so that we could get everything ready for yours.

dialog: If this is a farewell party, why does the cake I picked up from Sugarcube Corner say "Happy Birthday, Pinkie Pie"?

title: Party of One
dialog: And you like me so much you decided to throw me a surprise party!

title: Party of One
dialog: That's what we've been trying to tell you, darling.

dialog: You girls are the best friends ever! How could I have ever doubted you?

dialog: Uh-huh! It sure would.

title: Party of One
dialog: Don't worry about it.

dialog: I'm just glad I haven't been replaced by a bucket of turnips.

dialog: Huh?

title: Party of One
dialog: You don't wanna know.

title: Party of One

Always expect the best from your friends, and never assume the worst. Rest assured that a good friend always has your best interests at heart.

dialog: Chaos!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Come back here, you! Gotcha! Eww, what is this? Cotton candy?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Wait a second! It's not supposed to rain until tomorrow. You can't just<U+0096>

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: You did.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Hey, I didn't tell you to go anywhere!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Rainbow Dash, what's going on with this rain? I mean chocolate milk? I mean chocolate milk rain?!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: There's crazy weather all over Equestria! Cloudsdale is getting soaked by a major cola storm right now! But don't worry. I'm not leaving you until I get control of Ponyville!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Ahem. I heard about your troubles, Applejack, and I came to see if there's anything I can do without getting wet. Or dirty. Or out from under my umbrella.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Fluttershy! Do somethin'!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Now, Angel, you really shouldn't<U+0096> No! It's not possible! I must be seeing things!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Don't worry, everyone. I've learned a new spell that'll fix everything. My fail-safe spell... failed. What do we do?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Uh, give up?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Spike, Twilight will come up with something.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Hmm, time for plan B. Rainbow, can you corral all those clouds in one corner of the sky? Applejack, I need you to bring those high-strung storm clouds down to Earth.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Hey, what happened?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Oh dear. I hope none of the animals see these delicious chocolate-filled cotton candy clouds. I'd hate to have to share them.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: You and me both, sister! Hey!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: And when y'all are done with that, feel free to have some popcorn for dessert.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: You see, Spike? You should never give up. There's nothing we can't overcome if we all work together.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: [gasp] Come on, girls. Princess Celestia wants to see us all in Canterlot immediately!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Princess Celestia, we came as fast as we could!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Thank you, Twilight. Thank you, all.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Is this about the weather? And the animals' weird behavior? What's happening out there? Why isn't my magic working? Is there<U+0096>

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Follow me.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: I've called you here for a matter of great importance. It seems an old foe of mine, someone I thought I had defeated long ago, has returned. His name... is Discord.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Discord is the mischievous spirit of disharmony. Before my sister and I stood up to him, he ruled Equestria in an eternal state of unrest and unhappiness. Luna and I saw how miserable life was for Earth ponies, Pegasi, and unicorns alike, so after discovering the Elements of Harmony, we combined our powers and rose up against him, turning him to stone.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: All right, Princess!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: I thought the spell we cast would keep him contained forever, but since Luna and I are no longer connected to the Elements, the spell has been broken.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: No longer connected?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: This is Canterlot Tower, where the Elements are kept inside since all of you recovered them. I need you to wield the Elements of Harmony once again and stop Discord before he thrusts all of Equestria into eternal chaos.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: But why us? Why don't you<U+0096>

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Hey, look! We're famous!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: You six showed the full potential of the Elements by harnessing the magic of your friendship to beat a mighty foe. Although Luna and I once wielded the Elements, it is you who now control their power, and it is you who must defeat Discord!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Princess Celestia, you can count on<U+0096>

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Hold on a second! Eternal chaos comes with chocolate rain, you guys. Chocolate rain!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Don't listen to her, Princess. We'd be honored to use the Elements of Harmony again.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Ooh. You can keep the Elements. I'll take that case!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Have no fear, ponies. I have total confidence that you will be able to defeat Discord with these!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Oh, well. If anyone needs me, I'll be outside in the chocolate puddles with a giant swizzle straw.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: The Elements! They're gone!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: That chamber is protected by a powerful spell that only I can break! This doesn't make sense!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: [laughter] Make sense? Oh, what fun is there in making sense?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Discord... Show yourself!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: [chuckling] Did you miss me, Celestia? I missed you. It's quite lonely being encased in stone, but you wouldn't know that, would you, because I don't turn ponies into stone.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Enough! What have you done with the Elements of Harmony?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: You'll never get away with this, Discord!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Oh, I'd forgotten how grim you can be, Celestia. It's really quite boring.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Hey! Nopony insults the Princess!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Oh, you must be Rainbow Dash, famed for her loyalty, the Element of Harmony you represent.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: That's right! I'll always be loyal to the Princess!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: We'll see about that.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: I can't believe we're wasting our time talking to a tacky window.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: The beautiful Rarity, representing the element of generosity, if I'm not mistaken?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: So you know who we are, big deal.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Oh, I know much more than that, honest Applejack.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: You seem to know our strengths too.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Pinkie!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: [laughing] He's standing on your head!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Stop stalling, Discord! What have you done with the Elements of Harmony?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Can we go home now?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: What do you reckon he meant? Twists and turns and ending back where we started?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Twists and turns... twists and turns... twists and turns! That's it! I bet Discord hid the Elements in the palace labyrinth!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Good luck, my little ponies. The fate of Equestria is in your hooves.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Thanks, Princess. We won't let you down.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: W-We have to go in there?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Nope! Dopey Discord forgot about these babies! I'll just do a quick flyover and we'll have the Elements in no time. My wings!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Give us our wings and horns back!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: You'll get them back in good time. I simply took them to ensure there's no cheating. You see, this is the first rule of our game: no flying, and no magic.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: The first rule?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Never fear, girls. We have each other!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Yeah! Like Twilight said, there's nothing we can't overcome if we all stick together!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: All right, girls, let's do this!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Stay calm, girls! Everypony head to the middle as fast as you can, and we'll regroup there!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Moving out!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: See you in the center.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Yee-haw!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: See you guys there!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: [gasping] What's that? Who's there? Girls!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: What in tarnation? Where am I?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Who are y'all?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: All right then. I don't trust this place worth a hill of beans, but I've got a really bad feelin' about this feller Discord. What's gonna come of this mission we're on?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: No! Our friendship? Over?!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: It can't be true. It just can't!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: That just can't be the truth.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Applejack! Thank goodness! I thought I heard voices over here. Who were you talking to?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: I was talking to... uh... nopony! Nopony whatsoever!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: What?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Nothing. Come on, uh, we best be going.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Did Applejack just...? Come on, Twilight! Applejack wouldn't lie.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Hey, what gives?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: What's the matter, Pinkie Pie? I thought you appreciated a good laugh?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: It's different. They're laughing at me.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: It's hardly different. Your friends laugh at you all the time.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: My friends laugh with me, not at me.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: No! Stop it!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Stop laughing at me!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Oh, poor Pinkie Pie. And here I thought laughter made you happy.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: [gravelly] Happy? I don't think so.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Pinkie Pie! Are we glad to see you!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Oh you are, huh? Why? Need a good laugh?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Pinkie? What do you suppose has her so upset? It's not like her.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: I didn't notice anything strange about Pinkie.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Weird. Better pick up the pace before the stress of this gets the better of all of us.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: I was expecting an audience with the Princess, not outdoor sport. Agh. Oh my...

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: [laughing] Welcome to your lucky day, Rarity. You've found the one thing in Equestria that could rival my face for sheer beauty. What do you think? You like?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Yes... I like very much... No! No, I shan't succumb to such fabulousness. Must... get to the center... to meet... the others. [grunt] Mine!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Rarity! Are we glad to see... Why are you carrying a humongous boulder?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: [teeth chatter] Okay, I can do this. I can... [scream] Oh, wait a minute... Butterflies? Wait! Don't leave me here!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Oh, no. I'm certain they're doing their best to find me.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Not at all. I am weak and helpless and I appreciate their understanding.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Not really. In fact, I think I'm awfully lucky to have friends who want me to be the best I can be.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Oh, for goodness sake! You've been kind for far too long, my dear. Time to be cruel. Arrivederci!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Fluttershy! I'm so glad to see a friendly face. This awful labyrinth is getting to everypony.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Grrr...

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Aw, boo-hoo-hoo! Why don't you wave your magic little horn and make everything all right?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Uh...

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Oh, that's right, you can't. You don't have one.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: What is happening to my friends?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: And what are you laughing at?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Chocolate milk.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Little help here! Thanks, Twilight.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: You're welcome<U+0096>

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: But don't get any ideas about my gem! I know where you live.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: I've got you now, element.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Oh. I can see why you like these clouds so much. Very plush.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Get off there and put 'em up! Come on! Let's go!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Hey, I'm here to deliver a message.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: I've got a message for you too!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Listen closely, this is important. A weighty choice is yours to make:<U+00A0>the right selection or a big mistake. If a wrong choice you choose to pursue, the foundations of home will crumble without you.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Cloudsdale? Crumble... without me? No!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: That box contains your wings. You can take them and leave the game, or you can carry on aimlessly wandering this maze. Your choice.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Must... find... Rainbow Dash. As a team... we're unstoppable. Rainbow Dash won't let us down.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Well, looky there. Rainbow Dash is flying away. She's abandonin' us.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 1
dialog: Now I know that's a lie. [gasp] How can it be?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Princess Celestia, we came as fast as we could.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I need you to wield the Elements of Harmony once again and stop Discord.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: The Elements! They're gone!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [laughter] Everypony has to play, or the game is over and I win.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Our friendship...over?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Who are you talking to?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Nopony! Nopony whatsoever.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: What?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Pinkie Pie! Are we glad to see you!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Why? Need a good laugh?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: What is happening to my friends?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: And what are you laughing at!?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Oh, you ponies are just the most fun I've had in aeons.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Well, quit it! You'd better think before you laugh at the Pink...ie Pie!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Oh, yeah? Well ha, ha.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Quit it!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: No. Ha, ha.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Quit it!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: No. Ha ha-ha ha ha.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Uh... Rarity? This here diamond of yours? Twilight said we should split it six ways since we, uh, found it together.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: HI-YAH! Try it, punk. He's mine. All mine! Ya! Ya! Ya!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Girls, why are you all acting like this?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Quit it! Stop it!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: We need to stick together.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Ha, ha.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [laughter] It's just too entertaining.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Stop it, Discord. You're not playing fair.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I'm not playing fair? Perhaps we haven't met. I'm Discord, spirit of chaos and disharmony. Hello?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: How are we supposed to find the Elements of Harmony when you took away the labyrinth before we could get to the end?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Oh, wait, did you...? [laughter] How funny! You thought the Elements were in the labyrinth?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I never said they were in the labyrinth.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: But...but...

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Keep trying, Twilight Sparkle. [mockingly] Maybe the magic of friendship can help you. Now if you'll excuse me, I have some chaos to wreak.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Chocolate milk? I hate chocolate milk!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [grunt] Think, Twilight, think! "Find the Elements back where you began." Back where you began.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Don't touch my gem!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I'm touching your gem, Rarity. Ha, ha.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: What 'chu laughin' at?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Ugh. I just want to go home... Wait a minute... Home! "Back where you began!" The Elements must be in... Ponyville! Come on, girls. I'm certain this is what Discord's riddle really meant. If we get back to the library, I have a book that I just know can give us a clue. Ah!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Good boy, Angel. Mama's so proud.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Wow, I can see so much better now. Whoa! I meant to do that.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Wah! Ahh! Whoa! Discord's turned our dirt roads into soap!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Beautiful, isn't it? This is the new and improved Ponyville, and these are only my first of changes.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: This may look like fun, but it's not.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Ugh.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Picture it. The chaos capital of the world.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Well, wait a few minutes and you'll see it in the beautiful light of day. Or not.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Ponyville, the chaos capital of the world? Not if I have anything to say about it.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [sigh] Okay, we're here. Everyone please, please, please just go inside, please?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I absolutely refuse.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: With pleasure.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I hate libraries!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Pleeeease, we gotta hurry!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Forget it, Twilight. I know what you're up to. The second I go in, you'll have your little minion Spike come and take Tom!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Tom?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Well, it's not going to work.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: You're not going in without him, are you?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Mm-mm.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [grunting] Fine!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Ah! Brrr! What did you do that for, Fluttershy?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: 'Cause you just looked so peaceful.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I...uh...huh?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Careful, Twilight! You'll ruin his beautiful finish.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Oh, for the love of...

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Twilight, what's going on? Why does everybody look so...gray?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Don't ask. I need you to help me find something.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Hey, Twilight, what's soaking wet and clueless?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: What's happened to everypony?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I guess you just bring out the worst in us, Spike.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Ugh. No time to explain. We've got to find the reference guide to the Elements of Harmony before somepony does something she'll regret!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: The Elements of Harmony? Oh, I know exactly where that book is. Found it!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Hah!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Fluttershy, you'd better give me that book!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [sing-song voice] Keep away!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Hey! Applejack, give me that book!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I don't have any book.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Pinkie! You guys! Stop it right now!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Ugh!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Mine!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Hey, do you even know what you just stole?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: No, but if you want it, I want it!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [strained groan] GIVE ME THAT BOOK!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Where is she? Where's Rarity?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Beats me.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Lies!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Get back! All of you! This is my book, and I'm going to READ IT! [gasp] The Elements!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: The Elements! They were here all along!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: This is great! Now you guys can defeat Discord and put everything back to normal!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: See, girls? We did it! We found the Elements of Harmony! Together!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: You don't even care, do you?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [sigh] I never thought it would happen. My friends... have turned into complete JERKS! Necklace! Necklace! Necklace! Necklace! And... big crown thingy! Come on, everypony, let's go!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: But Twilight, aren't you missing somepony?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Nope. We've got the liar, the grump, the hoarder, and the brute. That just about covers it.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: But what about Rainbow Dash?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Congratulations, Spike, you're the new Rainbow Dash. Now let's go!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [gasp] Me? B-b-but what if she finds out I've been impersonating her? [moan] That won't end well.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Too bad, you're Rainbow Dash. Now let's go defeat Discord so we don't ever have to talk to each other again!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Move! Look out, here comes Tom!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Well, well, well, I see you've found the Elements of Harmony. How terrifying!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Discord! I've figured out your lame riddle. You're in for it now!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I certainly am. You've clearly out-dueled me, and now it's time to meet my fate. I'm prepared to be defeated now, ladies. Fire when ready.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Formation, now!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: "Rainbow Dash", get over here.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: All right, let's get this over with. What's going on?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Mine's workin'. There must be somethin' wrong with yours.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I HATE the Elements of Harmony!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Hmph! Garbage.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: MINE!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Sorry, Twilight. I guess I'd better get back upstairs and clean up the library. Good luck with all this<U+0096> whoa!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: It's your fault it didn't work.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Who are you talking to?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Any of you! ALL OF YOU! I'm outta here!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I better go, too. I've got new better friends waiting for me at the farm.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Yeah! I'm sick of you losers.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: FINE! Leave! See if I care! I don't need you guys either! With friends like you, who needs...enemies...?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [laughing] Oh, my stomach! Twilight, you've got to see what I just did.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: It's priceless! [laughing] Come now, Twilight Sparkle. You've got to get into the spirit of things! After all, this is your new home.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Not anymore...

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Pack your things, Spike, we're leaving.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Don't ask where we're going, 'cause I don't know yet. Just not here.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Can't...move. The princess...has been sending these...since I came back upstairs. [belch] Make it stop!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: These are all the letters I've written to the princess since I've lived in Ponyville. But why would she send them back?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: "Real friends don't care what your cover is."

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: You're right, Spike. I've got to fight for my friendships. For them. For me. For Equestria!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Oh...uh...why don't you just stay here and rest? I'll take care of the whole fighting for friendship thing myself.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: And so I tried to defeat Discord, but none of my so-called "friends" would lift a hoof to help me.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Applejack, I'm here to fight for our friendship.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Oh, now you want to fight. Where you went when I was battlin' Discord?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Snap out of it. This isn't you! You're not a liar.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Wh-what happened? Twilight! [sigh] I saw a vision of us feudin' and fightin'. I couldn't face the truth, so I started tellin' lies. Can you ever forgive me?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I already have. Come on!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Oh no! Twilight, Applejack, I just had the worst dream!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: What do you think you're doing? Get away from my gem! Get away--! [grunting] Let us never speak of this again.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [laughter] And I-I turned gray! [giggle] Can you believe it?!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Uh? She's not here.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Without Rainbow Dash, we can't use the Elements.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: She could be anywhere by now! We're never gonna find her.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Yeah, we will, 'cause she's right there!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Rainbow Dash!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Hey, guys!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: We've been looking everywhere for you!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: That's nice.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Discord's still on the loose! We need you to help us defeat him with your element, Loyalty!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Pfft. Loyalty, schmoyalty! Have you guys seen Ponyville? It's a disaster! I'm staying here in Cloudsdale where everything's awesome.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: How in Equestria can she think that tiny patch of clouds is Cloudsdale?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: The same way he got you to think that cheap rock was a bona fide diamond.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I thought we agreed never to speak of that again.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Time for Plan B.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [whispering] Okay, Fluttershy, you grab Rainbow Dash and hold her down. Applejack will lower me down from this rope so I can cast the memory spell on her.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Got it!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Um...I'm just wondering if it's okay if I hold you down against your will for a little bit?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Ugh...

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Nice try! Ponyville's your problem, not mine.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Come on, Fluttershy, we've got to catch her. Hyah! Applejack!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: PINKIE! You were supposed to secure the ROPE!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Oops.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Rarity, Pinkie, hold on! Y'all are slowing her down!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Oh, Fluttershy, would you be a dear and FLY FASTER, please?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [whimper/crying] I can't!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: If you can't catch her, Discord wins!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: That big... dumb... MEANIE!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Okay, Applejack, last rope! Make it count!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Lemme go! I don't need you guys! Leave me alone! Wh-what happened? [gasp] How's Ponyville? Where are the Elements?! Did we stop Discord?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Maybe it's a little early for a group hug.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: [laughter] Chaos is a wonderful, wonderful thing.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Not as wonderful as friendship.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Oh, this again?

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: That's right. You couldn't break apart our friendship for long.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: I'll tell you what we've learned, Discord: we've learned that friendship isn't always easy, but there's no doubt it's worth fighting for!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Ugh, gag. Fine, go ahead. Try and use your little Elements. Friend me. Just make it quick. I'm missing some excellent chaos here.

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: All right, ladies, let's show him what friendship can do!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: Huh. What's this? No. NO!!!

title: The Return of Harmony Part 2
dialog: We are gathered here today to once again honor the heroism of these six friends who stood up to the villain Discord and saved Equestria from eternal chaos.

title: Lesson Zero

dialog: How are we doing, Spike?

dialog: Let's see... We've already dropped off your cape at the cleaners, returned the blackboard you borrowed from Cheerilee, ordered new parchment and quills from the stationery shop...

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Not to worry, I'll just move some of this one to... hmm... I think I may have scooped too much... oops! Now those two have more. Let's just try this again... Hmm, no, that won't do. Let me just... hmm... put some here, and... no, that's not right. A little more on this one, a little bit... and wait... I'll just... ooh, a little bit here, and here, and... perfect!

dialog: Okay, time to tackle the next item on our-- oops! Looks like we're going to have to add 'give a baby dragon a bath' to our list.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Eh.

dialog: Looks like that's everything!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Almost everything.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: "Triple-check checklist to make sure we didn't miss anything when we double checked the checklist!" Uh... check! Ugh... I've been holding that quill so long, I've got a claw cramp! Well, good thing we don't have anything to report to Princess Celestia this week... I don't think I could write another word!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: We haven't sent a letter to Princess Celestia this week?!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Why? Is that bad?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Bad? BAD? Of course it's bad! I'm supposed to send Princess Celestia a letter every week, telling her about a lesson I've learned about friendship! Not every other week, not every ten days, every... single... week!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Huh?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Ohh... Where's my calendar, where's my calendar?!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Where it.. always is?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: When did we send the last one?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Last... Tuesday?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: And today is...

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Tuesday?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Argh! Nononononononono! If I don't send her a letter by sundown, I'll be... tardy!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: What's that now?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Tar-dy, Spike! Late, I'll be late! Oh, how could I let this happen? I'm usually so organized. I've never been late with an assignment.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Oh, please! You're the most studious student ever! I'm sure the Princess will forgive you if you miss one little deadline.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I'm afraid to take that chance, Spike. This is the ruler of all of Equestria we're talking about. The pony who holds my fate in her hooves! What if she doesn't forgive me?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Yeah... I don't think she--

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: What if instead she starts thinking I'm not taking my studies on friendship seriously?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Why would she--

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: What if she makes me come back to Canterlot and puts me back in school and makes me prove I've been taking them seriously by giving me a test?! What if I don't pass?!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Well, why wouldn't you pass--

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: She's my teacher. Do you know what teachers do to students who don't pass? They send them back a grade! But she won't just send me back a grade. She'll send me back to... magic kindergarten.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Twilight? Twilight!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Huh?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: That is the most ridiculous thing I've ever heard! You're not going to be sent back to magic kindergarten.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: You're right. I have no reason to worry. Because I'm going to solve a friend's problem and get that letter to Princess Celestia before sundown!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: So... got any problems, troubles, conundrums, or any other sort of issues, major or minor, that I as a good friend could help you solve?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Huh. Hmm. Huunh. Huh... I got nothin'.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: [sigh] Then it looks like I'm going to have to find somepony who does.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: [sigh] This won't end well.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: You've got this, Twilight. You still have plenty of time to get that letter to Princess Celestia! Has to be somepony who needs the help of a good friend!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Rarity!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Don't worry, Rarity! I'm here!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: [sobbing] Why me-e-e-e-e-ee... [gasp] WHYYYY?! Why? Why-y?! And of all the worst things that could happen, this is THE. WORST. POSSIBLE. THING!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: What's happened? Are you alright?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: [gasp] I've lost my diamond-encrusted purple ribbon! I have searched high, and I have searched low. Low and high! High and low! But I can't find it anywhere! Anywhe-e-e-e-ere! How can I possibly finish my latest creation if I can't find it?!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Never fear, Rarity. As your friend I'll do my best to help you fi--

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Oh, there it is. Isn't it always just the last place you look?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: So... you just lost your ribbon?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Mm-hm!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: But now you've found it?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Yuh-huh.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: And nothing else is bothering you? Nothing that I, as a good friend, could help you with?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Hmm... there is one thing.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Yes?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I think I left my measuring tape under the fabric over there. Could you get that for me?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: [sighs] Measuring tape? Sure.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Twilight? Is there something bother-- Twilight?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: No need to panic. Rarity is just one pony. I'm sure one of my other friends will need me.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: What in the world...? Rainbow must be angry with Applejack! She must hate her guts! How wonderful! Rainbow Dash! Stop! Listen, Rainbow. I know you're upset with Applejack, but don't worry. Whatever it is that has come between you two, I'm sure that I, as a good friend, can help you resolve your problems.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Uh, what are you talking about?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Oh, Rainbow Dash, you don't have to hide your feelings from me! I can tell you two must've had a terrible fight.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Now, why don't you tell me all about your issues with Applejack.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I don't have any issues with Applejack.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: You don't? Then why are you destroying her property?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Because she asked me to. Right, Applejack?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Yes, ma'am. I wanted to put up a new barn, but this one's gotta come down first. Hehe. Now get back to it, R.D.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: You got it, boss!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I'd take cover if I were you.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: [sigh] I can't believe I wasted all that time. I should have just come here first. Fluttershy always has some fear she's trying to get over. As a good friend, I'll be able to help her.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Fluttershy?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: How can this be happening? Of all the days she had to stop being such a scaredy-pony, she had to pick today?! What am I going to do?!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: You really should have come to me sooner. You were carrying so much tension in that shoulder.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: It's fine. It'll all be fine. The day isn't over yet. But it will be over soon!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: [groans] It'll be all over! My time in Ponyville! My advanced studies! Nono. You're a good student. You can do this. Ooh! But what if I can't? You can! You just have to keep it together. Keep. It. Together!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Are you talking to... yourself? Twilight?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Snap out of it!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Huh?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Are you okay?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Twilight, I'm really worried. I mean this letter thing is really getting to you. Here. You've been so anxious all day that you completely forgot about the picnic. Why don't you just relax and go hang out with--

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: The picnic! I should go see my friends!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I'm glad you've come to your senses.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Please tell me I did not forget the plates. [gasp] I did. I totally forgot them. Of all the worst things that could happen, this is THE. WORST. POSSIBLE. THING! [cries] Why, why, why... Uh... What? You didn't expect me to lay on the grass, did you?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: You alright, hun?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: No! I am not alright.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: It's just terrible.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Simply awful.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: It's the most horrific trouble I've ever been in and I really really really need your help!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: My letter to Princess Celestia is almost overdue, and I haven't learned anything about friendship!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Oh, thank goodness. I thought something really awful had happened.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: [strangled noises] Something awful has happened! If I don't turn in the letter on time, I'll be tardy! TARDY!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: No offense, sugarcube, but it looks like somepony's gettin' themselves all worked up over nothin'.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: This is not nothing. This is everything. I need you guys to help me find somepony with a problem I can fix before sundown! My whole life depends on it!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Come on now. Have a seat and stop sweatin' the small stuff.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Wow. I've never seen Twilight so upset before.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Oh, what a drama queen. Mm. Relatively speaking...

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Clock is ticking, Twilight. Clock. Is. Ticking. Keep it together. If I can't find a friendship problem... I'll make a friendship problem!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Oh, hi, Twilight. How's it go--

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Gr-eat. Just great. You three look like you're doing great too! Looks like three good friends who obviously don't need the help of another good friend. This is Smarty Pants. She was mine when I was your age, and now I want to give her to you!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Uhh... she's... great.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Yeah. Great.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I really... like her... mane.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: She even comes with her own notebook and quill, for when you want to pretend she's doing her homework!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: That's... um... great.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Yeah... great.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I really like her... mane?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I just hope the fact that there are three of you and only one of her doesn't become a problem! I'd hate to cause a rift between such good friends. So, who wants to play with her first?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Uh... You should play with her first, Sweetie Belle. Y'know, 'cause you like her mane so much.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Nonononononono. I think Scootaloo should get to play with her first.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I'd love to, but, um, you take her, Apple Bloom.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Applejack says it's important to share.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: [thinking] I gotta think of something! Thinkthinkthinkthinkthink Twilight, think! [gasp] That's it! [aloud] Ooh, you're going to like Smarty Pants. And you're going to like her more than anything.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: [gasp] I want it.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I need it.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I really like her mane!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: The 'want it, need it' spell. Works every time. Okay, okay, let's break it up. I think we can all see that there is an important lesson to be learned here about-- Ugh! C'mon, girls, we're all friends here, right? Don't you think you ought to share?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: No way!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: [annoyed groan] Big McIntosh! Thank goodness! You've gotta help me get that doll away from those girls!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Oh, thank you so much. Now if you could just give her to me?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Nnnope.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Oh no!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Give her back!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: What's all the commotion about?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: That incredible, amazing doll!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Gimme!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Nope.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Oh, what have I done?!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Y'all hear that? What in the name of all things oats 'n apples is goin' on here?!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Don't look at it!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Don't look at what?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: My Smarty Pants doll! I enchanted her and now everypony is fighting over her!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Why would you enchant your doll?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Oh, I had to do something! I had nothing to report to Princess Celestia! I thought if I couldn't find a problem, I'd make a problem! The day is almost over!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Not almost!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Twilight Sparkle!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Whoa nelly.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Meet me in the library.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Goodbye, girls. If you care to visit, I'll be in magic kindergarten, back in Canterlot.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Magic kindergarten?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Canterlot?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: We're never gonna see Twilight again!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Uh, what are we gonna do, y'all?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Of all the worst things that could happen, this is THE. WORST. POSSIBLE. THING! What? I really mean it this time!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: But...but... I'm supposed to send you a letter about friendship every week. I missed the deadline. I'm a bad student! I'm... tardy!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: You are a wonderful student, Twilight. I don't have to get a letter every week to know that.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Really?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Wait!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: You can't punish her!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: It wasn't her fault!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: I'm listening.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Please, your Highness. We all saw that Twilight was upset.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: But we thought that the thing she was worrying about wasn't worth worrying about.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: So when she ran off all worked up, not a single one of us tried to stop her.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: As Twilight's good friends, we should have taken her feelings seriously and been there for her!

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Please don't take her away from us just because we were too insensitive to help her.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Looks like you all learned a pretty valuable lesson today.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Very well. I'll forget Twilight's "punishment" on one condition.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: From this day forth, I would like you all to report to me your findings on the magic of friendship when, and only when, you happen to discover them.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Princess Celestia, wait! How did you know I was in trouble?

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Your friend Spike made me aware that you were letting your fears get the best of you. I commend him for taking your feelings seriously. Now, if you will all excuse me, I must return to Canterlot. I'm expecting some mail.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Y'all heard the Princess. Spike, take a letter.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: [clears throat] Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: We're writin' to you because today we all learned a little somethin' about friendship.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: We learned that you should take your friends' worries seriously.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Even if you don't think that she has anything to worry about.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: And that you shouldn't let your worries turn a small problem...

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: ...into an enormously huge entire-town-in-total-chaos Princess-has-to-come-and-save-the-day problem.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: Signed, your loyal subjects.

title: Lesson Zero
dialog: P.S. Obviously Spike did not have to learn a lesson, because he is the best, most awesome friend a pony could ask for. Unlike everypony else, he took things seriously, and- Eheh... uh... yeah... I'll just, um...

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Ugh, come on, Twilight. We're gonna be late for the Nightmare Night festival. Huh? Are you that one kooky grandpa from Ponyville Retirement Village?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: I'm Star Swirl the Bearded! Father of the amniomorphic spell? Did you even read that book I gave you about obscure unicorn history?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Hi, everypony. Great costumes. Happy Nightmare Night, Granny Smith.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: I should have been asleep five hours ago.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Pipsqueak the pirate, at your service. It's my very first Nightmare Night.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Since you moved here from Trottingham?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: No, my very first Nightmare Night ever!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [chicken squawk] Enough chitchat! Time is candy!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Pinkie Pie, aren't you a little old for this?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Too old for free candy? [chicken squawk] Never.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [bell jingles] Do you like it?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Yeah! Great costume, Twilight! You make a fantastic weirdo clown!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: A clown? Look at the borders on these robes. These are hoof-stitched!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: It's a great costume! Huh! Grandpa!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Star Swirl the Bearded is only the most important conjurer of the pre-classical era.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: He created more than two hundred spells! He even has a shelf in the Canterlot library of magic named after him. Maybe I should start up a pony group to teach ponies about history. I bet everypony would love it! Don't you, Spike?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [chewing candy] Mm-hmm! [eating sounds] I love it!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Hey look, we're here already! Should we get something to eat?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Twilight, Twilight! Look at our haul! Ah! Can you believe it? And then, we went to Cheerilee's house, and got a bunch more goodies. Didn't we, Pip?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Sure did!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: And then, we had to stop and wait for Granny Smith, and -<U+0096>

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Rainbow Dash, that wasn't very nice.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Lighten up, old-timer. This is the best night of the year for pranks!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Look what you did to Spike!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: It's all in good fun. Oh! Oh! There's another group over there!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Happy Nightmare Night, Applejack!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Howdy, Spike! Hey, Twilight! Nice costume.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Thanks! I'm a dragon.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: She means me, Spike.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: With that beard, I reckon you're some sorta country music singer.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: While y'all are here, ya' feel like bobbin' for an apple?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Thank you, everypony, and welcome to the Nightmare Night festival!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Spooky voice might work better if she wasn't dressed like that.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Follow me, and very soon, you'll hear the tale of Nightmare Moon.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Listen close, my little dears, I'll tell you where you got your fears of Nightmare Night, so dark and scary. [blows] Of Nightmare Moon, who makes you wary.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Every year, we put on a disguise, to save ourselves from her searching eyes.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: But Nightmare Moon wants just one thing: to gobble up ponies in one quick swing!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Hungrily, she soars the sky. If she sees nopony, she passes by. So if she comes and all is clear, Equestria is safe another year!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Uh, Miss Zecora, if we wear costumes to hide from Nightmare Moon, so she won't gobble us up, how come we still need to give her some of our candy?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: A perfect question, my little friend. For Nightmare Moon you must not offend. [blows] Fill up her belly with a treat or two, so she won't return to come eat you!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [screaming] Everypony! Just dump some candy and get out of here!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [gasp] It's Nightmare Moon! Run!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [awestruck] Princess Luna!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [booming voice] Citizens of Ponyville! We have graced your tiny village with our presence, so that you might behold the real Princess of the Night! A creature of nightmares no longer, but instead a pony who desires your love and admiration! Together we shall change this dreadful celebration into a bright and glorious feast!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Did you hear that, everypony? Nightmare Moon says she's gonna feast on us all!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [normal voice] What? No, children, no! You no longer have reason to fear us! Screams of delight is what your princess desires, not screams of terror! [stomps hoof] Madame Mayor, thy Princess of the Night hath arrived.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: What is the matter with you? Very well, then. Be that way. We won't even bother with the traditional royal farewell.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: I'm gonna go talk to her.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: You can't talk to her! She's Nightmare Moon!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: No, she's not. I saw the Elements of Harmony change her back to good. But it seems like she's having some trouble adjusting after being gone for a thousand years.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Princess Luna? Hi, my name is-

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Star Swirl the Bearded. Commendable costume! Thou even got the bells right.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Thank you! Finally! Somepony who gets my costume! Uh, I just came to welcome you to our celebration! My actual name is-

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Twilight Sparkle. [booming voice] It was thou who unleashed the powers of harmony upon us and took away our dark powers!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: And that was a good thing, right?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [normal voice] But of course. We could not be happier. Is that not clear?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Well, you kinda sound like you're yelling at me.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: But this is the traditional royal Canterlot voice! It is tradition to speak using the royal "we", and to use [booming voice] this much volume when addressing our subjects!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: You know, that might explain why your appearance was met with... mixed results. I think if you just changed your approach a bit, you might be met with a warmer reception.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [booming voice] Change our approach?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Lower the volume?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [normal voice] Ohhh. We have been locked away for a thousand years. We are... not sure we can.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Go away! No candy here! Visitors not welcome on Nightmare Night!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [nervous laughing] Fluttershy, it's me, Twilight!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [nervous laughter] Wait right here.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Fluttershy... you remember Princess Luna?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [booming voice] Charmed.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [timidly] Likewise.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [booming voice] Twilight Sparkle hath spoken of the sweetness of thy voice. We ask thou teachest to us to speak as thou speakest.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [very quiet] Okay.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [booming voice] Shall our lessons begin?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [whisper] Okay.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [booming voice] Shall we mimic thy voice?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [quiet] Okay.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [booming voice] How is this?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [hurriedly] Perfect, lesson over!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: A little quieter, princess.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [booming voice] How is... [loud voice] this?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Better. Right, Fluttershy?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [nervous, dazed laughter] Yes.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [loud voice] How... about... now?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Now you're getting it.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [normal voice] And... how about now?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Yes! Well done.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [booming voice] I thank thee, dear Fluttershy! Our normal speaking voice shall surely win us the hearts of thy fellow villagers.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Fluttershy! You've gotta hide us! Nightmare Moon is here and... [chicken squawk] Ah! She stole Fluttershy's voice so she can't scream when she gobbles her up!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [booming voice] Nay, children, wait! [normal voice] I mean... nay, children, no, wait.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Come on, princess. Time for plan B.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: It is of no use, Twilight Sparkle. They have never liked us and they never shall.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: My friend Applejack is one of the most likable ponies around. I'm sure she'll have some ideas.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Heee...!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Uh... Applejack, the princess is looking for a little advice on how to fit in around here.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: "Fit in"? Really?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: I mean... that's easy! All you gotta do is have the right attitude. Loosen up a bit, be positive, play a few games, have some fun.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Fun? What is this "fun" thou speakest of? Pray tell, what purpose do these serve?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: You can do it, princess!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Ha! Your princess enjoys this "fun"! In what other ways may we experience it?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Fire away, princess!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Ha ha! The fun has been doubled!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Why don't you try bobbin' for apples? We got the best apples in Equestria here, princess.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: I ask that thou call us... me... Luna, fair Applejack. Hear me, villagers! All of you! Call me Luna!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Show me to these bobbing apples.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Hey, gals. Anypony seen Pip? We lost him the last time we had to run<U+0096> [chicken squawk] Aaah! Nightmare Moon is gobbling Pipsqueak! Everypony run!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Help! My backside has been gobbled!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: 'Tis a lie! Thy backside is whole and ungobbled, thou ungrateful whelp! [hoof stomp, thunder] Fair villagers, please do not back away. Let us join together in... fun!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Not enough fun for you? What say you to this?!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Huzzah! How many points do I receive?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Do not run away!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: As your princess, we command you!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [deafening voice] Be still!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Princess, remember! Watch the screaming!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [booming voice] No, Twilight Sparkle! We must use the traditional royal Canterlot voice for what we are about to say. Since you choose to fear your princess rather than love her, and dishonor her with this insulting celebration, we decree that Nightmare Night shall be canceled! Forever!

title: Luna Eclipsed
