dialog: [sigh] Shoot. We had everything goin' our way. Luna was happy, everypony in town was happy, now look at 'em.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: It's not over yet.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: What are you gonna do?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: I'm going to do what I do best. Lecture her!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Princess?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Leave me be, Twilight Sparkle.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Princess, I'm sorry it hasn't worked out how we wanted. But you have to believe me when I tell you that Nightmare Night is one of the most popular celebrations we have.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Yes. I can tell. By all the adoring shrieks of the children as they run away.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Princess...

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: No! No shrieking. No screaming or squealing either. Okay?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [muffled] Okay.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: There's something I want you to see. And I promise that it's safe, but you really, really, really can't shriek. Do you promise not to shriek?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Pinkie Pie, you remember Princess Luna, right?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Ah. The ringleader of the frightened children. Hast thou come to make peace?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Rainbow!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: She's changed, Pinkie! She's not evil or scary anymore! And she definitely doesn't want to gobble you up!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Well, duh.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Huh?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: I know that. Sheesh, Twilight. I'm almost as big as her, how's she gonna gobble me up?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: So why do you keep running away and screaming?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Sometimes it's just really fun to be scared!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Fun? Pinkie Pie, you're a genius!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Princess Luna! I've finally figured out why you're having so much trouble being liked!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [deadpan] Forgive me if I withhold my enthusiasm.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Come with me. I'll explain everything on the way.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Gosh. I never thought my very first Nightmare Night would be my very last.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Come, little Pip. Now don't you fret. Nightmare Night's not over yet. We still have candy left to give, so Nightmare Moon might let us live.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Yes. Come on, little ponies. What's Nightmare Night without the annual candy offering? You don't want Nightmare Moon to gobble you up, do you?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Aw, the rainbow wig just kills it for me.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Come on, kids! Doesn't that sound like fun?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Goodbye, Nightmare Night. Forever.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [booming voice] Citizens of Ponyville! You were wise to bring this candy to me. I am pleased with your offering. So pleased that I may just eat it... instead of eating you!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: [spit] I am not certain that did what you meant for it to do, Twilight Sparkle.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Just wait.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: For what? For... for them to scream some more?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Um... Princess Luna. I know there's not gonna be any more Nightmare Night, but do you suppose maybe you could come back next year and scare us again anyway?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Child. Art thou saying that thou... likest me to scare you?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: It's really fun! Scary, but fun!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: It... is?

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Yeah! Nightmare Night is my favorite night of the year.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Well then. We shall have to bring [booming voice] Nightmare Night back!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Whoa! You're my favorite princess ever! [to foals] She said yes, guys!

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: See? They really do like you, princess.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Can it be true? [thunder, booming voice] Oh, most wonderful of -- [normal voice] I mean... Oh, most wonderful of nights.

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Luna Eclipsed
dialog: When you first sent me to Ponyville, I didn't know anything about friendship. I met somepony tonight who was having the same problem -- your sister, Princess Luna! She taught me that one of the best things you can do with friendship is to give it to others, and help them find it themselves! And I'm happy to report that all of Ponyville has learned that even if somepony seems a little intimidating, even scary, when you offer them your friendship, you'll discover a whole new pony underneath. And even if my Star Swirl the Bearded costume didn't go over, this still turned out to be the best Nightmare Night ever!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Rarity! Rrgh, you ruined the surprise! I was gonna serve you breakfast in bed!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Father! Mother!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I... figured. [sniffs] I didn't know you could burn juice.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Vacation? Is that this week? As in 'starting this very instant' this week?! Uurh. Let me guess: apple sauce?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Nope. Toast! We're gonna have the bestest time two sisters could ever have! I'm gonna go grab my stuff from Dad's wagon.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: So, now, when you say 'a week'... is that, um, seven whole days?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: But I've got such a long to-do list. Oh well, I suppose 'spend time with your sister' will just have to be added to the list.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Just a few necessities.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Now, let's get that kitchen all cleaned up.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Cleaned up? But we haven't even eaten yet.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Well now, Sweetie Belle, I appreciate the gesture, but we simply can't eat this breakfast; it's burnt.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: It's not that burnt.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Never fear, my dear, I'll get a proper breakfast going.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Can I help?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Oh, er, of course, er, in one moment, Sweetie Belle. Let me just get things started.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Rarity! I thought you said I was gonna help!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: You are! You... can... put the garnish on the plates.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: You mean this parsley?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Okay, now, easy! It has to be just right! No need to rush. No! That's too slow. Careful! Back up! Looking for perfection here...

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Whoa, whoa!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Not... bad.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: [gasp] There are some things I must attend to. Can you take the dirty towels to the laundry room?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: No problem, I'll make myself useful!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Sweetie Belle!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I told you I'd make myself useful. Surprised?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Am I? You washed my incredibly expensive one-of-a-kind designer crocheted wool sweater! Do you know how hard these things are to come by?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: What's the big deal?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: The big deal is that in the heat of the sun, wool... shrinks.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Oh. Sorry.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Nng... Well. Back to work. I must create.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Sorry?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Huh. Stay out of trouble, okay? Please?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I just wanted to do something nice for my sister.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Raargh, I'm so bored! When is Rarity gonna finish her work?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: [in Sweetie Belle's mind] Stay out of trouble, okay?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I never got in trouble for drawing. Hmm. This needs something...

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Hi, Rarity! I made a special drawing for y<U+0096>

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: [screams] Oh no! Did you use these gems?!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Well, yes, but I know you'll have more in your work room...

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: But, but these are extremely rare baby blue sapphires! I need them for an outfit for an extremely important client!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Oh. Sorry.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: [sigh] Sweetie Belle, what am I going to do with you?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Oh! We could paint together, we could ride bikes, play chess, sing a song, catch frogs, pillow fight<U+0096>

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: That's not what I meant!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Oh.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Now I have to go and find some more of these gems!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I'll go with you and help!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: No! No thank you. You can help by picking up these papers and stacking them, neatly. Put the pens and pencils back exactly where you found them, and please find something to do that doesn't create a large mess for me to clean up!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Geez Louise, can't I do anything right?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Surprise!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: My- ee- bleh- My inspiration room! What did you do? What did you do?!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: When I saw the big mess in your room, I thought I'd clean it up for you.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: This wasn't a mess! It was organized chaos! I was just about finished planning my new fashion line, and, and you, you, you went and, and you<U+0096> and you put everything away!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: But every time I make a mess, you get upset!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: But this was my mess in my house! And now I have to start from scratch!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: But, I thought it would make you happy!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Happy?! Happy?! I<U+0096> [grinds teeth] I just need some time alone. Hm!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: How's the sleepover at Rarity's goin'?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: [mimicking Rarity] Why, it's smashing!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Huh?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I just wish we could do something special together that didn't include me goofing anything up.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: The Sisterhooves Social! Applejack an' I do it every year! You an' Rarity can compete against other sister teams in all these neat events!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: That sounds like the perfect way for us to hang out! Rarity will think it's an excellent idea.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: What a ridiculous idea. A contest at Sweet Apple Acres? It doesn't sound... very... clean.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: So, what, now you're back to hating messes?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Sweetie Belle, watch your tone! I am still your big sister.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Right! And any sister who cares about her sister goes!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Sweetie Belle...! Honestly! Playing silly little games in the dirt is just... uncouth! With or without a sister.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Well then! Maybe, maybe I'll try the Sisterhooves Social without a sister! In fact, I think I'll try the rest of my life without a sister!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: [gasp] Oh, I'm the one who's ruining your life?! Really?! Have you looked around this place? I'm the one who'd be better off with no sister!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Well it looks like we finally agree on something! Neither of us needs a sister!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Deal!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Deal! Goodbye, un-sister!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Hmph!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: 'Uncouth'? She said the Sisterhooves Social was 'uncouth'?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Yeah! Uncouth? [belch] Wait. What's uncouth?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: It's not just the Social. She thinks I'm uncouth.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Honey, Rarity thinks everything's uncouth.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: [with mouth full] What's uncouth?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: It means uncivil. Y'know, bad mannered?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Exactly. Sweetie Belle, just give Rarity some time. She'll come around. Sisters always do.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Not sisters like Rarity.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Come on, now. Apple Bloom and I got some chores to finish up on. Maybe you can help!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: You sure you want me to help? I just mess everything up!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Oh, come on, that's just stinkin' thinkin'. Watch!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Good catch there, Apple Bloom! Whoo!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: This is a chore?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Since we can't sell the bruised apples, we gotta collect them all for the pigs to eat.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: It's a lot of work, so we make a game of it. Wanna try?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Um, okay. Ow! You're right, it is hard work.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: That's why we do it...

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Huh, Rarity never wants to do chores together.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Ugh, all that work ruined, thanks to Sweetie Belle. Oh my. It's usually a big mess in here. [gasp] Id-ee-a! This is genius! I shall call it 'full spectrum fashions'! If Sweetie Belle hadn't<U+0096> [clears throat] Well, no matter. She still shouldn't have touched my things without permission. Hm!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Apple Bloom! You're up!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: You're... making... grape juice? Rarity would call the fashion police on me if I got grape juice anywhere near her precious outfits.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Well, that's silly!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Apple Bloom...

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Please, Applejack, she didn't mean<U+0096>

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: How d'you like them grapes, y'little whippersnapper!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Now to get these fabrics washed for my fabulous new line. Ooh, my favorite sweater... I just can't believe that Sweetie Belle.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Oh, Opal-wopal! It's as if Sweetie Belle knew the sweater was perfect for you. And Sweetie Belle should consider herself perfectly lucky that this thoughtless mishap turned out all right. Hm.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Apple Bloom!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Got it, sis!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Wow. It's as if they were just one pony.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Way to corral some critters, sis!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Rarity never high-hoofs me.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Perfect! Just one more, and this ensemble is fini! Rrgh, Sweetie Belle! Where's her silly little arts and crafts project?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Oh, Sweetie Belle! My one and only sister! What have I done? All the time I could have spent with you was wasted complaining and wishing you were gone! [crying dramatically] Woe is me! No! I must get her back! I must! As Celestia is my witness, I shall never be sisterless again!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: [gasp] Sweetie Belle! Oh, I have been galloping all over looking for you. I<U+0096>

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Oh hello, un-sister. What are you doing here? Better be careful, you might get some dust on you.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Oh, Sweetie Belle, I want to apologize. I am not better off without a sister.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I'm not better off without a sister either. Spending the day with Applejack and Apple Bloom made me realize that.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Oh, Sweetie, you don't know how happy I am to hear<U+0096>

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: And that's why I'm adopting Applejack as my big sister!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: What?!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: What?!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: What?!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: A sister is someone who loves and takes care of another sister. Applejack's a real sister.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: H-Hold on, Sweetie Belle. Don't get ahead of yourself here.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Besides, she's my big sister!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Yeah, um<U+0096>

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: [to Rarity] Or maybe she should be your sister, so she could teach you what a good sister is supposed to be!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Heh, um, actually, I<U+0096>

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: But I don't need lessons on being a good sister, I-I promise! Listen! I'll show you how to cook my favorite quiche! Or, or, I'll show you the proper way to beautify your mane. Won't that be fun? Hm?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Hm! You want me to go home with you, so we can do what you wanna do?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Uh... yes?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Just forget it!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: We're still sisters, right?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Well, that apology went swimmingly. Applejack, why do you have to be so good and make me look so bad?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: [chuckles] Oh Rarity, once again you're thinkin' about yourself. Bein' sisters is a give and take. You've been doin' a whole lotta takin', but you haven't been doin' a whole lotta givin'.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: But of course I give. I give lessons. Reasonable demands.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: But ya never give in. Bein' sisters is like... apple pie. You can have amazin' apples, and you can have a wonderfully crispy crust, but only together you can have a perfect apple pie.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: But apart, all we are is just a pile of mush and some crumbly dry mess... [gasp] I know what I need to do! I just hope it isn't too late!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Well, I guess it's a good thing Rarity isn't here. Do I see 'uncouth' written all over this contest?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Look at the size of that pig!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: He sure is a cutie.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: That's the last word Rarity would use. [mimicking Rarity] Oh my, what a repulsive monstrosity! This thing needs a head to toe makeover!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: It's almost time!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Well, you two have fun. Sure wish I had a sister to run the race with. Huh?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: You do now!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: AB and I figured since we do this every year...

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I'd let you borrow my sis so you can give it a try!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Sister for a day.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: No way!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: One. Day. One. Day.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Is this thing on? [to Big McIntosh] I don't think this thing is on. [to the megaphone] Hello! [Big McIntosh whispers into her ear] What is the- e- oh. You have to say so. Confangled modern doohickeys. Now, the event you've all been waiting fer! The Sister Soci- The Socialhooves- Oh, dabnabbit, you know, the big race! We have five teams this year fer the event! So y'all head on up to the finish line, y'hear? [Big McIntosh whispers into her ear] [to Big McIntosh] Eh? [to the megaphone] The start line! [to Big McIntosh] That's what I said.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: That's us.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: One. Day. Good luck!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: And may the best sisters win! On your marks... get set... Gooooo!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: You okay, Applejack?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Applejack, help!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: You can do it, sister!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Ooh, so close! You almost won!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Thank you, Applejack! You were amazing! I don't even care that we didn't win. This was so much fun! Huh? Rarity?! Wait, where's Applejack?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I don't get it.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: [chuckles] We switched places over at the very first mudhole.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: So, we did the whole competition... together?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: That we did, little sister. Well, except for the start line.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: But you finished together!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: You mean... you were all in on it?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: You did this for me?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Us. I did it for us. You see? We are apple pie!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Huh?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Uh, I'll explain later. For now, I think we deserve a celebration!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Where?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: The spa, of course.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Oh, Rarity.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: No, I-I-I'm serious.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Very well then, what should we write to the Princess?

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I'll start. Having a sister is just about the bestest thing in the world. But it sure isn't the easiest.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: I agree that being sisters is a wonderful thing, but it takes teamwork. Sometimes it's about compromising. Sometimes it's about accepting each others' differences. But mostly, it's about having fun together. Even if it means getting your hooves a little bit dirty.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: A lot dirty.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: A little bit dirty.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: A lot dirty.

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: A little bit dirty!

title: Sisterhooves Social
dialog: Hold it, hold it! How about "a medium amount of dirty, not too little, not too much, just right"?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Today's the day, Cutie Mark Crusaders! I can just feel it! Today's the day we are all gonna get our cutie marks in... bowlin'!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Whoo-hoo!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: [muffled] Whooo! [spits out bag] I mean, yaay!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Why, after today, we won't even be the Cutie Mark Crusaders anymore! We'll be the... the Three Strikes!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: That makes us sound like we've struck out.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Mmm. How 'bout the Pin Twins?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: But there are three of us.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Okay then... Um... the Bowlin' Dolls!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: The Bowling Dolls! That's it!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Perfect!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: All righty then! Let's bowl 'em over!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Phpoo!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I did it! I did it! Blank?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: But... but... what about my ball?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: That bowling sure was fun, even if all I got was gutter balls.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yeah, at least you were able to keep your ball in your lane. I don't think Mr. Kingpin is ever gonna let me play again! Hey, maybe I could get my cutie mark in demolition!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Aw, come on, Apple Bloom.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I know just what you need to put the bloom back on your apple.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: A treat from Sugarcube Corner will cheer you up.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: No, it won't.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: A party will cheer you up!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: No, it won't.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: A lovely new chapeau will cheer you up.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: No, it won't.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Come on, Apple Bloom, it's just a cutie mark!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Or lack of a cutie mark!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Shh! That's not helping! Apple Bloom! Where are you going?! Apple Bloom, come back!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Whoa! Ah! Ooh! Ow! Nnnn...

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Well, who is it that we have here? Why, it's Apple Bloom, my dear!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Ow...

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: What has happened to you, youth? Ah, you've gone and chipped your tooth. Come with me, I have just the trick that will fix you up quite quick.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: [with a lisp] I've tried everything, Zecora, and still no cutie mark! Well, I'm gonna be as old as Granny Smith and still have a blank flank!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Your frustration is well understood, but one must be patient for all things good.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: [with a lisp] Ugh, I've heard that from every pony I know! And now from every zebra I know! I'm just too impatient to be patient. I just want my cutie mark and I want it now!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: For your cutie mark, you will have to wait. We must fix that tooth before it's too late. Now drink down every little drop, and this mixture will mend that chip on top!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: [glug, glug] Oh my star apples, you did it, Zecora! Golly, you have tonics that heal all sorts of ailments. Bad bones, bad back, bad breath...

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yes little one, it is true, I have many a healing brew.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: And not only stuff that fixes the bad, but stuff that brings the good! Good health, good hair... good heavens! Hmm... I bet you can mix up a brew to fix... anything.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: There are many mixtures in this room, but none for what you want, dear Apple Bloom. A magic potion does not hold the key. For a cutie mark, time is the only remedy.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Fine. Whatcha got goin' on there?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I am brewing up another mix for a rooster and his chicks. [muffled] It seems the rooster has lost his crow, [normal] making mornings very slow.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Hey, I've seen that flower bloomin' in Ponyville! What is it?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: It is one we call 'Heart's Desire'. A dash will ignite the rooster's fire. With Heart's Desire, his talent comes into view, and he'll give a mighty cock-a-doodle-doo!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Zowie! Heart's Desire, huh?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Ay me, but what is this? I have run out of amethyst. I must go get this purple flower for my brew to have full power!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yeah, you go, you go.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I'm so hungry.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yeah, I can't wai--

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Um, Apple Bloom... what is it?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yeah! Is it an 'o'? Is your talent spelling?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Or is it a ring? Are you a jewelry maker?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: No, it's a loop-de-hoop!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: [gasp] A what now?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: A loop-de-hoop! 'Least, that's what I always called it. Applejack made it for me from an old rain barrel when I was littler! Who woulda thought that loop-de-hoop would end up bein' my special talent?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Wow, Apple Bloom, that's amazing!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: That's it? That's your talent?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Spinning a hoop around your waist? Puh-lease.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Oh, you ain't seen nothin' yet.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Apple Bloom, you're super-duper-loop-de-hooper!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Thanks, everypony!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: All right, my little ponies, time for class!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Apple Bloom?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yes, Miss Cheerilee?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I want you to take your loop-de-hoop into the yard... and give us all a lesson in your amazing loop-de-hooping!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Don't worry, gals. Keep at it and you might get to be half as good as me!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Great job, girls!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: You're too kind, Apple Bloom.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yeah, we stink.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Nah, you just need a little practice. Soon you'll be able to... hoop and bop! Hoop and hop! [muffled] Hoop and skip! [normal] And hoop and flip!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: [laughs] Show us some more, Apple Bloom.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Well, all right, just a few more tricks. But be warned! These are advanced moves, not for beginners. Got that, Diamond Tiara?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I call this one the hoop-la! [makes helicopter noises] Huh? Oof!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Another cutie mark? Hah! I guess that last trick was a lot of hoopla. Those cutie marks are fake!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: What? No they're not!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Miss Cheerilee, have you ever heard of a pony with two cutie marks?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I must say that I never have, but maybe Apple Bloom has two special talents!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Oh yeah? Then let's see you do that!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Spin plates!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yeah!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Two cutie marks?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Two talents?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Aw yeah!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Our friend is the most...

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Alright, everypony, You ready for a real show?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yee-haw, little sis! Congratulations on gettin' not just one, but two cutie marks! We're mighty proud of you, right, Big McIntosh?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Eeyup.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I've never seen anythin' like it. Have you, Big Mac?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Nnnope.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Why, the way you were a-hoopin' and a-hoppin' and kickin' and spinnin' reminded me of when I was a spry young filly. Guh, charley horse, charley horse! Ooh, that's better.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Why, Apple Bloom, I think you're ready to hit the rodeo circuit right now!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Actually, I'm ready to hit the hay right now. I'm plum tuckered. I'll see y'all in the mornin'. Night!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Night! Oh my, little Apple Bloom has finally blossomed, hasn't she, Big Mac?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Eeyup!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: [grunting] What in tarnation is that? Apple Bloom, what is all that awful... tapping? [gasp] Three cutie marks?!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Help me!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Help me!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: C'mere, you! Ow! Ow! Whoa!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I'm sorry, Applejack! I dunno how to make it stop!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Well, I know somepony who might!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Three cutie marks. Three talents. I've never seen anything like it! I was just reading something about unusual equine illnesses. What was it?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: "Perplexing Pony Plagues", perhaps?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yes, Spike, you're amazing!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yes, well, I do have some talents.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Hay fever... the trots... [gasp] Cutie pox!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Cutie pox. This puzzling pony plague afflicted a population of ponies back in the Paleopony Period!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Heh, say that ten times fast!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Random cutie marks appeared all over the ponies' bodies, causing them to perform all the talents that came with them!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Just like me!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yes, but what's the cure? What's the cure?!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: It says here there's no known cure!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: The cause of the breakout was never discovered, and the cutie pox disappears as mysteriously as they arrived!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Oh, no! Sacr<e9> bleu! Plus de marques de cutie! [gasp] Qu'est-ce c'est?! Je parle Fran<e7>ais?!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: My sister's speakin' in fancy!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: She needs help!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I know she needs help! We can't just wait for this to go away! We gotta find somepony to mix up a cure! And fast!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Tout de suite!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Not some pony... some zebra!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Zecora!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Hurry, hurry!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: D<e9>p<ea>chez-vous!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: No, she's not.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: She just has some weird mysterious disease with no known cure called cutie pox.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I thought I had removed their fear the last time that I visited here. But doors are barred and shutters shut. Guess I should've stayed inside my hut.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Zecora! Apple Bloom has cutie pox! We were just on our way to see if you had a cure!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: But magically you're here! Was your zebra sense a-tinglin'?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: My 'zebra sense' did not bring me round, it was a special flower that I needed found. I thought I picked enough to fix all the potions I had to mix, but after my visit from Apple Bloom, some had mysteriously left my room. Apple Bloom! What do you say? Did this flower just walk away?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I, um...

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: A cutie pox cure I have forsooth, for healing power is in the Seeds of Truth.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Well, well then give 'em to her! Quick!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: These seeds must be planted in the ground. With the truth, they'll grow, and the cure is found.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Come again?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: The Seeds of Truth do hold the cure, but one must speak words, true and pure.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Well then let's get to it! Alright, they're planted, now somepony tell the truth!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Somepony! Anypony!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yesterday I told Mrs. Cake that I ate two corn cakes, but I really ate three! Okay, six! I ate six corn cakes! [cries] Make it stop! Oh, make it stop!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Wah, I can't stand it any more! It's me! I admit it! I didn't earn my cutie mark! They're all fake! I figured the Heart's Desire would help me get what I wanted most! So when Zecora left her hut, I mixed up a special potion and put the rest of the Heart's Desire in it!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: [chomps, chews and swallows] Ahh.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Apple Bloom!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Are you okay?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I'm great, and I've never been happier to be a blank flank. But I'm awful sorry I lied, 'specially to you gals. I was so desperate for my cutie mark, I just got carried away. And I'm really sorry I snuck those flowers from you, Zecora. Why, I wouldn't blame you if you never wanted me to come by again.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Now, Apple Bloom, do not be silly. You are always welcome, my little filly. With each mistake you learn something new, growing up into a better you.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Apple Bloom, would you mind writing to Princess Celestia and telling her what you've learned?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I'd be happy to, Twilight! Spike?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Ready!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Waiting for what your heart desires can be really hard. So, you may try to take a shortcut. But this dishonesty never works, because you didn't earn what your heart desired. The only cure is being honest with yourself and others. And that's something every heart desires.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: I sure am proud of you, sis. Seems like you finally learned the importance of patience.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yup! All good things come to those who wait. Well! I've waited long enough.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Actually, that was way too long.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: What?!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: So what are we gonna do today to earn our cutie marks?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Well, I was thinking, for a pony who's never mixed up a potion before, you sure stirred up something fierce.

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yeah! So what if your talent is potion making?

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Oh my gosh, totally! Let's go talk to Zecora, now!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Yeah!

title: The Cutie Pox
dialog: Woo-hoo!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Ha-ha! Whoo-hoo! Yeah! [laughs] Whoa!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Winona? I mean... Winona's head?! Um, is this weird, or is it just me? Angel? Gummy?! Okay, this is officially beyond weird now and right on down to freaky town.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: [gasp] Yaaaaah!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Whaa!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Phew.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Let's get this thing started!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Sincerest apologies, Rainbow, if our pets were bothering you.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Say you're sorry, Opal.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: She's... sorry.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: What are you all doing out here?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Why, we always round up our critters for a regular ol' Pony Pet Playdate in this park.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Uh, you do?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Same time every week.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: I thought you knew. You didn't know? She didn't know?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Well, we had initially planned on inviting Rainbow, of course, except<U+0096>

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: We were totally gonna invite you, Rainbow, then Twilight remembered that you don't even have a pet, and Rarity remembered that you really like to take naps in the afternoon, so Applejack figured you wouldn't be missing out on anything anyway, and Fluttershy and I nodded our heads in agreement like this.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Oh, please don't be mad at us.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Oh, I'm not mad. You all are right. Not much point of a Pony Pet Playdate for me if I'm a pony without a pet, right?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Eeexactly. So, if'n you'll excuse us...

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Hey, now wait a minute! Just because I don't have a pet now doesn't mean I never want a pet!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Ohh! Y, y, Oh, really? You really want a pet? Really? 'Cause I've got so many wonderful choices at my house! Oh, and I know you'll just love them! And they'll love you! Oh, and you'll be best friends forever and ever! Oh!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Now, Rainbow, my dear, I cannot express my delight It's abundantly clear That somewhere out here Is the pet that will suit you just right

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: I can't wait to get started, but first let me set a few rules It's of utmost importance The pet that I get Is something that's awesome and cool

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Awesome, cool, got it! I have so many wonderful choices, just wait, you will see

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: I need something real fast like a bullet to keep up with me

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Sure! How 'bout a bunny? They're cutesy and wootsie and quick as can be

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Cutesy? Wootsie? Have you even met me?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Rainbow, have faith You see, I will bet you Somewhere in here is the pet that will get you

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Come on, the sky's the limit!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Sky is good. I'd like it to fly.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Really? Because I think this widdle puddy tat has your name written all over it. Yes, he does. Aww, look, he likes you!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Pass.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: I have so many wonderful choices for you to decide There are otters and seals With massive appeal

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Otters and seals do not fly.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Maybe not, but I've seen this particular seal catch ten feet of air when he breaches the water!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: That's it. I'm outta here.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Wait! There must be a pet here That will fit the ticket How 'bout a ladybug, or a cute cricket?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Bigger. And cooler.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Bigger, cooler. Right.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: It's just a squirrel.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Not just any squirrel. A flying squirrel!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: ...Yeah. So, like I was saying...

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: I'm sensing you want an animal that can fly.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Ya think?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: I have plenty of wonderful creatures who soar in the sky Like a sweet hummingbird or a giant monarch butterfly

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Better, but cooler.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: I see. How 'bout an owl, or a wasp, or a toucan? There's so many wonderful creatures the likes of that There are falcons and eagles They are both quite regal Or perhaps what you need is a dark and mysterious bat?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Now you're talking! But instead of just one standout, now that's too many.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Not a bad problem to have, if you ask me.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: The bat would be awesome, but the wasp I'm digging too Do you have something in a yellow striped bat?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: No.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: What to do, what to do? [gasp] A prize! That's it! There's really just one way To find out which animal's best Hold a contest of speed, agility, and guts That will put each pet to the test

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Don't forget style, that should be considered

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Then we'll know for sure who's best of the litter

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: The one who is awesome as cool

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Just like me Can't settle for less, 'cause I'm the best

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Who's the number one, greatest, perfectest pet

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: May the games

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: And may the best pet win!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: [blows whistle] Shh! [to assembled animals] So! You all think you've got what it takes to be my pet, do ya? Well, we'll just see about that! If any of you don't think you can handle it, bow out now before you humiliate yourself in front of your peers. This competition isn't for the weak. You'd better be prepared to step up your game! You call that flapping?! That's better. There's only room on Team Dash for one of you, and my future pet needs to be able to take it to the extreme! Any questions?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: I got one. Does she understand what a pet really needs?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Yeah, like care and attention, love and affection<U+0096> Ugh! And breath mints!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Now, you just pay attention, and try your best, and<U+0096>

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Seriously, Fluttershy! The turtle? What did you bring that thing here for?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Technically he's a tortoise, and he's always dreamed of being somepony's pet. He just wants a chance to compete, he won't get in the way. You won't even know he's here.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: No.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Oh, just let him try.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Ugh, but there's no way he can possibly keep up. Look at him!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: It won't hurt to let him try.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Just let him try?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Grrgh, ugh, fine! But don't say I didn't warn you! This isn't a game, you know! Alright, now these games will determine which one of you has the most important qualities I'm looking for in a pet. Speed. Agility. Guts. Style. Coolness. Awesomeness. And radicalness.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Aren't those all the same thing?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: You would think that, Twilight. And that's why you would never qualify to be my pet.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Speed! On your marks...

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Get set... [blows whistle] Sorta speedy... not speedy... pretty speedy... could be more speedy...

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Yeah! That's speed!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: [to the tortoise] Tsk-tsk. That's just sad.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Agility! Sorta agile... not agile... pretty agile... could be more agile... [to the tortoise] Wanna know the opposite of agility? That.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Yeah, baby, now that's what I call agility! [sing-song voice] Don't leave me hangin'! I'm gonna have to shave a point off your score for that.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Okay! Which of you has the guts to try and get Opal's favorite toy away from her?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Now that takes guts!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Style! Any pet of mine's gotta look good, 'cause you gotta make me look good!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Coolness!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Sorta cool.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Not cool.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Pretty cool.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Could be cooler.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Not what I had in mind. I can't hear you!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Eugh.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Now that's a cool sound!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: [to bat] Sorta awesome. [to toucan] Not awesome. [to flamingo] Could be more awesome. [to owl] Ho ho ho, yeah, that is awesome! [to tortoise] Uh, you did that already. That's pretty much all you can do, huh?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Whoa! That was truly awesome! But I'm afraid this is the radicalness competition, so I'm gonna have to take some points off.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: [sigh] Listen, turtle...

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Tortoise.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Whatever! You've had your fun, but I think you and I both know who made the cut and who didn't.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: You didn't.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: I mean... 'A' for effort and everything, you gave it your best shot, maybe I've got a gold star sticker around here somewhere you can have, but, seriously, go home. You're starting to creep me out. So, anyway, you're all outstanding competitors, but there can only be one of you who's number one. So the final tie-breaking contest is going to be... pause for dramatic effect... a race against... me! Through Ghastly Gorge! Dun dun dun!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Gesundheit.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Actually, Ghastly Gorge isn't scary. It's fun. Heh. I've flown through it a million times myself, so obviously I'll be at the front of the pack. But whichever of you make it across the finish line with me will have proven you can keep up with me, and will have earned the honor and glory of getting to be my pet! Ready? Setgo!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Woo-hoo! Haha! Try to keep up!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Can't catch me, ha-ha!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: C'mon, slowpokes! You wanna win, don't ya?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Oh! I forgot to tell you! Watch out for the Quarray eels! They don't like it when you get too close to their nests, like this. Whoa.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Easy, peasy, one-two-threesy! Right, guys?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: AVALANCHE! Hey! Whoaaaa!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: C'mon... No! Wait! Come back! Don't leave me! I'm the one who's supposed to win! I don't wanna end up stuck here... forever! Oh no, nonono, th-this can't be happening. Forever is way too long to be trapped in Ghastly Gorge. I mean, it's like, forever! Somepony! Anypony! Help me!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Wahoo! My prayers have been answered! Oh, thankyouthankyoutha<U+0096> You?! Oh no! Now I'm not only going to be stuck here forever, I'm gonna be stuck here forever with the most annoying turtle in the world! Gyh, I'm doomed. DOOMED, I tell you!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Hm, something's not right here.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Where's Rainbow Dash?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Great galloping galoshes! There's been an avalanche in there!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Rainbow!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Wait! Look!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: It's the turtle!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Oh, whatever...

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: And he's carrying something on his back...

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Ahh! It's Rainbow Dash! It's her! It's Rainbow!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Maybe we'd better go meet him halfway.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Huh. Way to go, little guy!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Oh, thank goodness you're not hurt, Rainbow!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Just my pride.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: It sure was, if'n it means Rainbow gets to have her own little critter just like the rest of us from now on.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Uh... thanks. What you did... I owe you one.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Rainbow! Your new pet is over here waiting for you!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Oh... Right... Yeah... That.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: What's the matter?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: You got your perfect pet, right?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: The best of the best like you wanted, remember? It can fly and it's not a squirrel! Should we sing about it again?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: A falcon sure looks good on ya, Rainbow.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Yay?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: But I said whoever crosses the finish line with me gets to be my pet.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: You did! You did say that! She did say that, that was the rule!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: And the only racer who crossed the finish line with me was the one who stopped to save me when I needed help. The tortoise!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: But what about the<U+0096>

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Wouldja look at that? He even smiles slow.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Spike, take a letter. Dear Princess Celestia,

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: I used to think that the most important traits to look for in a pet, or any best friend, were all physical competitive abilities. But now I can see how short-sighted and shallow that was.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Today I learned what the most important quality really is. A certain kind of spirit. A stick-to-it-ive-ness. A never give up, can-do attitude that's the mark of a real winner. And this tortoise has it.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Tenacity.

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Gesundheit. You just can't stop that little guy. He's like a... like a... Tank!

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: But Rainbow! You didn't want a pet that couldn't fly because it would keep you grounded and hold you back, remember?

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Hmm...

title: May the Best Pet Win!
dialog: Heh. C'mon, Tank! We're gonna be late for our very first Pony Pet Playdate!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Attention, everypony! Attention! The official Rainbow Dash Fan Club will come to order. Let's get right down to our first order of business. I motion that Rainbow Dash be declared the most awesome pony in Ponyville.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I second the motion, and might I add that if you looked up the word 'awesome' in the dictionary, there would be a picture of Rainbow Dash.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I object!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I think the word 'awesome' is played out! Rainbow Dash deserves better! I motion that we declare her the most stupendous pony!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: 'Stupendous'? Is that the best you've got? I motion that we declare her... wonderiffic!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Astonishing!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Breathtaking!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Astounding!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Bedazzling!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: What about super-ultra-extreme-awesomazing?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: All in favor of declaring Rainbow Dash the most 'super-ultra-extra-uh-whatever you said' pony in all of Ponyville, say 'aye'!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: [sigh] What a beautiful day. There's nothing like a dip in the clouds to make a Pegasus feel super relaxed.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Looks like my sky swim will have to wait! I'm Rainbow Dash, and I'm here to rescue you!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Wow. What's with this crowd? Uh, thanks, everypony. It was really no big deal.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: That Rainbow Dash sure is something.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: [gasps] Oh no! There's something wrong with the baby!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: She's not cheering for everypony's favorite hero, Rainbow Dash!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: There just aren't enough words in the dictionary to describe Rainbow Dash's awesomeness.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I can think of a few new words.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: And I bet 'modest' is not one of them.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: No, but she is kinda awesome.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Never fear, your friendly neighborhood Rainbow Dash is here!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I can't hear you!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Call me silly, but I think this whole hero thing might be going to Rainbow Dash's head.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: You may be right...silly.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: And then I zoomed into the well. I knew it would be dark and dangerous, but I didn't let that stop me. Danger's my middle name. Rainbow 'Danger' Dash. Thinking back on it, I acted pretty awesomely heroic that day.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: That day.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Awesomely heroic that day and awesomely arrogant ever since.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Hey, Applejack. How'd you like to be immortalized as my friend?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Immorta-what?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Are you taking notes?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Yup! I've been hoof-picked by Rainbow Dash herself, to write her autobiography!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Umm, autobiographies are supposed to be written by the pony they are about.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Maybe for your normal, run-of-the-mill ponies. But I'm far too busy saving lives to stop and write. That's why I hired Spike as my ghost writer.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: [yelps] Spike's a ghost!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: ...Anyway. Spike here writes down everything I say. Don't you, Spike?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Don't... you... Spike. Got it!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: This way, I can stay focused on performing those acts of bravery that nopony else has the guts to perform. Yep, it takes guts. But it also takes brains. And sometimes a big lunch and a nap. Being a hero is surely not for everypony, but I'm up to the challenge.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: [grunts] There you go.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Aim high, kid, but don't aim for the impossible.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Uh, don't you think you should go and help?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: [muffled] Yeah, yeah. I've got a good ten seconds to spare. Just a couple more.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: The tension is unbearable. Will Rainbow Dash make it on time?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: That's right! Ponyville has a new hero. A mysterious mare that has done well by our fair city today. I dub this new masked hero 'The Mysterious Mare Do Well'!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Mare Do Well, huh? Well that mare would do well to stay outta my way! Ponyville's only got room for one hero, and that hero is me!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: [clears throat] Never fear, your friendly neighborhood Rainbow<U+0096>

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Ugh, fine! Picky, picky. Whoaaaa! Aah!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I can't believe it. Mare Do Well is stronger than me? Well, a hero is more than just muscle, and she's gonna learn that the hard way.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Huh? Never fear, your friendly neighbor<U+0096> Whoa!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Never fear<U+0096> Uh! I'm coming! Hold on! Whoa!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Here ya go, safe and sound.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Well, Mare Do Well, or should I call you Mare Do Slow? You're gonna have to pick up the pace if you wanna compete with me, 'cause I move like lightning.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: [growls] Okay. She's strong, fast, and somehow knows what's gonna happen ahead of time. I've gotta step up my game.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: [gasps] If the dam breaks, the whole town will be flooded! Looks like Ponyville needs a hero! Easy peasy.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: My game is officially back on. If only somepony were here to pat me on the back. Eh, guess I'll have do it myself<U+0096> [yelps] [screams] Help! [spits] Help! You?! I suppose you want me to thank<U+0096> You gotta be kidding me...

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Lemme get this straight. She's strong, she's agile, and she's magic? Ughhh! How do I compete with that? Wait a minute. I do have a leg up on her. And that leg is... wings! Hah! Take that, Mare Do Well!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Oh, for the love of Pete.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Gotta hand it to the girl, that Mare Do Well sure can pull off some pretty heroic feats.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I must say, I was impressed by that spell she used to fix the dam. Seems like something like that would take quite a bit of study.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: She really cares about everypony's safety.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Have you seen her costume? It is to die for! If you ask me she's a hero of fashion.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: And she's modest and humble. She lets her actions speak for themselves. Gotta admire that.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I don't have to admire that! I don't think she's all that great!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: She's... great.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I didn't say that.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Sounds like somepony's jealous.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Who, me?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Rainbow Dash is jealous.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Don't write that, Spike!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Correction: Rainbow Dash is very jealous.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Fine! Laugh all you want, but I'll be the one laughing when I prove to you all that I'm just as good<U+0096> no, that I'm a better hero than Mare Do Well!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Huh, no sign of trouble here. Darn it.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Buses and baby carriages are always careening down this hill. Where is an out-of-control vehicle when you need one?!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Rrgh, there are absolutely no freak natural disasters going on anywhere! How am I supposed to prove myself when everything's so normal and safe? [gasps] Hold it right there, Granny Smith! You don't have to pretend with me. I can see that you're in way over your head here.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Eh, what's that?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: You're putting on a brave face, I get it. But you don't have to anymore. I'll help you cross the street!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: [grunting] Actually, I can cross the street just fine!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Don't worry! You're in extremely... capable... hooves!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: [panicked grunts] Back off!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: [pants] Here we are! Safe and sound. A good and heroic citizen deserves a little recognition, don't you think?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: [gasps] Somepony's in trouble!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: You'd better let me handle this, ma'am! For your own safety, I must ask you to stand back!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Ta-da!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: How would you describe what I just did? Would you say I was amazing?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Please, just answer the question! Was I, or was I not, amazing?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Oh, look!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Another great feat of heroism! I have just saved that grass!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: From weeds! Weeds that were attempting to eat this lawn!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Aww, who am I kidding?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: All anypony talks about is Mare Do Well this and Mare Do Well that! What about me? How could everypony forget about me so easily? I mean... have I changed? Same sleek body. Same flowing mane. Same spectacular hooves. Nope, I'm still awesome. They're wrong. But... then... why am I all alone? I hate being all alone.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Hey, Rainbow Dash!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I knew it! No need to apologize, squirt. Anypony could make that mistake.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Mistake? What mistake?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Wait a minute. Why are you here?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: To invite you to join us! We're heading off to the thank you parade for Ponyville's greatest hero, Mare Do Well.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: No! No way! Can't you see I-I wanna be alone? I love being alone.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Oh, okay. See you later then.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Yeah, right, like I'm gonna thank her. [mockingly] Thank you, Mare Do Well, whoever you are, for ruining e<U+0096> [normal] Hey, squirt! Wait up!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Welcome to Ponyville's first, but surely not last, thank you parade, in honor of our city's greatest hero, the mysterious Mare Do Well!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: The mysterious Mare Do Well, huh?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: So what are you hiding? Let's see how mysterious you are without that mask!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: What the hay?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Grrr... I got you now! Alright, Miss Mysterious! Mystery... solved! [yelps] P-p-p-p- Pinkie?! Whudda- hud-d-duh- hud-d-duh- huh?! Twilight?! Applejack?! There were three of you?!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Yup, we all played Mare Do Well at different times.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I stopped the carriage bus with these babies, Bucky McGillicuddy and Kicks McGee.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: It's alright.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: And I used my magic to fix the dam.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Ooh, ooh! And I did the flyby afterwards.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I made the costumes. Fabulous if I do say so myself!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I don't understand. Why? Don't you want me to be a hero?

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Of course we want you to be a hero.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: But a real hero doesn't brag.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Uh, I guess I did start to brag a little.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Okay, a lot.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Celebrating your accomplishments is natural. But...

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: ...Rubbin' them in everypony's face is not.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: I think we're getting off topic here.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: What we're trying to say is, it's great to be really good at something, but it's important to act with grace and humility.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Ohhhh. That makes loads more sense. Yeah. You're right. And I guess I should've also acted with grace and humility when others outshine me. Like Mare Do Well.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Sounds like you've got a letter to write to Princess Celestia.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Already got it covered. As your ghost writer, I've already penned a letter to the Princess.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: That's nice of you, Spike, but I really wanna write this letter myself.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Aww, come on, I wrote the whole thing already!

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Okay, let's hear it.

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: [clears throat] Dear Princess Cel-

title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
dialog: Look out! It's a real ghost!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: [gasp] Here? I get to stay here?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Twilight Sparkle said you were coming to Canterlot for a visit, and asked if I might accommodate you.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Thank you so much, Princess.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: You're very welcome.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: No, really. This is so nice of you.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: It's nothing, really.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: You are very we<U+0096>

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Thank you!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I'll leave you to get settled.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Enjoy your stay.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Thank you!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: That's perfect.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Oh, this old thing? Oh, it's just something I<U+0096>

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Oh, yes, of course... how are you?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Well, yeah, yes, but<U+0096>

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: "Looked a little country". "Not something you can get in Canterlot". I'll show you something worthy of Canterlot!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: [panting] I have to get started right away. This new design is very ambitious, and I've already written to Twilight to let her know she'll have something beyond fabulous to wear to her party. [gasps] Fancy Pants!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I say, that's one way to make an introduction.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Oh, goodness, I am so sorry. I didn't see you there. I've just got so many bags and I was trying to get back to my suite at the castle and<U+0096>

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: You're staying at the castle?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Wh<U+0096> The Princess invited me to stay in one of the suites.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: You know the Princess?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Oh, it's for an ensemble I'm making for a friend. Her birthday is in a few days. [pants] Again, I am really sorry I bumped into you.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I'm not! Heheh, you are obviously somepony worth bumping into! Listen, I have a VIP box reserved at the Wonderbolts Derby this afternoon. Would you, would you be so kind as to join me and a few of my companions there?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Me?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: But of course, my dear.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Well, I'm, uh, ah- no- sure.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: We'd love to see you there, uh...?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Rarity.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Rarity.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Pardon me. 'Scuse me, 'scuse me!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Rarity, jolly good to see you! So glad you could make it.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Everypony, this is Rarity. She's staying at Canterlot Castle.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I'll be rooting for Rapidfire, of course. He's sure to take home the grand prize.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I don't think he has a chance against Fleetfoot.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Bravo, Rarity! I say, how did you know Fleetfoot would be victorious?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: My friend Rainbow Dash talks about her all the time. She says what Fleetfoot lacks in size, she makes up for in speed.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Uh... [gulps] Why... she's... she's the... the Wonderbolts' trainer, of course.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Staying at Canterlot Castle, and she knows the Pegasus training the Wonderbolts. I told you all this was an important pony.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Three cheers for Rarity, my new favorite party guest!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: ...And then I said, "Puh-lease, that isn't a hat, darling, that's a natural disaster that somehow landed atop your head!"

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Oh, I'd love to, but I<U+0096>

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Well, that sounds wonderful, but I<U+0096>

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I'm flattered, really. It's just I have a project I really need to get started on, and-

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: ...of course I'll be there.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Looks like we'll be spending a few more days here, Opalescence. Turns out bumping into Fancy Pants like that was the best thing that's ever happened to me. Of course, finishing Twilight's dress in time for her birthday party is still my top priority, but I can't possibly disappoint the Canterlot elite by rejecting their invitations now, can I?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I'll be the toast of the town, the girl on the go I'm the type of pony every pony, every pony should know I'll be the one to watch, the girl in the flow I'm the type of pony every pony, every pony should know

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Oh, I hope I haven't forgotten anything.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: We'd better get going.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I must get back to Ponyville with enough time to finish Twilight's ensemble.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: For me? Dearest Rarity, your presence is requested at the Canterlot garden party tomorrow afternoon. Yours, Jet Set and Upper Crust! [gasps] The Canterlot garden party! Why, next to the Galloping Gala that is the premier event in Canterlot! [squeals] Oh, but if I go, I'll miss Twilight's birthday... But if I don't go, my new reputation in Canterlot as a Very Important Pony might be ruined! I might never be invited to another high society event again! Friend's birthday... Very Important Pony... [winces] It's just too important. [takes deep breath] My dear Twilight, I am afraid I won't be able to make it to your birthday party tomorrow, because... because poor Opal is quite ill, and she is in no condition to make the long journey back to Ponyville! I do hope you understand. Your friend, Rarity.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: No. But, I will need some help unpacking them.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: What do you think? Too much? You're right. Too little. Ah, garden party, here I come!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: [fades in] Swoosh! And right before she hit the ground, shoom, she<U+0096> Hi again!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: What are you<U+0096> how did you<U+0096> Why are you<U+0096>

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Listen to her. She's so excited to see us, she can hardly talk.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: What I mean to say is, what are you all doing here?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: When I got your letter saying you were stuck in Canterlot, I asked Pinkie Pie if it wouldn't be too much trouble to move my birthday party here, so you wouldn't have to miss it!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Balloons are super easy to pack.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Wow... First you get me a suite at Canterlot Castle and now this. I don't know what to say, Twilight.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: How about you start by saying what you're doing in that fancy getup?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Oh, poor Opal. Where is the sick darling?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Oh, uhh, she's... Hold on a minute.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I am so sorry about this.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: She's resting on the bed.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Poor baby.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: She looks awful.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Is... that my dress?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Yes.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: It's so... simple. So practical. So me! It's the perfect dress for my birthday party! I love it!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: [sighs in relief] You don't know how glad I am to hear you say that.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: When I told the Princess that I was moving the party to Canterlot, she was kind enough to offer us the Canterlot Castle ballroom!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Isn't it fancy pants?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Oh, I never leave home without my party cannon!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Ta-da!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I thought about having my birthday outside, but they're having another party on the castle grounds today.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Let's party!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Mmh... No reason I can't at least make an appearance...

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I'm here!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Rarity! So happy to see you here.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I wouldn't have missed this for the world.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: [sniffs] I say, what is that scent you're wearing? It smells like... [sniffs] Is that cake frosting?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: ...Yes, I always dab a little frosting behind my ears before I go out. [laughs nervously] After all, who doesn't like the smell of cake frosting?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I know I do.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: [sighs] Well, all this talk about cake has made me hungry. Think I'll go and see what's on the hors d'oeuvre table. If you'll excuse me...

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I think I left the bathwater running in my suite.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I really should go check on Opal...

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Is that Princess Celestia?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: [hushed] I need to use the little fillies' room!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Can I get anypony more punch?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Uh, what's with the croquet mallet?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: [muffled] What croquet mallet?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Duh, the one in your mouth!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: [laughs nervously] Ooh, that croquet mallet. I- well I, you know, the truth is... the truth is...

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Were you at that other party in the garden?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Rarity, I'm surprised at you.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Twilight let me explain! I<U+0096>

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I hadn't realized you were such a savvy businesspony!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: You must understand! I<U+0096>

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: All of those ponies look so posh. And with the Grand Galloping Gala coming up, I bet you could totally get some of them to buy your dresses. Very smart!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Oh, well, you didn't have to do that. You should totally go over there and mingle!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Twilight, you really are the best friend a pony could ever ask for. I don't know why I ever thought you wouldn't understand.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Understand what?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Nothing. See you girls later!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Hey, wait up! We're your friends! I'm sure they won't mind if we check out the party too! C'mon, you guys! Let's show them how to party Ponyville style!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Oh no!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Mmm!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: How come y'all aren't doing any gardening? This is a garden party, isn't it?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: [nervous laugh] Yeah.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Excuse me, might I ask where you got your ensemble?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Why, yes! Yes, you may. A very, very close friend of mine from Ponyville made it for me.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Ponyville? You don't say?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I do say. Her name is<U+0096>

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Fancy Pants! Come with me! I'd like to show you this, er, thing that's over there. On the other side of the room.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: In a moment, my dear. This lovely filly from Ponyville was just about to tell me who made her charming dress.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: That dress? Oh come now, who cares, it's just a plain old<U+0096>

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Oh, don't be so modest! This dress you made is beautiful!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: We all think so!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: [to Rarity] You know these ponies?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Yes. Yes, I do know them. They may not be as sophisticated as some of you Canterlot ponies, but they are my best friends. And they are without a doubt the most important ponies I know.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I, for one, find them charmingly rustic.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: And I think the dress you made for your friend is lovely. [chuckle] I dare say every mare in Canterlot will be wanting one.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Er, yes, now then. How about you introduce me to your friends?

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: With pleasure!

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I wanted to tell you about the important lesson I learned during my visit.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Now that I would like to hear.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: I learned that no matter where you go in life, you should never forget that you are the product of your home and your friends. And that is something always to be proud of, no matter what.

title: Sweet and Elite
dialog: Hm, a very valuable lesson to have learned.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: No distractions. Today is too important. Re-shelving day! Understanding Medieval Equestria goes in Pony History. Modern Spellcasting. That's Classics. The Art of the To-Do List... Actually, I kinda wanna read that again.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Spike! What are you laughing at?

title: Secret of My Excess
