dialog: This little beauty is my birthday present to myself! It's a fire ruby! I've been aging it for months, and it's almost ripe!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [giggles] Hey, you took my advice! Just use the whole floor as one big shelf.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [muffled] Hellooo? [normal] Anypony home? Twilight? [gasps] Is that a fire ruby?! Huh, that must be at least twenty carats! No inclusions, pristine facets...

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: And totally delicious.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Uhh... if you guys don't mind?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Oh, uh, of course. I just came by to see if you had any books on historical fashion... [to Spike] Did you say... delicious?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Sure did! Next week's my birthday, and this is my birthday dinner.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Start with this one.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Thanks, Twilight. I've got a feeling ruffled taffeta capes are going to make a huge comeback this season, and I want to be ahead of the game... [to Spike] I hope it's as tasty as it is beautiful, Spike. I've never seen anything quite so stunning before.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Gosh... You really like it, huh?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Like it? It's magnificent.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [sighs] Then you should have it. This beautiful gem was meant to be with you.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: I don't know what to say... This is so thoughtful. Oh, my little Spikey-wikey! [kisses] Thank you so much!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Wow, Spike, that's one of the kindest, most generous things you've ever done. I've never seen Rarity so happy!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Just about finished, Spike? Everypony will be here soon.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: There. Perfect! Everything looks perfect!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Not quite everything.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: A washcloth? I don't get it. Ah, no way, Twilight! I said I wasn't gonna wash the cheek that Rarity kissed, and I meant it!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: It's over, Spike! I'm cleaning that cheek!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [gasps for breath] It's mine! Stop it!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Never!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Twilight...!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [blows party hooter] Happy birthday!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Party time, woo-hoo!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Are those... for me?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: You bet they are, birthday boy.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Happy birthday, Spike.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Don't you know you get presents on your birthday?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Well, actually, this is my first birthday in Ponyville... I usually just get one present... from Twilight. A book.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Speaking of presents, this is from my new line of taffeta capes. I'm going to make one for each of you!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: I've been inspired by the generosity of my little Spikey-wikey, who gave me this beautiful fire ruby, one of the kindest acts I've ever experienced. Mmm.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Applejack, I can't thank you enough for this great blanket. I really needed a new one.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: C'mon, Spike, you already thanked me fifteen times. I'm startin' to get a little embarrassed.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: I know I keep thanking you guys, but I'm just so grateful. I wish this party could last forever.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Duh! The party can't last forever 'cause you have to go to Sugarcube Corner, 'cause the Cakes said they have a special surprise for you, 'cause it's your birthday!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: No way!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: I said the party couldn't last forever, but it doesn't need to end right now!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Hi, Mr. and Mrs. Cake!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Mr. There's the dragon of the hour! Happy birthday, Spike!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Thanks!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Mrs. When we found out it was your birthday, we couldn't resist trying out a new recipe: sapphire!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Wow!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Thank you so much! Man, first I get a bunch of great presents from my best friends, and now an amazing sapphire cupcake! Hohoh, what a day! Whoa! Oh my gosh! I'm so sorry, Cheerilee!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: That's okay. What's got you so excited?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [chomps] [muffled] Pinkie Pie told me I should come see the Cakes, so they could give me a cake 'cause it's my birthday today.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Well, happy birthday, Spike! I wish I had something to give you! Uh... Oh! Here you go!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Wow, really?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Sure! Everypony should get fun gifts on their birthday! Have a great birthday, Spike.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: I wish every day was my birthday...

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Pinkie Pie mentions my birthday to the Cakes, and I get a cupcake. I mention it to Cheerilee, and I get this great hat.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Hmmm, I wonder... Hey there, Lickety Split! That's a pretty cool ball you got there! Did you know it's my birthday?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [laughs] This is unbelievable! [chuckles] Hey, Junebug! It's my birthday!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Aren't you gonna give me something? You know, like a birthday present?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Well, how about those flowers? I'll take those<U+0096>

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Spike! Uh, sorry, Junebug, I think Spike might've gotten a little carried away.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: What are you doing? You're out here demanding gifts now?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Wow, you're right, Twilight. I don't know what got into me. Thanks for snapping me out of it. I'd better go give Cheerilee her hat back.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: No problem. See you at home later?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Wow, what a rough night's sleep, Spike. I had the weirdest drea<U+0096>

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [yawns/hisses] What happened?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: What's happening to me, Twilight?!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: I don't know! Think back to last night. Did something happen? Spike? What did you do after I saw you?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: I went to talk... to...

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Spike!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Huh?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: You went to talk to who?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Oh, um... I don't remember. Hey, can I have that globe? You're not using it, right?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Huh?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: What about this book?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Spike, I'm worried about you. You're usually not so... grabby!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: My arms aren't usually [voice drops] this long either. What's happening to me?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: This is Spike. [slaps] And something's wrong with him. [slaps] He used to be half this size! And he keeps trying to take things that aren't [slaps] his!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: So? What do you think, Doctor?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: That's not the problem. He's always been a dragon.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [sighs] Okay. Thank you, doctor.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Thanks anyway. C'mon, Spike.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Ooh, he is starting to mature. Of this fact I am quite sure.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Mature? So he's just... growing up? But that doesn't explain why he keeps grabbing things.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: A dragon's heart is prone to greed, a steady diet to make growth speed. Then, the resulting bigger size only makes their hunger rise. If this trait should go unchecked, if Spike continues to collect, more growth will certainly occur <U+0096> he is going to turn into a monster.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [gasps] You mean the more things a dragon collects, the bigger and greedier he gets? But how do we stop him before he's completely out of control?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: If his monstrous ways you wish to impede, you must prevent him from practicing greed.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Get away from her, you brute!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Spike want!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: You're not getting my scooter!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Spike want!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Hey, Spike! Check out this amazing broom!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [sing-song voice] C'mon, big boy! Look at this incredible broom!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Spike want!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Fight all you want, I'm not letting you out! Oh, Spike, I just re-shelved this room!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [groans] What now?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Now who in Ponyville would steal my apples? For that matter, who would steal my leaves?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Applejack, help! Spike's running wild and I need you to lasso him!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [laughs] Oh, that's a good one, Twilight. Sweet little Spike, running wild. Ha, what a laugh.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Twilight, get my rope.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Huh? [laughs] Don't tell me! You-you tied yourselves up?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Get us out of here right now!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [gasps] What was that?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Sounded like Fluttershy to me!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Fluttershy? Fluttershy!?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: I'm up here!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: What happened?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: I was helping my squirrel friends with a dance step, and all of a sudden, a giant, r-rampaging d-d-d-dragon stormed through!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: That was Spike!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Spike? But why would Spike steal my chicken coop? He just pulled it out of the ground and filled it with a bunch of apples and stuff!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: That sounded like Pinkie Pie!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: C'mon, girls!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Back! Get back!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Pinkie Pie! Stop giving him cake!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: I'm not giving him cake, I'm assaulting him with cake!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: How dare you take the cake!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: He's completely out of control! Who knows where he'll go next!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Put me down, you brute!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: How rude.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Don't worry Rarity, we'll save you!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Put her down, right now!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: I-If you wouldn't mind, that is...

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: I mean it, dragon boy!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: We'll be ever so grateful if you'd be so kind as to possibly consider...

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Drop her, scaly!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Hey! I'm<U+0096> not some<U+0096> sort of common<U+0096> fly swatter!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Girls! My cape!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Look! The Wonderbolts!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Oh, be quiet. You've got nothing to be proud of. You steal everypony's things, terrorize the town, and use me as a weapon against my own friends! Which, as horrible as it is, I can almost understand because you're a dragon and all. But this! [rips off dress] This is a crime against fashion! Oh no. You are not getting this gemstone! This was given to me by my dear friend Spikey-wikey, the kindest, sweetest, most generous dragon ever. And it is too precious to me to give to a greedy old beast like you!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Oh, what now? I suppose you'll be eating me or something? Spike?! You're the rampaging dragon?!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Somepony do something!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: On it!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Rarity? I need to tell you something! Just in case we don't make it! I've always sort of had a crush<U+0096>

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: [gasps] We did it! I can't believe we did it!

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: All in a day's work.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Spike, I just have to tell you how absolutely proud I am of you.

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Proud of me?

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Secret of My Excess
dialog: Today I learned a great lesson about friendship. Well, you might think that it would feel good to get lots and lots of stuff, but it doesn't feel nearly as good as giving something special to somepony you really care about. But I learned that it truly is better to give than to receive, and that kindness and generosity are what lead to true friendship. And that's more valuable than anything in the world. Well... almost anything.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: We're getting closer!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I can hardly wait!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I'm so excited, I-I feel like shouting! [softly] Woo-hoo!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Hooo-wee! Canterlot, here we come!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Oh, I do hope I look festive enough!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: There it is! Canterlot!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Oh, isn't Canterlot wonderful this time of year?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Yeah, I wish it was Hearth's Warming Eve every day.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: There's so much to look at! I feel like my durned eyes are gonna pop right out of my head!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I have an idea, let's play 'I spy with my little eye' as we walk! I'll go first. I spy... an eight-foot candy cane.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I spy a snowpony!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I spy somepony eating a gingerbread house...

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [munching] ...and it's me!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I can't believe that Princess Celestia chose us to put on the most important play of the season! Do you guys know what an honor this is? For all of us?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Oh, I wish she hadn't honored me quite so much... I can't go onstage! I don't want everypony looking at me!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Fluttershy, darling, there's nothing to feel nervous about.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: No?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Of course not. All across Equestria, ponies are preparing their own pageants for Hearth's Warming Eve in their own towns. It's tradition.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: So you're saying they'll be too busy to come to our play?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Well, no. We're in the Canterlot pageant, the biggest, most important production in all of Equestria. A lot of ponies will come to watch us.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: A lot?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Hundreds.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Hundreds?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [gasps] Maybe even thousands!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Oh, my hair! Applejack? Be a dear and shut those windows, will you?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Aaah! Rain-bow-Dash! Rain-bow-Dash! Aaaah! Thank you, thank you!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: It's a reenactment of the founding of Equestria. It's not the 'Rainbow Dash Show'.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Well it should be the 'Rainbow Dash Show'! I'm the star!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Fluttershy, you've got to come out of there!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Curtain in two minutes!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Twilight, let me handle this.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: My hair!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: PINKIE!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: The Hearth's Warming Eve pageant is about harmony and friendship.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [with a faux British accent] Once upon a time, long before the peaceful rule of Celestia, and before ponies discovered our beautiful land of Equestria, ponies did not know harmony. It was a strange and dark time. A time when ponies were torn apart... by hatred!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [normal voice] I know. Can you believe it? [accent] During this frightful age, each of the three tribes <U+0096> the Pegasi, the unicorns, and the Earth ponies <U+0096> cared not for what befell the other tribes, but only for their own welfare. In those troubled times, as now, the Pegasi were the stewards of the weather. But they demanded something in return. Food that could only be grown by the Earth ponies.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: The unicorns demanded the same, in return for magically bringing forth day and night. And so, mistrust between the tribes festered, until one fateful day, it came to a boil. And what prompted the ponies to clash? 'Twas a mysterious blizzard that overtook the land, and toppled the tribes' precarious peace.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: The normally industrious Earth ponies were unable to farm their land.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: The Earth ponies were freezing. The home of the Pegasi fared no better. The Pegasi were hungry. And the unicorns were freezing and hungry. Even the unicorns' magic was powerless against the storm. Each tribe blamed the others for their suffering, and the angrier everypony grew, the worse the blizzard became. And so it was decided that a grand summit would be held to figure out a way to cope with the blizzard.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Each tribe sent their leaders.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Daughter of the unicorn king, Princess Platinum.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Ruler of the Pegasi, Commander Hurricane. And lastly...

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: ...leader of the Earth ponies, Chancellor Puddinghead. Perhaps the three tribes could finally settle their differences, and agree on a way to get through this disaster.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: All I wanna know is why the Earth ponies are hogging all the food!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Us?! We're not hogging all the food, you are! Oh, wait. You're right. It's us. Well, it's only 'cause you mean old Pegasusususes are making it snow like crazy!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: For the hundredth time, it's not us! We're not making it snow! It must be the unicorns! They're doing it with their freaky magic!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [gasps] How dare you! Unlike you Pegasi ruffians, we unicorns would never stoop to such a thing! H-m-ph!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Well, if you non-Earths aren't gonna stop using your weirdo powers to freeze us all, then I'm just plum out of ideas.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: What a shocker. An Earth pony with no ideas.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Commander Hurricane, please cease with the insults!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: You're not the boss of me, your royal snootiness!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I beg your pardon?! I am a princess! I won't be spoken to that way!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Well, I'm leaving first!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: No, I'm first!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: And the blizzard raged on.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: So the summit of the tribes did not turn out as well as hoped, and the three leaders returned home to lick their wounds, and basically complain.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Atten-tion! Well? Aren't you curious about how it went?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Oh! Commander Hurricane, sir! How did it go, sir?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Horribly! Those other tribe leaders are so disrespectful! Don't they realize that we are a mighty tribe of warriors, and should not be crossed? We have got to break ranks with those weak foals!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [shivering] Clover the Clever! I need you!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Yes, your Majesty. Did the other pony tribes see reason as I predicted?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Those other tribes are impossible! I, for one, can no longer bear to be anywhere near those lowly creatures. The unicorns are noble and majestic. We will no longer consort with the likes of them!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Wouldn't it have been easier to use the door, Chancellor?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Maybe for you, Smart Cookie. But I am a chancellor. I was elected because I know how to think outside the box. Which means [slightly echoes] I can also think inside the chimney. Can you think inside a chimney?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Uh...

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I didn't think so.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Ugh.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Ohmygosh. Hold on to your hooves! I am just about to be brilliant!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [under her breath] That'd be a first.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I have decided that the Earth ponies are gonna go it alone!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Aw, so you mean the other tribes didn't come around? Shoot... I really thought we could get through to 'em if we<U+0096>

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Don't worry about them. We're the ones with all the food, right?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Actually, we're all out.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Fine, then we'll have to go somewhere new where we can grow some new food. And with me as our fearless leader, what could go wrong?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [under her breath] Where should I start?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: The point is...

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: C'mon, Private Pansy, let's get a move on! Hup-one, hup-two!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Get a hold of yourself, Private! We cannot let anything distract us from the mission at hand. To find, and if necessary, to conquer a new land!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Conquer, sir?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: You never know where enemies might be lurking.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I don't see any enemies, Commander. Just... snow.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Okay. This is getting old.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Oh, this is simply taking forever. My hooves are killing me! How long have we been walking for?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: About five minutes, your highness.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Oh, I never imagined finding a new land would be so hard. But it'll all be worth it, don't you agree?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I actually think that the three tribes could've tried harder.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Stoooooop!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: What's wrong?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: That is what's wrong!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Your Highness, it's just a stream. We can cross it easily.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I refuse to get my gown wet. I have no intention of arriving at my new land looking like a bedraggled Earth pony, or worse yet a rough-and-tumble Pegasus. I, for one, have no intention of stooping down to their level. On the other hand, I have no trouble watching you stoop down.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: And do watch the gown, darling. It's worth more than all of the books in your library.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Yes, yes. This is definitely the right direction.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: It feels like we're going in circles.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: But that's impossible. Are you suggesting that I'm reading the map wrong?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Absolutely not, your chancellorness. It's just that there are holes in the map, and<U+0096>

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Of course! How else could I see where I was going?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Yeah, uh<U+0096>

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Or talk? I need to be able to talk! I mean, how would we survive if I just suddenly shut up?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Heaven forbid that should happen, your chancellorship. Heh. It's just that... the map is also upside down.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I got a newsflash for you, Cookie. The Earth is round. There is no up or down.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: You're right! It's such a relief to me that you're in charge of this map...

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Relief? You don't need relief! If anypony needs relief around here, it's me! I'm a chancellor! I'm a bigshot! You're just my, um... my, uh...

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Secretary.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Whatever. You take the map, while I enjoy some relief.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Yes, Chancellor Puddinghead.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [accent] And so, each leader encountered obstacles along the way, but eventually, they all arrived in a new and wondrous land. Nopony had ever seen paradise before.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: This is the new land we've been searching for!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: What a view... I can see my future house from here.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I proclaim this new land to be... Pegasopolis!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I've never seen such jewels! This ruby is dazzling. This whole land is dazzling. I'm double dazzled! [squeals] In the name of the unicorns, I hereby dub this land Unicornia!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: The air! The trees! The dirt! This dirt is the dirtiest dirt in the whole dirt world!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: And fertile, too. Perfect for growing food.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: In the name of the Earth ponies, I think I'm gonna call this new place... uh... Dirtville.

dialog: How about "Earth"?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Earth! Congratulations to me for thinking of it.

dialog: I planted my flag first!

dialog: Did not!

dialog: Did too!

dialog: I planted mine earlier than first.

dialog: Earth!

dialog: Pegasopolis!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Unicornia!

dialog: I say we fight for the land. May the best pony win!

dialog: That's barbaric. Clover the Clever? Throw that brute into the dungeon!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: What dungeon? Look, perhaps if we all calmed down...

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I agree. Let's all calm down.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I vote for calm.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I'll have you court-martialed for insubordination, Private! We settle this on the battlefield!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Who dares throw a snowball at royalty?!

dialog: Wait a minute, where'd all this snow come from anyway?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Oh no. Not again.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [accent] And so the paradise that the ponies had found was soon lost, buried beneath a thick blanket of snow and hard feelings. Instead of beautiful, it was blizzardy. Instead of wonderful, it was wintry! Instead of spectacular, it was snow-tacular! Instead of<U+0096>

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [laughs nervously] [clears throat] [accent] Everypony was forced to seek shelter. They searched high and low, but the only shelter for miles was a cold and desolate cave. And, of course, the three tribes had to share it, and nopony was too happy about that.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Please, Commander Hothead.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: It's Commander Hurricane.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [clears throat] Please, Commander, could you just stand back and give me my royal space?

dialog: You mean like this, your highness?

dialog: Indeed not! You see this invisible line?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Private? Outline our territory for everypony to see. See this real, non-invisible line? No unicorns or Earth ponies are allowed to cross it! This is the sovereign territory of Pegasopolis!

dialog: Clover the Clever?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Uh... Smart Cookie!

dialog: I know, I know.

dialog: What are you doing? Don't go around the rock, go over it! I'm not giving up an inch of territory to the enemy!

dialog: That rock is clearly on the Unicornia side of the cave, and it belongs to us! [under her breath] Who knows? there could be jewels inside.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [groans] I claim this rock for Pegasopolis!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Unhand that rock this instant, you scoundrel!

dialog: Oh, look, you found my rock. I've been looking for it everywhere.

dialog: Hey! You invaded our territory!

dialog: Finders keepers, losers weepers!

dialog: That's the last straw!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Give me my rock!

dialog: Look, everypony! The entrance!

dialog: Great. Now there's no way out! We're trapped!

dialog: You two deserve this horrible fate. You've done nothing but argue and fight with each other!

dialog: You've been fighting too, your Highness.

dialog: Yeah! Worse! I haven't been fighting nearly as much as you!

dialog: How ridiculous! A unicorn never stoops to fighting!

dialog: That's just 'cause you wimpy unicorns know you'd never win! Earth ponies are numbskulls!

dialog: Pegasi are brutes!

dialog: Unicorns are snobs!

dialog: W-W-What is that... thing?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: They must be... windigos!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: My mentor Star Swirl the Bearded taught me about them. They're winter spirits that feed off fighting and hatred. The more hate the spirit feels, the colder things become!

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Then... this is our fault. We three tribes... we brought this blizzard to our home by fightin' and not trustin' each other. Now it's destroyin' this land, too.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: And now our bodies will become as cold as our hearts... all because we were foolish enough to hate.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Well, I don't hate you... I actually hate Commander Hurricane a lot more than I hate you guys.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Actually, I don't really hate her, I just really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really dislike her.

dialog: Well, I don't hate you guys either.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: Nor do I.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: No matter what our differences, we're all ponies.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: What was that?

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I didn't know unicorns could do that.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: I didn't either. Nothing like this has ever happened before. But I know it couldn't have been just me. It came from all three of us, joined together, in friendship.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [accent] All through the night, the three ponies kept the fire of friendship alive by telling stories to one another and by singing songs, which of course became the winter carols that we all still sing today. Eventually, the warmth of the fire and singing and laughing reached the leaders, and their bodies began to thaw. [normal voice] And it even began to melt their hearts.

title: Hearth's Warming Eve
dialog: [accent] The three leaders agreed to share the beautiful land, and live in harmony ever afterwards. And together, they named their new land...

dialog: We should be so honored that Princess Celestia chose us! She must really think we exemplify what good friends are!

dialog: Applejack, I thought you closed all the windows.

dialog: Don't blame me. Rainbow Dash should've flown up there and shut it. After all, she's got wings.

dialog: Why do I always have to do all the high up chores? Why can't Twilight use her magic for a change!

dialog: O'course. Now I been doin' this ever since I was a little pony, so be warned, pickle pear. There's a whole mess o' steps in this process and you gots to get each one of them just right, or no zap apple jam. Take this.

dialog: Uh, is this one of your gazillion secret herbal ingredients for the zap apple jam?

dialog: That there's a broom. Now get sweepin', pipsqueak! Now while you sweep, I'll get to, uh... something there... umm... Oh, ponyfeathers. Bet I'd forget my mane if it wasn't attached to my head.

dialog: There's the zap apple leaves, right on schedule!

dialog: A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L-M-N-O-P...

dialog: Well, howdy-doo there, Filthy Rich!

dialog: Granny said that the water needs<U+0096>

dialog: "Silly ways"?

dialog: Shh! Stop it, Granny!

dialog: What dolls. Why, when I was little, ponies didn't come that purdy.

dialog: Are we done shopping, Granny? 'Cause I'd like to get back to the farm, fast.

dialog: All done, smellybelly. [singing] I got my honey, gooey-goo! Got my honey, gooey-ooh! Got my honey, iddley-hoo!

dialog: And, by capturing the whole sale market, purchasing in bulk and slashing all prices, we undermine every other gift market in town, and that's how Rich's Barnyard Bargains became the cornerstone of retail in Ponyville.

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Well, thank you, Mr. Filthy<U+0097>I mean, Mr. Rich. What a wonderful day of sharing! And thank you for being a part of Family Appreciation Day! Now, uh, let's see who will be bringing in a family member for next Monday's Family Appreciation Day. Um... Oh! Apple Bloom!

dialog: But Miss Cheerilee. Monday is zap apple harvest day, and Applejack and Big McIntosh will be too busy to come and speak.

dialog: Oh! But, uh, no, that wouldn't<U+0096>

dialog: That's a splendid idea, Diamond Tiara! Apple Bloom, you shall bring in Granny Smith on Monday.

dialog: Have a great weekend, everypony!

dialog: Granny Smith? Come Monday, I'll be the laughin' stock of Ponyville!

dialog: I'm sorry, Apple Bloom, but don't you fret. Granny Smith's got no shortage of entertainin' stories to tell.

dialog: I know. That's what I'm worried about.

dialog: I'll be embarrassed, shamed, disgraced, mortified, humiliate<U+0096>

dialog: That's it! C'mon!

dialog: Apple Bloom's sick! Looks like she might have to stay home all week!

dialog: We can't move Family Appreciation Day, so let's move harvest day instead!

dialog: I don't know... Zap apple trees aren't like normal apple trees. They're magic.

dialog: Granny Smith, it's Miss Cheerilee! Apple Bloom said you wanted to speak with me?... Hello? Granny Smi<U+0096>

dialog: [mimicking Granny Smith] Well hello there! Howdydoo!

dialog: Hi... uh... Granny Smith... is, ugh, everything okay?

dialog: [mimicking Granny Smith] Oh, er, excuse me. Uh, pickles always give me the hiccups! I need to tell you that I can't make the presentation on Monday after all!

dialog: Oh no, is that so?

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: For today's Family Appreciation Day, we are pleased to welcome Granny Smith. Um... Apple Bloom? Is Granny Smith here?

dialog: Well, howdy, my little ponies!
