dialog: Er, no, it came. And Uncle Apple Strudel was on it.

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: I can't wait to hear Granny Smith's presentation. [hushed] If she can remember any of it.

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Long ago, when I was a little pony, things were very different here in Ponyville, 'cause there was no Ponyville!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: [voiceover] That's right, my little ponies. Me and my family were pilgrim pony folk, back when I was a little filly. Oh, we ventured far and wide, collecting new seeds and sellin' the old. But my pa was the finest seed collector in all of Equestria. Then, one day, the Smith family found themselves in the most brilliant, most grand, most magnificent of all cities. A place called... Canterlot. Well, I bet your hooves to hindquarters I had never seen anything like it before nor since. And as if the beauty of that city wasn't enough, suddenly, she appeared. Princess Celestia, the most regal of all ponies. When lo and behold, she stopped to look at my pa's seed collection. Then Princess Celestia saw that we were plumb-tuckered and hankerin' to find our forever home. And bein' a royal Princess and all, she knew exactly the place for us to lay down our stakes. My pa gave the Princess a mighty thanks. We quickly found that land near the Everfree Forest, and we built our first home. Next, we planted our first orchards. But an orchard don't grow overnight, and we were getting mighty short on food. Now mind you, we were cautioned about the forest, and we knew that it was not fit to enter.

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: [voiceover] But I knew there was critters livin' there. There must be somethin' to eat. It was dark and musty, and I won't lie, it was scary. But every inch was covered in plant life, and before I knew it, wasn't I standin' in front of the most incredible apple trees! I had never seen anything that bore this kind of colorful fruit! Oh I started picking apples quick as a whip!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: [voiceover] I turned, and there before me stood the timberwolves! I've never run so fast in my life. I did the only thing I could think of.

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: [voiceover] My pa and I planted those special apple seeds, and before our eyes they grew like wildfire. Why, we had full grown trees faster than you could say 'lickety split'. Then each year, I paid close attention to the signs of the zap apples' special harvesting times. How the weather affects the Everfree Forest, how the timberwolves howl when the zap apples first start growing, and how they zapped away if you didn't pick 'em all in one day! And the fruits of our labor were the best fruit we ever tasted. Soon enough I was mixing up batches of zap apple jam. Just like harvestin' the zap apples had its special rules, so did makin' zap apple jam. I learned that you gotta be extra friendly with the bees, otherwise their honey won't taste rightly sweet to mix in with the zap apples. Who'd'a thought that glass jars needed talkin' to? Or that zap apples like pink polka dots? But magic is as magic does. Just funny that way. Then ponies started comin' to our farm from far and wide just to get a taste of my zap apple jam. Some of them decided to stay, like Stinkin' Rich, Diamond Tiara's great grandfather. Matter of fact, the first thing he ever sold was my zap apple jam.

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: [voiceover] And before we knew it, we had ourselves a nice little town, bustling with all kinds of ponies. And that is how Ponyville was founded.

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Oh, thank you kindly, little ponies. Oh, now now, let's settle down.

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: So if it weren't for you and the zap apples, Ponyville wouldn't even exist?!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Darn tootin', little filly!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: If it weren't for my Granny Smith, your daddy wouldn't have Barnyard Bargains.

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: But she's just a... kooky old lady!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: She is not a kooky old lady! She is the most amazing pony in all of Ponyville!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: I think this is the best zap apple jam I've tasted yet!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Must be 'cause you had something to do with it, Apple Bloom.

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: You betcha. Apple Bloom is one humdinger of a zap apple jammer!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: I am?

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: So I take it Family Appreciation Day went well?

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Did it? My Granny Smith is super special! I just forgot that for a little while.

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Aw, don't fret. I forget things all the time. Now, I'll getcha... er... somethin'. Aw.

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Who wants to help Granny sing to the water?

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Diamond Tiara?

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: But dad!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Can you believe the new baby is finally here?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Cup Cake and Carrot Cake must be so proud!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: I wonder if it's a filly or a colt?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: I wanna see the new baby pony! I wanna see! Which one is it?!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. Meet our son, Pound Cake.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. ...and our daughter, Pumpkin Cake.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Two new foals for me to play with? [gasps] That's two, two, two times the fun! This is the greatest day ever! We need to celebrate your birthday, babies, 'cause you were just born today! Woo-hoo!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: But I was just<U+0096>

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: [quieter] Happy happy birthday to you and you today<U+0096>

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Now how in thunderation is one of them twins a Pegasus and the other one a unicorn?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. Easy. My great-great-great-great grandfather was a unicorn, and Cup Cake's great aunt's second cousin twice removed was a Pegasus. That makes sense, right?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Aw, yeah! Heh, just you wait! Once little Pound Cake there gets his wings going, he'll be all over the place.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: And be careful around Pumpkin Cake.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Baby unicorns get strange magic surges that come and go.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Quick! Make a wish and blow out your candles! Which is easy, 'cause there are zero candles! You are zero years old, after all!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Happy month-i-versary to you and you today! [very quickly] I-can't-believe-you're-already-a-month-old. Time-sure-flies-doesn't-it-wow. Seems-like-only yesterday-you-were-born. But now you're a month old today, hey!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Are you ready for your favoritest game in the whole wide world? Where's Pinkie Pie...? Here I am! Where's Pinkie Pie...? Here I am! Where's Pinkie Pie...? Here I am!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mrs. Everything okay in there? Who needs a diaper change?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Don't worry, they're fine! [sniffs] Oogh, I mean...

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. Oh, I got it.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. Is anypony hungry?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Ah, no thanks. I just had a big breakfast.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mrs. I'm on it.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Oh, oh, you're making funny faces! I have one! Bleghhh!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. [chuckles] No, y'see, Pinkie, the babies need to be burped.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: All set now? Everything good? Okay, who wants to play again?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mrs. Uh uh uh, Pound Cake, no pounding things.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. Uh uh uh uh, we don't chew on things, Pumpkin Cake.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Except food.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mrs. [gasps] Food! Great cinnamon sticks, I completely forgot.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: No, you just fed them bottles, remember?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mrs. Not the babies' food!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. Gh! The food for the enormously big catering order we have to deliver today!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mrs. Oh, with the new twins, we've been so distracted!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. Gh, quick, honeybun, we need to find a babysitter to watch the foals while we take care of this.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: I could do it! I wanna do it! Oh, the babies love playing with me, I'll do it!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mrs. I wonder who would be available on such short notice.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Me! Me! Pick me!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Oh, I would love to babysit! But I can't today, sorry. I promised Angel we'd go on a picnic. You understand, don't you? Y-you're not mad at me, are you? Please don't be mad at me!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: I'll do it! Pick me!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: I have to finish this report for the Princess summarizing all my other reports to the Princess.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: I wanna babysit! Pick me!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Babysit? Now? When there's a swarm o' hungry caterpillars headin' this way? I gotta get all these apples picked before they get swarmed on!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Ooh, ooh, I wanna do it!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: I got tickets to the Wonderbolts airshow this afternoon. Gotta dash!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Ask me! Mememememememememememememe!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Moi? Babysit? N- Oh nonononononononono! I'm flattered that you would think about me though.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. [groans] [unenthusiastically] Pinkie Pie, how would you like to babysit for us?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: [gasps] I dunno. I'll have to check my schedule.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. Now, Pinkie, are you sure you really understand the responsibility of watching over two babies?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: I can be responsible. Why, responsibility is my middle name. Pinkie Responsibility Pie.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mrs. But this time you need to take care of them, not just play with them. You have to be responsible.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Yes, I know. I will. I am.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mrs. Oh, here you are, dearie. All your responsibilities are on this list.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Whoa! That's a lot of responsi<U+0096> Consider it done.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. [to Mrs. Cake] We'll frost it when we get there! C'mon, sugarplum, tick-tick!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mrs. Take good care of our two precious little ginger snaps!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: No problemo, Mr. and Mrs. Cake. Everything is under control.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Uh-oh.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Oh, don't cry, little friends! Look, look! Where's Pinkie Pie...? Where's Pinkie Pie?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Oh no... I'm right here, see?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Oh, think think think... Aha!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Hey guys, watch this!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Hey, you're a wonderful crowd here tonight! Where y'all from? Wow, that's great. Y'know, I used to have an ant farm, but I had to get rid of it because... I couldn't find tractors that small!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Get it? Tractors that small? [pause] The other day, I spilled spot remover on my dog... and now I can't find him!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Gee, tough crowd. [to herself] Tell me about it. Fine, I wasn't gonna pull off a show stopper, but you're a lovely audience and I think you deserve it!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: First you jiggle your tail! Oink oink oink! Then you wriggle your snout! Oink oink oink! Then you wiggle your rump! Oink oink oink! Then shout it out! Oink oink oink!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: First you jiggle your tail! Oink oink oink! Then you wriggle your snout! Oink oink oink! Then you wiggle your rump! Oink oink oink! Then shout it out! Oink oink oink!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: First you jiggle your tail! Oink oink oink! Then you wriggle your snout! Oink oink oink! Then you wiggle your rump! Oink oink oink! Then shout it out! Oink oink oink!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: There, see? Nothing to this babysitting business! Ugh!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Snack time. That's easy enough. Okie-dokie! Eat up! Like this! Num-num-num, num-num-num-num! Ahh!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: No, Pumpkin Cake, we eat food, not tablecloths.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Huh, huh? Uh, hey, guys, look at me!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Achoo!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Towels are not food, Pumpkin Cake!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Drop it... Drop it... Drop it!?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Uh, uh, uh, uh, don't cry! Look, look, uh, floating things! Ooh, aaah, eeh!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Uh, don't make me do it, guys! You know what happens when you mix flour and water, don't you?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: [sniffs] [gasps] [hoof on nose] Smells like somepony needs me to changy-wangy their diaper-wiper right now-a-wow! [tiptoeing noise] Easy... easy...

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Wait- no- stay there- just- for a second- stand still, I've almost-

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Oh, you've gotta be kidding me.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Oh! Thank goodness they're home!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Hi! I finished up the work I had to do, so I thought I'd stop by and see if you needed any help. Whoa!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Thank you, thank you, thank you for coming! I can't begin to tell you what my day has been like! I mean, these babies just won't listen to reason, and don't even get me started on their taste in stand-up comedy.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: It's okay, Pinkie. I figured you would need some help. That's why I stopped by.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Ex-cuse me?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Babies take a lot of work, and some ponies are just not cut out to handle the responsibility.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Is that so? Well, thanks for stopping by, Twilight. Sorry, I don't have time to visit. I'm very very busy with my responsibilities here.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: I'm happy to help! It's no trouble<U+0096>

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Well, of all the<U+0096> She thinks I can't handle things on my own! Maybe because I haven't handled things on my own. Well, I can handle things on my own!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Pound Cake. [growls] This is a crib. It is only to be used for napping, sleeping, and on occasion with permission, as a pretend old-timey Western fort. It is not a trampoline, so stop your jumping right now, mister!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: And you, young filly. We do not put anything in our mouth that we cannot safely and properly digest, so stop slobbering on that toy this instant!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Now, we've all had a very exhausting afternoon, and it's time for all good little foals to take their nap. So, fall asleep!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: [sighs] [kisses twice] Sleep tight.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Oh, nononono. Not good, not good, not good! Pound? Pumpkin? Where are you? Come out, come out, wherever you are!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Whoa! You be a good little girl now, Pumpkin-wumpkin, and stay in your crib for your pal Pinkie-winkie!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Pound Cake? [clicks] Here, Pound Cake!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Uh, Pound Cake? Uh...

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: [squeals] You can fly?!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Oh... get down here... this instant... young... colt! [gasps for breath] I'm responsible for you!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: No no no, Pumpkin.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: No no.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: No. Hmph! I am the responsible one, and I said no.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: That goes for you too, Pound Cake!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mm, razzleberry. I'm- not- letting- go! I'm- re-spon-si-ble!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Oh, not you too! There! Now who's the responsible one?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: [giggles] Y'know, you're right. That is funny.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: I've always had fun playing with little kids, and I thought babysitting meant just more playtime, right? Wrong! Being a caregiver is way more responsibility than just being a playmate. And today, I learned that sometimes our desire for responsibility can outrun our actual ability to handle it.

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. Pinkie Pie! We're back!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. Are we in the right place?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Shhh!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mrs. P-Pinkie. This is just... just...

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: Mr. Amazing is what it is. We had no idea how responsible you really are. Would you be interested in becoming our go-to babysitter on a permanent basis?

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: [gasps] Hm- Ah- lemme check my schedule! I should be available a week from... never!

title: Baby Cakes
dialog: [happily gasps] I have some free time next Tuesday.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Whoo-- Whoa! Whoo-hoo! Applejack, you're sure to knock everypony's hat off at the Equestria Rodeo competition!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Aw shucks, Apple Bloom. I sure hope so.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Hope so? I know so! After all, you're the ten-time rodeo champeen of Ponyville! Why, you've got more blue ribbons than anypony in Ponyville ever! And I can't wait for my big sis to win every blue ribbon in Equestria and bring home the title of Equestria Rodeo champeen!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Huh? Now, careful, Derpy! Don't want to do any more damage than you've already done.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I just don't know what went wrong.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Yeah. It's a mystery.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Nice work, Rainbow Dash.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: You okay, Rainbow Dash? Anything I can do to help?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: No! Nothing! In the name of Celestia, just sit there and do nothing!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Oops. My bad.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Everypony, can I get your attention? Attention please!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Yes, we are all here to send Applejack to compete in this year's Equestria Rodeo competition in Canterlot.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: And I want to thank Applejack in advance for generously offering up her prize money to fix town hall.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Yeah, Applejack! Whoo-hoo!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Speech! Speech!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Oh, shucks. I'm not much for speeches.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Alright then, no speech!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Buuut! This here is the nicest send off anypony could ask for. Y'all have been cheering me on in every rodeo since I was a little little pony. So it seems only fittin' to use my winnings to fix up town hall. I promise to make Ponyville proud.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I want you to show all them highfalutin rodeo ponies what a real rodeo pony's like!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: You betcha, Granny Smith.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: And bring back all that money!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: You betcha, Mayor.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Just do your best, Applejack.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I'll do better than my best!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Guess that means me.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Seeya in a week!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: With lots of new blue ribbons!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: And lots of money!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Darn tootin'! See y'all in a week, with a big bag full of blue ribbons!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: And drink sarsaparilla! What? It gives you extra sass.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Oh, I hope Applejack is surprised by this surprise party!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Well, that is the point.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I know, but I hope she isn't so surprised she's startled, because while being surprised can be nice, being startled can be... very startling.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Surprise!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: [gasps] Oh, Pinkie, you startled me.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Sorry! I was just practicing my "surprise!" for when we surprise Applejack with this super cool party for becoming rodeo champeen of Equestria! Surprise!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Quiet, Pinkie, I think Applejack's coming!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Surprise! Shoot!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Who's it from, Twilight? What's it say?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: It's from Applejack. "Family and friends, not coming back to Ponyville."

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: "...Don't worry, will send money soon." That's all there is.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Applejack's... not comin' back?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: What do you mean Applejack's not coming back?! She loves Ponyville!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: And she loves Sweet Apple Acres!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: And she loves her family!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: [gasps] Something just dreadful must have happened to Applejack to make her not return!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Maybe she's hurt, or sad, or scared!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: So, what are we waiting for? Let's go find her!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Don't worry. We'll search all of Equestria if we have to. We'll bring her back.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Y'all are the best.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Thank you, girls! [to Big McIntosh] Our little bushel just lost one apple.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I hope this lead doesn't turn out to be a dead end. I don't wanna go home empty-hooved after promising we'd find her.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I don't know how we'll break it to the Apple family.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I don't know how we'll break it to Ponyville!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I don't know how I'll make it to the next stop!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: This is Dodge Junction, girls. Applejack is supposed to have come here after the rodeo ended. Let's fan out and try to find her.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Ooh, pickles! [knocking] Hurryhurryhurryhurryhurry! Hurry it up in there!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Huh, some ponies. Sheesh.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Applejack! I found her, I found her, I found her, I found her, I found her!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Oh, Applejack, thank heavens!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: We're so glad you're safe!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I found her, I found her, I found her, I found her! Be right back.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Uh, hey, everypony. What's up?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Why didn't you come back to Ponyville?!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Yes, why are you here?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Are you okay?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Do you have any snacks?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Tell us what happened, Applejack!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Yes, ma'am.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: And you are?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Aw shucks, Miss Jubilee. You don't have to go into all that.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: "Change of scenery"? What's that supposed to mean?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: S'no big deal, guys. I thought cherries would be a nice change from apples, so I took the job and came here. That's it. End of story.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: That's it? Well, that's a terrible story!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Sorry, but that's all there is to tell. Thanks for checkin' on me, but y'all can go home now. Tell my family hi, and that I'm doing a-okay.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Excuse me, AJ, but we didn't travel all over Equestria searching for you to come home without you!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Well, I didn't ask you to come lookin' for me! There is nothin' to tell and I am not going back to Ponyville!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I don't care what she says. Applejack's not telling us something.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Twilight's right. We gotta get her to spill the beans.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: What?! She had beans? Ugh, I told her I was snacky!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Sure am, Miss Jubilee.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: What are you all doing here?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: We're your cherry sorters. Shall we get started?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Fine.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: What are you five up to?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Well, uh, you made working on a cherry orchard sound... so delightful.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Uh-huh. Well, just remember: No talking about Ponyville.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Fine! Why don't you quit talking and get walking?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: So, AJ, how was Canterlot? Not talking about Ponyville, talking about Canterlot, totally different town.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Canterlot was fine.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Was the rodeo fun?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Yes.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Did you meet some nice ponies there?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Some.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Really? Did you see Wild Bull Hickok? What about Calamity Mane?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Yes, I saw 'em both.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: And how did you meet Miss Jubilee?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Um, well, Miss Jubilee had a cherry stand at the rodeo. Real good treats.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Um, excuse me?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Cherry winks, cherry cheesecake, cherry tarts. We struck up a conversation, being orchard folk and all.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: So you told her about Sweet Apple Acres?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Yes.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Did you tell her why you weren't going back?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: No, 'cuz it was none of her business!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Ooh... Can you please slow down?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Is it because I made it rain on you that one time?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: No!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Help!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Is it because you were insulted when I gave you that book on organized orchards?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: NO!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Is it because you were insulted when I insulted your hair?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: No, no, NO! I'm not telling you why, so just<U+0096>

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: STOP!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Well, girls, we seem to be striking out.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: That's 'cause we're playing too nice.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Yes. Desperate times do call for desperate measures.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: It's time to call in the big guns.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Hey, Applejack. Need some help?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: You promise not to ask me any questions?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I promise.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Have you ever had a cherrychanga? Ooh! Sorry, that was a question.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: That kind of question is fine, Pinkie. No, I-I never had a cherrychanga.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Well, no wonder, because I made it up myself! A cherrychanga is mashed up cherries in a tortilla that's deep fried. Cherrychanga. Great name, huh? Oh, but maybe I should call it a chimicherry. Ooh, that's good too. Which do you think sounds better? Cherrychanga or chimicherry? Or what if I combine them? Chimicherrychanga! What sounds the funniest? I like funny words! One of my favorite funny words is 'kumquat'! I didn't make that one up. I would work in a kumquat orchard just so I could say 'kumquat' all day! Kumquat, kumquat, kumquat! And 'pickle barrel'! Isn't that just the funnest thing to say? Pickle barrel, pickle barrel, pickle barrel! Say it with me! Pickle barrel, kumquat, pickle barrel, kumquat, pickle barrel, kumquat, chimicherrychanga!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: No! Make it stop, make it stop!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: The only way to make it stop is for you to spill the beans!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Never!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Alright, alright! I'll tell everypony what's goin' on! Just please stop talkin'! But... can it wait 'til tomorrow at breakfast? I'm plum tuckered out.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Tomorrow, huh? I don't know...

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Do you Pinkie promise?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: [sighs] I will tell you the whole truth at breakfast. Pinkie promise.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I'm glad we're finally gonna get some answers from Applejack.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Yeah, maybe.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Don't worry, Rainbow. She's gotta 'fess up after making a Pinkie promise.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Nopony breaks a Pinkie promise!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Applejack! [slightly distorted] You Pinkie promised!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Applejack, come back here!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Giddy up, fellas, I gotta get the heck out of Dodge!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: She's gonna get away!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Oh no, she won't! Look, girls!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Follow that stagecoach! Oh, we have you now!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Whoa! What the hay?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Pull over!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Hey! Cut that out! Whoa! [to coach ponies] I'll pay you double to outrun them.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: We'll pay you triple to slow down!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I'll pay you quadruple to leave them in the dust!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: That was rude!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Get them! Get them!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Come on, Fluttershy!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Hyah! C'mon, y'all! Go, go!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Applejack, you broke your Pinkie promise! Apologize!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Pinkie, I did not break my promise!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Wha?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: If y'all reckon back, I told you that I would tell you everything at breakfast. But I didn't come for breakfast. I couldn't come to that breakfast, not if it meant telling y'all what happened.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Well, I... I...

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I'm sorry, Pinkie, but I can't tell y'all the truth. I just can't!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Well I heard a "sorry" in there, so that'll have to do for now. I'll get a real apology later. Rarity, catch me.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Rainbow, go back!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: No time! They knew what they were getting into!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Yes. Hyah!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Yee-haw!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Ha, try and catch me now. Oh, nuts.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Not so fast!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Fine. Now you know.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Know what?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Well, just look!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: I am. You won an amazing number of ribbons, just like Miss Jubilee said!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Don't you get it? There's every color of ribbon down there. Every color... but... blue. I came in fourth, third, even second, but I didn't win one first prize, and I certainly didn't win any prize money.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: But the telegram said you were gonna send money.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: That's why I came here. I wanted to earn some money. After that big old send off Ponyville gave me, I just didn't have the nerve to come home empty-hooved. I couldn't come home a failure.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Applejack, you're not a failure.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: And we're your friends! We don't care if you came in fiftieth place! You're still number one in our books.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: So... you're not upset or disappointed?

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: But what about the mayor? I don't think I can face her and tell her I didn't get that money to fix the broken roof.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Applejack, we can always find a way to fix that hole in the roof. But if you don't come back, we'll never be able to fix the hole in our hearts.

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: [sniffles] Darn it! Now you got me acting all sappy!

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: The Last Roundup
dialog: It's a tad easier to be proud when you come in first than it is when you finish further back. But there's no reason to hide when you don't do as well as you'd hoped. You can't run away from your problems. Better to run to your friends and family.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: [yawns] Who could that be? It's still dark!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: C'mon, Fluttershy! Cider season's about to start!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: [squee] [shrieks] Oh, where are we? What's the rush?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: The rush? Don't you remember what happened last year? Or the year before that? Or pretty much any cider season ever?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Um, well, uh<U+0096>

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Pinkie Pie. She always ends up ahead of us in line, and then they always run out of cider!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: I guess I<U+0096>

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Gee, Rainbow Dash. It looks like a few other ponies had the same idea.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Oh, gosh, Pinkie. I love your new style.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Who are all these ponies?!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Isn't this great? I couldn't sleep last night 'cause I was so excited about cider season, and I had this brilliant idea to come down here and camp out, so I told a few others about it, and they all thought it was a great idea too, and now it's just a big old cider party! Woo-hoo! Oh, gosh, that's a lot of ponies. Hope they don't run out before you get any.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Isn't this exciting, Spike? Opening day of cider season!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Yeah! That means it's only thirty more days 'til sapphire season!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: [through megaphone] Attention, everypony! Cider season is now officially open!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Heh. Sorry, everypony! That's it for today!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Surprise, surprise. You ran out again!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: For the record, I don't mind<U+0096>

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Why can't you make enough cider for all of us? Or at least for me!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Hold on, everypony. We've done our best to improve supply this year-

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: And it's always true. But Apple family cider is made with love and integrity, and only the highest quality apples in Equestria. Sorry, but that recipe takes time.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: If y'all just be patient, we'll have plenty more tomorrow.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: She's right, y'know! You can't rush perfection! And this year's batch was perfection!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Uh, Pinkie Pie<U+0096>

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: What in Equestria is that?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Well, lookie what we got here, brother of mine, it's the same in every town Ponies with thirsty throats, dry tongues, and not a drop of cider to be found Maybe they're not aware that there's really no need for this teary despair

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: That the key that they need to solve this sad cider shortage you and I will share

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: He's Flim

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: He's Flam

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Nonpa-what?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Nonpareil, and that's exactly the reason why, you see No pony else in this whole place will give you such a chance to be where you need to be And that's a new world, with tons of cider Fresh squeezed and ready for drinking

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: More cider than you could drink in all your days of thinking

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: I doubt that.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: He's Flim

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: He's Flam

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: I suppose by now you're wondering 'bout our peculiar mode of transport

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: I say, our mode of locomotion

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: And I suppose by now you're wondering, where is this promised cider?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Any horse can make a claim and any pony can do the same

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: But my brother and I have something most unique and superb Unseen at any time in this big new world

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Folks, it's the one and only, the biggest and the best

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: The unbelievable

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Unimpeachable

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Indispensable

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: I-can't-believe-able

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: What d'you say, sister?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Young filly, I would be ever so honored if you might see fit to let my brother and I borrow some of your delicious, and might I add spellbindingly fragrant apples for our little demonstration here?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Uh, sure, I guess.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Ready, Flim?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Ready, Flam?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: And show these thirsty ponies a world of delectable cider!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Watch closely, my friends!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: The fun begins!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Now, here's where the magic happens. Right here in this heaving, roiling, cider-press-boiling guts of the very machine, those apples plucked fresh are right now as we speak being turned into grade-A, top-notch, five-star, blow-your-horseshoes-off, one-of-a-kind cider!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Feel free to take a sneak peek!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Now wait, you fellers, hold it! You went and over-sold it! I guarantee that what you have there won't compare For the very most important ingredient Can't be added or done expedient And it's quality, friends, Apple Acres' quality and care!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Well, Granny, I'm glad you brought that up, my dear, I say I'm glad you brought that up You see that we are very picky when it comes to cider if you'll kindly try a cup

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Yes, sir, yes, ma'am, this great machine lets just the very best  So whaddaya say then, Apples?  Care to step into the modern world And put the Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000 to the test?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: What do you think, folks? Do you see what the Apples can't? I see it clear as day! I know she does! So does he! C'mon, Ponyville, you know what I'm talking about!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: You got a deal!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Not so fast! No way no how that machine matches up with the care we put in our cider!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: But if it really does work, we could make everypony in town happy!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: I just don't know, y'all. We've always made cider the same way.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Eeyup. Huh?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: We'll sweeten the deal. You supply the apples...

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: ...We supply the Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: ...Seventy-five...

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: ...Twenty-five.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Deal<U+0096>

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Hold on. Who gets the seventy five?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Why, us, naturally.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: And, we'll throw in the magic to power the machine for free.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Cider sales keep our business afloat through the winter. We'd lose Sweet Apple Acres if we agreed to this.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: No deal.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Hmph. Very well. If you refuse our generous offer to be partners, then we'll just have to be competitors.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: You wouldn't dare.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Oh no?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Don't you worry, everypony! There'll be plenty of cider for all of you!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: [quietly] Once we drive Sweet Apple Acres out of business.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: What?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Still worried about Flim and Flam?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Granny Smith says they were just blowing hot air.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: I'm not so sure. They sounded mighty serious when they threatened to run us out of business.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: That's it! Last cup!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Oh, for Pete's sake!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: C'mon back tomorrow, everypony!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: What seems to be the problem here?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Oh my, oh my, out of cider again?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: What have we here? Who'd like a cup?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Don't worry, everypony, we've got the Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000 to make more in an instant!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: You can't sell that cider! That's made from Apple family apples!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Is this some kind of cruel joke?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Don't worry, everypony, there are plenty of apples in Equestria. We'll find some others and make more cider than all of Ponyville can drink!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: We'll make more cider than you could ever imagine!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Now, it ain't about the speed, young'un, it's about quality.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Who cares how good the cider is if I never get to drink any?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Oh, look at these poor, dissatisfied ponies.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Ponyville is Sweet Apple Cider country!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Our cider speaks for itself!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Let's put it to the test!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Anywhere, anytime!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Well, that's enough now.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: With our machine, we can make enough cider in one hour to satisfy this entire town!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: We'll do it in 45 minutes!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Easy, Apple Bloom, easy.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: What's the matter, Granny Smith? Chicken?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: What did you call me, sonny?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: If you're so confident in your cider, then what's the problem?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Tomorrow mornin', right here!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: But I'm afraid we haven't any... [spits] ...apples.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: You can use our south field! It'll be worth it to teach y'all a thing or two about cider making!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Excellent; we have a bet. Whoever produces the most barrels in one hour wins the exclusive right to sell cider in Ponyville.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: And after we beat ya, I don't never want to see you bambahoozlers around here again!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Until tomorrow.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Don't worry, Applejack, I know you'll win tomorrow!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: We'd better, 'cause if we don't, we're gonna lose our farm.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Applejack? Are you sure this is such a good idea?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Me 'n' the family are... one hundred percent confident... in our cider making capabilities.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: And besides, nopony calls Granny a chicken.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: [through megaphone] Attention, everypony!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Well, good luck.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Thanks, Twilight. We'll need it.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: [through megaphone] The teams have one hour to produce as much cider as they can, after which the barrels will be counted and the winner will be named the sole cider provider for all of Ponyville!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Are both teams ready?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Ready!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Then let's... go!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Ugh, bad 'un. Good 'un! Bad 'un...

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Great job, y'all! We've already filled an entire barrel!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: I'll bet you those guys don't even have<U+0096>

dialog: What?!

dialog: C'mon, Apple Bloom, focus! We gotta forget those guys if we're gonna have a chance of winnin'!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Sorry, sis! Better keep up, Granny, we're fallin' behind!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Egh... [sniffs] Good 'un... Ugh, bad 'un...

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Rest when it's over, Big McIntosh! Ride! Ride!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: This is just dreadful. Even at top speed the Apples are only making one barrel to the twins' three!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Um, Miss Mayor! Are honorary family members allowed to help in the competition?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Well, I'm not sure... Flim, Flam, would you object to honorary family members helping?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Are you kidding?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: We don't care if the whole kingdom of Canterlot helps. It's a lost cause.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Hm, I guess it's okay. Applejack? What do you think?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: I think I'd love to have the rest of my family helpin' out.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Okay, everypony, we're not gonna let those smooth talkers take our friend's farm.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Fluttershy, help Applejack with the trees.

dialog: Got it.

dialog: Pinkie Pie, you're on apple catching detail.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Yessir, ma'am, sir!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Rarity, you've got a discerning eye. Help Granny Smith at the quality control station.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Of course.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Rainbow Dash, do you think you can help Big McIntosh press?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: In my sleep!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Alright, everypony, let's save Sweet Apple Acres!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Over there, Apple Bloom! Don't miss them!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Right behind you, Pinkie Pie!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Good 'un, bad 'un, bad 'un, good 'un...

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Lovely, horrid, horrid, lovely...

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Based on these figures, we're making five barrels for every three of theirs!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Keep it up, everypony! We're back in this!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: [spits] Come on, brother, we've gotta pick up the pace!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Right, uh, double the power!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: We've gotta try something else!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: I've got it, brother of mine.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Well done, Flam! We're at top productivity!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: C'mon, Rainbow Dash, keep grinding!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: We don't have time for quality control if we wanna win this thing!

dialog: [yelps] Get back, you! One bad apple spoils the bunch!

dialog: Applejack, help me!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: There's no point in winnin' if we cheat!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: We'll just have to work harder! C'mon, everypony!

dialog: All right then, double time!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Time's up!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: I'm proud of you, Applejack.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Integrity like that will always be... rewarded.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Flim and Flam win!

dialog: We... lost?

dialog: Daww, too bad, Apples.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Guess you'll just have to find a new line of work that doesn't match your names quite so... perfectly.

dialog: Now should we tear down all these tacky old buildings and put up new ones, brother?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: I don't see why not, brother. After all, this isn't Sweet Apple Acres anymore. How about 'Flim Flam Fields'?

dialog: I ought to press you into jerk cider!

dialog: No, Rainbow Dash. A deal's a deal.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Congratulations to y'all. The cider business in Ponyville... is yours. C'mon, Apples. Let's go pack up our things.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Fear not, everypony, there's more than enough cider to go around.

dialog: Go ahead, everypony. Go on, y'all. It's okay.

dialog: Drink up, Ponyville! Down the hatch!

dialog: Mine's got rocks in it!

dialog: You wouldn't pay even one cent?

dialog: How about two cups for one cent?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: [nervous noises] It looks like we've encountered a slight... problem here in Ponyville.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Nopony wants our product. Next town?

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Next town. Let's go, Flim!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Let's go, Flam!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: They're gone.

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: That means Sweet Apple Acres is still in business!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Because of this silly competition, we've made enough of our cider for the whole town!

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
dialog: I wanted to share my thoughts with you. [clears throat] I didn't learn anythin'! Ha! I was right all along! If you take your time to do things the right way, your work will speak for itself. Sure I could tell you I learned something about how my friends are always there to help me, and I can count on them no matter what, but truth is, I knew that already too.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Hey, Rarity. Hey, Pinkie Pie. What are you looking at?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Rainbow Dash! Isn't she the most daring devil? I mean, the most devilish darer? I mean<U+0097>

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: She's dazzling!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Ooh, yeah, that's a good word. She's dazzling!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Oh no, oh no, oh no!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Ai yi yi yi yi!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: So much for dazzling.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [muffled] Is she gonna be okay?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [muffled] Oh, I'm so worried!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [muffled] Is her face gonna stay that way?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Awwww.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: How is she, doctor?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Huh, how long do I need to lie here? I've got things I need to do!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: You guys have gotta get me out of here! I'm gonna climb the walls!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Ooh, just like a spider! [to Doctor Horse] Did the crash somehow give her super-duper spider powers?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Few days? Might as well be a few months, or a few years!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: It's not so bad, Rainbow Dash.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: I bet the chow in here is hoof-lickin' good.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: And the hospital gowns, they...match the curtains!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: And look! You have a roommate!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: What's this? 'Daring Do and the Quest for the Sapphire Stone'.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: No thanks. I so don't read. I'm a world-class athlete. Reading's for eggheads like you, Twilight. Heh, no offense, but I am not reading. It's undeniably, unquestionably, uncool.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Is she serious? Who doesn't like to read a bang-up tale from time to time?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Why, a good book is almost as magnificent as silk pajamas on a Sunday morning, heh!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Reading is for everypony, Rainbow Dash!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Yeah! I love reading, and my head isn't even close to the shape of an egg! It's more the shape of an apple, or maybe an orange, but a big orange! More like a grapefruit really...

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: I think you'd like Daring. She's a lot like you. Adventurous, fierce, and undeniably, unquestionably, unstoppable.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: ...to get to the other side! Get it? Never mind...

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [sighs] [unenthusiastically] "As Daring Do trekked through the tropical jungle, the wet heat sapped her energy and slowed her every step. If only she could escape this oppressive atmosphere and fly up into the cool blue sky. But her crash landing in the jungle had injured her wing and she was grounded for a few days. Few days... it might as well be a few months, or a few years!" Huh. I'm right there with you, sister.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [voiceover] "The mosquitoes buzzed loudly. The macaws cried from the high trees. Yet all of these distracting noises were not enough to cover the sound of the predators following her every step."

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [voiceover, steadily getting more excited] "Safely landing on the other side, Daring finally allowed herself a moment to breathe. She turned around to find herself face to face with the long lost temple that she had sought tirelessly for over sixty days and nights!"

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: I hate to admit it to myself, and would really hate to admit it to my friends, but... I love this story! I, I... I love reading! I'm an egghead.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [voiceover] "The smell of decay and danger hit Daring Do as she peered into the dimly-lit entrance of the ancient temple."

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Phew!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Uh, hey, guys...

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: We thought we'd come and cheer you up!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: We brought your favorite board game!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: We know how much you like to win!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: You go first, Rainbow Dash!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [short nervous laugh] No no, you first.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Alright, uh... cloud three.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Aw, shucks, you... rained on my cumulus, heh. Go again!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Um... sky five?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Whoa, you found my seagull.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Uh... cloud two?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: But Rainbow Dash, you, you didn't even get a turn.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: You win some, you lose some.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: But you don't lose some. I don't think you've ever lost a game of<U+0097>

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [yawns] Thanks for coming!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: But yesterday you were desperate for things to do!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Glad we could... cheer you up?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Alright then.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: "Daring Do stood at the entrance to the central temple chamber."

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [voiceover] "At last, she was face-to-face with the legendary sapphire statue!"

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Hmm, there must be a pattern here. What do all these animals have in common? Ah-ha! These animals are all predators... except... rats! Phew!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: How's our patient doing today?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Ugh, we need to get some fresh air in here. You're lookin' sweatier than a pig wrangler on a summer's day.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Uh, well, guys, thanks for visiting, but<U+0097>

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Oh, just in time. I am sooo hungry.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Oh, well, don't mind us, Rainbow Dash.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Yeah, just go ahead and eat up.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Uh, on second thought<U+0097>

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Uh, we'll see you tomorrow, Rainbow Dash, aheh...

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [spits] "'You thought you could evade me and capture the relic for yourself, but you are sadly mistaken, Miss Do.'"

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Whoa! Who is this dude?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [pants] You won't get away with this, Ahuizotl!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [exasperated sigh] Not again...

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: H<U+0097> oh, good evening<U+0097>

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: <U+0097>morning. Doc.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Right now?! 'Right now' right now?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: But I don't feel better!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: How will I ever find out what happens to Daring Do?!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Is Ahuizotl going to get away with the statuette? What's gonna happen to Daring?! Ah-ha! Twilight has a copy of the book! Uh, but I can't ask her after I called her an egghead and all...

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Ugh, this is making me sick all over again!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Owww... [grunts in pain unrealistically] Oh, the pain... the pain!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Well, uh, my wing! It's still hurtin', Doc. Oh, ouch! Right there.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Uh, right. Well, I think that one's hurting now too.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: B-But, you got me all wrong, Doc! I'm not being lazy!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: What am I gonna do? I'll never get to sleep without knowing what happens to Daring Do! ...Which may not be such a bad thing...

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Feels like the harder I struggle, [grunts] the tighter the ropes get!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: I'm not trying to steal your slippers, I'm trying to steal this book!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Hey, nopony invited me!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Huh! Hasn't anypony heard of beauty sleep?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: What's all the ruckus?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Mmm, I'd say it's more of a fracas than a ruckus.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: What's going on, Rainbow Dash?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [sighs] I'm an egghead.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Pardon?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: See, I was trying to get back into the hospital to finish the last chapter of<U+0097>

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: <U+0097>'Daring Do and the Quest for the Sapphire Statue'!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: You got me.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Wow, I knew the book was good, but I didn't know it could drive a pony to petty theft!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Good? Try awesomely amazing. That book is undeniably, unquestionably, un-put-down-able! But then I had to put it down; I was sent home before I could finish it.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Well, I'm glad that's all this is about.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: There's no reason to go around causin' a ruckus<U+0097>

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Fracas!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: ...causin' a fracas just because you like to read.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Like I said, I have every book in the series, and you can borrow them all, any time you like!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Oh, thanks, Twilight. I'm sorry I made such a big deal about all of this. I thought reading was just for smart ponies like you.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Rainbow Dash, just because you're athletic doesn't mean you aren't smart!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Reading is something everypony can enjoy, if they just give it a try.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Yeah, I get it. I shouldn't knock something until I've tried it.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: That's a great lesson, and it would make a great letter to the Princess.

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [to Spike] Didja get all that?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Yeah?

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [takes deep breaths] Another day, another dungeon!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: I'll take that!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: Better luck next time, Ahuizotl!

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: [voiceover] "And so, with Ahuizotl defeated, and the sapphire statue secured..."

title: Read It and Weep
dialog: "...The world was safe and sound once again, thanks to Daring Do!" [sighs in admiration] 'Daring Do and the Griffon's Goblet'. Awesome!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Hmm... I just don't feel like it's quite finished.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I know what you mean. If it's for Miss Cheerilee, it needs to be perfect. Hearts and Hooves Day only comes once a year, after all.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I say we add a little more ribbon!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Mm-hmm, yeah, yeah. And just a tiny bit more lace.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: A few more hoof-prints.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Glitter! It could definitely use just a little more glitter!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Now that'll show Miss Cheerilee how much we care about her. Just have to get it to the Hearts and Hooves party at school.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I think we're gonna need a bigger envelope.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I like the red ones.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: It's lovely. And so... big!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: We just wanted to let you know that we think you're the best teacher in the whole wide world! And we think you're super! And that we love you so so much! And we want you to have the best Hearts and Hooves Day<U+0096>

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Thank you so much, girls. I love it. I really do.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I'm sure it's nothing compared to the gifts you've gotten from your... very special somepony.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Oh, I don't have a very special somepony at the moment.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Really?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: How could somepony as amazing as you not have a very special somepony on Hearts and Hooves Day?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: It's alright, Sweetie Belle. I have lots of good friends and wonderful students who care about me very much. I'm gonna have an absolutely terrific Hearts and Hooves Day. Alright, everypony, who's ready to play "Pin the Heart on the Pony"?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: If anypony deserves a very special somepony, it's her.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Uh, you all right?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I'm more than all right. I've just come up with the best idea ever. We're gonna find Miss Cheerilee a very special somepony.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: That is the best idea ever.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: [singsong voice] Tooold yooou!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: So what are we waiting for? Hearts and Hooves Day is almost over! Let's get out there and find somepony special for Cheerilee already.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Yeah!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Let's do it!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Now it can't be just anypony. Miss Cheerilee is one of the best mares in Ponyville. She deserves to have one of the best stallions as her very special somepony.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Cheerilee is sweet and kind, She's the best teacher we could hope for. The perfect stallion you and I must find One to really make her heart so-o-oar. But... This one's too young, This one's too old. He clearly has a terrible cold.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: This guy's too silly. He's way too uptight.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Well nothing's wrong with this one, He seems alright...

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: His girlfriend sure thinks so.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: How 'bout this one?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: He's much too flashy.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: He might do!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Too short.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Too tall.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Too clean.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Too smelly.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Too strangely obsessed with tubs of jelly.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I don't think that we're mistaken, It seems all the good ones are taken.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I really feel that at this rate, We'll never find the perfect date.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Doing anything special for Hearts and Hooves Day?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Oh please, oh please oh please say-

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Nope.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: We did it girls, We've found the one, Who will send our teacher's heart aflutter!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Wait a minute. Lemme get this straight. Are you talkin' 'bout my brother?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Sweetie Belle is right. Big McIntosh is the perfect match for Miss Cheerilee. He's really nice, super hard-working.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Hmm... but he's also pretty shy. He's never gonna ask Miss Cheerilee to be his very special somepony.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Maybe he doesn't have to.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Huh?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: If we can get Big Mac and Miss Cheerilee in a really romantic setting, I bet she'll ask him.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Sounds like a plan to me.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: So? What are we waitin' for? Let's get out there and create the perfect date!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Flowers. Don't forget the flowers.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Oops. I'm on it!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: [gasp] They're coming! This is gonna be perfect. Miss Cheerilee is gonna have the best Hearts and Hooves Day ever.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: With her new very special somepony.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Hi, girls.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: So you three said you needed help identifying a tree you found here near the gazebo?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: [dryly] That's an apple tree.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Is it?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Oh, sorry, big brother. We went and fixed up the gazebo all on our own. See?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: As long as you're here, why not have a bite to eat from this romantic-looking picnic? Oh gosh, seems like there's only room for two.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I guess we'll just be goin' then.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: You really think this'll work?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Of course it will work. They're perfect for each other.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Beautiful day we're having.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Any big plans for tonight?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Nnnope.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Oh, come on, Miss Cheerilee, ask him to be your very special somepony.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: [gasp] Ohmigosh, look.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Big Mac...

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Eeyup?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: You have something stuck in your teeth.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Aw, come on!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Well this has been... strange.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I need to get going, but it's always great running into a good friend.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Yup.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: [sigh] Do you think it just wasn't romantic enough?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Maybe it was too romantic.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: [sigh] Either way, we failed.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: [sigh] There's gotta be somethin' else we could<U+0096> UGH!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Oh my goodness, I didn't even see you there. I'm so so sorry.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Aw, it's okay, Twilight. It was an accident.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I've just been reading the most fascinating book about Hearts and Hooves Day. Did you know that this holiday got its start because of a love potion?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Did you say... a love potion?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: That's right. It even has the recipe.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I... don't suppose we could borrow that book for a little while, do ya?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Of course you can. I have another book here that I think you'll<U+0096>

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: [giggling] Take a tuft of cloud;

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: A bright rainbow's glow;

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Stir with a Pegasus feather<U+0096>

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Hey!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Fast, not slow.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Serve to two ponies who aren't in the know.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I feel kind of bad trickin' my brother and Miss Cheerilee this way.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: What's the problem? We all agreed these two are perfect for one another.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Yeah, they just need a little nudge.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: And what could make them happier than being together, right?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Right!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Oh, oh, here they come.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Hiya, Miss Cheerilee.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Hello again, girls. Hello, Big Mac. Would you three like to tell us why it was so very important that we meet you here<U+0096>

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Punch!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Excuse me?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Punch! We made punch. We were gonna set up a stand and try to sell it but, heh, we needed somepony to taste-test it first.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Yup.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I'm very sorry about this. I mentioned to the girls that I don't have a very special somepony, and I believe they're putting us in these awkward situations because they've decided it should be you.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I suppose we should just humor them for a moment. This punch does look delicious.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I think they're gonna drink it.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: To good friends!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: They're drinking it. They're drinking it!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: They're looking into each other's eyes.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Big Mac?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Yup?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Will you be my very special somepony?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: YES!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: He's my special somepony.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Eeeeeyup.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: He's my shmoopy-doopy sweetie-weetie pony pie.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: You're my shmoopy-doopy sweetie-weetie pony pie.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Did he just say<U+0096>

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: You're my cutie-patootie lovie-dovie honey-bunny.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: You're my heartie-smartie smoochie-woochie baby-waby.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Big Mac! Hey! Hello! What's going on?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Miss Cheerilee, are you alright?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I have a special somepony. A kissy-wissy snuggy-wuggy sugar bear.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: I think we may have given them too big of a nudge.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: You're my cuddly-wuddly boopsie-woopsie pumpkin pie.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Ya think?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: What have we done?! My brother's actin' like a grade-A goofball!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Maybe we added too much rainbow.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Or maybe not enough cloud.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Or maybe... uh-oh.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Whaddaya mean, "uh-oh?!"

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: We might not have given Big Mac and Miss Cheerilee a love potion. We may have given them a love poison.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Apparently, some prince a long time ago whipped up this recipe and gave it to this princess he liked. He meant it to be a love potion, but things didn't turn out so well.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: How "not so well" did things turn out?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Well, there's something here about a dragon, the kingdom falling, chaos reigning... Okay, apparently it was all because the prince and princess were so lost in each other's eyes that they couldn't perform their royal duties.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Great! We've not only turned Big Mac and Miss Cheerilee into a couple of nonsense-spoutin' nincompoops, we may have put all of Ponyville in jeopardy!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Come on, Apple Bloom. Miss Cheerilee and Big Mac don't have any royal duties.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: But they still got responsibilities. If we don't fix this... Oh no, Miss Cheerilee won't be able to teach. Big Mac won't be able to harvest any apples, and before you know it... Ponyville will be overrun with uneducated little ponies starvin' for apples. Oh, it'll be chaos! It'll be chaos!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: There's an antidote!

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Well, why didn't you say so? Didn't you see me gettin' all panicked back there?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: If we can keep Miss Cheerilee and Big Mac from looking into each other's eyes for one full hour, the love curse will be broken.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Only an hour? Pfh, we can pull that off in a second.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: You take the first sip, snuggle-wuggles.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: No, you take it, schnoodle-dumplin'.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: No, you, shnooky-lumps.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: No, you, pookie-pie.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Mrs. I'm all for romance, but this has been going on for hours. What's happened to these two?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: [nervous chuckle] Who knows?

title: Hearts and Hooves Day
dialog: Mrs. Well, these lovebirds will probably be planning a wedding soon. I can always use the catering business.

title: Hearts and Hooves Day

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: One bit.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: One bit!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: One bit!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Two bits!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Two bits!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: I insist it's two bits or nothing!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Have it your way, one bit it is!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: See? Asserting yourself can be fun!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: I guess you're right!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: So, Fluttershy, do you feel like giving it a try?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Um... okay. [to self] I need that cherry. [to Crafty Crate] Boy, am I glad you have one cherry left. You see, I'm making this special meal for my bunny Angel. He's a very picky eater, and the recipe calls for a cherry on top.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Here you go.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Oh, yes, I'm desperate for it!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
