dialog: Ten?! Oh, hey, mister handsome, I know you wanna do the right thing because you're handsome and strong, and big, handsome, strong guys are always nice to everypony, right?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Ten bits for one cherry's outrageous! I insist on paying you... eleven bits!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Umm...I mean, nine bits!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Okay, twelve bits, but that's my final offer!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: It's twelve bits, take it or leave it.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Don't give him your money! One cherry is not worth twelve bits!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: But... I was only doing what you did.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: It was a valiant effort, but you should refuse to give him your business and just walk away.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: But... I can't let Angel starve! He won't eat it unless I make it just right! I need that cherry no matter what it costs!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Twenty?! Oh, but, I don't have that much!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Ta-da! Here you go, Angel. Sorry there's no cherry on top, but the rest of it is exactly what you wanted. Angel? [sighs] Look at me... I really am a doormat. "The incredible Iron Will turns doormats into dynamos. Assertiveness seminar today, hedge maze centre." As Celestia is my witness, I'm never gonna be a pushover again!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: [kissing] Welcome, friends! My name is Iron Will, and today is the first day of your new life! I wanna hear you stomp if you're tired of being a pushover!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Stomp if you're tired of being a doormat!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Stomp if you wanna pay nothing for this seminar!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: That's no joke, friends. Iron Will is so confident that you will be one hundred percent satisfied with Iron Will's assertiveness techniques, that if you are not one hundred percent satisfied, you. Pay. Nothing. But I pity the fool who doubts Iron Will's methods! You don't doubt me, do you?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: That, my friends, is your first lesson. "Don't be shy; look 'em in the eye."

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Now, to demonstrate that Iron Will's techniques will work for anypony, I'm gonna need a volunteer.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: You in the back row!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Who, me?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Yes, you! Iron Will wants you onstage!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: [gulps] Uh, well...

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Now!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: [whispering] Okay.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Whoaa! He's blocking your path. What are you gonna do about it?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Um, politely walk around him?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: No.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Gingerly tip-toe around him?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: No!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Go back home and try again tomorrow?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: No! "When somepony tries to block, show them that you rock!"

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Oh! Sorry.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Don't be sorry! Be assertive! "Never apologize when you can criticize." [clears throat] why don't you watch where you're going!? Now, you try.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Uh... next time, get out of the way before... I bump into you, 'cause... I totally won't be sorry when I do!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: You see my friends!? If my techniques can work for this shy, little pony, then they can work for anypony!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Okay, I feel good. I feel ready to "attack the day", as Iron Will says.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Excuse me, Mr. Greenhooves, but I-I think you might be over-watering my petunias...

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: ...again.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: "Treat me like a pushover, and you'll get the once over."

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Thank you. [excited giggle] I can't believe it worked!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Go ahead, try one of your jokes out on me. I laugh at everything.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: [clears throat] Excuse me? Would you mind moving your carts so I can pass?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: A-hemmmm, can you move? You're blocking my path.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: "When somepony tries to block, show them that you rock!"

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Good!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Who's next please? And what can I get for you today?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: What do you think you're doing?! Didn't you see me?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: 'Maybe'? "Maybes are for babies!" [growling] Now go to the back of the line where you belong!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Heyyy, look at you!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Oh, your attitude is so feisty, it's fabulous.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Looks like that monster's workshop really paid off!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Iron Will's not a monster. He's a minotaur, and a true inspiration. His techniques really work.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Well, they've certainly made a difference in the way you carry yourself. You truly are a whole new Fluttershy.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Yes I am. And new Fluttershy feels pretty stoked about new Fluttershy.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: "You laugh at me, I wrath at you!"

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Bye, girls. What a day. Taxi! Oh no you don't. "Cut in line, I'll take what's mine!"

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Nopony pushes new Fluttershy around! [screams] Nopony!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Old Pinkie Pie is not so sure new Fluttershy is such a good idea after all.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Old Rarity agrees.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: You got this, new Fluttershy! This day is yours! And nopony's gonna take it away from you! Am I right?! Right! What?! He's delivered the wrong mail, again!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: And new Fluttershy does not want the wrong mail delivered to her cottage.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: "You apologize, I penalize!"

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: [growls] "You make me lose, I blow my fuse!"

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Fluttershy! What are you doing?! That's no way to behave!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Didn't you see what he did to new Fluttershy? And he thought new Fluttershy was a pushover!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: No, sweetie, he didn't. We saw the whole thing. We think that you've taken your assertiveness training a little too far.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: What?! You just want new Fluttershy to be a doormat like old Fluttershy! But old Fluttershy is gone!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: New Fluttershy? Old Fluttershy!?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: What happened to nice Fluttershy? We want that Fluttershy back.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: No, you want wimp Fluttershy. You want pushover Fluttershy. You want do-anything-to-her-and-she-won't-complain Fluttershy!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Nyaaaaah! Too many Fluttershys to keep track of! Make it stop!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Things getting too complicated for your simple little brain, Pinkie Pie?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Now, stop right there! Let's not let things descend into petty insults!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Why not? I thought 'petty' was what you're all about, Rarity. With your 'petty' concerns about fashion.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Hey, leave her alone! Fashion is her passion!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Oh, and what are you passionate about? Birthday cake? Party hats? I can't believe that the two most frivolous ponies in Ponyville are trying to tell new Fluttershy how to live her life when they are throwing their own lives away on pointless pursuits that nopony else gives a flying feather about!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: [starts crying] Looks like nasty Fluttershy is here to stay!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: [starts crying] I cannot believe what that monster Iron Will has done to you!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Iron Will's not a monster, he's a minotaur! [growls] [whimper] I'm the monster.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: [knocks, clears throat] Fluttershy, are you in there?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: It's Pinkie Pie and Rarity!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: [muffled] Go away! Go away before nasty Fluttershy strikes again!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Oh, sweetie, we all said things that we regret.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: We did?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Shh.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: [muffled] Pinkie's right. I'm the only one to blame. [normal] But don't worry, I'm never coming out of my house again. Everypony will be a lot safer with me and my mean mouth locked away.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: [muffled] Sweetie, [normal] Pinkie Pie doesn't blame you, nor do I. You just received some bad advice from that Iron Will character.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Yeah! He's the one that made you act super-duper nasty. What I mean is, there are other ways to assert yourself besides yelling at everypony.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Yes! [muffled] You can stand up for yourself without being unpleasant about it.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: I-I'm not sure I can. I'm too far gone. Whenever I try to assert myself, I become a monster.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Oh, sweetie, you're not a monster.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: No, but he is.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Iron Will's my name, training ponies is my game.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: What a darling little catchphrase.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Your friend Fluttershy loved Iron Will's catchphrases. Word on the street is that she doesn't take no guff from nopony! So, Iron Will is here to collect Iron Will's fee.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Fluttershy is in no shape to deal with that creep!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: [gasps] I'm sure a big, brave, powerful, and rich monster<U+0096> I mean, minotaur like you doesn't need that money right away. You can afford to come back later.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Are you kidding? Fluttershy is overdue as it is. Iron Will collects now.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Do something!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: We're not even sure Fluttershy is home right now. Uh, she might be off frolicking with some woodland creatures. Uh, why don't you give us some time to track her down for ya?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Iron Will does have some grocery shopping to do. Iron Will will come back this afternoon.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: But that's only half a day. We need one full day at least.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Iron Will will delay for half a day and no longer!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: A full day!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Half day!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Full day!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Half day!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Half day!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Full day!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: We need half a day and no more!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Well, you'll get a full day and no less!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Okie-dokie. See you tomorrow.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Wait, what?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Huh, sounds like the search won't be necessary. Iron Will collects now.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: But we had an agreement! You gotta come back tomorrow!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: "When somepony tries to block, show them that you rock!"

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: [snorts] You were nothing but a doormat, and Iron Will turned you into a lean, mean, assertive machine! Now, pay Iron Will what you owe Iron Will!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Um, no.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: What did you say?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: No.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: As I recall, during your workshop you promised one hundred percent satisfaction guaranteed, or you pay nothing. Well, I'm not satisfied.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: What do you mean you're not satisfied?! Everypony has always been satisfied!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Well, I guess I'm the first then. But since I'm not satisfied, I refuse to pay. It's as simple as that.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Ohh, are you... sure you're not just a little bit satisfied? B-because maybe... we could cut a deal. I-I mean we're both reasonable creatures, aren't we?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: I'm sorry, but no means no.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: No means no, huh? Nopony's ever said that to me before. Huh... I gotta remember that one. That's a good catchphrase for my next workshop.

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: You were amazing, Fluttershy! You totally stood up to that monster!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: In fact, you didn't change at all! You were the same old Fluttershy that we've always loved!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: The one we missed!

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Don't worry, old Fluttershy's back for good. I'm sorry I took the whole assertiveness thing too far. Friends?

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Putting Your Hoof Down
writer: Merriwether Williams; story by Charlotte Fullerton
dialog: Sometimes it can be hard for a shy pony like me to stand up for myself, and when I first tried it, I didn't like the pony I became. But I've learned that standing up for yourself isn't the same as changing who you are. Now I know how to put my hoof down without being unpleasant or mean.

title: It's About Time
dialog: [sighs] I made it for you, Rarity. Why, yes, it is an ice cream house. Chocolate fudge shingles... rocky road garage...

title: It's About Time
dialog: Huh? Twilight?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Oh, hi, Spike!

title: It's About Time
dialog: It's the middle of the night! Why are you pacing like this?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Frankly, I don't know how you can sleep at a time like this!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Three A.M.?

title: It's About Time
dialog: It's awful, it's horrible, it's tragic!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Eh... I don't understand. What's wrong?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Here. Now do you see what's wrong?

title: It's About Time
dialog: We forgot to celebrate Arbor Day?

title: It's About Time
dialog: No, the problem is I just finished planning my schedule for the month, but I forgot to leave time to plan for next month! Don't you see? There's no time in my schedule to put together another schedule! I could move my meeting with the Ponyville Hay Board to the following Tuesday, but then I have to reschedule my lunch with Pinkie Pie, and you know what a nightmare she is with scheduling. This is an absolute disaster. My whole year could be thrown off!

title: It's About Time
dialog: And I woke up from an ice cream dream for this...

title: It's About Time
dialog: Oh, my gosh, I think I did it! If I can find a way to read "The Art of Invisibility Spells" and "Thornhoof's Brief History of Canterlot" at the same time, that could leave me a half-hour scheduling window! Huh?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Who are you? I mean, you're me, but I'm me too. How can there be two me's? It's not scientifically possible. You are not scientifically possible!

title: It's About Time
dialog: You're from the future?!

title: It's About Time
dialog: What happened to you? The future must be awful.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Is there some sort of epic pony war in the distant future or something?

title: It's About Time
dialog: I can't believe time travel is really possible! How did you, I mean, I figure it out?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Really? Where? I've never seen them.

title: It's About Time
dialog: C'mon, Fluttershy! The party can't start until the party supplies get there!

title: It's About Time
dialog: [grunts] Happy to... help... but... can I carry... the balloons next time?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Oh!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Listen, everypony! I've got something really important to say!

title: It's About Time
dialog: This is no laughing matter! We have a crisis on our hooves!

title: It's About Time
dialog: I've just been visited by myself from the future!

title: It's About Time
dialog: This isn't a joke! My future self tried to warn me about a horrible disaster that's going to occur sometime before next Tuesday morning!

title: It's About Time
dialog: What kind of disaster?

title: It's About Time
dialog: I don't know! I got sucked back into the future before I could explain!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Run for your liiiiiiiife!

title: It's About Time
dialog: What ever should we do, Twilight? How do we stop the disaster if we don't know what it is?

title: It's About Time
dialog: We'll just have to work together to make sure we're safe. Rainbow Dash, you and the other Pegasi spread out over Equestria, and look for any kind of problem that could lead to a disaster, and I mean anything.

title: It's About Time
dialog: You got it!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Everypony else<U+0096>

title: It's About Time
dialog: Everypony else, time to disaster-proof Equestria!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Eeyup.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Done, and done, and done. Applejack, what about the Everfree Forest?

title: It's About Time
dialog: The perimeter's clear.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Great.

title: It's About Time
dialog: And my team gave the all clear from Fillydelphia to Las Pegasus.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Excellent. Well, we've done everything on the list, but still... Future Twilight looked like she'd been through a horrible ordeal. I just have this nagging feeling we should be looking for something bigger than loose bolts and leaky pipes.

title: It's About Time
dialog: What is that thing?!

title: It's About Time
dialog: That's Cerberus! He's supposed to be guarding the gates of Tartarus. But if he's here, then all the ancient evil creatures that have been imprisoned there could escape and destroy Equestria!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Destroy Equestria?!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Yeah! Isn't it great? Hey, Cerberus! You look like you could use some obedience training! Magic obedience training!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Huh?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Who's the cute widdle three-headed dog?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Wow, I knew you were good with animals, but this is amazing!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Aww, he's just a big furry guy who got out of his yard, that's all. Right, Cerberus? Who's a good boy? Who's a good boy?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Pinkie.

title: It's About Time
dialog: [stops screaming] Yes, Twilight?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Do you have a ball I can borrow?

title: It's About Time
dialog: I have balls stashed all over Ponyville, in case of ball emergency.

title: It's About Time
dialog: [sing-song voice] Hey, Cerberus! Look what I have!

title: It's About Time
dialog: I'll be back as soon as I've returned him to the gates of Tartarus. Once he's back at home, there'll be no disaster.

title: It's About Time
dialog: [yawns] I wish Twilight would go on epic adventures more often. Best night's sleep I've had in weeks.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Hey, Twilight. How'd it go with Cerberus?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Great. I got him back before any of the evil creatures could escape.

title: It's About Time
dialog: [yelps] Oh no!

title: It's About Time
dialog: What's the big deal, it's just a 'lost dog' flyer. I guess the Princess hasn't heard we found Cerberus yet.

title: It's About Time
dialog: It's not that, it's this!

title: It's About Time
dialog: A paper cut? Come on, Twilight, you really need to toughen up. Just clean it out and you'll be fine.

title: It's About Time
dialog: The cut's in the exact same spot as the scar on future Twilight's cheek! We haven't changed the future at all! The disaster is still coming!

title: It's About Time
dialog: If the disaster wasn't caused by Cerberus getting loose, then what could it possibly be?

title: It's About Time
dialog: [laughs] I dunno, but maybe you ought to give the pacing a rest. You've worn a groove into the floor!

title: It's About Time
dialog: I don't have time for another one of your lectures, Spike! This is serious!

title: It's About Time
dialog: My lectures?

title: It's About Time
dialog: I did everything I could think of to change the future. But it didn't work. So maybe it's not what I do... Maybe it's what I don't do!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Huh?

title: It's About Time
dialog: If I stand right here and don't move a muscle until next Tuesday, I can't possibly do whatever it is that future Twilight wanted to warn me not to do!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Really? So... no matter what happens, you're not gonna move a muscle, huh? Then maybe you won't mind if I... eat an entire tub of ice cream!

title: It's About Time
dialog: [through gritted teeth] Spike, stop! Think of the stomach ache!

title: It's About Time
dialog: [chuckles] Stomach ache, huh? That's future Spike's problem.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Hey, Twilight, another Pegasus just got back from Baltimare with an all-clear and<U+0096> [laughs] What's going on? Aren't you gonna stop him?

title: It's About Time
dialog: She sure isn't! In fact, she's not gonna move 'til next Tuesday! She thinks it'll prevent the disaster from happening!

title: It's About Time
dialog: [laughs] Oh, this is too rich. [gasps] Hey, Twilight! There's a mouse right behind you!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Oh no!

title: It's About Time
dialog: What happened?

title: It's About Time
dialog: I'm so sorry! I didn't mean to! It was a total accident!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Show me.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Uhhh... I'm not so sure that's a<U+0096>

title: It's About Time
dialog: Show me! Oh no! This is the same mane cut as future Twilight!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Y'know... it really doesn't look too bad...

title: It's About Time
dialog: I don't care how it looks! It's just another sign that the future hasn't changed! Not doing anything didn't work either! Oh, I wish there was a way to know what was going to happen so I could stop it!

title: It's About Time
dialog: You wanna see the future? I might know somepony who can help!

title: It's About Time
dialog: What's this?

title: It's About Time
dialog: It's Madame Pinkie's place.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Madame Pinkie?

title: It's About Time
dialog: [spookily] Come... Enter the chamber of Madame Pinkie Pie... For the answers you seek, let us consult the mystical orb of fate's destiny... [normal] Do you like my mystical orb of fate's destiny? I just got it. Cool, huh?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Yeah, uh... best one I've seen.

title: It's About Time
dialog: [spookily] Look deep into the crystal ball... for soon it will reveal all! Ah, yes, I see something... It is a vision of the future... I see... you, Twilight. You will get a really cool birthday present next year...

title: It's About Time
dialog: Yes, and?

title: It's About Time
dialog: That's it.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Are you sure?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Yep. Cool birthday present.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Pinkie, I need your Pinkie Sense to tell me what the impending disaster is that future Twilight was trying to warn me about!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Oh, my fortunetelling has nothing to do with my Pinkie Sense, silly. It's only good for vague and immediate events.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Like that, see? Where did that even come from?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Lalalalalalala, lalalala... Gosh, I haven't seen Twilight since the flowerpot incident. Hope she still isn't mad. Uhhhh...

title: It's About Time
dialog: Off by point zero two from yesterday. Carry the fifteen... Negative azimuth on the fourteenth moon...

title: It's About Time
dialog: Hey Pinkie.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Twilight's really serious about finding out about that cool birthday present, isn't she?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Who cares? As long as I can keep eating ice cream. Sorry, future Spike.

title: It's About Time
dialog: [to Twilight] Are... you okay?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Ah, Pinkie, I'm glad you're here. Can you help me recalibrate the apertures on the nine-and-quarter catadioptric telescopes?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Sure!

title: It's About Time
dialog: So I was thinking, after I came to see Madame Pinkie and the flowerpot landed on my head<U+0097>see the bandage? Just like the bandage from the future...

title: It's About Time
dialog: Nice!

title: It's About Time
dialog: I had an epiphany after that flowerpot. Doing things didn't work, not doing things didn't work, and I couldn't predict the future either, so I only had one other choice. Monitor everything.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Makes sense to me!

title: It's About Time
dialog: That way no matter what happens in the future, I'll be ready! I thought I saw something last night in the Horsehead Nebula, but after staring at it for three straight hours I realized, I was wrong!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Three hours? But when did you sleep?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Oh, I didn't sleep. I haven't slept since future Twilight was here. There are only three days left until next Tuesday, I can sleep all I want after that!

title: It's About Time
dialog: You've been awake too long, Twilight.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Yeah. Tuesday's not three days from now, Tuesday's tomorrow!

title: It's About Time
dialog: [gasps] Pinkie, did you finish recalibrating the apertures on the nine-and-quarter-inch catadioptric telescopes?

title: It's About Time
dialog: I have no idea!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Ah! My eye!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Don't worry, Twilight, I have eye patches stashed all over Ponyville, in case of eye patch emergency. There! Now you look like a pirate! A sleepy pirate, with a really weird mane cut.

title: It's About Time
dialog: The eye patch...! Another sign! Nearly all the signs have come true! I haven't done a thing to prevent the catastrophe! If Tuesday's tomorrow, and the disaster happens by Tuesday morning, then there's only one solution. I'll just have to... stop time!

title: It's About Time
dialog: [hushed] Okay, the Canterlot archives are right over there. Let's move!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Uhh... I don't think we need to sneak around, Twilight. It's not illegal to walk around Canterlot.

title: It's About Time
dialog: [hushed] Guard! C'mon, you guys! [exhales] That was close.

title: It's About Time
dialog: I dunno why we have to wear these things, either.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Aren't we wearing them for fun?

title: It's About Time
dialog: [hushed] No, there's nothing fun about this!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Oh... Are you sure?

title: It's About Time
dialog: [hushed] Focus, guys! The only way to prevent this disaster is to stop time! Time spells are kept in the Star Swirl the Bearded wing, the most secure section of the archives. That's why we're sneaking around!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Awesome! That sounds fun!

title: It's About Time
dialog: [hushed] No, it's not fun!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Aww.

title: It's About Time
dialog: I still don't understand how sneaking into the archives is gonna help her find out about her birthday present.

title: It's About Time
dialog: [hushed] The coast is clear. Now slowly lift me into the window so we can<U+0096> AH!

title: It's About Time
dialog: [sighs] Let's get this over with.

title: It's About Time
dialog: [hushed] Okay, if my calculations are correct, the Star Swirl the Bearded wing should be right... here.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Uh, Twilight?

title: It's About Time
dialog: [hushed] What is it, Spike?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Isn't this where we came in?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Cool! Can we climb in the window again? That was super fun!

title: It's About Time
dialog: I don't understand. It's supposed to be right here... How are we supposed to find it now?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Maybe we should ask somepony in the Star Swirl the Bearded wing?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Huh. How'd I miss that? Look at all those priceless magic scrolls. There are more than I ever imagined!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Twilight, the guard!

title: It's About Time
dialog: [gasps] What do we do, what do we do?!

title: It's About Time
dialog: [chuckles nervously] Thanks!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Oh no!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Oof!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Oh!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Look! I look just like future Twilight... The last sign has come true!

title: It's About Time
dialog: And that's bad, right?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Come on! It's almost Tuesday morning! The disaster could happen at any moment!

title: It's About Time
dialog: But how do we find the time-stopping spell? There must be a million scrolls here!

title: It's About Time
dialog: I. Don't. Know!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Twilight, it's over! It's officially Tuesday morning.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Nnngh, no! Tuesday morning, the disaster! Incoming!

title: It's About Time
dialog: I dunno, Twilight. I don't see any disasters. Looks like a pretty nice day.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Good morning, Twilight. Love the new hairstyle. Well, happy Tuesday!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Why isn't anypony surprised to see me sneaking around in here?! Is it possible there never was a disaster? That I've just been making myself frantic over nothing?!

title: It's About Time
dialog: I don't get it. If future Twilight wasn't warning you about a disaster, then what was she trying to tell you?

title: It's About Time
dialog: [giggles] I don't know. But I do know one thing. I look ridiculous.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Yeah, you do!

title: It's About Time
dialog: And it's all because I couldn't stop worrying and let the future handle itself! Well, not anymore. From now on, I'm gonna solve problems as they come, and stop worrying about every little thing!

title: It's About Time
dialog: That's great! Does that mean there won't be any more late night pacing?

title: It's About Time
dialog: No more late night pacing. If only I had learned this lesson a week ago, we wouldn't have had to go through all this.

title: It's About Time
dialog: Twilight, Twilight, I found something! It doesn't stop time, but it lets you go back in time. It says you can go back once, and it only lasts for a few moments. Does that help?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Pinkie, you're a genius!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Woo-hoo!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Now I can go back and tell past Twilight that she doesn't need to go berserk with worry about a disaster that's never gonna come!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Twilight, you've got to listen to me!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Twilight, please! I have a very important message for you from the future!

title: It's About Time
dialog: That's right, now listen<U+0096>

title: It's About Time
dialog: Please! I don't have much time!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Actually, I'm from next Tuesday morning, but that's not important right now!

title: It's About Time
dialog: The time spells are in the Canterlot archives. But that's not<U+0096>

title: It's About Time
dialog: They're in the Star Swirl the Bearded wing. Now, you have to listen to<U+0096>

title: It's About Time
dialog: I have something extremely important to tell you about the future, and I only have a few seconds, so you've got to listen! Whatever you do, don't<U+0096>

title: It's About Time
dialog: <U+0096>waste your time... worrying... about... Ugh! I can't believe I just did that!

title: It's About Time
dialog: Did you tell her about the cool birthday present?

title: It's About Time
dialog: Remember last week when future Twilight came to warn me about something? That was me trying to warn myself not to worry so much! Now I'm gonna spend the next week freaking out about a disaster that doesn't even exist! Ugh...

title: It's About Time
dialog: Ah, don't worry about it. It's past Twilight's problem now.

title: It's About Time
dialog: [giggles] Huh, I guess you're right, Pinkie.

title: It's About Time
dialog: [stomach growls] Ohhh... my stomach... I, I think it's all that ice cream... I thought the stomach ache would be future Spike's problem... but now I am future Spike. Ohh...

title: It's About Time
dialog: Come on, future Spike. Let's get you home.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: C'mon, Fluttershy, it'll be fun!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: There's nothing fun about dragons! Scary, yes! Fun, no!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: But Fluttershy, the great dragon migration happens only once in a generation! Do you really wanna pass up a chance like that?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Now that you put it that way, yes!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Aw, Fluttershy, we just don't want you to miss out.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Miss out on what? Dragons? Big, scaly, fire-breathing dragons?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Well... yeah!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Thanks, but... no thanks!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Look, Fluttershy, I watched that boring butterfly migration with you, so now it's your turn to watch the dragon migration with me! You owe me!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I... said... no!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Yeaagh! Ugh!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Okay, I guess I'll let you off the hook this time.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [hushed] I don't see any dragons.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [hushed] Me neither.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Me neither neither.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Shoot! You don't think we missed them, do you?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [hushed] No, I don't think so. We're just a little early, and I'm glad we are. This way, we can watch every moment of the migration without bringing any unwanted attention to ourselves!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Yoo-hoo! Well?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: What do you think? Am I the toast of the trench or what?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [hushed] You'll be toast alright, when the dragons see you parading around in that getup.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [hushed] You look very nice, Rarity, but could you maybe look nice down here in the trench with us?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Nice is an understatement. I look fabulous! Who says camouflage has to be drab?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [hushed] Ahoy, maties! Dragons ho!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Wow, amazing!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Pfft, pretty lame move. Is that all they've got?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [hushed] What do ya think of that 'move', Rainbow Dash? Still think they're lame?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [hushed] Uh, not so much. The word 'fierce' comes to mind.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [hushed] And 'formidable'.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [hushed] And 'super-duper scary'!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Yeah. Us dragons are definitely a force to be reckoned with.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [laughs] Yeah, right, Spike. That's one of the scariest aprons I've ever seen!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: What's wrong with wearing an apron? You won't be laughing when you spill blueberries all over your scales. Feathers. That's one tough stain!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: You leave him alone, Rainbow Dash! Spike's style is unique. He doesn't have to look like other dragons.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Or act like them.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: My little Spikey-wikey is perfect the way he is.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I don't act like other dragons?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oh, not even close!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: But why would you want to, Spike?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Yes. You've got something those dreadfully fierce dragons can only dream of.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: What's that?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: The cutest widdle chubby cheeks! Ooooo!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Cute?! Dragons aren't supposed to be cute! Right?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oh, sweetie, you are turning the most delightful shade of red. It is most becoming.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Rrrgh!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oh, isn't he adorable when he waddles off in anger?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Waddle?! Rrrrrggggh!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: What am I? Where am I from? Who am I supposed to be?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Uuugh! I don't know! For the last time, Spike, you were given to me as an egg. I don't know who found you or where they found you.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Seriously? That's all you know?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I'm sorry, Spike.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: That doesn't tell me anything about who I am! I need answers! I feel like I'm... I'm looking at a complete stranger. Oh!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oh, Spike. Why don't we do some late-night research? See what we can find out.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Really? You'd do that?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Of course! I'm sure we can find something.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Nothing. Nothing in this one either!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Nothing at all about dragons? This is getting ridiculous!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I know! It's hard to believe, but ponies know next to nothing about dragons. Apparently they're too rare and too scary to try to talk to or study!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I wonder if dragons cry...

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Aw, Spike.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: It's okay, Twilight. I'm gonna discover who I am if it's the last thing I do!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Yoo-hoo!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Hey, guys!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Waugh!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Good morning!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Ya wanna join us for breakfast?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: That sounds great. I'm famished.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Count me out. I've gotta get an early start!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: An early start?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Yes! I'm going on a quest of self-discovery! I need to learn what it means to be a dragon! And the only way I'm gonna do that is to join the dragon migration!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Spike, that's nonsense talk! I know that you're a dragon, but those dragons mean business! They're big, and tough, and scary...

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: And I'm small, and meek... and I like to wear aprons. See? This is exactly why I need to spend time with them.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: All I'm saying is that you could get hurt.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Darling, this time I really do have to agree with Rainbow Dash. I don't want those big, ugly, nasty dragons to hurt one little scale on your cutesy-wutesy head!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I'm sorry, but I've made up my mind.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oh, uh, quick, do something! Stop him before it's too late!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Ngh! Hey! Give it back!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Hold it!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Whoa!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Aaagh!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Really?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Don't tell me you think he should go?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Yes, Spike. I couldn't answer your questions. My books couldn't either. I understand why you want to look elsewhere. I truly believe you need to go on this quest. And we have no right to stop you.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I suppose not.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I still say you're nutty, but hey, I've done lots of nutty things.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [under her breath] Rrgh.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Well then, I guess this is goodbye, Spike. We can't wait to hear about it when you return.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Yeah, we hope your trip<U+0096>

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Quest.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: <U+0096>your quest answers some of your pesky "Who am I?" questions.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Thanks, everypony. I know it will.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Goodbye, Spikey-wikey!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Go get 'em, big guy!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: We have faith in you!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [through her grin] We're following him, right?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [through her grin] Of course.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Ugh!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Nngh...

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Alright, teenage dragons! Now that's more my speed. And size.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I'm telling you, we'll never pass for a real dragon!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oh, pish-posh! This costume is fabulous, one of my finer creations.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Shh! [hushed] We'll never pass if they hear three voices coming out of one dragon! Now come on, let's go!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Um, excuse me? Uh, hi. I'm Spike.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: No, it's Spike! I'm not, I mean, I'm sure about that...

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Not exactly...

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: No, I haven't sucked my claw in months!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Well, if you weren't just hatched, how come we haven't seen you around before?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oh, well, y'see, I live in Ponyville and<U+0096>

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Hahaha! Ponyville? That explains it! I knew there was something vaguely pony-ish about you! If I didn't know any better, I'd say you were part pony!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Who, me? I'm not part pony! I'm all dragon, see? Raar!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Or maybe you're a pony in a dragon costume.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [deep voice] Aheh... yeah... hilarious.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Nnh, I am a real dragon!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oh, yeah? Prove it.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Well... how?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: By acting like one! Who's up for a little belching contest?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: You think you can beat that, Peewee?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: From the desk of Princess Celestia. Dear Spike, please te<U+0096> Ha! Get this, guys! Spike's pen-pals with a namby-pamby pony princess!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [gasps] How can he just throw that away?! That letter could be something important!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: We can't worry about that now, Twilight. We're here to help Spike!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I know, I know!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: There's no reason to disrespect Princess Celestia that way!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Maybe tail wrestling is more your speed.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Uh...

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Ready... go!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: The winner!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Good old tail wrestling...

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: We can't let little Spikey-wikey wrestle one of them! He'll get clobbered!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Let's go! [deep voice] I challenge Spike to a tail wrestle!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Who's this weirdo?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oh, that would explain it. Ready? Go!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Spike's the winner!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Nice going, little Spike! Maybe you are a dragon after all!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Yeah! Maybe I am!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Rainbow Dash, I can't believe your silly plan actually worked. Ow.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Alright, who's next?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Getting a little cocky, huh? I like that. So how about you wrestle... him! Go!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Whooooooooa!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: So, Spike, you haven't exactly proven yourself as a dragon yet, have you?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: But... I get an A for effort?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Huh, maybe. Let's see how you do in this next contest.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Whaaaaa! Oof! Wha! Oah! Oof!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: King of the hoard!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: This is my chance.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Not so fast!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oof!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: King of the ho- whoa! Oof! Uh! Nuh! Oof!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Looks like this is another fail for you, little Spike. Can't wait to watch you fail at lava cannonball, too.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Whoever makes the biggest lava splash is the ultimate dragon! Geronimo!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Nuh!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [hushed] Spike's on his own this time.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Guh!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: What's wrong, Spike? You afraid the lava will hurt your soft pony hide?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Ugh... Was I... that bad?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: No, dude. That was awesome! No pony could live through a belly flop like that! [chuckles] You're one tough little dragon.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Spike, by belly flopping so hard, you have proven yourself worthy. I hereby dub you 'rookie dragon', and will now perform the initiation ritual. Rrrrgh. [chuckles] Now let's party dragon style!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Man, was that a great party.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Great? Huh, maybe by Ponyville standards. Stick with us, Spike. We still got plenty to teach you about being a dragon.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I'm not going anywhere. The way I feel right now, I could hang out with you guys forever.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Spikey-wikey is going to stay with these awful dragons? Forever?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oh no, this is terrible!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I should've stopped him back at the library when I had the chance!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: No, Rainbow Dash, this is all my fault! I encouraged him to go!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Y'know, Spike, I think you just might be ready for a real dragon raid.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: There's a nest full of phoenix eggs nearby, and we're gonna swipe 'em!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oh yeah, I'm excited. I mean, I'm psyched.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Alright then. Let's fly!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Uh, sorry, guys! I guess I'll meet you back here at the crater! After the whole raid thing's over? We'll totally hang then! Whoahoa!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oh no, they took Spike! We've gotta go after them!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [yelps] Rainbow Dash, stop! We can't fly!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: And you're ruining my fabulous costume!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I'm sorry, but we gotta help Spike!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Well, we're just gonna have to hoof it!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Alright, Spike. Since you're our rookie dragon, you get to lure the parents away from the nest.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Heh... Lucky me...

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Well go on, then!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Hey, Mr. and Mrs. Phoenix! I was hoping I could have a word with you? Um, I'd, um, like to ask you some questions actually...

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [hushed] We haven't got all day, Spike!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Hey, you bird brains! Come and get me!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: What the...

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: We take the hatchlings, of course!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Get 'em!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Ohh... Get them!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: [chuckles] Nnnghh...

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Nnngh, they got away! I hate that!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Huh, what have we got here? What happened?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: They got away! Hey! You stole an egg?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Uh...

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Well, I guess the raid wasn't a total waste after all.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Nice going, Spike.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Smash the egg?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: No! It's just a defenseless egg, like I was! And I'm not gonna let you hurt it!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: What did you say?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: I said no.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Nopony's gonna lay a claw on him!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: That's right!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Fighting's not really my thing, I'm more into fashion, but I'll rip you to pieces if you touch one scale on his cute little head!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Ooh, scary, hehe! Spike, are these namby-pamby ponies your friends?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Yes, they are. And they're better friends than you could ever be. Now, if you don't back off, you'll see what us ponies do when confronted by a huge group of jerky dragons.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Oh, yeah? [snorts] What's that?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Run away!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Nyuh!

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Phew, that was a close one. Thanks, you guys.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Of course. What are friends for?

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: You're more than friends. You're my family.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Seeing the great dragon migration made me wonder what it meant to be a dragon. But now I realize that who I am is not the same as what I am. I may have been born a dragon, but Equestria and my pony friends have taught me how to be kind, loyal, and true! I'm proud to call Ponyville my home, and to have my pony friends as my family.

title: Dragon Quest
dialog: Aww. [chuckles] Hey, welcome to the family, Peewee! Stick with me. I've got plenty to teach you about being a pony.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Calling all Pegasus ponies! Meeting tonight!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Library, tonight. Be cool or be mule. No offense.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: All right, go on in, find a seat. Ohh... You too, Fluttershy. Come on, let's go.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Uh... intermission?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: So, here's the scoop. Cloudsdale has chosen our own highland reservoir as a source of the rainwater they need for all of Equestria. And you know what that means. It means it's up to Ponyville's Pegasi to bring that water up to Cloudsdale.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Not only that, but Spitfire, captain of the Wonderbolts, will be here to oversee the water transfer and record our top tornado windspeed. Now last year, Fillydelphia broke the windspeed record with a top speed of nine hundred and ten wing power. But I think we can do better. I think we can get a top speed over a thousand!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: ...if each and every pony trains, and trains hard to get their wing power numbers up.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: That coughing better be from a popcorn kernel, Thunderlane. Nopony's getting sick on my watch. So, are we gonna train hard?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Are we gonna be strong?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Are we gonna be fast?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Record-smashing fast?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: YEAH!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Who's with me?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Fluttershy!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Stretch those glutes, Flitter! Nice flexibility, Cloud Chaser. A... little too much flexibility, Blossomforth. Uh, somepony give Blossomforth a hoof. Let's see some faster trotting, Thunderlane! Good pace, Silverspeed! [blows whistle] Keep it up! We're gonna need all the wing power we can get to break that record!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Good work, everypony! [under her breath] Everypony except Fluttershy.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: [knocking] Fluttershy? I know you're in there! You're avoiding tornado duty and I want to know why! Fluttershy, open<U+0096>

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Fluttershy, what happened to you?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Oh, you poor thing. You know, there's only one cure for pony pox.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: I know, plenty of bed<U+0096>

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Cold water! Those pony pox are clearing right up.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Oh, y'know, all of a sudden, I'm, I'm starting to feel better. [laughs nervously] I'll just get out of these robes and<U+0096> ow! Oh, my wing, oh, ow, it's hurt. I guess I can't fly after all<U+0096>

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Messed up wing, huh? Stop horsing around, Fluttershy. We've got a lot of training to do. Come on now, what's going on?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Well, y'see, uh, well... Oh, Rainbow Dash, I just can't do it! I can't fly!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: What are you talking about? Just last week you went into that wicked nose dive to save that falling baby bird right before it hit the ground!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: But that was different, that was an emergency! This whole tornado thing, it's more like a performance, and you know how I hate performing in front of others. Don't you remember flight camp? I couldn't gallop hard or fly fast, not with everypony looking at me!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: It wasn't that bad.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: You're right, Rainbow Dash, it wasn't bad. It was horrible!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: [voiceover] The other foals used to tease me, a lot!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: I just can't risk that sort of humiliation again.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Suck it up, Fluttershy! This is no time for<U+0096> I mean, confidence or no confidence, I'm gonna need every Pegasus to break the record, including you. I need every ounce of wing power I can get.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Oh, I-I don't think so, Rainbow Dash...

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: [sighs] Thanks anyway.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Wait. I'll do it.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: You will?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: I will.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: You're game?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: I'm game.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Alright!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: This is an anemometer. It measures your accelerative velocity and translates it into wing power, thus gauging your cumulative H2O anti-gravitational potential. Any other questions?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: It tells you how fast you're flying and how strong your wings are.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Is that you again, Thunderlane? Please, we need to have a germ-free environment.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Don't worry, Twilight. Thunderlane's just cooking up an excuse to spend tornado day in bed. Why don't you get over here and be our first test flyer, Thunderlane?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: We have 9.3 wing power.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: YEAH!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: 16.5 wing power!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Now listen up! If each of you can get your numbers up to at least 10.0 wing power by the end of the week, we'll no doubt set a new tornado speed record. We'll be number one!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: [hushed] Tell her!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: [hushed] No, you tell her!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: [hushed] No, you!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Um... great job, Fluttershy! You measured, uh, uh, .5.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: .5? Isn't that like... less than one?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Ow!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Fluttershy, wait! So some punks poked a little fun at you and you got stage fright, big deal. You aren't gonna go quit just because of that, are you?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: [crying] Yes!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: But I need you!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: I'm sorry, Rainbow Dash, I just [between sobs] don't have the courage right now...

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: [sniffles] Oh, thank you, but I'm afraid a couple of little acorns won't solve my big flying problem.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: I tried, but you should've seen those ponies laughing at me...

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: I know it's important to have confidence in myself...

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Yes, yes, I do remember. The river was swelling...

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: ...and you were scared...

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: ...yes, I did tell you to never give up... and to believe in yourself. You're right, my friends. I shouldn't give up. I will get my confidence up and show everypony that I am a good flyer! A great flyer!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: That's wonderful, Flitter. Much better than yesterday.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: This is crazy awesome! We're gonna smash that record!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: What did he say?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Do I look like I speak squirrel?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: What's that?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: 2.3? 2.3?! That has to be some kind of mistake! I worked so hard!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Fluttershy, that's a huge improvement!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: You did awesome, Fluttershy.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: No, I didn't. I thought I'd gotten over my nerves, but they still got the best of me! There's no way I'll fly with 10.0 wing power tomorrow!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: So you won't fly with 10.0 wing power. Every bit counts!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: How would you feel if everypony else was flying with 10.0 wing power and you were flying with 2.5?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Actually, it was only 2.3, and<U+0096> ow!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Well, uh... I'd feel... um...

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Exactly! Humiliated! [between sobs] I'm sorry, Rainbow Dash, I just can't do it!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: It's okay, Rainbow Dash, you've still got plenty of wing power for your tornado. You'll be able to lift tons of water up to Cloudsdale!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: [sighs] If only there was a way to lift Fluttershy out of the dumps.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Are we ready to do this?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Look!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Lazy Thunderlane! Where is he?! He's been trying to get out of tornado duty the whole time with his fake coughing and all. Rumble, where's your lazy brother?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: He's got the feather flu. He's down at Ponyville Hospital.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: But he's not the only one.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Let's see, with those eight sick Pegasi out with the feather flu... [gasp] Oh no!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Don't tell me we won't be able to break the windspeed record?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: No...

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Phew!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: ...You might not have enough wing power to create a tornado powerful enough to lift the water to Cloudsdale!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Well, should we pack up?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: No. Of course not. Forget the record. Cloudsdale still needs water! Okay, everypony! Let's give it all we've got! On the sound of the horn, we take off!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: You think they're gonna make it to eight hundred wing power?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: I sure hope so! One hundred and fifty wing power. Two hundred and fifty wing power. Five hundred wing power!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Seven hundred and fifty wing power!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Twilight!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Fluttershy! What are you doing here?!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: I figured... if I couldn't help Rainbow Dash with the tornado... the least I could do was offer moral support!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: She could sure use it, considering eight Pegasi are sick with the feather flu!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Oh no! That's terrible news!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Yaa<U+0096> oof!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Are you okay?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: [muffled] I'm fine!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Oh, you were so close to the eight hundred wing power minimum! I'm sorry, Rainbow Dash.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Rbbbb<U+0096> We've got to try again!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: But you've pushed your crew to their limit already!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: If you break apart again, somepony could get hurt! You should quit, it's not safe!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: No! One more time! I've gotta know we gave it our all! If I'm going down, I'm going down flying! C'mon, ponies, let's make this happen!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: YEAH!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Okay, here we go... One hundred wing power! Two hundred! Five hundred!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Stay in position! Flap those wings! Faster!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Seven hundred! Seven hundred and fifty wing power!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: [yelps] They fell apart right after this!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Oh, I'm too nervous to look!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: C'mon! Just a little harder! I can see the water trying to funnel through!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Seven ninety five! We are so close! Fluttershy, they need you up there!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: I won't make a difference!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: You can make a difference!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: My measly 2.3 wing power is still too little!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: It's sticking at seven ninety five! I don't know if they've got any more in 'em!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Do it for Equestria! Do it for Rainbow Dash! Do it for yourself!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: It's moving! She's doing it! Seven ninety eight! She surpassed her best wing power number!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: No!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: She did it! She did it! They all did it!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Whoa, girl, take it easy!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Whuh, what? Did we do it?

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Yeah, we did it! You did it!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Nice job, Rainbow Dash. You may not have set a new record, but you showed a lot of guts.

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Thanks, but if you wanna talk guts, then you've gotta give it to my number one flyer, Fluttershy! Let's hear it for Fluttershy!

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Hurricane Fluttershy
dialog: Sometimes you can feel like what you have to offer is too little to make a difference, but today, I learned that everypony's contribution is important, no matter how small. If you just keep your head high, do your best, and believe in yourself, anything can happen.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Can you believe Featherweight got his cutie mark? Featherweight! Before us!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Great cutie mark, Featherweight!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [chuckles] Looking good!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: I give up...

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: I've got it! The answer to all our problems!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: The Foal Free Press? How's the school paper gonna get us our cutie marks?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Move your caboose!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Uh-oh. That's Granny Smith. Gotta run!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Maybe there's something to this newspaper idea.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Guess it's worth a shot...

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Apple Bloom. Your newspaper idea was nothing but a big bust.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We tried everything, from papier-m<e2>ch<e9> to making birds' nests, and nothing worked.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: What's so funny?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: What I meant was, we should write for the paper! We can get our cutie marks as journalists!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Okay, class, see you tomorrow! Oh, for those of you who want to join the newspaper staff, stay here, because we're meeting right now!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Cutie marks in journalism!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Such a good idea.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Welcome, everypony. Now, as you know, our editor-in-chief graduated last year<U+0096>

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Oh, oh, oh, ohohohoh!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Yes?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: What's an editor-in-chief?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Good question, Sweetie Belle. I like those reporter's instincts. The Foal Free Press is a student-run paper. I'm only involved as an adviser, so the editor-in-chief is the pony in charge, from choosing the stories to making sure it gets to press on time. Now, as I said, we have a new editor this year!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Hm.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: I'll leave you alone now to discuss everypony's assignments. Have fun!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Alright, listen up. The Foal Free Press is a joke.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Nopony at this school takes it seriously. Well I, the editor-in-chief in charge, am going to deliver us to newfound glory!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: First things first. Where's the staff photographer? Get out there and document everything. I'll decide what's important.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: The rest of you, I want hard-hitting news and interesting think pieces. No more Namby-Pamby stories like last year's editor.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Well, there's a new regime now, and I want juicy stories. The juicier, the better! Now get out there and report!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Let's get out of here, girls. Maybe we can try packing boxes again.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: But this could be our last chance to earn our cutie marks! If we really are supposed to be journalists, isn't it worth a little grief?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: I guess you're right. We can take a little bit of Diamond Tiara for a lifetime of cutie marks.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: C'mon! Let's go get these marks!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [voiceover] My first story's going to be an exclusive interview.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [voiceover] I saw a brand new nest of baby birds the other day. I bet our readers would eat up a sweet story like that!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [voiceover] Granny Smith has all sorts of great stories! I reckon I'll do a piece on the history of Ponyville.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: I hope you've got something, because everything so far is unusable. "Baby Birds Born"? "Rarity's Hot New Hat"? "Ponyville: The Early Years"!? Oh! I don't know what you call this, but it sure isn't news!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We just... thought...

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Get something else on my desk by the end of the day, and it better be juicy!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Now what? Do you know what I had to do to get that story?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Oh, you don't even wanna know what I had to sit through.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Oh! Get it off me, Snails!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Eh, you get it off me, Snips?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Aah! Stop it! You are making it worse! Nah! Oh, great.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Aah!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Get it off! Get it off!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [giggles] Hey, Featherweight, c'mere! [giggles] Take a few pictures of this, then meet me during lunch. Girls, I have our story.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Our mothers always told us we'd end up in the papers someday.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Your column is a sensation! I don't want you doing news anymore. I want more columns like this. Columns about ponies and their private lives, the things they do when they think they're alone. You three are my new gossip columnists! And I love the way you signed it! "Gabby Gums"... [sigh] That was a stroke of genius!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We couldn't fit all of our names, so we decided to create one for all three of us.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Well, I want more Gabby Gums! Nice work, girls.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: But we sure seem to have a gift for gossip.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: If we can write a few more of these Gabby Gums columns, we'll earn our cutie marks for sure!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Woo-hoo!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Scootaloo? Do you have anything?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Nope.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Apple Bloom?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [sighs] Sorry.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Let's face it, nothing very juicy happens at this school.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We're doomed.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Ohh, Sweetie Belle... Was she raised in a barn or something? [gasps] Oh, you really shouldn't be snooping, Rarity... Oh, but it's so much fun, Rarity. Hello... what's this? [giggles] Gum on their bum! [laughs] Too rich!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Can you please keep it down with all the laughter? I'm trying to<U+0096> hey!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Bleh! I, I was just<U+0096>

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Are you snooping through my saddlebag?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: How dare you!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Oh, but this Gabby Gums column is so funny!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: You actually like the school paper?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: It's so much juicier than anything in the boring old Ponyville Express. Could I borrow this to show my friends?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Your friends would wanna read the Foal Free Press?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Oh, they'd just love Gabby Gums! Who is she, anyway? I've never heard of her before. Is she a new<U+0096>

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We gave up too quickly, girls. Forget trying to squeeze stories out of this school. We need to expand!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We can find all kinds of great gossip out there in Ponyville!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We'll need to tell Featherweight to start working overtime.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Sweetie Belle, you're a genius!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: "Pound and Pumpkin Cake Trip to the Store Ends in Tears." Gabby Gums comes through again!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Send 'em twenty copies, and if they run out of those, we'll send 'em twenty more! You three are doing a great job for this paper. Keep those columns coming!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: This is great!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Oh, this is the life, isn't it, girls? The best hooficure I've ever had!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [voice vibrating] You said it, ooh...

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [sighs] I don't know if I've ever been so relaxed.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: You guys!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Aaah!

title: Ponyville Confidential
