dialog: The new Gabby Gums just came out! "The Great and Powerful Trixie's Secrets Revealed!"

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We already read that one, Rainbow Dash. Come on, relax, have a hooficure, it feels amazing.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [swallows] Did you forget who you're talking to? The day I get a hooficure is the day I turn in my daredevil license. Besides, I haven't read this Gabby Gums yet.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Well, do it quietly, will ya? [sigh] Some of us are trying to unwind!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: I like Gabby Gums too, but don't you think she can be a little mean?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: She's not mean, Twilight, she's a hoot!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: "Celestia Just Like Us"? Gabby Gums doesn't value anypony's privacy.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Oh, lighten up, Twilight, it's nothing but harmless gossip!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Yeah, Twilight, I mean listen to this one. "Mayor Not Naturally Gray!" The Mayor in a mane dyeing scandal? Who wouldn't wanna read that?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: I just can't help feeling sorry for the ponies featured in her columns. It's gotta be a little embarrassing.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Are you kidding? Do you know how awesome it is to get your name in the paper?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Rainbow, why don't you join me in one of these delicious hooficures?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: It's that good, huh? Well, maybe just one little hoof.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [yelps] Forget it, I don't like ponies touching my hooves. Man... I'd love it if Gabby Gums did a story on me.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: She did one on me.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Aaaah!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: "Exclusive! Local Dragon Tells All! Spike opens up about Canterlot, naps, and his favorite jams!"

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: It's our best column yet!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: More like your worst column yet! Gabby Gums didn't become the biggest thing in Ponyville with namby-pamby stories like this!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [sighs] Yeah, she's right. This column is a little softer than our usual gossip.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Were you guys feeling guilty about all the gossip too? Like... maybe we could be hurting other ponies' feelings?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Yeah, I didn't wanna say anything because everypony loves Gabby Gums so much, but... I was sorta hoping we could start writing more stories like this one.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Me too.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: If we're gonna get our cutie marks, we've got to give the ponies what they want.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Awww...

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: "Applejack Asleep on the Job!" Can y'all believe this?! And this one: "Big McIntosh <U+0096> What's He Hiding?" Who the hay does this Gabby Gums think she is?!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Listen to this one. "Twilight Sparkle: I Was a Canterlot Snob. A well-placed scaly source close to the prissy pony says Twilight Sparkle thinks Ponyville is nothing but muddy roads and low-class rubes." Spike!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: How could you say such a thing?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Well, I didn't! Gabby Gums made that up! I never said anything like that!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Everypony, please! She's just a harmless schoolpony engaged in a little harmless gossip. You're really making too big a deal out of this.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: But it's all lies! Gabby Gums prints whatever she wants! She doesn't care whose reputation she destroys! "Fluttershy Has Tail Extensions!" "Pinkie Pie is an Out-of-Control Party Animal!"

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Oh, look! According to this one, the Cakes are breaking up!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Mrs. We are?!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [muffled] Well, my life is officially over. [normal] Gabby Gums has made it to Cloudsdale.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: "Rainbow Dash: Speed Demon or Super Softie?"?!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: I grabbed as many copies as I could, but it was too late! [crying] I'm a laughing stock!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: See, Rarity? Your so-called 'harmless gossip' can be very hurtful!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Honestly, you ponies have no sense of humor. So she tweaks a few ponies every now and then, maybe they deser<U+0096> [gasps] I'll destroy her! "The Drama-Queen Diaries"... She's reprinted my diary! How could Gabby Gums possibly get access to my private diary?!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We've got to put a stop to this once and for all! Sweetie Belle's on the newspaper staff. Maybe she knows who Gabby Gums is.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [gasps] My sister would never associate with anyone as beastly as Gabby Gums! I resent you even suggesting such a thing, Twilight! Why, she's the most innocent, most lovely<U+0096>

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: <U+0096>most evil pony in Equestria! How could my own sister steal my private diary? How could my own sister be... Gabby Gums?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Et tu, Gabby Gums?!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [gasps] You know?! How'd you find out?!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: The gilded pages of your betrayal!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Oh, yeah.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: How could you do this to me?! You stole my secret diary and published it for all the world to read! Gossip can be a very hurtful thing. It is an invasion of privacy, just like when I snooped through your saddlebag. You didn't like that much, did you?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: No...

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: What is important is that you understand how your column makes the ponies that you're writing about feel!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: I do understand, and we've all been feeling guilty, but we just want our cutie marks so badly!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Do you really think that writing nasty things and making everypony feel horrible is your destiny?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Well, when you put it that way...

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: No! I won't let you quit!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: But the gossip we've been printing is hurting everypony's feelings!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Feelings?! I don't care about feelings! Gabby Gums is my bread and butter, and I'm not gonna let you goody-two-horseshoes take that away from me!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We're sorry, Diamond Tiara, but we've made our decision.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Yeah, you can't force us to keep gossiping.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: When you see these... you may not want to quit after all.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: I told Featherweight to document everything...

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: ...And that's exactly what he did.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [gasps] Gimme those!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Sorry, girls, property of the Foal Free Press. And if Gabby Gums really does go into retirement, I'll need something to fill that empty column space. Now get out there and bring me more Gabby Gums!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We'll find a way out of this, girls.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Maybe Rainbow Dash will have a story for us. She's always good for some gossip.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Rainbow Dash! Hey, Rainbow Dash!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Well, if it isn't Gabby Gums!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: You heard too, huh?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Are you kidding? Everypony in town knows it's you three.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Don't suppose you'd let us write a column on you, huh?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Oh, hi, Angel. Is Fluttershy home?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [muffled] Hey, what gives?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: A-ha! [muffled] Twilight thought you might try to show your faces around here, so she put up a force field.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Aw, c'mon, Applejack! You're not mad at us too, are you?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: You're not even gonna talk to us?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Nnope.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: You should be ashamed of yourself, humiliatin' your sister 'n' me like that. We don't wanna talk to any o' y'all right now so take your little gossip column and your embarrassing photographs and just go away!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We've ruined all of our friendships and we still don't have our cutie marks!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: This is the worst day ever!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Oh yeah? Wait 'til tomorrow, our most embarrassing moments are about to be published for everypony to laugh at.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: So what do we do?

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: I don't know, but we're not leaving this clubhouse until we think of something!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: That's it, Gabby Gums is out of time. Run these instead. I want this paper on every street corner in Ponyville!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Stop the presses!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: We have a Gabby Gums column!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Hmph, you're lucky I'm nice.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: This better not happen again, or else.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: [sighs] Well done, Diamond Tiara. You've averted yet another crisis with your amazing diplomatic skills. [gasps] "An Open Letter to Ponyville by Gabby Gums"?! What is this?! Ooh, they're not gonna get away with this! I'll publish those photos tomorrow! They messed with the wrong pony!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: To the citizens of Ponyville,

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Y'see, I'm actually three little fillies, Sweetie Belle, Apple Bloom, and Scootaloo.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: As the popularity of our column grew, we got swept up in the hype. We knew that what we were doing didn't feel quite right, but we ignored the guilt because everypony seemed to want to read what we were writing.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: From now on, we promise to respect everypony else's privacy, and we won't engage in hurtful gossip any more.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: All we can do is ask for your forgiveness, Ponyville.

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: And for the next editor of the Foal Free Press...

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: ...here's your new editor-in-chief, Featherweight!

title: Ponyville Confidential
dialog: Ugh! Him? But what about me?!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness. You've really outdone yourselves, Mr. and Mrs. Cake. This is sure to be the winning entry of this year's national dessert competition!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Mrs. Oh, thank you, Pinkie!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Mr. And thanks for transporting it all the way to Canterlot for us.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Absolutely! It's my honor and I<U+0096>

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Uh, beg pardon, but could we maybe move things along? This here cake's a mite heavy. Right, Big McIntosh?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: [grunts] Eeyup...!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Alrighty then, Big Mac! To the train depot! That's it, Big Mac, nice and slow. This is precious cargo you're carrying.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Mr. Yes, it took months of planning and testing.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Mrs. I would hate for it to<U+0096>

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Don't worry, Mr. and Mrs. Cake. Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy, a little pegassistance? I'll get it there safely, you'll see!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Mrs. Ahahah, oh... of course, Pinkie.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Mr. We never doubted you.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Twilight, can I see you a second? A nice protective spell as extra insurance. [laughs] Better safe than sorry. AJ, Rarity, one last thing? All right, everypony, we're in the home stretch here.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: See, Mr. and Mrs. Cake? I got it here without a hitch! Now all we have to do is get it... in?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: [sigh] Thank you all for helping me get the cake safely on the dessert car.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Thank you for inviting us all to go with you to Canterlot for the National Dessert Competition.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: I'm sure the festivities will be just lovely.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Phooey on the festivities! I can't wait to try all those tasty treats!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Well, the tastiest treat of all is sure to be the Cakes' Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness. All that rich creamy goodness of the marzipan, combined with the tart tanginess of the mascarpone, blended perfectly with the smooth, silky sweetness of the meringue. That's why I call the Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness the "MMMM".

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Exactly. It's the most delicious delectable delightful de-lovely cake in Equestria, and it's sure to win first prize.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Donut Joe! What are you doing in Ponyville?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Hello. What's your name?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: The Cakes' Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness is going to win!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Well, it sure looks like we're in for a delicious competition tomorrow. Maybe we should all settle in for a good night's sleep.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: [yawns] I gotta admit I'm pretty beat.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Yeah, I'm gonna hit the hay myself.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Wait! Didn't you hear those chefs? We have to protect "MMMM".

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: MMMM?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Mmm-hmmm. I know for super sure that "MMMM" is the best dessert in all of Equestria, and I know that they know it too.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: So...

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: So... one of them is going to sabotage the Cakes' cake tonight! You have to help me stand guard!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Pinkie... you're overreacting.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Yeah, those chefs aren't going to do your cake any harm.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: But they are! I just know it.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Fine! If you want to stand guard, go for it. We're going to bed.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: I'll show them. I'll stay up all night and protect you. Nothing and nopony will stop me from keeping you safe.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Huh? Stop, you saboteur! I have you now! Wha? A-ha! Ahh?! Oh! Thank Celestia you're okay! But one of those bakers is mixing up something bad, so I'm not leaving you again no matter what.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Huh? Who turned out the moon? Don't go near that cake, thief!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Stop, thief!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: [snores] Huh? What? [gasp] The cake! Oh, MMMM, you look mmmm-marvelous.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Whoa!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: I know. I think some congratulations are in order for a job well done.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Um, you better hold off on giving yourself an award just yet, Pinkie. Look.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: What is it?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: What happened?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: It's the Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness, it's been [crying] mutilated!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Now we just need to find out who done it.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: You mean, who did it.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Exactly. Who did-done-dood it.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Well, having read many mystery novels, I know that the only way to discover the culprit is to investigate.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Exactly.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: And as chief detective, that's exactly what I'm gonna do.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Uh, you're investigatin'?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Yes! And Twilight shall be my lowly assistant who asks silly questions with obvious answers.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Fine, Pinkie. Should we start looking for clues?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Perfect silly question, my dear Twilight. Because the obvious answer is...

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Yes?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: No! 'Cause I know who did it.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Pinkie, how could you possibly know?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: How could I possibly not know? Clearly this dastardly deed was done by the baker, who knew their dessert could not measure up to the mastery of the Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness. I guess you feared your <e9>clairs lacked flair, Gustave!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Thus, destroying the cake and the Cakes' chance of winning the National Dessert Competition.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: But it makes no sense!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: What do you mean, lowly assistant?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Well, first, if you were tied to the train tracks, how are you now here?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Huh... Guess that isn't a totally silly question.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: And second, the cake hasn't been sliced. It's been bitten. Just look at the teeth marks!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Hm... You're right, my fine fellow. Gustave le Grand is clearly in the clear, which means the "MMMM" was destroyed by another baker. A baker who's donuts are do-nots. That's right, it was Joe!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: [voiceover] Or as he's known the spy world, Mane. Con Mane.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Crushing the Cakes' chances to win!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Pinkie! There is no laser beam security system! And Joe is not sleek, stealthy Con Mane! He's big, gruff, and messy!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Although, you would look rather dapper in a tuxedo.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Huh... You may be right, lowly assistant.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: May be?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Now that I'm taking a closer look at these desserts, I see that one simply cannot look me in the eye.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Pinkie... that moose is a mousse!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Yes, and the mule behind the moose panicked when she saw the mastery of the "MMMM".

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: So you're saying that the culprit is...

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Mulia Mild!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Putting an end to the Cakes' dreams of taking first prize. Huh, I hope you're proud of yourself, Mulia.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Pinkie, stop! This is ridiculous! Look at her!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: [sigh] I guess you're right...

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Thank you!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: But I was so sure that it was one of the other bitter bakers that destroyed the "MMMM". That way, their delicious dessert would reign supreme. I mean, just look at Joe's Donutopia. It's a spectacular city of donutty delight, topped temptingly in sprinklicious sprinkles. And Gustave's <e9>clairs look incredibly edible, with glistening glaziness. But then there's Mulia Mild's Mousse Moose. [sighs] why, this mouth-wateringly marvelous mousse moose tempts the taste buds with its silky, smooth, yummy-nummy, chocolateyness. So why did this criminal devour the Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness while leaving this trio of tasty treats untouched?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: [gasp] Now I have no idea who do-doned it!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: This mystery gets more mysterious every minute.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Well, you have to stop the wild accusations and get to the truth. Everypony go back to your cars while we do a little investigating. Okay, Pinkie, in order to really solve this mystery, we're going to have to find clues. Now you were here at the scene of the crime all night.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Huh! You're not accusing me, are you?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: No! But maybe you saw something that will help us.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: I saw a silhouette in the moonlight!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Good... Let's retrace your steps.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: And then I chased the culprit down the train towards the caboose, but when I got there, he was gone.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Hm... A-ha! Our first clue. I think I know who did it, Pinkie.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Already?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Yes, but I need more evidence to confirm. Tell me what happened next.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: I heard somepony else in the dessert car and chased them up to the engine. But when I got there, all I saw was the conductor shoveling coal.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: The conductor, huh? [gasp] But that doesn't make any sense. What happened next, Pinkie?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Well... I went back to the dessert car.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Yes?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: The curtains mysteriously closed, all on their own.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Interesting. Anything else?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: I heard hoofsteps, a loud thud...

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: ...and then they were gone! When I opened the curtains, I saw that the portrait by the door was all crooked.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Oh my, what is that?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: What next Pinkie?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: That's it. I was here guarding the cake the rest of the night. I mean... I slept by the cake the rest of the night.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: And when you woke up, half the cake was gone?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Exactly.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: By Jove, I think I've got it. Call everypony back. We have a cake culprit to catch.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: I bet you're wondering why you're all here again.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: We have discovered the true culprit of this cake carnage.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Well, you see, when committing a crime, it's crucial that one never leaves behind clues, especially an obvious clue like... this.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: A-ha! A blue feather! I knew it was you, Gustave le Grand!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Pinkie, Gustave doesn't have blue feathers.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: No, 'cause he's been dyeing them!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: No, Pinkie. Remember how when you chased the suspect to the caboose, they suddenly disappeared? That's because they flew away. But the thief did leave a little something behind, didn't you, Rainbow Dash?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: I-I don't even like cake!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: So Rainbow Dash did it! Case solved!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Case not solved, because when we went to the engine, I saw the conductor's hat. And inside the hat was... this.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: So it was you! That pink hair came from your rainbow-colored mane!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: I don't have pink in my mane, Pinkie!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: So you're wearing a wig?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Ow! Cut it out!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Pinkie, remember? You chased a pony to the engine, where you thought you saw the conductor shoveling coal, but that wasn't the conductor at all. It was... Fluttershy!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: [gasp] Oh my.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: You're goin' down, Fluttershy!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Pinkie! But then another clue confounded my suspicions. You were guarding the cake when the curtains mysteriously closed. But that's no mystery, that's magic. But when the thief tried to make their great escape, they left a little addition to the portrait. Has anypony else noticed that Rarity is wearing her hair rather differently today?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: [gasp] What? Is it a crime to change one's style now and again? Why, I think it's a crime not to.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Really?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Fine, I'm guilty! [crying] I wear false eyelashes! Oh, and I took a bite of the cake.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: So did I.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Aw nuts, so did I.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: You just made it sound so delectable.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: So tasty.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: And boy was it!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: I only meant to take a little, lady-like bite.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: And it was so good.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Yeah, I just dove right in!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: But I'm really really sorry.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Terribly sorry.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Sorry, Pinkie.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: That's okay. At least this mystery is finally solved.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: But it isn't. We figured out who ate the Marzipan Mascarpone Meringue Madness, but we still don't know who devoured the other bakers' goods.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: You're right, Twilight. You know what we have to do?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Well... Yes, I do. Do you?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Look for clues! [sniffing] Uh-huh, uh-huh, uh-huh.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Well, Pinkie. Did you find the devourer of the desserts?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: I most certainly did. It was none other than... the bakers!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: First of all, Gustave has mousse in his moustache! And Joe has <e9>clair in his hair! And Mulia has sprinkles in her wrinkles!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: What do you say, bakers?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Well, everypony, we finally have the mystery solved.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: I think we can fix that. Come on!

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Today I learned that it is not good to jump to conclusions. You have to find out all the facts before saying somepony did something. If you don't, you could end up blaming somepony for something they never did. This could hurt their feelings, and it can make you look really foolish. So from now on, I will always make sure to get all the facts.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: How's that for a lesson, Princess Celestia?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Care for a bite?

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: I don't mind if I do.

title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
dialog: Mmmmm.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Ahh!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: It is gorgeous out. Just gorgeous!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Dear Twilight, I am sure you are as excited as I am about the upcoming wedding in Canterlot. [to the others] Wedding? [reading] I will be presiding over the ceremony, but would very much like you and your friends to help with the preparations for this wonderful occasion. Fluttershy, I would like you and your songbird choir to provide the music.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Oh my goodness! What an honor!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Pinkie Pie, I can think of no one more qualified than you to host the reception.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Hip, hip, hooray!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Applejack, you will be in charge of the catering for the reception.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Well, color me pleased as punch!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Rainbow Dash<U+0096>

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: ...I would very much appreciate it if you could perform a sonic rainboom as the bride and groom complete their "I do"'s.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Yes!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Rarity, you will be responsible for designing the dresses for the bride and her bridesmaids.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Princess Celestia wants me to<U+0096> [unintelligible] ...wedding dress? For a Canterlot wedding... I, ah, ooh, oooh!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: And as for you, Twilight, you will be playing the most important role of all: Making sure that everything goes as planned. See you all very soon. Yours, Princess Celestia. But... I don't understand. Who's getting married?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Oh, wait! Uh, I was probably supposed to give you this one first.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Princess Celestia cordially invites you to the wedding of Princess Mi Amore Cadenza and... [gasp] My brother?!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Your brother's getting married? Congratulations, Twilight! That's great news!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Um, Twilight? Are you okay?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Sorry, it's just that Shining Armor and I have always been so close. He's my B.B.B.F.F!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Big Brother Best Friend Forever?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Before I came here and learned the importance of friendship, Shining Armor was the only pony I ever really accepted as a friend. When I was just a filly, I found it rather silly To see how many other ponies I could meet I had my books to read, didn't know that I would ever need Other ponies to make my life complete

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: And though he's, oh, so far away I hoped that he would stay My big brother best friend Forever... Forever...

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: As one of your P.F.F.'s...

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Pony Friends Forever...

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: ...I wanna tell you that I think your brother sounds like a real good guy.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: He is pretty special. I mean, they don't let just anypony be captain of the Royal Guard.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [chirp] So let me get this straight. We're helping out with the wedding of not only a princess, but a captain of the Royal Guard?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I guess we are.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Ooh, ooh, oooh!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: A sonic rainboom? At a wedding?! Can you say "best wedding ever"?!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [gasp] [echoing] Best wedding ever!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: So you all get to help with the big fancy wedding, but I'm the one who gets to host the bachelor party! I have just one question. What's a bachelor party?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Why the long face, sugarcube?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I'm just thinking about Shining Armor. Ever since I moved to Ponyville, we've been seeing each other less and less. And now that he's starting a new family with this "Princess Mi Amore Ca-whatshername", we'll probably never see each other.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Come on, now. You're his sister. He'll always make time for you.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Couldn't seem to make time to tell me he was getting married.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: We're here, we're here!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Whoa, what's with all the guards?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I'm sure they're just taking the necessary precautions. Royal weddings do bring out the strangest ponies.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Now, let's get going! We've got work to do!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: And you've got a big brother to go congratulate.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Yeah. Congratulate. And then give him a piece of my mind.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I've got something to say to you, mister.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Twily! Ah, I've missed, you, kid. How was the train ride? I<U+0096>

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: How dare you not tell me in person that you were getting married! I'm your sister, for pony's sake!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: It's not my fault! Princess Celestia has requested a major increase in security. Didn't you see all the guards at the train station?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Yeah, there's a big wedding coming up. Maybe you heard about it?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: It has nothing to do with the wedding. A threat has been made against Canterlot. We don't know who's responsible for it, but Princess Celestia asked that I help provide additional protection. This, you need to see.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [gasps] The burden of keeping Canterlot safe and secure rests squarely on my shoulders. Staying focused on the task at hand has been my top priority.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Okay, okay, I get it. You've got a really important job protecting all of Canterlot with a force field only you can conjure up. But still... how could you not tell me about something as big as your wedding? Am I not that important to you any more?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Hey. You're my little sister. Of course you're important to me. But I'd understand if you didn't want to be my best mare now.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: You want me to be your best mare?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Well... yeah.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I'd be honored! But I'm still pretty ticked you're marrying somepony I don't even know! When did you even meet this "Princess Mi Amore Cadenza"?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Twily, Princess Mi Amore Cadenza is Cadance, your old foalsitter.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Cadance? As in the Cadance? As in the greatest foalsitter in all the history of foalsitters?!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [chuckles] You tell me. She was your foalsitter.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Ohmygoshohmygosh! Cadance is only the most amazing pony ever! She's beautiful, she's caring, she's kind...

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: How many unicorns can just spread love wherever they go? I only know of one! And you're marrying her! [sing-song voice] You're marrying Cadance! You're marrying Cadance!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I hope I'm not interrupting anything important.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Cadance! Sunshine, sunshine, ladybugs awake! Clap your hooves and do a little shake!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: What are you doing?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Cadance, it's me, Twilight!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [uninterested] Uh-huh.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I've gotta get back to my station, but Cadance will be checking in with all of you to see how things are going. I think I speak for both of us when I say we couldn't be more excited to have you here. Right, dear?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Absolutely.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Well, we'll let you get to it.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Cake, check. Ice sculpture, check. Best darn bite-size apple fritter you ever tasted...

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Mmm. Check.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Hiya, Princess!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Please, call me Princess Mi Amore Cadenza.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Hiya, Princess Mi Amore Cadenza. You come to check out what's on the menu for your big day?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I have!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Aw, shucks. Why don't you take a few to go? [squee] I know how you brides can be. So busy, you forget to get a little somethin' in your belly.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Did... you see what she...

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Oh, you should have seen how she acted back there. I don't know when she changed, but she changed! [imitating Cadance] "Please, call me Princess Mi Amore Cadenza."

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Did I hear someone say my name?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [unenthusiastically] Uh-huh. Is my dress ready?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [stammers] Yes, of course. Um, I've been working on it ever since I was given the assignment, and I think you'll be pleased with the results! Mmm!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I was hoping for something with more beading and a longer train.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Oh, yes, of course.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: And those should be a different color.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Make them a different color.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Gee, maybe her name should be "Princess Demandy-pants."

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Okay, let me see. We've been over the games... [rattles dice] ...the dances...

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [gasps] I think this reception is gonna be perfect! Don't you?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Perfect! ...If we were celebrating a six-year-old's birthday party.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [gasps] Thank you!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Rest, my sister. As always, I will guard the night.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Bet I can guess what you're all thinking. Cadance is the absolute worst bride-to-be ever.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [high voice] Who, me?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Spike! That goes on the cake.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Twilight, whatever are you talking about? Cadance is an absolute gem!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Rarity, she was so demanding!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Well, of course she is! Why shouldn't she expect the very best on her wedding day?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Applejack, did you know that after she told you how much she just 'love-love-loved' your hors d'eouvres, she threw them in the trash?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Aw, she was probably just trying to spare my feelin's.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: No, she was just being fake and totally insincere!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: She did raise her voice at one of my birds during rehearsal.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: See? Rude!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: But he was singing really off-key.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Pinkie Pie, you had to have noticed how Cadance treated<U+0096>

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Never mind. Rainbow Dash, you're with me, right?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Sorry, Twi. Been too busy prepping for my sonic rainboom to pay much attention to the bride's bad attitude.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: The princess is about to get married. I'm sure any negative behavior she might be displaying is simply the result of nerves.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: And I'm sure it's the result of being an awful pony who doesn't deserve to even know Shining Armor, let alone marry him!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Think maybe you're bein' just a tiny bit possessive of your brother?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I am not being possessive, and I am not taking it out on Cadance! You're all just too caught up in your wedding planning to notice that maybe there shouldn't even [thumps table] be a wedding!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Twily! Your big brother's looking pretty good, don't you think? Huh. Everything okay?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: We need to talk. I think you're making a big<U+0096>

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Oh, uh, hi, sweetie.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: She sure has a way of sneaking up on people.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Could I speak to you for a moment, dear?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Better see what she wants.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [muffled] Look, we need to talk.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [muffled] I'm here to talk.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [muffled] It's about your sister, okay?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [muffled] I<U+0096> look, look, she's okay<U+0096>

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [muffled] Just... listen to me, (over Shining Armor) alright? No no<U+0096>

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [muffled] I'm listening, I'm listening.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [muffled] I thought I made it perfectly clear I didn't want you to wear that.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: This was my favorite uncle's.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: And?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: And I think I should wear it.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Are you disagreeing with me?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I guess I am<U+0096> Ah!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Oh, dear. Are you getting another one of your headaches?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Gyah!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Feeling better?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [grunts] Mm-hmm.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: She isn't just unpleasant and rude. She's downright evil!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Twilight!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Let her go.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Huh. It seemed like she had something else she wanted to tell me.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Who goes there? Stay indoors, Twilight Sparkle.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Shining Armor's in real trouble! You have to help<U+0096>

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Dresses? What are you<U+0096>?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Can you believe it? We're gonna be Princess Mi Amore Cadenza's new bridesmaids!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: New bridesmaids? What happened to her old bridesmaids?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: She didn't say. But she did tell us that she would love-love-love it if we'd fill in for them.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Seeing as we've been working so hard and everything.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: And you had your doubts about her.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Told you she was an absolute gem!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: You sure this is what I should wear? Doesn't seem all that aerodynamic.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Hmm. I'll see what I can do.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Looks like I really am on my own.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Perfect, girls. No need to rush. Then of course, Cadance will enter.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I'll say a few words, and then we'll begin with the vows. Shining Armor, you'll get the ring from your best mare.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [deep voice] Do you? [high voice] I do!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Hey... has anypony seen Twilight?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I'm here! I'm not gonna stand next to her! And neither should you!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I'm sorry, I... I don't know why she's acting like this.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Maybe we should just ignore her.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: You have to listen to me!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Oh, goodness! Are you okay?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I'm fine.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Ya sure about that?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I've got something to say! She's evil!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: She's been horrible to my friends, she's obviously done something to her bridesmaids, and if that wasn't enough, I saw her put a spell on my brother that made his eyes go all [bells jangling]!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: [starts crying] Why are you doing this to me?!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Because you're evil!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Evil! And if I don't stop you, you're gonna ruin my brother's life!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: You want to know why my eyes went all [bells jangling]? Nuh! Because ever since I started having to perform my protection spell, I've been getting terrible migraines. Cadance hasn't been casting spells on me. She's been using her magic to heal me!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: And she decided to replace her bridesmaids because she found out the only reason they wanted to be in the wedding was so that they could meet Canterlot royalty! And if she hasn't been on her best behavior with your [stomps hoof] friends, it's because with me being so busy, she's had to make all the decisions about the wedding!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I was just trying to<U+0096>

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: She's been completely stressed out because it's really important to her that our big day be perfect! Something that obviously wasn't important to you! [gasps] Now if you'll excuse me, I have to go and comfort my bride. And you can forget about being my best mare. In fact, if I were you, I wouldn't show up to the wedding at all.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: C'mon, y'all. Let's go check on the princess.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I was<U+0096>

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: You have a lot to think about.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: Maybe I was being overprotective. I could've gained a sister. But instead... I just lost a brother.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: I'm sorry!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1
dialog: You will be.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: "Princess Celestia cordially invites you to the wedding of Princess Mi Amore Cadenza and..." [gasp] My brother?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Twily! Ah, I've missed you, kid.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: How dare you not tell me in person that you were getting married!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: A threat has been made against Canterlot. Princess Celestia asked that I help provide additional protection.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: But I'm still pretty ticked you're marrying somepony I don't even know.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Princess Mi Amore Cadenza is Cadance.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Cadance is only the most amazing pony ever!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: I hope I'm not interrupting anything important.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Cadance, it's me! Twilight!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: [uninterested] Uh-huh.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: And I think I should wear it.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Are you disagreeing with me?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: She's evil! I saw her put a spell on my brother that made his eyes go all [bells jangling]!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Cadance hasn't been casting spells on me. She's been using her magic to heal me! If I were you, I wouldn't show up to the wedding at all.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: I just lost a brother. I'm sorry!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: You will be.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: [echoing] Hello? Is anyone there?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Where am I?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: The caves beneath Canterlot, once home to greedy unicorns who wanted to claim the gems that could be found inside. And now, your prison.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Help! Help!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Plans? What plans?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: The plans I have for your brother, of course.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Don't you dare do anything to my brother, you... you monster!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: No! Wait! Ugh! Please! Don't hurt me! Twilight, it's me! Please, you have to believe me. I've been imprisoned like you. The Cadance who brought you down here was an imposter.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Likely story!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Sunshine, sunshine, ladybugs awake. Clap your hooves...

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: You remember me!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Of course I do. How could I forget the filly I love to sit for the most?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: We have to get out of here. We have to stop her!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: This day is going to be perfect The kind of day of which I've dreamed since I was small Everypony will gather 'round Say I look lovely in my gown What they don't know is that I have fooled them all!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: This day was going to be perfect The kind of day of which I've dreamed since I was small But instead of having cake With all my friends to celebrate My wedding bells, they may not ring for me at all<U+0085>

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: I could care less about the dress I won't partake in any cake Vows, well I'll be lying when I say

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: We must escape before it's too late Find a way to save the day Hope, I'll be lying if I say

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Finally the moment has arrived For me to be one lucky bride

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Oh, the wedding we won't make He'll end up marrying a fake Shining Armor will be...

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Mares and gentlecolts, we are gathered here today to witness the union of [muffled] Princess Mi Amore Cadenza and Shining Armor.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Oh, we're never going to save him.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: We will. We just have to find... There!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Princess Cadance and Shining Armor, it is my great pleasure to pronounce you<U+0096>

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Stop!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Ugh! Why does she have to be so possessive of her brother? [sobbing] Why does she have to ruin my special day?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Because it's not your special day! It's mine!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: What? But how did you escape my bridesmaids?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Hmph. Clever. But you're still too late.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: I-I don't understand. How can there be two of 'em?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: She's a changeling. She takes the form of somepony you love and gains power by feeding off your love for them.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: [laughing] Right you are, Princess. And as queen of the changelings, it is up to me to find food for my subjects. Equestria has more love than any place I've ever encountered. My fellow changelings will be able to devour so much of it that we will gain more power than we have ever dreamed of!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: They'll never get the chance! Shining Armor's protection spell will keep them from ever even reaching us!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: [chuckling] Oh, I doubt that. Isn't that right, dear?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Mm-hmm.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Ah, ah, ah. Don't want to go back to the caves, now do you? Ever since I took your place, I've been feeding off Shining Armor's love for you. Every moment he grows weaker and so does his spell. Even now, my minions are chipping away at it.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: [laughing] He may not be my husband, but he is under my total control now.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: And I'm sorry to say, unable to perform his duties as captain of the Royal Guard.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Not my Shining Armor!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Soon, my changeling army will break through. First, we take Canterlot. And then, all of Equestria!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: No. You won't. You may have made it impossible for Shining Armor to perform his spell, but now that you have so foolishly revealed your true self, I can protect my subjects from you!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Princess Celestia!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Ah! Shining Armor's love for you is even stronger than I thought! Consuming it has made me even more powerful than Celestia!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: The Elements of Harmony. You must get to them and use their power to defeat the queen.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: [laughing] You can run, but you can't hide!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Go, go!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Looks like we're gonna have to do this the hard way. How did you...?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: They're changelings, remember?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Don't let them distract you. We have to get to the Elements of Harmony. They're our only hope.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: OK, this is just gettin' weird. Real me! Real me!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: [laughing] Do me! Do me! Meh, I've seen better.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: You won't get away with this! Twilight and her friends will<U+0096>

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: You were saying? You do realize the reception's been cancelled, don't you? Go! Feed!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Sorry, Twi. We should've listened to you.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: It's not your fault. She fooled everypony.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Hmm, I did, didn't I?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Quick! Go to him while you still have the chance!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Wha<U+0096> where... huh? Is...is the wedding over?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: It's all over!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Your spell! Perform your spell!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: [laughing] What good would that do? My changelings already roam free.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: No! My power is useless now. I don't have the strength to repel them.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: My love will give you strength.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: [chuckling] What a lovely but absolutely ridiculous sentiment.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Noooooo!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Don't worry about me. I'm fine. You have a real wedding to put together.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Seriously, though. I get why the queen of the changelings wanted to be with you, but how did you get someone as amazing as Cadance to marry you?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: I told her she wouldn't just be gaining a husband. She'd be getting a pretty great sister, too.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Mares and gentlecolts, we are gathered here today to celebrate the union of the real Princess Mi Amore Cadenza<U+0096>

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Princess Cadance is fine.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Hm. The union of Princess Cadance and Shining Armor. The strength of their commitment is clear. The power of their love, undeniable. May we have the rings please? I now pronounce you mare and colt!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: This is your victory as much as theirs. You persisted in the face of doubt, and your actions led to your being able to bring the real Princess Cadance back to us. Learning to trust your instincts is a valuable lesson to learn.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Rainbow Dash, that's your cue.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Best... wedding... ever!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Hello, everypony. Did I miss anything?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: [squee] Let's get this party started!

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Love is in bloom A beautiful bride, a handsome groom, Two hearts becoming one A bond that cannot be undone because

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Twilight! None of this would've been possible without you, little sis. Love ya, Twily.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Love you too, B.B.B.F.F.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Ready to go?

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Oh! Almost forgot.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: IT'S MINE! Oof! Ahaha... ha.

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: [background] Love is in bloom A beautiful bride, a handsome groom I said love is in bloom You're starting a life and making room For us, (For us... For us... Aah...)

title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2
dialog: Now this was a great wedding.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Yes?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: [gasp] Find Princess Cadance and Shining Armor.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: My dearest Twilight, you must come to Canterlot at once.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: [panicked breathing] Where are all my quills? Brbrbr. No, no, no, no, no... Ugh! I need the Magical Compendium volumes 1 through 36! Where is it?!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Flash cards! I should make some flash cards. Spike, I'm gonna need you to quiz me. On everything. Everything I've ever learned. Ever. That isn't going to be enough cards.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Twilight, calm down. It's just a test.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Just a test? Just a test!? Princess Celestia wants to give me some kind of exam, and you're trying to tell me to calm down because it's just a test?!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Uh... yes.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: I'd say she's handling things pretty well, considerin'.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Urgh!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Are you sure you don't want me to go as well?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Yes. Princess Cadance and Shining Armor are already there. The others will be joining them soon.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: The Empire's magic is powerful. It cannot fall again, my sister.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: She will succeed at her task. And when she does, we'll know that she is that much closer to being ready.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Ahem.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Trust me, little sister.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: You wanted to see me? To give me a test? I brought my own quills and plenty of paper to show my work. Sorry, sorry!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: This is a different kind of test. The Crystal Empire has returned.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: The Crystal Empire? I'm sorry, I-I thought I'd studied. Ooh. I don't think there's anything in any of my books th<U+0096>

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: There wouldn't be. Few remember it ever existed at all. Even my knowledge of the Empire is limited. But what I do know is that it contains a powerful magic. One thousand years ago, King Sombra, a unicorn whose heart was black as night, took over the Crystal Empire.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: He was ultimately overthrown, turned to shadow, and banished to the ice of the arctic north.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: But not before he was able to put a curse upon the Empire. A curse that caused it to vanish into thin air. If the Empire is filled with hope and love, those things are reflected across all of Equestria. If hatred and fear take hold... Which is why I need your help finding a way to protect it.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: You want me to help protect an entire empire?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: It is, as I said, a different kind of test. But one I'm certain you will pass.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: How do I begin?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: By joining Princess Cadance and Shining Armor in the Crystal Empire.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: My brother is there?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: He is. And your Ponyville friends will join you there as well. I have every confidence you will succeed. And when you do, I'll know you are ready to move on to the next level of your studies.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: But what if I fail?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: You won't.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: But what if<U+0096>

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: You won't. But Twilight, in the end, it must be you and you alone who ultimately assists Princess Cadance and Shining Armor in doing what needs to be done to protect the Empire. Do you understand?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Mm-hmm!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Then go. There is no time to lose.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Ah! Twilight! That was fast! Let me guess, you got a perfect score? A-minus? B-plus? [gasp] Twilight, did you... [quietly] fail?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: I was prepared to do my best Thought I could handle any test For I can do so many tricks But I wasn't prepared for this

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: The square root of five hundred and forty-six is twenty-three point three six six six four two eight nine one zero nine.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: I could ace a quiz on friendship's bliss But I wasn't prepared for this Will I fail, or will I pass? I can't be sure...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: She can't be sure...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: My mind is sharp, my skills intact My heart is pure...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Her heart is pure...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Oh, I've taken my share of licks I've made it through the thin and thick But no I wasn't

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Oh no, she wasn't

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Oh no, I wasn't

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Oh no, she wasn't

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: No I wasn't

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Uh, prepared for what exactly?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Twilight! Uh, did you pass?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Are we gonna celebrate your awesomeness with Princess Celestia?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Not quite. We're going to the Crystal Empire!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Crystal what?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Ha! And you all made fun of me for packing so many scarves.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Twilight!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Shining Armor?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Twily! You made it! We'd better get moving. There are things out here we really don't want to run into after dark.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: [gulp] What kind of things?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Let's just say the Empire... isn't the only thing that's returned.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Something keeps trying to get in! We think it's the unicorn king who originally cursed the place.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: But Princess Celestia said I was being sent here to find a way to protect the Empire! If King Sombra can't get in, then it must already be protected.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: [gasp] Th-That's one of the things, isn't it?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Guh. We have to get to the Crystal Empire! Now!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Go, go!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Almost there.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: [gasps for breath] Everypony okay?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Oh, no! Shining Armor, your horn!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Sparkleriffic!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: It's gorgeous! Absolutely gorgeous! [mumbles incoherently] There are no words!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Focus, Rarity. We're here to help Twilight, not admire the scenery.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Eh, I don't see what the big deal is. Just looks like another old castle to me.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: A<U+0096> p<U+0096> guh! Another old...! Have you lost your mind? Look at the magni<U+0096>

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Very funny.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Cadance!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Ooh.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Are you okay?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Cadance has been able to use her magic to spread love and light. That seems to be what is protecting it. But she hasn't slept, barely eats. I want to help her, but my protection spell has been countered by King Sombra.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: [breathes deeply] It's alright Shining Armor, I'm fine.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: She's not fine. She can't go on like this forever, and if her magic were to fade... Well, you saw what's out there waiting for that to happen.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: That's why we're here.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Why we're all here.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Well, with Cadance putting all her strength into keeping her spell going, and me trying to keep an eye on signs of trouble in the arctic, we haven't been able to gather much information from the Crystal Ponies.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Crystal Ponies?! Hahaha, there are Crystal Ponies?! Um, ahem. Please continue.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: But we have to believe one of them knows how we can protect the Empire without having to use Cadance's magic.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: A research paper!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Huh?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: That must be part of my test <U+0096> to gather information from the Crystal Ponies and deliver it to you! This is gonna be great! I love research papers!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: [sarcastically] Yeah, who doesn't?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Oh-oh-oh! Lemme guess! Is it Spike? Nono, Fluttershy! Rarity?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Don't worry, big brother. I am really good at this sort of thing.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Are you sure? Absolutely sure?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: King Sombra's spell must be why their coats aren't... crystally.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Yes.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: If you think of anything, even the smallest thing...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Well, that was a total bust.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Maybe the others are having better luck.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: A way to protect the Empire! You know anything about it or what?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Hold on! You gotta know something!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Time to gather some intel!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Because it isn't!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: [screams] A spy? How did they know? Ah! Must have noticed my night vision goggles. Ooh! Night vision-y!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: [sighs] I got nothing so far.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Oh, me neither.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: [hushed] My cover has been blown. I repeat, my cover has been blown!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Ooookay.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Sorry, Twilight. These crystal ponies seem to have some kinda collective amnesia or somethin'. Only thing I was able to get out of 'em was somethin' about a library.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: [gasps] A library? Well, why didn't you say so?!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Uh... thought I just did.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: I just... I don't even know what to... There are no words.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Yes. We're looking for a book.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: [in awe] You do. You really do.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: We're lookin' for a history book. Somethin' that might tell us how the Empire might've protected itself from danger back in the day.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Which is where, exactly?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Ugh.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: We'll just take a look around. I'm sure we can find it on our own.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: I like her!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Uh, anyone else startin' to think this is a lost cause?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: No, no, no, no, no... Yes! "History of the Crystal Empire". I just hope it has the answers we need.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: A 'Crystal Faire'. According to this book, it was established by their first queen and became their most important tradition. The Faire was held every year to "renew the spirit of love and unity in the empire so they could protect it from harm". My friends and I could put it together. Everything we need to know is in the book!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: That sounds pretty promising.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: We'll get started right away. C'mon, Spike, we've got a Crystal Faire to put together!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Princess Cadance needs our help Her magic will not last forever I think we can do it But we need to work together

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: It says that they liked jousting

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: They flew a flag of many hues

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Made sweets of crystal berries

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: They had a petting zoo with tiny ewes

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: There was a crystal flugelhorn That every pony liked to play

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: And the Crystal Kingdom anthem Can you learn it in a day?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: It looks amazing! I don't know how I could've done this without you! One last check to make sure everything is in place, and then the festivities can begin!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: What's this thing for?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: The last page of the book mentioned a Crystal Heart as the faire's centerpiece, so I used my magic to cut one out of a crystal block.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Nice work, Twi. Think we're ready to get this faire up and runnin'.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Hear ye, hear<U+0096>

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: [blows flugelhorn] Flugelhorn! [laughs nervously] My bad.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Ahem. Hear ye, hear ye! Princess Cadance and Prince Shining Armor do cordially invite you to attend the Crystal Faire!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Come on in, y'all. Got food and drinks thataway, games and crafts are thataway, Crystal Heart to the back near the Princess.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: We totally nailed it, right? Must be feeling a lot of love and unity about now! Gonna have some grub, huh? What are you thinking? Crystal Empire berry pie? Maybe some crystal corn-on-the-cob! [pause] What is with these ponies?!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Of course we have it! Can't have a Crystal Faire without the Crystal Heart, right?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: W-what's that about 'powering the heart'?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Why did you<U+0096>

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: I think we may have a problem...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: I didn't know it was an actual relic! The book didn't mention anything about the Crystal Ponies powering the Heart! There was a page missing... How did I not notice?!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: It's alright, Twilight.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1
dialog: Twily...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: You wanted to see me? To give me a test?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: The Crystal Empire has returned.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: You want me to help protect an entire empire?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: It must be you and you alone.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: But what if I fail?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Let's just say the Empire... isn't the only thing that's returned.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Go, go!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Sparkleriffic!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Well, with Cadance putting all her strength into keeping her spell going, and me trying to keep an eye on signs of trouble in the arctic, we haven't been able to gather much information from the Crystal Ponies.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: There are Crystal Ponies?!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: "History of the Crystal Empire". The last page of the book mentioned a Crystal Heart as the Faire's centerpiece, so I used my magic to cut one out of a crystal block.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I think we may have a problem...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I didn't know it was an actual relic!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: It's alright, Twilight.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Twily...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: The Empire is under attack.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I have to find the Crystal Heart!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: No, you stay here with Cadance. She needs you, Shining Armor. I'll retrieve the Heart.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Let's do this!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I've been trying to figure out how I'm meant to pass Celestia's test. Retrieving the Crystal Heart must be it. But there is something else you can do.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Name it.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: You and the rest of our friends have to keep the Faire going.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: What? With that thing moving into the Empire?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: The whole purpose of the Crystal Faire is to lift the spirits of the Crystal Ponies, so they can activate the Crystal Heart.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Yeah, and?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: If the Crystal Ponies find out that King Sombra is trying to take over the Empire again, their spirits are gonna be anything but lifted. It won't matter if I find the Crystal Heart. They won't be able to make it work. You have to keep them happy here at the Faire.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Keep the Faire going and the Crystal Ponies' spirits high. Done and done!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Twily, be careful.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I will.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [under his breath] Uh-huh. We can do that. Twilight's doing what?!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
