dialog: He... really... loves getting his face painted. Haha.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Who wants a flugelhorn?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I want a flugelhorn!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: <U+00A0>Who else wants a flugelhorn?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [screaming]<U+00A0>I want a flugelhorn!!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [pants] Twilight, wait! I'm coming with you!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: You can't. I have to retrieve the Crystal Heart by myself.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I know. I promise I won't lift a claw to help you.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [sighs] Not a claw, Spike.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Where are we going exactly?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I think I might know where King Sombra hid the Crystal Heart.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: The castle?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: The king would've been counting on the fact that nopony would dare come looking for it here. They'd have been too afraid to even try.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I hope you're right.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: You and me both.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: What are you lookin' at?! That's what I thought!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [whispering] Uh, Rainbow Dash? We're supposed to be actin' like nothing's wrong.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [hushed] What I mean is, maybe you should let me keep the Crystal Ponies away from the fake Heart, while you show off your joustin' skills.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Huh. Seeing my awesomeness does have a way of putting ponies into a pretty good mood.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Come on, Knight Fluttershy.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Huh?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: It's showtime.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: How are y'all feelin'? Havin' a good time?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Well, that's good! Gotta renew that spirit of love and unity if you're gonna power up that Crystal Heart, right?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Oh, I hear ya, but, uh... phew! Gettin' a little toasty out here. Bet you'd like to cool off with a little Crystal Empire nectar! [panicked noise] Uh, you tried the Crystal Empire fritters yet? Made from a traditional Crystal Empire recipe! You're gonna love 'em! [loudly] Uh, I hear there's a joustin' match about to start! You don't wanna miss that! [hushed] Come on, Twilight... These Crystal Ponies are more curious than a cat!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: It's gotta be here somewhere. It's just gotta be! Not a claw, Spike.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Celestia's orders!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Of course!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [panting for breath] Argh! What? Did you find it?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: No. Because this isn't King Sombra's castle.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Well, isn't this where he lived when he was in power?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Whoa. When did you learn to do that?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: That was a little trick Celestia taught me.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: You stay here.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Huh, if you insist. [echoing] Can you see what's down there yet?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [echoing] Not yet. I can't even tell how far down this goes!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Spike?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [echoing] Yeah?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [echoing] Can you see outside?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: It's not good! Cadance's magic must be fading [echoing] faster than before!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [echoing] Twilight? Are you okay?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Yes...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Spike, I think it's here! Huh?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: What are you doing here?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I don't know! I opened the door and<U+0096>

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: And now you must go.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Go where?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Doesn't matter to me. You failed the test, Twilight!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I don't understand! The test?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Not only will you not move on to the next level of your studies, you won't continue your studies at all!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I... You didn't say anything about no longer being your student if I failed!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Didn't I?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: But... what do I do now?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [incredibly distant and muffled] Twilight! [closer] Twilight? Twilight! Twiliiiight! [quickly] I know you told me to stay up there, but you were down here for such a long time and you weren't answering and I got worried so I came down here and you were just staring at that wall and... I was calling your name, but I couldn't seem to get your attention, and<U+0096> What were you looking at? I mean... it's just a wall. ...Ponyville?! Well, how did I get... No! I don't wanna go! Please, Twilight, don't make me!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: King Sombra's dark magic. A doorway that leads to your worst fear.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: We were home. You told me you didn't need me anymore. You were sending me away...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: A fear that will never come to pass. I'm never gonna send you away. And I'm not gonna fail my test!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: What's in there?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [sighs] Stairs. Lots and lots of stairs. [sighs] Maybe you should come with me this time.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [nervous exhale] [catching breath] Isn't there... somepony else who could... take over the jousting demonstration with you?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [scoffs] The fate of an entire empire rests on us showing these ponies a good time. But, y'know, if that isn't important to you...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [sigh] Okay, okay, I'll take it easy on you next time. But not too easy. I've got a reputation to maintain!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [panting] What if this is just more of his magic? He makes a door that leads to your worst nightmare. Why not a staircase that goes on forever?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Hold on to me.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Uh...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [sounds of exertion] Whoa. Whoaaa! Yaaaah!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [laughs nervously] Excuse me, pardon me... [hushed] I am running out of weaving materials for the traditional crafts booth! I just made a hat out of three pieces of hay and a drinking straw! I made it work. But still!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: We gotta do everything we can to keep this thing goin'. The Princess isn't lookin' so good. I can't imagine her magic is gonna last much longer. It's gonna be fine. These ponies are gonna power up that Crystal Heart when the time comes, and we won't be needin' her magic anyway.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [laughs nervously] Oh, of course it isn't. The real one is<U+0096>

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: On its way!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [hushed] I was going to say 'being polished' to buy us some more time?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Oops.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: The Heart... Where's the Crystal<U+0096>

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Here! It rolled over to me when you dropped it!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Don't move!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: You can move, just not toward me! How could I have been so foolish? I was just so eager to get it! Then when I saw what was going on outside, I...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: You have to get out of there, Twilight! You have to be the one who brings the Heart to Princess Cadance! If you don't, you'll fail Celestia's test!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: King Sombra is already attacking the Empire. He could reach the Crystal Ponies at any moment... reach Princess Cadance, my brother, my friends. There may not be enough time for me to find a way to escape.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: You have to be the one to bring the Crystal Heart to the Faire.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Me? But Twilight<U+0096>

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Go!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Goooo!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Now, don't y'all worry your pretty, little Crystal heads! The real Crystal Heart will be here any second!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [hushed] I don't know if they believe you...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [hushed] Don't know if I believe me...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Whoa! Huh! [spits fire] Yah! [nervous noise] Hey! Up here!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Spike?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I got the Crystal Heart!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [gasps] Spikey-wikey!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: The Crystal Heart has returned. Use the light and love within you to ensure that King Sombra does not.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [sighs] Good job, Spike.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I do so wish it was permanent. Did you see how my mane just absolutely sparkled?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: But... good things are better when they're a rarity.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Everything's gonna be okay. You've gotta stop saving my rump like this. It's starting to get embarrassing.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Wasn't me who saved you in the end. It was Spike.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: It's just a test. Maybe she'll let you retake it.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I don't think she's gonna give me a new test.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: [breathing heavily] [to himself] Keep it together, buddy... Gotta stay strong... for Twilight...

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: It's beautiful.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I wish it had been me who ultimately made it so. But it wasn't.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Twilight, as I understand it, Spike brought Princess Cadance the Crystal Heart because you weren't sure how quickly you could find a way to escape the tower. You weren't willing to risk the future of the citizens of the Crystal Empire in an effort to guarantee your own. Far better that I have a student who understands the meaning of self-sacrifice than one who only looks out for her own best interests.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Does this mean...?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: She's totally gonna lose it! [breathes heavily] Keep it together, buddy... Gotta stay strong... for Twilight...!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: I passed!

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Ooh.

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: You were prepared to do your best Had what it takes to pass the test All those doubts you can dismiss Turns out you were

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: You clearly have just what it takes

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: To pass a test with such high stakes

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: We knew for sure you would prevail

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Since when does Twilight Sparkle ever fail?

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Turns out I was

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Turns out I was

title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2
dialog: Turns out you were

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Try again, Twi, you can do it!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Phew, this spell's a toughie. But I feel lucky this time! One, two...

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Hi!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Nnnnnng! Pinkie, why'd you do that?!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: 'Cause hugs are funneriffic, especially when you throw one around a friend. Whatcha doin'?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Trying to turn that apple into an orange!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: But you kinda threw her aim off...

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Wheee! [giggles] What a cute orange birdie! Do me next, Twilight! Do me, do me!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Ooooh, Rarity, wanna see Twilight turn me into an orange? It's gonna be funna-fun-fuuun!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: As fun as creating this haute couture ensemble that I just finished making? Delightful, non?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: [gasps] This is terrible!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I admit it's perhaps not my finest work, but I<U+0096>

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: You had total-awesome-amazing fun and I missed out on it?! Neh! Wait! What if there's more awesome amazing fun with friends happening somewhere in Ponyville right now that I'm missing out on too?!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: We weren't going to turn her into an orange! I swear!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Hey, Rainbow Dash, whatcha doing?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: This punk cloud got so heavy it's making fog. Figure I'll thin this bad boy out so it floats back up.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Oooh, fun! Wheeeeee! Gotta go!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Uh, thanks, Pinkie...?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Hey, Applejack! That looks like fun, can I join you? Wheee! Next time I'll pull you!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Fluttershy! [panting] There... you... are...! Doing... [deep breath] anything... [deep breath] fun?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Not especially.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Feeling better, Pinkie?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Abso-tutely-lutely! Thanks for letting me rest in your butterfly grove while I get my Pinkie strength back!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: What are friends for?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: That's just the thing! I've got so many wonderful friends having fun in every last corner of Ponyville, I can't figure out how to keep up with it all! It's driving me even more coco-loco than usual!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I can promise to not do anything fun at all if that would help.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: You are such a good friend.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: There you are, Pinkie. Been lookin' everywhere for ya, girl.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Hey, Pinkie. Got something fun planned this afternoon thought you might wanna know about.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Heh. Well, I'll be an apple crisp. I'm here for the same reason.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: This is perfect! Everyone will now bring their fun to me. Ha, this'll solve everything! Why didn't I think of that?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Actually, what I meant is after I'm done whipping up today's weather, I'll be chilling by the lake catching some rays. Wanna hang?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I am so there. Wheee.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: And my family's havin' a barn-raisin' this afternoon at Sweet Apple Acres.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: And I'm also so there. Whee, whee.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: But... that's when I'll be at the swimming hole. Ah, well, doesn't matter. Whichever one you choose is okay with me.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Me too.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: [gasps] Choose?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: One, two...

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Pinkie! What in the wide, wide world of Equestria are you doing now?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Timing myself galloping back and forth between the swimming hole and Sweet Apple Acres. I'm trying to cut down my time so if Rainbow Dash dives off the swing, I can get to Sweet Apple Acres to help with the barn raising, and then be back in time to see Rainbow Dash hit the water after doing a double flip! [sigh] If I can cut my time by only twenty minutes, I'm good.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: [laughs] Oh, Pinkie. I'm afraid no matter how hard you try, the only way to pull something like that off is if there's more of you to go around.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: That's it, Twilight! The legend of the Mirror Pool!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Legend of the who-what now? Pinkie! I'm familiar with loads of legends, and I never heard of<U+0096>

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Does this mean practice is over?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Of course not! Back to work.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Seems like hardly anypony's been here in ages. I hope I'm remembering the rhymes right from my Nana Pinkie's story. "Where the brambles are thickest, there you will find a pond beyond the most twisted of vines!" [echoes] What was that?! Oh, I heard a voice! Oh. Hehe. It was me. Ouch! Ooh! Stop scratching me up, you brambles, and<U+0096> Whoooaaa!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: [gasp] The Mirror Pool! [echoes] Oh, and there's that voice again! Tsk, tsk, tsk. Ah Pinkie, you have got to stop talking to yourself. Starting... now. "And into her own reflection she stared, uh, yearning for one whose reflection she shared, and solemnly sweared not to be scared at the prospect of being doubly mared!"

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Wow, the legend is true. It really worked!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Okay, wait. I promised not talk to myself anymore. I should say something to her. Or... would that still be talking to myself? Excuse me, me? Can I have a word with you? Uh, I mean, me? Listen, I can see you're having lots of fun, but<U+0096>

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I did, over here!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Whoa, calm yourself, Pinkie, there's loads of fun to be had in Ponyville with my girls! Trot on over back to Ponyville with me and I'll tell you all about 'em.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: ...And then there's Rarity. She's the one with all the fancy clothes and ribbons and stuff! I'm thinking she can make us all matching t-shirts that say 'Team Pinkie', and<U+0096>

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Uh, well, let's see, Applejack's having a barn raising at<U+0096>

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: It's that-away!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Wait, come back! Don't forget to meet me back here to tell me everything about everything, like I was there myself! Because I'm you and, and you're me, and<U+0096> Oh, my gosh! This is the greatest plan ever! [squee] Now, off to double my fun!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Let's rock this pool, ponies! [blows up inflatable] Whee!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Coming in, Dashie? The water's great, it's totally wet and everything!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I don't know... Cloud busting was tougher work than usual today. [yawns] I'm kind of exhausted.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: That's fine, you relax. At least we'll still be together!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Glad you made it, Pinkie. I thought you maybe went to Applejack's, instead.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I did.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Oh. The barn up yet?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I have no idea.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: But I thought you said you were just at Applejack's.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Actually, I'm probably still on my way there now! Whee!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Oh, Pinkie Pie, I'm so glad you wandered by. I know I promised not to have any fun today, but, oh, I couldn't help myself. All of my critter friends wanted a picnic, and I couldn't disappoint them. Come join us. We have plenty of hay juice and marmalade to go around, don't we, critters?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Who's Applejohn?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Walls? But we're outside.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Goodness. Was it something I said?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Huh?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: So you see, that's how I'm able to have fun in two places at once.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Duplicates of you, huh? Heh, yeah, sure, Pinkie. [yawns] Look, I was just gearing up to catch some Z's, so, uh...

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Gotcha. I'll have the rest of my fun really quietly. [quietly] Wheeeee...

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: How'd you do that?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Just trying to show a little consideration for my sleepy friend. Ooh, ooh, gotta run. Looks like I'm trying to get my attention. Excuse me.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Ooh, ooh, tell me all about it! Did they pull the walls of the barn up slow or fast?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Maybe slow to medium fast, somewhere in that range?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Ooh, did you get ice cream? What kinds did they have? Banana brickle?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Fluttershy.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Aw, how could you say no to that?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Applejack.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Aw, my poor poor me! There, there. Tell me what, we just need a couple more Pinkie Pies. Easy peasy.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Come on, would I lie to me?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I think you mean a double-double me. Plus another double-double me, which makes two double-double mes, or a double-double-double me, if you will.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Now Applejack, Rainbow Dash, and Fluttershy are covered, plus one extra Pinkie Pie in case we get an extra invite from somepony else. Perfect! Okay, let's go! [under] Hey, Pinkies! Yoo-hoo!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Okay, good enough. Pinkie Pies, move it out<U+0096>

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: What in the name of pink?! Knock it off!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: To Ponyville, everyone! Follow me!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: [sighs] Yes, it's fun there.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: [whistles] Okay, between the bunch of us, we should have every nook and cranny of fun in Ponyville covered at all times. An unprecedented and massive undertaking! But first, a pop quiz on the names I taught you!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Excellent. Okay, let's get on with this, folks. Fan out on three. One<U+0096>

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Eh, good enough. La-la-la-la-la-la-la, la-la-la, whee!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: [sneezes] What the<U+0096>

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Wow! Pinkie Pie wasn't kidding about the duplicates! Except now there's triplicates... and quadruplicates!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Dash is gonna love this! Aw, if I push her around on this floaty thing, it'll be fun and relaxing!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Uh-oh...

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: No more Pinkies! I can't take it!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Gosh, uh... I wonder what fun they're having raising the barn at Applejack's right now! Maybe I'd better go check!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: No!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Oh, phew! Looks like I haven't missed a thing!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I wanna know right now where all you Pinkies came from, so I can find out who's responsible for y'all ruinin' our barn raisin'!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Uh, you look pretty busy right now, so [laughs nervously] maybe we should talk a little later?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Y'all come back here and clean up after yourselves this instant!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Oh no, what have I done, what have I done?! My poor friends...

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Okay, everypony, please, calm down!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Calm down? I just had a Pinkie hurricane raging through my shop!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: And they trashed our critter picnic!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Please, everypony, hang on while I try to figure something out! Come on, Spike. I've gotta try to remember the name of that legend she mentioned.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Aha, here it is! "The legend of the Mirror Pond"... It describes a spell I can use to send them back where they came from!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: That's perfect! Let's go!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: But there's a catch. If I can't figure out which one's the real Pinkie, I might send her back by mistake!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Well, we'll just have to figure out who the real one is then. Shouldn't be too hard.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Does anypony here know how we can tell the real Pinkie Pie from all the rest of them?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Twilight! I have to talk to you, I need your help!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Excuse me, whoever you are, but I'm not talking to any of you Pinkies unless you're the real Pinkie.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Oh, but, but I am the real Pinkie!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: How in tarnation are we supposed to tell which is the real Pinkie?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I have no idea.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Ugh, this is hopeless!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Maybe that one's the real Pinkie.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Please. The real Pinkie Pie never sat that long in one place her whole life!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I'm gonna go ask.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Of course she's gonna say she's the real Pinkie! They all do! You're wasting your time.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: So lemme guess. You're the real Pinkie Pie.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Heck if I know. Could be any one of us if you ask me. And if I said I was the real Pinkie, you wouldn't even believe me anyway. So just leave me alone. I've got some important poking the ground with my hoof to do.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Oh, Spike, how're we gonna do this? I can't risk sending the real Pinkie back into the pond!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I miss the real Pinkie.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: [sighs] I bet she misses you too. Bet she'd do just about anything to get to be with her friends again. Hey. Hey! What if you gave them a test? Pick something really hard for a Pinkie to do, something not fun at all! Any Pinkie that can't do it goes back into the pond. But whoever wants to stay the most, that must be the real Pinkie!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: You know, that's not a bad idea.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Hey, Twilight!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I've been looking all over for you ponies. What are you all doing here?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Fluttershy spoke with the woodland critters, and they've agreed to take us into their home 'til the Pinkie storm dies down.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: You guys, we're gonna fix this. And I know exactly how.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Are we gonna lose our real Pinkie Pie?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I don't think so. Now come along. I've already got Applejack and her family rounding up all the Pinkies.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Hyah, ya Pinkies! Hyah!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Oh, give it a rest.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Welcome, Pinkies, welcome. Please have a seat and make yourselves comfortable. [pause] Okay, I suppose you can't be comfortable staying in one place, but have a seat anyway. [pause] Sit down!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Better. Now, I suppose you're all wondering why I've gathered you all here today.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: No, just the opposite actually.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Wait up, I got one more! Found this one poking at the ground with her hoof, drawing frowny faces.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Have her come sit with the others.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Pinkies, you've been brought here to take a test.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Don't worry, it's a simple test, about as simple as they come, and whoever passes gets to stay.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Curtain, please. The test... will be watching paint dry!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: On your mark, get set, go!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Ooh, this is so exciting!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Okay, maybe not that exciting.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Ugh, I can't take it anymore! Somepony's making balloon animals!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Pinkie, you can look away now.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I passed?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: You passed. You're the only Pinkie who kept staring at the wall.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I had to. I just had to. I couldn't leave my friends, I just couldn't. But I guess sometimes I will have to choose between them.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I knew you'd be up to the challenge.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I'm me! I'm me! I'm me! Or am I? Yeah, I'm pretty sure I am.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Dear Princess Celestia,

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: It's great to have fun, but it's even greater to have great friends. And having lots of friends means that you sometimes have to make choices as to who you'll spend your time with. But that's okay, because good friends will always give you lots of opportunities to have fun. So even if you're missing out, it's never for long.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Hi, Pinkie Pie. We were thinking we should go out and celebrate.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: You up for some wheelbarrow races?

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Or I could take everypony on a cloud ride!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: I could throw a party with punch and zesty cucumber sandwiches! Ooh!

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: That looks like fun.

title: Too Many Pinkie Pies
dialog: Oh, Pinkie.

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: [whining] What to wear, what to wear? Oh, what to wear?!

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: Scoot your boot, Apple Bloom. It's not like it's the Harvest Day Parade! We're just goin' to the train station!

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: Too casual. Too summery.

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: [sigh] Your cousin isn't gonna care what you're wearin'. Just pick somethin'!

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: This is my first time meetin' her, and she's from Manehattan. I wanna make a good impression!

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: You know what would make a good impression?

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: What?

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: Bein' on time to pick her up!

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: You got nothin' to worry about, sugarcube. Y'all are gonna get along great. You already have somethin' in common.

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: [muffled, through snorkel] Oh, yeah? What's that?

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: Neither of you have your cutie mark.

title: One Bad Apple
dialog: What?! How could you forget to tell me somethin' like that?

title: One Bad Apple

dialog: I can't believe I didn't recognize the Alicorn Amulet!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: The more she uses it, the more it will corrupt her!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: But how am I supposed to beat that amulet? My magic's not good enough!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Twilight Sparkle, much work have you done. You learned all of my lessons; all but one. If Trixie's tricks have you in a fix, you must nix your magic and use the six.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Nix your magic, use the six... Nix your magic, use the six! Use the six! That's it! Zecora, you're a genius! Now we'll need to get you back inside Ponyville, Fluttershy.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: This better not be another false alarm, or the Great and Powerful Trixie will<U+0096> [gasps] You! [muffled] What's the matter, Twilight Sparkle? Not enjoying your exile?

title: Magic Duel
dialog: I know about the Alicorn Amulet. I know you cheated.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Cheated? Moi?

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Yeah. And I thought you might wanna see what a real magical amulet looks like. Zecora gave it to me. [muffled] It's from beyond the Everfree Forest, [normal] and it's way more powerful than your measly little Alicorn Amulet!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Ha! Nothing's more powerful than the Alicorn Amulet! And nopony's more powerful than the Great and Powerful Trixie!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: [muffled] Care to put your amulet where your mouth is? [normal] How about another duel?

title: Magic Duel
dialog: [muffled] Why should I? I already beat you.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: That's up to you! But I guess you'll never see the totally awesome magic from beyond the Everfree Forest. Come on, Zecora.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Wait!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Okay, okay, you're on! A second duel.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Let's start with a simple age spell, shall we?

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Let's.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Snips, Snails.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: An oldie, but a goodie, ha. Now, let's see what your little charm can do.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: No problem. Um, Applejack, Rarity? Could you help me, please?

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Huh?

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Huh?

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Oh, ho-hum. So you can do an age spell, big deal.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: That's... That's impossible!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: That's nothing!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Yow!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: How did you<U+0096>

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Duplication spell. Ever see one pony play ten instruments?

title: Magic Duel
dialog: This... just can't be!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Ooh, one more. I can turn a mare into a stallion.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Well, Trixie, looks like my amulet is more powerful than yours<U+0096> Hey! Give it back!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: [laughs] With this amulet, I shall now rule all of Equestria!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Witness, my subjects. Gaze upon an ever greater and 'powerful-er' Trixie!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Hey! [scoffs] I don't need that old Alicorn Amulet. I have this!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: [laughs] Stop it! Tha<U+0097> that tickles!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Tickles?! That was supposed to make you writhe in agony! This amulet is defective! [magic zap] Give mine back!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Sorry. This is going back into hiding where it belongs.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: By the way, Trixie, the amulet around your neck? It's one of Zecora's doorstops.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: [upset] But... how did you do those spells? Nopony can do those spells!

title: Magic Duel
dialog: You're right. Not even me. Zecora taught me so much about magic while I was in exile. She even taught me when not to use it. My magic alone wasn't powerful enough to take on the Alicorn Amulet head to head, so I needed to use a different kind of magic <U+0096> the magic of friendship. I also knew that the only pony who could get the amulet off your neck was you.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: But... what about the pony with the ten instruments?

title: Magic Duel
dialog: That's not magic. That was just Pinkie Pie.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Trixie?

title: Magic Duel
dialog: It's the least I could do. I treated you and your friends so horribly when I was wearing that Alicorn Amulet. I just couldn't control myself. You can forgive me, can't you?

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Hmmm. Sure.

title: Magic Duel
dialog: Oh, good. Don't you think the Great and Apologetic Trixie is the most magnificent humble pony you've ever seen?!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Whoo-hoo!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [sips] Nice moves, kid.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Nice moves? Rainbow Dash thinks I've got<U+0096>

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [gasps] ...nice moves!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: ...Then, all of a sudden, I'm airborne! And Rainbow Dash looks over and was like, "Nice moves, kid."

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Woooow.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: She really said that?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I mean, it's like she practically told me she wanted to take me under her wing, teach me everything she knows, and become like my big sister!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I dunno about all that.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: It was a really nice compliment and all, but...

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I know, I know. But all that stuff I said could happen, right?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Sure.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Absolutely.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I just need to find a way to spend some time with her, y'know, so she can see more of my awesomeness.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Well... Applejack and I are supposed to be campin' up at Winsome Falls this weekend. Maybe I could get my big sis to invite Rainbow Dash, and then you could come, too!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Really?!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Sure!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I wanna go...

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Well, duh, of course you can go!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: And I'll get Rarity to come too! Rarity loves camping!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I despise camping! All of that... [shudders] ...nature.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Oh, all right! Ooh! Of course I will need to find an outfit more appropriate for 'roughing it'. Ooh!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: See? Told you she'd wanna go.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: You packed bug spray?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Yup. You got the canteens?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Yup. Looks like we're all set then.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Hey!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Gee, Rarity, did you remember to pack?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Oh, well, let's see who gets the last laugh when you're absolutely desperate to curl your lashes, and you realize you didn't bring your eyelash curler.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Well, looks like we're all set now.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: But what about Rainbow Dash? Isn't Rainbow Dash coming?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: 'Course she is, sugarcube. She's gonna meet us up at our first campsite.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Oh.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Alright, y'all, let's move 'em out!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Oh, are we there yet?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: The last thousand times you asked that, the answer was no. This time, it's actually yes. There's Rainbow Dash up there right now.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [quietly] Alright, Scootaloo, just play it cool. [normal] Hey Rai<U+0096>

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [clears throat] Hey, Rainbow Dash! What's up?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: What took you guys so long?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Well, some of us didn't pack as light as the others. So we were slowed down a bit.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Looks like you'll be sharing a tent with me, huh?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Heh, if that's okay with you.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Sure! Long as you don't snore. You don't snore, do you?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Nope. No way. Not me. Never snored a day or [laughs nervously] night in my life.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Then you and I are gonna get along just fine.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: You have got to be kidding me.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Sweetie Belle, do be a dear and see if you can find some fresh flowers for my bedside vase.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [mimicking Rarity] Scootaloo, do be a sweetheart and see if you can gather some firewood.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Seriously though. Can you get us some wood for the fire?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Of course!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Okay, everybody get comfortable, 'cause I'm about to tell you the best story you've ever heard.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Is it about the time when Rarity had wings, and then they got ruined, and then you saved her from plummeting to her doom?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Okay, maybe it's the second best story you've ever heard. But probably still the scariest. [spookily] You like scary stories, right?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [gasps] Mm-hmm.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: It all happened on a night just like this one, in a forest, just like this...

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: ...And then, The Olden Pony asked, [mimicking aged voice] "Who's got my rusty horseshoe?"

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Not me!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: You do!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [clears throat] Something in my throat. I wasn't scared at all, heheh. Good story.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Knew you wouldn't be scared. The way you jumped that cart the other day, you're like me <U+0096> fearless.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [coddling] Don't worry. Rarity is here to keep you safe and sound. Ooh!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [yawns] Think it's about time for me to hit the straw.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Don't you worry, little sis. There's no 'Olden Pony' in our tent.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [nervously] Haa, that sure was funny, wasn't it? Heheh. How they were all afraid of The Olden Pony? Heh, but not me, heh!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: That's because you're tough, just like when I was your age!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I'm hitting the sack. Come in whenever you feel like it.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [nervously] It's, it's nothing... Just my imagination...

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [nervously] And that isn't the thundering stomp of The Olden Pony...

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I-Is anyone out there?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [cries] [dash] [panting] Rainbow Dash<U+0096>?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [yawns] What's that noise? Is there a bug in here? [sighs] I dunno about you, but I slept like a filly.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [nervously] Best night ever.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Glad you're rested up, because we've got a long trek ahead. Totally gonna be worth it when we get to Winsome Falls.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Ohh... Am I sweating? Oh! I think I'm sweating! Oh, uh, but it's absolutely worth it to get to spend time with my little sister. It's just that this cart feels like it's getting heavier all the time!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I don't care if that's cart's as heavy as a pack of mules. If we don't get a move on, it'll be dark before we get to the campsite!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [gasps] Dark?! [wings buzzing] I'll just ride ahead and make sure the path is clear. We don't wanna be out here after dark, right?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Doesn't matter to me.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Well, y'know, [hushed] it's for the scaredy-ponies, heheh.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [fades in] That's why it's always important to bring your own trunk on any public outing.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [gasps] Um... don't come this way! Take the path! It's, heh, way better than going through the bushes.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: You're more nervous than a worm in an apple on cider making day. What gives, Scootaloo?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Heh, nothing, just thought I heard something, aheh.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: You sure you're okay? You seem a little jumpy.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Just getting my exercise! You know how important it is to stretch out those hindquarters every so often, aheh.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Uh, d-do you need a little help?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: That's so sweet, thank you.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: No need for tents tonight, y'all. We'll just take shelter in that cave.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: All right! A deep, dark cave! Perfect for the story I've got for tonight. All we need is a campfire, and we're good to go.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [gulps] [nervously] Uh, of course...

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [nervously] I'll be right back with lots of firewood from the deep... dark... not-scary-at-all forest!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Thanks.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [breathing heavily] [sighs] Okay. I can do this. On the count of three, I get those branches. One... two... three! [trembling] [sighs] [nervously] Here, branches branches branches...

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Bbbbrrr! Hoo-wee! It's colder than a timberwolf's toenail. Bbbrr! Where's that Scootaloo?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [panicked laughing] Here you go!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: That's it?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: It's all I could find, 'cause, y'know, there aren't that many trees around here!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: It's all we need. Why don't you sit with Rainbow Dash for a while?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Hey, I have an idea! How about I tell tonight's story?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Alright, just make sure it's a horrible one.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: There once was a really really nice pony who lived in a bright and sunny land, where there are rainbows every day, and lots and lots of happy friends, and<U+0096>

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: No offense, but it's not a real campfire story unless somepony's shaking. [spookily] I've been told that these very woods are haunted...

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [spookily] ...by The Headless Horse! It gallops only at night<U+0096>

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: If it doesn't have a head, then how in tarnation does this pony know where it's goin'?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: It's headless, not brainless. [spookily] ...looking for little lost ponies<U+0096>

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: So where's its brain?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [spookily] [crossfades in] ...and they were never heard from ever again!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [gasps] Never?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Never.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Don't worry, you'll be safe with me tonight.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: It's not time for bed yet, is it?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: 'Fraid so, Scootaloo.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: You don't have to ask me twice!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Good night, Sweetie Belle.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Good night, y'all.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Good night, y'all.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Sleep tight.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Oh, just one more song! Anyone? [whoosh] How about a dance contest? I know you love to cut a rug, so how 'bout we mess up a cave floor? I have a brilliant idea! Hide and seek! Who's with me?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [yawns] Maybe tomorrow.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Aww.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Seems like you don't really wanna go to sleep tonight. Is there some reason why?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Pfft, of course not! I just love camping and hanging out with Rainbow Dash so much that I don't wanna waste a single minute with sleep! [yawns] Heh, silly sleep.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: That's cool and all, Scoot, but this pony needs her shut-eye and she needs it now!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [gasps] If The Headless Horse catches me, I'm never gonna be heard from again! And I wanna be heard from! Woah, woaaah! Ugh! [grunts] Woah!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [panting] Aaah!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [echoing] A warm welcome to you, Scootaloo.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Princess Luna! I thought you were The Headless Horse!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: You were mistaken, but I hope not disappointed.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: You are so, so much better than The Headless Horse. But what are you doing here? Shouldn't you be in Canterlot?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I am the princess of the night. Thus it is my duty to come into your dreams.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Oh, yeah... Wait, is this just a dream? But it feels so real!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I assure you that you are asleep. But when you awake, the thing that frightens you most will still exist.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [nervously] Eh... The Headless Horse?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Hmmm... Is The Headless Horse really what frightens you the most?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Mm-mm. I'm afraid Rainbow Dash will find out I'm not as tough as she thinks I am.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Everypony has fears, Scootaloo. Everypony must face them in their own way. But they must be faced, or the nightmares will continue.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Face your fears!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: <U+0096>Princess Luna?! [sighs] It was just a dream.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [gasps] But The Headless Horse isn't! Rainbow Dash said it lives here, in these very woods!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [panting] So it's a horse without a head... which means it doesn't have a mouth... and if it doesn't have a mouth, then... it's not a horse-eat-pony kind of horse... but still... it's a horse without a head!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Hello?! Is anyone out there? [nervously] Anyone except The Headless Horse?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Heellllp<U+0096>

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I gotcha!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Rainbow Dash! Is that you? Thank you, thank you!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: What were you doing out here in the middle of the night?!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [echoing] It is time for you to face your real fear, Scootaloo!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Hey, I'm gonna tell you something, but if you ever tell anypony else, I'm gonna deny it. First time I heard those stories... I was scared too.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [sniffles] You were?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Sure! I mean, I got over it because I realized pretty quick that if there was such thing as a Headless Horse, I could totally take it on. So, you're looking for somepony to take you under their wing, huh?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Mm-hmm.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Yeah, I might be up for something like that.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Really?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: As long as you don't go falling into any more rivers in the middle of the night.

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: [giggles] It's a deal!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: I call sister teams! Last herd to make it to the falls is a moldy carrot!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Ugh, if you insist. [giggles] It is so on!

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: They think they can beat the two of us?

title: Sleepless in Ponyville
dialog: Here it is, for pony's sake. Now take it and stop all your moaning.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Ooooh, I wish the mailpony would just come already! I can't wait another minute to find out if Rainbow Dash got in or not!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Pinkie Pie, you're more nervous than Rainbow Dash.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I'm not nervous at all. When I get into the Wonderbolt Academy...

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: IF you get in! If you get in! Don't jinx it!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I'm telling you, it's in the bag.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Don't jinx it!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: She is the best flyer in Ponyville.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: In Ponyville? I'm probably the best flyer in all of Equestria. I wouldn't be surprised if they just went ahead and made me a Wonderbolt on the first day.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I... didn't get in.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Gotcha! Ha, you guys are so gullible. Like I wasn't gonna get in!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I'm just sooooooooooo happy for you!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Uh... thanks?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Pinkie Pie? I kinda need to get going.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Okay. I'm done!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: The sooner I get there, the sooner I get to show 'em my stuff! See you guys in a week!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Good luck!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Won't need it!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: DON'T FORGET TO WRITE!!! [echoing] [to others] Do you think she heard me?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Oh, yeah! This is gonna be sweet!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Well, lookie what we got here. Bet y'all think you're Wonderbolt material, don't ya?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Think you got what it takes to be an elite flyer?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Well then. Let me be the first to tell you... You don't! If you had what it took to be an elite flyer, you'd already be a Wonderbolt! Still think you're something special?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: [to Bulk Biceps] Ya think you're hot stuff? [to Rainbow Dash] You look like you're the worst flyer in the whole academy! You'll probably quit after the first day!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: No, ma'am! I'd never quit, ma'am!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Ha. What about you? Bet you couldn't fly past the first flagpole without getting winded.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Try me, ma'am.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: What's that?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Let me show you what I've got, ma'am.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Ah. You want a chance to prove yourself, huh?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Yes, ma'am!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Well then, now's your chance. Give me five hundred laps! All of you!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Lap four-hundred and ninety-nine!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: One more lap to go!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: You're on!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Five hundred!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Not bad... for a couple of newbies.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Name's Lightning Dust.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Rainbow Dash!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Wanna grab some grub in the mess hall?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Definitely.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Pinkie Pie, Rainbow Dash hasn't even been gone twenty-four hours yet. Give her a chance to settle in first. Why don't we just go see what Twilight's up to? I hear Princess Celestia's got her workin' on some new spells!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: So in other words, you're stickin' by the mailbox.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Yep!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Suit yourself.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: The Wonderbolts are the fastest, best precision flyers in the world. But spin-outs can still happen. And when they do, a Wonderbolt must be able to recover quickly. This... is the Dizzitron. It's gonna make you very <U+0096> I repeat <U+0096> very dizzy. Your task is to try and recover and fly straight again, as soon as possible. Once you have recovered you must come in for a smooth landing. Now, who's first? [to Meadow Flower] You. You're up.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Now! Ready?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Go!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Release!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Huh. Fifteen seconds. Decent, but I wouldn't go writin' home about it! Who's next? Alright, Rainbow Dash. Let's see what you got.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Yes, ma'am!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Okay, go!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Release! Six seconds? That's an academy record.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I make everything look easy.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Okay, Lightning Dust. You're up.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Ma'am, can you put the Dizzitron at maximum speed? I wanna push my limits.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: You sure about that?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Yes ma'am.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Okay. You asked for it.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Release! Six point five seconds. Not bad.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Next!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: No pony even came close to six seconds.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: They should make us Wonderbolts right now.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Yeah, they should.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Listen up! For the rest of the camp, you'll be working in pairs. 'Morrow morning, I'll post the teams, including who'll be lead pony and who'll be wingpony. Good luck.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Like we're going to need it.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Heh, yeah.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: So, which one of you lucky gals gets to be my wingpony? What?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: A wingpony?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: They made us a team! Isn't that awesome?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Permission to enter, ma'am.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: What is it, Rainbow Dash?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I had the best time on the Dizzitron! Only six seconds!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: And?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: And you made me a wingpony!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Because I believe you and Lightning Dust will be an unstoppable team. Do you not think you'll be an unstoppable team?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Yes, ma'am! I mean no, ma'am! I mean... We'll be an unstoppable team, ma'am.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Then what's the problem?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I think I should be lead pony, ma'am.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: And I think Lightning Dust likes to push herself a little harder than you do. That's why I made her lead pony. Got it?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Yes, ma'am.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Good.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Today you will all be participating in a flag hunt. We'll divide you into two teams, red... and blue. Whoever finds the most flags of the opposing team's color wins.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: If you think this is gonna to be fun, you are sadly mistaken. This is for training purposes. This is not recess. Lead ponies and wingponies must fly together. If any pair splits apart, they will be immediately disqualified. Do you understand?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Ready to rock and roll?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Ready.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: You spotted any flags yet?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Not yet. Oh! There's one!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Good eyes!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: We should slow down. It doesn't look like both of us can make it at this speed!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Peh.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Ow!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Lightning Dust and Rainbow Dash found the first flag!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Come on! Let's find some more!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Uh, sure. Just give me a second.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Oh, you're fine.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: She's still at it.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I just wish we could help her.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Help me? The only thing that could possibly help me right now is a letter from Rainbow Dash! It's been three days already. By now, she probably doesn't even know our names anymore! She probably can't remember our faces! "Pinkie Pie? I never heard of a Pinkie Pie! Who is Pinkie Pie?"

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Well, if you're so worried, then why don't you send her a letter first?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Of course! That's a great idea!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Oh wait! I got an even better idea! How about we send Rainbow Dash a care package? You know, before she forgets all about us? Although, come on, let's face it. It's probably too late for that. But, uh, maybe it'll jog her memory somehow.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Pinkie Pie, I'm sure Rainbow Dash still remembers our faces and who we are. But I think sending her a care package is a great idea.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: A care package it is! We'll send it through the mail! WAIT! Ah! That won't work at all!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Why not?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Because what if the package gets lost in the mail? What if somepony else gets the package by accident and then she remembers us instead of Rainbow Dash and then she becomes our new friend? And then the real Rainbow Dash won't ever know that she used to have friends and she forgot them!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Is anypony else followin' this?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I've got it! We'll deliver the care package to Rainbow Dash in person!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I wouldn't mind a little trip.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I'll go!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Count me in!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Me too.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Me five! But don't be upset if she doesn't recognize you at first. It may take a while for her to get her memory back.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Today we'll be doing our famous air obstacle course.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Ugh! Can't they go any faster? It's no good, I can't get around them!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Doesn't matter! We can still fly completely in sync and blow Spitfire's mind with our moves!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I guess...

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: What are they, a couple of snails? It's just a little weather.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Now's our chance to pass these slowpokes!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Not bad! And in record time, too! Definitely made the right decision making you two a team. The others seem to have had a little trouble with the precision part of the exercise. I'd better go help sort them out. Why don't you two go hit the mess hall early?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Yes, ma'am!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Thank you, ma'am. Um, Lightning Dust? Next time, maybe we don't cut the other teams off like that.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Hey, you snooze, you lose! Besides, Wonderbolts are supposed to be able to recover from a spin-out. You saw them on the Dizzitron! They could use the practice. I mean, it's not our fault we're so much better than those other guys! Not every pony is destined to become a Wonderbolt. Only the best of the best, right?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Yeah, I-I guess you're right...

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: 'Course I'm right! Now let's go fuel up! Kicking all that tail has made me hungry.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: [chomp] Yeah!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I have an idea about how we can literally blow away our competition.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: But we're already way ahead.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Are you in or not?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: [echoing] Lightning Dust likes to push herself a little harder than you do. That's why I made her lead pony.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I'm in!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Then follow my lead!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I can't control it!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: It's a twister!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Hold on!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Noooooo!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Are you guys okay?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Pinkie Pie!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: You... remember me!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Well... yeah, of course I remember you. But... what are you all doing here?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: We wanted to bring you a care package. Didn't realize you'd be in the middle of some crazy tornado drill.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: That... was... awesome!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Awesome? My friends could have been smashed to pieces!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Yeah, but they weren't, right? Can't say the same for the clouds. We totally wiped them out with that tornado. The other cadets will have to be up there for days to bust as many as we did.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: A hoof bump? Seriously? You made me clip my wing. You sent half of our class into serious tailspins on the obstacle course. You unleashed a tornado that nearly demolished my friends!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Yeah, and?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: And I get that you want to be the best. So do I! But you're going about it in the wrong way.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: The Wonderbolts don't seem to think so. After all, Spitfire did make me the leader and you the wingpony.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: [sigh] You're right. She did.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: This better be important. You're supposed to be up there busting clouds with your partner.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: We're done with that, ma'am.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Already? That's an academy record! Explain your methods.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: That's why I'm here, ma'am. Lightning Dust decided to use a tornado.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: A bit excessive for cloud-busting. But judging from your time, it was obviously an effective tactic.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Yeah, well that "effective tactic" nearly took out my friends! No disrespect, ma'am, but there's a big difference between pushing yourself as hard as you can and just being reckless. And if being reckless is what gets rewarded around here, if that's what it means to be a Wonderbolt, then I don't want any part of it.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: What are you saying, newbie?

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I quit.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: You did what?!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Being a Wonderbolt was your dream!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Not anymore.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: I'm sorry, Rainbow Dash. I know how much this meant to you.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Rainbow Dash! How dare you storm out of my office without giving me a chance to respond! The Wonderbolts are looking for the best flyers in Equestria, but you were right. Being the best should never come at the expense of our fellow ponies. It's not just about pushing ourselves. It's about pushing ourselves in the right direction. You've shown that you're capable of doing just that. You're no wingpony, Rainbow Dash. You're a leader.

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: OhmygoshOhmygoshOhmygoshOhmygoshOhmygosh!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Now get out there and give me twenty!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Yes, ma'am!

title: Wonderbolts Academy
dialog: Wait! You didn't even get to open your care package!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Ha! Found 'em!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Aaa-choooo!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Heh. Gesundhoof.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Why, thank you, Applejack. I still can't believe it's been almost one hundred moons since our last family reunion. Aw, I remember it like it was yesterday.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Well, you have been talkin' about it pretty much every day since then.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Apple Bloom! How them RSVPs comin' along? Who's showin' their muzzle at the reunion?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Everypony!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Everypony? [aside, to Applejack] Feathers on a goat. [to Apple Bloom] Are you sure?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Well, I got RSVPs from Apples from Yonder Hill, Hollow Shades, Galloping Gorge, Foal Mountain, Apples from Fillydelphia, Tall Tale Town, and all the Apples from Appleloosa!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Guh?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Oh! And how could I forget? Manehattan! Babs is comin'! I get to see my favorite cousin!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: I think we're gonna need a bigger cider trough.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Whooeee! Looks like the family's grown tenfold since the last reunion! I'm gonna be busier than a worm in a rotten tomater tryin' to get everything ready!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: I could always help out.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Me, too!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Oh, I sure would appreciate that. Granny's a little rustier in the giddy-up since the last time the Apples all got together.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: You may be a tad old, Granny, but you're as feisty and full of spark as ever<U+0096>

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Who you callin' old?!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Uh... I just meant... Why don't you let me take over puttin' the reunion together this time 'round? Then all you need to worry about is enjoyin' yourself.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Hmmm. Alright, young'un, you got yourself a deal. You are in charge.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: I won't let you down, Granny. You just tell me what the reunion needs, and I'll take care of the rest.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: I'll do better than tell you what the reunion'll need. I'll show ya!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: We've been hostin' these things at Sweet Apple Acres every hundred moons since we first planted roots here in Ponyville.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Hey, who's that?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: That'd be your Great-Great-Auntie Applesauce when she was just about your age. Now, she used to go by another name, but everypony started calling her Applesauce after half her teeth fell out when she was makin' apple jam. Yeah. Never did find them teeth in all those jars.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Hey! That's you, Granny!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Sure is. Apple family's been workin' on that same old quilt since our first reunion.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Well, nopony told me you actually had to knot the end of the thread!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Okay, so I'll need to get new quiltin' materials, fabric, needles, thread... You've really been workin' on the same quilt since the first reunion?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Surely have. I don't think we're ever gonna finish that doggone thing!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Hey, what's goin' on here?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Well, you know us Apples enjoy a good fritter...

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: That's how we figured out your sister had the appetite of a full-grown stallion.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Better get twice as much honey and flour, then... fifty more buckets of apples... more oil... wood for the fire...

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Now, stick an apple in my mouth and roast my rump! This one sure brings back memories. Y'know how Babs is your favorite cousin? Well, Apple Rose is mine. The two of us entered the seven-legged race every reunion!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Never won a single one of them races.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Races. We'll need cloth ties, finish line... Not much to a seven-legged race. Hmm...

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: And, of course, we can't forget to take the big family photo! We always snapped a photo in front of the barn at the end of every reunion, let's us see how our family's grown!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Photo in front of the barn. Got it.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: You sure have some great memories of these reunions, don'tcha?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Indeedy, and I'm lookin' forward to makin' more at this one. Oh, I'm sure everypony is, and I do mean everypony! We got the whole family together this time 'round! Who knows if they'll all be able to make the next one?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: That's true! Busy as everypony's lives are gettin' these days, chances are pretty slim we'll be this lucky next time 'round. Don't worry, Granny, I'm gonna make sure this is the most memorable reunion we've ever had! I'd better get started... I've got some plannin' to do!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Oh, hootenanny! Would you look what your second cousin is wearin' on her head?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Apple Bloom! What are you doin' up?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: I was gonna ask you the same thing.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: I can't sleep. My gears are turnin' in my head about this reunion!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [yawning] Yeah... I can't wait to see my cousin Babs. We're gonna do so many fun things together...

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Fun? That's just the beginnin' of it! Granny Smith handed me the reins of this reunion, and I'm gonna make the most of it. Apple Bloom, I've got so many things planned you won't even have a minute's rest!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Trust me, little sis. This reunion I'm puttin' together is gonna be worth the wait.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [snoring] Whoa!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Rise and shine! We don't have much time!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [belches] Don't forget the glitter!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: H-ah. Think that'll do it!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: And just in time, too.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: They're here!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Apple Rose! Ohhh! Ooh, this is more excitin' than when it rained frogs!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [through megaphone] Howdy, y'all, and welcome to the Apple family reunion!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [through megaphone] My name's Applejack, and I just want to let y'all know that I got a real big day planned for ya! We're gonna start off with an obstacle course for the young'uns, and some fritter makin' and quiltin' for the not-so-young'uns. And there's lots more to come after that! Hope y'all enjoy it!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Where is she?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Babs!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Cuz!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: I know it hasn't been that long since we've seen each other, but<U+0096>

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: I can't wait to tell you about my new school!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: I can't wait to hear all about it!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Jeepers, where do I start? Okay. So first day<U+0096>

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Babs! Huh, so glad you could come!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Why don't you two head over to the obstacle course?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: We kinda wanna catch up a little bit first...

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Don't you worry. There'll be plenty of time for family bondin' while you're racin' against your other cousins.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Alrighty, ponies! Ready to have some fun?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Whoa, is that the finish line? It's like a mile away or somethin'!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Actually, that's just the marker where you go on to the next leg of the race.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: There's more?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Much more. Trust me, I have put together somethin' you are never gonna forget. After the seven-legged race, you're gonna wanna hurry up and head over here, where you'll be bobbin' for apples!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Then you'll run around these trees fifty times until you're real good and dizzy. Then you'll jump these big wooden hurdles. And then there's the final leg, where you'll balance plates on your head while sayin' "Pappy pony picked a pluck of prickly pluffnuggets" over and over and over again. Last pony standin' wins!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Seriously?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Seriously! C'mon, y'all! Let's start makin' some memories! On your mark... get set... go!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Whooeee! Lookin' good, everypony! Ooh, better go check on the quilt.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: How long you had those new choppers, Auntie Applesauce?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [giggles] We were just usin' it to help break open that pi<f1>ata!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Sorry, Auntie Applesauce, I am busy-busy-busy. Y'all should get started, though!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: We couldn't find our rocking chairs.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: I got rid of 'em to make room for these. This is the year y'all are finally gonna finish that quilt!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [over noise] Won't that be excitin'?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [over noise] I said, won't that be<U+0096>

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: <U+0096>excitin'?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [over noise] That's the spirit!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [over noise] What did she say?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [over noise] Good gracious!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [dizzy] How are Scootaloo and Sweetie Belle?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [dizzy] Great! Ugh...

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [dizzy] You alright?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Ugh...

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Havin' fun?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Better pick up the pace on those fritters though, huh? Roll, fold, crimp, slide to the left. Roll, fold, crimp, slide to the left. Roll, fold, crimp, slide to the left. Now you try! That's it! Gotta keep this assembly line movin', gals! We want every Apple here to get a chance to taste the best darn fritters in Equestria!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Any other blank flanks at your new school?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Yeah. Two.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Do they wanna be Crusaders?

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Totally!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Great!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Ah can' thfeel my tongue.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: Neh nehber.

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [through megaphone] Alright, Apples, break!

title: Apple Family Reunion
dialog: [sighs] Finally...

title: Apple Family Reunion
