dialog: We're not really going! We just needed to get on the train so I can get that rabbit! And when I do, we're off!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: What?!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: That's not fair!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: There he is!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: No, no, no, no, no, no!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: So it seems like the Crystal Empire would be really cold, but I've heard that it's not! It's as warm as can be!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Do you think the walls are crystal? [gasps] Maybe even see-through! Can you imagine see-through walls?

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Take it! Just take it!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: So beautiful!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Well, enjoy it while you can, 'cause we're not getting out of this car until we're back in Ponyville!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: There is no way, no how, we're comin' all the way to the Crystal Empire without lookin' around!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Nopony's gonna get past this dragon!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Don't make me use this!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Whoa, just whoa.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Ah! I'm in crystal heaven!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Shhh! They're right there! There's the bunny! Please, please, pretty please, don't go down there! I'll fluff your tail! I'll perm, highlight, and blow it out if you'll just stop!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: What do you want?! Name it, and it's yours! [pants] [groans] [kisses] Hyah!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Oh my goodness.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Hah! You're coming with me!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: We made it!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Without seeing the palace!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: I think this car's empty.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: They're coming this way! Everybody down!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: There has to be a better solution!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Shh! Oh, don't sit down, don't sit down!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Whooeee! My dogs are barkin'.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Did y'all hear that? They really are!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Huh, bummer Spike had to miss out on all this. He woulda' had fun here.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: I'm sure he's having a great time watching all the critters back at home.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Think he's still got a handle on things?

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: If he's staying calm and collected, I bet he's doing a terrific job as a leader.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Go ahead, bunny. Do your worst. I deserve it. I ignored you, tried to pawn you off on someone else, I didn't take these silly things out, or fluff this like I was supposed to. I wasn't really thinking about you at all. Any of you. Just wanted the jewels. I hope you'll all forgive me someday.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: You will? [stomach growls] Oh great. I'm gonna be the one who gives us away.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: You all hear that?

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: I can't wait to scratch the belly on Winona. Oh, I miss her.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Hello! Thought we'd meet you at the station!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: So we could hear all about the Crystal Empire, and find out if you brought us one of the crystal snow globes that they sell at the train station!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: How did you know about the snow globes?

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Um... lucky guess?

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: I've gotta hand it to you, Spike. You did a really good job of taking care of the animals.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Oh, Spike, Angel looks perfect! You did such a good job fluffing his tail.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Yeah, well... we're like this now.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: You know who.

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: So what are you thinking? Bake 'em into a jewel pie? Ooh, six-layer gem cake sounds pretty good!

title: Just for Sidekicks
dialog: Yeah, it does. [slurps] It really really does. [pause] Whyyyyyyyyy???!!!

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: You absolutely sure you can do this?

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: Of course. Wouldn't have agreed to it if I couldn't. Piece of cake. Speaking of cake, I got a little something I need to attend to.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: Yeah, like keeping an eye on a house full of critters.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: [slurp] Uh, yeah, uh, that was totally what I was talking about. Relax. Go to your welcoming thing in the Crystal Empire. Spike's got it all under control.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: Hurry up, Twilight! We can't miss our train!

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: Oh, this is gonna be a real treat. Princess Cadance said she'd never seen the Crystal Ponies so excited.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: Duh! Of course they're excited. They're up for the Equestria Games. It's only the biggest sporting event in all of Equestria.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: Didn't Cloudsdale host the Equestria Games one year?

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: No. Cloudsdale should have hosted the games one year. I'll never forget when we got the bad news.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: NOOOOOOOOOOO!

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: These Crystal Ponies lost a thousand years to an evil king's curse. They've had enough bad news. No way we're letting them experience the pain of losing out on these games.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: Exactly. Princess Cadance is counting on us to do our part to convince the Games Inspector to choose the Crystal Empire. And we are not gonna let her down. Are we?

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: NOOOOOOOOOOO! What? I was just answering Twilight's question.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: [through megaphone] Okay, everypony, great job! Sounds like we're ready.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: One more time from the top.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: Oh, please! I think that was perfect.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: [sighs] But we've run this, like, twelve times already. I think we've got it.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: Cadance said the Games Inspector really puts folks through the wringer on her visits. There's no margin for error here. And this time we need to practice the steps.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: On a train car?

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: You heard the pony! On your hooves!

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: [sighs] Probably should've watched our step while we were still on it, too.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: Wow! The Crystal Empire looks crystallier than ever!

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: They must have everypony in the Empire out sprucing it up!

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: This must be why we were asked to handle the welcome committee routine.

title: Games Ponies Play
dialog: And it's probably also because we'll be awesome at it.

title: Games Ponies Play

dialog: You've come such a long, long way And I've watched you from that very first day To see how you might grow To see what you might do To see what you've been through And all the ways you've made me proud of you

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Twilight? Is that you?

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Wha... I-I've never seen anything like it!

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Why, you've become an Alicorn. I didn't even know that was possible.

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Wow... You look just like a princess!

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: That's because she is a princess.

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: A... A princess?

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Since you've come to Ponyville, you've displayed the charity, compassion, devotion, integrity, optimism, and of course, the leadership of a true princess.

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: But... does this mean I won't be your student anymore?

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Not in the same way as before. I'll still be here to help and guide you, but we're all your students now, too. You are an inspiration to us all, Twilight.

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: But... what do I do now? Is there a book about being a princess I should read?

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: [giggles] There will be time for all of that later.

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: We are gathered here today in celebration of a momentous occasion. My most faithful student, Twilight Sparkle, has done many extraordinary things since she's lived in Ponyville. She even helped reunite me with my sister, Princess Luna. But today, Twilight Sparkle did something extraordinary. She created new magic, proving without a doubt that she is ready to be crowned Equestria's newest princess. Fillies and gentlecolts, may I present for the very first time, Princess Twilight Sparkle!

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Say something, Princess.

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Oh. Um... [clears throat] A little while ago, my teacher and mentor Princess Celestia sent me to live in Ponyville. She sent me to study friendship, which is something I didn't really care much about. But now, on a day like today, I can honestly say I wouldn't be standing here if it weren't for the friendships I've made with all of you. Each one of you taught me something about friendship, and for that, I will always be grateful. Today, I consider myself the luckiest pony in Equestria. Thank you, friends. Thank you, everypony!

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Twilight! I'm so proud of you!

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Are you crying?

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Of course not. It's... it's liquid pride. Totally different thing.

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Way to go, Princess!

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Best coronation day ever!

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: We love you, Twilight.

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: I love you too, girls!

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Life in Equestria shimmers Life in Equestria shines And I know for absolute certain

title: Magical Mystery Cure
dialog: Yes! Everything<U+0092>s going to be just fine!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: You gotta really flap 'em hard.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: [grunts] Whoa!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Uh, maybe not quite that hard.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Whoa! Oof!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Lookin' good up there, Princess Twilight.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Applejack, you know you don't have to call me that.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Why do you protest so? You've already given up wearing your crown all the time. The least you can do is embrace your new title.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: If other ponies want to address me that way, I suppose it's fine, but... not my friends. It just doesn't feel right. [sigh] And neither does all this flying business. The Summer Sun Celebration is only two days away, and I'm never gonna be ready to perform my part.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Not if you spend all your time down here, you won't! Now get up there and show everypony the big finish!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Wow! That was a big finish!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: You look amazing, darling. They've really captured your regality.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I suppose.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I don't know if it's everypony's dream.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Most of my dreams are about frosting! [slurp] Ohohohoho...

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: We'd better get going. We don't want to miss our train.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Fluttershy's right. Don't know about y'all, but I've still got bushels to do to get ready. The official celebration may be here in Canterlot, but hoo-wee, has the Mayor put us in charge of one heck of a party back home. Aw, don't look like that, sugarcube. You get to be right there with the other Princesses when Celestia raises the sun.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: And I'm honored. Really, I am. It's just that the Summer Sun Celebration is what first brought us all together. It just doesn't feel right not getting to spend such a special day with my Ponyville friends.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: It doesn't feel right to us either, darling. If the Mayor wasn't so desperate for our assistance, we'd most certainly stay here in Canterlot. And of course we do understand that your royal duties must come first.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: The Summer Sun Celebration may have brought us together, but it's something much bigger that'll always keep us connected. Exhibit A: The six of us are united by the Elements of Harmony. No amount of royal duties is gonna change that. Right, everypony?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Right, Pinkie Pie?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: You should take that as a yes.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: We're gonna write you and give you so many details, it'll be like you're in Ponyville with us! Right, girls?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: And you will be with us right after the Celebration. We already have an appointment on the books to discuss the royal upgrades to your loft decor.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Whee!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: [exhales] I can't help it, Spike. They've only been gone a minute, and I already feel like I'm missing something.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: [reading] Dear Twilight, you aren't missing anything. Your friend, Pinkie Pie.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: [in the distance] That's me!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: But I am. I just know it.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Check, check, check, check, and... check! Huh, whaddaya know? We're way ahead of schedule! I credit your extremely competent assistant.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: So do I.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: The Celebration isn't until the day after tomorrow. We could still fit in a quick trip to Ponyville and be back in plenty of time to finish off these last few things before the main event!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: [sighs] That would be nice, Spike, but what if something else came up while we were gone? What if we were delayed getting back and I wasn't able to finish everything on that list? What if we lost the list on the way to Ponyville and then couldn't remember which things we'd done and which things we hadn't done, and then spent so much time trying to figure out what we hadn't done and what we had done, and we ruined the entire Celebration by not doing the one really important thing that we were supposed to do?!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Uh... so that's a 'no' then?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: These are the first royal duties Princess Celestia has given me. I can't risk letting her down!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: And I'm sure you won't.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Your highness!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: No need for that now, Princess Twilight.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Sorry.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: [giggles] No need to apologize.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Sorry!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I must admit that it is wonderful to actually be looking forward to the Summer Sun Celebration.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: What do you mean?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: For my subjects, it has always been a celebration of my defeat of Nightmare Moon. But for me... [sighs] It was just a terrible reminder that I'd had to banish my own sister.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I guess I never really thought about it that way.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: But now it has become a wonderful reminder of her transformation back into Princess Luna, and our happy reunion. I am so pleased that you will be playing a role in the festivities. I know it must have been difficult to see your friends return to Ponyville without you.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Maybe a little.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: You may no longer be my student, Princess Twilight, but I hope you know that I will always be here if you need me. Just as I hope that you will always be there when I need you.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: [clears throat] I think this guy needs you?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: A letter from Ponyville, I presume?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Never mind. It's not important. Spike, where were we?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: About to call it a night?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: We should probably go over the checklist one more time.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I knew you were gonna say that...

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I'll leave you to it.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Huh?! Spike?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: [snores] Check-check-check-check-check-check...

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Spike!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Ungh... What time is it?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: It's the middle of the night! But it could be morning. That's just it! I can't tell!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Whoa. That is weird.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Come on, Spike, we have to find out what's going on.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I'm-I'm sure it's just... Well, there's certainly a logical ex<U+0096>

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: But I don't understand! Where are they?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Vanished?!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: My command?!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Way to take charge, Twilight.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Excuse me... Oh, pardon me... Are you all right? My goodness, what is it that has caused you all such distress?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Whatever it is, I'm sure it's nothing you need to really worry about. [screams] Oh, no, you were right. You should be worried! Very, very worried!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: ...Nope.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: [straining] Dagnabbit, we ain't never seen this kind of trouble with weeds before. Now that I think about it, I've never seen these kinds of weeds at all! Have y'all?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Nope.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Where the heck are these things comin' from? And what in tarnation is goin' on with the sky?!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Oh, no, you don't! This is Ponyville territory, and we aren't due for rain until after the Summer Sun Celebration. You Everfree clouds need to just head on back to where you belong! Whoa! [yelps] Gonna make me do this the hard way, huh? [yelping] Hey!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: [humming] Hmm. Something strange about the sky.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: What in the name of calming chamomile is going on?!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Opalescence, darling, I'm so sorry! I promise I am not doing this on purpose!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: It wasn't me, I swear!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Ooh, Sweetie Belle! If this is some sort of prank you and your little Crusader friends are pulling, I find very little humor in it!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Rarity, you have to help me! I think something's wrong with my horn!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Where are we going?!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: The Everfree Forest is... 'invading'. Whatever is going on, I'm sure we're going to need our friends and the Elements of Harmony to stop it! I just hope we haven't missed the train...

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: [gasps] [short on breath] Twilight? There is another way for us to get to Ponyville, remember?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: There is?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Huah! You can fly!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Oh. Right!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Whoa!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Something very strange is going on, and- [gasps] I for one would appreciate an explanation!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: All I know is the sky's split in two, and these clouds moving in sure aren't from around here.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Neither are all these crazy plants! They're comin' from the Everfree Forest! And try as we might, us Earth ponies can't do anythin' to get rid of 'em! Don't suppose you know any magic that might stop 'em from spreadin'?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Alas, this whole raging forest situation seems to have left my horn on the fritz!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: We have to figure out something! I don't know how much more of this Ponyville can take! [yelps] I don't know how much more I can take!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: The forest is expandin', y'all, and judgin' by how fast it's movin', it doesn't seem content just takin' over Ponyville... I reckon before long, it'll cover half of Equestria!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I'm starting to wish... we'd taken the train!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Almost there! Come on, Spike, we need to get the Elements of Harmony and find the others!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Incoming!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Whoa! Aah!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Oh, thank goodness!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Oh, I hope you know we wouldn't normally go through your books without permission...

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Sweet ground! [kissing noises] Sweet, sweet, wonderful ground!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Okay, I get it! I need to work on my flying!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I dunno if you've noticed, but the Everfree Forest is just a teeny-tiny bit out of control.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Guess it turned out you were missin' something here in Ponyville after all.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: But perhaps you already know what's causing all of this calamity. Has Princess Celestia sent you to dispel it posthaste?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Not exactly. You see, Princess Celestia is, well... she and Princess Luna are both...

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: They're missing!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I don't know who has taken them, but I've got a hunch we're going to need the Elements of Harmony to get them back.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Oh, yeah, just like old times.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: A-boo-yah!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I told ya we'd always be connected by the Elements. [sighs] Now we just gotta figure out who to aim these bad boys at so we can get Celestia and Luna back and keep the rest of Equestria from becoming plant food! Any ideas?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Hmm...

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I haven't found squat in any of the books I've been looking through! Oopsies! Missed a spot!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Half day, half night... strange weather patterns... out of control plants. I think I'm starting to get a pretty good idea of who we're up against.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: [singing] Winter Wrap Up, Winter Wrap-ooh! [laughs] Now, Twilight, you know Princess Celestia said that you were to give me a heads up before you summon me with that little spell she gave you. In case you haven't noticed, I was in the middle of a particularly invigorating shower.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: E-nough! Release Princess Celestia and Princess Luna, and stop the Everfree Forest from invading!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Why, [chuckles] whatever are you talking about?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Don't you play dumb with us, Discord! We know you're the one behind all of this!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Don't get me wrong. I absolutely love what you've done with the place, but I couldn't possibly take responsibility. I'm reformed, don't you remember?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Yeah, right! This has got your cloven hoofprints all over it!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I'll have you know that I have only one cloven hoof. Such accusations. And here I thought we were friends.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Drop the act, buster! We're onto you!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Ladies, ladies, I'm innocent. Would I lie to you?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Um, maybe?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Well then, it seems we've reached an impasse. I'm telling the truth, but you think I'm lying. What do friends like us do in a situation like this, Princess Twilight? Congrats, by the way, on the promotion. You totally deserve it.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I say we blast him back to stone!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Works for me!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Hear, hear!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Hey! We can't do that! What if he really is telling the truth?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Well, finally! Somepony willing to give me the benefit of the doubt. The rest of you could learn a lot about friendship from my dear friend Shutterfly here.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Um, it's Fluttershy.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Oh, right, whatever.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: If you're not the one responsible, then help us figure out who is!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I suppose I could, but after all the hoof pointing and besmirching of my good name, I just don't know if I'm up to it.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Rrrgh!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Why don't you ask your zebra friend if she knows anything?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Zecora!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: From my home, I have had to flee! The forest has grown too wild, even for me!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Any idea why all this is happenin'?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: I'm afraid it is a mystery to me as well, but I may have something that, if combined with a spell... I do not dare to use it myself, the results would be tragic. It only responds to Alicorn magic. Princess Twilight, you can turn the potion from purple to white. After a sip, you may see why the sky is day and night.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Oooh!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: [drinking] Doesn't seem to be worki-

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Where am I?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Not... another step!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Princess Luna! I don't understand. Where are we? Why did you and Celestia disappear?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Did you really expect me to sit idly by while they all basked in your precious light?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: Precious light?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1
dialog: There can only be one princess in Equestria! And that princess... will be me!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: They're missing!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: The Everfree Forest is... invading. I think I'm starting to get a pretty good idea of who we're up against.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I'm reformed. Don't you remember? Why don't you ask your zebra friend?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: You can turn the potion from purple to white. You may see why the sky is day and night.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Princess Luna!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: There can only be one princess in Equestria! And that princess will be me!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Luna! Think of how long you were banished to the moon! You'll give us no choice but to send you back there if you don't stop!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Luna, I will not fight you! You must lower the moon! It is your duty!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Luna? I am... Nightmare Moon! I have but one royal duty now: to destroy you! And where do you think you're going?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Celestia!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: No... Why would Luna do this? Why now? [crying] You're all right. You're all right! Princess Celestia?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Oh, dear sister. I am sorry, but you have given me no choice but to use these.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Are those the Elements of Harmony? But that's how they looked in... the past. This is the night you banished her.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Nooooooo!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Why are you all looking at me like that?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: It's just... you were mumblin' to yourself...

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Ooh! And don't forget the uncontrollable sobbing!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: We were really worried about you.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I for one found it delightful. Sort of a one-pony theater piece, if you will. You should really consider taking it on the road.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Did you find out whose rump we need to kick and where we can find them?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I saw something from a long time ago. But it didn't explain what's happening now.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Perhaps farther back still are the answers you seek. Another sip of the potion will give you a peek.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: You sure about this?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Oh, I do hope she breaks into a song this time!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Oh, this is so much fun. How about a game of 'Pin the Tail on the Pony'?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: [gasp] Play time is over for you, Discord.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Oh, I doubt that. [munching] Hungry? Suit yourselves. Oh! What have you got there?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: The Elements of Harmony.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: With them, we shall defeat you.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: This must be when they turned Discord into stone.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: [laughing] You should see yourselves right now. The expressions on your face. So intense. So sure of yourselves. [laughing] Hilarious!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: [gasp] The Tree of Harmony.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: The Tree of Harmony? My cutie mark.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Are you sure?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: We have managed to discover the only means by which we can defeat Discord and free the citizens of Equestria. Even without these elements, the Tree of Harmony will possess a powerful magic. As long as that magic remains, it will continue to control and contain all that grows here.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: So what did you find out?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I still don't know what's happened to Princess Luna and Princess Celestia, but I think I know why the Everfree Forest is acting this way. Something's happened to the Tree of Harmony.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: The tree of what now?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: It's where Princess Celestia and Princess Luna found the Elements. I think it's in danger.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Well, all right then! Let's go save a... tree. Uh... where is it exactly?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I think it's in... there.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Ooh-hoo! I'm going to need more popcorn!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Seems like only yesterday we were heading into these woods to find the Elements of Harmony.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Seems like only yesterday I was foolish enough to think I should go after them on my own. I don't know what we're going to face in there. But whatever it is, I know we need to face it together.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: [gasps] A cragadile! Run for your lives!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: That was close.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: [sighs] A little too close, if you ask me. You sure you're all right?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I'm fine. I just can't seem to get these new wings to do what I want them to do when I want them to do it.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Aw, you'll figure it out eventually.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: "Eventually" isn't soon enough.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: You have been having an awful lot of trouble with those things. And, well, who knows what else is gonna to come after us? You know, maybe it wouldn't be such a bad idea for Twilight to go back to Ponyville and let us look for the Tree of Harmony without her.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: What? Why?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: For starters, you just about got eaten by a cragadilly.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: We all did. He wasn't after just me.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Sure, but... well, the rest of us aren't princesses.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: What's that got to do with anything?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Princess Celestia and Princess Luna are gone. If something happened to you, I-I just don't think Equestria can risk losing another princess.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Applejack does make a valid point. Even if we manage to save the Tree of Harmony, it won't necessarily mean Princess Celestia and Princess Luna will return. Equestria will need somepony to lead in their absence.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: But the Tree of Harmony! I'm the only one who has seen it and knows what it looks like.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Huge tree, cutie marks on the trunk, probably being attacked by something hideously awful? Yeah, I'm pretty sure we'll know it when we see it.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: All of you feel this way? Feel like I shouldn't be here?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: It is probably for the best.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Discord!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: You're welcome! Hmph. No luck finding your tree?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: We ran into some trouble. And my friends decided it would be best if I returned to Ponyville while they continue the search. Equestria will need me if Princess Celestia and Princess Luna don't return.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I'm just surprised that you agreed to their plan. I never thought you'd be the kind of pony who would think she was better than everypony else.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I don't think I'm better than anypony!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I never should have agreed to come back here.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Come on, Twilight. Discord may be reformed, but he's not that reformed. He's just trying to get under your skin.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Well, it's working!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Anypony else starting to think this is a lost cause? We're almost at Celestia and Luna's old castle. Maybe whatever Twilight saw when she took that crazy potion wasn't real. Maybe there is no Tree of Harmony. Maybe<U+0096>

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Maybe it's right down there.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: [gasp] It can't be!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: How are we supposed to get to it?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Whoa! Oof! Ugh! Take the stairs, silly!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Are we there yet?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I don't know where we are. We're lost. I never should have left my friends.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: We can't just give up. Maybe if I get up there, I'll be able to spot 'em. Well, what do you know? Twilight?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: [gasp] I think it's dying!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Nice try. Heh- Whoa! Oof!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Valiant efforts on both your parts, but the tree remains in jeopardy.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: And I suppose you've got a better idea? That's what I thought.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I know who would know what to do. But we sent her home.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: It was your idea, Applejack!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: We all agreed it was the best thing, Rainbow Dash! We were tryin' to protect her.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Oof! Ow! Ugh!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Twilight! Trouble! Help!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Listen here, you rabid rhododendrons! You mess with one of us, you mess with all of us!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Up here!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Yoo-hoo! Come and get me!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Don't forget about me!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Ta-da!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I sure am glad you came looking for us.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Not as glad as I am that you found me.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: The truth of it is, Twilight, we're simply lost without you.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Yeah. Equestria may need its princess...

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: ... But we need our friend.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: [voice over] Even without these elements, the Tree of Harmony will possess a powerful magic. As long as that magic remains, it will continue to control and contain all that grows here.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I know how we can save the tree. We have to give it the Elements of Harmony.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Whoa, whoa, whoa, heh. How are we supposed to protect Equestria?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: How are we meant to rein Discord in if we can't use the Elements to turn him back to stone?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Twilight... The Elements of Harmony... They're what keep us connected no matter what.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: You're right about one thing, Applejack. The Elements of Harmony did bring us together. But it isn't the Elements that will keep us connected. It's our friendship. And it's more important and more powerful than any magic. My new role in Equestria may mean I have to take on new responsibilities, and our friendships may be tested, but it will never, ever be broken. There's no time to lose. Everypony ready?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: [thud] Oh, poo.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: We know how difficult it must have been for you to give up the Elements. It took great courage to relinquish them.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: What's inside it? How am I supposed to open it?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Six locks, six keys.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I do not know where they are. But I do know that it is a mystery you will not be solving alone.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Bravo, ladies, bravo! How ever did you save the day this time? Blast the beastie with your magic necklaces, I presume? Where are those little trinkets of yours? You know, the ones you use to send me back to my extremely uncomfortable stone prison?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: [sigh] Gone.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Gone? Gone?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: But our friendship remains. And if you want to remain friends, you'll stop thinking whatever it is you're thinking and help us clean up.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Fine. But I don't do windows.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: One thing I don't get. Why did all this happen now?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: I have no idea. Those seeds I planted should have sprouted up ages ago.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: What did you say?!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Oh, why should I try to explain it when you can see for yourself?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Play time is over for you, Discord!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Oh, I doubt that. [munching] Hungry? [voice over] Well, obviously things didn't go according to my original plan. My plunderseeds should have stolen the magic from the Tree of Harmony and captured Princess Celestia and Princess Luna thousands of moons ago. Alas, it seems the tree had enough magic to keep the seeds from growing up big and strong. Until now, that is.

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: You realize this is information we could have used hours ago?!

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: And rob you of a valuable lesson about being princess? What kind of friend do you think I am?

title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2
dialog: Citizens of Equestria, it is no longer with a heavy heart but with great joy that I raise the summer sun. For this celebration now represents not the defeat of Nightmare Moon, but the return of my sister, Princess Luna.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: What's wrong, Twilight?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Ugh, I've gone through every book in Ponyville, Spike, and there isn't a single mention of the mysterious chest that came from the Tree of Harmony, nor anything about keys to unlock it! But something tells me that opening it is pretty important. I hope Princess Celestia has some ideas. If the library in Canterlot doesn't have anything, I-I don't know where else to look!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [reading] My dearest Twilight, while it would be perfectly lovely to have you in Canterlot once more, I have another option in mind much closer to Ponyville.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [voice over] As you know, the ancient castle that I once shared with Princess Luna lies mostly in ruins, deep in the Everfree Forest. But if you look carefully, you may find a book that could prove helpful to your research, hidden somewhere in what's left of the castle library.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [happy gasp] Wow! Look at all these ancient books! It's a veritable goldmine of information! I can't believe it! Woo-hoo!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Whoa, whoa-whoa! Oof! [yelp] Uh, heh-heh. So, uh, Twilight. Uh, ready to head home?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Are you kidding? This place is perfect!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I'm not gonna move. You move.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Uh-uh. There is no way I'm movin'.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: This is the most daring dare anypony ever dared dare another pony to dare!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: It's exciting!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Rainbow Dash and Applejack are competing for the title of "Most Daring Pony"! This is the final test: the Bee Stare! Last pony to blink wins!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: But then we'll never find out who the Most Daring Pony is!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Well, what do we do now?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Don't worry, ladies, I've been keeping excellent score all day! [quietly] Hmm, move the decimal, carry the 2, and... [aloud] Congratulations! You're tied!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Tied?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: You can't be tied for the Most Daring Pony!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Okay, no problem. We just have to come up with another daring dare.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Right. I think I might have an idea of what we can do.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Um, Rarity? Don't you think it's a little late in the day to be walking through the forest? It is... star-spider season, after all. Though, I'm sure you have a very good reason.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Simply the most important reason I've ever had in my entire life!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh, well then I'm happy to help. What is it?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I've heard rumors that the Castle of the Two Sisters is filled with the most gorgeous of ancient tapestries in all of pony history! It pains me to think of those magnificent creations rotting away in those old ruins, totally unappreciated.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I see...

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I require your help in borrowing one or two to bring back to the boutique where I can restore them. Maybe I'll even use the patterns as the inspiration for a new line!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: That does sound... very important.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Um, are you sure you need those tapestries?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: But, of course. Although, I must admit these ruins are a fright. Just look at all the dirt everywhere! Ugh...

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [gasp] Angel!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Angel! Oh, you really shouldn't have run off like that. Ancient ruins are filled with all sorts of things that can hurt you! You could stub your toe, or, or trip on a loose stone... You have to be careful!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I don't think I'll need all these candles, Twilight. I was really only scared for a second.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh, these aren't for you, Spike. We're gonna be studying late into the night, and we're gonna need all the light we can get.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh, great.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Well, here we are!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Uh, what's so daring about this place? This is where we got the Elements of Harmony.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: When I was just a filly, Granny Smith told me of an ancient legend. When Nightmare Moon was banished, not every last bit of her dark magic went with her. Granny used to say, when night falls on the castle, that magic takes the form of... the Pony of Shadows!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: You mean, like a ghost?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [spookily] Nopony knows!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Ugh.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [excited gasp] This one is perfect!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Well, it certainly could use some restoration.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Be a dear, fly up there and lift it off that hook?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [calling out] Maybe from below?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I don't see what's so daring about an old legend. Plus, I don't believe in ghosts.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: You might wanna rethink your position on that.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: You saw that, right?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Run!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Ow... I think I hurt my wing.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh, my dear, I am so sorry! That tapestry is far too heavy. We'll just have to find a smaller one.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh, of course.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Where, pray tell, did you disappear to?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: What do you mean?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: While you were struggling under that fabric, the entire wall spun around! You must have activated a secret door.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh, I'm sorry.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I suppose these ruins are chock full of them.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Really?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Absolutely. We must use the utmost care as we<U+0097>

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [panting] Okay, so, maybe the legend is true!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Well, that's why I brought you here! I guess only the most daring pony of all could stay in this castle all night without being scared off.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Scared? I'm not scared!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Well, m-me neither!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Then it's settled! Whoever stays in the castle the longest is the Most Daring Pony.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Deal.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: But it's gonna take a lot more than some shadowy ghost pony to get me to leave.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Me too! Humph!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Find anything, Spike?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Uh, nope. Nothing yet.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Aaah!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Angel? What are you doing here?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [gasp] Whoa! [reading] The Journal of the Two Sisters. [gasp] Maybe this is the book Princess Celestia was talking about!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I sure hope you're not afraid of the dark, Applejack!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I can't say that I am! But even if I was, I'd be at least fifty percent less scared of it than you, Rainbow Dash.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I dunno how all that math works because I'm not scared at all!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Me neither!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Huh?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: W-what's the matter? It's just a dark hallway full of... disembodied pony legs.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Yeah. Nothin'... creepy about that.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I'm starting to wonder if maybe this castle doesn't want my expertise!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh dear. Angel? Rarity, have you seen him?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I'm not sure he made the trip down with us, dear.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh, goodness! We have to find him. An ancient castle is no place for a bunny. He could get hit by falling debris, or the floor could give out under him! Oh! He could be trapped in a dark place with no way out!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [flatly] I can only imagine how that might feel. Hmm...

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Applejack, if you're scared, you can just admit it. You don't need to put your hoof around me.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Uh, I'm over here.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Rarity! What is it?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I felt something... alive!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [gasp] Angel!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: But we can't leave now, not with Angel lost somewhere in this dangerous old castle! He could be trapped under a crumbling statue, or stuck high in a tower without food or water or any friends at all!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Spike, you've got to hear this. [reading] I love to duck behind the paintings, and though the Hall of Hooves still gives her a bit of a fright, the trap door slide is Luna's favorite.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: "Hall of Hooves"?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [reading] Soon the Organ to the Outside will be finished. I can hardly wait.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: What's the "Organ to the Outside"?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [happily] I have no idea!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: You hear that?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: You mean, the creepy sound of a haunted pipe organ?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Uh... maybe?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [worried] I don't know what you're talking about!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Uh, Twilight? Did you hear something?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh, Spike. Quit being such a scaredy-dragon. This castle is thousands of years old, and half of it was destroyed by Nightmare Moon. Of course it makes strange sounds. It's practically falling apart!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh... kay.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [calling] Angel! Angel!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I'm sure we'll find him.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Angel?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Did you find Angel? Is he okay?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [gasp] They are perfect! No castle in its right mind could possibly object to my restoring such exquisite works of art.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh! They're lovely, Rarity, but... I have to keep looking for Angel. Oh, I hope he doesn't think I've given up on him.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I'm right behind you! Won't... [grunts] be... [grunts] a moment!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Do you think there's a single room in this castle that isn't filled with terrifying things?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Whoa! [nervous laughter] It's just old pony armor. What's the big deal?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Yeah! It's not like it's gonna come to life or anything. Right?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Huh?!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Whoa-oa!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [groans, spits] Now, you look here, castle! You are very old and very scary! But your wall art is in an atrocious state!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: And there is nothing you can do to keep me from my sacred task of restoration!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Uh... Applejack? If you went back to Ponyville, that means I win, right?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [calling] Rarity! I know hiding isn't really your sense of humor, but please let this be a joke!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [screams] [echoing] Rainbow? Hello? I guess if I don't find you, I win by default, right?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [grunts] [grumbles] Of all the castles in Equestria, this is by far the most ungrateful!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oof!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [whispered yelling] Angel! Rarity! Oh... I hope you two are together.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Haunted statues, creepy armor... Come on, castle! Is that all you got?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [whimpering] [gasp] Angel?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: AAANGEEEEEL!!!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: What in the world is that?!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh, you know. Probably just more strange sounds of this old castle falling apart!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: No one likes sarcasm, Spike.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: What got into them?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [grunting] It's okay, Angel! You're okay! You're okay!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Yaaaaah! Shadows everywhere!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [sobbing] Aaangeeeeel!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Alright, everypony, stop!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Twilight?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Must... save... Ange<U+0097>! ...Oh.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Fluttershy? What are you doing here?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: She's with me...

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [gasps] Thank you.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Have you all spent the whole night running around, scaring each other?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Well, that depends.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: On what?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: On whether or not you're the Pony of Shadows.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: What's... the Pony of Shadows?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh, that's just an old ponies' tale.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Then who's playing... that?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: We're going to find out.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [whispered] The Pony of Shadows!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Hey, you guys! Did you know I can totally play the organ? Because I didn't!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Check it out!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: You're the Pony of Shadows?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: [continues playing light melody] The pony of what?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: See? What'd I tell ya?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I thought you went to ring the school bell all week!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Oh, yeah! I only had to ring it for, like, five minutes! They said that was good enough! Eh, can't imagine why...

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: So then, I decided to throw a "finish ringing the school bell" party! But I didn't have any bluebells, and you can't throw a "finish ringing the school bell" party without bluebells, so I went to Everfree Forest to pick some, but it started to get so chilly.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I had to wrap myself up in the tarp I was gonna use to gather flowers, and then I saw Fluttershy and Rarity. But they went into the castle before I could invite them to my party. Luckily, I followed them inside so I could help you all with your party!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: What party is that?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Duh!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I swear, this is going right back where I found it just as soon as I've returned it to its former glory.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Now don't go running off again! Oh, I can't believe I was so frightened. Guess I let my imagination get the best of me.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I think we all did.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I always let my imagination run away from me! Then it comes back... with cake!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Well, it's good to know that whenever your imagination is getting away from you, a good friend can help you rein it in. And even though I didn't find anything out about the mysterious chest, I'm glad I was here to help all of you.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: You certainly did that, Twilight.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Yeah! Why weren't you scared?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Reading Celestia's diary made it hard to be afraid, because I knew what it was like when she and Luna lived here. Knowing something about the past made it easier to deal with my problems in the present, even the scary ones.

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I've just thought of a great idea! Why don't we keep a journal, just like the royal pony sisters?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: All of us?

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Sure! That way we can learn from each other! And maybe some day, other ponies will read it and learn something, too!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: What a splendid idea!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: I know what my first entry will be! "Dear Diary, I'm glad Granny Smith's legend wasn't true."

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Me too!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Me three! Because that means you two are still tied for Most Daring Pony!

title: Castle Mane-ia
dialog: Heh, Shadow Ponies... How ridiculous is that?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Four more months, four more months, four more months! I bet you're excited, huh?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Oh, my. I, uh, I could be excited. I don't really know. I wasn't really think<U+0097>

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Come on, you gotta be excited!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Oh, well, I guess maybe I'm a little kinda sort of excited.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I thought so!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Yeah... So, um, why am I excited?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Because the next Daring Do book is coming out exactly four months from today! That's how exciting it is! So what amazing, incredible, awesome adventure do you think Daring Do will have in her next book, huh?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [voice over] Will she at long last stalk the Fortress of Talacon? Only to be forced to contend with its dreaded and impenetrable arrow defense? And if so, could her skill, quick wits, and courage possibly carry the day? Or will her next adventure bring her face to face with the vast and horrible Ahuizotl himself?!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Would she cower, turn tail and run? Or would she fly at him, full bore, knowing full well against all odds that the greatest challenge she ever faced was still surely no match for<U+0097>

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Oh, I'm not so sure she's gonna last another four months...

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Three months and twenty six days, three months and twenty six days, three months and twenty six days! Heya, Twilight! Aren't you excited that<U+0097>

title: Daring Don't
dialog: So glad you've finally made it!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: What's everypony doing here?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: So what holiday would today be?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: National Random Holiday Party Day! Woo-hoo!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I've never heard of it either. [sips] But the punch is quite tasty.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: How come nopony bothered to invite me?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I came to invite you personally, but it seems you were a speck too busy reading the last Daring Do book for the twelfth time.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Yeah, well, in three months and twenty six more days, I'll be able to read the next one.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Oh, haven't you heard? The release of the next book got pushed another two months.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [spit-take] Two more months?! I've been waiting so long already! I don't think I can take another two months! I'll never make it!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Yeah. I can vouch for that...

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Did they give a reason?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: The publisher just said author A.K. Yearling won't be able to finish the book for another two months. Cupcakes?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [growls] How could you possibly know that before me? I'm the series' biggest fan!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I'm just as big a fan as you! In fact, I'm the one who first introduced you to the books, remember?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Oh. Right.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: A.K. Yearling just might be my favorite author. I know everything about her. Where she grew up, where she studied literature, where she wrote the first Daring Do book...

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Where she lives?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Uh... no, though I could probably find out somehow. Why?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Don't you get it? The new book is obviously delayed because she needs help dealing with whatever everyday nonsense is distracting her from spending her every living breathing second writing! So I<U+0096> I mean, fans like me, can get to read the new book ASAP! Think about it! We could help her with her laundry, buy her groceries, cooking her meals, whatever! Now, who wouldn't appreciate that?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Hmm, I don't know... What she probably wants most of all is respect for her privacy.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: She can always just say no.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Mmh... I suppose you're right...

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Of course I am. So... how's about getting that address?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: You see what I mean? Why would she live in this remote part of Equestria except to keep folks from intruding on her privacy? We should respec<U+0097>

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I think I spotted the house! We're super close! This way!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Wait! Oh no. What happened?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Apparently somepony has intruded on her privacy pretty hard already...

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Hoo-wee, somepony really trashed this place.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Hmm... Maybe... or maybe A.K. Yearling's just a terrible, horrible, unbelievable slob!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I hope A.K. Yearling's alright!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Oh no! What if something terrible happened to her?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I know! There might be no more books! Uh... But, of course, I'd be worried about her, too. Heh.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: We didn't do this! We swear!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: We didn't do this, Ms. Yearling<U+0097> whoa!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: We're awfully glad to see you're alright.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Great! Maybe now would be a good time for me to ask her how we can help move the new book along a little faster. Chop chop!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Rainbow Dash, a minute please! A.K. Yearling has made it pretty clear that she wants to be left alone. We need to respect her wishes!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: You should tell that to those guys.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: A.K. Yearling and Daring Do are one and the same! My mind is officially blown!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Aw, come on, I knew it all along.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Amazing!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Incredible!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Wow! So much action! Whee!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Daring Do!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Dr. Many thanks, Daring Do. As you've probably surmised, our earlier search for this treasure was... unsuccessful. So kind of you to find it for us.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [grunting] Give it back, Caballeron!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Dr. That's Doctor Caballeron to you.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [hushed] He's from book four: Daring Do and the Razor of Dreams. He wanted to partner with Daring Do on her adventures.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I know, but she refused! I can't believe it! The real Daring Do and the real Caballeron!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: So let me guess: Ahuizotl has put you up to this? You're stealing the ring to give to him so his hold on the Fortress of Talacon will be good for eight centuries as foretold by prophecy!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Dr. Close, but... no. I'm going to sell this to him, make a bundle, and retire from archaeology in splendor.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [grunting] Caballeron, you fool! You're dooming the valley to eight centuries of unrelenting heat!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Dr. To market, henchponies!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Uh... should we go in and help her, maybe?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [gasps] Are you okay?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I got this.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Um, she was just trying to help, Ms. Do.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Daring Do doesn't need help. She handles her business herself.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: We've gotta go help!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: You heard her! She says she works alone!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: How can we just stand by and do nothing? You know what's at stake here! Ahuizotl has sought control of the Tenochtitlan Basin since book three!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: True, but in book four, she defeated Ahuizotl and secured control of the Amulet of Atonement, dispelling the dark magic of the Ketztwctl Empress, and thus protecting the basin with the Radiant Shield of Razdon!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: But the Radiant Shield of Razdon is vulnerable to the dark enchantment of the Rings of Scorchero!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: But are you forgetting that the Rings were scattered to the four corners of Tenochtitlan, thus rendering the dark enchantment powerless?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Only if you assume that the Rings have yet to be retrieved, and the ring Caballeron just stole isn't the last to completely restore the dark tower and its cruel hold on Tenochtitlan! Did you ever think of that?!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: You gotta admit, Rainbow Dash makes a pretty good point.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: We gotta help Daring Do retrieve the ring for safekeeping before it's too late!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [sighs] Okay, but sounds to me like we're in way, way, way over our heads. We're going to need a carefully thought out plan...

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I'm coming, Daring Do!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: That's not a plan!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Come on, come on, come on... Bingo! Here I come, Daring Do! To join an adventure with the greatest, bravest, coolest, most incredible hero I could ever<U+0096> [whimpers] Okay, maybe I just need a sec... Just another adventure. No big deal. [smack] Get a grip! I got this. Though, doing it alongside Daring Do... Wow! Maybe I could get my picture taken with her, or an autograph<U+0096> [smack] There you go again. She's just a pony like any other pony. A pony who stops entire armies of bad guys with nothing more than her bare hooves, and an attitude, and<U+0097>! [smack] Ow... That's starting to hurt.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Yow! Stop!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Oh, it's just you.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Wait, wait, wait! Let me help you! I promise I could be a huge, huge help if you just give me a chance.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I. Work. Alone.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: But why won't you let me team up with you just this once?!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: My work always involves secrets. And since you never know who you can trust, it's best never to trust anypony.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: But just because you can't trust some, doesn't mean nopony can be trusted!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Look, I don't have time to argue-

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Neither do I. Let's go!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [sighs] [under her breath] Can't believe I'm even talking to her...

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Looks like they decided to have an early dinner before making their way back down the hill to the marketplace in town.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Oh, I see. You're gonna ambush them like in book four at the Horavian caves! Or maybe, that neat trick you did in book three, where you swoop in and knock three guys down with one swing! Or maybe- [hushed] Okay. I'll be quiet now. Just watching very quietly, heh. Shh. So, what kind of ambush are you gonna use then?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Wow!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [gravely voice] I have been led to believe you have in your possession an item of significant importance that might be... for sale.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Dr. Oh, uh, well... I did have another buyer lined up, but he's not here, so... sounds like we have a deal.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Ahuizotl!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Be cool, Rainbow Dash, be cool... she's got this!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Now, Ahuizotl, you know I love you, but I can't give you the ring 'til I've properly proposed.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Bring it!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Come on, Daring Do, come on...

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Daring Do! I've got your hat! You want me to toss it? Daring Do! Daring Do!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Don't worry, Daring Do! I'll come help you! Whoa! Ow.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Don't bother! I'd say you've already helped plenty.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: What have I done?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [gasps] Thank goodness you're alright!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Quick, where does it hurt?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: In here. Daring Do and the ring have been captured by the dreaded Ahuizotl, and it's all my fault.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Dash, I'm sure whatever you did was an honest mistake.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Whatever. Let's just go home.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: We can't go back now! Looks a mite like she needs our help more than ever!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Trying to help is how I got in this mess in the first place. You were right, Twilight. We should've stayed out of this.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Look, there is more going on here than meets the eye. In every Daring Do book, there always is! We can't turn our backs on her!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: She doesn't want my help, Twilight.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Perhaps. But she might need it anyway.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: No. My hero's way better off without me.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: This don't sound like you.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Where's the Rainbow Dash who would help anypony at the drop of a hat?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Or pith helmet, as the case may be.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: She's here where she's got no business being. She should be at home.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: It's fine to look up to Daring Do, but you've put her so high up on a pedestal, you can't even see your own worth anymore! She's in the fortress, and we're here, and we wouldn't be who we are if we didn't go in after her! And neither would you! So, are you with us, or not?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Gotcha! [grunts] You can flap too, y'know!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I was just about to save myself, y'know.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Of course. I just thought you might need this.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Have I mentioned yet that I work alone?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Have I mentioned yet that you're lucky I don't?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Drop the ring, Ahui... whatever your name is!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Come with me! Help me get all these rings off!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [panting] If we can remove the giant ring at the bottom, the whole fortress will collapse!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: W-Was this your plan all along?

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I had to find a way to get into the fortress.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: You did it on purpose?! But<U+0096> but I thought<U+0097>

title: Daring Don't
dialog: I didn't count on how heavy this ring would be, though... Guess having a little help can be handy sometimes.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [straining noises] You can flap too, y'know!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: [straining noises] Ponies! Run! This place is goin' down!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Could never have done this without you, Rainbow Dash. I've got a book to finish!

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Just had the coolest adventure with the coolest pony ever. Came this close to blowing it because I got so wrapped up in how awesome she was, I almost forgot about how awesome I was. Good thing I didn't, 'cause it gave me a chance to show her how important it is to put your trust in somepony else.

title: Daring Don't
dialog: Sweet! The new book a week before anypony else gets it! [inhales] Ohmygoshohmygoshohmygoshohmygosh!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Today, we have two special guests with a very special announcement! Everypony, welcome the head of the Equestria Games, Ms. Harshwhinny!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: [distant] Oh, come on! Tell 'em the fun part!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: That's right! All you gotta do is show Ms. Harshwhinny the coolest, most spectacular, most rocking routine and you're going to the Games! So who's going to be the lucky ponies?!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: It's gotta be me!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Maybe it's us!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Hey! It could happen!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: So, the winning team gets to carry the Ponyville flag at the Equestria Games! Oh, you are gonna love this!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Aw, get to the nitty-gritty later. Tell 'em the important stuff! Like who's the coach! [blows whistle] That's right! Me! And you know why I'm qualified to coach you? Guess who carried the Cloudsdale flag in the Games when she was a little filly? Me! I'll never forget it <U+0096>- I burst into the stadium, spreading my wings, the flag flapping in the breeze. I did tricks with that flag the likes of which nopony saw before and nopony's seen since!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Yes, Ms. Harshwhinny. Y'know, "professionalism" is my middle name. Rainbow Professionalism Dash.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Ahem. Yes. Quite, quite correct. In the meantime, get ready to train, and train hard, because I know this opening ceremony is the single most important thing that will ever happen in your young lives! But, I know you're up for the challenge. And so am I! Wooho-- Ahem... Meet me after school tomorrow at 1500 hours. Sharp. And show me your flag carrying skills. I am outta here. Professionally. See how professionally?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: So what do you say we come up with the perfect routine and win this thing?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I'd say that's rootin'-tootin' terrific!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: But there's one problem! I bet everypony in class is planning to compete!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Listen. Somepony in our class is gonna carry that flag, so it might as well be us! Crusaders, are you in or are you in? 'Cause I'm in!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Me too!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Me three!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Alright, the winning routine needs to show what's important about Ponyville, right?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: So... what's special about Ponyville? It's... It's... I got it! It's a place where different kinds of ponies live together as friends!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Earth ponies like me!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Unicorns like me!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: And Pegasi like me! So somehow we got to figure out a way to show that in our act.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: We're gonna need a plan.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: And a lot of hard work!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: And a whole bunch of practice! But take it from me; we may just be little ponies, but we have hearts as strong as horses!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: If that's the best you've got, we're going to win for sure.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: We already have the most divine routine planned.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: It's absolutely sure to crush everyone else <U+0096> and I mean crush.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: But we're winners! And we have [starts singing] hearts--

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Sure. But you know what you don't have?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: What does that have to do with flag carryin'?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Having cutie mark-less ponies represent Ponyville would be unthinkable.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: And we, of course, already have our cutie marks. So we know who's gonna be in the winner's circle.
