title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Listen, you two! Cutie marks or no cutie marks, you'll see! The Crusaders are gonna carry that flag at the Games.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: May the best ponies win!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Game on!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Show me what you got, Cutie Mark Crusaders, and make it good!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Don't worry, we will!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Now, this is just a little something we threw together. It's not perfect yet, not even close.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Let's watch the Cutie Mark "Goof-saders" do their saddle routine.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: They're gonna be a hot mess!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Since the dawn of recorded time, in one town of amazing amazingness, three types of ponies coexist!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: We are Earth ponies!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: We are unicorns!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: We are Pegasi! And the town where friendship reigns is our home. Now, welcome to the stadium, the flag of the place we love best...

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: It's kind of a work in progress. So? What did you think?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: That was ama-- [in her head] Wait. Hold on now. Gotta stay calm, cool and collected. [out loud] To give a calm, clear analysis-- Wait. You whipped that act together just yesterday?! That is-- [in her head] Professionalism, Dash, keep those emotions in check! [out loud] Overall, it was... kinda, sorta... [quickly] Overall, it was okay. Keep working hard. Who knows? You might have a shot. Gotta go!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Do y'all think she liked it?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I'm not really sure.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: You heard her! If we keep working hard, we might have a shot! So let's keep working! Trot to it, ponies!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Did you see that?! I can't believe I'm saying this. They could win!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: But how do we stop them? We already called them blank flanks!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Then we need to find a new way to get under their skin. Or maybe... get under their wings.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Girls, we just wanted to say your act is quite impressive!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Wait... What?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Um... Thanks?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Oh, but of course. As a matter of fact, we think you're very brave.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Brave? Why?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Isn't it obvious? It is to us. In fact, it's obvious to everypony. You're showing all three types of Ponyville ponies, yet you have a Pegasus pony...

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: What in tarnation does that have to do with anything?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I'd say not even being able to fly has everything to do with everything. Doesn't it?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I mean, a Pegasus pony at your age? You should've been flying long ago.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: So what if my wings can't get me off the ground?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Your career as a flag carrier isn't getting off the ground either.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Ms. Harshwhinny will never pick a Pegasus pony who can't fly to represent Ponyville in front of all of Equestria.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Ms. Harshwhinny never said anything about that!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I would've thought that was obvious.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Well, have fun practicing anyway, even if your routine will never<U+0097>how shall I say<U+0097>take off!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Don't listen to them, Scootaloo. Scootaloo? You okay?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: This routine isn't working how it is. We've gotta rethink my part in the whole thing.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: What?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Why?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: If we wanna win, I'm gonna have to fly!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Is that even possible?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: And by tomorrow?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Maybe I can win if I work twice as hard. See? Oof! Maybe... three times as hard.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Golly, I don't know, Scootaloo, I don't think that's the problem.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Well, I know this for sure <U+0096> flying is the only way we're gonna win, so it's back to practice!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Is this a good idea?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Whoaaaaa!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I'll just work four times as hard!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Probably not.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: [sighs] Guys, guys, guys! Try it again!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: [yawns] But we've been rehearsin' all the livelong day! We're gettin' tired!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Fine! We'll skip to my big impressive flying entrance. So you've done the do-si-do to the left, then to the right, and then there's the hoop. Then I come in--

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: [hushed] I liked the routine the way it was!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: [hushed] Me too! But all she cares about now is flying!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: [panting] Ponyville! Home of the, um...

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Ah, friendship, right! Uh, there are four-- no, three kinds of ponies.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: [hushed] Left, left!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: [hushed] I'm sorry! I'm just tired! And then I dip, and then we turn, and-- Sorry!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Ta-da! Oof! [panting] So? What'cha think?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: That's... y'know... good and all, heheh... I just thought... maybe possibly you might wanna go back to, say, the first version of the act, which was, I dunno, what's the word, better? Just do the routine as it was! Don't mess with success, right? Seriously. Now I need to... go coach these other ponies! And don't forget, we've got to catch the early train for the Crystal Empire. See you in the morning!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: What are we gonna do?! We're competing tomorrow, and I still can't fly! Unless...

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I'm just too tired! I can't keep going!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Me too! I'm tired, I'm hungry, and now I hate this routine! It feels like it's all about you now!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: She's right. It's like you don't even need us anymore!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Of course I need you! Without you two, who's gonna hold up the hoop?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Rrgh! You don't listen to yourself! Forget it. I'm goin' home to get some sleep.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: So? Are you gonna leave me too?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: We've gotta catch the early train to the Crystal Empire. I'd better get some rest. See you in the morning, Scootaloo.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Come on, Scootaloo! Do it for Ponyville! Just got to try twenty times as hard! [straining noises] Thirty times as hard...! Oof! Just... a little... harder!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: [straining noises] [sighs] I can't fly. I just... can't.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Scootaloo? Where is she?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: She'd better get here soon! This here train is about to leave!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Here I am...

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: We were scared you were gonna miss the train!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I... I'm not going.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I'm the weak link. If I go, and fall, flop, or do anything but fly, I'm gonna blow it for you two.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I can't believe you're quitting on us!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: But you're better off without me!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: But that's not true, Scootaloo!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: You know what, Sweetie Belle? Forget it. If she's gonna quit, we don't want her, and we don't need her!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Fine!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Fine!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Fine...

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: How's my favorite routine going today? Oh, I just can't keep it in! I want you to win so bad! [to the BGM] Bom, bom, bom, bom... and then Scootaloo does that [half-whistles] through the hoop!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Well, there ain't gonna be a Scootaloo.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: She's staying home.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: She's what?!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: She got it in her head that the only way to represent Ponyville was by flyin' in our routine! When she couldn't do it, she told us that she was quittin'.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: And then you tried to stop her from doing that, right?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Well, actually, we kinda told her...

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: ...uh, that we didn't want a quitter.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Hang on. Are you nuts?! You're a team, and a team never leaves a friend behind!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Come on!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Sorry you can't make it! We'll take a picture for you from the winner's circle!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I do not like them one bit.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Put on some speed, girls!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Throwing away your scooter?!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Rainbow Dash?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Yup, but not just me.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I don't wanna see them. And what are they doing here, anyway? They're supposed to be on the train.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: We're not goin'.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Not without you, Scootaloo.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: What's gotten into you, Scootaloo?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I didn't want to ruin their chance to win just because I couldn't fly.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: And who said you had to?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: But flying's what Pegasus ponies are supposed to do! You flew when you carried the flag in the games!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: But that was me! You're you! And it just doesn't matter if you can fly or not. Your routine was amazing 'cause it represented exactly what makes Ponyville special. You do still know what that is, right?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Friendship.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Three kinds of ponies livin' together as friends. Just like us. Earth ponies...

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: ...unicorns...

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: ...and Pegasi. But Rainbow Dash... what if... what if my wings never grow? What if I never fly?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Listen, Scootaloo. Maybe you'll fly someday, or maybe you won't. You're all kinds of awesome anyway. Who's the toughest little pony in town?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Got the moves, got the mojo...

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: No harder working pony around.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: We are a trio, work as a team

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: So let's get to the Crystal Empire and let's do the routine as it was! And let's win this thing!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Ahem. Look. What you three did was... acceptable.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Contain your excitement, Ms. Harshwhinny. Remember <U+0096> professionalism.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: You know what this means, right?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: What?

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: We are totally gonna get cutie marks in flag-carrying!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Spike, you really need to go to sleep!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Aw, two more minutes, Twilight! I'm just getting to the really good part! The Mane-iac is about to<U+0097>

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: "The Mane-iac"?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: The Power Ponies' most evil nemesis! She was the power-mad owner of a hair-care product company. A tragic accident at her shampoo factory in Maretropolis not only gave her mane strange new powers, but also caused her to go completely insane! She and her henchponies are planning to break into the Maretropolis Museum and steal the Electro-Orb, so she can use it to power up her doomsday device! Of course, the Mane-iac wouldn't have even known if Hum Drum hadn't slipped up and told her all about it.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Hum Drum?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Nah, the guy in the blue boots and pointless red cape. The Power Ponies' bumbling and totally useless sidekick. The Power Ponies have to stop the Mane-iac or Maretropolis is doo-hoo-hoo-hoomed!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Believe me, Spike. If anypony understands what it's like to get caught up in a really good book, it's me. But if we're going to make any progress fixing up Luna and Celestia's old castle tomorrow, we all have to do our part. We don't want to be too tired to lend a hoof... or claw.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Okay, okay, I'm going to bed. Goodnight.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Two more minutes.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Yes!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Looking good, everypony! Let's keep this magical makeover moving!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: You got it!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Good old Spike is here, ready to do his part!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: A little more to the left! No, the other left! [quickly] Awesome! That's perfect right where it is! On to the next painting!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: You sure you don't need any help?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Nah, that's okay.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: [quickly] We have everything under control!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Dash?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: I'm good!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: [sighs] Isn't there anything I can help you with, Twilight?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: [quickly] Don't worry about it, Spike! It's all good!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: I think she's right. It looks like we've got it, Spike. Looking great, everypony! Why don't you find a quiet spot and finish reading your comic? Aren't you right at the part where Hum Drum was about to stop the villain?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Rarity, lemme give you a hoof with that!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: I could do it!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: That's okay, Spike.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Pony power! Weehee!!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: [to himself] Mane-iac breaks into the museum... Okay, here we go. ...Ugh, what a surprise! Hum Drum is in the way again while the Power Ponies do all the work! I guess I know what that feels like... [gasps] Wait. What? How can that be the end?! What's... that? "You can... retr-" What? "You can... return..." Urgh! I know I saw a magnifying glass laying around the last time I was here...

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Spike! Where are ya, Spike?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: We're breaking for tea and biscuits!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Spike!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: [reading] "You can return to the place you started when the Mane-iac is... defeated." Huh? "Take a closer look to join the adventure in this book"? What does that even mean? Whoa! Cool!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Spike! What are you<U+0097>

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Heeeeeelp!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Weehee!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Is this... Maretropolis?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Somepony wanna tell me what the hay is goin' on?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Holy new personas, ponies! You're the... Masked Matter-Horn! Fili-Second! Zapp! R-Radiance! Mistress Mare-velous! Saddle Rager! You're the... Power Ponies!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Did she just call us... Power Ponies?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: You're the... the superheroes from my comic book! It somehow zapped us all in here!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: So somepony zap us back out!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: My comic book! It said the way to get back to where we started was to defeat the Mane-iac! Your arch-nemesis!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Pinkie! Where'd she go?!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Wheeeeeeee!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: She could be miles away from here by now! Pinkie is Fili-Second, the fastest pony in all of Maretropolis!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Twilight! Freeze her mane!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Do what?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: You're the Masked Matter-Horn! You can shoot all kinds of crazy power beams from your horn!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Dash! Quick! You're Zapp, and your superpower is controlling the mighty forces of nature! Unholster the lightning bolt!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Lightning, not a tornado!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Whoa!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Whoa-whoa!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Fluttershy! You're Saddle Rager! Lose your temper, and you'll turn into a huge, super-strong monster!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Oh, gosh! That wouldn't... be very... polite!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Ugh! Rarity! Use your jewelry to create attack constructs!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: What's an attack construct?!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Just think of something, anything, and your bracelet makes it appear!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Something useful!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: The Electro-Orb!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: I'm Hum Drum...?! Oh no... [straining noises] Applejack! You gotta... help stop the... tornado from destroying.. the city!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: But every time I move, this darn lasso gets tighter!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: You're psychically connected to it! Will it to where you want it to go, and it'll obey you!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: [giggles] That was spin-tastic!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Lemme get this straight: We've been sucked into some kind of comic-book world?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Technically, it's called Maretropolis. And if we wanna get back to Ponyville, I think we have to stop the Mane-iac from using her doomsday device to destroy it!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: No biggie. I was already awesome. And now we've all got superpowers!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Almost all of us have superpowers...

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: But you must have them too, Spikey-boo. Your character is wearing a cape!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Yeah, for absolutely no reason. He's pretty much useless...

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Good thing you're not really Hum Drum, then.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Yeah, good thing...

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: So the six of us Power Ponies will take care of Mane-iac, and get us back to Ponyville!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Spike, where is the Mane-iac building her doomsday device?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Her top-secret headquarters! But you'd better get there quick. That glowing orb she just stole is what she's going to use to power it up!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Lead the way, Spike!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Then leave the rest to us!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: There it is!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Is that a... shampoo factory?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: All right, Power Ponies, here's the plan. Rarity, you, me and<U+0097>

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Come on out, Mane-iac! Or the Power Ponies are comin' in!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: So much for "element of surprise".

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Guess I'll just hang back here doing nothing.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Oh, I don't think she's home. Maybe we should just come back later.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: She's home.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Time to Power Pony up!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Ooh! Nice catchphrase!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Freeze ray!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: It's an improvement, darling.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Ooh, I do so love a functional accessory!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Seriously? You aren't even just a little angry right now?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Nice work, Power Ponies! Now let's take care of the Mane-iac and get ourselves home!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Just watch us!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: The Hairspray Ray of Doom! It stops you in your tracks and renders your powers useless!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: We'll just see about that!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Fluttershy, please! Just a little anger?!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Well, I'm not so much angry as I am concerned, bordering on terrified!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Don't spray!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: What am I supposed to do? I'm useless. No wonder my friends never need me to do anything important. They're the ones with superpowers. They've probably already figured out how to escape.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Or not!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Ahem. I don't mean to interrupt, but aren't you forgetting about somepony?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Maybe in your world. But in our world, Spike<U+0097> uh, Hum Drum always comes through when we need him! Always!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: I'm not like Hum Drum! When my friends really need me, I do come through! And they need me now!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Way to go, Spike!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Get mad!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Tag you're it! Tag you're it! Tag you're it! Tag you're it!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Need a place to put these guys!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Hold it right there, partner!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Fluttershy, where are you going?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: You seem to have everything under control.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Fluttershy, we need you! You have to power up!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: I'm sorry, it's just that nothing is making me mad.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Once again, the day is saved by<U+0097>

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Awesome!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Whoo-ee!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Did you see how I was raining down a storm of justice at the end there?!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: You catch how I was wieldin' that lasso?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Cupcakes?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: How did you<U+0097>

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: Eh, we had a good half second before we got sucked back out of the comic, and the Maretropolis bakery was only sixty-five blocks away!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: I'm just glad to be back.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: We wouldn't have made it without you, Spike. And I hope you realize that just because we don't always need your help, it doesn't mean that we don't think you're helpful.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: And that you don't have to have superpowers to be a super friend.

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: But I do have one question. Where exactly did you get that comic book?

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: This one I got in Canterlot at the House of Enchanted Comics. Well, I didn't know it meant they were literally enchanted!

title: Power Ponies
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Charlotte Fullerton & Betsy McGowen
dialog: I thought it just meant, like, the comics they sold there had really enchanting storylines! Hey, wait up! I'm an important part of this team, remember?!

title: Bats!
dialog: Any minute now...

title: Bats!
dialog: What the heck is goin' on? [gasps] They're back!

title: Bats!
dialog: Attention! This is a Sweet Apple Acres code red! I need all hooves <U+0096> and claws <U+0096> on deck!

title: Bats!
dialog: Calm down, Applejack.

title: Bats!
dialog: Calm down?! How can I calm down at a time like this?! Vampire fruit bats are attackin' Sweet Apple Acres!

title: Bats!
dialog: But I thought the fruit bats usually stayed put in the west orchard.

title: Bats!
dialog: The fruit bats do, but these aren't just your everyday ordinary fruit bats. They're vampire fruit bats! I'll be darned if they think they're gonna sink their fangs into my blue ribbon apple.

title: Bats!
dialog: Awesome!

title: Bats!
dialog: This here's our entry into the Appleloosa State Fair's produce competition. [exhales] You know how much TLC goes into getting an apple to grow like this?

title: Bats!
dialog: Applejack! When you go big, you really go big!

title: Bats!
dialog: Them vampire bats want to shrivel it up like a raisin!

title: Bats!
dialog: Oh, I'm sure if we just let them know how special that particular apple is to you, they'll leave it alone.

title: Bats!
dialog: Yeah, right. Be my guest.

title: Bats!
dialog: Um, excuse me, Mr. Vampire Bat--

title: Bats!
dialog: We were just wondering if maybe you wouldn't mind leaving that really big apple alone?

title: Bats!
dialog: Well? What'd he say?

title: Bats!
dialog: Um... yes.

title: Bats!
dialog: Huh?!

title: Bats!
dialog: But... it could've been a no.

title: Bats!
dialog: Oh.

title: Bats!
dialog: This is the first vampire fruit bat I've ever met and, well, it might take some time for me to really understand their language.

title: Bats!
dialog: Uh-huh. And in the meantime, this pest and his vermin friends are gonna go after my prized apple and, while they're at it, every other apple in the orchard! These vampire bats are nothin' but a bunch of monsters!

title: Bats!
dialog: Monsters?! Oh, that's a bit harsh, don't you think?

title: Bats!
dialog: No, I do not.

title: Bats!
dialog: Those vampire bats will give you a fright Eating apples both day and night They rest for a minute, maybe three Then they're eatin' every apple in your apple tree

title: Bats!
dialog: Now wait just a minute, there's another side to this And if I did not defend them, then I would be remiss These bats are mamas and papas too They care for their young just like we ponies do

title: Bats!
dialog: Oh, give me a break, you're bein' too kind These creatures have a one-track mind The orchard is not their restaurant But do they ever think what others may want? No! They don't! And that is just a fact These bats, they simply don't know how to act

title: Bats!
dialog: That's where I have to disagree They're loyal to their family Spreading seeds both far and wide

title: Bats!
dialog: You see one comin', you'd better run and hide! They're big and ugly and mean as sin Will ya look at the state my trees are in?

title: Bats!
dialog: They help your trees, they'll grow stronger faster

title: Bats!
dialog: They've turned my life to a total disaster!

title: Bats!
dialog: Well, I for one don't have a doubt These vermin must be stamped right out

title: Bats!
dialog: I second that, they've got to go These bats, they've got to hit the road

title: Bats!
dialog: It comes down to just one simple fact They've crossed the line, it's time to fight them back!

title: Bats!
dialog: Yes, it comes down to just one simple fact They've crossed the line, it's time that we attack!

title: Bats!
dialog: I'm sorry, Fluttershy, but I believe Applejack has made the better argument. These vampire fruit bats sound downright dreadful.

title: Bats!
dialog: So let's get to roundin' them up so they don't destroy the rest of my orchard.

title: Bats!
dialog: [to the tune of Winter Wrap Up] Fruit bat round-up, fruit bat round-up!

title: Bats!
dialog: Um, excuse me, but, um, what if instead of rounding them up, we... let them have part of the orchard?

title: Bats!
dialog: [whinny] Have you lost your pest-lovin' mind?!

title: Bats!
dialog: They're only here because they're hungry! If we build a sanctuary for them, they could have their own apples to enjoy! After a while, they could even help the rest of your orchard! The vampire bats don't eat the seeds of the apples, and when they spit them out, they grow into even more productive apple trees!

title: Bats!
dialog: Listen, Fluttershy. That sounds real nice 'n' all, but every second we spend buildin' this so-called 'sanctuary' is a second they'll spend destroyin' orchards! You don't know what it was like the last time there was an infestation, but Granny Smith has told me enough stories about it that just the thought of it gives me nightmares! [narrating] Granny says we lost a huge section of orchard that year. They had to ration out apples all winter!

title: Bats!
dialog: What about the cider? There was still cider, right?

title: Bats!
dialog: Not...a...drop.

title: Bats!
dialog: No cider?! No cider?! We need to round up these monsters, and we need to do it now!

title: Bats!
dialog: If Granny Smith wasn't with Apple Bloom an' Big Mac checkin' out our produce competition in Appleloosa, she'd be here tellin' us to do just that!

title: Bats!
dialog: I'm sorry, Fluttershy, but I think Applejack is right. I just wish there was another way we could convince them not to eat them in the first place. Maybe there is...!

title: Bats!
dialog: So, there's good news and bad news. The good news is that I found a spell that can get the vampire fruit bats to stop wanting to suck the juice from the apples. But in order for the spell to work, I need the bats' full and complete attention.

title: Bats!
dialog: [gasps] Oh no.

title: Bats!
dialog: Fluttershy, I need you to do your Stare on the bats.

title: Bats!
dialog: Oh, gosh, I don't know.

title: Bats!
dialog: What's the problem? You've used the Stare plenty of times before!

title: Bats!
dialog: Yes, but it's not something I take lightly. I've made a vow not to use it except in dire circumstances.

title: Bats!
dialog: This circumstance is plenty dire to me!

title: Bats!
dialog: Me too! Think of the cider! Won't somepony please think of the cider?!

title: Bats!
dialog: I'm sorry. I just don't like the idea of taking away the thing that really makes the vampire fruit bats [inhales] vampire fruit bats! It just feels wrong!

title: Bats!
dialog: But if we don't do this, there won't be any apples left for anypony here in Ponyville. Doesn't that feel wrong, too?

title: Bats!
dialog: So what's it gonna be, Fluttershy? Will you do your Stare on the bats or not?

title: Bats!
dialog: Um... Um... Okay, I'll do it.

title: Bats!
dialog: They're not icky.

title: Bats!
dialog: First round of cider's on me!

title: Bats!
dialog: Hold it right there! We've gotta round up these beasts with wings first. Time's a-wastin'!

title: Bats!
dialog: [muffled] [yelps] Ew, ew, ew, ewwww!

title: Bats!
dialog: Gotcha!

title: Bats!
dialog: Good work, everypony! I think we got 'em all! [to Fluttershy] Now all we need is for you do to your Stare.

title: Bats!
dialog: Oh, um, are you sure I really need-- Okay. I really, really, really hate to do this to you... I just hope you can forgive me...

title: Bats!
dialog: Good... Now you go, Twilight!

title: Bats!
dialog: Alright.

title: Bats!
dialog: You can stop staring, Fluttershy.

title: Bats!
dialog: Did it work?

title: Bats!
dialog: Only one way to find out for sure.

title: Bats!
dialog: Ye-he-heah, whoo!

title: Bats!
dialog: My crop is saved! Yee-haw!

title: Bats!
dialog: We'll be drinking cider all winter long!

title: Bats!
dialog: I wanna thank you for your help. I couldn't have done it without you.

title: Bats!
dialog: Aw, don't mention it, Applejack. It was my pleasure! Really!

title: Bats!
dialog: Now all we gotta do is sweep up these cores so I can start buckin' fresh tomorrow mornin'!

title: Bats!
dialog: Apple Bucking Day, take two!

title: Bats!
dialog: The spell didn't work!

title: Bats!
dialog: You're darn tootin' the spell didn't work! I think we're gonna have to take more extreme measures!

title: Bats!
dialog: I hear ya, Applejack! C'mon, everypony! Let's track down those vampire bats!

title: Bats!
dialog: Wait a minute... I don't think these bats are the ones that sucked my apples dry.

title: Bats!
dialog: But if the vampire bats aren't eating your apples...

title: Bats!
dialog: Who is? Fluttershy, you're our animal expert. Do you know of any other creature that might be capable of this?

title: Bats!
dialog: I'm sorry. I don't.

title: Bats!
dialog: Well, there's only one way to find out. We'll have to catch whoever it is in the act.

title: Bats!
dialog: And how do you propose we do that?

title: Bats!
dialog: A stakeout...!

title: Bats!
dialog: [spookily] The witching hour...

title: Bats!
dialog: Oh, Fluttershy, it'll be okay. Don't forget, darling, we're all in this together.

title: Bats!
dialog: That's right. Nopony leaves this orchard until we've solved this mystery. Agreed?

title: Bats!
dialog: Does everypony have their pony signals? Now remember, Pinkie Pie, only use the signal if you see somethin' suspicious.

title: Bats!
dialog: I got it. Something suspicious...

title: Bats!
dialog: Whatcha doin'?!

title: Bats!
dialog: Alright, now everypony split up. We'll each patrol our own row of the orchard. Whoever or whatever's destroyin' my apples has gotta be here somewhere.

title: Bats!
dialog: What was that?! [gasps] Suspicious! [giggles] It's pony signal time!

title: Bats!
dialog: Who's there? Oh, well, there's obviously no need to worry about that shadowy figure overhead... [frightened] Or maybe there is! I think I'll just go see how Rainbow Dash is doing...

title: Bats!
dialog: Uh... who's there? Answer me or you'll regret it! Fine, have it your own way! Take that, you, you, you... scarecrow... Oh.

title: Bats!
dialog: Applejack, what is it?

title: Bats!
dialog: Suspicious!

title: Bats!
dialog: Fluttershy? Yoo-hoo! Fluttershy!

title: Bats!
dialog: That's not Fluttershy... That's Flutterbat!

title: Bats!
dialog: We've gotta get her down from there!

title: Bats!
dialog: Uh... Fluttershy, sweetness, please come down, and... do stop being a vampire bat.

title: Bats!
dialog: Fluttershy! It's me, Rainbow Dash! Why don't you cut the bat act and come on down?!

title: Bats!
dialog: [yelps] Whoa! Maybe we should just let her come down when she's ready.

title: Bats!
dialog: Flutterbat on the loose! Run for your lives!

title: Bats!
dialog: Pinkie Pie, calm down! See? She's back on her... branch.

title: Bats!
dialog: She's just biding her time! Waiting for the right moment to pounce!

title: Bats!
dialog: Pinkie Pie, bats don't eat ponies. Not even vampire bats.

title: Bats!
dialog: But maybe vampire ponies eat other ponies! I'm not taking any chances!

title: Bats!
dialog: How did this happen? That's what I don't understand.

title: Bats!
dialog: I think this was actually our fault.

title: Bats!
dialog: Our fault?

title: Bats!
dialog: And how'd you figure that?

title: Bats!
dialog: Okay, so this is me, these are the bats, and this is Fluttershy doing her Stare. The spell was supposed to go right onto the bats like this, but somehow the spell must have backfired. It took the vampire fruit bats' desire to be vampire fruit bats and transferred that desire into Fluttershy. C'mon! We'll reverse the spell and make it right!

title: Bats!
dialog: Then what are we waiting for? Let's save Fluttershy before that thing eats us all!

title: Bats!
dialog: Hit the deck!

title: Bats!
dialog: Follow that bat!

title: Bats!
dialog: I can't believe we lost her!

title: Bats!
dialog: Oh, Fluttershy, where are you?

title: Bats!
dialog: Look out! Whoa!

title: Bats!
dialog: If she keeps this up, your whole crop will be gone in no time!

title: Bats!
dialog: That's the least of my worries. I just want my friend back.

title: Bats!
dialog: We'll never get her back unless we corner her and catch her so I can reverse the spell!

title: Bats!
dialog: [hushed] There she is!

title: Bats!
dialog: There she goes!

title: Bats!
dialog: Oh, this is no use. I think the only way we're gonna catch her is if we find a way to lure her closer to us.

title: Bats!
dialog: But even if we can lure her to us, how're we gonna get her to stay still long enough for you to do your reverse spell?

title: Bats!
dialog: Aww, if only we had Fluttershy to do her Stare on the Flutterbat.

title: Bats!
dialog: [gasps] That's it!

title: Bats!
dialog: Okay, let's get our friend back. Action stations!

title: Bats!
dialog: So much for having the winning apple in the Appleloosa State Fair, huh?

title: Bats!
dialog: [hushed] She's coming!

title: Bats!
dialog: Oh... where am I?

title: Bats!
dialog: Thank goodness you're okay!

title: Bats!
dialog: But... what happened to me?

title: Bats!
dialog: You turned into a vampire pony!

title: Bats!
dialog: [gasps] I tried to eat ponies?!

title: Bats!
dialog: Of course not!

title: Bats!
dialog: So I wasn't a vampire?

title: Bats!
dialog: Yes!

title: Bats!
dialog: Yes I was, or yes I wasn't?

title: Bats!
dialog: Yes, you were!

title: Bats!
dialog: But I didn't try and eat ponies?

title: Bats!
dialog: Yes!

title: Bats!
dialog: I did?!

title: Bats!
dialog: No!

title: Bats!
dialog: I'm confused...

title: Bats!
dialog: Me too... and I was there!

title: Bats!
dialog: Fluttershy, I'm real sorry I didn't take your suggestion in the first place.

title: Bats!
dialog: And don't forget, now you'll get seeds that will grow into even bigger and better apple trees.

title: Bats!
dialog: Does that mean what I think it means?

title: Bats!
dialog: Yup! More cider too.

title: Bats!
dialog: Yea-he-heah, whoo!

title: Bats!
dialog: Okay, got the part about the spell, Fluttershy turning into a bat, building a sanctuary...

title: Bats!
dialog: Be sure to put in there that I came to see that my short-term solution was a little short-sighted.

title: Bats!
dialog: And that you shouldn't let anypony pressure you into doing something that you don't think is right. Sometimes you have to tell even your closest friends 'no'.

title: Bats!
dialog: Now, how about we celebrate our stronger than ever friendship with a nice, ripe, juicy apple?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: There you are, Rarity! That's the last of your bags.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Actually, Spike, I've got one last pile of bags, over there. Won't you be a dear?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: An entire week in the fabulous city of Manehattan! Plus, all of my very best friends there with me!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Of course we'd all come along to support you during Fashion Week, Rarity!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Not that you'll need it. We're sure you'll win.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: [squeals] I can't begin to tell you how excited I am that you'll all be there with me! However... Perhaps I can show you...

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: What's that?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Ooh, ooh, ooh, I know! A paper fan!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: No, it's<U+0097>

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: A magic trick! You know, where I pick a card and remember what it is and then you put it back in the deck so you can't look at it and<U+0097>

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: These are tickets to the hottest musical on Bridleway!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: You couldn't mean Hinny of the Hills... because that show's been sold out for months! Or could you?!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: I could. I do.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: [gasps] Oh, Rarity, you didn't have to do that, but... since you did...

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: This trip is fun already! I love jumping up and down! Whee-hee!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Come along, ponies! I found us a place to stay only a block from the train station in the very heart of this glorious metropolis!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Hey, look! That's the theatre where Hinny of the Hills is playin'!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Wow, Rarity! How'd you manage to get us seats for tomorrow night?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, I gave some designs to the costume designer, so he pulled a few strings.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: That is what makes Manehattan so splendid and amazing. You do something nice for somepony, and then you never know when they'll do something nice for you!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: So then you can do something nice for us!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Like get us in to see Hinny of the Hills!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Which is only the best musical in all of Equestria!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: It must be good if Rainbow Dash is impressed. Normally she doesn't even like musicals.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: I know. Ponies just bursting into song in random places at the drop of a hat? Who does that?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, Manehattan, what you do to me Such a huge bustling community And there's always opportunity To do the friendly thing

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Only if you'll accept this gratuity first.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Do keep it all. I insist!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Generosity, I'm here to show all that I can give Generosity, I'm here to set the bar Just sit back and watch how I live

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: After you.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Please, take mine.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Some may say, "Rarity, Don't be so big-hearted and bold Treating strangers like they're friends This town's too big and cold"

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, Manehattan, what you do to us

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: What if you find a Gloomy Gus?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: It's no intimidatin' thing

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Just be kind without a fuss

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Generosity, I'm here to show all that I can do Generosity, you are the key Manehattan, I'm here just for you Just for you

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: [sigh] To think my dresses could soon be displayed on the most glamorous shopping thoroughfare of the most glamorous city in Equestria! Oh, it would be my dream come true!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Is there anything left to do we can help you with?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Hm, nothing I can think of. The dresses are all completely finished, all made from a fabulous new fabric I've been developing for months. Stretchy, but not clingy. Shimmery, but not showy.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Sounds amazing.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: There's nothing left for me to do but check in at the runway with my dresses by two this afternoon.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, that's funny. Because that clock over there makes it seem like that's only ten minutes from now!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, my ribbons and threads. And the runway ballroom is all the way across town! If I don't get there, I'm disqualified! Taaaaxiii!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, no! We've gotta help her find a cab, now!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: I'm on it! Hey, buddy! Is this cab taken?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Huh? What? Does everypony in this town want a cab?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: I'm afraid getting a taxi at this time could prove almost impossible!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Please won't you let her have this taxi? She has somewhere very important to be right away!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, it's no use! The cab drivers just drive right past to get to the next pony in line!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Fashion runway plaza in seven minutes. Can you make it?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Ta-ta!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Whew, that was close.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Anypony else got a sneaking suspicion we're forgetting something?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: [out of breath, quickly] Good afternoon, I'm here for Fashion Week!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: My<U+0096> My dresses! How could I possibly forget them?! [gasps] I'm dooooomed!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: You're a lifesaver!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: [sighs] I made it! And with seconds to spare! Hello, everypony. Pleased to meet you all.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: You must be Prim Hemline, the host of this grand event. How do you<U+0097>?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Uhhhh... [chuckles nervously] Just... lucky, I guess.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Me too, but everything just seems to keep working out!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, yes, of course, of course! I<U+0096> I thought you looked familiar, but I couldn't place it. You haven't been back in years!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, good for you, Sur<U+0097>

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Yes, yes. Well, good luck!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Why, thank you so much!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh now, I'm sure your collection is equally lovely, if not more so!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, not at all! Here, I have loads extra.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Positive! Oh, well, it's been wonderful getting caught up, and I don't wish to be rude, but I must finish my preparations and I am a bit late as it... is?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Hello! I'm here half an hour early for my run-through appointment, just the way Prim likes!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, why, yes. It's stretchy, but not clingy. Shimmery<U+0097>

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: You stole my fabric!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: I gave you the fabric for accents! Not for your whole line! And how could you possibly make all of those outfits out of it so fast?!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: [gasps] How could this happen?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, my gosh, what a great afternoon! That was almost too much fun!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Better pace yourself, 'cause the rest of the day is jam-packed!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: First there's the salon appointment to get our manes done.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Then our fancy dinner at the Far-Afield Tavern!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: And after that...

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Is... everything okay?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: You got the dresses the bellhop brought you and everything, right?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: But he said he brought them.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Now, Rarity, whatever went wrong, we're all here to help you get through it, no matter what it takes.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Come on, Rarity, buck up! All we need is some fabric and you'll be back in business!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: [gasps] This new line is going to be marvelous! Perhaps even better than the last! It's daring, it's bold! Perhaps I still have a chance after all!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Twilight! Sew these pieces together according to that pattern there!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: You said if we skipped dinner at the Far-Afield Tavern, you'd order a meal for us while we keep working.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Don't fret. It'll be here in an hour. That's not going to be a problem, is it?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Well, we're supposed to be watching Hinny of the Hills by then...

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh! I see! I go out of my way to get you tickets for a show, and this is how you repay me? By abandoning me in my hour of need? Oh, oh, oh! Fine! Go and see Hinny of the Hills tonight! And then tomorrow morning when you come to see my fashion show without any fashion to show, you can have more entertainment! "Oh, why look, there's our friend Rarity going down in flames! Isn't friendship magic?!"

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Rarity, calm down. What's gotten into you?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: What's gotten into you?! Oh, go ahead! See your little show! Congratu-pony-lations, fillies! Sounds like you've all figured out already it's everypony for herself in this town!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: There. That's the last of them.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: [gasps] Finally!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: You're welcome!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh! They're liking it! I think I may have just won this thing! Oh, I can't wait to celebrate with... My friends. They didn't come. What have I done?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: I have to go.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: No time to talk. I have to find my friends!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, no! Back to Ponyville, I imagine. Oh, they worked so hard on my behalf! And I repaid them with unkindness. What have I done?! Oh... here you are.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, Manehattan, what have I done? The thought of Fashion Week was fun But I went way too far My friends gave to me in ways so kind And I gave them nothing but a hard time

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: I need a moment with Prim Hemline. I have to rush back to Ponyville, but I just wanted to thank her first for<U+0097>

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: There you all are! I can't believe it, I thought you went back home!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: We missed the show because we overslept. Suri told us you lost. I'm really sorry.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: I lost? You know what? I don't even care. I'm just happy you're all still here after how I treated you. Taking advantage of your friendship the way I did. How could you ever see past it?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Yeah, you were pretty rotten.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Wow, Applejack. I know your thing is honesty, but come on!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Last night we may not have seen you at your best, but we know you. And we would never let one thing like that change how we feel about you.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Oh, thank you! You really are the most wonderful friends a pony could have! You know, I already arranged to make it up to you this afternoon! Hope you're all available for an exclusive performance of Hinny of the Hills!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Wow! That was even better than I imagined!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: I loved it! [beat] Uh, I mean, it was a'ight.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: How did you ever get them to agree to do an extra performance just for us?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Remember my costume designer friend who got me the tickets? Well, I offered to make all the costumes for his next show!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Um, here in Manehattan?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Well, um... yes... it will keep me away from Ponyville for a while.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: But I so wanted you to see this show! And working for this designer is such a great opportunity!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: We know. We're happy for you, Rarity. We're just sad for us.

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Sure. Come on down. This is the first place trophy for Fashion Week. [gasps] With my name on it! But I thought I lost!

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Hm. I suppose you'll need a job now that you're no longer with Suri. How would you like to work for my friend making all the costumes for his next show?

title: Rarity Takes Manehattan
dialog: Manehattan was simply grand. It was in this magnificent metropolis that I learned that, while there are ponies who will take advantage of your generosity, you should never, ever let that cause you to abandon your generous spirit. Nothing feels worse than taking advantage of the giving nature of your friends.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Whatcha doin'?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Aaagh!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Just some genealogical research.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Ohhh. [whispering] I don't know what that is.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Genealogy is the study of family history. Y'know, where ponies come from and who they're related to.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Ooh, fascinating.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Maybe you should pick one from the... top?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Uh-huh... Interesting... I see... Hmm, that makes sense... Not much of a surprise there... WHAT?!? This is the most amazing thing ever! Why didn't you tell me how amazing this is?! Genealogy is better than cotton candy on top of a fountain of chocolate! [thud] You'll never believe who it says I'm related to!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Hey, cousin!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: This is just so excitin', I can hardly believe it!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I know! Isn't it the best?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I have another sister! I have another sister!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Well, you actually have a fourth cousin twice removed by a fifth cousin, but that's like exactly like a sister!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I'd try to tone it down a little around non-family members, because I don't want to make them jealous, but...

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: This is the best family ever!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: It really is. You are gonna love bein' an Apple. I mean, you've got the playful one...

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: The strong one...

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: And of course, there's Granny Smith, who knows everythin' about everythin'!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: A Ponyville snail can hibernate for up to forty-eight moons!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Who knew?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: And then there's me. [sniffs, exhales] Do you smell that sweet apple air, Pinkie Pie?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: That was rhetorical. Of course you smell it. You're an Apple now!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: And Applejack is the one responsible for it!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Aw, Apple Bloom, that is sweet, but--

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: It's true! I mean she keeps us all organized and on schedule and does her own part on top of it all!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I was already super happy as a Pie! And now I get to be a part of this amazing family too?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: It's even more amazin' now that you're in it! [rhythmically] We're family, we're family, you an' me are family!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Best family twirl everrrrrrr!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Huh, I just can't believe we've never heard anythin' about this before! Hmm...

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: What's wrong, sis?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I'm not seein' where exactly it says we're family.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: It's riiiiiiiii- [inhales] -iiiiiight here!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: It... is?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Uh-huh. Applesauce of the Apple family lineage is a fourth cousin twice removed of the Pie family!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I see the part about our great, great auntie Applesauce and fourth cousin twice removed part, but that last bit's awful smudged. Are you sure it says 'Pie'?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I guess it is a little smudged, but I see most of it there, and when I read it, I knew in my heart it was true!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Well, ain't that just the sweetest thing!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: It is, it is. I'd just hate for us to get all excited before we found out for sure.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: So how are we supposed to find out for sure?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Ehhhh... Oh! Cousin Goldie Delicious! Her cabin's practically an Apple family history museum! If anypony has the records to back up Pinkie's theory, it's her!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Huh, I suppose we could always... I mean, Goldie Delicious doesn't live that far away, and we haven't been on one as a family in a real long time... Are y'all thinkin' what I'm thinkin'?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Has anypony seen my travelin' bonnet?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Isn't that it on your head?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: No!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: It looks an awful lot like--

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Well, it ain't, and that's final!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Hey, everypony? Since Pinkie Pie's back home gettin' her stuff for the trip, can y'all gather round? I just wanted to say somethin' real quick.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I've had somethin' in my teeth this whole time, haven't I? Gadsnickety, what a way to welcome a family member!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Er, no, Granny, your teeth are fine. I just wanted to be sure that we're all on the same page about showin' Pinkie Pie how awesome a family we really are. We want her to get to know the family she's been born into, but, like, the best version of it, y'know?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Oh, [blows raspberry]. Don't you worry, honey. We're a great family, and she can't help but see it.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I'll bet my future cutie mark's gonna be a picture of me bein' the best behaved pony ever! That's how good I'm gonna be! Big Mac?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Are y'all ready to go? Because I'm ready to go-go-go!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Er, Big Mac? Are you sure we really need all that stuff?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Are you sure you're strong enough to really pull all that stuff?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Are you sure the wagon's strong enough to hold it all?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: [groans] Eeyup!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Then lets get this show on the road!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: C'mon, Apples, y'all know this one!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Hot-diggity!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Yee-haw!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: We've traveled the road of generations Joined by a common bond We sing our song 'cross the pony nation From Equestria and beyond

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: There's no place that I'd rather be Than travelin' with my family Friends all around come to join and see As we sing out across the land

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: We're peas in a pod, we're thick as thieves Any clich<e9> you can throw at me We're here for each other, through thick and thin You're always welcome with your Apple kin Wheeeeee!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: You're more fun than the color pink Or balloons flying over your favorite drink The love I feel here is swim, not sink As we party across this land

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Big Mac! I thought you said<U+0096> Uh, I thought<U+0096> I mean, not that I'm blamin' you, because we don't blame in this family, but I thought you said all this stuff wasn't gonna be too heavy.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: How're we supposed to get to Goldie Delicious now?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I don't know, but I don't see how we can go back now either. We're closer to cousin Goldie's that we are to home.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: [gasps] I have the best... idea... ever! Family river trip!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Heh. Just one problem. We haven't got a raft. [under her breath] 'Bout the only thing that didn't get packed.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Well, back in the old days, we used to use the sap from a sugar pine tree to glue things together.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: That is, uh, fascinatin'... Don't know that it's helpful, but it is fascinatin'...

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Pfft! 'Not helpful', my patootie! We're gonna build ourselves a raft out of these here jalopy parts and keep it held together with sugar pine sap!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Hm, worth a shot!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Woo-hoo!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Could be worse, I guess. Now remember, this time we're only packin' the necessities.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Wait a second!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: This one is for the scrapbook!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Pinkie Pie, when did you have time to make this?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Applejack, when you're family, you make the time.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Woo-hoo! We did it!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Say 'soaked'!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: So what you're saying is, if I have the courage to jump, the parachute will open.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Whoa! That is deep!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Uh-oh... All right, y'all. Please tell me that the map didn' get wet. 'Cuz it looks like I'm gonna need it right about now.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Found it! Who's got the map? I got the map! M to the A to the yeah, that's right, P Ain't no other pony found a map like me I'm Applel<U+0097>

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: [through gritted teeth] All you had to do was bring it to me. No singin', no dancin', no games. Just walk it over!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: [through gritted teeth] Eeyup.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Say 'best siblings ever'!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Ooh, that's another keeper!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: It's okay, y'all! I travelled down this river as a filly and I know it like the back of my hoof!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Are you sure you know which way to go?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Does a June bug like to hide in a tree?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Uh... I don't know.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Well, I do know! And I also know we wanna head southeast! Now step aside, young'un!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Um, Granny?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Myuh-huh?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Are we supposed to go through a cave?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Ah, don't worry, child! The scariest cave in Equestria was down that other way!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: The scariest cave in Equestria?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Oh, it's a fright all right! Filled with creatures that'll eat ya soon as look at ya!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Ooh, sounds scary. Tell us more!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Ponies go in... but they never come out!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: And you're sure it's not that cave? The one we're headin' straight for?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Now, Applejack, I taught you better than to question your elder ponies!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Heh... you sure did.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Alrighty then. Now everypony just sit on back an' leave the steerin' to your old Granny Smith.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: See now? Told ya th--

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Got it! Best scary unidentifiable creature ever! Say 'terrified'!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Guess that was the scariest cave in Equestria. Uh, of course I meant to take us through it! Unexpected adventure is good for the soul!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Best granny wisdom ever!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Uh-huh. Why don't you just scooch on over there, Granny? Think I'll take it from here on out.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Huh! Is that how I taught you to treat your elder ponies?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Ooh! Ooh! Is it?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: You taught me to trust my common sense. And my common sense says we should get to Goldie Delicious's cabin in one piece.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: And that is exactly what I'm gonna do!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: That is mighty generous of you, but I think you've done enough for one day.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: And how exactly are you gonna know which way to go?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Hmmmmmmm?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: It would be easier if the map hadn't gone overboard!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Hey! There wouldn't have been an overboard if Big Mac hadn't overpacked the jalopy!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyu- hey!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Exactly! So I think we can all agree that from here on out, I should be in charge of everythin'.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I just wanna say... that I think you're all super duper, and I can't wait to make a page in my scrapbook about the amazing waterfall we went down!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Wheeeee!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Huh! Told you that sugar pine sap would hold this thing together.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Uh, Pinkie Pie? Maybe you could read that one out loud?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Oh, right, sorry! I haven't even read it yet. I was just looking at how pretty the paper is. Okay, it says that she ran off to run some errands but will be home soon! Oh, that's perfect!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Why is that perfect?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Because it'll give me enough time to get more scrapbook paper! See ya!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Worst family road trip. Ever.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: [sadly] Eeyup.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I can't believe she witnessed our family fallin' apart like this. [sighs] I can't believe I was arguin' with you so much that I tore the wheel right off the raft. It's like I wasn't myself at all.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Aw, that wasn't your fault. My stubborn streak got a hold of me somethin' fierce. Should've let you take the wheel long a'fore that.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: It was my fault the map got all wet...

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I was the pony who<U+0097>

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Now, now, Big Mac, you gotta know we forgive you for packin' the jalopy so much that it collapsed. You was just as eager to please Pinkie Pie like the rest of us.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Everypony, I think we have to let Pinkie Pie know that even if she does discover that she's an Apple, she does not have to feel obliged to consider herself one.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Sure as applesauce.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Are you kidding me?! You guys are the best family ever!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: How can you say that? We started out as one big unit, and now look at us.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Yeah! Now look at you! You're all here still in one big unit, loving each other and owning up to what went wrong! You never gave up, even when things got tough!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: She does make a pretty good point.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: You aren't just family, you're best friends! And I wanna be an Apple more than ever!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: And we want you to be one too!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Now that's how you run an errand.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Hello!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Hello yourself!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: You must be Goldie Delicious. So nice to meet you.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Uh-huh. And who exactly are you?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: We're Apples!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Well, we think we're all Apples. But we need your help finding out if Pinkie Pie here is our fourth cousin twice removed.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Well why didn't you say so? If anypony can help solve this genealogy mystery, it's me!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Gotta... get some oil... for the hinges... Alrighty then, just have to move a few things out of the way of the door. Ooh! Ah! Get off of that, Mr. Fluffy... Come on, Pooples... Come here, sweetheart... Come on in! Sorry about the mess!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Whoa!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Oh, careful now. Those belonged to your great-great-great-great uncle Apple Tart!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Well, whose was this?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Well, that was my lunch. A couple of weeks ago.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: [blows dust away] [straining] This here is a complete record of, of our family tree! It's not here, or here, or, or here, or it certainly isn't here, is it...? Oh, here it is! ...Oh, dear.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: 'Oh, dear'? What is it?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Am I not an Apple after all?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Well, that's just it. I don't know. The page is all smudged. I sure am sorry, but I don't think I can help you out after all.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Don't be sorry, it's okay. I'm just a little disappointed that I'll never know for sure if I'm a part of this family.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Well, I know for sure!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: What do you mean? You can't know!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I can know for sure that it doesn't matter what the book says or doesn't say. After all you've been through with us and all you've put up with, it's obvious you're an Apple to the core!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Darn tootin'!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Yes siree!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Ooh! Say 'best family hug ever'!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Thanks again for the wagon, Goldie! We'll see you soon!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Y'all sure you don't want to take any of these Apple family heirlooms home with you?

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Nnope.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Twilight agreed this was definitely an experience worth puttin' in the journal. Think I'll write about how bein' a good family isn't about bein' perfect as much as it is about bein' able to get through the rough patches together. About bein' able to forgive each other for mistakes.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Don't forget to mention how really good friends can also feel like your family.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: You know what? Maybe I should write it. I'm good at makin' things sound excitin'.

title: Pinkie Apple Pie
dialog: I have a history of excellent storytellin'. I should probably do it<U+0097> Hey! Where in the haystack do you think you're goin' with that there pen?!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Alright, ponies, listen up!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: We're all ears. Right, Bulk Biceps?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [kissing noises] [grunts] Nuh-uh! I'm all muscles! Yeah!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: I like your attitude, Bulk Biceps, but it's gonna take more than muscles and Yeah!s to get us to the Equestria Games! We are the Aerial Relay team, and it's up to the three of us to make sure that we qualify at the tryouts. And do I need to remind you how much I - I mean, Ponyville, heh <U+0096> wants to qualify and make it to the Games?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: I remember. I really, really, really want to qualify for you and Ponyville.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Bring it on!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Gimme a 'P' for 'Ponyville'!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [through megaphone] P, Ponyville!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: P!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Just make sure you have one ready for when we qualify for the Aerial Relay.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: And after that, for when we win gold medals in the Equestria Games!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Not so fast! If you're gonna be good, you're gonna be better with some of my apple brown bettys in ya. They're perfect.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: 'P' is for 'perfect'!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Alright, team! Show me what you got! Put some bend into those knees! Flap those wings! And I want to see all four hooves off the ground on the count of three! [beat] [quickly] One two three!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Don't forget to breathe while you're up there!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: 'P' is for, uhh... 'pain'?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Good luck! [to Rainbow Dash] It was nice of you to be part of the team that doesn't have... uh... the strongest flyers.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Nothing nice about it. I know that I can pick up the slack for anypony. With me on the team, we'll qualify. I'm sure of it.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Ponyville is very lucky to have you.

title: Rainbow Falls
