dialog: Yeah, I'm pretty awesome.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [straining] [gasping] I am so proud to be representing Ponyville. [straining] Oh, it's such an honor to even try out for the Games. I just hope I don't let anypony down.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: We'll make them proud!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: 'P' is for 'proud'! We're gonna be the best fans anypony has ever seen!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Ooh. Can't wait to see what everypony else is wearing, even though I am absolutely sure they won't be better than the Ponyville uniforms I'm designing for the Equestria Games.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: And we will make it to the Games once everypony carbo-loads on my apple brown bettys.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: I can't wait!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: And the game is on!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Hah, nice to see there's some real competition here!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [sighs] The Wonderbolts know a winner when they see one, and we'll be winners just as soon as we practice! Right team?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Right.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Yeah!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: And, um, I'm with her! Hooray!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [gasps] Where can I get pompoms like those?!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: So, do I need to remind you of what our goal is here?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Uh, maybe?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: We want to qualify! We need to be one of the first four teams to cross the finish line! Bulk Biceps, you're the first flyer, so let me see you flap it!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: What the?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Sorry! Got the idea from them, but...

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: ...It looks like they got better aim.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Okay, the passing of the baton needs to be seamless. You shouldn't miss a wing beat or drop a hair in altitude! And whatever you do, don't let go of it!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Are you really, really, really sure you're ready? I mean, I don't want to take it if you're not super sure.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Ready!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Ponyville could do so much better. I'll be back with a freshly painted one in no time!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: We were using that! And it's not like anypony else has color-coordinated horseshoes or anything!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [sighs] I guess some ponies do.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Some ponies do what?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [sighs] Have a better chance of qualifying and going to the Equestria Games than others.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Watch and learn. The Cloudsdales are Wonderbolts, and Wonderbolts are the best flyers there are. And my personal heroes. So, maybe you can learn something.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Please learn something?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: I sure hope so.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Whoa!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Whooaaaa!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Aaaaah! Help!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Gotcha!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: As good as any Wonderbolt!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Oh, Rainbow Dash, I'm just so proud of you. You scooped Soarin out of the sky and brought him down to the ground and now, now he's okay. At least, I hope he's okay. [to Soarin] Are you okay?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Uh, my wing hurts, but I-I'm sure it'll be okay by the competition.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Ah, it was nothin'. But, if you feel like talking about how great I am, don't let me stop you!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: 'P' is for Rainbow Dash!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [whispering] Um, 'Rainbow Dash' actually starts with an 'R'.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Never mind!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Tough break to lose a teammate right before the tryouts.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: So that means you could fly with us.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Fly?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: What do you say? Wanna be our third?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Uh, I don't know. My team really needs me to be at my best in order to qualify. Don't wanna be too worn out by the time the race comes around.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: We put you through some pretty intense workouts at the Wonderbolt Academy and you handled those just fine.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Heh, I did kick some major tail at the Academy... but I don't know how my teammates will feel about me practicing with the competition.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Alright, I'll do it.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [chuckles] Wise decision, Rainbow Dash.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Come on, Bulk Biceps, you can do it!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Um... I'm ready to take the horseshoe, if you want me to.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Nnnngh...

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [yelps] Oof!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: You, uh, keep doing your wing-ups. I'm just gonna get some, uh, water.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [laughs] Yeah!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Too much?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: It's not easy practicing with two teams, is it?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [spit-take] You... know? Does anypony else?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: No. They're too busy practicing to wonder why you keep disappearing.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Well, I've seen the other teams practicing and we're still gonna qualify. I can fly fast enough to make up the distance.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: It just seems like one of the teams you're practicing with needs a little more help than the other one.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: But it's so much more fun working out with the winners than... um... the non-winners. Besides, Ponyville will still qualify.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Rainbow Dash, you got a minute?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Uh, sure.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: It looks like Soarin's wing won't heal in time for the trials. We want you to fly with us.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Ow!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: So, what's it gonna be?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Well, I...

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Take some time to think about it.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: They want me to fly with them! It's like a dream come true!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: If you fly for Cloudsdale, Pinkie Pie won't have anypony to cheer for. Rarity's uniforms will never be seen. And Applejack will have slaved over those apple brown bettys for nothing.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Oh, but I really wanna fly with the best team! What would you do?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: I think this is a decision you have to make on your own. The race is tomorrow, so you'd better make it soon.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [exaggerated groaning] Woe is me! Oooh!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: What's happened?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Urgh, I've hurt my hoof...

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: All of them?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: I, uh, tripped on a-a foam hoof and landed on a... [mumbles, near unintelligible] pokey stick coming out of the ground...

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [growls] If I get my hooves on that [matching unintelligible gibberish], it'll be in big trouble!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: There is no way I can fly now.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Do you think you'll be better by tryouts?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [exaggerated groaning] I'll be lucky if I ever fly again! [sighs] I just need a little rest.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Oh, don't worry, Rainbow Dash. We'll take care of you... or, at least, somepony will. Like, a medic or-or a doctor, or a nurse.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: So, the medic pony isn't sure what's wrong with you.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Everything! Absolutely everything!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: This'll cure everythin' that ails ya!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [with mouth full] Thank you. I couldn't have done that on my own.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Nothing says 'get better' like a little medical pizazz! Silk slings and a glitter bandage?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: That might help.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: And how is our patient doing?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: I've been better.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: We just wanted to let you know that we're so sorry you're hurt, but you shouldn't worry a bit about not being able to be in the tryouts. We'll be alright. We even have a replacement. We're so, so sorry that you can't compete. We all know how much you love to fly. And we promise-

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Cross our hearts!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: ...That if we qualify and make it to the Equestria Games and all win gold medals, you can have ours, because we know how much a gold medal means to you.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Thanks...

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [clears throat] I think Rainbow Dash might need to rest some more.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Don't forget your bettys!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: You know, choosing not to choose isn't really a decision.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: You sure have nice friends. Nopony's been by to visit me. Eh, too busy practicing, I guess.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Well, hopefully your wing will be better soon.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Oh, it's fine. I-I'm just keeping it warm in case my team wants me back.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: What do you mean, 'wants you back'? Spitfire and Fleetfoot told me that you were still too injured to fly!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: And they told me that they were worried I wouldn't be one hundred percent by the tryouts, so they were going with somepony else!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: That somepony else was me! Until, uh, well, until I got hurt, that is.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: So, [sighs] I guess we're all out of luck. Cloudsdale won't qualify without three fliers, and Ponyville won't qualify without you. Too bad...

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Even with Rainbow Dash's replacement, I don't think we're gonna qualify. No offense.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Gah! What am I gonna do with all these now?!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Uh, what were you gonna do with them before?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [sighs] Maybe my Equestria Games uniforms will still be in style next year. I mean, I am pretty fashion-forward.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Is that Rainbow Dash... walking?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: I-I feel great, because... I was never hurt in the first place.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: I faked my injury so that I wouldn't have to choose between flying for Ponyville or Cloudsdale. I wanted to fly with you both, and the decision was too hard!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Oh, Rainbow Dash, you don't have to choose us. I know you love to win, and you should go with the team that surely will.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: I know now who I should've been loyal to.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Good choice. Always stick with the winners.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Ponyville. Because it's not just where I live, but it's where my friends are. The ponies who really care about me, whether I can help them win a race or not.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Are you sure that's the right decision?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: You lied to me about Soarin's wing just so you could get a better flyer! You may be a winning team, but you're still not the kind of team I wanna be a part of.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Huh. Rainbow Dash, you are something. Saw it at the Academy, seeing it again here. We could learn a lot from a competitor like you.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Ready to fly?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Really?

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Never should've lied and tried to replace you to begin with.

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: [gasps] Go, Cloudsdale!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Come on, Ponyville relay team! We've got a race to get ready for!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Yeah!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Come on, Ponyville! You can do it!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Go, Fluttershy! Woo-hoo!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Woo-hoo! Go, Rainbow Dash!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Yeah!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Woo-hoo!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Equestria Games, here we come!

title: Rainbow Falls
dialog: Oh, I can't deny it. I love to win! But if I ever gotta choose between winning and being loyal to my friends, I'm always gonna choose my friends. 'Cause as much as I love winning, I love them waaaaay more.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Mail's here!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Please be a yes, please be a yes, please be a yes... Yes! She can make it, she can make it!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Going out on a limb here, but I'm guessing that Princess Cadance said she can come this weekend!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I'm finally gonna get to spend some quality time with my sister-in-law! This is the best news ever!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Um, so sorry for barging in like this... but I'm so excited, I just couldn't wait to tell somepony! The Equestrian Society for the Preservation of Rare Creatures have given me permission to observe the rarest, tiniest, most adorable magical creatures in all of Equestria <U+0096> the Breezies!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Wow, Fluttershy, that's fantastic!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Oh, it's not just fantastic; it just might be the best news ever!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I just got the most incredible mail anypony's ever received in all of recorded pony postal history! It's a flyer about a one-day sale on used patio furniture! Aah! Could this day get any better? Woo-hoo!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Here's a wrap, in case it gets cold.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: And I packed you a basket of nice fresh apples in case you get hungry.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Have a great time!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Oh, I will. And I hope you have fun with Cadance.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Goodbye! Goodbye, everypony!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Fluttershy! I'll never forget youuuuuuu! [beat] Ooh, something floaty! La-la-la-la-la!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Oh, I'm a bit nervous about Cadance's visit!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: What could you be nervous about, Twilight? Cadance just loves you to pieces!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I know, but I really want her visit to go without a hitch!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Oh, why wouldn't it?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Well, the last three times we've seen each other haven't exactly been worry-free.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: The fate of Equestria has hung in the balance during most of your visits with her.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Exactly. Cadance and I haven't really had a chance to just enjoy being friends again. Which is why it is so important that this visit be about the two of us having some real quality time together.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I'm guessin' you've got a plan that'll keep it that way.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: The timing couldn't be more perfect. For one day only, right here in Ponyville, the Star Swirl the Bearded Traveling Museum! Cadance and I can spend the whole day looking at Star Swirl the Bearded artifacts!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Sounds like a perfect drama-free way to spend the day with Cadance.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Not counting the drama surrounding which of the bells from his cloak they've chosen to put on display. Spoiler alert: it's this one!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: [hacks] Uh, sorry. Something in my throat... like a big ball of 'lame'!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I think it sounds delightful.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Yup, definitely sounds like you two will have some real quality time together.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Exactly. Just quiet time.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Your Highness.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Your Highness.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I'm teasing, Twilight. We're sisters-in-law. We don't have to be so formal.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Knowing you, you've made some plans.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Boy, have I. Hang on just one second. [to rest of main cast] You guys-

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Now, now, don't you worry about a thing! We will make sure that nothing <U+0096> but nothing <U+0096> interferes with your visit.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Go on, have a hootenanny with your kinfolk.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: You really are the best friends a pony could ever have. Coming, Cadance!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: [sighs] Two sisters-in-law bonding. Well, I for one am gonna make sure that nothing spoils their day!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: What is that thing?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Whatever it is... duuuck!!!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Rarity, that doesn't look anything like a duck!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: What is that?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: [sniffing] No, not a "what", but a "who", dear.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Oh, no... That sounds like...

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: [sneezes] [sniffs] Oh...

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: What in tarnation are you doin' here? And why the jumpin' June bugs are you blue?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: More like a shade of cerulean, to be precise.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Whatever color you are is the color of trouble!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: What are you, sick or somethin'?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Well, of course I'm sick. The blue skin? These sneezes? Could somebody find me a fainting couch?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: What?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: If you're so 'sick', why have you come here instead of, y'know, staying home in bed and getting over your weird illness?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: [sneezes] [blows nose] Because this condition has left me helpless, simply helpless! Why, I can barely lift a spoon.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I came to find the one pony who truly understands me and could nurse me back to health. Where is that dear, sweet Fluttershy? I need attention! I need some care! I need-

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: You need to chill. Fluttershy's out.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Oh, of course, her trip to see the Breezies. Ah, yes, I had forgotten that was today.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: How do you know about her trip?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Well, she told me about it in her last letter.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: You and Fluttershy write each other letters?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Well, of course we do! We're friends! It's just such a shame that today of all days is when I really need her. Oh, well, I know what to do.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Good thinking. Head on home, put your feet up. I'm sure eventually you'll have the strength to make yourself soup or something...

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Oh, no-no-no-no-no-no! I mean, while she's gone, you ponies can take care of me! Isn't that what friends are for, taking care of each other? [laughs] Let the healing begin!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Not it!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Don't you worry, Discord! I'll give you cuddles, and read you stories, and tell you all about me! I was born on a Tuesday-

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I so hope you don't mind, Pinkie Pie.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Well, as a matter of fact, I most certainly- Hey! Who keeps throwing away these perfectly good balloons?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: [hushed] That joker's up to something, and whatever it is, we're gonna keep it as far away from Twilight and Princess Cadance as possible.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: [hushed] You're right. We promised we wouldn't let anything ruin their visit... although I do so wish that "anything" had turned out to be something else!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Did I hear you two talking about Princess Cadance's visit with Princess Twilight?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Maybe.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Fluttershy had mentioned that those two were getting together today. Mm-hm. How wonderful for them both. It is so rare that those two get to see one another. I don't know about you, but I sometimes wonder how close they could actually be. All those years apart before being reunited?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: They're plenty close.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: And if they're not, this rare opportunity to focus on their friendship will certainly bring them closer. Unless...

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Don't even think about it! They mustn't be disturbed!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Disturb them? I wouldn't dream of it. Not when I have two such dear friends of my own who have already offered to take care of me. And at such peril! This flu of mine is highly- [snorts] [sneezes] contagious.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: A whole day to celebrate Star Swirl the Bearded. What could be better?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Absolutely nothing. [gasps] Is that the candlestick he used to light the way when he was exploring the caverns of Maretania?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: It sure is!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Oh, I can't believe I'm getting to see it in real life!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Discord! What are you doing here?!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Oh, dear, dear Princesses, I'm sorry to say that I'm sick. [hacks] Blue flu.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Blue flu?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Magic health bubble.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Good thinking.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Indeed. How would Twilight nurse me back to health if she were sick too? You will be letting me stay at your place until I'm all better, won't you?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Stay? With me?! Uh, now is not really the best time, though I'm sure you already knew that...

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: But taking in the sick and the desperate - isn't that what Fluttershy would do? Isn't 'helping' something that friends do for friends? Unless, of course, you're really saying that you're not my friend.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: [through gritted teeth] No, that is not what I'm saying.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Oh, how elated I am to hear that. Shall the three of us head back to your place? I don't want to get anypony else sick.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: [sighs] Guess we don't have much choice.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Carry me?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: It isn't far. I think you can manage.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Oh, poo.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Need anything else?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Just knowing that I have a good friend like you to take care of me has made me feel better already. I'll be fine here on my own. Oh, just before you go, just a little small request.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: It's going to be fine. We'll just get him what he wants and be back to the exhibit in no time. What was it that you needed?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: A little glass of water please A fresh pressed hanky if I sneeze Some tea with honey from the bees Whenever you can brew it

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I'll get your tea.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: And while I get a little rest A teeny tiny small request Some codfish oil for my chest Poured from a crystal cruet

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: A crystal cruet?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: [singing faster] My goodness, I'm a nincompoop Because I fear I've got the croup I need a vat of pumpkin soup And scarves made out of zinnias

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Anything else?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I'll be grateful for your charity Until the bitter end Because I've heard that tenderness Is what you lend an ailing friend

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Right, but<U+0097>

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: So, who's ready for my big reprise?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Alright, this is ridiculous!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: How did you even catch this flu?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Inadequate hoof and claw washing?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: There must be some way to just cure you! There has to be a spell or remedy in one of my books!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: There is one way...

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: And you didn't think to mention it earlier?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Slipped my mind. On a hill at the very edge of Equestria, there grows an exquisite magic flower. Pick the flower as it drops its petals at sunset. Then you can make a magical soothing elixir to cure the blue flu.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I suppose you have a good reason you didn't bother to get this flower as soon as you realized you were sick?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Well, I couldn't travel that far in my condition. By the time I got there, I'd be too weak to even attempt to retrieve the flower.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: So where exactly are Cadance and I headed?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Well, [clears throat] you'll want to head north, turn left, th<U+0097> Oh... You know, it'd be much easier if I took you there myself.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I thought you were in no condition to travel.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Doing okay there?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: To be honest, I'm a little out of practice when it comes to flying.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Well, then lucky for you. We're here.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: It's just at the top of that hill.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I'm really sorry about this. All I wanted was to have some peaceful quality time together.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I know, I was looking forward to it too.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: This is the top. But where is that flower? Oh. Come on, if we hurry, we can still have some time together.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: One... last... pull!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Phew! Let's get Discord and this flower back home, then all our problems are solved-

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: What in Equestria?!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Twilight! Help!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Get your coils off my sister-in-law!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Let go of my sister-in-law!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Thanks!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Don't thank me yet!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Just... a little... more!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: And for good measure...!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: [panting] Are you okay?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: [panting] Yes. Better than okay actually.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Then let's get Discord back to Ponyville, make that elixir, and finally get a chance to spend some quality time together.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: You... were... faking?!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I was! But I had a very good reason.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: We're listening.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Well, I was in my thinking tree <U+0096> that's where I do most of my really deep thinking <U+0096> I was there, and I said to myself, I said, "Discord, your friend Twilight says that she's your pal, but she never writes and she never pops in for a visit."

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I don't even know where you li-

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: "Now that she's a princess, maybe she's decided that she's too good for you."

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I have never considered myself t-

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: But how was I supposed to know for sure that I'm truly still friends with one of the most important ponies around?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I'm not more-

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: By seeing if you would go to the ends of Equestria for me, of course. Which you did, literally. Congratulations, Twilight, you passed my friendship test!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Why the angry eyes? You love passing tests. It's not because my little exam put a damper on your visit with Princess Cadance, is it? Made it so that there was no time for you two to focus on your friendship?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: You didn't put a damper on our visit at all.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Spending the day at the Star Swirl the Bearded exhibit would've been more relaxing, but to be honest, relaxation is the last thing I need.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: It is?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Don't get me wrong. Life in the Crystal Empire is wonderful, but it's become a little... predictable. I enjoy a little excitement now and then. Getting to face all these challenges today was just what I needed. And facing them with you just made me realize even more how lucky I am to have somepony like you as a friend. We may not see each other very often, but I know you'll always be there when I need you. Just like she was there for you, Discord.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Yes, she's a real sweetheart. We're all so lucky to have her in our lives.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: What in the world?!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I think it's pretty clear that my visit with Cadance didn't go quite the way I expected. But in the end, I realized that when you're with a good friend, even the most chaotic day can end up being a great experience that brings you closer. Wouldn't you agree, Discord?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: [snorts] Yes, Twilight.

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I don't wanna go sayin' you got what you deserved...

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Well, I have no trouble saying it. You got what you deserved!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: Now, now, he's learned his lesson. Isn't that right, my little patient?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: I'm so glad that you're back from your trip, Fluttershy. Just your presence here is making me feel so much better. I was just wondering, could I trouble you for just one more thing?

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: No!

title: Three's A Crowd
dialog: What? I was simply going to ask for a teeny, tiny glass of water.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Well, Boneless. Looks like our work here is done.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Yep, those ponies never partied so hard. Thanks to me: Cheese. Cheese Sandwich.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Woo-hoo-hoo! That was a doozy! Well, Boneless. Looks like our next party is gonna be in... Ponyville.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Every single day there's something new you can plan for Every single day there's something wonderful to do But nothing makes me happy like a day that I can say "Today I planned a party, and it's just for you!"

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Great, thanks! Got any streamers today?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Don't you know it!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Don't have much time to gather all the things I need If I'm really gonna make this party fly For today's another day that all of Ponyville will say

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: She planned my cute-cea<f1>era my dad made me, I won't lie I demanded all the best, I suppose she passed the test Sure it was pretty good all thanks to Pinkie Pie

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Thanks, I guess?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: I'm gonna need the full rainbow!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Yes, if you please!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Your biggest banner! This party's gonna be the best!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: I don't know how she does it.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Wow, look at her go!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Oh, boy! This is gonna be good!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Go, Pinkie, go!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Ooh, I am so, so, SO excited because today I'm planning the birthday bash of... Rainbow Dash!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Yeah!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Rainbow Dash.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Yes, Pinkie?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: You realize that, by enlisting me as your party planner, I guarantee that this is going to be the funnest, most fantabulous, superbial party in Ponyville?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Uh...yeah? I guess.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: No guesses! Parties are no picnic.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Oh, I like a nice picnic party.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Oh!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Parties. Are. Serious! And you have my certified Pinkie Party Promise that you will have the best birthday party ever!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Okay.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Great! Now, who's ready to join this super duper party pony to plan this super duper pa-rty?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: I am.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Who are you, stranger?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Name's Cheese Sandwich. I plan parties.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: What an amazing coincidence! I'm Pinkie Pie, and I'm planning a party!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Oh, it's no coincidence, my little pony. My cheesy sense was a-tingling, telling me a party was in the works.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: A cheesy sense? Ah! Double amazing! I have a Pinkie Sense!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Yes. I sensed you did. And I happen to be the premiere party planner in all of Equestria. If there's a party in need, there I'll be. Be it wingding, hoedown, hootenanny, or shindig, I'm your pony.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: A pair of party pony planners in Ponyville?! What can be more perfect?!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: I'll tell you what -- making this party epic! 'Cause this isn't just any birthday. It's also the anniversary of when I moved to Ponyville!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Good heavens, Rainbow Dash. It's your "birth-iversary"!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Exactly! So what do you say, party planners?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Oh, I think we can do it!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Oh, I don't think so.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: I know so! After all...

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: The super-duper party pony<U+0096>that pony is me I always knew that was the kind of pony I would be

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Me too!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Come on, ponies! Who here likes to party? Ha-ha! You do! I can tell!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Like me!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: But everypony told me, "Cheese, that fun just wastes the day"

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: As if!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: But when I threw a party and I busted out some moves

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Uh-huh!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: The ponies finally saw the light and got into the groove

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: You know it!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: The super-duper party pony<U+0096>that pony is me

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: And me!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: You'll never meet another party pony quite like Cheese!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Uh, Pinkie?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Hey, good-lookin', want some mayonnaise?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: The super-duper party pony<U+0096>that pony is me You'll never meet another party pony quite like Cheese

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Oh, when I throw a Cheese party, be sure to not be lame And miss my pie fights, wacky kites, and streamers in your mane Fizzy drinks, Hawaiian shirts, and brie fondue delight You know that with Cheese Sandwich, you'll be partying all night!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: C'mon, everypony! Let's party down with Cheese!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: You're really a certified party pony?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: That's right! That's my guarantee!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: But what about the super party pony named Pinkie...?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: [indistinct] Thanks buddy! You're gonna love this party! Hey kid, have a streamer, on me!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Yeah! Hah, now that's what I'm talking about! I'm so stoked you're here, Cheese Sandwich!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Yeah. You sure did come on the right day.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: [sighs] Your party sounds simply divine.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: We're so lucky to have you here.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Just doing my job, little fillies.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: I mean, Pinkie Pie's parties are fun and sweet and all, but now this party's gonna be--

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Epic?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: You said it! Oh, yeah!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Feels gouda!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Uh, heh, no offense, Pinkie.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: My birth-iversary's already looking way cooler! You are my kind of party pony, Cheese Sandwich.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: [chuckles] You got that right, Rainbow Dash. All right, party ponies, I've got some planning to do!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Pinkie! Aren't you gonna help Cheese Sandwich plan the party?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: That's okay. [chuckles nervously] He obviously has what it takes to do it all by himself. Heh.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Really?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Yes, indeedy! [chuckles nervously] After all, if Cheese really is the super duperiest partying-est pony of them all, maybe that means... I'm... not.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: For all my life, all I've wanted to do Was make my friends want to smile true But maybe I was wrong And Pinkie Pie shouldn't plan parties at all

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Well, they don't call him the super duper party planner for nothin'.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: That's it! This pony has gotta get her title back! And I know just what to do!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Totally awesome!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Huh. Best I've ever seen.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: I can't believe it!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Freeze, Cheese! I challenge you... to a goof off!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Oh, no! Not a goof off!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: [whispering] What's a goof off?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: I have no idea, hehe.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: This Cheese has stood alone a long time, Pinkie Pie. You think you can out-goof me?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Oh, I don't think so. I know so! And the stakes are high, Cheese Sandwich. Whoever wins will be dubbed the ultimate super duper party pony and headline the Rainbow Dash birth-iversary bash!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: And the loser?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Doesn't!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: So, are you in, Cheese? Or are you... boneless?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Nopony calls me boneless. Right, Boneless?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Then the goof off is on for high noon!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Um, Pinkie? It's already 3 o'clock.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Oh. Oh, well then. Make it 3:10 to goof off!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: All right, everypony. According to my official goof off rulebook...

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: She actually has a goof off rulebook?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Are you kidding? Twilight can find a rulebook for everything!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Shhh.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: The two competitors have free range to goof about -- be it by singing, dancing, playing, prancing, joking, or performing -- to make the judge chortle, chuckle, giggle, guffaw, hoot and holler, whoop it up, and party down.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: The funnier, sillier, wilder, and goofier, the better. Rainbow Dash, since the winner will be headlining your party, you are the judge.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Heh. Big tense competition on my birth-iversary. What could be better?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Cheese Sandwich, Pinkie Pie, are you ready?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: I was born ready!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: I was ready before I was born!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Then... Let the goofing begin!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: It's your birthday party, a very special day I've got a song, it won't take long, I just wanted to say Happy, happy, happy, happy Happy, happy, happy, happy Happy, happy, happy, happy birthday to you!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: If you wanna be the life of the party But you're feeling just a little uptight Call the doctor, beg and plead "Doctor, tell me what I need" Try to put a little cheese in your knees!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Bubbles and balloons, bubbles and balloons What's a birthday party without bubbles and balloons? Star-shaped or trapezoid, look what I can do Only Pinkie Pie can make a bubble shaped like you!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Just let yourself go floppy, for now this is your chance Pretend you have no bones and do the rubber chicken dance!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Cooler than a rubber chicken and tastier than cake Come on, you, let's party down and do the Gummy shake!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: 'Cause I like to make you smile, smile, smile Yes I do It fills my heart with sunshine all the while Yes it does 'Cause all I really need's a smile, smile, smile From these happy friends of mine

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: That's my song!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: What do you mean? I have no idea what you're talking about.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: THAT'S IT!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Roll out the party cannon When you hear the party cannon song Ka-BOOM!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Why should you compromise? Try this one on for size 'Cause nothing quite says cheer like the ringing in your ear Of the cheese supreme cannonball surprise!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: <U+00A1>Dale, dale, dale No pierdas el tino! Porque si lo pierdes <U+00A1>Pierdes el camino!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: [gasps] Rainbow's not having the best party ever! I... I broke the Pinkie Party Promise! Stop! The goof off is off!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: But I haven't named a winner.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: You don't have to. I forfeit. Which means... Cheese Sandwich wins.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: [laughs] [sighs] ...I do?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Yes. You get to headline Rainbow Dash's party.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: But, what about you, Pinkie?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: I... [sniffles] I don't.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Pinkie, wait! I'm sorry I got all swept away by Cheese Sandwich.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: We all are.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: [sighs] Sorry, Pinkie.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: No. I'm sorry I let my pride get in the way of you having the best birth-iversary ever. Cheese Sandwich really is a super duper party planner, and he'll be a terrific headliner. I should've been a big enough pony to admit that and let you have your day.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: But don't you get it? You're both super duper party ponies. Sure, Cheese Sandwich is a great guest party pony, but you're Ponyville's permanent party pony. Nopony could ever take your place, and we could never have a party without you.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Rainbow Dash is right. I never meant to take your place in Ponyville. I just wanted to show you what a great party pony I am, Pinkie.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Why me?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Well...

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: I fear I told a little fib about my pony past I hope that when you hear the truth, you will not be aghast I wasn't quite the super party pony like I claimed The fact is that I was so shy, nopony knew my name

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Me?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Yes!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Hah, really?!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Really!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: So I was the pony that threw the awesomely spectacular party that inspired you to become an awesome spectacular party thrower?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Swear on Camembert!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Enough with the warm fuzzy stuff, you two. It's my birth-iversary, and you gotta throw me a bash!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Yeah!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Let's go!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: All right, everypony! We are here to celebrate the birthday...

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: ...and anniversary...

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Hey, everypony! Who's ready to get their party on?! Hit it!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Get your hooves up, party's starting out right now Everypony, everypony get down Time to make a wish, better make it right now It's been a year and today is your birthday party

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Cheese Sandwich! Oh, I gotta tell ya, you and Pinkie have totally made this the best birthday/anniversary super combo ever! Hah, it's totally--

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Epic?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Yeah, it is!

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: That's all I needed to hear, little filly. Just a little memento of my visit.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: You're giving me your special rubber chicken friend?

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: Oh, he's not the only one. Well, Boneless Two, another job well done. But it's time we mosey along. Another town, another party.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: I never did get that pony's name.

title: Pinkie Pride
writer: Amy Keating Rogers; story by Jayson Thiessen
dialog: [giggles] Oh, yeah!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Wow! I can't believe how many ponies showed up!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I can! I mean, finding out who the Ponyville Days pony of ceremonies is is a pretty big deal!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I didn't know Granny Smith was on the selection committee.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Of course she is. Ponyville Days celebrates the founding of Ponyville, and she was right there.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I'm glad the committee didn't automatically pick me so everypony gets a chance to see how great being me actually is! Even though the festival's basically a party and the pony of ceremonies gets to organize the whole thing! So it'd totally make sense if they did pick me.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Citizens of Ponyville, this year's applicants were all exceptional, but there can only be one Ponyville Days pony of ceremonies. And that pony is...

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Rarity!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Whoo-ee! All right, Rarity!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Congratulations, Rarity! Do you know what you're gonna do?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Oh, I might have a few ideas.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I'm so excited for the festival, I can hardly stand up straight!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Me too. I'm glad Rarity was picked. I know she'll add a touch of elegance to the whole thing!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Probably more than a touch!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [clears throat] [reading] This year's Ponyville Days festival, designed by Rarity, will feature various high-class events such as... a silent cider auction and tasting.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: A Ponyville gala in town square.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: And, of course, a Ponyville fashion show.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: This year's Ponyville Days festival pony of ceremonies creates shimmering couture of her own design.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: And the theme is... "Small Town Chic"!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Wow, Rarity. You really have put a lot of effort into this.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I'll say.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Oh, I think it's going to be magical.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [gasps] Do you really think so?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Are you kidding? I can't wait!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Oh, that's such a relief. But of course, I couldn't possibly do it all on my own. The festival is in three days!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Pinkie Pie and I can hang lights and decorations in the town square!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: And I can get Sweet Apple Acres all ready for the cider tastin'.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Oh, that's just perfect! And now, Twilight, if you and Fluttershy wouldn't mind helping with the fashion show...

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Of course!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I'd be honored.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I can focus on the thing I'm worried about most of all.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Creating a Ponyville Days festival fantastic enough to impress... Trenderhoof!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Uh, who's Trenderhoof?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Sounds like somepony has a little bit of a crush.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Thank you ever so much for joining me, Twilight. I don't think I could have met Trenderhoof on my own!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: It's no problem, but you shouldn't be nervous about meeting him.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Is that him? Is he here? Twilight, is he there?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Uhh... I'm not sure.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: You don't suppose he's decided not to come? Twilight, I don't see him! What if he doesn't arrive? The whole festival will be a disaster! Twilight, where is he?!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [clears throat] Sorry.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Rarity, you have to get a hold of yourself. I mean, you haven't even met him yet!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: What's wrong?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Shh! [hushed, quickly] It's him, it's him, is it him? Is it him? It's him, he's here, he's here!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Well, go up and talk to him!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: And over here will be the climax of the festival, the Ponyville Days gala! Music, dancing! [laughs nervously] And of course a locally sourced menu of delicious treats.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Exactly! I, I can't even describe how much your work has influenced me!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: And finally, Sweet Apple Acres. Ponyville's core, heh-heh, so to speak, where our quaint little hamlet began.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Oh, yes, uh, they, they really do grow apples here.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Oh, I had planned to transform it into an elegant country inn for the festival... but now I see just how special it is au naturel.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Who? Applejack? Ahem! Why are you staring at her like that?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Rarity? Rarity! Hello?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I brought my cider-tasting cup. Are you ready to go try the samples?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [sobbing throughout] What's the point?!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Rarity, what's wrong?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Nothing!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Is it something I said?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: He doesn't like me.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: What?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: He doesn't like me.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Rarity, I can't hear what you're<U+0097>

title: Simple Ways
dialog: He doesn't like me because he has a crush on Applejack, even though I've had a crush on him ever since the beginning of time, and it's not fair!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Trenderhoof doesn't like you? That's ridiculous!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Oh, Spike, how could you ever know what it's like to be totally obsessed with a pony only to find out they're obsessed with somepony else?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I mean, what could Applejack possibly have that I don't?!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I 'unno.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Hmm...

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Uh, gee, thanks. Granny Smith always said, "Pick an apple a day and keep trouble away."

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Uh, on the farm or in all of Equestria? 'Cause<U+0097>

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Is that a fact?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Well, I hope you can relate to Ponyville.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Look, I'm glad you're interested in Ponyville 'n' all, but I'm kinda busy with my chores. And if I can't get 'em done, there won't be a Ponyville Days festival for you to write about.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Well, that will never do!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Rarity, what are you wearin'?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: What, this old thing?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Aren't you too busy plannin' the festival to keep makin' new outfits for it?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I am. But the thought of hauling apples inspired me, and I just couldn't stop myself!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Really?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: If there's one thing I love, it's hauling apples!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [under her breath] Maybe you two should try it sometime.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Rarity, why do you want to plow a field?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Is it me, or could this use a splash of color? And maybe a wash!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Don't we need to check on the gala decorations?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Yes, yes, of course, but Trend obviously has a thing for farm life. If I can't convince him that I'm just as much of a farm hoof as Applejack, I'll never get him interested in the festival.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: The festival. Right.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: And I do appreciate your help ever so much. I couldn't do a thing without you, Spikey-poo.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Well, that's what friends are for!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Right, so. [whips reins] Come on! [grunts] Farm... thing! [sighs] Oh, how does Applejack do it?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Well, it would help if the harness was on right! What are you doin'?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I am simply lending a hoof with the chores, which I love doing ever so much.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Well if you're still interested after the festival I can teach you all about it. But right now, I need to get the plowin' done, if you don't mind.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Not at all. Ugh! Oh!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: She makes it look so easy.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I really don't see what the fuss is all about.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Now, Rarity, you be careful. If you don't get the buckin' just right, you could sprain a hoof.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I am perfectly familiar with the apple-bucking process, thank you very much. But while you seem to rely on raw power, I believe a certain amount of style is required. It's really more of a dance, if you ask me. [happy 'hm'ing noises] Et voil<e0>!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Well, your way is definitely long on style.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Thank you.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Now, if you'll all excuse me, I have some more chores to do. Inside!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Oh, why, Trend, you can ask me anything.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Why don't you go ask her yourself?! Hmph!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Whew! Well, that was close.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: If you've come to apologize, there's really no need.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: What are you talkin' about?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Let's dispense with the charade, shall we?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Listen, I know you really want Trend to like you<U+0097>

title: Simple Ways
dialog: And he does! Despite somepony's best efforts!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I swear I don't know why he's payin' so much attention to me. And I don't know anypony who's that interested in farmin'. Not even me!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Well, maybe it's time Trend met a real country pony.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Shouldn't you be workin' on the festival instead of comin' up with new ways to impress Trend?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Oh, I'm sure you'd love that. Well, I have a new vision for the festival, [in country accent] and it's gonna be more country than the whole Apple family put together!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Um, isn't it a little late to be changing the theme?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Applejack, what's going on?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I'm too scared to guess.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [country accent] Firstly, I just want to thank you all for comin', and second, I know y'all will all adore my new festival theme!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [country accent] "Simple Ways"!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [country accent throughout] Well? What's so funny?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Rarity, that is the silliest getup I have ever seen!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: It is a little funny.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Fun-nay?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [laughing] Rarity, you aren't serious, are you?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [normal voice] Well of course I'm serious<U+0096> [clears throat] [back in country accent] Why wouldn't I be?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Because you would never dress like that. You like fashion and high society and fancy things.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: And I can like plowin' fields and haulin' apples just as much.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: But you don't!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: How do you know what I like?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Because I know you.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Wail, maybe you don't know me as well as you thank.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: And I suppose it's just a coincidence that Trenderhoof seemed so interested in country life, too?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I don't know what you're gittin' at!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Well then, I guess I'll just have to show you!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Be my guest! Now, if you all will excuse me, I have a hootenanny of a festival to put on.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [country accent throughout] Now, to be a model in the Simple Ways fashion show, you might think "simple" means "less is more". Well, that just ain't so. If you want to be real simple, more is more. Now, y'all go off and make yourselves look just like that. [to Spike] Who's our next model for the fashion show?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Um... Apple... Jewel?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Who the hay is that?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Is this some kind of joke?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [upper-class accent throughout] Why, Rarity, whatever would make you think I was joking?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [normal voice] Because you would never wear an ensemble like that. You like plowing fields and hauling apples<U+0097>

title: Simple Ways
dialog: And I can like fashion just as much.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [back in country accent] But you don't!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Well, maybe you do not know me as well as you think.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Fine. But I got a whole festival to plan, so if you're goin' to start modelin', just get on with it!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Life is a festival, and you should celebrate it by looking just like me! Because I'm a trend-setting fashionista!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Oh, is that so?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Yes, indeedy-doodle!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [gasp] Not me! My mane needs to be perfectly coiffed at all times.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Well, my mane is full of dust and split ends.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: My hooves are so polished, you can see your reflection in them.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: My hooves are cracked and dry from working in the fields!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I'm so fashion-forward.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I wear droopy drawers!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I smell like rosebuds.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I love being covered in mud!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [normal voice] Goodness! Your couture! Ooh, it's bad. Will somepony bring me a towel to wipe this repulsive filth from my hooves?!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: [normal voice] There's the Rarity I know!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Oh, Applejack, I'm sorry I said all those things. You're a true friend who probably knows me better than I know myself. I don't know what I was thinking wearing this ridiculous outfit.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I kinda know how you feel.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Oh, but you were just trying to help me see how silly I was being. And you were right. [sighs] Besides, that gown looks just gorgeous on you. I wish I hadn't ruined it.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Thanks! It's nice, ain't it?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: It's magnificent! Wherever did you get it?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Oh, it's, uh, one of yours.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I'll need three gallons of boiling water and one ounce of detergent, stat!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Well, that's real nice, but I sure hope you weren't thinkin' of Sweet Apple Acres.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Uh, look, you're a fine pony, but, uh, well, I'm, uh...

title: Simple Ways
dialog: I think what Applejack is trying to say is that there's something unappealing about a pony who'd change themselves so much just to impress somepony else. If somepony doesn't like you for who you are, it's their loss.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Not at all. In fact, I think I know just how you feel.

title: Simple Ways
dialog: What do you think, Rarity? Is it too late to go back to "Small Town Chic"?

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Not if I can help it!

title: Simple Ways
dialog: Organizing the Ponyville Day celebration was one of the hardest things I've ever done. But I learned an important lesson. Real friends will like you for who you are, and changing yourself to impress them is no way to make new ones. And when you're as fabulous as I am, it's practically a crime!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Oh, good morning, little friends. Your singing is oh-so pretty.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Yes, it is a very beautiful day today. Certainly something worth singing about.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Oh, thank you so much. [giggles] You're too kind.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Wow!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Oh... You... um... you didn't hear me... um...

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Singing in the most beautiful voice ever?!?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Uh, yeah, we did!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Wow, I've never heard you sing a solo like that before!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: It was like a little slice of heaven.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: With ice cream on top!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Fluttershy, I cannot believe your spectacular voice isn't part of the Pony Tones quartet!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Um, well, I<U+0097>

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Especially since you're having us perform for your Ponyville Pet Center fundraiser tomorrow night!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Well, you see, I<U+0097>

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: This simply must be rectified. You must share that stunning voice at the event!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Yeah! It'll be so amazing! You'll be there on stage, basking in the hooflights! The center of attention! A shining star! Everypony staring at you, judging you, jealously noting how they could be way better than you! Why wasn't it them? Why wasn't it them? And then, when you choke, they'll turn on you, becoming a seething, angry mob, and you'll be horribly humiliated, never able to show your face in Ponyville again!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Pinkie Pie!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Don't be ridiculous!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Aw, but I'm so good at it!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [sighs] Come, Fluttershy, you will join the group, making the Pony Tones quartet the Pony Tones quintet!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: No.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Pardon me?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: I love the Pony Tones, I'm one of their biggest fans, but I do not want to perform with them.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Why not, Fluttershy?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Well, you see... I... I have... um... I... I have...

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Spit it out!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: I have... stage fright.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [gasps] Is it contagious?!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Stage fright isn't a disease, Pinkie. It just means that Fluttershy is scared to perform in front of everypony.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: I'm very thankful the Pony Tones are singing at the Pet Center fundraiser, and I'm really looking forward to the performance, but I'll be watching safely from the audience.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [sighs] Well... I think it's a terrible waste of an exquisite talent, but I understand that you're not comfortable.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Thank you. Oh! Angel's right. We'd better get going. There's a lot of work to do before tomorrow's event.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Bum, bum, bum-ba-da, ba-da Bum, bum, bum-ba-da ah

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Everypony's sayin' you should learn to express your voice But if talk doesn't seem like it's the answer

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Woo-hoo, yeah! Rarity, you were awesome!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Uh, thank you, Spike, but this is an ensemble.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Eh, the rest of you were pretty good too.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Oh, I thought you were all amazing, Pony Tones!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Now, Pony Tones, I want you all to rest your voices for the remainder of the day. We'll do a final run-through tomorrow before the big event, alright?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Oh, Rarity, the Pony Tones are really gonna make the Ponyville Pet Center fundraiser so special. Thank you so much for helping me help the animals.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Oh, yes. It is wonderful when a plan comes together without any sort of drama, isn't it?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Good morning, Pony Tones!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Actually, we're the Pony Tones minus one tone. Big Mac is inconveniently late.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Big Mac? Can you please start the song?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [croaking] Nope.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Big Mac! Did you lose your voice?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [gulps] [croaking] Eeyup.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Whatever did you do to cause this?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [croaking] Well...

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [through microphone] Howdy, everypony, and welcome to the twelfth annual Ponyville turkey call!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Who will take the title this year? Will it be somepony new? Or will the turkey call champion of six years defend his title to make it lucky number seven?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: We'll find out if you stop your gabbin' and get on with the gobblin'!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Alright, everypony! Let's talk turkey! Big Mac, you're up!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: A...a...a turkey call? You lost your voice doing a... a turkey call?!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Now we can't perform tonight!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Wait, what? No! You have to perform! Otherwise, the fundraiser will be a disaster!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Well, we cannot perform tonight with only three voices.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Why not?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: It would take rearranging all the music, and we just don't have time. I'm sorry, Fluttershy, but I have no remedy for this situation.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [gasps] Of course! A remedy! Follow me!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Hmmm.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [croaking] Ahhhh.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Hmmm.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [croaking] Ahhh<U+0097>

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: I can cure this pony that is hoarse, but it will take a longer course.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Uh, come again?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Mm. I can mix a brew that can work just right, but it cannot heal him by tonight.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Oh, no! Ah! Where are we ever going to find a deep voice to replace Big Mac's?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Pardon me, Zecora, but this is no laughing matter! We need a bass voice for the harmonies to work! Without it, the performance will be ruined!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Please, forgive my strange elation, but I was not laughing at your situation.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Then what?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Remember when you pony folk stumbled into poison joke? Miss Fluttershy had an unusual change, deepening her vocal range.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [from Bridle Gossip, deep male voice] I don't want to talk about it.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Yes, yes! Your voice became really low, making it sound like...

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [gasps] Flutterguy!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: With these leaves I can mix a brew, creating the same effect on you.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Zecora, that's fantastic!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Yes! I'll do it! I'd do anything for the animals!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Why, you'd even appear on stage!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Oh. Except that. I just can't bring myself to sing on stage in front of everypony.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: What if you sang not in front of everypony?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Huh?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: What if Big Mac was onstage, moving his lips while you're behind the curtains singing his part? It would be just like singing in your house! Nopony would know it was you!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Even still, I just don't think I could sing in front of...

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: You must! For the animals!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Oh... Okay then... [gulps] Mix it up!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [hushed] Now, do it just like we practiced!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Good evening, citizens of Ponyville! I want to thank you all for coming out tonight and generously supporting the Ponyville Pet Center! Thanks to your kindness, pets are finding loving homes, and we're sure to meet our fundraising goal!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Where's Fluttershy?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Probably hidin'. You know how much that pony hates the spotlight.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: So, with no further ado, please welcome the Pony Tones!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Pony Tones! That was truly amazing!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: And you sounded better than ever, big brother!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Fluttershy, you were on the wrong side of the curtain! You totally missed the show!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Uh, just like a true professional, Fluttershy was backstage making sure everything ran smoothly! [hushed, to Fluttershy] And it was perfect.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Why, thank you!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: We'd love to! When is it? Next week? Next month?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Oh, gracious, I'm terribly sorry, but that's much too last minute.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [deep male voice] Oh, Rarity, we can't disappoint that sweet little filly.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [hushed] Are you sure you're up for it?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Amazing, Pony Tones! And it would be even more amazing if you could perform at my ribbon-cutting ceremony tomorrow!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Oh, Mayor, we would love to, but... [clears throat] Would you excuse us for a second, Mayor?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Certainly.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [hushed] Don't worry, Fluttershy, you don't have to perform again.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [deep male voice] But we wouldn't want to disappoint the Mayor.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Well, then... Mayor? The Pony Tones will happily perform at your ceremony!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [deep male voice] We wouldn't want to disappoint the spa patrons.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [deep male voice] We wouldn't want to disappoint the schoolponies.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Fluttershy, we must talk to you. Big Mac's voice is all better!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Now you can bathe in the poison joke antidote and sound like your lovely self again.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [deep male voice] It's just... I didn't know that last performance was my last performance.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Fluttershy, stop! Ohhh... [to Big McIntosh] Would it be okay if Fluttershy sang for you one last time?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Hmm. Eeyup.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Big Mac, you got some 'splainin' to do! [beat] Turkey call?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Trash your voice?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Zecora remedy?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Not quick enough?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Nnope.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Needed a deep voice?

title: Filli Vanilli

title: Filli Vanilli

dialog: Flutterguy?

title: Filli Vanilli
