title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Better now?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: And that shy filly was livin' her dream in the shadows because she couldn't bring herself to come into the spotlight?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Well, for corn's sake! Let's go!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Fluttershy? You in here?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [normal voice] Yes... I'm here.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: That was totally unbelievable! I mean, the curtain came up and there you were, singing in front of everypony! And you know, I don't think anypony was jealous, 'cause there certainly wasn't an angry mob! But it must have been horrible standing there on stage, all eyes glued directly on you! It's like you were living your own personal worst nightmare!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: [crying] It was.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: What? Too much?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: What Pinkie meant to say is that you were really great!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Wait! Didn't I say that?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Hardly!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Whoops. You were great!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: You totally blew my mind!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Incredible!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Though, no offense... you kind of sounded like a dude.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Uh, a great-sounding dude!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Well, thank you all. I'm glad you enjoyed it. Because I'm never going to sing in front of anypony ever again.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Are you kidding me?!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Can we please stop running?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: I just don't understand why, Fluttershy. After all, you're the one that wanted the Pony Tones to sing for every silly thing that was requested of us.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: You mean, you knew I really wanted to perform?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Of course I knew!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Oh...

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: And, for all her babbling, Pinkie Pie was right about one thing.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Only one?!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: When that curtain fell, and everypony saw you singing, you lived your worst nightmare! Was it really that bad?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Yes!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Well, what was so bad about it?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: The thunderous applause?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: The praise for your fantastic singin'?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: The screaming fans?!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: There's music in the treetops And there's music in the vale And all around the music fills the sky There's music by the river And there's music in the grass And the music makes your heart soar in reply

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: You've got to look inside and find

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: The music deep inside you

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: 'Cause when you look inside, you'll see it

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: You're gonna find it, gonna find

dialog: You did it, Fluttershy!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: See? That wasn't so bad.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: And you didn't look completely petrified by the fact that we're all staring at you at all!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: How do you feel?

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Surprisingly... okay!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Fantastic, because the Pony Tones have been booked for the Apple Family Zap Apple Jam Extraordinaire!

dialog: Oh, no... I couldn't do that!

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: How come?

dialog: I'll get there someday. But for now... baby steps, everypony. Baby steps.

title: Filli Vanilli
dialog: Sometimes, being afraid can stop you from doing something that you love, but hiding behind these fears means you're only hiding from your true self. It's much better to face those fears so you can shine and be the best pony you can possibly be.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Uh, Sweetie Belle, maybe we should run through the steps another few times before you try it on your own.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Nope. Ready to give it a shot!

dialog: Okay then!

dialog: [straining] Can't... seem... to...! [straining] [neck clicks] Ugh! Think I threw my neck out...

dialog: Aw, you're okay.

dialog: A little more magic practice and liftin' brooms'll be a cinch!

dialog: I doubt it. That thing weighs a ton.

dialog: Hmph. I'll never get my cutie mark for this...

dialog: Maybe not. But I'm happy to keep helping you learn just for the fun of it as long as you like.

dialog: Hey, who's gonna clean up this mess?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Scootaloo, I already told you I won't show you how, but I'll help you find the instructions so you can figure it out yourself.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Ugh, I hate research!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: To your left, third shelf from the bottom. You'll find it in no time.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Thanks so much for helpin' us all learn these new skills, Twilight.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Always glad to pass on my love of learning for learning's sake.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Only I'm afraid I'll never get the hang of this potion-makin'.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Did you follow the magic plant-growing formula I gave you?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Well... uh... more or less.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Well, let's try it out on this apple seedling and see how we do.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Oh... I hope this works.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Layin' it on a little thick there, aren't we, pal?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Yoo-hoo! Gather 'round! It's time!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: As you all know, I had promised to put on an amazing, first-time-ever acrobatic display for you all today!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I know, it's so exciting. But I'm tired.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: But I did not wish to disappoint you all, so I brought my butler Randolph to do them for me.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: That was amazing, Diamond Tiara.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I know. I don't know how I do it.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I can't believe she gets so much attention without even really doing anything!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: She's using somepony else to build herself up, and without even putting any effort to learn her own skills like we do!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Hey, come to think of it, if we get really good at the stuff Twilight's teaching us, we could be the big shots around here for a change! Hmm...

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Check this out!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: And check this out!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Now check this out!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: [yelping] Hey, put me down!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Hey, can you hear me?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Huh? Huh? What? What?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I was asking if your sister Rarity will be taking you to Manehattan anytime soon.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Because if she is, maybe you can meet up with us while we hang out with a bunch of famous celebrities.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Cool!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Wow, that's... pretty nice of you guys.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Actually, my sister hasn't offered to take me to Manehattan anytime soon.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Yeah, we figured.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Oh, yeah?! Well, I don't have to go all the way to Manehattan to hang out with the famous and super-cool ponies! Me and my friends hang out with Princess Twilight all the time!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: D-did you say Princess Twilight?! You hang out with her all the time? For real?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: More like just once a week.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: She helps us learn cool new stuff to do! That we actually do ourselves!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: You must bring me along next time you go!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Bring us along!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I mean, we used to see her around town all the time, and I thought, "whatever"...

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Me too. I thought that.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: But now she's a princess, which makes her totally awesome!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Plus, she has wings.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: And she's an Alicorn. So can I<U+0096>

title: Twilight Time
dialog: We!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I don't think we should<U+0096>

dialog: Would you two excuse us for a moment? We should totally say yes! This is a golden opportunity!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Are you kiddin'? I don't want them laughing at us while I'm mixin' potions and accidentally sendin' plants into chokin' fits!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: But don't you get it? They'll have to learn something too!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: And they won't be able to laugh at us when they're so busy trying to learn stuff of their own.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I must admit it's kinda fun to see them workin' hard to get on our good side for a change.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Oh, my gosh! A princess lives in there! And I'm about to go inside and see her! I can't even tell you how excited I am!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I can't either!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Now remember, Twilight takes this time out with us so we can learn stuff.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Hey there, guys! Come on in!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Oh, it's really her!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Oh, my gosh, I don't believe it!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Oh, and, uh, you brought guests. Great!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Princess Twilight, it is such a thrill and honor to be here! You have no idea. Oh my gosh, who dyes your tail?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I so have to get that done.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Actually, it's not dyed. I've always<U+0096>

title: Twilight Time
dialog: [gasp] Are those books in there? What a bold design choice!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: You should so do that, Di!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I know, right?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Listen, I'm all for helping as many ponies as I can, but maybe we should keep these weekly visits just between us, hm? Okay, which one of you wants to practice first?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Shouldn't they go first?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: No, silly! I set up Twilight Time especially for you. Apple Bloom, go ahead. Let's see how your plant potions are coming.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I can't believe I let you talk us into bringin' guests yesterday.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I didn't hear them laugh at us once, Apple Bloom.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: 'Cause they laughed on the inside.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Don't worry. We won't make that same mistake again.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Aw, great. Look who showed up to make fun of us.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: So much for learning skills to be big shots.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Hey, guess what! I told everyone about your special Twilight Time!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Oh, no, here it comes...

title: Twilight Time
dialog: And they all want in!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Thanks to me, you three are now the hottest thing around. You're welcome.

dialog: Uh-oh...

dialog: Wow! All these ponies really wanna meet Twilight that badly?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: We love you, Cutie Mark Crusaders!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Now, now, everypony! Demanding time with the princess as an unruly mob simply won't do. Might I suggest you get organized through us, the Cutie Mark Crusaders' nearest and dearest friends?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Everypony get in line! No pushing, no pushing!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: What a mess.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Of awesome! Don't you see? We're really and truly and certifiably the biggest of the big shots in school right now!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Huh?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: They all think we're the greatest, because we're their ticket to get time with Ponyville's newest and biggest celebrity, Princess Twilight!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: We just said like two seconds ago that invitin' two ponies to Twilight Time was a big mistake! And now we're supposed to bring the whole class?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Relax. I got this.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I don't like this, Sweetie Belle...

title: Twilight Time
dialog: You said not to invite them to Twilight Time and I didn't. So what's the problem?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: This feels like a trick.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: What's tricky about inviting Twilight out for a meal thanking her for all the nice things she's done for us? Seems like the least we can do for the princess!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Did someone say "princess"?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: When I told you when you could come eyeball the princess at one of her favorite hangouts, I said only two or three of you, tops!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: She's coming!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Okay! But stay out of sight!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: As you wish, Sweetie Belle.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Yes, as I wish.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: [messy eating noises] Mmm! Mmmm, mm! [with mouth full] I didn't realize how hungry I was! I'm so glad you asked me to join you here today... [swallows] I'm so honored! Mm!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: You are?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: When you first asked me to help you develop new skills, I thought, 'Working with young students so devoted to the joy of learning purely for its own sake? What could be better?' You all remind me of myself when I was your age!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Yes, well... we feel the same way.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: That's why we invited you here.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: All because of our love of learning!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Twilight! Haven't seen you here in, like, forever and a half!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I know. I've been so busy I forgot how delicious everything is here!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Totally! Hey, what's going on out there? Oh, never mind, they're gone. They're back! Never mind, they're gone. La la-la la-la...

title: Twilight Time
dialog: [through gritted teeth] Knock it off!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: What was all this? And this?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I couldn't help it! When I don't smile in a picture, I look sad.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Oh, we're gonna look sad all right...

title: Twilight Time
dialog: [gasps] [long pause] Uh, can I... help you?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Get my picture with her!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Me first!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Hey! Get out of the shot!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: This is bad.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Twilight's gonna be so ticked at us.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I told ya this was a terrible idea.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: You seriously all want my autograph? Okay, I'll sign just a couple more for you, but then I really must get back to my little friends. Oh, there you are!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Wow, to think I've been to the Hay Burger so many times, never knowing it's a regular hangout for a princess!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: This isn't my regular hangout. I'm only here to be with them.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: You mean, Princess Twilight decides where it's cool to go based on where they go?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Huh?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Thanks, guys, this was fun! See ya around!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I'm opening a new lemonade stand! Won't you come to the grand opening? I'll give you free lemonade for a week!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Relax. I know exactly how to handle this.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: More lemonade?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Don't mind if I do!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Whoa, so bright I can see myself!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: And so can I! Nice job bedazzlin' my bow! What do I owe you?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: You three must come to my pool party. It'll be much cooler than this.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Look who's inviting who to her fancy house!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I believe we have arrived, Cutie Mark Crusaders.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Yeah!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Wow, this is nice, but there's no one else here. Why is this party cooler, exactly?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Because of all the ponies we're keeping out.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: This has been great, but we have to go. It's Twilight Time.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: So, we're coming too, right?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Um... a-actually, no. We didn't have a chance to ask Twilight, so<U+0096>

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Really? After all the favors we did for you? After all the favors they did for you?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Okay, I know exactly how to handle this. Run!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Go, go, go!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: We gotta beat them to Twilight's so we can explain!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: This way! I know a shortcut!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Then we run, like the wind!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: [gasps] [out of breath] We... made... it... Quick! Knock on<U+0096>

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Twilight, we can explain.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: We know you said we should just keep Twilight Time to us!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: We didn't mean for so many other ponies to be here! Honest!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Oh, don't be silly. I only meant that for your benefit so you could get the most out of our time together. But if you want to share your time with others, that's fine.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: So you're not mad?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Of course not! Come on in, everypony! Spike made nachos!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Turns out we'll need some more than that.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Before we start, we should maybe get a bit more organized? Ponies interested in magic in this corner. Ponies who want to learn potions over here. Bookworm ponies over there.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Incredible. Looks like everything's workin' out just fine.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: And I was so afraid Twilight would be disappointed in us.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Told you I knew exactly how to handle all this!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Thanks to all of you for taking time out to come learn new things.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Thank you, princess!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: We love you, princess!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Okay, okay, let's settle down. If you want to thank anypony, thank the Cutie Mark Crusaders for so generously sharing this time.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: It was nothing, really. We just felt it was the right thing to do.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Hmph! What a laugh.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Let's begin over here. And what would you like to learn, little one?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I want to learn how to become a Cutie Mark Crusader!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: And why do you want to become a Cutie Mark Crusader so badly, hm?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Because then I could get all my classmates to do me favors and stuff because I'm friends with a famous princess!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Oh, boy.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Is this true?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: We wanted our time together just as a way to be with you and learn new things. Really and truly!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Prove it.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Huh?!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: If it's true, then I'm sure you've all been practicing your skills over the past week. Show me how much better you got.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Uh, well, uh... we... can't.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: We kinda rushed over and forgot to bring our stuff.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Hm, I see.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: No, wait! Hey, everypony, you're in luck! You came to learn, but instead you're getting dinner and a show! Get ready, 'cause we, the Cutie Mark Crusaders, are about to lay on you the amazing skills we learned in Twilight Time!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Unfortunately, since we don't have Scootaloo's unicycle parts, she'll take apart and put back together one of the scooters from outside.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Hey! That's my scooter!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: You got us into this mess, kid. Might wanna roll with us.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Huh?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Apple Bloom doesn't have her apple seed with her, so she'll just grab an apple from the kitchen. And I will begin by using my magic to lift this broom!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Ta-da!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Become a tree!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Rise!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: That didn't turn out quite how I had hoped.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Looks like Twilight Time is over.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: And look who's not the princess's entourage anymore.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Guess they didn't come here to learn after all.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Well, neither did any of you.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: We're really sorry, Twilight. We made a huge mistake.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: And we really and truly did enjoy learning new skills with you.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Guess we'll have to just keep on doing it without you now. Thanks, Twilight.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Thanks...

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Thanks...

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Sweetie Belle? Remember a moment ago when you asked me to give you a chance?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: [straining] Aw, come on!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: I guess Twilight must not be so super-upset anymore, 'cause she's letting us do a diary entry like our sisters do. Boy, did we get our priorities messed up. We started acting special because we were friends with someone special. We almost forgot the real reason she's special <U+0096> because she's our friend. But she forgave us, and, like magic, things are good as new! That's the kind of magic I really want to get good at, now that I'm getting so good at the other kind.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Wow, all three of you have made so much progress! I'm really proud of you. See you next time!

title: Twilight Time
dialog: We're just glad Twilight Time is back to normal. Well... almost back to normal. I just hope no one sees us.

title: Twilight Time
dialog: 'Cause we're tryin' to keep Twilight Time a secret now?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: Or because we look ridiculous?

title: Twilight Time
dialog: A little of both, actually.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Okay, everypony. As you know, the adorable fairy creatures known as Breezies are about to come through Ponyville.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Yes! Ooh, it's so exciting! Ah! I can't wait for Rainbow Dash to make the breeze for them so I can see how cute they are up close!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: I've never done it before, not that I won't be totally awesome at it, because I totally will!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: And that breeze is very important, but so is cheering on those teeny-tiny little things, so they have the confidence to ride that breeze to their native land. Did I mention how tiny they are? So tiny! I was thinking we could do a special Breezie cheer!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: I love cheers!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: But these cheers should be quiet cheers. We don't want to startle them. They need to be able to concentrate. Why don't we try it? You can do it, Breezies.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, my.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Heh, sorry, Fluttershy. I had no idea how hard it was to do a cheer quietly.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, it's okay. Quiet doesn't come naturally for everypony. Let's try it again.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Perhaps just a little bit quieter.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Just a little quieter.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [loudly] Perfect! Oh, um, I mean... yay.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: That's too strong! We gotta slow this breeze down or we're gonna blow those Breezies apart!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Mr. What I don't understand is why they need the Pegasi to make a breeze for them.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Well, you see, it's the breeze that activates the Breezies' magic, and that magic protects the pollen they're carrying from being destroyed.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Mr. So, no breeze means no magic means the pollen goes bad?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: That's right! And they only have two days to get that pollen back before the portal to their home closes. That's why it's ever-so-important that we help them make their way through Ponyville safely.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Mrs. We certainly wouldn't want to scare them and divert them from their path!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Now you understand.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Mr. Hm, you certainly know a lot about them.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, thank you. I went to see them gathering their pollen in Western Equestria. Um, Rarity? I, uh, hate to weigh in with you when it comes to fashion, but...

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, there's too much purple on this, isn't there? I knew it! But Twilight refused to admit it.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: What?! I-

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, no-no-no-no-no. It's the perfect amount of purple. It's just that there's an awful lot of sequins on your jacket.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: You can if they reflect the sun, and the light catches a group of Breezies right in their eyes, and blinds them long enough to get them off their course so they never get home!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: I stand corrected! I suppose there is the rare instance where one can have too many sequins. I'll just take off my jacket. I suppose this won't do either?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [whispering] Everypony, it's time. Please welcome... the Breezies!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: They're as cute as Apple Bloom on the day she was born.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: And would you look at those adorable little packs they carry their pollen in?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: So... cute! Can't... take... it!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [grunts] [hushed] Pinkie Pie, can I hop on you so I can see the Breezies?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [hushed, straining] May explode!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, no!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Slow down the breeze for the other group to catch up!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: What if we speed it up?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: He's right! You must all gather as close as you possibly can!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, I understand the language of all kinds of creatures!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: And you speak my language too?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: That was amazing!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: I'm sorry we couldn't get a breeze going that would get them back to the others.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, it's not your fault.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: I, for one, am very proud of you, Fluttershy. Leaping into action like that.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: I feel like I should design you a special hero's gown! Heh... Or a sash. At least a sash.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Okay, okay, okay! I know what you're all thinking! Why don't you just say it?! [crying] I'm sorry! This is all my fault! I'm so, so sorry!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, Spike, it's okay! It could have happened to any one of us.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Okay... Thank you!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Uh... I'm... just... gonna stay over here.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: So, Fluttershy, you want us to get the breeze going again so these little guys can get a move on?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Maybe we should wait just a moment or so. They've been through so much...

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Just gimme the word when you think they're ready.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, my, Twirly, you look like you need a blanket.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, no problem.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, did you need some more water?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Now, who else needed a hoof-knitted sweater?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Hey there! Can we come in?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, of course! But watch your step!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oop, sorry about that, little one.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: We just wanted to see if you thought the Breezies were ready to give it another try.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Has it been an hour already? Oh, my goodness! Time flies when you're making sure little creatures don't feel that you're abandoning them to the cruel world.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: But they're not going to a cruel world, right? They're going home.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, yes, that's right!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: On second thought, I don't think they're quite ready.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Uh... what did he say?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: I'd... rather not say.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Okay, well, I'm sure you know what you're doin'. No one knows rare magical creatures like you do.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: We'll just wait for your word.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Thank you. I'll be in touch very soon.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Um, now, Seabreeze-

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: But that is just not true, Seabreeze. It was because of a leaf, and you know that!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Well, I didn't say that exactly now, did I?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, well, maybe a snack will lighten the mood.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: You're excused. Well, my Breezies, I think we can all agree that now that you've eaten and you have a little energy going in your breezy bodies, you're strong enough to face the breeze! I've loved having you here, and I hope I've made you all feel loved and special. But you have to go. Nopony here will deny that-

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Okay, well, a confusing pep-talk, but nonetheless. I do know that if you don't leave soon, you may never make it back, and that would be terrible!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: I had no idea you all have colds! Really? All of you?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, dear. I can't let you go out there sick! What kind of a friend would I be if I made you go now?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Hey, Fluttershy, just wondering if the Breezies are ready to go yet. Clock's kinda ticking for them to make it back before the door closes on their home.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, yes. I mean, not quite. Um, maybe just a few more minutes?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Uh, alright.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: We just have to trust Fluttershy. She must know what she's doing.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Breezies, I must say, Seabreeze has a point. I think it's time for me to get Rainbow Dash and her friends so they can create the breeze for you to get home.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Ooh... You're all awfully anxious... Oh, I don't want you to feel abandoned, or that I wasn't the most kind host I could possibly be...

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, yes, that does make sense... Seabreeze, do you think you could wait just a couple more hou- Seabreeze? Seabreeze? Has anypony seen Seabreeze? [gasps] Where's he going? There's no way he can handle being out there on his own!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Excuse me, bees? Can you please back off my Breezie friend? He didn't mean any harm. It was just an accident. I'm working on a bee-type dance and was hoping you could help me? Does this bring to mind any images for you? Perhaps a bee? Excuse me! I have done nothing but be kind, but I guess that is not working! You bees know better than to hurt a helpless Breezie! I demand that you go away now, or you'll have to answer to me!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Of course. You could've gotten seriously hurt out there. Ponyville is much too dangerous for you. One tiny acorn is a threat!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, my goodness. I was just trying not to hurt any creature's feelings, but my displays of kindness may have cost you everything... [gasps] Time is running out, and you may never make it home!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Seabreeze, I understand your feelings are hurt, but it's hard for them to hear you when you're shouting and being mean. The message doesn't get across.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Yes, but they had to go, and they wouldn't listen to me any other way. We need to go, now!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: My dear Breezies, I had to rescue Seabreeze from serious harm, and now I know more than ever that you must leave before it's too late! You would never survive in Ponyville.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: It's too strong!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Fly back! I'm gonna try and see if I can slow it down. Now it's too light! Oh, this will never get them home!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Oh, my. Maybe it's because there are too few of them. When they started their journey, there was more of them to face the breeze together.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: I've been studying an old spell book from the Castle of the Two Sisters. There's a spell that I think could help us! This is probably gonna feel a little funny at first, but you're gonna have to trust me.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: I love new ideas that make me feel funny at first!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Maifo flai batendud! [high-pitched] Um, I mean, let's go!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [high-pitched] Holy mini-sized paradise!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [high-pitched] This is simply beautiful! So much inspiration. Where's my sketchpad when I need it?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [high-pitched] So...stinkin'...cute!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [high-pitched] You okay, Fluttershy?

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [high-pitched] I'm just so very happy they got to be reunited with their family!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [high-pitched] We'd better get going before the entrance- well, exit for us, closes.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [high-pitched] Goodbye, Breezies. I must go now.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [high-pitched] Thank you! I'll miss you. I'll miss all of you! [voiceover, normal] My experiences with the Breezies have helped me to see that kindness can take many forms, and sometimes being too kind can actually keep a friend from doing what they need to do. Pushing them away may seem cruel, but it's sometimes the kindest thing you can do.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [high-pitched] Whoa! That was a close one!

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: [high-pitched] Okay, gather round.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: So, uh, I've always kinda wondered what it would be like to be a griffon.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: Not a chance.

title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
dialog: You sure? What about a dragon? No? It doesn't have to shoot fire!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Whatever they decide, Apple Bloom, we'll be here for you.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Totally. Even though it could change everything for you, forever and ever!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: So, we here have decided... that you're old enough to stay home alone and take care of the chores yourself for the afternoon!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: I accept your decision.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Stayin' home alone, by myself, on my own! I can't believe I'm really doin' it!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Now, hey there, filly. I know you're excited, but bein' the only pony here to take care of the day's chores is a big responsibility.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: I know it! And it means everythin' to me that y'all think I'm grown up enough to handle it. I won't let you down.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Well, if'n I'm gonna make my train, I best to be off. When Great Aunt Pine Apple says a pony's gots to ride by a certain time, you better be there! You be sure and take care now, Apple Bloom. Y'all take care as well. I don't know which of your delivery routes is tougher. you're each headed to a mighty hard-to-reach town.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: We know, Granny. That's the only reason I agreed to let Apple Bloom stay behind alone.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: It is?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Oh, I didn't mean it like that, sugarcube. It's just, I take my job as your big sister real serious, which is why I spent all night makin' this.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: What is it?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Just a little list of helpful reminders.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [reading] "There's some soup for you in the 'frigerator. Be sure not to heat it up too much. If it's hot, blow on it to cool it off. And take little sips <U+0097> if you gulp, you could get hiccups." You don't have to worry about me. I can take care of myself and the chores! I'm ready for this.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [sighs] I guess you are. I'm just not so sure I am.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: But you trust me and believe I'm grown up enough to handle this, right?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [sighs] Right. Okay then. Good luck, little sis<U+0097> whoa!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [quickly] Okaygreatseeyousoonbye!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Eyuu-up!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Woo-hoo! I'm alone! At home! I'm home alone! This is gonna be so awesome!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Eheheh... Sorry, Big Mac. I was just frettin' a bit about Apple Bloom. You think she's gonna be okay on her own?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: I just keep on thinkin' of things I forgot to put on her list. Like, I didn't write down that if she wants to get a spoon out of the drawer, she needs to open the drawer first. [sighs] I know, I'm probably just bein' silly.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: But I know I'd feel a heap better if I could just check on Apple Bloom one last time. You go on ahead and make your delivery. I'm just gonna take a quick peek, and then I'll make mine.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Okay, number one seventy two: "Make sure to pump the bellows to keep the stove warm."

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Check! "Make sure the hats and bows closet is fully stocked." Check! [spits] That's everything on Applejack's list! And now that my chores are done, since there's no one else here, I get to make all the decisions! If I wanna listen to music, I can! If I wanna read a book, I can! If I wanna just stand here in the kitchen talkin' to myself, I can!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Apple Bloom!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Whoa!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Ugh... Applejack?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: I came back to check on you, and I'm so glad I did! I never thought about how dangerous things are around here!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Thanks, but I'm really gonna be okay.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: You are now! Because I'm here and I'm stayin'! No way am I leavin' my little baby sister home alone all by herself!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: I'm not a baby! I can take care of myself! And what about those pies you're supposed to deliver?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Pies? Ha! Family's way more important than pies!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: But I'm fine! And actually... this was kind of your fault.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: I know. I should never have left you alone.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: But I don't need you lookin' after me. I'm perfectly capable of stayin' home alone. Really! Just look! "There's some soup for you in the 'frigerator."

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: What was that?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Watch me!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Whoa! Ugh!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Oh, no! This is worse than I thought! Well, don't worry, Apple Bloom, I'm here now and I'm not leavin' you home alone ever again. I'm stickin' right by your side, always!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Apple Bloom? Apple Bloom!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Applejack's just overreactin' a bit. I'm sure she'll snap out of it. Whoa!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: You need somethin'? I'm right here!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: I know you mean well, but I don't need you watchin' over me! I can take care of things myself!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Look! Huh? Hey! Who put pillows on this rake?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [chuckles] Oh, I don't know. Maybe someone who really loves her little sister and doesn't want her to get an owie?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Hm? Hm.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Oh, for the love of...! [sighs] You've gone and baby-proofed everythin'!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Heh, yup! Your big sister let you down once, but I promise it won't ever happen again.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: But really, I'm fine! I can take care of myself. I don't need you watchin' over me!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Aw, that's sweet. I appreciate you tryin' to make me feel better, but don't worry. I'll always be here for you. Always!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [sighs] And that's the reason I asked y'all to come over quick.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Hey, Apple Bloom! You need anything? A snack? A hoof massage? Maybe a snack while havin' a hoof massage?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Why, that sounds delightful!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [through gritted teeth] No thank you!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: O-kay, well you can count on me bein' close by if'n you need anythin'!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [sighs] You see what I mean? If this keeps up, I'm never gonna be able to do anythin' without Applejack hoverin' over me!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: So what can we do? Hmm.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Uh...

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Um...

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Hang on a sec! I got it!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: What?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: The pies! I'll sneak out and deliver them! Granny said that they were goin' to some incredibly hard-to-reach town. If I can do it alone, that'll show Applejack I don't need somepony watchin' over me!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Just one problem. Your sister's gonna come back and check on you any minute!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Which means you need an escape plan.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Ooh, and I got an idea for one! [mocks snoring] See? It'll look just like you're sleeping in bed. Sweetie and I can take turns! That way, when one of us gets tired, the other can take over. Brilliant, huh?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Mm-hm!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: You know what? It is! I got a feelin' this just might work! We're gonna make my sister see I don't need her watchin' over me<U+0097>

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Stop! No time for a song! Applejack's coming!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: If you're gonna go, we've gotta get you out of here now!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Cutie Mark Crusaders, let's do it!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Whoa!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [muffled] Everythin' okay in there, sugarcube?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Quick, get in while I hide! Sweetie, no! You gotta sleep like Apple Bloom!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: How does she sleep?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Like she does everything! With sass!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Huh. I guess you must've been so tuckered out, you sent your friends home and went to bed. Then again, you are a delicate flower. [sighs] Sleep tight, Apple Bloom. I'll check on you again in a bit.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Just checkin' in on you again!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Need anythin' now?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: How 'bout now?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Need another blanket?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Did I hear a cough?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Want a glass of water?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [yawning] Just... checkin' in on you again. [sighs] Look at you, dozin' so peaceful-like. Here I am, checkin' up on you every five seconds, and you're totally fine. Maybe you don't need me frettin' over you all the time.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [gasps] [muffled] Wow, Apple Bloom will be so glad to hear that!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Huh? Scootaloo?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Uh, um, n-no.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Sweetie Belle? But... where's Apple Bloom? She's not here! She could be anywhere! She could be lost, cold, hungry, itchy, stuffed up, needin' to go to the bathroom!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Don't worry, we know exactly where she is.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Yeah, she's making your pie delivery.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: What?! No! Didn't she hear how difficult and dangerous it was?! [gasp] I may never see my little sister again!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Okay, Rarity's on her way here to look after you two. Now tell me, did Apple Bloom at least bring flameproof boots? A lion tamer's chair? A snake charmin' flute?! A hunk of ricotta?! [gasps] [teeth chattering] Okay, maybe there's still time to catch her before she gets there. When did she leave?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: It must've been hours ago.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Oh, no!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Well, now at least I can see.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [nervous whimpering] It don't look so safe to me.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Well, unfortunately, I gotta get these pies to a town on the other side of the swamp, so, uh...

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: No!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Uh, actually...

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: I really wish my sister were here!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Hang on, Apple Bloom! I'm a-comin'!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Howdy!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Let's go!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [panting] Are you okay?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Thanks to you.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: I told you you need your big sister lookin' after you! I'm just glad this wasn't a whole lot worse. I mean, sure we lost the cart and all the pies, but at least you're<U+0097> Huh, the cart! And all the pies! You actually got them all the way up here? In the dark? Through the Flame Geyser Swamp? Past that monster? ...By yourself?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Well... yeah.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Huh, wow. That's mighty impressive! Anypony who can do that on her own, well, she don't need somepony like me babyin' her.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Just remember, you fellas wouldn't be enjoyin' these pies if it weren't for my sister.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: And my sister!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: But this don't change the fact that tryin' to make this delivery on your own was a plumb crazy thing to do!

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: I know...

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: [scoffs] I bet Granny Smith grounds you for a month for sneakin' out! And if Big Mac, Granny Smith 'n I ever have to be away for the day again... I would totally trust you to stay home and take care of things on your own. I guess I did get a little carried away watchin' over you, and if you hadn't snuck out like you did, maybe I wouldn't have figured that out.

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Yes! Now that is the kind of 'looking after me' that I can definitely appreciate! So... we're good?

title: Somepony to Watch Over Me
dialog: Little sister, we're always good.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Has anypony heard from Pinkie Pie since yesterday?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [yawns] I don't see what's so important we had to meet her here this early. Celestia hasn't even raised the sun yet!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Thank goodness you're all here! There's no time to lose!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Whoa!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Ooh...

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Ugh! Hey- whoa!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Careful!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: What is all this?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: My sister Maud's gonna be here soon, and I need your help taste-testing my rock candy recipes!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Uh, we're happy to help you, Pinkie Pie, but this seems like an awful lot of candy.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Even for you.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Everypony ready for more?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Ugh. My teeth hurt.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I think we've had plenty. And shouldn't you be on your way to pick up Maud from the train station?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Maud is your sister. I'm sure she'll love your rock candy. And I'm pretty sure you've made enough. She's only staying for the week.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Aw, it's not just for Maud, silly. I'm making candy for all of us!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Aw, what a great tradition.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Hold on. The secret ingredient is rocks?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Yeah. But these are a special kind of rock that Maud discovered.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Oh, what kind of a rock are they?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Can't tell ya that, silly! [whispering] It's a secret! [speaking normally] Now that Maud is heading out to get her rocktorate in rock science, this may be our last chance to trade them for a really long time. I can't wait for you all to meet her. I just know that my best Ponyville friends and my best sister friend are gonna become bestest friends! We can make bestest-est friend rock candy necklaces together! She expresses herself through fashion just like Rarity, and she's really smart and loves reading just like Twilight! And she's honest, and loves forest things, and is good at games, and... Well, oh, she's awesome!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [strained] She sounds amazing, but won't she start worrying if you aren't at the train station when she gets here?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: She sure will. [gasp] I gotta get out of here!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I sure hope Maud has an appetite.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Never met a pony or critter who didn't love Granny Smith's apple spiced muffins!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Oh, it's no use! I simply cannot find anything suitable to wear!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I doubt she'll notice what anypony's wearing, so what's the big deal?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: The big deal is that it will be very difficult to show Maud what a strong fashion presence we have in Ponyville if the most fashion-forward pony here can't keep her hat from falling apart!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I think we're all a little nervous about Maud's visit. She's Pinkie Pie's sister, and it's obvious Pinkie really wants us to hit it off. Being able to make those rock candy necklaces together is really important to her. I'm sure everything will be fine<U+0096>

title: Maud Pie
dialog: We're heeeere!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Where's Maud?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: She's coming!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Uh... you sure?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: She's not quite as fast as me. I asked Gummy to stay with her in case she got lost!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [whispering] Is she even moving?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: We're over here, Maud!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [sniffs] [deadpan] Hm. Sedimentary.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Huh?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] This is a sedimentary rock.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: That's... really fascinating, isn't it, girls? We're just so thrilled you could come for a visit before your big trip. Pinkie Pie has told us so much about you. I'm Twilight, and this is Applejack, Fluttershy, Rainbow Dash, and Rarity.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: We're ever so glad to meet you.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: We're just gonna have the best time!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Pinkie Pie tells me you share my love for fashion.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] I'm really into expressing myself through my wardrobe.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: A-and what is the delightful frock you're wearing now saying?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] It doesn't talk. It's a dress.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Uh, so this here's Winona. That's Owlowiscious, Tank, Opal, and Angel. Pinkie Pie told us you have a pet, too.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] He's in my pocket.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Oh, you have a pocket pet? Like a tiny mouse? Or a baby bird? Or a trained butterfly?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] It's a rock. His name is Boulder.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: This is going to be the best, most awesome, funnest week ever! I can't wait for us all to become bestest friends!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Maud? Would you like to try one of Granny Smith's famous apple spiced muffins?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Oh, uh, heh, that's not<U+0096> Um...

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [chews] [with mouth full] [deadpan] It's crunchy.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [chews] [with mouth full] Maud's right! They are crunchy! Yum!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: So, uh, Pinkie Pie tells us you like games.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] Boulder and I sometimes play a game called 'Camouflage'. It's kind of like hide and seek but way more intense.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Awesome?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Any luck?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I truly wish I'd spent more time with Boulder, because I'm having a very hard time remembering what he looks like.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: It's like looking for a pebble in a haystack.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: More like in a pile of pebbles.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Well, you don't have to make it even harder.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Ugh! I give up! this is impossible!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: It'll hurt Maud's feelings if we all stop playing. Besides, look how much fun Pinkie Pie's having.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Is this him? Is this him? Is this him? Is this him?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Just a little longer, okay?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Uh, alright, fine...

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [simultaneously] Really?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] Found him.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Oh! Where was he?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] He was hiding in my pocket.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Oh, come on!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I don't mean to interrupt, but we really should get these little critters home. It's getting awfully late, and they've had a very busy day.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Maud and I had better get going too. I want her to taste the rock candy we're gonna use for our best friends necklaces! Aw, yeah!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: She sure is... different from what I expected.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: We spent all day digging in the dirt, and he was in her pocket the whole time?!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: On the bright side, Boulder seemed really sweet.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: He's a rock!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Come on, girls. I'm sure Maud was just nervous about meeting all of us.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Maybe she was just acting a little 'off' because she was shy or somethin'.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Exactly. It must be awfully intimidating to meet all of us at once, especially since we're already such good friends.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Maybe if we spend some time with her one-on-one to try to get to know her better, I'm sure we'll be making those best friend rock candy necklaces in no time.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Where shall we start? I've chosen a few fabrics that I think will be stunning with y<U+0096>

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Choices, choices, choices!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: ...Of course, if you don't see anything that speaks to you, I would be happy to suggest<U+0096>

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] I like this one.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [laughs] Pinkie Pie didn't tell us you were so funny!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] What do you mean?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Oh, well, it's just... I believe that is a dishtowel. [beat] B-b-but it does go very well with your complexion. I'm sure I could work my magic and turn it into something fabulous.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Rarity and my sister working together to design something amazing! This is the best day ever!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Perhaps I could sew all of these together and make you something you'd like.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] No thanks. One is enough.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Doesn't Maud make the coolest scarves?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Quite...

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Hello there, Hummingway. I'm ever so happy to see you.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: What's he saying?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: He says hello, and he's happy to see us too.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I wish I could speak hummingbird. Humm! Hum-m-m-m-m, hum!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [to Maud] These spiders only live in Ponyville, and even though they may look a teeny bit scary, they're actually very sweet and help keep other, more dangerous insects away!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] I was looking at the rock.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Oh.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Thanks again, Fluttershy! Start thinking about which flavors you want to put on your best friend rock candy necklace!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Oh gosh. I'm not sure we're even friends yet.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Maud is a total bookworm. She loves poetry!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I've got lots of poetry. Do you read anything by Quilland Ink? Or Flourish Prose?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] I prefer to read my own poetry.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Oh, I'd love to hear some of it!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [clears throat] [deadpan] Rock. You are a rock. Gray. You are gray. Like a rock. Which you are. Rock.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: She's so prolific!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] This next one is about rocks. They're all about rocks. Rocks; these are my rocks. Sediments: make me sedimental. Smooth and round, asleep in the ground. Shades of brown and gray...

title: Maud Pie
dialog: You 'bout done peelin' them apples for the cider, Maud?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] I think this one is done.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] Should I peel another?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: No! I mean, nah. I'm sure there's plenty apples in it already.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [sniffs] Can we taste it now?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Sure, why not?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [glugs] Wow! That's the best apple cider I've ever had!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: What do you think, Maud?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [sips] [deadpan] It tastes like apples.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Told you she was super honest, just like you!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [nervously] We're practically twins, heh.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Yeah! Let's see you beat that! Whooaa!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: That was amazing!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Whoa. How'd you do that?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] I threw it.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I guess you won this one, Maud.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] I'm not really into... 'winning'.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Great, you're all here! Maud is out looking for rocks, so this is the perfect time for us to set up everything we'll need to make our best friend rock candy necklaces!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: What's wrong?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Well, I'm not sure it's the best time to make best friend rock candy necklaces.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Why not?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Uh...

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Well, darling, you see...

title: Maud Pie
dialog: You're ever so thoughtful to share your special bonding ritual with us, but, uh...

title: Maud Pie
dialog: But what?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [sighs] The truth is, we've all been tryin' real hard to get closer to Maud, but, well... maybe some ponies just don't click the way others do.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: We just wouldn't feel right makin' somethin' that means we're best friends if, well, we aren't.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [mane deflates] Oh. Okay. If anypony needs me, I'll be in here trying to figure out what to do with two hundred pounds of rock candy.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I feel awful! Just awful...

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Maybe we should have just pretended we were friends with Maud.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: If we didn't tell Pinkie Pie that we hadn't all become the best of friends, I think Maud would have.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Maybe, but who really knows? That pony is a riddle wrapped in a mystery inside an igneous.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Don't you mean "inside an enigma"?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Nope. I mean igneous. It's a kind of rock. Ask me how I know that.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I've come up with just the thing to bring everypony closer together!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Huh?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: It combines everypony's interests into one giant activity that we can all enjoy together and that will totally bring all of my bestest friends together as bestestest friends! You'll need these.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Like I said: Huh?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Probably better for me to show you. Watch this! Applesauce tunnel for Applejack, pretty shiny stuff for Rarity, reading material for Twilight, critter time for Fluttershy...

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Cupcakes for yours truly... [chomps] and it's a race for Rainbow Dash!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Pinkie Pie, what is that?!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: A rock slide, of course! For Maud! First you climb, then you slide!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I've got a bad feeling about this...

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Oh, goodness!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Watch out!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: What<U+0096> how<U+0096> what?!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Pinkie Pie, what were you thinking?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I guess I wasn't.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I know how important it is to you that your friends become my friends, but I just don't think it's going to happen. I think it would be best if I just go back to the rock farm and spend the rest of the week there. It was nice to meet you all. Makes me happy knowing Pinkie Pie has such good friends.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: But... we never even got to make our rock candy necklaces... Wait, Maud! I'll come with you!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I can't believe Maud cut her trip short.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: I can't believe we nearly lost Pinkie Pie to that ridiculous obstacle course.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Thank goodness Maud was able to reach her in time.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Did you see how fast Maud moved?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: And the way she smashed that huge rock into dust? How in Equestria did she do that?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Pinkie Pie was in trouble! Maud would move mountains for her if she had to.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: That's it! I think I finally realized what we all have in common with Maud! Something that just might be worthy of a very important super-duper special tradition that only the closest and bestest of friends can share!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Thank you for coming with me. I don't know how long I'll be gone on my rock research trip. I'm glad I still get to spend some time with you before I go.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Me too. I'm sorry I put so much pressure on everypony to bond. I only wanted my friends to get to know my amazing older sister.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: What are you doing here?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Pinkie Pie, we're so sorry we hurt your feelings by not bonding with Maud right away. And Maud, we're sorry that you felt the only way to spare Pinkie Pie's feelings was to leave Ponyville early.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: We've seen how much you care about Pinkie Pie firsthoof.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Pinkie Pie's happiness means as much to us as it does to you, and we're sorry we couldn't see it sooner. The thing that makes us click and creates a special bond between us is how much we all love Pinkie Pie!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Aw, shucks!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: That's a pretty great thing to have in common, if you ask me. What do you think, Maud?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Sure.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: What's wrong?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Sorry, darling. I think we all just thought she'd be a bit more excited about this.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Are you kidding me? I've never seen her more excited in my entire life!

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] I don't know if you've noticed, but I don't show my enthusiasm for things quite in the same way my sister does.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Uh, we noticed. And we're totally cool with it.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Maud, we'd like to give you something to take on your trip, so that you remember all your friends from Ponyville.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] Thank you.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: Are those all the necklaces Pinkie Pie sent you?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] Mm-hm.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: You haven't eaten any of them?

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [deadpan] I don't really like candy. But I do love Pinkie Pie.

title: Maud Pie
dialog: [chewing] Mmm!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I have to leave for dress rehearsal soon, Rarity! Is it finished yet?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Uh, not quite. I still feel it needs a certain je ne sais quoi. Perhaps it needs... appliqu<e9>s.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Appliqu<e9>s?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Or sequins.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Sequins!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Sweetie Belle, I adore having you help me, truly I do, but...

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Guess I got a little carried away. It's just that I know how important it is for you to finish this wardrobe in time for Sapphire Shores and her backup dancers.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: This is without a doubt my most prestigious order ever. After all, Sapphire Shores is the pony of pop, and her Equestria-wide tour launches in Canterlot next week! Which means she must have these outfits by day after tomorrow at the latest!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But is there time?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Barely. But I work well under pressure. Hmm, as long as I stay calm, I'll be fine.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, good! Then maybe you could check the stitching and finish the buttons on the dresses I made for me, Apple Bloom, and Scootaloo? I really want them to look perfect, and... I think I need your expertise.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: My, you've been so much help to me. How could I possibly say no? When do you need them?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Tomorrow night. For the opening night of our show!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But, Sweetie Belle, darling! I, I'm behind as it is!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I understand.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I suppose... if I got a few more ponies to help me, then maybe...

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: My goodness, girls, it's time! And the audience is almost fully seated! Costumes!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I can't believe Rarity still isn't here with the costumes.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: She's been very busy lately!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But how can she still not be here? She's known about this for weeks! Uh... she has known about this for weeks, right?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I kept meaning to ask her, I really did, but I worked so hard on this play. I wrote it especially for the three of us! I directed it, I'm in it, I made the costumes... It's just that this is really my time to shine doing something completely myself, and I really wanted to keep it that way!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But we wanted everything to be perfect! All our friends came out to see it tonight!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Places!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, I'm here, I'm here!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [gasps] You made it!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, I beg your pardon for cutting it so close, but I made some improvements to your original design, and I had a terrible time with these froofy sleeves. It is for the first play you ever wrote, after all, so I made quite certain it came out just so.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Places! Hello?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Forsooth and anon, I cometh forthwith and posthaste with glad tidings, miladies.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Wow! A standin' ovation!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I still have goosebumps!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: This must be like a dream come true for you, huh, Sweetie Belle?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Ooh, can you imagine if this show was how you got your cutie mark?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Which do you think you'd get it for? Writing, directing, or acting?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [deep breath] Let's not get carried away. We've got a whole lobby full of friends waiting to shower us with adoration and praise. Try to be gracious.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Modest.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Classy.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Here we are, the stars of the show!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: You may tell us how much you loved it now.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Line forms here!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Wow, you guys! I think your sisters would have loved it!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Would have?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: They're sorry, but they had to go help Rarity get Sapphire Shores' wardrobe ready to take to Canterlot in the morning.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Even Rainbow Dash?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Yeah. Rarity fell way behind.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Aw, cheer up, the show was great! I'll get you some punch.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: At least everypony else who was able to stay loved it.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: What did you all like best? The writing, the directing, or the acting?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, really? Which ones?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [growls] Isn't there anypony here who remembers anything about the play besides the dresses?!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: All of this is one headpiece?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Indeed. This marvelous extravagance is the cr<e8>me de la cr<e8>me of the entire wardrobe! But alas, without this key hidden stitch, it's just a... I'm trying to think of a nicer way to say 'big bummer'. [sighs] Now perhaps we can all at last take a moment to relax!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Whatever's the matter, Sweetie Belle? Didn't the play go all right?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Not even close.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, dear. Was something amiss with the dresses I made you?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: No, they were perfect, and that was the whole problem!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, um, I think maybe I'll go take that moment to relax now.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Heh, sure do feel like relaxing!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Right behind ya!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: How could you?! "Oh, what amazing dresses! Oh, how I love the dresses! Ooh, dresses, dresses, dresses, dresses!"

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, so they did like them. [chuckles] You had me worried, you silly filly.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: There! I knew it! You did this on purpose! Stealing the spotlight like you always do! It's my fifth birthday party all over again!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: The... the what now?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Don't act like you don't remember. Or are you trying to prove you're a better actress than me too?!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Sweetie Belle, if I did anything to upset you, then--

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Admit you made those dresses too good on purpose!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I thought they were supposed to be good.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Yes, good. Not jaw-dropping amazing!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I only tried to do what I thought you wanted.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Ha!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Ugh, I don't believe it. After everything I put up with all week long! [imitating Rarity] "Sweetie Belle, get me some red ribbon! No, that's not red, that's cherry! No, that's not red, that's cinnamon!" [normal, muffled] For Pete's sake, it's all red!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [to Opalescence] I should probably go talk to her, hm?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [muffled] At least Sapphire Shores won't be all like "Ooh, who fetched you that red ribbon? Because I don't care about anything else you made. All I care about is that amazing red ribbon!"

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Perhaps waiting would be best.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [gulping water] I wish there was a way I could take back all the work I did!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [growls] Now what?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Don't go!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Stop! Why do you have to ruin everything?!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Enough!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Princess Luna! It's really you! Or am I dreaming?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: What do you think?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Let me see. You just rescued me from a maniacal laughing Rarity-cloud. Yeah, probably dreaming.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I understand what you're going through, Sweetie Belle. I too have a sister who often shines more brightly than me, and with this, I have struggled.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Wait, come back! Luna? Can you hear me? Thank you for what you did! Help, Luna! Luuuna!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I remember this. This is my fifth birthday party! I decided to make a grand entrance. I made myself all beautiful, just like my big sister.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Finally, I was perfect, and then went to the stairs to enter like the belle of the ball. When I finally came out of my room, I found the party going on without me.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: And I kept posing at the top of the stairs, waiting to be noticed, but all I heard was...

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Made them myself. And of course, you'll all want cake, won't you?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: That's when I learned 'never try to shine with my big sister around'.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But perhaps you didn't have the whole story.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I thought you said you understood? Luna?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I'm sure she'll be along in any moment.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Don't go! You'll miss out on the, uh, party favors! I was going to save them 'til the end, but...

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Made them myself. And of course, you'll all want cake, won't you?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, no-no-no. All of these things were Sweetie Belle's idea. I just assisted with the execution.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I guess Rarity wasn't trying to steal the spotlight. She was trying to save my party. Luna? Luna!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Should I hem the cloaks now or wait until I'm there? I could hem them now, but I might have to redo them...

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: When was this?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But if I wait until I'm in Canterlot to hem them, Sapphire Shores might not get the best first impression...

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Wait. This must've happened earlier tonight!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Ooh... Sapphire Shores is such a big star and such a stickler for details. What if everything's not perfect enough?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Funny, I thought I was the only one who got worried about stuff like that.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, buck up, Rarity, stop this foolishness. You've done your best and left nothing to chance! All that's needed now is a good night's rest.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [sighs] I hope everything goes alright for her tomorrow.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Hm. How curious you should say that.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Go. Go see what the future holds if you fail to rein in your worst instincts, as I once did.
