title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: And here it is! The cr<e8>me de la cr<e8>me--

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Noooo!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: The pi<e9>ce de resistance...

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: The headdress!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But, but this is impossible! I, I, I checked and rechecked everything! This couldn't have happened!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Please, you must believe me!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Listen to my sister!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [screams] I don't wanna see any more!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Always check and recheck!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Check, recheck, recheck, then recheck!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Make it stop! Princess Luna, can you hear me?!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Make me a dress, Rarity, please?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Go away! You know I don't do that anymore!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Wake me up, Princess Luna, wake me up, wake me uuuup!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Rarity? [gasps] Oh no! The box is... gone? I'm too late! She left for Canterlot!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: The key is for you two to distract Rarity long enough for me to put the stitch back in without her noticing.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: If we're not too late already.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, my gosh! I can't believe we're goin' to see Sapphire Shores! I'm such a huge fan! I know all her songs!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: 'Get Your Pony On'!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Ooh, that's one of my favorites!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: This isn't a trip to see Sapphire Shores! It's a trip to save my sister from a horrible future!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: 'Serves Her Right'!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [gasps] How can you say that?! Rarity doesn't deserve that at all!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: No, 'Serves Her Right' is another one of Sapphire Shores' songs!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: You seriously didn't know that? Don't you listen to her music?!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: ...I prefer show tunes.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, bravo! Fabulous! Magnifique!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But you have to let us in! I'm Sapphire Shores' designer's sister! You have to believe us!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But I'm not a fan!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I am!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Me too!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Not helping!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [straining] Almost...

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oof!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: We've gotta get in there, now!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Actually, I saved the best for last!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: And here it is!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: You gotta see this with the cinnamon ribbon! You'll love it!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Sweetie Belle?!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Uh... [laughs nervously] Ahem. Just a moment!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, good! This is just a dream!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Actually, no. This is very much real.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [sighs] Oh, Luna... I wish none of this ever happened... What am I gonna do?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Let's begin with this. And I think I know how you can even improve it.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I would like to know what in the wide, wide realm of Equestria this stunt of yours is all about, and I want to know now! Do you have any idea how important this job is to me?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Actually, I do. I was upset at you for stealing the spotlight from me at the play, so I pulled out the center stitch to the headpiece so it would fall apart.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: What?!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But then I realized I didn't want your future to be ruined forever and ever, so I came back to change it before it was too late! So... here it is. It's all fixed. Please forgive me.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Wait... what is this?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Trust me. Sapphire Shores is gonna love it.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I promise you'll absolutely adore the headdress as soon as you see it.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Look at the stitching, real close.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Wherever did you come up with the idea for a dolphin?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, it just came to me... in a dream. I'm sorry I got jealous about those dresses. I know now that you were only trying to help.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, Sweetie, I forgive you! But I never did get to see your play. Any chance I could catch an encore performance?

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Uh, I don't think the play went all that good. To be honest, the costumes were the best part.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Awww!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Just one more time? Please?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Alright, but this is the last one.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Woo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo! Woooo!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: [spluttering] Who done that?!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Sure wish you'd come swim with us, Granny.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Uh, sorry, dear. I just can't bring myself anywhere near that there swimmin' hole.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: How come?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Well, I wasn't always this way...

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Time was, I was an aquapony all-star! In fact, I was the only Apple to ever come close to breaking the Equestria high-diving record! Falling six stories into a deep dish pie pan takes a toll on the hindquarters. Oh, I was so sore, took years before I could even look at the water again! Just the idea of swimmin' makes my whole body ache! Besides, these old legs can't even paddle fast enough to stay afloat.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Boy, I sure would hate to be afraid of swimmin'. You think I'll ever be scared of the water?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Aah!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Nope.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Wow, Granny. I can't believe you were a high diver!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: The best one in Ponyville!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Do you think I could be a high diver?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Nope.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Absolutely not.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Now you hold your horsefeathers, little seed! I never said bein' a high diver was a smart decision! It's incredibly dangerous!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I know, but<U+0096>

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: But nothin'! It is the riskiest, scariest, darn-fool thing I ever did do! That's not to say I didn't wish I was still young and spry and confident, but let's leave the flyin' through the air to the Pegasi.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Wow, when you put it that way, it doesn't sound so fun.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Wow. I wonder where everypony's headed.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Now where in Ponyville do you two think you're goin'?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Aw, quit bein' such a worry-worm and follow your ears!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Come on, Applejack, aren't you curious?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Thank you, one and all, for your attendance, and we guarantee that your time here will not be spent in vain!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: In fact, we think it will prove to be the most valuable time you've ever spent!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: The Flim Flam Brothers! This should be interestin'.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Welcome, one and all, to the demonstration of a lifetime!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: A demonstration of a better life!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: A demonstration of a better time! And if we haven't captured your interest just yet, by the time we've finished, an unfortunate phenomenon practically guarantees that we will!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: A phenomenon? What's that?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: It's a circumstance perceptible by the senses, but in this case, it's the simple fact that:

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: A sickness that lies waiting there in every breath you breathe

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Disease will up and grab you as it crawls from land and sea

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: It's amazing how infected that the natural world and all its things can be

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Now I understand that some of you don't think you're sick.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: But twisted hooves and aching joints don't heal all that quick.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Consider just how dangerous this world is! You might...

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Slip and fall, break or sprain something here tonight

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Now I know our claims seem fantastical.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Impractical.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Improbable.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Impossible.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: So we welcome every suffering pony to make their way up to the stage.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Now don't crowd.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: And we'll prove our tonic's effectiveness before your very eyes.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: You there! Come up here, good sir.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I'll wager you're tired of those crutches, my friend.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Try taking a sip of this!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Now how do ya like that?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I don't. There's somethin' funny about this whole thing.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Now some of you may suffer from feelings of despair You're old, you're tired, your legs won't work, there's graying in your hair

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Just listen and I'll tell you that you don't need to fear Your ears will work, your muscles tone, your eyes will see so clear

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: It cures the reins, the spurs, and the Clydesdale fur blight.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Hooferia and horsentery cured in just a night.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: You've got swollen hooves and hindquarters or terrible bridle-bit cleft.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Saunter sitz and gallop plop will give your tail some heft.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Mane loss, hay fever, or terrible tonsillitis.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: You heard it here, folks -- this is the only place in all of Equestria you'll find it!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: It can make you shorter, taller, or even grow old

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: But who'd want that?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: When with one drink

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: SOLD!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Congratulations, Granny Smith! You just made the purchase of a lifetime!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Are you as worried as I am?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Boy, I just can't believe all the things that Flim Flam Tonic can do!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: When somepony says somethin's too good to be true, it usually is.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: You mean Granny wasted her money?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Well, I don't know about that, but I don't think there's a tonic in Equestria that can make an old pony young again.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Howdy!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Granny?!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Hang on now! We'll get ya!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Granny, I thought you were too afraid of the water to swim! And, and what about your hip?!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Well, I reckon it might have been a problem before I had myself a dose of that there Flim Flam Tonic!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I'm not so sure that tonic really does anythin'.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I'm glad you're feelin' good, but how do you know it's from the tonic?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I looked out at the water this mornin' and I felt the same terrifyin' aches and pains I always do. But one sip of that magic elixir and it all went away! Why, I might even get a head start on my chores! What do you say, Big Mac-a-doo? Up for a little afternoon applebuckin'?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Uh, no.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Oh, quit your bellyachin'!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Gee, it looks like that tonic works after all! I wonder what's in it.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I think maybe it's time we found out.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: So you're just gonna walk up and ask them how it works?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I guess. Though if it's a genuine cure, I don't suppose they'll be too keen on sharin' the recipe.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Wait a second! That's that same pony from before!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Hey!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Now hold it right there, Mister...?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Our Granny took some tonic and we want to know how it works.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Granny couldn't swim before, and now she can. Just like you couldn't walk and now you can. But what are you doin' back here? I mean, if the tonic cured you and all...

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: ...Because he's part of the act! It's time for you to tell the truth! You never needed crutches at all, did ya?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Hey! Huh?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Well, if it isn't our most favorite Apple!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: What brings you back to our humble abode?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: You two charlatans sold my Granny a bottle of tonic, and now she's off actin' like a filly again.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: What's so bad about that?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: If she keeps gallavantin' around like a yearlin', she's apt to drop from exhaustion or worse! What's more, I know for a fact that your friend here is dressin' up as a different pony every night so he can pretend to be cured!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Well, well, well, that's quite an accusation.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: But let's say that it's true...

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Hypothetically...

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Theoretically...

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: As I understand, your Granny was a famous aquapony.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: The star of the show, once upon a time.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: But hasn't set so much as a hoof in the water since.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Until today, that's right.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Well, then even if our tonic were nothing more than a mixture of apple juice and beet leaves...

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Hypothetically...

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Theoretically...

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: The fact is that Granny is happier now than before she tried it.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I guess...

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: So, the question is...

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Do you really want to be the pony who takes all that happiness away?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: There you are! I've been lookin' all over! Did you find out what's in the tonic?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Honestly, Apple Bloom... as long as it works, I... don't suppose it really matters.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Well, if it doesn't matter to you, then it doesn't matter to me either, sis.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: That's the spirit!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Come back anytime!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Hey, Granny! Think you can buck me over the water?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I don't see why not! Come on, Big Mac, toss her this way!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Granny, wait!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Woo-hoo-hoo!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Uh, what were you sayin', dear?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Granny, don't you think you should take it kinda easy?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I've been takin' it easy for too long! And now, thanks to that Flim Flam Tonic, I don't have to!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Granny, you think I could be an aquapony like you?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Of course you can, sapling. There's nothin' to it but to do it!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Well, the Ponyville swim meet is comin' up. We could enter together! A legendary water pony like you? We'd be a cinch to win!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Mm, ee, uh, I don't know... Bein' back in the water is one thing, but a competition is a pony of a different color.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Oh. Okay.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I don't know, Granny. A swim meet sounds pretty safe. And after all, if that tonic lets you swim in a river and a swimmin' hole, a pool should be no problem at all.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Well, I'll be a tart turnover, you are right! All we need now is more tonic!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Welcome, friends, and step right up! The next show starts in five minutes!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: But why not buy your tonic now and avoid the rush?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Right this way, good sir!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: We'll take the whole case!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: It seems to work for Granny.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: You heard it here first, folks! Flim Flam Miracle Curative Tonic is Granny Smith-tested and Applejack-approved!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Just remember, you two. The most important thing is to be safe and have fun, right?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Fiddlesticks! With the routine we've been workin' on, I'll be a plum puddin' if we don't win this thing!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Uh... good luck, then!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Luck? Pfft, who needs luck? We got tonic on our side!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Flim Flam's Magical Curative Tonic!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Get your Applejack-approved tonic! Granny Smith drinks it <U+0096> why shouldn't you?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: [sighs] Right.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Now, if'n you'll excuse us, we got some swimmin' to do!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Well, I'll be...

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Yeah, but mostly it's the tonic!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: That's Flim Flam Miracle Curative Tonic, to be precise.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Buy it now while supplies last.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: What are you doin' here?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: If you say so.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Thanks to... me?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: With Flim Flam's magical Curative Tonic, my Granny can do anything! Just ask Applejack!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: No! This has gotta stop! If ponies keep believin' that tonic can do things it can't, who knows what'll happen?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: [gasps] Granny! What in blazes does she think she's doin'?!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Granny's gonna break the Equestria high divin' record!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Land sakes!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: [yelps] Now what in tarnation did you do that for?!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: That was the most fool-pony thing I've ever seen anypony do in all my life! You can't do a dive like that!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Oh, quit your fussin'! I had enough tonic to do a dive ten times as high!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Twenty times, by my count.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Thirty, with a favorable breeze.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I hate to disappoint everypony, but there's no way Granny could have made that dive, because this tonic is a fake!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: ...I am.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I didn't mean to! But everypony seemed so much happier, I couldn't bring myself to tell you when I found out the tonic wasn't real. I know it was wrong. I just hope with time, I can win back everypony's trust.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: But if the tonic is a fake, then how come Granny can swim again, and what about all that aquabatics stuff we just did?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I reckon sometimes you can forget what you're capable of, and it just takes a little extra confidence to remember that it was inside of you all along. But tellin' ponies your tonic can do things it can't is just wrong!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: But you just said it boosts confidence!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: And that's not all it does, folks<U+0096>

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Believin' in somethin' can help you do amazin' things. But if that belief is based on a lie, eventually it's gonna lead to real trouble.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I don't know...

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: I'm sorry, Granny. I hope this doesn't mean you'll stop swimmin'.

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Why in tarnation would I do that? I just can't believe those two salesponies had me believin' I could near fly! Hey, where'd they go?

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Bein' honest sure gets hard when it seems like the truth might hurt somepony you care about. But I think believin' a lie can end up hurtin' even more. Maybe some ponies don't care about that <U+0096> but I sure ain't one of them. Now you take it easy there, Granny!

title: Leap of Faith
dialog: Oh, I plan to! Hoo, ha, ha-whee!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [reading] The magical properties of this spell will only have lasting effects if you focus on<U+0097>

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: No! Rainbow Dash! [grunts] How in Equestria does that pony expect to pass her history of the Wonderbolts exam tomorrow if she's wasting time flying?! I'm just gonna fly right up to her and tell her what I think about her lackadaisical approach to studying! Won't she be surprised!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Surprise!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: What? Huh? How did you<U+0097>

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Puh-lease, Twilight. That was the worst sneak attack ever.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Wha? But<U+0097>

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I saw you giving me the stink-eye from the ground and heard you flying towards me and muttering from a mile away.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Well, if you heard me "muttering", then you must know what I was "muttering" about.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Yeah, yeah, the Wonderbolts history test. No big deal.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: No. Big deal. Really big deal. It's a test! A test that will determine if you can join the newly-formed Wonderbolts Reserves, and being part of the Wonderbolts Reserves means you'll have the opportunity to live your dream as a Wonderbolt! This is the most important test of your life!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Twilight, not everypony gets all freaked out about tests like you.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I do not get "all freaked out" about tests!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Uh, seriously? Your freakouts are so epic, you sing whole freakout arias about freaking out.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Fine, I may tend to take my tests a little seriously, but that doesn't mean you shouldn't be studying for yours! Oooh! And I know just the pony who can help you: me! This is gonna be so much fun!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Sure. Fun.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [yelps] Wha<U+0096> huh?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: This is the most complete<U+0097>

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: And ginormous!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: <U+0097>book on the history of the Wonderbolts.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Okay, but how am I supposed to get what's in there into here?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: With my handy-dandy study checklist, of course!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Of course.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: First up, reading and highlighting. Reading and highlighting is the foundation of any good study method. It allows the student to hone in and boil down on what's really important, separating the good from the bad, the wheat from the chaff, getting to the crux of things. Let's see what you've got so far!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Um...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Huh? Hm, by highlighting everything, you don't really separate the wheat from the chaff... Or the good from the bad. Hey, I am not that tall!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [sighs] Okay, Rainbow, clearly reading and highlighting is not your style of studying, so let's move on to the tried and true: History lecture! Yes, Rainbow?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Is it snack time?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: No.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Recess?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: No.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [sighs] Can't we just watch the history of the Wonderbolts movie?!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: No! Now, just get comfortable, and experience the magic of learning. Ahem. Prior to the great Celestia/Luna rift, there was no need for the Earth, Unicorn, Pegasi, or E.U.P., Guard.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: But after Luna's banishment, the Protective Pony Platoons were formed. On the anniversary of the first Celestial year of peace, a celebration was held.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Headed by General Firefly, an elite team of aerial performers were chosen to help celebrate this auspicious occasion. The first performance was so full of energy, so highly charged, that magical lightning showered down on the crowd. Everypony was so filled with amazement and wonder that General Firefly dubbed them "the Wonderbolts"!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Rainbow Dash, can you repeat any of my lesson?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: History lecture... nope. [sighs] Okay, Rainbow<U+0096> Rainbow? Rainbow Dash!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Here!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Let's move on to my favorite style of learning: flashcards!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Oh, does that mean I'll learn in a flash?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: One can only hope. [inhales] Colonel Purple Dart, the leader of the Wonderbolts in the Fourth Celestial Era, was known for his<U+0096> wha?! Rainbow! Did you see what happened?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: What? No! I was... riveted by your captivating cards!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Hmm... After becoming the official flying squadron for Princess Celestia, she honored them with<U+0096> Gotcha!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Got what?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: The original Wonderbolts lightning bolt insignia was<U+0096> [yelps] Rainbow Dash, you could've hurt me!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: With a spit wad? Really?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: A spit wad to the eye would have been no laughing matter!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Well, if you can horse around like this, then you clearly must be ready for the test.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Clearly.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Well then, I guess you're also ready for a...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Pop quiz!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Bring it!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: The initials E.U.P. stand for what?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Ernie's undercooked pancakes.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: The original aerial team performed for...?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Celestia's cereal celebration.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: The Wonderbolts were given their name by this famous Pegasus. Who is she? [to herself] Please don't say Colonel Waffle...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Hello? General Blazing Donut Glaze! [scoffs] So, did I ace it or what?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Or what. You didn't get one answer correct.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: What? But<U+0096> but how?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I don't know. I've never heard answers so wrong! And so breakfast-related!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: If you had taken the official test today...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [gasps] My dreams of being in the Wonderbolts Reserve would have been totally crushed! [gasps] What am I gonna do? I'm running out of time! I don't know any of this history! I'm gonna fail!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I'm gonna fail, I'm gonna fail, I'm gonna fail! And it's all your fault!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: My fault?! I'm the one helping you!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Maybe your famous study methods aren't all they're cracked up to be, eh, teacher?!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Excuse me, I've used them to study for many a test and passed!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Yeah, right.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Do you know the name of the premiere Wonderbolts choreographer?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Uh, well<U+0097>

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Commander Easyglider. Do you know how many Pegasi flew in the original squad?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Seven! Do you know Princess Celestia's favorite flight pattern?! The Icaranian Sun Salutation! See? I could pass the test.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Fine! Rub it in, why don't ya? Besides, I don't see why I have to take this lousy test anyway. I've proven I'm one of the best flyers around.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Knowing their origin and being able to properly represent them for all of Equestria is just as important.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Yeah, right. Some history buff like you must have made that up to bring us flyers down.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Knowing history actually is beneficial, Rainbow.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [blows raspberry] Beneficial for eggheads!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Girls.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Well, this egghead knows history and can fly. Maybe I should become a Wonderbolt.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Just 'cause you've got wings, doesn't mean you can fly!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Girls!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: You're barely able to just get off the ground!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Girls! Stop! Now, is that any way to talk to a friend?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Sorry.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Yeah, sorry.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Don't you have more important things to do? Like prepare Rainbow for her big test?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I've tried everything, Fluttershy, but none of my study methods work for her.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Well, no offense to your teaching methods, Twilight, but I think I may have a way to help Rainbow.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Oh, who's that, who's that?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Celestia and Luna, back when they were happy.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Uh... now what?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Gummy's an Earth pony, Winona's a unicorn, and Tank is a Pegasus.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: They're the E.U.P., helping to protect the Princess.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Uh, how are you getting all this?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Oh, no!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Stop, stop, stop! That was aw<U+0097>

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Awesome! I give it three woohoo's! Woohoo, woohoo, woohoo! And an extra "woo" for good measure! Woo!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Well, I give it a "whoa, whoa, what?" I'm totally confused and I just wanna go home... Whoa<U+0096> hey!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Whoa your woes there, woeful. Some ponies learn through theatrical presentation, but other ponies learn through musical intervention.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [beatboxing, turntable scratching noises] Well, back in ancient times, there were the Wonderbolts of old A general named Firefly, amazing and so...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: She brought them all together, spreading unity...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Performing at their very best with wonder...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: There's Admiral Fairweather and the Colonel Purple...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Gave Wonderbolts a bit of steel along with...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: An admiral named Fairy Flight and general called...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Helped the 'bolts fly super high...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Commander Easyglider was the real cream of...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: For with her wicked moves, the Wonderbolts...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Wonderbolts, yeah! Wonderbolts...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Wonderbolts, yeah! Wonderbolts...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: That is my rappin' history of the Wonderbolts!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: So, d'you get it?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Yes, Pinkie Pie! [poorly imitating rap-style sounds] General This and Colonel That, they're the Wonderbolts, something that rhymes with that!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: That... was pretty terrible.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: What?! No... really? But I've gotta learn this stuff! Now!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: And I am just the pony to help!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Rarity, you look ridiculous.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I am going to ignore that comment out of my desire to help you.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Good luck.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Get ready, Rainbow Dash, for I am going to take you on an historical adventure in fashion! I am now modeling the rather unattractive, and frankly itchy, original Wonderbolts flying costume. Fortunately, thanks to the vision of Flair d'Mare, the Wonderbolts ensemble became more streamlined in a wonderfully breathable fabric. Of course, there were fashion hits... and misses. Just look at those dreadful bell-bottoms. What were ponies thinking?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I dunno. I bet General Flash rocked these thangs!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [yelps] Pinkie, you're real!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Of course I'm real! I mean I'm not the real General Flash, the tenth leader of the Wonderbolts, but I, Pinkie, am really real.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: And I'm Admiral Fairy Flight, from the seventh squadron.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: And of course you recognize Commander Easyglider.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: And I'm sportin' some sort of getup worn by Colonel Purple Dart.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Just look at us.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Look at us.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Look at me!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: It's too much for my eyes!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Now, don't you fret, Rainbow. This fashion show nonsense wouldn't help me learn nothin', either.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Really? Well, what special study trick do you have, AJ?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Who, me? Oh, I got nothing.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Why, I could tell you every little thing there is to know about the history of apples, but I picked all that up over years in the field as a labor of love. How much time you got?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Twelve hours.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Oh, then you are up a creek.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Oh, I think we should just go back to old-fashioned studying.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: What about our play?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Just look at these costumes! Surely something resonates with your inner Wonderbolt!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: And Granny Smith discovered the first granny smith in Fillydelphia, when she was just a filly!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Commander Easyglider was the real cream of the crop<U+0097>

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Pinkie, stop rapping! That isn't gonna help Rainbow!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Well, I suggest you put down your silly cards of flash, For I know that they cannot help our good friend Rainbow Dash!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Enough! No rapping, no cards, no costumes, no play, and no apples! I am never gonna pass this test, ever! Just forget it!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [panting] Rainbow, I'm sorry about all that! We didn't mean to overwhelm you!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: It's okay. You were just trying to help. It's just too bad I'm too dumb to learn anything.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: You are not dumb! You just learn differently!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: If by "differently" you mean "not at all", then you're totally right.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: No, that's totally wrong.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: See? Wrong again.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I don't know anypony that's read more Daring Do books than you.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Well, that's not going to get me into the Wonderbolts.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: And your knowledge of jokes and pranks is only rivaled by Pinkie.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Great. My years of being a class clown prevented me from actually learning how to learn!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: That's not what I meant. You're smart, creative, inventive, and<U+0096> ugh! Hey! I know you're upset, but you don't need to<U+0097>

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Whoa... I almost slammed into that!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I know. You were jabbering on so much you didn't even notice.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: But how did you notice? You were listening and talking to me the whole time!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Ha-hah, you're such a rookie. An experienced flyer like me knows how to multitask.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: While you fly?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: It's essential! Yes, I was paying attention to you, but was also scanning the sky and the ground for any problems.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Really?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Flying's not just flying!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: In order to stay safe in the sky, I've got to hear and see everything down to the littlest details. For instance, I saw Apple Bloom, Sweetie Belle and Scootaloo come out of Sugarcube Corner, and from the looks of it, they had carrot cupcakes with sprinkles. And I'm thinking Big Mac sold a huge order of apples to Filthy Rich, 'cause I heard him give a very hearty<U+0097>

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I always make note of everything when I fly. No biggie.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [gasps] Oh, my gosh!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: What?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Gotta go!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Thanks for meeting me, everypony.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: What is it, Twilight?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: We have to help Rainbow Dash.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Yes, but how?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: We've tried every kind of studying. My way, your way...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: But we haven't tried Rainbow Dash's way.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Hmm, I'm intrigued.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Hey, Rainbow. Wanna go for a fly?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [sighs] Sure. Got nothing better to do. Didn't we just do this?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Yes, but like you said, I'm such a newbie, I need all the practice I can get.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Yeah, well, I'm sure you'll become a great flyer in no time. After all, you're good at everything.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: So... what's going on?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Oh, nothing. Just getting my dreams crushed.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Uh... read any good books lately?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [sighs] Just history books. I'd tell you what they were about, but my brain is as dry as a rock.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Maybe I'll go work there as I have no other plans for the rest of my life.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Oh, come on now, Rainbow. You can't give up on your dream!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Seems my dream has given up on me. Maybe I'll learn to shine shoes, sell hats, dig ditches...

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Or maybe you'll be a Wonderbolt.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Twilight, give it up! I have.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: So, what do you remember about that flight?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [sighs] Nothing important. Except after Luna was banished to the moon, Celestia needed protective forces, so Earth, unicorn, and Pegasi formed the E.U.P. Guard of the Protective Pony Platoons.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Yes...?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: [getting happier] And, at the celebration of the first Celestial year of peace, an elite flying squadron performed, headed by General Firefly, who later named the group the Wonderbolts!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Uh-huh...?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Commander Easyglider established flight choreography that is still used by the Wonderbolts today!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Yes!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I... I know the history! I know it all! But how in Equestria did that happen?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: You learned it!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Yeah, I got that! But how?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Well, on our first flight, I discovered that you catalog everything that happens all around you when you're flying, without even thinking about it! Don't you see?

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I made use of your special skills by enlisting everypony to help you learn the history of the Wonderbolts!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I, Princess Celestia, banish you, Princess Luna, to the moon.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Noooooo!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Earth!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Unicorn!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Pegasus!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: E!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: U!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: P!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Let us celebrate our first Celestial year of peace!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Yeah, let's party! I'm General Firefly! Gee, my costume is itchy and unattractive, but I'm gonna assemble an awesome flying team!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: I'll call them... the Wonderbolts!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Streamlined style by Flair d'Mare!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: The history of the Wonderbolts!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Oh my gosh, oh my gosh, oh my gosh! Thank you! Thank you all so much!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: You're welcome, but it all came from you. You learned without knowing you're learning. Your main focus is flying, but then your brain is also absorbing lots of other information! It's actually really brilliant!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Ha, I always knew I was brilliant!

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Rainbow Dash finally learned the history of the Wonderbolts, but she's not the only pony that needed a lesson; I needed to learn something just as important. One way of learning isn't better than another. After all, every pony is unique and individual.

title: Testing Testing 1, 2, 3
dialog: Yeeeaah! Whoo!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: [squeals] Yes! Best day ever! We're all going to the Rainbow Falls Traders Exchange! And not just going <U+0096> we're accompanying a princess on an official royal duty!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Please, it's not that big of a deal. There always has to be a princess at the Exchange. Last year was Princess Cadance, this year it's me. It's just a formality. I'm sure none of the other ponies will even notice I'm here.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Could be wrong, but I think they might've noticed.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Oh, my goodness!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: You said it. The Rainbow Falls Traders Exchange is simply divine. You can get anything you want here!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: If'n you got the goods to trade for it.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: [grunts] Wha? Nooo! Thanks, Twilight. Whew. One ding, nick or dent, and this Power Ponies comic book wouldn't be in perfect mint condition anymore. And if you want to trade for a mint comic, you gotta have a mint comic.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I guess a pony who's here on official princess business has to expect a little fussin'.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: There's a pony here who's got a signed first edition of Daring Do and the Quest for the Sapphire Statue, and I'm gonna get it! I've been able to get first editions of all of the Daring Do books, except this one! Nopony's ever put together a whole set, and I'm gonna be the first! If it hasn't been traded yet... It's the only one in all of Equestria!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Oh no! I'd really hate to see you disappointed. I did want to trade this bear call I've got for a bird whistle, but getting that book seems so important to you, so if you need me to help you first...

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Normally I'd say I don't need any help, but you're right. This is really important. I've gotta get that book!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Well, I'm off to take a gander at some of the vintage stalls.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Did you say vintage? Why, old and rare items are so in style right now! I'm hoping to get a vintage item as well. I just hope I brought enough to trade.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I know what you mean, Rarity. Hey! Why don't we pool our trade stashes?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Pool?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: That way, if one of us finds somethin' real valuable she can't live without...

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: [gasps] She'll definitely be able to get it! Who could say no to exchanging a single object for such a huge assortment of items? Oh, yes! That is absolutely brilliant! I'm so glad I have a friend like you, Applejack.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I feel the same way.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Then let's go shopping!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Um, shouldn't your princessness be headed to the royal box seats?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I may be the princess on duty, but I don't think that means I have to sit up there all alone doing nothing. Ever since I became a princess, Celestia's been sending me more books to read than ever. The library's overflowing, so I figured while we're here, I might as well trade away some books I don't need anymore.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Mm-hm!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: [gasps] There it is! The first edition of Daring Do and the Sapphire Statue! It hasn't been traded yet! [to stallholder] Lucky for you, because I've brought my most valuable possession to trade for it: My lucky horseshoe!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: What?!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: But, but how is Rainbow Dash going to get the book she really wants?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Aww, an Orthros! How cute!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: You got it! [to Fluttershy] I don't know how, but somehow, we're gonna get that Orthros.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Oh, Applejack, I am so glad I found you.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Me too! You're not gonna believe it!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: So, where is this valuable vintage item you want to trade everything we have for?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: There!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Where?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Right there!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: But... that's a dented old pie tin.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: A dented vintage pie tin. The metal they used to fashion this one helps cook the pies up to five seconds faster! They don't make 'em like this anymore!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I'm so glad you showed that to me, darling...

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: ...because once you see what I've found, you won't want to waste our trade goods on that. [giggles] Just look at this gorgeous vintage brooch. It's one of a kind!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: It looks exactly like the one you're already wearin'.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Well, yes, they may look the same, but I know it's older, and that's what makes it so much more divine!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: But that doesn't make a lick of sense! Why, I'd wager if I switched them up, you wouldn't even know the difference!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Oh, don't be silly, of course I would!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: So which is the vintage one?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: That one, of course.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Hah, you're bluffin'!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Am I? How can you tell?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Well... because... [groans] I can't, 'cause the one you wanna waste our whole stash on is exactly the same as the one you already got! There's no way anypony would notice the difference!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I'd say it's a lot more likely they'd notice that than some dented tin that cooked a pie a whole two seconds faster!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: It's five seconds faster!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Yes, such a good two-headed boy. Yes, you are!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Okay, I can see you're busy, so I'll give it to you straight. I need to trade this horseshoe for... that.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Aww.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: A whole stand filled with Discord-shaped lamps? Seriously?!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: They really do have everything at the Traders Exchange.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Will you trade a lamp for my horseshoe so I can trade it for an Orthros and get my book?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Great! [beat] What's an antique chicken?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Okay, cool! So will you trade one for a horseshoe so I can trade it for a lamp and then trade it for an Orthros so I can get my book?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: [panting] Hold on a sec. [inhales] We need a crystal chalice to trade for a chicken to trade for a lamp to trade for an Orthros. So what are you willing to trade for it? I'm guessing it's gotta be some crazy thing way across the Exchange.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Yeah, like where am I gonna find<U+0096> wait, I've got one of those! Now that we've got the chalice, this is gonna be a cinch!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Do you really think so?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: All we gotta do is bring this thing to the chicken stand and we are<U+0096>

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: You want me to trade all my books for a broken pen? Alright, fine. You got yourself a<U+0096>

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Stop! What are you doing?!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I was trying to get rid of all the books I don't need anymore.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: For that? Do you reaaaaally want that?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Well, not really, but I'm running out of library space, so<U+0096>

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Ohmygosh, ohmygosh, ohmygosh! I can't believe that almost happened! But luckily, it didn't happen, thanks to me.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: What are you talking about?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Y'know, if you want to go check out the rest of the Exchange and trade whatever you brought...

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Nope, I just came to pony-watch! I'm not going anywhere. I won't let you make a mistake like that again! Hey, everypony, step right up! Do not walk! Gallop over here for your chance to trade for authentic, one-of-a-kind, official princess merchandise!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Well, that took forever.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I just hope it looks okay.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Oh no! The pony we're supposed to trade the chicken statue to didn't tell us what kind he wanted! Okay, look. I'm fast. I'll fly over to the lamp stand and find out what kind of chicken he wants. Just don't let anypony trade for any chicken while I'm gone, okay?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Um, well, okay! Um, I can do that, I think. [to Crusoe Palm] Um, well, maybe you shouldn't get one of those? You know... unless you really want to...

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: [groans] Beat it! You go. I'll stay here.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Well, since we can't both get what we want, I will be the better friend. You take our trade goods and get what you want.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I'm an amazin' friend! So even though it's for somethin' that don't seem valuable at all, you take our stash.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: How dare you let me get what I want. What kind of friend do you think I am? You are going to get what you want!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: No, you are!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: No, you are!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: These books made Twilight the princess she is. Before that, she was nothing <U+0096> a big, fat zero!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Hey!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Then she read these books, and voila! Princess! So who wants to start the bidding?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Uh, just a moment, please! Pinkie, I appreciate your help and all, but I'm not sure I'm comfortable with this. Nopony should trade for my books just because I'm a princess. I'm not better than anypony else!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: [hushed] I know you're not better than everypony! Just leave this to me! [to crowd, normal] Did I mention that Princess Twilight got these books from Princess Celestia?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Oh, that's right! Double princess!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: There he is!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Look, I know it's your break and all, but you've gotta open your stand so we can trade you for a lamp!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Oh come on, please?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Pretty pretty please?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: But the Exchange ends at sundown!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I've got an idea. Next! Next! Next! Next! Next!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: We're home free!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: As long as this thing doesn't drown us in slobber.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Oh, he's just an affectionate little two-headed fellow. Aren't you, little boy?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: No, I insist. You go fetch what you want, 'cause that's the kind of tried and true friend I am.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Well! I am way too generous to let you out-friend me like that!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: We gotta hurry! [gasps] We're never gonna get to the Daring Do stand through this crowd in time!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Come on!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: My bear call!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: We gotta go!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Of course. It's just a bear call. There's nothing I could have traded it for that's more valuable to me than you.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: [sighs] Okay, the Exchange is almost over, but we did it. We traded a crystal chalice for an antique chicken...

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: And the chicken for a lamp...

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: And the lamp for an Orthros, just like you asked.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: So there you go! Now where's my book?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: But... what do we do now?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Oh goodness, oh goodness!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Argh! Ugh...

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Good boy!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Hey! You said you wanted an Orthros!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: There, there, that's a good Orthros. You just have to know how to train them. With a little patient training and a big slobber mop, they can be a wonderful household pet.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Yes!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Gosh, training an Orthros takes a long time. I'll probably be gone from Ponyville for... I don't even know how many moons! But... if that is what you really want...

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Of course it's a deal! Yeah-eah, whoo! [squeals] I did it, I did it! Fluttershy, can you believe it? Oh no. what did I do?!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Who's got something valuable enough to trade for Princess Twilight's princess books that she got from Princess Celestia? Did I say "princess"?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Oh, come on! These are the books the princess would sit up with all night, with nothing to read by but the light of her own horn! Ooh, now that looks fun<U+0096> but not fun enough! These are the books that made Twilight the princess she is! So who's got what it takes to trade for them?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Oh, yes, they are.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: But I thought you wanted to get rid of them!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: None of those ponies had anything valuable enough to trade for my books. Not because these books belong to a princess, but because they helped make me who I am. Just like you said. This was the one I was so absorbed in the day Spike decided he owed Applejack a life debt. And this one reminds me of the day I got it <U+0096> which was the day I met you. I may not ever need to read these again, but that doesn't mean they don't have value. I realize that now, thanks to you, Pinkie.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I told you I'd take care of everything!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Twilight! I need you to say a trade wasn't fair! Fast!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I've heard what you both have to say, and I'm sorry, Rainbow Dash, but my hooves are tied. You said it was a fair trade.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Yeah, I said it, but I was wrong! I did want that book, a lot. I said I wanted it more than anything in all of Equestria. But there's no thing that's worth as much to me as a friend. I might have forgotten that for a little bit, but it's true. Which means there's no way this trade can be fair!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: [in distance] Woo-hoo!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I know it's not the pie tin you were after, but I hope you like it. It's the rustiest piece of junk I could get.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Well, I took my half of our stash and got you this!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Ohhh!

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: And I know you're gonna love it, 'cause you already have a bunch of ones that look exactly the same sittin' in the drawer doin' nothin'. So that should settle it once and for all which of us is the better friend.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Oh, come on! You both gave up what you wanted to get something for each other! That's the coolest thing a friend can do. Trust me, I know.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Hey, where's your double-doggie?

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: I traded it for something way better.

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: Well, what do you know? My copy of Daring Do and the Sapphire Statue. It's just a beat up old paperback, not a one-of-a-kind first edition...

title: Trade Ya!
dialog: [gasps] Even better, because I can read this one with all my friends!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Hear ye, hear ye! The Ponyville Foal and Filly Fair is almost ready to begin!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Just because the attendees are young, doesn't mean they don't deserve my very best creative work. Why, this puppet theater is going to be the talk of the Foal and Filly Fair!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: How could it not be? [dreamily] You're the one making it...

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Oh! But I couldn't have done it without the help of one of my dearest and most supportive friends! You are my favorite dragon.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Your favorite dragon? Aw, gee...

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: The hours have been long, the work taxing beyond compare, but it will all be worth it when we hear those three little words!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Awful?!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: I don't know what that guy was talking about. This thing is perfect!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: So that puppeteer didn't like your exquisitely crafted best puppet theater in the history of puppet theaters puppet theater. [beat] You can just contribute something else to the Foal and Filly Fair.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Argh, there's gotta be something in here somewhere.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: It's not "who", it's "what"! Like, what can help Rarity make something in time for the fair? She really, really, really wants to make a creative contribution. She said I'm her favorite dragon, so it's up to me to come through for her in her time of need. There's gotta be some kind of spell that'll do the trick.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Come on, help a dragon out!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Ugh! It's not for me! It's for Rarity! The one who made you that bow tie you like so much?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Okay, I get it.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: You don't think we should use magic<U+0096> What is that?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: What? If I wasn't supposed to have it, it wouldn't be so easy to get. And it's covered in spikes, like me.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: "Inspiration Manifestation: Instantly brings ideas to life."

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: I'm likin' the looks of this one. Hmmm.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Rarity!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Leave me be! Can't you see how distraught, disappointed, and downtrodden I still am?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: But I brought you something.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Unless it's another carton of vanilla oat swirl or word that the festival has been cancelled, I don't think I'm interested.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: It's magic!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Spike, precious scales, I already have magic.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: But not the kind that can help you create something in time for the fair. This can!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: I suppose it's worth a try. "From in the head to out in the world, every thought to action. Hold close this book and through its spell, you'll start a chain reaction. Projecting forth whatever beauty you see. Only when true words are spoken will you finally be set free."

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Did it work?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Hm, there's only one way to find out.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: [gasps] Oh, my! I thought about making this a much more beautiful spell book, and I have!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Dear, dear Spike! Here I was about to give up, but like a true friend, you've come through with flying colors! Come! We must find the puppeteer right away, so that I may provide him with the most fabulous theater he's ever imagined! Or, should I say, that I've ever imagined.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Oh, but I think you'll find the new one I've created will be much more to your liking!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: As a matter of fact, she used a s<U+0096>

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: A good designer never reveals her tricks.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Thank you again, Spike, for being such a dear friend and finding this book for me!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: My pleasure. Well, guess I can return it now that the fair's over.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Oh, yes, of course. I've made my creative contribution as I'd hoped to do, and all is well! Uh, then again, perhaps I should keep it just a skotch longer... You don't mind, do you, Spike?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Of course not! See you tomorrow! [to Owlowiscious] What? She'll keep it for a few more hours, no harm in that.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Rarity?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Whoa!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Spike, I'm so glad you're here!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Whoa! Are... you okay?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Oh, I've never been better! This book you've given me is amazing! Why, I, I, I, I've been up all night just creating and creating and creating and creating! I've completed my fall line for the next fifteen seasons!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Wow!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: But then I started thinking, 'why stop there'? Oh, Spike, I've always thought this town of ours could use a few beautifying upgrades, and with this book, I can make that happen with such ease! You will support me in this endeavor by letting me keep the book just a little longer?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Of course I will!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: [panting] What do you say we get a little breakfast before we get started?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: No time for breakfast! I want to get started right away!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Technically, we do have time, because with that book held close, you can just make things<U+0096> Rarity?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Now, this is exactly what I'm talking about! Why, that cart hasn't an ounce of stylish flair!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: My eyes playin' tricks on me again?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: What in rhubarb pie just happened?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Isn't it gorgeous?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: It's amazing! You should ask Applejack if she wants you to give all the Apple family carts a makeover!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Oh, I don't really think I need to ask permission, darling. Everyone loves surprises, especially when they're gorgeous ones!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: You're right! Everypony does love surprises.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: [hushed] We shouldn't even tell anypony that it's me who's behind all the fabulous changes I'll be making! [giggles] Won't that be a fun little secret for the three of us to share?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: The... three of us?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: You, me, and the book, of course. My marvelous, marvelous book!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: ...Of course.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Promise me you won't say a word to anypony?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: [muffled] You got it!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: I knew I could count on you, Spike. And I also know just what I want to do next!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: I've always thought Rainbow Dash could use a little more glamor, and now look at her! Cloud-busting with style! [short laugh] Moving on!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: She'll be fine. It's just a dress. Uh, wait for your favorite dragon!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: La la-la la-la la-la la la... There you go, Mr. Robin!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Don't you look so content in your little house<U+0096>

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: [gasps] Oh, my goodness!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: You're lost? No, not that way, that looks like it's the door to a... bedroom. Try that one over there. No, no, that leads to a...

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Shoe closet? Oh, dear. Maybe try the staircase? Oh, no-no-no, the other staircase.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Isn't it gorgeous?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: It's probably the most beautiful birdhouse ever created.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Go on.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: I'm just not sure how the bird feels about it.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Pfft, what does a bird know about architectural design? What matters is what you think, Spike. And you love it. Don't you?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Of course I do. It's so... [beat] Rarity.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: It is, isn't it? Ooh!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Oh, adorable! But it could use a touch of class, don't you think?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Oh yeah, definitely.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: This party doesn't even seem to have a proper theme. Let's do something about that, shall we?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: You've already made things look really really great. Maybe you should stop while you're ahead?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: You're right, Spike! There's so much to do elsewhere!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Right! Elsewhere...

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Just one more little thing before we go...

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Why, this party is certain to make the society page now. Won't Pinkie Pie be pleased?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Happy, happy day to<U+0096> huh?!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: I am simply buzzing with ideas. Simply buzzing!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: That's great! But, uh, you've been at this for a while now. How 'bout you take a break? Give that brilliant mind of yours a rest?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Don't be silly! I'm not going to stop now! Why, I won't stop until every inch of Ponyville has benefited from my creative vision! Starting with you, Spike!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: You look fabulous!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: All because of you, heh...

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Anything for my favorite dragon and most supportive friend. Come, there's so much more to do!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: [gasps] Oh no, not you too!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: What do you mean, not me too?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Oh. Judging by that outfit, I thought for sure you'd<U+0096>

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: What? This? I just wanted to try out a new look.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: You like?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Hmm... Well, in that case, have you seen anypony suspicious around?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Uh, nope.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Princess Twilight, the gazebo has been turned into solid crystal, and two ponies are now trapped inside its walls!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: No! I made a promise to Rarity to keep this to myself!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: [sighs] But you're right, Owlowiscious. I have to tell. And once I do, I can forget Rarity thinking of me as her most supportive friend... I can forget Rarity thinking of me as a friend at all...

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: [sighs] I can't do it. I promised I'd keep all of this between the three of us!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Of course it's weird she meant her, me and the spell book. But<U+0096> The spellbook! Of course! If I can get it away from her, I bet she won't be able to use its magic anymore! Oh, come on, it's the perfect plan! I... just have to figure out which way she went.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: I'm thinking she's headed this way.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: [giggling] What do you think you're doing?!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Uh, me? I was just, uh... basking in your creative radiance.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Oh, Spike, you do say the nicest things.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Thanks.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Now, where was I? Oh yes! Gold-plated rooftops for everypony!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Spike!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: I have just had the most marvelous idea!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: [gulps] [gasps] Of course you have. You're Rarity.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: My work here in Ponyville is nearly complete. Don't you think it's time the rest of Equestria benefited from my creative vision?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Absolutely!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Oh, yeah, we should definitely go by<U+0096>

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Huh?! How... how did you... do that?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Why, whatever do you mean?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: The book! It's<U+0096> I mean<U+0096> you don't<U+0096> it's gone! The book is gone!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Why would I do anything with your book? We're friends! It... it was probably the owl!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: But, wait... I don't seem to need it anymore, do I? Yes... yes...! I can feel its magic flowing within me now! I'm so excited! I'm so excited!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: [quietly] I'm so scared.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Oh, the places we'll go, Spike! Manehattan, Fillydelphia, Canterlot! And there you'll be by my side, just as you've always been here in Ponyville, your constant praise and adoration driving me to even greater heights, until there isn't an inch of Equestria that hasn't been utterly transformed by my creative genius!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: What did you say?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: I said 'no'. You've been changing things, but you haven't been making them better. I should have told you the truth at the very beginning, but I didn't because I was trying to be a supportive friend. [sighs] But instead, I let you become something awful.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Awful?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Ugh... what happened?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Rarity! You're okay?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: I... I think so... though by the looks of it, something quite terrifying has happened to Ponyville.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: You happened.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Me?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: The last part of the spell!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: [flashback] Only when true words are spoken will you finally be set free.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: The spell took over you, and you wanted to change everything in Equestria. I was afraid to tell you how I really felt about it, but then I... I told you the truth.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Dearest Spike, you should never be afraid to tell me the truth. We're friends, remember?

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Today I learned how important it is to be honest with your friends when they're doing something that you don't think is right. A true friend knows that you're speaking up because you care about them.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: Spike. Never, ever, ever, ever take another book out of the library at the castle without asking! Princess Cadance and Princess Luna have much better things to do than help me clean up Ponyville! Do you have any idea how hard it was to reverse that much dark magic?!

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: [chuckles] You don't look so good.

title: Inspiration Manifestation
dialog: What? I'm just being honest! It's what good friends do!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: This just got real!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Listen up, gang! We're almost there, so I've got a few things to say. First off, who here besides me thinks this is the best Equestria Games delegation in Ponyville history?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Yeah!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: And no matter what your sport is, we gotta give it our best, because we've all got a genuine shot at Ponyville gold!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: ...With the possible exception of Bulk Biceps, Fluttershy, and me. I mean, we're good and all, but we're up against the Wonderbolts in the aerial relay, so gold's kind of a stretch. Let's not kid ourselves.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Don't feel bad, Rainbow Dash! We have absolutely no shot at getting gold either!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Uh, that's because you're carrying the flag for Ponyville in the opening ceremony. There are no winners.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Winners or not, we still have the chance to be awesome!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: That's the spirit! You hear that, everypony? Winners or not, we all still have the chance to be awesome!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: But, uh, let's still try to win lots and lots of stuff too, 'kay?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: [straining] It's all in there, gang! Leave it to Spike, champion gear-carrier for all your gear-carrying needs.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: And the Ponyville flag? You sure? And what about the flagpole?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: In with the portable ramp! Whoa!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Give it a rest, Apple Bloom.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Aw, she's just nervous, that's all. Perfectly understandable. Whenever I'm afraid I'll forget something or start to panic, I have a simple trick. I count to ten, and by the time I'm done, I've calmed myself enough to get the job done right every time. Easy-peasy, cider-squeezy!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Hey! Put me down!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: What's going on?!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Spike! Are you all right?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Huh? Who the what now?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: [to guards] Thanks for bringing Spike to us. [to Spike] It's okay, Spike. We'll have our hoofponies go back for your bags.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Uh, can they hang back a second and tell me what's going on first?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: [eating] Mm! So the ponies here think I'm some kind of hero, huh? [to Fleur De Verre] More of the green ones, please? I like the green ones.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Last time you were here, you got the Crystal Heart to Princess Cadance in time to save this entire empire from destruction!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: You are known throughout my empire as "Great and Honorable Spike the Brave and Glorious".

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Isn't that awesome? You're a big shot here, Spike! See that? That's you!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: [a la Barbra Streisand] Hello, gawgeous!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: This is why we all hope you do us the honor of lighting the torch at the opening ceremony. You'd be the very first dragon in the history of the Equestria Games to do so.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Places for the procession, everypony! Two minutes!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: I stand where you tell me until you give me the signal, and then I walk over and light the torch.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Now, please welcome the delegation from Ponyville!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Awesome!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Yay.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Yeah!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: [inhales] [coughing] Come on, Spike! Calm yourself! Count to ten. One... two... three... thousand... fourteen thousand... Twenty thousand...! Thirty thousand...!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: What's wrong?

title: Equestria Games
