dialog: [inhales] [weak breath] Tell me this isn't happening...

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Equestria, we have a problem.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: I don't know what it is, but I just don't have the stuff today! Did you bring a match?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: [coughs] [raspy] Then some cough drops, maybe?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Somepony go down and help him!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Phew!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: I'm... not sure.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Let the games begin!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Oh! There are our little superstars! You were fabulous!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Made me sit up proud like a cornstalk in August!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Ya done good, squirt!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: You three really were wonderful. But does anypony know what was going on with Spike?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: He sure seemed to be having a tough time of it out there.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: He put things right in time, though.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Actually, it was me. I didn't want him to be embarrassed, so I cast a secret spell to light it for him.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Oh, dear. Have you told him?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: No, but he might have figured it out on his own.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: You gotta tell him, just in case.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: I know. I'm just afraid of how he'll take it. I know what pride he takes in a job well done.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Psst, here he comes now! Act casual! [to Spike] 'Sup?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Spike! Is everything okay?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: I guess. I don't know. The weirdest thing happened down there.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Yeah, about that. I<U+0096>

title: Equestria Games
dialog: I mean, there I was, trying to light the torch, with all of Equestria watching, and feeling like the hugest failure ever, and then the thing just lit! It was amazing!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Oh, phew! I was afraid you'd be upset.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Upset? Are you kidding? Why would I be upset to discover I can light fire... with my mind?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Sure!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: [whispering] Spike, may I have a word with you a moment?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Hey, you'd better be careful with that! It might burst into flames later! Delayed reaction. Hey, Twi, what is it? Hold on, hold on, give me a second... If I can set fire to stuff with my mind, mind-reading must be just around the corner! And I predict that you are about to ask me... to set fire to something with my mind!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: No, because you can't!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Oh, really? So how do you explain what happened down there in front of thousands and thousands of<U+0096>

title: Equestria Games
dialog: I did it, Spike. I cast a spell to do it for you.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: In front of... thousands and... thousands...?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: I'm sorry, Spike. I just couldn't stand to see you stuck like that! You understand, don't you?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: I... I... I need to be alone right now.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Spike?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Sorry. You should probably ask somebody special instead.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Our next event... [amplified, some distance away] ...the aerial relay!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: That's Dash and Fluttershy!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Oh, no! We can't be late for that!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Hmph!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: [chewing] [swallows] If Ponyville medals here, we'll have eight medals so far, putting us tied for the lead with Cloudsdale! Unless Cloudsdale medals here too...!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Ms. Harshwhinny? I know you're really busy, but...

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Maybe there's something else I can do for the Games. Y'know, something really worthy of the Crystal Empire's admiration?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Uh, well, actually, that wasn't really<U+0096>

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Wait, that's it!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: We got silver!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Congratulations to all our medalists. And now, the anthem of<U+0096>

title: Equestria Games
dialog: And I shall do the honor of singing!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: [to Spike, hushed] Spike, what are you doing?!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: You know how they always just play the music? [amplified] Well, I know all the words to our anthem, and will sing them for you now, loud and proud, to the enjoyment of all!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: And now... um... the Cloudsdale anthem, as sung by... Spike!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Wait! The Cloudsdale anthem?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: [hushed] They only play the anthem for the winner, Spike! The Wonderbolts are from Cloudsdale!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: But... But I don't know the words to the Cloudsdale anthem! I've never even heard it!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: [clears throat] [singing out of time and rhythm] Oh, we're the Wonderbolts and we're super fast And we're from Cloudsdale which-is-a-part-of-Equestria<U+00A0> [laughs nervously] That we like best and we're proud and we're fast and we like it because it really has nice trees Yeah, we love the town because it's so cool and, and we like to fly really fast and everything like that [sighs] I kinda wish this was over 'cause it is... n't... yet... over... now.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Nailed it!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Spike, you comin'?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Nah, I got this stuff to pack up.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: But you've been moping in here for almost the entire Games.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: And tonight's the closing ceremony!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Which means we leave tomorrow. Ergo, the packing.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: And so the Games conclude as they always do, with the ice archery finals! Ice archers, take your places!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Too bad Ponyville doesn't have any ice archers competin'. We don't have anyone to root for.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: That's okay. Ponyville has thirty seven medals, and Cloudsdale thirty six, so looks like we'll be medal champs of the Games anyway! Woo-hoo!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: But Cloudsdale has two ice archery finalists down there now! If they both place, Cloudsale wins the medal count!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: So you're saying that it all comes down to this one event?!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Pretty much.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Omigoshomigoshomigoshomigosh! Twilight! Come take this extra seat next to me and freak out over the medal count! I'll show you how: Omigoshomigoshomigoshomigosh!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Actually, I was looking for Spike. Have you seen him?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: He wouldn't come.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: We tried to talk him into it...

title: Equestria Games
dialog: ...but he wouldn't listen!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: You can have his extra seat, though. Uh... Twi?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Spike?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: You here?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: [chokes] Uh, yeah! I'm super-busy! Look at all this packing left to do, heh. Crazy, right?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: No more hiding out. You're coming with me. Now.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Okay, fine. I'll come. Can I at least wear these?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Those aren't your average arrows. They freeze whatever part of the target they hit. Whoever encases their entire target in ice first wins. Keep your eye on number seven from Cloudsdale <U+0096> he's the favorite.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Honestly, Spike, I don't see why you're being so hard on yourself.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: I let everypony down. Twice. You never let anypony down, so you don't have any idea what that's like.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Are you kidding? I've totally let ponies down. That's not the point. The torch got lit, the aerial relay teams got their medals -- no harm, no foul.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Can we at least watch from inside there? I'm not sure I'm ready to face crowds in the stands just yet.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: No!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Steer it towards the field, away from the crowds!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Somepony cut the disabling spell!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Dash, Fluttershy! Move!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: That was awesome!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: I just wanted to thank you personally for saving those ponies and the Games, O Great and Honorable Spike the Brave and Glorious. You must be very proud.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: I guess.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: I just saw what needed to be done and reacted. Just so happens I can breathe fire and... if any of you could do that, you'd have done the same.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Forgive me for bein' blunt, Spike, but you're not makin' a lick of sense.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Well, it's just how I feel.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Wait a second. I think I get it. You keep saying you let everypony down, but we all keep saying you didn't. You know who's disappointed in you, Spike? You. And only you can make it right with you again. What would that take, Spike?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Meh, I don't know. Can you turn back time? 'Cause I'd sure like a do-over on that opening ceremony.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: We can't turn back time, but, would you do me the great honor of lighting fireworks in my place at the closing ceremonies tonight?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Come on, Spike. You saved the Crystal Empire twice! I think you can light some fireworks.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Mm, I guess I have to at least give it a shot.

title: Equestria Games
dialog: We did it! Ponyville won the medal count, and only by one medal!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Hmm, wonder which medal that was? Bam!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: How does it feel to have opened the best Equestria Games in Ponyville history, squirt?

title: Equestria Games
dialog: Probably as good as it feels to close them!

title: Equestria Games
dialog: You know, it's kinda weird. No matter how many times others tell you you're great, all the praise in the world means nothing if you don't feel it inside. [inhales] [breathes fire] Sometimes to feel good about yourself, you gotta let go of the past. That way, when the time comes to let your greatness fly, you'll be able to light up the whole sky.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Seems like only yesterday I was saving this place from being totally destroyed. Hey, you guys remember that?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: You only mentioned it about fifteen times on the train here.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: [sarcastically, to Rainbow Dash] Yes, and we never hear a peep out of you about your exploits.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Heh, point taken.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I'm glad you all wanted to come, but I don't think it's gonna be that exciting. I pretty much just have to smile and wave as the dignitaries arrive.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Yes, but you get to smile and wave like a princess.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: How exactly is that different than smilin' and wavin' like not a princess?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: It isn't.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: What's wrong, Twilight?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Why the looooooooong face?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I've just been feeling a little unsure about things lately. It doesn't seem that my new role as a princess equates to all that much.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: That's just silly. You've got a real important role in Equestria.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Princess Celestia wouldn't have asked you to come today if she didn't think so.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I guess you're right.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Of course we are. Now hurry along! You don't want to risk having that important role diminished because you were tardy for your regal meet-and-greet.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Of course.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Is there anything else I can do to assist with their visit?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I'm sorry, Twilight, but their visit is already over.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Oh.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Something wrong?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I guess I just don't really understand why I'm here. Couldn't one of the royal guard have unfurled the banner?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Having all four of us in the Empire to greet them lets the dignitaries know that their visit is considered an important one.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Plus, it gives me an opportunity to see my favorite sister-in-law.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: And I'm happy to see you. All of you.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: But...?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: But I... well, it's just that Princess Luna raises the moon, Princess Celestia raises the sun, you protect the Crystal Empire, and all I seem to do is... smile and wave.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: It isn't that I'm ungrateful For all the things that I've earned, For all the journeys I have taken, All the lessons that I have learned

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Your destiny's uncertain And that's sometimes hard to take But it will become much clearer With every new choice you make

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Patience is never easy I understand wanting more I know how hard it is to wait To spread out your wings and soar

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: But you stand here for a reason You're gifted and you are strong That crown is upon your head because You belong

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: We understand you wanting more A chance to shine, a chance to soar

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Soon will come the day it turns around

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: You are a princess; you'll play your part

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Your time will come.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Sister, are you alright?!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I've just had the most terrible dream.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Why do you think I'm here? You know as well as I that this was not a dream, but a vision.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Then we haven't much time. The stronger he becomes, the more we are all in danger.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: [narrating] Tirek and his brother Scorpan came here from a distant land, intent on stealing Equestrian magic. But Scorpan soon came to appreciate the ways of Equestria, even befriending a young unicorn wizard.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: [narrating] Scorpan urged his brother to abandon their plans. When Tirek refused, Scorpan alerted us to Tirek's intentions.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: [narrating] Scorpan returned to his own land, and Tirek was sent to Tartarus for his crimes. But it appears he has found a way to escape.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: We believe it happened when Cerberus left his post at the gates.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: But that was a long time ago. Why is he just now starting to steal magic?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: His time in Tartarus left him very weak. He has just now gained enough strength to use his dark powers.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: But with each passing moment, he grows stronger still.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: And I know just the princess who can stop him.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Yes. I'll find him and<U+0096>

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: No, Twilight. I'm afraid I must call in another to stop Tirek. Discord.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: ...As in Discord Discord?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Yes!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I don't think it's that big of a surprise. He can be very helpful.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: He can sense when there's a magical imbalance. The next time Tirek steals magic, Discord will be able to track him down!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: So what are you supposed to do in the meantime?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: [sighs] Nothing. Unless of course one of you needs me to smile and wave.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Where are you going?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: To the Castle of the Two Sisters. I'm not really needed anywhere else. Might as well catch up on some of my reading.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: You want some company?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: <U+00A0>It has been a while since we visited the castle. Might be fun!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Maybe I could use a little company right now.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: [sighs] I still can't believe we had to give back the Elements.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: It had to be done or the Tree of Harmony wouldn't have survived.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: But Twilight was right. Even without the Elements, our friendship is as strong as ever.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I just hope another 'friend' of ours never makes us sorry we had to give them up.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: [laughs] Oh, you're talking about me, I presume?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: How'd you guess?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: My ears were burning.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: What are you even doing here, Discord?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Oh, just a bit of light reading before I head off on my extremely important mission. I suppose you all know that I've been tasked to capture a certain escapee.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Big deal.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: You're right, Spike. It is a big deal. Seems I possess a magic that gives me quite an important role in Equestria. Maybe they should make me an Alicorn princess.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Mmwah! Mmwah!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: In your dreams!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Oh, I never dream of such things. Ask Princess Luna.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Don't you have a creepy magic-stealin' villain to track down?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Yes, yes, yes, of course. It's just that I couldn't help but notice that Twilight hasn't yet opened this little chest of hers. I-I-It got me thinking, what if what's locked inside is something that could help her prove her royal worth? I only bring it up because she said that she's been feeling like her role as a princess doesn't equate to much.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Wait a minute! How do you know how she was feeling?!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: [mock sadness] Oh, my. Is eavesdropping not the way you're supposed to find out what your best pals are up to? Woe is me. Will I ever learn the intricate nuances of being a good friend?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: [clears throat] Well in any case, I suppose now is as good a time as any for me to make my exit.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: And good riddance!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Oopsie-doopsie, I almost left with the little journal you've all been keeping. What a fascinating read. Haven't you girls just learned so much? I've bookmarked a few of the more interesting passages. You really should take a look! [to Fluttershy, hushed] We're still on for tea later, aren't we, Fluttershy?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I wouldn't miss it.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: [singsong] Well, I'll bring the cucumber sandwiches...!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Sometimes I think the 'reformed' Discord is more obnoxious than the 'before-he-was-reformed' Discord.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Indeed.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: But he could be right, couldn't he? What if there is something important in that chest?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: There's only one way to find out.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Anything?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: There must be something in this library that can help me figure out how to open it. The answer's in one of these books. I just know it.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Tirek, I presume?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Discord. You're free?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: As a bird.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I commend you on your escape.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Oh, I should have known you would want to have Equestria all to yourself.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Fluttershy? You're not saying you're friends with ponies?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Surprise!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I am surprised that someone with your intellect does not see this 'friendship' is but a new form of imprisonment. Clearly you've had to abandon your true nature to stay in their good graces.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I have done nothing of the sort!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Oh, please, I've seen this before. But he was always weak minded. You are Discord, you are legend, you cannot fall into the same trap that claimed my brother! Help me to grow strong, and be rewarded with something far greater than friendship. Freedom. Once I've stripped these ponies of their magic, nothing would give me greater pleasure than to see their world turned upside down. Who better to do so than the master of chaos himself? Join me, Discord, and reclaim your greatness. Unless, of course, 'pony errand boy' is the role you've always wanted to play in this world.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I think I found something! I've been reading our journal, and there's something interesting about the sections that Discord bookmarked. Applejack, do you remember when you had to tell everypony that the tonic Granny bought from the Flim Flam brothers didn't really work?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: How could I forget? It was one of the hardest things I ever had to do.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: [flashback] I hate to disappoint everypony, but there's no way Granny could have made that dive, because this tonic is a fake!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: [present] And in that moment, I knew I had to be honest. I just knew it. But what's that got to do with openin' the chest?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I've found that each of you has had to face a situation where living up to the Element of Harmony you represent wasn't easy. Fluttershy, it was when you realized that the way to show kindness to the Breezies was by forcing them to leave your home.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Oh, the looks on their poor little faces! But I knew that, as difficult as it was, pushing them away was the kindest thing I could do.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Rarity, even after Suri took advantage of your generosity at Fashion Week in Manehattan, you didn't let it cause you to abandon your generous spirit.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I simply couldn't have lived with myself if I didn't do something special for the friends who have always been so generous to me!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Rainbow Dash, you had the chance to fly with the Wonderbolts at the Equestria Games, but instead you chose to compete with your friends.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Sure! But being loyal to my friends was way<U+0096>

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Ooh, my turn, my turn!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Pinkie Pie, you realized that seeing your friend laugh was more important than proving you were a better party planner than Cheese Sandwich.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Best party I've ever had.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: It's clear we've all had our moments to shine, Twilight, but I'm with Applejack. What does any of this have to do with the opening of the chest?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: All of you had tough choices to make. But when you made the right one and embraced your element, it helped somepony else make the right choice too. Each of you received something from the pony whose life you helped change. I know it sounds crazy, but maybe there's something special about those objects that could lead us to the location of the keys. The chest is connected to the Tree of Harmony, the Tree is connected to the Elements, and the Elements are connected to all of us. There must be a connection! I hate to admit it, but maybe Discord was trying to be a good friend after all.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I don't see anything on them that would give us a clue as to where the keys might be. They're just... ordinary, everyday objects.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Come on, Boneless! Give us that key!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I don't think that's going to work.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: There's still one key missing. The key that represents the element of magic. My element.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Oh, but I'm sure that if we've gotten our keys, you have too, Twilight.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Think, Twilight. When have you completed a difficult magical task, and in doing so encouraged another pony to do the same?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I haven't. If I had, I would have written about it in the journal.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: What's it say?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: That I'm needed in Canterlot at once!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I came as quickly as I could! Is something wrong? Is it Tirek?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: I'm afraid I put too much trust in Discord and the effect that friendship would have upon him.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Discord has betrayed the ponies of Equestria and joined forces with Tirek.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: How could he do this?! I thought our friendship meant something to him! I thought he had changed.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Tirek has stolen enough magic that he now has the strength to steal flight as well. Without Pegasi to control the weather, there will be no rain in Equestria. There is word he has gone after Earth ponies as well. Without their strength, they will not be able to tend the land.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Ponies will no longer be in control of their world. That power will belong solely to Tirek.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: There is no doubt that Tirek is after Alicorn magic. With Discord by his side, we will not be able to stop him from taking it.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: Once it is in his possession, his power will know no bounds, and all hope will be lost.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1
dialog: But there is one solution. It is only by making this sacrifice that Equestria and the lands beyond it might be saved. We must rid ourselves of our magic before Tirek has the chance to steal it from us.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: What's wrong, Twilight?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: It doesn't seem that my new role as a princess equates to all that much.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I am Lord Tirek, and I will take what should have been mine long ago.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: With each passing moment, he grows stronger still.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: And I know just the princess who can stop him.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I'm afraid I must call in another to stop Tirek.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [laughs] Oh, you're talking about me, I presume?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Haven't you girls just learned so much?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: And there's something interesting about the sections that Discord bookmarked.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Each of you received something from the pony whose life you helped change.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: There's still one key missing. My element.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Join me, Discord, and reclaim your greatness.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Discord has betrayed the ponies of Equestria and joined forces with Tirek.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: There is no doubt that Tirek is after Alicorn magic.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: We must rid ourselves of our magic before Tirek has the chance to steal it from us.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Tirek is set on possessing Alicorn magic. When he comes for us, we cannot have what he is looking for.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I'm more than willing to do my part and give up my magic.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: You misunderstand. Our magic cannot just disappear into thin air. Somepony must keep it safe.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: That somepony is you, Twilight.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Why me?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: We do not believe that Tirek is aware that a fourth Alicorn princess exists in Equestria. If we transfer our magic to you, Tirek will not know where it has gone.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Do you understand what we're asking of you?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Yes. It's just... I'm only now learning how to control my own Alicorn magic. To take on even more<U+0096>

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Twilight, you represent the element of magic. If there is anypony who can do this, it's you.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Taking on this task will be one of the most difficult things I'll ever do, but with the help of my friends<U+0096>

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I'm sorry, Princess Twilight, but you must keep your new abilities a secret. I fear that your friends being aware of your new power could put them at great risk. Do you still think you can take on this responsibility?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: This is the role I am meant to play as a princess of Equestria! I will not fail to do my duty!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Then we must begin at once.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [shivers] That can't be right.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: What can't be right?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Nothing. Carry on.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [out of breath] It is done.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [snoring] You weren't gone very long. Does that mean everything's okay?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: In that case, I'm going back to bed. Sun's not up... and neither am I.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [hushed] That's strange. The sun should be up by now... [gasps] The sun should be up by now! [inhales, exhales] You can do this.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Shining Armor, why, whatever are you doing here?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Back off, traitor.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: The only one Discord betrayed was himself. Abandoning his true nature to make friends with weak-minded equines who offer him nothing!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [weakly] How... could you... do this...?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Why don't you go and have a little fun? I won't stand in your way.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [inhales] What have you done?! [inhales] Where is your magic?!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I have to gain better control. I sure can't practice here.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Uh, Twilight, [pants] where are we goin'?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Oh, uh, hi, Spike. Uh, gotta go... somewhere... else.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Waaaaah! Whoa!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Whoa! Twilight?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Yiiiipe!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Ooh!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Oh, my goodness, are you all right?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Jumpin' junebugs, Twilight! When did you learn to fly that fast?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I must have caught a particularly strong breeze... or something.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Must have been "or something", because there wasn't any breeze up there.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I don't know what happened, but I don't really have time to figure it out right now.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Another visit to the Castle of the Two Sisters, I presume? We'd be more than happy to accompany you!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Not today!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Tirek may still be a threat. I need you all to stay here and encourage everypony to remain inside.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Getting rid of your magic so that I cannot take it from you? That was your plan? How does it feel, knowing that soon, every Pegasus, unicorn and Earth pony will bow to my will, and that there is nothing you can do to stop it?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: You will not prevail, Tirek.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Give my regards to Cerberus.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: You meant our will, didn't you?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Of course. Here, I want you to have something. This was given to me by someone very close to me. I give it to you as a sign of my gratitude and loyalty.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Oh, my! I do love a good accessory. I suppose that's Rarity's influence.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [laughs] Amusing. But we have no time for such things. With the princesses out of the way, we can now<U+0096> is this meant to be humorous?!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Oh, no, I haven't touched that one yet.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: There's a fourth? And you did not tell me this?!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I just needed some assurance that you truly considered this a team effort. And now I have it.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Then where can we find this fourth princess? Where is her castle?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Not for much longer.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Alright, y'all. I think we've warned everypony to stay inside.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I'm sure Discord will catch Tirek and this will all be over soon.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I'll bet he takes his sweet time.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Or perhaps these things just take time.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [gasps] You're back! Did you bring the cucumber sandwiches?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I did. I imagine they'll be your last decent meal for quite some time.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Ta-da!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: You've gathered up all of them?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: And her little dragon, too.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [crying] Why are you doing this? I thought we were friends!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Oh, we were. But Tirek offered me so much more than just tea parties. Surely you saw this coming.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [crying] I didn't. I really didn't.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: You really think she'd do anything for them?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: If Twilight has magic to give, it will be yours. Soon there won't be a Pegasus, Earth pony or unicorn who will be able to stand up against us.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Us? Who said anything about us?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: You did.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: You've helped me grow strong, you've provided the means by which I can obtain Princess Twilight's magic, and now you are no longer of any use to me.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [weakly] But you said this was a sign of your gratitude and loyalty. A gift from someone close to you.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: My brother who betrayed me. It is as worthless as he is.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Surely you saw this comin'.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [weakly] I didn't. I truly didn't.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I can do this.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: See! Ha! Perfectly controlled teleportation<U+0096>

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Princess Twilight!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [gasps] Tirek!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: You have something that belongs to me!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Now I understand what your fellow princesses have done!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: It appears we are at an impasse. How about a trade, Princess Twilight? Their release for all the Alicorn magic in Equestria.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: What's it going to be, Princess?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [muffled] Don't do it, Twilight!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [muffled] We aren't worth it!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [muffled] Oh, but you are, Fluttershy. You're the pony that taught me that friendship is magic. I had magic and friendship, and now I don't have either.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Enough! I want an answer, and I want it now!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I will give you my magic, in exchange for my friends.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: As you wish.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: All of my friends.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: After the way he has betrayed you, you still call him a 'friend'?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Release him!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: If that's what you want.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Thank you, Twilight. [to Fluttershy, hushed] I'm sorry.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I know.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Your turn.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [roars] Yes!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Twilight, what were you thinking?!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Tirek tricked me into believing that he could offer me something more valuable than friendship. But there is nothing worth more. I see that now. He lied when he said that this medallion was given as a sign of gratitude and loyalty. But when I say that it is a sign of our true friendship, I am telling the truth.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: You think that might be the last one we need?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: We have to get to the chest.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Together! I think we have to do this together!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: How is this possible?! You have no magic!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: You're wrong, Tirek! I may have given you my Alicorn magic, but I carry within me the most powerful magic of all!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Sweet Celestia! Are you all seeing what I'm seeing?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: But... whose is it?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I believe it is yours, Princess Twilight.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: You've been wondering what you are meant to do as a princess. Do you know now?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: As princess, I believe I have the power to spread the magic of friendship across Equestria. That is the role I am meant to have in our world! The role I choose to have! But I didn't defeat Tirek on my own <U+0096> it took all of us to unlock the chest!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Then it is unlikely you are meant to take on this task alone.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Wowee!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: You are now Twilight Sparkle, the princess of friendship. But what is the princess of friendship without her friends?

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Wait a minute, where's my throne?!

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: I don't think you're quite there yet.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: [chuckles] Yes, well, I suppose not.

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Each one of us has something special That makes us different, that makes us rare

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: We have a light that shines within us That we were always meant to share

title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2
dialog: Let the rainbow remind you That together we will always shine

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Let's go through this one more time.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [sighs] We've been over it like a million times, Twilight! We found all six keys, defeated Tirek, and got this sweet castle! End of story!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Yes, but why?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I dunno, sugarcube. Maybe it's just your new house and there ain't nothin' more to it than that.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I must say, speaking strictly on aesthetics, there really doesn't need to be more to it. It's all simply divine!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I agree with Twilight. And Rarity. And Applejack. And Rainbow Dash. And Pinkie Pie. Oh, and probably Spike.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: As princess, I've been chosen to spread the magic of friendship across Equestria. So why would the Tree of Harmony want us to sit in a castle in Ponyville? It doesn't make any sense.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [groans] Is that new? I like it.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: This is incredible! It's got all of Equestria!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Hi, Mom and Dad!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But if this is Ponyville, why are our cutie marks over there?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I don't know. But it seems like the map wants us to find out. The Tree, the chest, this castle, and now the map. How can we not follow it?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Y'know what? There's a ton of room for dangerous adventure along that route. Count me in!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Aw, shoot, I reckon you're right.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well, I was planning on organizing my baking sheets, but okay!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [sighs] Very well.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Um, maybe I'll just stay here with Spike.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Awesome! Me and Big Mac have a huge weekend ahead of us talkin' hoofball, and... and trading hoofball cards, and arguing about hoofball stats...

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: O-o-on second thought, m-m-maybe I'd better go with them. In case they need me.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Looks like it's time for a road trip.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well, suit yourself. But he's got a Hock Fetlock rookie card I plan to sweet-talk right into these hot little claws.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: That's it! That's the place on the map!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Right. Let's get down there and find the spa.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Wait. We don't know why the map sent us here. We shouldn't just walk right in. It could be dangerous.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Yes!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Stay behind me, everypony! I'm on it!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Careful, Pinkie!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: This is where the map sent us? It looks like the most boring place in Equestria.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: It's just an ordinary village full of ordinary pony folk.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: It could certainly use a few more architectural flourishes. Or any architectural flourishes.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I think it's lovely.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I don't like it. I don't like it one bit. I know smiles. And those smiles? They're just not right.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Forget the smiles. Look at the cutie marks.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Okay, that's weird.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: An entire village with the same cutie mark? How can that be?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I bet there's some sort of horrific monster behind it.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: What makes you say that?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: 'Cause fighting a horrific monster would be super-awesome!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I reckon we just ought to head into town and talk to some locals, find out what's goin' on.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Great idea, AJ. Let's go!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Those smiles are bad news.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: This must be the most pleasant place in Equestria!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Ugh. Thanks a lot, map.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: That there's the Princess of Friendship!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: What brings you to town?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We're not entirely sure.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I see. Well, all are welcome here in our little village. My name is Double Diamond, and this is Party Favor.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Howdy, Double Diamond. I'm Applejack, and this here's Pinkie Pie, Fluttershy, Rarity, Rainbow Dash, and Twilight Sparkle.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And you all have your own unique cutie marks.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: If you don't mind, has there been any sort of... trouble here, lately?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Trouble? Why, I don't think we've ever had trouble in our little village.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Perhaps you'd care to speak to our founder Starlight Glimmer.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I wish everypony in Equestria was as friendly as these ponies are.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I've got my eye on them. Something's rotten in... whatever the name of this village is that we're in right now!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Starlight, we have some new visitors.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [to Applejack] Be ready to fight. We don't know what's gonna come through that door.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Welcome! I'm so pleased to have you here.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: This is Applejack, Fluttershy, Pinkie Pie, Rarity, Rainbow Dash, and Twilight Sparkle.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Forgive my bluntness, but I'm assuming it's Princess Twilight Sparkle? We don't get many Alicorns around here.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Yes, but "Twilight" is fine.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: So! How did you hear of our little village?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: It's kind of a long story. Let's just say we found it on a map.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Technically, it's a Tree-chest-castle-map!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well, however you found us, we're happy to have you! We're happy to have anypony who wants to experience true friendship for the first time.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Say what?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh, indeed. That's what's so unique about our village, you see. Around here, we don't flaunt our special talents because we don't have any special talents to flaunt.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Is that why you all have those cutie marks?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Perhaps it would be easier to understand if I gave you a tour of the village!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Heads high, ponies! Marching proud! [whistle blows] All together now! Every one of you! No pony left behind!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Let's see those big, happy smiles!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You see? Now everypony wins!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Other ponies argue Do you ever wonder why? When you think your talent's special You don't see eye-to-eye

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [laughing] You're kidding, right? Give up our cutie marks? No way!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Rainbow Dash, don't be so rude. I don't think we should judge them. They all seem perfectly happy with their choice.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Don't believe their smiles, Fluttershy.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I'm sorry, I guess we're just a little confused by all of this.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We have no judgements here in our village. Each of us was confused once as well, blinded by the false promise of our cutie marks.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Is she for real?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: When we were sent to this village, we assumed it was to help in some way. But, well, it doesn't seem like you need any help.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Have you considered perhaps that you might have been sent here so we could help you? After all, nopony has ever come to our village and wanted to leave. Why should you be any different? But that is entirely your choice. Please enjoy our little corner of Equestria. We're all quite fond of it. No doubt you will be as well. Double Diamond, please help our guests with whatever they might need.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Of course.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well, this will certainly provide a boost to our little community. When the rest of Equestria sees that a princess gave up her cutie mark to join us, they'll finally understand what we're trying to accomplish.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: A cutie mark is a representation of a pony's unique talents and skills. How is it possible to<U+0097>

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [gasps] What in the name of Equestria is that?!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [gagging] Wha<U+0097> Ooh, er, perhaps another time, good sir, thank you. [whispering] No wonder nopony's wearing anything!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed] Really, girls! They may do things a bit differently than we're used to, but that's no reason to be rude.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed] No, the reason to be rude is that they all keep staring at us!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Need something?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Uh, no! We're good! [hushed] Fluttershy's right. If we're going to get to the bottom of why the map sent us here, we'll need the help of these ponies.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I think we ran off to the end of Equestria before we even knew what that map was!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: If we were at the end of Equestria, we'd be sitting on a big 'A'! [giggles] Get it?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh, please, Miss Pie! This is hardly the time for jokes! We've come all this way and for what?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed] Maybe you're right. But we're here now, and it sure feels like something's wrong.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: That and two bits'll get you a cup of cider.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Is this a bad time?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We shouldn't be bickering like this in front of our new friends. Really, Applejack, you're almost as bad as Rainbow Dash!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Don't drag me into this!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Is your friendship ending?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Are you crazy?! We'd never let a disagreement get in the way of food!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: O-kay, well, my name is Sugar Belle. What can I bring you? We have: muffins...

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Then I guess we'll take six muffins!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Make that twelve! What? I'm hungry!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed] Come on, girls. We've got to stick together. It doesn't matter what happened before, we're here now.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I guess you're right. And the sooner we figure out why, the sooner we can go home.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Forgive me for overhearing, but just a moment ago you were disagreeing, and now it sounds like you're... agreeing.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Uh-huh...

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well, you had such differing opinions <U+0096> and cutie marks.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We have differing opinions all the time, darling.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But you look like you're friends.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We are friends. A simple disagreement wouldn't change that.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I'm sorry, I'm just having a hard time understanding. Different talents lead to different opinions, which lead to bitterness and misery. So... why aren't you bitter and...?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [choking] Blech! Mmmm... good...

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: It's all right. I know I'm not a very good baker. At least, I know I'm not any better than anypony else in the village. Well, I... hope you enjoy our little village!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed] Come inside before you go! Meet me downstairs!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Okay, that was weird too.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed] Let's all sit here and eat these muffins and act normal. I think we're being watched.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You think?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed] No, not like that! I mean somepony here doesn't want us talking to Sugar Belle.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I got an idea. But you gotta eat all of them muffins, Pinkie.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Me?! Why me?!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed] You got a stronger stomach than any of us, and that filly in there might be our best chance at findin' out what the hay is goin' on round here.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [stilted] I can't believe you ate all our muffins, Pinkie Pie! We'd best go inside and get some more!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Nice work, Pinkie.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I've accidentally eaten cardboard tastier than that...

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Hello? Sugar Belle?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Thank you for coming!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Why did you want us to come down here?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: So nopony could see what's about to happen.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I love your cutie mark!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh, look at this one! This one's great too! I'd love to have my special talent back even just for a day! Make something besides those disgusting muffins...

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: So what's stopping you? Go get your cutie marks back.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I'm not sure Starlight would like that. She wants us all to be happy in our sameness.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: How do you take somepony's cutie mark anyway?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But nopony should keep you from your cutie mark. It represents such an essential part of who you are.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Can we visit this cave?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I'm delighted you're interested in our cutie mark vault. We hope someday every pony in Equestria will make a pilgrimage here to our little village to have theirs removed too, and our message of [continues under] perfectly equal friendship can finally spread across the land.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed, over] This must be the reason we're here.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed, over] "Pilgrimaging"?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed] No, helping those ponies get their cutie marks back.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed] Oh, are you sure, Twilight? Maybe they miss them a little, but even they didn't seem all that unhappy.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed] Then why did they want to meet us in secret? And why did they ask us not to tell Starlight who told us about the vault? Something's not right.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Just through here! Behold! Our cutie mark vault!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I've never seen anything like it!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And here is the Staff of Sameness. It was one of the great Mage Meadowbrook's nine enchanted items. We are incredibly fortunate to have it here. This is the tool that allows us to free ourselves from our marks! I'm curious <U+0096> how did the subject of the vault come up?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh, some ponies were telling us how much they missed their cutie marks, and<U+0097>

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Pinkie!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oops...

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [gasps] Were they? Well, it seems you inspire all sorts of free thinking, don't you?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [laughs nervously] Well, w-we certainly didn't intend to cause any disruptions to your charming little<U+0097>

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Good. Let's just make sure of that, shall we?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: It's a trap!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Aw. I don't blame you for what you tried to do here today. You've spent your whole lives thinking those marks are a good thing.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Give them back!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 1
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well, now you can spend the rest of your lives here with us! And we'll teach you just how much better life can be without your cutie marks!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: As princess, I've been chosen to spread the magic of friendship across Equestria. So why would the Tree of Harmony want us to sit in a castle in Ponyville?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: This is incredible! It's got all of Equestria!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Why are our cutie marks over there?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Seems like the map wants us to find out.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: An entire village with the same cutie mark?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Welcome!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: This must be the most pleasant place in Equestria!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I'm delighted you're interested in our cutie mark vault.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: It's a trap!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Now you can spend the rest of your lives here without your cutie marks!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [slightly muffled, over loudspeaker] In sameness, there is peace. Exceptionalism is a lie.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Free yourself from your cutie mark. Choose equality as your special talent.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [voice fades under] Difference is frustration. To excel is to fail.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Hey, this is pretty good!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [under] Be your best by never being your best.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Ugh, we've gotta find a way out of here! I can't take much more of that voice!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: There, there, Rarity... It's not so bad...

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Yes, it is! Look at those drapes! I have no idea if they're tacky or not!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well, I think they're nice.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [crying] So do I!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh, thank goodness! Can you help us, little birdie?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Go on, now! Fly away and get us help!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh, even tweets don't make sense any more!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [grunts] This door's shut tighter than a... summer of...

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: ...uh, piglets in... shoot! I can't even make countryisms no more!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I don't know! Maybe it'll be super fun to be all the same!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Sort of. More pleasant than fun, I guess...

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Something odd about that staff. I haven't studied Eastern unicorns as much as I should have, but I'm pretty sure Meadowbrook only had eight magical items, not nine. And I don't remember any of them being a staff.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well, it looks like you'll have plenty of time to try to think about it.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I've got it!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I know how we can get out!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [sighs] Forget it, Twilight. This door's not opening.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And I'm afraid the windows are much too small for escape.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But there is a third way.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Of course! Eventually the wind and the weather will wear down the walls until they start to crumble! Then all we have to do is wait for a big enough hole to form and we can just walk out! It's the perfect plan!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I guess.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We don't actually have to escape. They'll just let us out when they think we've accepted their philosophy!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But they're never gonna believe we switched over in just one night.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: There's one of us they might believe.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh! Me?!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You've been saying how great this place is since we got here!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But that's because everypony's so nice and their village is so pretty, and, and... Oh, you're right. They probably would believe me. I hate to lie to them. They've been so welcoming and friendly... aside from locking us in here and trying to brainwash us into abandoning the things that make us special... Okay. I'll do it.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Woo-hoo! I mean, cool.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But what do I do once I'm out?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You've gotta find a way to get our cutie marks back.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [over loudspeaker] Oh, good morning!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I trust you had a pleasant night? This way, please. There are some friends who'd like to see you. Gather round, friends, gather round! We've come to ask if any of you are ready to join us! There are so many friends to be made once you realize you don't need your cutie marks or the talents that come with them.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We have a welcome ceremony for new friends! The whole village joins together to build you your own cottage<U+0097>

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Not interested! You may have them now, but we're going to get our cutie marks back!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Y'all don't understand, do ya? You can't force nopony to be friends! It don't work like that!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: It's all right, everypony. This is a perfectly normal part of the equalization process for those who haven't... quite seen the light yet. We'll try again tomorrow once you've had a bit more time to consider our philosophy!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I'd like to join!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Fluttershy? How could you?!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: If giving up my cutie mark means I get to stay in this lovely village with these lovely ponies, then I'll do it.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We have a new friend, everypony!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Now, there's one more order of business. It seems some in our midst might be... dissatisfied with the village life!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Unfortunately, it's all too true, my friends! [to Fluttershy] Will you kindly tell us the names of those friends who so desperately miss their cutie marks that they would sneak around in the shadows talking to strangers about it? Just so we can be sure your intentions are indeed pure.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Um, I don't know who they were. Um, I'm sorry. I don't know your names and faces yet.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Nonsense! Obviously these ponies must have asked you directly. Kindly point them out!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
