writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And you're quite certain it was only you?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And no thought to the pain you'd cause your friends. Such selfishness.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Don't worry. Fluttershy will have us out of here in no time!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: This guy's a barrel of laughs.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [flatly] Laughs don't come in barrels. They come from inside you as your body's response to delight.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [hushed] So what are we gonna do while Fluttershy's out there lookin' for our [whispering] cutie marks?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We have to stay as positive as we can. If Party Favor sees how much we really do like each other, even though we're all different, maybe we can use him to spread our message to the rest of the village.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Let's hope they don't convert any of us first.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Gosh, you really are the nicest ponies I've ever met.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Come. All new friends stay with me until their cottage is completed. Let's get you settled, and then you can enjoy all that our little village has to offer.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [coughing] Brrrrrr! [sighs] Get the cutie marks back. That's all you've gotta do, Fluttershy. Just sneak through the dark up to that spooky old cave with the scary magical staff and get the cutie marks back.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Okay, you're doing great. The cave's gotta be close now...

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Excellent work, Double Diamond.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Of course, but I don't understand why you wanted me to bring them here. Fluttershy is one of us now. Surely she can be trusted.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: This one belongs to a princess. It could be very important to our cause.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But if Twilight Sparkle becomes our friend, then why do we care about this old cutie mark?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I just want to keep them close until everything is... settled. You may go, Double Diamond.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh, dear. How am I ever going to get the cutie marks back now?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Ow!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Ugh! Starlight, you clumsy foal!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [gasps] Oh, no...

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I've got a good feeling about today! So, do any of you have anything you'd like to say? Aw, pity. Well, let's try this again tomorrow, shall we? No new friends today, I'm afraid!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Wait! I'd like to lock them in.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Marvelous, Fluttershy! That's the spirit! Party Favor, will you join us, please?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: It seems there's cause for celebration after all!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Such backwards thinking.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well done, Party Favor! We welcome you back with open hooves!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Um, Starlight? I think we might have one more friend joining us today.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Is this true?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I-I think so. But I just want to be sure. If I agree to leave my cutie mark in the vault, I'll really be happier?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Just look around! Equality has given us more happiness than you've ever known!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And you wouldn't let me just live here in the village with my old cutie mark?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Out of the question. A pony with a different cutie mark in our midst would destroy our entire philosophy. We are all equal here!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Then how do you explain this?!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I knew you couldn't be trusted! No! Get away!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Wha... What are you looking at?! They're the problem, not me!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You said cutie marks were evil! You said special talents led to pain and heartache!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: They do! Don't you see?! Look at them!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Then why? Why did you take ours and not give up your own?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I... I had to, you fools! How could I collect your cutie marks without my magic?!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: The staff is a piece of wood I found in the desert! It's my magic that makes all this possible! You'd all still be living your miserable lives thinking you're better than everypony else if it weren't for my magical abilities! I brought you friendship! I brought you equality! I created harmony!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You lied to us!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: So what? E-Everything else I said is true! The only way to be happy is if we're all equal!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Everypony has unique talents and gifts, and when we share them with each other, that's how rea<U+0097>

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: QUIET!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You can't have a cutie mark, Starlight! Either we're all equal, or none of us are!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Come on! Let's get our cutie marks back!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Come on! Let's go get our cutie marks!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Our cutie marks aren't in the vault! They're in there with her!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Stand back, everypony!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Even without my cutie mark, I can tell this is beautiful!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: They think they can come to my village and disrupt my life? Let's see how they like spending the rest of their lives without their precious cutie marks!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: They're gone! They were right over there!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Look!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: These are amazing!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: There's a whole network of caves up there! Your cutie marks will be gone forever!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Then let's get moving, y'all!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh, come on!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Are you all so willing to give up everything because of these strangers?!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We gave up everything for you, because we thought you were our friend!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I can't believe we have to count on these other ponies to save our cutie marks!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: If we hadn't come here to help them, they'd still be living under her rules! Now it's their turn to help us!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And I know they can do it!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: My newest recipe <U+0096> snow pie!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: She's gonna get away!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Whoa! These are my old skis! This is where I first met Starlight!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Feel like an air drop?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Yee-haw! Finally, I can buck like a five-bit snake herder in an Appleloosa ranch house again!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And you got your countryisms back, too!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Wh<U+0096> I studied that spell for years! How can you<U+0097>

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I studied magic for years too! But what I didn't know then was that studying could only take me so far. Each of my friends has taught me something different about myself! It was their unique gifts and passions and personalities that helped bring out the magic inside of me! I never would have learned that I represent the element of magic without these five! And I certainly wouldn't be here to stop you now!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Spare me your sentimental nonsense! I gave these ponies real friendships they never could've had otherwise!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: How do you know that?! You never even gave us a chance!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: She's getting away!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We'll never find her in there!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We just have to hope that when she's had a chance to think it over, she realizes that you all have taught her something.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Does that mean you'll stay in the village?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: This is a chance for all of us to get to know each other again for the very first time!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And I finally have a chance to bake something besides terrible muffins!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Now those are real smiles.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I'll never get used to that.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I think it's divine.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Does that mean that the map is calling us somewhere else?

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I have a feeling it means our work here is done.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Looks like you were right, Twilight. The map did have a reason for sendin' us here. We brought real friendship to these here ponies. Guess that's why you're the Princess of Friendship.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But the map didn't send me. It sent us. You're a part of me, all of you. And there's no doubt you're a part of my mission to spread friendship too.

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: This feels like an ending! It doesn't have to be an ending yet, right? 'Cause that Sugar Belle can bake!

title: The Cutie Map - Part 2
writer: Scott Sonneborn & M. A. Larson; story by Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Maybe we can stay a little while longer. Come on!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Phew! Thanks for helping me get them so fresh and clean, Twilight.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: No problem, happy to do it!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: You probably can't wait to get back to your castle and take your own bath, huh?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Aren't there more animals that need cleaning?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: I think you and I are the only ones left, and I can't wait to get the mud out of my mane.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Oh, no! Angel got dirty! I'd better stay longer to help give him a bath too!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Thank you ever so much for staying to give Angel a bath too, but, um... I think he's dry.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Goodness! It's gotten late! You really didn't have to stay all day. Not that we don't appreciate it. Isn't that right?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: I for one am exhausted. [yawns] Plus, I really need to rest up for that big pancake breakfast tomorrow. [beat] And I'm sure you have to get the castle ready.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: No! The castle's... fine! But maybe I'd better see if Pinkie Pie needs help with the pancakes!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [knocking] Um, Angel?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [gulps] Mm, these are delicious, Pinkie Pie!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [slurps, gulps] Thanks! Twilight spent all night helping me pick the flavor! I kept thinking we'd found the right one, but she insisted I make even more to try. And more. And more and more and more and more! It was like she never wanted to<U+0097>

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Leave?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Exactly! [chomp] Eventually we ran out of time so we just went with every-berry-any-chip-surprise! [to Rarity, hushed] The surprise is I lost a measuring spoon in the batter. Somepony's gonna get a very special pancake!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Up all night, huh? Is that why she's so, uh... out of it?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Um, I don't mean to sound unappreciative, but has anypony else noticed that Twilight has been a little too helpful lately?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Now that you mention it, she was lendin' a hoof at Sweet Apple Acres the other day and stuck around 'til near midnight. Dug up fifty tree-plantin' holes when all I needed was ten.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: She spent an entire afternoon rearranging a single gem drawer at the boutique. An entire afternoon!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: You think that's weird? She raced me, like, a hundred times the other day. And lost every time! She just kept goin'! Best out of ten, best out of twenty, best out of a hundred! I mean, I know hanging out with me is awesome, but it was like she'd rather keep losing than<U+0097>

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Leave?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Yeah. Who does that?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Somepony who's avoidin' somethin', that's who. Soon as she wakes up, we're gonna find out what.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [coughs] I win!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Huh?! I'm pancake! I mean, awake...

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Uh, Twilight? Is there somethin' you wanna tell us?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: You know how much we appreciate all you do for us, and we simply adore having you around... but... we worry you might be... ahem... avoiding something else?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Oh, has it been that obvious? I've been... the thing is... I know it's silly, but I... I've been avoiding... this place.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [gasps] Why in Equestria would you want to avoid such a gorgeous castle?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Yeah, this place has everything! Big tall ceilings that make you feel tiny! Shiny new floors that are cold to the touch! Brrr! And it even has loooong empty hallways!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Okay, I get it.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: The castle is amazing. But it just... [sighs] It doesn't feel like home.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [chuckling] Oh, is that all? Why, you simply need to decorate, darling. Make this space your own!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: It's just so daunting! Look how big it is! I-I don't even know where to start!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: You can start by letting us do it for you. We will make this the castle of your dreams while you go to the Ponyville spa for some much needed rest and relaxation. I'm saying this with love, but... have you looked in a mirror lately? I've never seen you look this... mmmm...

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Frazzled?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Yes! That is absolutely the word I was going to use.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Ooh, I guess I do need a little help. And so does my castle. And I just know you'll do a great job, because nopony knows me better than you.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: We'll make this place feel cozier than hot cider on a rainy day.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [gasps] There's gonna be cider?! [beat] Uh, I mean, let's decorate!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Oh, no! Did I miss the pancakes?!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: I sleep like a baby under that cold, cavernous ceiling.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Spike, I'm so glad you're here!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Really?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Yes! You're taking Twilight to the spa!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Come on, y'all! We've got work to do!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Let's all work together To make this castle shi-i-ine

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Once we add some sparkle It'll feel, it'll feel, it'll feel...

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Crates of apples an' bales o' hay Just makes ya feel at home

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Furry friends and some popinjays So she won't be alone

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: There's nothing like balloons and confetti To greet you every time you walk through the door

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: She'll need this and those Posters of all my heroes How could anypony awesome ever ask for more?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Bright curtains of flowing silk and lace

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: This picture of me winning a race

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Party cannons to give her a surprise

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Hoes and rakes and some more garden supplies

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Getting hugs from this nice, big, friendly bear

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Decorate with some gemstones bright and rare

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: More of this and that

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Don't forget the party hats

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: How could anypony awesome ask for more than that?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Let's all work together

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: To show that we have shown

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Princess Twilight Sparkle

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: We sure did... something.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [simultaneously] Together.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [simultaneously] All together.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [unconvincingly] Fluttershy, I love that you brought so many animals.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Are these your trophies?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: I prefer to think of them as everypony's trophies but with my name permanently etched onto them.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [unconvincingly] [laughs] My my, Applejack, bringing the outdoors inside, it's... earthy... What a lovely touch! [sniffs, heaves] Are these quilts vintage?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Hey guys, how do my claws look<U+0097>Sweet Celestia!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Oh, Spike! Are you and Twilight done already?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Don't worry, I ordered her the super-deluxe mane blow-out! She'll be a while. Man, this place looks terrible!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Thank goodness somepony said something!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: It's pretty bad, right?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: This place looks like a mishmash of knickknacks.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Hmm, I suppose it is a little cluttered.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: What are you guys talking about? I think it looks super fun!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Whee!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Oh! Oh, no! Please don't do that! If you all just take a deep breath and calm down<U+0097>

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: No! That bunting is embroidered by hoof! Don't you move one more paw!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Everypony, stop!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Okay, now it's a mess.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: What're we gonna do?!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: I dunno. But Twilight's blow-out won't take that long. If she was avoiding the castle before, she'll never set hoof in here now!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Come on, guys, we've gotta do something! Twilight's counting on us!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Spike, you've got to get back to that spa and stall her! Whatever you do, don't let her come home!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Like, forever? But we live here.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Anything for you, Rarity...

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Okay, we all agree the castle is too cluttered, right? So why doesn't everypony take one of their own decorations out and we'll see how it looks?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Spike, you're back! How do I look?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Great!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: And more importantly, how does the castle look?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Great?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: I can't wait to go home and see it!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Great! I mean, no! I mean, uh, I'm not... quite ready to go yet. Uh, why don't we have a massage? I was really hoping to get, uh... this thingy!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [reading] The 'Extra-strength-hot-stone-deep-tissue massage'?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [gulps] Yep!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: I think I'll just have a traditional massage, but you go for it.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Yeah! Let's do this, little dragon!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Come on, Rarity. Everypony has taken somethin' out except you.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Ooh, I know! I simply can't decide.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: How about this?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: No! Not that! Anything but that!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: How about these?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Oh, but those brighten up the whole room! They're my favorite accent!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Then let's lose the curtains! The room wouldn't need brightening if they weren't making it so dark!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Not them! They're my favorite too!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [growls] They can't all be your favorite! Okay, I'm taking down the portrait. We all know what we look like.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [huffs] Well, the room still looks a little bit cluttered, doesn't it? Perhaps I'll take down a poster or two. Only to be helpful, of course!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Okay, everypony calm down. I'm sure we can find a way to remove the clutter together.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: You're absolutely right, dear.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Hey, those are my warmin' quilts!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Fluttershy, tell your birds to stop pecking at my balloons!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: I guess they must not like being scared out of their wits by exploding confetti cannons or something.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: But we can't get rid of the cannons! I don't remember where I hid them.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Allow me to help.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Oh, no, I'll help you.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Not if I help you first!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [sighs] Great suggestion, Spike. I feel totally relaxed.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [joints cracking] Ow. Ow. Ow. Ow. Ow...

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: You want to hop on? Maybe I can get us to the castle faster.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [cracks] Ow! I mean... how... nice is this day? I was hoping we could take the scenic way back.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: I don't know.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Come on. Walking is good for post-massage circulation.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Really? I've never heard that theory.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [sighs] I really miss this place, Spike. We had so many wonderful memories here.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: We did, didn't we...?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Oh, Spike, I'm so sorry. Of course losing the Golden Oak Library was hard for you too. [beat] I've got an idea. Why don't we have the girls add some things to make the castle feel more like your home as well?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Really?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Hop on!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Ow! What are you doing?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: I, um... I just thought of what I want!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Oh, okay. What is it?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: It's a... well, I want a... it's... I kind of need a... a bed!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: I thought you said you sleep like a baby in the castle.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [scoffs] Everypony knows babies are terrible sleepers. Let's go!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: There! Now nothing is cluttering the castle!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: You're right. There is literally nothing cluttering this castle.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: What do we do now?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: I hate to be the bearer of more bad news, but it's almost sunset. If we don't figure this out soon, it's going to look like we didn't lift a hoof to help her!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Why is this so hard?! We're Twilight's best friends! This should be easy for us!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: She said it herself <U+0096> if anypony should be able to make her feel comfortable in her new home, it's us. If we can't do it...

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Then Twilight will be stuck living in a castle that makes her feel... sad!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Wow, Fluttershy! I didn't know you could be loud enough to echo!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Calm down, Pinkie. We just need to figure out what we did wrong so we can make it right.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Well, I didn't do anything wrong! I did exactly what I would do if this were my home!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: But it's not your home. It's Twilight's home!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Where she keeps all her Rainbow Dash trophies?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Touch<e9>.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Maybe we're all a little guilty of making ourselves feel at home instead of Twilight.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Come on, y'all. We just need to think about Twilight. What was it she'd loved about livin' in the Golden Oak Library?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Oh, everything! The books, the smell of books, the joy she felt from organizing books...

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Remember that time I crashed into all those books attempting my sonic rainboom after you guys just cleaned up? [laughs, sighs] That was good times.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Yeah, for you, maybe.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Oh, and Applejack, remember when we were stuck having a sleepover there? That turned out to be so much fun!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Remember the time it got blown up to smithereens?! Wait, no, that was the worst.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: We had a lot of good memories there, though. That's what made the Golden Oak Library home.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [gasps] That's it!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: How's that one? Too soft? Too hard? Too lumpy?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Um... Just right! I'll take it!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Oh, thank goodness. I thought you'd never find one you liked! Let's find a salespony and get out of here.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Sounds good to meee<U+0097>I... nn, um, uh, heh... did you hear that? [mimes squeaky springs] Too squeaky! Better keep looking!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [sighs] Maybe my plan won't work after all.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Of course it will, darling. I can see it! You and Fluttershy stay here. Rainbow Dash and Pinkie Pie, you come with me. We're going shopping! We'll meet back at the castle.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: It's not the things that ya gather 'round

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: It's not how much you own

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: The things that hold the meaning in your life Are the memories you've sown

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Hello? We're home!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Oh, I, uh... love what you've done with the place. You did such a good job of... preserving the integrity of the original design.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Aw, come on! It looks exactly the same! Do you know how hard it was to keep her from coming back here?! I never want to see another dust ruffle as long as I live!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Wait. Keep me from coming back here?

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [laughs nervously] It took a teensy bit longer than we thought.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: What really makes home feel like home isn't what it looks like. It's the memories you make when you're there.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: So we've made something that celebrates the memories we've made with you since you moved to Ponyville.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: The ornaments on the chandelier are reminders of all the fun we've had together.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: That one shows your party at the Golden Oak Library welcoming you to Ponyville!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: The time we shared donuts after the Grand Galloping Gala!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: We were hoping that being able to look at your beautiful old memories would inspire you to make new ones.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: And the best part of it is, it's made from the roots of the Golden Oak Library, so you'll never forget where you came from.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: It's exactly what the castle needed. And I am ready to make new memories here.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Then let's start right now with a new memory cake! Seven layer what's-that-flavor mystery surprise! These might be chocolate chips or they might be super-spicy black beans!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Let's go to the dining room. It's a little sparse, but [door opens] at least there's a table and chairs. Whoa! What happened in here? Last I checked, this place was empty!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: I couldn't help myself! It was just begging for the personal touch!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: Truth be told... I couldn't either. Your kitchen might have some rustic farm decor, Twilight.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: And there may or may not be some Daring Do posters up in your library.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: And some stuffed animals in your bedroom.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: What was that?!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [sighs] One of Pinkie Pie's confetti cannons.

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: What? It's not my fault I hid them so well!

title: Castle Sweet Castle
dialog: [simultaneously] Oh, Pinkie...

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Hear ye, hear ye! This meeting of the Cutie Mark Crusaders is now in session! Who wants to do roll-call?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I'm pretty sure we're all here.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Yeah. Apple Bloom, what's this all about?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Oh, nothin'... except this letter from Babs Seed sayin' she's got her cutie mark!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: She says it's a pair of scissors!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: So... she's good at cutting stuff?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Of course! She was always fussing with her bangs and tail! I'll bet she grows up to be a celebrity stylist!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: But if she spends all her time cuttin' hair, who's gonna run the Manehattan CMCs?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Well, not Babs. She can't be a Cutie Mark Crusader if she's already got her cutie mark.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Oh, wow. I guess you're right.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I'm glad she's happy, but I sure wouldn't want to be up to my flank in mane hair all day. Can you imagine getting stuck with a cutie mark you didn't like?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: No... or at least I hadn't...

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Don't worry, Apple Bloom. Most of your family has apple-related cutie marks. I bet yours will be, too. And what's not to like about apples?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: There's the core, and sour apples, and rotten apples, and apples with worms in them<U+0097> What?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Not helping.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I guess I just spent so much time worryin' about how to get a cutie mark, I never even thought about what would happen after. There's just so many things I never considered.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I'm sure there are, but you don't need to<U+0097>

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: What if I finally get my cutie mark and I don't like it? What if I get my cutie mark and nopony likes me?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Well, that's just ridicu<U+0097>

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: What if the Crusaders drift apart? I mean, we won't really be the Cutie Mark Crusaders anymore! [gasps] What if it's not an apple?! Will I have to move out?! Where will I live?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: All right, that's enough, sugarcube. Those are way too many questions to answer all in one night.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: And nopony's gonna make ya move out.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Are you sure, Applejack?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Of course, I'm sure. Now get some sleep. You'll see. Everything will be better in the mornin'. Hush now, little sister You're loved by all you know You'll never lose their friendship No matter where you go

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: [yawns] No matter what I get.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Hoo-ee! Nothin' like a good night's sleep!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: [muffled] Breakfast!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: You were right, Applejack! I feel much better! I don't know what I was so worried about last night!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: See, now what did I tell you? A good night's sleep'll fix just about an<U+0097> Well, no wonder you were so worked up!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: What? What is it?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Looks like somepony got her cutie mark!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: [gasps] I can't believe it! I got my cutie mark! I got my cutie mark! [rumbling and echoing] I got my cutie mark! Wait 'til I tell the others that my cutie mark is a... a... What is it?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I have no idea what it means.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Infestations? You mean like... parasprites?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Twittermites?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Pest ponies?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Take over?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I'm sorry. I guess this just wasn't what I was expectin'.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: The touch? Oh, sorry.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Wait, what do you mean?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Ow!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: What do I do?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Twittermites!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Bugbugbugbugbugbugbug!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Now, hold on! I'm sure this job is real important, but... I don't think I wanna call bugs for the rest of my life. Hey, where'd he go?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Well, well, well! Look at the new bug pony!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: It's pest pony.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Eh, it sure is! Ew!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I might've known you'd end up with the worst cutie mark ever!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: But look on the bright side! Whenever you need a friend, you can just go out and catch one!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: That's not funny.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Heeere, friendfriendfriendfriendfrieeend!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Stop it!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: You know what? My cutie mark isn't the worst! You two are!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: [sighs] I hate to think that Diamond Tiara is right, but... this cutie mark sure isn't what I was hoping for.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Who's there?! What do you mean?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Well, if you know how to wave a hoof and erase a terrible cutie mark, you go right ahead!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Huh. Now that is some serious magic.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Hey! Where's everypony goin'?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Mayor! What's goin' on?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Apple Bloom, you've got to get your family out of town!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Twittermites! Here, bugbugbugbugbugbug!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Here, bugs!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Come on, here!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Apple Bloom! What in tarnation are you doin'?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I'm tryin' to stop the infestation, of course!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Only a pest pony can do that! Now come on! We gotta skedaddle!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: But I've gotta do somethin'!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Are you crazy?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Aaaaaaahhh!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Whoo-ee. That's what I call a nightmare. It seemed so real.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: [muffled] Breakfast!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Applejack! You are not gonna believe the dream I just had! I guess I needed more sleep than I thought!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: See, now what did I tell you? A good night's sleep'll fix just about<U+0097> [gasps] Well, no wonder you were so worked up!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: What?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Looks like somepony got her cutie mark!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Again?! I mean... I did? Woo-hoo! Potion making! Now that's more like it!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: More like what?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Never mind. I'm just glad Princess Twilight's lessons finally paid off!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I expect you want to run off to the clubhouse and tell your friends all about your new cutie mark. But before you go, make sure you do all your... chores...?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Whooo!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Why all the excitement?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Yeah, what's going on?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: [coyly] Oh, nothin'... except this brand new cutie mark!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: That's amazing!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Wow!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I know!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: That's so cool!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I don't suppose either of you got yours?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Nope.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Me neither...

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I know it's silly, but I'd always hoped we'd get our cutie marks together.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Me too...

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: But I'm still super excited for you!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Absolutely!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I know! [knocks on podium] Let's call this meeting to order! I'm sure the three of us can figure out how to get two more cutie marks.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Um, yeah... the thing is...

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: What?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Well, you can't be a Cutie Mark Crusader if you've already got your cutie mark...

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Oh, yeah... Just like Babs Seed... Well, I could just sit quietly in the corner 'til you two figure out what you're gonna do...

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Well, technically the clubhouse is for Crusaders only.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Oh. Right. I guess I should just come back later, then...?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Why? I mean, you can't come in then either.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Oh.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Rules are rules.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I don't even think we're still supposed to be friends.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: What?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Sweetie Belle! Scootaloo! Come on, fillies, this isn't funny!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: No! I mean, w<U+0097> yeah, I mean... Well, I got mine, but my friends didn't get theirs, and now there's all kinds of trouble!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I guess so... I mean, if I was a blank flank again, there wouldn't be a problem!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Hey, Apple Bloom. Why'd you want to meet here?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Well, us blank flanks have to meet somewhere!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Um, actually, Apple Bloom, we... both sort of got our cutie marks.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: You did?! What are they?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Oh, we don't have time to go into all that.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: And we certainly don't have time to hang out at an old clubhouse.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Yeah, we've got responsibilities now.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: But maybe we'll see you later.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Much later.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Wait! Hold on! I can get my cutie mark back, I think! Rrgh! I mean, I got it once, right? Oh, just wait a second! Nooooooooooo!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: What in Equestria's goin' on?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: [muffled] Breakfast!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I'm not so sure sleep is the cure-all Applejack thinks it is.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Uh... Applejack? I know you said sleep is supposed to make me feel better, but I'm pretty sure it's makin' me feel worse.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: See, now what did I tell you? A good night's sleep'll fix<U+0097> Well, no wonder you were so worked up...

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Wh<U+0097> Didn't you hear what I said?! I was trying to<U+0097>

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Weeeell, what do we have here?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: What is it, Granny? What's wrong?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Oh, nothin', right, Applejack?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Right... Nothin' at all... Right, Big Mac?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Truth is, Apple Bloom, it's your cutie mark.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Oh, no! What is it now?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: [echoing] Well, I can tell you what it ain't. It ain't no apple.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Nnope!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: What?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: [in Big McIntosh's voice] And we don't have room for non-apples.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: [in Applejack's voice] Nnope.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: [in Big McIntosh's voice] Time for you to mosey on. You can't stay here.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: But this is my home!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Oh, and you're gonna have to change your name.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I think just 'Bloom' has a nice ring to it, don't you, Applejack?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Noooooooooo!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Ugh!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Alright, this is getting ridiculous. [pause] Whoo-ee! I never thought I'd be so happy to not get a cutie mark. What the?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: [frustrated grunt] I don't wanna see another cutie mark as long as I live!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: All right, whoever you are! I dunno what spell you went and cast on me, but I want it to stop right now!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Rrrgh! Why would I want you to torment me with nightmares?!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I don't want your help! Just get away from me!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Oh, Apple Bloom, you can't get away from your own shadow.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Princess Luna?! My shadow? What do you mean? It's just me? You mean I've been doin' all this to myself?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Of course, Apple Bloom. It's your dream.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: If I've been dreamin' this whole time, why don't I just wake up?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Sometimes we can worry about a thing so much, the fear can make us feel we're trapped in a nightmare. I don't suppose there's anything you're particularly afraid of, is there?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Yeah... I guess I've been pretty worried about gettin' my cutie mark.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: But if I like who I am, do you think other ponies will too?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Of course.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Then it doesn't matter what my cutie mark is!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Indeed.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: But that's so simple! I must be the only pony in the universe this worried about her cutie mark.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Oh, I wouldn't say that.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Scootaloo and Sweetie Belle are havin' nightmares too?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: It's been a busy night for us all, but I think it's time to bring it to a close.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I know you've all had a lot on your minds tonight, but I think Apple Bloom has something she'd like to share before you wake.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: We're still asleep?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Cool!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Well, I guess I should call this dream meeting of the Cutie Mark Crusaders to order!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I know we all got pretty anxious when we found out Babs got her cutie mark, but I for one don't want to have nightmares every night from now until we get ours!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Me neither!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: And even though we're all a little scared, a cutie mark won't change who we are or how everypony feels about us!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: It's lucky we're all scared of the same things. That way we can help and remind each other to just be who we are!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: And when the day comes that you all finally get your cutie marks, you can be sure they'll fit you to a T.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Exactly!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Do you fillies think that Babs is worried or scared about some of this stuff?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I know! Let's put together a care package for her!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: That way she'll know she isn't alone!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: We wouldn't want her to think that just because she isn't a Crusader, we can't still be friends! But, uh... maybe we should wait 'til we wake up.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Good idea.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: There ain't no call to worry So don't you cry or fret

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: A cutie mark won't change me No matter what I get

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Well, sure looks like somepony's feelin' better.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: You have no idea.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: See, now what did I tell you? A good night's sleep cures just about everythin'.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I guess so. I just wish it hadn't been so exhaustin'.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Look at that, Tank! Cloudsdale's here! That means Ponyville is next up for winter!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: You're doing awesome, everypony! Keep it up! We need those leaves off those trees! Once we get autumn cleared away, it'll be hello, winter!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Was that a yawn I just saw?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: How can you be tired when the most exciting time of the year is right around the corner? And don't forget the best part <U+0096> our first winter together! Come on, wake up! Once those ponies bring in the big, fat clouds full of snowflakes, we'll have a ton of snow for our extreme sledding! [cheering] And over there, we can play horse hockey, with no shoulder or arm pads!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Everything's looking great, don't you think?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Almost everything. Does Tank look alright to you?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Well, he does seem to be moving a little slowly.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I know, right?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: And he looks kind of sleepy...

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Totally!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: ...just like he always does.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Yeah, ha ha, I'm sure you're right.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Well?!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I suppose his heartbeat could be a teensy-weensy-eensy bit slower than usual...

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Okay, so give him a vitamin or something!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I don't think he needs that.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Maybe we're just staying up too late. Uh, too many Daring Do stories.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Oh, that's not it either.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Well, what's wrong with him then?!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Nothing! He's perfectly fine.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: He's just going to hibernate.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: You do realize he's not a bear, right?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [giggles] When the weather grows cold and less food is available, many animals hibernate to conserve energy. It's like taking a really long nap during winter, and then they wake up in spring. And see? Even tortoises do it! When the time comes, Tank will leave and dig into the ground.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: But don't worry. He'll reappear when the spring sun warms the ground back up.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Come on! Tortoises don't hibernate! Somepony put that picture in there as a joke.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: It's not a joke.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Well, then your book must be wrong!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Rainbow Dash, Tank needs to hibernate. It's healthy for him, just like sleeping is healthy for us.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [short laugh] Whatever. Okay, thanks. Come on, Tank.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Where are you going?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: To get a second opinion from a real reptile expert.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I told you, Rainbow Dash, I'm a dragon!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Come on! You're practically twins!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I'm purple.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: But if you don't have to hibernate, why should Tank?!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Because he's a tortoise and I'm a dragon!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Same family though, right?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: No!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I'll take that as a yes.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Ugh! Look, if Fluttershy says tortoises hibernate, then I guarantee tortoises hiber<U+0097>

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Well, what would you know?! You're a dragon!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Nopony knows you like I do, Tank. All you need is some hard work to get the old blood pumping.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Come on!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [huff] These things are heavy! Chock full of snowflakes! We're gonna have such a killer time in the snow, Tank. Tank? Tank!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Aww, look at the cute wittle Tankie, all snuggly-wuggly, getting ready to hibern<U+0097>

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Don't say that word!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Which one? "Snuggly"? "Wuggly"? "Tankie"? "Hibernate"?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: That one!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I was just saying how cute he<U+0097>

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: If you think hiber... <U+0096> you know, that napping thing <U+0096> is so cute, why don't you go do it?! Somewhere far away from here?!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [to rest of Mane Six] What are you looking at?! Pinkie Pie and I are just having a conversation!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Look, Rainbow Dash, we all know how upset you are about Tank hiber<U+0097>

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Shhhh! Don't say that word! That's what started this all!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: We all know how upset you are about Tank. But you shouldn't take your anger out on your friends.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Who said anything about anger?! I didn't say anything about anger! I'm not upset! And I am not angry! Do I look angry?! [grumbles] Come on, Tank! Let's get out of here!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I need you bright-eyed and bushy-tailed, not sleepy-eyed and scaly-tailed! Which... is exactly what you are. But get up anyway!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: You can't hiber<U+0096> you know. What about all the primo things we're gonna do together this winter? Building snow ponies, starting snowball fights, sipping hot cider by the fire.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Don't you wanna do those things with me?! Think, Rainbow Dash, think! Tank's only hibernating because it's cold, right? Well, I'd rather have him awake in the heat than asleep in the cold... [gasps] I just have to stop winter!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Hah! Stopping winter is gonna be a breeze!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: When life gives you lemons You can make lemonade But life gave me Tank here And my choice has long been made

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Ugh! For every hoof step back, they go three hoof steps forward! What are we gonna do? [long pause] Cloudsdale. That's it, Tank! If I can't stop winter in Ponyville, maybe I can stop it at the source!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Lunch hour! Perfect!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Slam dunk! With no water, they can't make clouds or snow! They can't make winter!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I hate to do this to those weather ponies, but desperate times call for desperate measures!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Oopsies! Looks like these were a little loose!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: And there goes winter down the drain!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Uh, I can't see!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Aaaaaah!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Let's get out of here!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: What in the name of Celestia's goin' on up there?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Prepare yourselves, everypony! Winter is coming!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Everypony, look out!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [groaning] You okay, Tank?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Rainbow Dash! Are you alright?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [sighs] No...

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Knock, knock!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: How are you feeling, Rainbow Dash?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [despondently] Whatever...

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: The poor thing looks so sad! Just what are we doing to do?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I don't know what we can do.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Buck up, Sugarcube. You just ain't yourself these days.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [despondently] Whatever...

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Uh, how can I say this tactfully...? You've lost your sparkle, Rainbow Dash.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I hate to say this, but, well... you've become...! [hushed] A party pooper!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Didn't you hear me? I said 'whatever'. I don't know if you're here to cheer me up or what, but I'm fine.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Let me handle this. Rainbow Dash, your winter is going to be pet-less.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Whatever did you do that for?!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Because she'll never get past this until she lets it all out.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [awkwardly] Uh... it's okay. Tank'll come back in a few months.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Alright, alright. There, there. [hushed, to Fluttershy] Nice going, Fluttershy. How do we get her to stop?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [hushed] She's got to be about done by now. Can't be too much left in there.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Feeling better?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [starts crying] I can't bear to see Fluttershy cry!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [starts crying] It's just heart-wrenching!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [to Applejack] You too?!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Nope, I'm good.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Look, everypony, I know how hard it is to say goodbye<U+0097>

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [crying] I'm mostly sad because you're not sad!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: What?! Me?! What about Applejack?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [crying] Applejack cries on the inside, Twilight!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: It's true.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [settling down] It's alright, Fluttershy. It's alright.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [hushed] You think she's done or just getting a third wind?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I don't know... Rainbow Dash? Are you okay?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: [sniffling] I think so. I feel better. Really, I do. Thanks, everypony. I don't know what I'd do without you. [tearing up] Or him... [sniffs] Oh, Tank... I'm sure gonna miss you.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Well, guess we're starting winter with a bang.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: The fun's come early! Yee-haw!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: You think we could mess up winter every year? It's way less work!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Uh, I don't think Rainbow Dash could handle it.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Riding that entire season from Cloudsdale to Ponyville was pretty awesome.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I thought you guys might like to say goodbye to Tank. He's ready to hibernate.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Ooh, you're using the word! Oh, she's using the word! And when Tank finishes hibernating, I'm gonna throw him the biggest welcome home party ever! Or wait. Should it be a 'welcome above ground' party? Or a 'happy wake-up' party? Maybe an 'it's about time!' party!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: And I'll design him a very special suit just for the occasion, whichever one it ends up being.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: I'm glad you're feelin' a little better, Rainbow Dash.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Yeah, me too.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: So, you really wanna do this hibernating thing, huh?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Goodbye, Tank.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Happy winter.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: See you later, little feller.

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Have a good sleep, Tank!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Goodbye, Tank! We'll miss you!

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Well? Ready for some winter fun?

title: Tanks for the Memories
dialog: Uh, I'm gonna hang here and read to him a bit. That little guy can never get to sleep without a bedtime story. I'll be right there.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Aren't you glad y'all came with me to see Applejack compete in the Appleloosa rodeo?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Totally! This place is a cutie mark gold mine! There's barrel racing...

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: ...roping contests, rodeo clowning...

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: ...steeplechase...!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: If we can get into some of these events, we could all three walk off the train back in Ponyville with brand spankin' new cutie marks!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Wouldn't a barrel look good here?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I want a lasso!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I don't know... All these events look a little, well, dangerous.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: No risk, no reward.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I hope nothing bad is going on.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: A cutie mark-apalooza and a low-down varmint? This is shapin' up to be the most excitin' rodeo ever!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Yeah, come on!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Woo-hoo! Yee-haw! That's my cousin! Go, Applejack, go!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Whew! It's been a dog's age since I got to compete. All the rodeos 'round Ponyville are closed down for some reason.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Well, I guess havin' injured kinfolk in Appleloosa sure paid off then, huh, cuz?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Just doin' my best to fill your horseshoes, Braeburn.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Keep tossin' like that and I'll be out of a job!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Ow, ow!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Ooh, sorry. Say, where's my sister and her friends?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Uh-oh. Gee, uh, I guess I got so caught up watchin' you that I<U+0097>

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: You said you'd keep an eye on those fillies! How am I supposed to focus on practicin' if you're not gonna<U+0097>

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: There they are! Heh, right where I left 'em... Aw, don't be mad! [beat] Owwwwch! My foreleg! Hurts so much...!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Y'all can't go runnin' off like that, y'hear? Backstage at a rodeo ain't no kind of playground!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Sorry, Applejack. We won't wander off again. But, uh, speakin' of the rodeo... what would you say about me and the Crusaders maybe competin' in one teensy-weensy little event or three?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Look out!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: [gasps] What the hay just happened?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: You fillies alright?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: [simultaneously] Yeah...

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: What is it, Sheriff?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Is it him?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Don't send us home! It's not fair!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Now, quit yer bellyachin'. I can't have y'all around here with some outlaw on the loose. Aw, maybe I oughta call it quits and go home too.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: No, you can't! This rodeo is important to Appleloosa! And with you in there, we got a real shot at winnin'! Come on, now, you head on back to practice and don't worry none about these three. I won't let 'em outta my sight.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: [to Crusaders] Ya hear? Y'all ain't leavin' my sight!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I thought we weren't going to wander off again.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: This ain't wanderin'. We know exactly where we're headed <U+0096> to find Trouble Shoes!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: But isn't he a dangerous criminal?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: We only need to find him. We don't need to capture him. The sheriff can handle that!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: And once he's in jail, we'll be competing! And then it's...

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Worst idea ever.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: It's another giant hoof print!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Do either of you have any idea where we are?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Uh, maybe we should head back and try again later.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: C'mon, before we lose the trail!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Come on, we've gone far enough! It's time to go back!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: The rain is only getting worse, Apple Bloom! Let's come back tomorrow.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Maybe y'all are right. So, how do we get back?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: You mean you don't know?!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Whew! Good job, y'all. I know they need lots of mud for the rodeo tomorrow, but I wish they would've warned us about this rainstorm.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Braeburn? Where are the girls?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: [echoing] What?!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Sheriff Silverstar! You gotta help! My sister's gone! And her friends too!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I've searched and searched, but no sign of 'em anywhere!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: It must've been Trouble Shoes!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: You really wanna take that chance?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: You sure about this, Scootaloo?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I thought I was, but now I'm not.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: So I pretty much got us completely and totally lost. How could this get any worse?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: We gotta get out of this rain. There's no tellin' how long this storm could last.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Look!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: It looks abandoned. Let's go see if we can find some blankets or somethin'.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: [through tinnitus] Hello? You alright?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Surely.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: We didn't mean no harm. We just came in to get out of the rain.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Had some hot cider a-cookin' in the kitchen. Doubt it survived.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I ain't gonna rise to greet y'all. Awfully rude, I reckon, but as you can see, I'm the fresh casualty of an unusually unfortunate circumstance. My lot in life, I suppose.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Are you... Trouble Shoes?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: That's me.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: W-what are you doing?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I'm gonna unwrap him.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: You can't do that! That's Trouble Shoes!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Aw, he don't seem so bad.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Of course guests would arrive while I ain't got no pie to offer. Scores more misfortune points for old Trouble Shoes. Wh-whooaaa!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Typical. Bad luck never rests.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: You sure that's bad luck? Seems like maybe you're just a little, um...

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Klutzy?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Tell that to the flank! Upside-down horseshoe <U+0096> bad luck. Follows me wherever I go like sour on old milk. Y'all best vamoose before my bad luck rubs off and sticks to y'all. Get along! Skedaddle!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Am-scray!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Um, we don't really know the way back to Appleloosa...

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: But o' course I do. Wouldn't you know it? My lucky day.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: It's actually kind of sweet of him to help us out like this.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I know! What do we do if he takes us back to Appleloosa and the sheriff arrests him? If I get a cutie mark for that, I'll feel guilty every time I see it.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Say there, Trouble Shoes, you might not want to take us all the way back to Appleloosa. The sheriff sort of has it in his mind that you're a no-good outlaw lookin' to shut down the rodeo.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: My kind of luck he'd think that.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: But... is it true?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Y'all like stories?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Mm-hmm!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Just my luck. I was hopin' you'd say no. [narrating flashback] When I was a colt, I wanted to be a rodeo star somethin' fierce, but I just didn't seem to have the knack for it.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: [narrating] I practiced and practiced...

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: [narrating] And finally, I wrangled up the guts to audition for rodeo school. Right in the middle of that tryout, I knew I was doin' what I was meant to. And wouldn't you know it? In a flash comes this here cutie mark.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: [narrating] I can still remember them judges a-laughin'. Didn't even finish my routine 'cause right then I knew bad luck was my fate. That fire for rodeo never did leave me, though. Couldn't keep away from 'em. So I'd sneak down and have a look, and wouldn't you know it? Bad luck would strike again. Just my lot in life, I reckon...

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Poor Trouble Shoes. I can't believe those mean judges would laugh at him like that.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Don't you see? They weren't laughin' at him. They were just enjoyin' the show.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: What are you saying?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Think about it. If we saw a rodeo clown doin' what he did back in that shack, we'd think he was the greatest!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: You're right! He could still be in rodeos, just not the way he thought!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: So he's been looking at his cutie mark wrong the whole time! It's not bad luck, it's<U+0097>

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Just my luck.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Wait!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Braeburn? Get these fillies someplace safe.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Wait, no! Listen, Applejack!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: No!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: But Trouble Shoes isn't the menace everypony thinks!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Sakes alive, what's with you? Why in tarnation would you want me to help get him out of jail when he's the one who ran off with y'all to begin with?! Now if y'all excuse me, I'm off to win the Appleloosa rodeo hay bale monster stack.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Um, Applejack?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: [sighs] Well, at least I get me a view of one small corner of the rodeo.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Figures.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Come on, sheriff! You're about to miss the hay bale monster stack!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Let's go, Trouble Shoes! This here's a jailbreak!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Ain't no need. Can hear the rodeo just fine from this vantage.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: But we've got a plan to help you live your dream!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Listen, y'all, I'm a known criminal. How you proposin' on gettin' me into a rodeo?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Go, Applejack!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: [simultaneously] You can do it!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: [simultaneously] Woo-hoo!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Well, how do I look?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Come on now, stack them bales! Woo-hoo!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: That's my sister!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: 'Kay now, Trouble Shoes, you're on!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Say what?! I may be dressed like one, but I ain't no rodeo clown.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: You got your cutie mark all wrong, Trouble Shoes! You were born to entertain! You've got a gift for makin' folks laugh, don't you?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: But my cutie mark's an upside-down horseshoe, and that means bad luck.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: That all depends on how you look at it.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: You always wanted to be a part of the rodeo, right? Well, now's your chance. Go on!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Whoa!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: There y'all are! How 'bout your big sis, huh?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: [flatly] Yeah, way to go.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Since when are y'all so into rodeo clowns?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Just leave me be, cutie mark! I aim to clear that there hoop!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: What the hay?!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Wait, y'all! He ain't what you think he is!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: But he never wanted to ruin any rodeos! Those were just bad accidents!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Sweetie Belle, what are you talkin' about?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Trouble Shoes has a gift for making ponies laugh! He's maybe the best rodeo clown I've ever seen!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: He thought his cutie mark was telling him to keep away from rodeos, but deep inside he knew it's where he was meant to be. He just didn't know how to do it.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: What she says is true. This here entertainin' y'all with my klutzin'? That's what I was supposed to be doin'. I know it now. I didn't mean no harm, honest! I just ain't never loved nothin' like I love the rodeo, so I kept on sneakin' back and makin' a big old mess of things. Turns out I was just a-lookin' at my cutie mark all wrong.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: If I done wrong, I'll see to it that I take my medicine and square my accounts.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Uh, yeah, about that...

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: [sighs] You really want us to clean up all this mess Trouble Shoes made?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Maybe it'll teach you not to go wanderin' off after I say not to!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Ugh. Ain't it bad enough that you get to go back to Ponyville with a shiny trophy, and all we're bringing back is these same old blank flanks?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Y'all helped Trouble Shoes realize what his cutie mark really means. Ain't that a nice feelin' you can take back with you?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I guess we did make things a little better.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: It does feel kinda nice.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: So... we can stop now?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Nnope.

title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord
dialog: Ohoho, but that's not all! When I went to look for them again, they were on the ceiling!

title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord
dialog: [laughs] Oh, Discord, I've never known anypony as funny as you! I love that story about the time you tried to train your right paw... [giggles] ...to fetch your left leg! [giggles] Oh, I do love our Tuesday teas, and I can't wait for you to meet my friend Tree Hugger. She's going to love you too.

title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord
dialog: I met her on a trip to see the Breezies. She's a member of the Equestrian Society for the Preservation of Rare Creatures.

title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord
dialog: We're all gonna have so much fun together at the Grand Galloping Gala!

title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord
dialog: Oh, I was wondering when you were going to ask me. I'd love to.

title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord
dialog: Oh. Oh, no. Um, I'm afraid I've already asked Tree Hugger. I'm sorry, Discord. I assumed you'd have your own ticket since you and Princess Celestia are friends now. Were you not invited?
