The damask pattern on these curtains is exquisite! Oh, and this velvet rope-holder <U+0096> oh, it's just<U+0097>

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: We don't have time to look at the d<e9>cor! They're gonna kick me out of the Wonderbolts unless we solve this thing!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: I know, Rainbow, and I'm on this case like a charm on a bracelet! Here's what I'm thinking: somepony had to bring Spitfire that letter, which means somepony must have seen them!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: I just have a few questions for you, and I'm sure once we get some things cleared up, we'll<U+0097>

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Come on, Rarity, we don't have all day! [to a guard] Where were you on the night of last night at midnight?!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: A likely story.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: What are you tryin' to say?!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: [narrating] The waters were getting choppy. Rainbow Dash's tactics were, well, horrid. It was time for another approach. [normally] Perhaps I should take it from here! You castle guards have such a difficult job. I'm guessing that at times it can be rather... boring.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: And of course being a castle guard can be thankless work. I'm not saying you did, but if you took a break, you more than deserved it.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: What kind of cake was it?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Was the frosting vanilla or chocolate?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Was the base of the cake decorated with buttercream rosettes?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Ugh, who cares how it was decorated?!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: [narrating] Rainbow Dash was questioning my methods. But I knew what I was doing.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Do you?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Oh, oh, oh. Did I say that one out loud?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: I mean, even I think I'm guilty at this point! I really did want to fly in that show! What if I wrote that note when I was asleep?! Do you know what I do when I sleep?! Because I sure don't!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Oh, calm down, Rainbow Dash. We'll get to the bottom of this. There's only one bakery in Canterlot that makes a chocolate cherry cake with custard filling and buttercream frosting rosettes and that's...

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: ...Cinnamon Chai's Tea and Cake Shop!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: I've heard you have the best chocolate cherry custard cake with buttercream frosting rosettes in town!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Oh, no. But somepony's already bought it! Who was the lucky pony?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Why? Because it was somepony famous?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: What do you mean, raspy?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: If there's anything else you can remember, dish.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: That's terrible! What color was the scarf?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: You don't say!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: I can't believe you're talking fashion at a time like this!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Rainbow, don't panic. I need you to trust me.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Trust you?! You've spent more time changing clothes than trying to help me! I'm doomed!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: No, you're not! Come on!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: [narrating] Rainbow Dash was obviously upset, but I had all my ducks in a row. Except one.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: [narrating] She was not going to like it, but there was only one way to find out if my suspicions were correct.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: I have found the culprit!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Somepony sent Spitfire away and framed Rainbow Dash for it. And that pony was none other than... Wind Rider!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Rarity, I can't believe you would accuse Wind Rider of framing me! He's a living legend, for pony's sake!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: All the evidence points to him!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Peh! What evidence could you possibly have? All you did was ask about cake, admire d<e9>cor, and change outfits a gazillion times!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Let me explain. I never believed you would send Spitfire away. When we found the rainbow hairs in Spitfire's room, I could tell they didn't fall out. They... were cut! Nopony loses hair in a chunk. And look at the ends. It's a straight line! They were clearly cut with shears, which means somepony planted it! Then when we were examining Spitfire's room, I smelled something on the envelope. Juniper Phoenix, Wind Rider's cologne of choice! Then, in the castle hallway, I noticed some of the damask curtains fell out of their velvet rope-holder, indicating that somepony had been hiding behind them! Perhaps after they dropped off the fake letter?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Precisely why I questioned the castle guards! They were at their post at the entrance to the hallway all night, except for a small window of time when somepony brought them cake. A cake that was ordered by a girl pony with a raspy voice! Whoever ordered the cake got a chocolate stain on her ivory scarf, and I couldn't help but notice that Wind Rider's scarf is tied in a tight Windsor knot instead of its usual loose slipknot! And why is that? Is it to hide the chocolate stain?!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Just admit it <U+0096> you're as guilty of framing Rainbow Dash as you are of ruining that ivory scarf!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: But why, Wind Rider?! Was it because I took the last broccoli at the dinner and you really, really wanted it?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: No. It was because he was afraid that you would break his long-distance Wonderbolt record! I heard him when Spitfire said you were close to breaking his record. He said, and I quote, 'Heh-heh'. That's the polite but disingenuous laugh you make when you want to seem happy but really you're not.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Really? That is so not cool. And I thought you were the coolest Wonderbolt ever. Until now.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: That's not what being a Wonderbolt is all about.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: She's right! Wonderbolts look out for each other! Which reminds me, where is Spitfire?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: No wonder she's been gone so long. Ice irises are almost impossible to find in spring!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: The Crystal Mountains are too far for anypony to make it there and back before the royal garden opening! Rainbow Dash, we need you to fly in Spitfire's place!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: But Spitfire shouldn't have to miss this! I'm gonna get her!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: But you'll never make it in time!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Then there's no time to lose!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Oh, don't panic. If I know Rainbow Dash, she'll come through.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Spitfire, you're back! I can't believe you made it!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: [out of breath] I wouldn't have, if Rainbow hadn't found me so fast! Gave me enough time to fly back!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Rare, I couldn't have done it without you. And I'm sorry I doubted you. But why didn't you tell me what you were doing?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Well, I didn't want to get your hopes up until I was sure, and I couldn't be sure until I saw that chocolate stain.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Thank you for believing in me, even when I was doubting you. I'm some friend, huh?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Actually, you're quite a good friend. You went to get Spitfire, even though it meant you couldn't fly today.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: [sighs] I'll get my chance one day.

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Or today. How'd you like Wind Rider's spot in the show?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Not anymore. For attempting to frame Rainbow Dash, I hereby strip you of your Wonderbolts status!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: [to Rainbow Dash] So, would you like to fly with us?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Would I?! Woo-hoo! Yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah, uh-huh, uh-huh, yeah, aww yeah...

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Uh, Rainbow Dash?

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: [embarrassed noise] Coming!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: [narrating] So my friend got her moment in the sun. Or the center of an aerial flower, as the case may be. And as for me? I got a chance to show off my Femme Mystique Chic collection!

title: Rarity Investigates!
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, M. A. Larson, Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco
dialog: Oh, did I say that out loud?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Ehh... [blows raspberry] [sighs heavily, groans, sighs again] I'm bored.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: But you're reading.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: I've read all these books already.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: And...?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: And I'm bored! I wanna do something! Things have been so slow around here and I just<U+0097>

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Twilight! Twilight! Ooh, Twilight, darling! Oh, thank goodness! It seems that my<U+0097>

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: [panting] Whew! Got here as fast I<U+0097>

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: [gasps] Yes! Finally! We've been summoned! I wonder where the map wants us to<U+0097>

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Uh, Twilight?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Where do you think<U+0097>

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: [excited squeals] Manehattan! We've been called to Manehattan! Oh, I've simply been dying to go back for a visit! And now I return... with a purpose!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Hmmm. It looks like you've been summoned to this particular neighborhood here.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Seems a hair odd, though, don't it? Map callin' me to a big city like Manehattan?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: You may be more of a country pony at heart, Applejack, but the map picked you two because you're the best ponies to tackle this particular mission.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: But how will we even know what our mission's supposed to be? That neighborhood probably has twice as many ponies as all of Ponyville.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Pff. Kch. Ts! More like three times! Why, it's not only home to the Haypacking District <U+0096> it's also home to the Fashion District! [to Twilight] Hmm. Shame you weren't called as well, though, darling. You did end up quite a fan of the hustle and bustle of Manehattan on our last visit.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: It's such an exciting city, and there's still so much I'd like to do there. So many museums and historical landmarks to visit. Not to mention all the libraries! But this is your mission. Heh-heh. Don't worry about me. I've got plenty of... books... to keep me... busy.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: [gasps] I just remembered something! The Sisterhooves Social!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: We'll have to miss it. No tellin' how long we'll be in Manehattan. I sure hope Apple Bloom and Sweetie Belle aren't too upset.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Oh, Manehattan, what you do to me!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Darling, are you all right?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Ponies move so fast here. Not at all like back home. [to herself] Eyes peeled, ears open. Eyes peeled, ears open.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Remember, Applejack, you're in the big city now. No moseying. You've gotta walk with speed and confidence!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Yoo-hoo!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Sorry 'bout that.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Sorry.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Hey<U+0097> Oh, dear. Butter my biscuits. I can barely cross the street in this town. How am I supposed to help solve a<U+0097>

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: [gasps] There!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: No! No.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: That hat clashes with your mane, not to mention it's far too large and will undoubtedly obstruct your vision. Oh, dear, none of these will do. Oh, Applejack! What good timing!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: [humming] Here. This will do splendidly.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Oh, no-no, please, please, keep it. I can always make another.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: [to Applejack] And you thought we wouldn't discover our purpose here! Pff. Kch. Ts!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Yeah, I'm pretty sure that wasn't it.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: What? We just saved that poor pony from committing a terrible crime of fashion.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Well, she could've been meeting a friend who would've laughed at her new hat, and then their friendship could've been ruined forever! And... mmm... it's possible.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Did your cutie mark glow signifyin' a job well done?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Ye<U+0097> No. I suppose it didn't. Still, a disaster was averted!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Oh, my! Oh, I-I-I-I-I'm s-so sorry. I never meant to<U+0097>

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Uh, please accept my sincerest apologies for the misunderstanding, and might I add, what a lovely establishment you have here! [nervous laugh] [clears throat] You're right, Applejack. [sighs] The search continues.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Uh, 'scuse me, I was just wonderin'... Uh, friendship problem, anypony? See, we've been sent here to... A-A map summoned us and, uh... If you could just take a moment to...

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Friendship advice! Anypony looking for friendship advice! Good grief. This isn't working.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: [sighs] I'm not sure what we're supposed to do. To be honest, I'm still not even sure what the map called me here for.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Oh, try not to worry, Applejack. The map picked us for a reason. Although how we're supposed to uncover that reason, I haven't a clue. We can't possibly approach every single pony in town until we find out what we're meant to d<U+0097>ooh! [reading] "Please help us restore our long-lost but beloved tradition, the Midsummer Theater Revival. There's a guest performance by a local theater troupe, the Method Mares, as well as games, food, and much, much more. This event promises to bring our Bronclyn neighbors together and restore our sense of community, but there's so much to do and we need your help." Huh. [gasps] Darling, this is it! The contact on the flyer is Coco Pommel!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Oh, right! She's the one you got a job makin' costumes for that designer friend o' yours.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Don't you see?! This must be why the map called us here! Oh, and you were so worried!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Well, I suppose it's at least worth lookin' into... that is, if we can ever get off this street corner.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Y'all do look like you're enjoyin' each others' company. Kinda reminds me of Ponyville.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: It sounds lovely, darling.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: What happened?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Nopony else stepped up to take over for Charity?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Say no more! You finish up your work, and by this time tomorrow, you'll be up to your mane in ponies who want to lend a hoof. Applejack and I will make sure of it!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: You bet your boots we will!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: It's just an expression.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: So you see, the Method Mares are only available on this one day, and we need all the help we can get with preparation.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: [clearing throat] Well? What do you think?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: So you'll help us?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Oh, not at all, darling. It's quite lovely.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: I think she was talkin' about the Midsummer Theater Revival.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Well, I could help you with the costumes.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Well I know a thing or two about buildin' and fixin' things. It's kinda, well, my thing. Could be the reason the map called me here!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: You see, dear? We went out looking for volunteers when all the help you need is right here.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Uh-huh.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: The map wouldn't have chosen just Applejack and me if it was more than we could handle. Everything is going to be just fine!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Perhaps I spoke too soon...

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: I know it looks bad, but I'm movin' as fast as I can.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Don't worry, we've still got plenty of time. Everything's going to be<U+0097>

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: No, wait! I haven't gotten a chance to<U+0097>

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: ...reinforce the stage yet.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: [hushed] I don't understand. The map summoned us here to solve a friendship problem. We've clearly found it, but why did it send the two of us? Why not Twilight? I'm sure she could have used her magic to transform this park in an instant!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: I've been thinkin' the same thing. I mean, I can at least see why you're here <U+0096> Coco's your friend, and you have an eye for costumes and all <U+0096> but me? I was never gonna be able to finish a project this big.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: [dramatically] We'll return to Ponyville as failures! Why must this be, Applejack? Why? Why?! Wh<U+0097>

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Now hold on there. I'm not suggestin' we pack up and go home.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: [muffled] Then what are you suggesting<U+0097> [ptoo] Then what are you suggesting?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: I'm suggestin' we stop worryin' about what we can't do and start doing what we can. I think I've got a plan. It won't be anythin' big or fancy, but it'll be somethin'. And somethin's gotta be better than nothin', right?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: That's the spirit! Sorta...

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Alright, y'all, it's ready!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Oh, darling, please, it was just a few costumes.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Aw, shucks, I just happen to be good with a hammer is all. To be honest, we had much bigger plans to start. When those fell through, we decided to simplify. This here was the result.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Oh, don't be so modest. Coco and I were lost.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Oh, yeah?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Not sure if you noticed, but the park is far from bein' fixed up. I imagine if you look around, you'll find there's lots of little ways for you to get involved in changin' this place for the better.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Yee-hoo!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: We did it!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: [gasps] I understand now! It all makes perfect sense!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Huh?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: I know why the map called you here.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: You do?

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: If Twilight had used her magic to fix the park, it wouldn't have fixed the real problem, which is that these Manehattan ponies didn't think they had time to do something for their community! But by building that stage and making sure the play went on, you showed them that just by doing something small, you can make a big difference!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Well, I'll be!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Seems you have more in common with the Manehattan ponies than you thought!

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Heh-heh. But all the same, I'd sure like to head back to Ponyville on the next train. I want to check in with Apple Bloom and find out how the Sisterhooves Social turned out.

title: Made in Manehattan
dialog: Oh, absolutely, my dear. Just as soon as I stop that pony in the shop over there from purchasing that dreadfully hideous scarf! Stop! You're making a terrible mistake!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Oh, snickerdoodle! Where is the darned thing? [groans] I wish for once I'd remembered to label these boxes! Uh, Big Mac, be a dear and help me move those... Uh, maybe it's in that one on the bottom.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Oh, dagnabbit, it's not in there either!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [muffled laughing] [normal] You can't catch me!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [laughing] Woo-hoo!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Hey!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [more laughing] You trickster!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Sisterhooves Social is right around the corner. Thought it'd be nice to award the winner of the big race the ribbon from when we hosted the very first Social! If'n of course I could find the darn thing. Oh, would you looky here! My, how Apple Bloom used to love watching you make that thing fly. It's like she thought you was magic. Ah, right, enough reminiscin'. Gotta find that ribbon! If you would just help me<U+0097> [straining] pull... this... box, then maybe I can... Uh, Big Mac?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [straining] Found her!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: We're gonna win every competition at the Sisterhooves Social! Those other fillies aren't gonna know what hit 'em!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Oh. Hey there, Big Mac! Did you want somethin'?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Hold that thought. Applejack, you are the most awesome sister ever!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Aw, gee-whiz. [laughs]. Well I think it's sweet that you hold that opinion, but<U+0097>

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: It's not opinion! It's objective fact! You saved Equestria like a gazillion times, you're smart, funny, strong... Why you're the best sister of all time! Probably the best Apple of all time! Right, Big Mac?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: And with you by my side, I am guaranteed to taste sweet, sweet Sisterhooves Social victory! Go, Apples, go, go, go, Apples go!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Uh, Apple Bloom? I think Big Mac's got somethin' he wants to show you.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Oh, hey. Is that the toy we used to play with when I was little?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Neat. [to Applejack] Alright then! Let's get back to practicin'! One more run-through of our jugglin' routine, make sure our harmonies are tight in our song, and see if we can't beat our best pie-eatin' time!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Hold on, sugarcube. I need a minute to talk with Big Mac.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Mind if I go ahead and start eatin' this pie?!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Hey, Big Mac, you all right?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [sighs] Yup.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: You sure? You seemed a little down back there.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [scoffs] Nope.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Come on, you can tell me. You feelin' a little left out? Apple Bloom and I have been spendin' a lot of time together gettin' ready for the Social.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [gasps] What in the...?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Your cutie mark! You're being summoned, Applejack! This is so cool!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [sighs] Eeyup.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Now calm down. Let me just go over to Twilight's castle and see what's what! Maybe it's just a false alarm.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: But you said it was a false alarm!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: I said maybe it's a false alarm. Well, it's not. Rarity and I have to go to Manehattan.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Can't you just tell that map it'll have to wait a couple days?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: No can do, sugarcube. When duty calls, I gotta answer right away. What kind of an example would I be settin' for my little sister if I didn't?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: This can't be happening! Your extreme awesomeness is backfiring on me!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [sighs] I'm sorry, Apple Bloom. [to Big Mac] Try and cheer her up, won't you?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Breakfast, come and get it!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Oh, it's no use, Big Mac. If I know my Apple Bloom, she won't come out of a funk this funky 'til her big sister gets back.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Hey, Apple Bloom, the Social's gonna start in a few hours. Thought you might want to go with us.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Since Rarity and Applejack are out of town, you and Sweetie Belle can cheer on me and Rainbow Dash instead!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Pretty great they're letting you participate even though you're not technically sisters.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Well, the Social's always had a pretty loose definition of what consti-ma-tutes a sister. As long as you share a bond that represents the spirit of the Social, you're in!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: So what do you say?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: You coming?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Why not...? Got nothin' better to do... Lemme wash up and I'll meet you in a little bit.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [sighs] Such a shame we don't live closer to all your second cousins. You could maybe do the Social with one of them instead. What is it, Big Mac? Y'all got an idea?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: What? What is it?!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Today is our big day!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: We have so got this. I'm gonna go sign us in.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: I guess I'm just a little jealous you two get to compete and I don't. But at least I get to be here and cheer you on! I thought Apple Bloom was gonna be here too.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Guess she changed her mind. Hey, there you are! You ready to cheer on me and Rainbow Dash to victory?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Uh, not exactly. Seems I'm gonna get to participate after all.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [gasps] Applejack is back from Manehattan already? That must mean Rarity is back too!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Your cousin who what now?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Oh, my! I'm so delighted to meet your little friends, Apple Bloom. Would these be your dear and beloved Cutie Mark Crusaders?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [sighs] Sweetie Belle and Scootaloo, cousin Orchard Blossom.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: It is my extra-ordinary pleasure to make your acquaintance.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [deadpan] That's Big Mac in a dress.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Big Mac? Why, as charmed as I am that you find me in the slightest resemblance to such a-a-a fine and noble product of the Apple clan. I am astonished in equal measure. However, I shall take this startling observation under advisement given that it's from such an astute and perceptive filly as yourself, Sweetie Belle.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: That's awful nice of you to say, cousin Orchard Blossom! I've been told before I'm pretty observant.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: I haven't the slightest doubt.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Pardon me. My dearest cousin Applejack is regrettably unable to be here as planned, so I, her cousin Orchard Blossom, will accompany Apple Bloom in her stead. I trust that's acceptable to all concerned?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Cousin Orchard Blossom, huh? I know Applejack has a lot of relatives, but I feel like she would've mentioned you.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Why, you must be Rainbow Dash. You're Scootaloo's... say... how are y'all related again?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Hm. Why don't I just let you finish signing in? [hushed] But don't think me and Scootaloo are gonna take it easy on you just 'cause you're a stallion!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [laughs] Now, where were we?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [tuts] You mean 'powder your muzzle', don't you, dear? Such a more, uh, feminine-like reference to nature's call, don't you agree?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Have they called your brother's bluff yet?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: No, but they're about to! I can't bear to watch!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Yoo-hoo! Apple Bloom! They've approved us as a pair! [giggles] Hurry along now, precious!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: I can't believe they bought it!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: It's sweet he wants to help you out like this. Weird, but sweet.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Here we are! This one, please.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [hushed] You sure you know all the words? 'Cause it took Applejack a pretty long time to get it down.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [hushed] Did it now?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Sisterhood

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Sisterhood

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Is a special kind of friend Sisterhood

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Sisterhood

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Is a bond that never ends

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Sisterhood

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Sisterhood

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Sisterhood

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Sisterhood

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Sisterhood

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Sisterhood

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [deep bass] Sisterhood!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [joining in] ...ood

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Just a frog in my throat, dear. Probably just need to get a sip of water. If you'll excuse us, we've another event in which to participate. Oh, my, that certainly didn't go as I had planned. But don't you worry. We'll get you a blue ribbon yet, Apple Bloom.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: You sure about that?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: As sure as my name is cousin Orchard Blossom.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [to herself] But that isn't your name!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Whee!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Whoaaa!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [spits] Yay.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Oh, I don't know why I didn't choose to wear something more casual. Why, I knew that juggling routine like the back of my hoof! But never you mind. There is still the race to be run!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: I really appreciate all the effort, Big Ma<U+0097> cousin Orchard Blossom, but maybe we just skip the whole obstacle course thing and call it a day.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Why, Apple Bloom! I wouldn't hear of it! Your cousin Orchard Blossom may be many things, but she is not a quitter.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: I'm sure she's not, but it's like Applejack said! There'll be more Sisterhooves Socials down the line, and I'm sure she'll help me get a blue ribbon next time around.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: B-But you wanted to win it this Sisterhooves Social! And no matter what, I am gonna get you that win! Why, I simply have to.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Alright, Scootaloo, remember the parts where teamwork really comes into play!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: How could I forget? We've been training all week!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Okay, hot stuff! What's our move on the grape squish?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: The alley-oop.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Apple toss?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Flip-flop.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Egg carrying?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Flutter-bomb.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Oh, dear.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [through megaphone] Competi-sis-tors! Take your positions!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [through megaphone] And a-ready, and a-set, go!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Nice jump, Scoot!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Woo-hoo!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Yikes! You almost squished me!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Pick up those hooves, Apple Bloom! Why, you're barely movin' at a mosey!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Come on, junebug, it's... like you've never carried an egg before!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Argh! I'm goin' as fast as I can!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Woo-hoo!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [coughs] I mean, [clears throat] victory is ours, sweet Apple Bloom!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Uh-oh.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: I should've known you'd eventually get busted for bein' a stallion!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Hah! Looks like we win, squirt!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Woo-hoo! Yeah!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: I told you I should've just waited until the next Social to win with Applejack.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: You know I'm... not mad, right?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: I mean... let's face it <U+0096> you dressin' up as my cousin Orchard Blossom was a pretty crazy idea in the first place.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: And it's not like you got me disqualified from the Social forever or anythin'. I can participate next time with Applejack. Everything's fine.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: I just don't understand why you went so crazy there at the end of the race. I mean, I know you like to win an' all, but... you wanna tell me what's goin' on?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Nope.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Alright. Well, it's getting late. You comin'?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Nope.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Okay. See you later, I guess...

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Apple Bloom?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Yeah?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: When you were little, you used to look up to me, thought I was the best thing since zap apple jam. Things are different now. Applejack's the hero of the Apple family, always rushin' off to save Equestria. And I'm just here on the farm, doin' chores, helpin' out the way I can, nothin' special, nobody's hero. I guess I just thought... oh, never mind. Here I am about to start blabberin' on about my feelin's. You don't wanna hear all this.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Yes, I do!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: I guess I just thought if I could... fill in for Applejack at the Social and get you a blue ribbon, well, I could be somepony you looked up to again. Be your hero again. Even if it was for just a day. It was foolish and I'm ashamed. Please, I just wanna be alone right now.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Yeah, well, too bad, you big goof! 'Cause I'm not goin' anywhere. And I know that you're always gonna be here when I need you. Heck, you'll do a whole obstacle course in high heels if you think it'll help me get somethin' I want. You're my big brother. You've always been a hero to me, Big Mac, and you always will be. I'm real sorry I haven't been lettin' you know that's how I feel. Guess both of us have been holdin' back when it comes to expressin' ourselves, huh?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Big Mac! Apple Bloom! Your sister's home! She says she's got quite a story to tell about her trip to Manehattan!

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Be there in a bit! I'm spending some quality time with my big brother! [to Big Mac] Hey, Big Mac?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Eeyup?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: How do you think cousin Orchard Blossom would describe this sunset?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: [chuckles] Why, dear, I do declare this is the most beautiful sunset my eyes have ever looked upon. Though sitting here on these tree roots is a trifle uncomfortable for my hindquarters.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Okay, Crusaders! Back to the business of earnin' our cutie marks! Any suggestions?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: No, we've tried everything!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: We've run out of ideas.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Are you kiddin' me, Crusaders? We can do better than that!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: We've been searchin' for our cutie marks For a while now Tryin' to find out how we fit in

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: 'Cause the Cutie Mark Crusaders don't give in

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Now, that's more like it!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Cutie Mark Crusaders! Help!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: What's wrong, Pipsqueak?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: I'm running for student pony president, I was hoping you three would be my campaign managers!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: We've never tried gettin' our cutie marks in campaign managin'! What do ya say, Crusaders?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Yeah! Hoof!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: [loudly] So, Pip, how would you help the school if you were elected student pony president?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Our playground equipment took quite a beating during Twilight's battle with Tirek!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: If I'm voted in as student pony president, I'll go to the school board and right this wrong!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Well, I think that's a ridiculous waste of money! It's just like when Twist proposed to repair the window that Discord destroyed! She just wanted to repair it like a plain old schoolhouse window. But you all know voting for me was the best choice because I convinced the school board to give that window visual appeal!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: 'Course, it doesn't hurt that her mother Spoiled Rich is president of the school board.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Exactly! Which is why when Diamond Tiara is voted student pony president, the school will be putting a statue of her in the center of our schoolyard!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: [through gritted teeth] Silver Spoon! That was my big announcement for when I won!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: I was only trying to help.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: [through gritted teeth] I don't need that kind of help!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Haven't we all had enough of Diamond Tiara?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Do we really need a big statue of her?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Especially where our playground equipment should be?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: A vote for Pip is a vote for the playground!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: A vote for Diamond Tiara is a vote for more Diamond Tiara!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: It's time to make a change This is our chance Don't be afraid to do what's right He's it! Vote for Pip!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: I don't believe what I am hearing I'm the only one you should be cheering Pipsqueak? Try "Pip's weak!" Don't you think?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: We'll let the votin' decide!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Everypony has their little secrets

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Come on now, ponies! Don't listen to her!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: You've gotta vote for change It's time for a new leader End all the tyranny Vote now and we can beat her

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Our victory is in sight

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Stop! Everypony who hasn't voted, listen up!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: I've a tiny suggestion That you should be aware You could probably win this election If you show them all you real<U+0097>

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: I don't recall asking you to speak!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Well, if that's how you treat your best friend, then I choose Pipsqueak!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: It's time for a new leader It's time to make a change We're here to fight for what we believe

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: It's finally time we beat her And play a better game 'Cause when we vote together There's nothing that we can't achieve

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: The votes have been counted! The student pony president is... Pipsqueak!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Huh?!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Oh, my gosh, Crusaders! Pip won!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: I couldn't have won without the hard work of my campaign managers, the Cutie Mark Crusaders!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Campaign manager cutie marks!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Guess you're not as good as you thought, blank flanks! In fact, I demand a recount!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Trust me, Diamond Tiara. Pip won.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: I'll be the judge of that, Miss Cheerilee!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: What?! One vote! Silver Spoon! You didn't vote for me?!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: No, I didn't.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: But you're my best friend!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Am I? 'Cause I tried to help by mentioning your 'surprise' statue, and suddenly I wasn't even allowed to speak! You could have actually won this election if you just listened to me. You wanna know how? [whispering] Sorry. I'm not allowed to speak.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: [to Cutie Mark Crusaders and Pipsqueak] What? I don't have to follow her drum any more.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: I know Diamond Tiara's been pretty awful, but... we should probably make sure she's okay. Just 'cause she's never cared about anypony else's feelings doesn't mean we shouldn't care about hers.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Because... I didn't win.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Sorry mother.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Hm.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: If I'm a diamond Then why do I feel so rough? I'm as strong as a stone Even that's not enough

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Is it weird that I feel bad for her?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: If it is, then... I'm weird, too.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: She wants to change, but she doesn't know how.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Seems like she could use a friend or two to help her figure it out.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Hey, Diamond Tiara! Wait up!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: What do you three want? To gloat? Rub in my defeat?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Actually, we wanted to invite you to our clubhouse to hang out.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Really?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Yeah, for real!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Well, thanks to you all, I don't have any important class president business to attend to or anything. So I might as well.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: That sounds like a yes...

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: So, do you three just sit around here plotting out different ways to try and get your cutie marks?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Actually, yeah.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: You three are... really lucky.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: We are?!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Yeah! You get to explore all these options, learning who you really are before you're stuck with something you don't understand.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: But... you've done that, right?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Yeah, 'cause I have my cutie mark! And I'm not struggling at all to figure out who I'm supposed to be and what I'm supposed to be doing with this mark that's already on my flank!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Uh... are you sure about that?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: [scoffs] That's a weird question.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Not really, since we kind of overheard you yesterday.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Were you trying to get your cutie mark in spying? Is that on your little chart?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: No! We were just worried about you when you lost the election, and then you lost your friend, and then your mom yelled at you...

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: We know you wanna change, and we think we can<U+0097>

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: [muffled] Help!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Cutie Mark Crusaders! I was at the school board meeting and they didn't approve my request for the new playground equipment!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Why not?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: There's no money in the budget! So I checked my Peggy bank to see if I had enough bits, but my little Peggy wasn't nearly full enough!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Don't worry, Pip!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: We'll meet you back at school.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: And help you find a solution!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Thanks, Cutie Mark Crusaders!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Oh, I already have a solution! Our new student pony president is gonna be kicked out of office, and I'll be reinstated!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Where's she going?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Where do you think?! C'mon! After her!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Wait! I'm coming too!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Cutie Mark Crusaders, get out of my way Those ponies need to know the truth And they'll hear it from me

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Stop! Diamond Tiara, this is not the way You know you're better than this hostility

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: You don't even know me at all Don't understand the meaning of my fall What my family would think if I ever Fail at anything

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Stop! This is not the answer Wait! And it's plainly seen Listen! You can redeem yourself But by helping others, not by being mean

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Everypony, I have an announcement!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Diamond Tiara! Think hard about the choice you're makin' right now!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: You can be a better pony!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: No, mother!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: You've spent your life acting like a high horse and raised me to follow in your hoofprints! At first I thought this was fine, but then I finally realized I wanted something you don't have <U+0096> friends!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: These are the Cutie Mark Crusaders, and they are my friends! You need to stop calling them such mean and hurtful names! They are working harder to get their cutie marks than anypony I've ever seen! And they will get them exactly when they discover their true talent, which I guarantee will be amazing! Now, will you please deliver this to father?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: I have to thank you, Crusaders. Obviously I've known since I got my cutie mark that my talent is getting other ponies to do what I want. I just asked my father if he could donate the money for the new playground equipment!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: [to Pipsqueak] I knew you were worried for a second there, weren't you? Ha! Well, I think it's all gonna work out just fine, Mister President!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: We'll build a playground For all of us to enjoy So full of games There's enough for each girl and boy

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: I've been thinkin', Crusaders. We spend an awful lot of time fussin' and frettin' tryin' to discover our true talent. But when we take a little time off, we end up helpin' other ponies figure out their true talent!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Yeah, and I think that's way more important than worrying about our cutie marks, don't you?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Absolutely! I don't care if I ever get my cutie mark as long as I get to hang out with my best friends.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: So what do you say, Crusaders? Want to just focus on helpin' others find their cutie marks?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: What happened?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: What's goin' on?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: It's your cutie marks! They're amazing!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: We all got the same cutie mark! Cutie Mark Crusaders forever!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: We were searching for our cutie marks For a while there Trying to find out how we fit in

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Now we know what it took all along

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: And our journey here is never really done

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: For it is more than just a mark It's a place for us to start

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: An adventure that has only just begun

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: All right, everypony! Get ready for the biggest cute-cea<f1>era celebration ever!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Oh, sugarcube, if Mom and Dad were here, they'd be so proud of ya.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Oh... Thanks, Applejack.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Now go on and party with your pals.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: I'm so proud of you, little buddy You've taught me a thing or two

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: You've inspired everypony around you And you've inspired me too

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Well, what do you think, Crusaders? Were these cutie marks totally worth waiting for or what?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Yeah! I can't wait to see who we're gonna help next!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: We started out just three Crusaders driven to see What we find in our hearts Discover our destiny

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Five hundred and sixty-six, five hundred and sixty-seven, five hundred and sixty-eight... Phew! Look at that, Pound Cake! I am so close to breaking my personal cupcake-icing record!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Mrs. My goodness! I can't believe what I'm seeing here!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Pretty impressive if I do say so myself.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Mrs. Pinkie, would you mind watching the counter while I pop to the supply room? We've just received a very special order, and the ingredients need to be perfect.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Okie-dokie-lokie.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Mrs. Thanks, dear!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: A baby?! Shining Armor and Princess Cadance are having a baby?! [squeals] This is the best news ever! I can't wait to tell Twilight!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Mrs. Oh, em, Pinkie, uh... [whispers] it's a top secret surprise.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: A top secret surprise?! That means I have to keep the exciting news... [gulps] ...to myself!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Even though I didn't technically make a Pinkie Promise to Mrs. Cake, I can't tell Twilight or anypony the big news! That would make me a... a... a big old surprise ruiner! Right, Gummy?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Did you take that from Pound Cake again? Don't you know it's wrong to steal from a baby?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: What's all this about a baby?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: What? Who? What? Who said something about a baby?!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: You did, Ms. Pie, just now. What were you talking about?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Great! Everypony's here. Now I don't have to wait any longer to tell you all the wonderful news! Somepony special is coming to visit Ponyville, and I need your help getting everything ready!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: It's...

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Yes, and they're coming<U+0097>

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Yes, on the<U+0097>

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Yes.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Annnnnd?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: And that's it.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Oh.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Uh, how did you know all that?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [nervous laugh] Uh... Pinkie Sense?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: So, you said you needed our help with something?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Follow me.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Sweet posters! Is that Smash Fortune?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: It sure is! When Shining Armor said he wanted to come to the castle and visit, I started collecting things he liked when he was a colt as a surprise!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I've been so excited that it's been hard to keep it to myself!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [slightly muffled] I have no idea what that's like!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Aww, look at the cute little ant farm!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: And check out all these old comic books!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Be careful! They're mint-in-bag!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: What's this?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: This is Brutus Force. Shining Armor used to carry him around like his baby!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: It is a bit juvenile for castle d<e9>cor, but it is very sweet of you.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I'm sure Shining Armor will love it.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Me, too. But there's a few more things I'd like to add before he gets here, and I could really use a hoof collecting them.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Whatever you need, sugarcube, we'll help you get it.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Thanks, everypony! I just can't wait 'til they walk in and see everything!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Totally understandable. Watching somepony else be surprised with something is almost better than being the one who's getting the surprise!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: But... eh... what if the surprise is something so incredibly exciting that a pony can't keep it in any longer, and she has to tell the pony standing next to her what it is or she might explode?!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I would say... no.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: The pony who ruins a surprise for somepony else has to live with that guilt forever!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [nervous laugh] Gotta bounce!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: So, I know the bar is set pretty high, but does anypony else think Pinkie Pie was acting weirder than usual?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [heavy breathing] Phew, that was close! Too close. I almost spilled the beans. Beans that would be really hard to clean up! I obviously can't be around my friends right now. Or anypony for that matter! Hmmm... That's it! If Shining Armor and Cadance are coming tomorrow, then all I have to do is lock myself in my room away from everypony until they arrive! Then I won't ruin anything!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Mr. Oh, good, you're back! Mrs. Cake needs my help, but these deliveries can't wait! I can't thank you enough for agreeing to be my backup delivery pony, Pinkie!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I... did?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Mr. Maybe I should hire somepony to be my backup delivery pony.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I'll do it!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Mr. Really?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Sure! There's no possible way that I could ever have anything that might interfere with doing that task, like a gigantic, emotionally exhausting surprise that would make it super hard to be around other ponies.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Mr. Great! Uh, you're sure you won't change your mind?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: No way! Cross my heart and hope to fly, stick a cupcake in my eye!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Oh, yeah. I Pinkie Promised I'd do it. And I never break a Pinkie Promise! Never!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Mr. Well, thanks again! You're a real cake-saver!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [deflates, sighs] Hm. Maybe it'll be a quiet day and I can just avoid everypony!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Hiya, Pinkie Pie!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Heard any good gossip today?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Yeah, we're bored. Please say you have some interesting news.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Nope!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: You were in such a rush earlier. Twilight wanted me to ask you if you would bring some snacks to the castle for Shining Armor and Cadance's visit.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Definitely! Got it! Pinkie Promise! Yeah! Heh.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: You know, maybe some baby carrots...

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [nervous laugh] What did you say?!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Baby carrots! They're Shining Armor's favorite.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Mine too! Baby carrots are kinda like big carrots but smaller, kinda like how foals are tiny versions of their parents but smaller and cuter and<U+0097> Albino squirrel!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Where? Is it Albert?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: It's time to kick this operation into hyper-hoof and avoid all ponies by any means necessary!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: It didn't feel good ignoring my friends like that... Maybe I can tell just one little pony the surprise?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [with reverb] The pony who ruins a surprise for somepony else has to live with that guilt forever!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: You're right, spooky-reflection-of-Rarity-that-I-know-is-actually-my-own-imagination. I can't tell anypony at all! [sighs] Then they would tell Twilight, and she wouldn't be surprised, and it would be all my fault.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [sighs] Finally, I'm all aloney on my owney.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Wow, great idea! I'm starving too! [chewing] [with mouth full] This apple is delicious! [swallows] What are you having, Gummy? Oh, no! It's the list that Twilight helped me make yesterday so I wouldn't forget all of my Pinkie Promises today! And I have three more things to do! Aw, four if you count bringing those snacks to Twilight's castle! I've been getting liberal with those Pinkie Promises lately...

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Ooh! I want a flamingo!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I want a goldfish!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Surprise me!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Is that a... baby bottle?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [screams] No! It's a... a... puppy! Ha ha, woof woof, ha ha! Eh...

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Are you sure? Because it looks like a<U+0097>

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Next!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Interesting choice of words, Featherweight.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I don't know. Was it?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: My, your friends weren't kidding when they said you had a great filing system, Pinkie! You are Ponyville's best kept secret!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: No, I'm not!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [hushed] Speaking of secrets, have you ever known somepony else's secret?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Noooooo...

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [hushed] A surprise that was so big and exciting that it was all you could think about?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Nope!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [strangled sigh] Me neither...

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: You're welcome!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [reading] "Treat your foal like... royalty"?!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Those look yummy, Pinkie! Let me help you! But we better cover them up so they don't get spoiled.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Why would they get spoiled? We're all gonna eat them super soon!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Oh, didn't anypony tell you? Shining Armor and Cadance are held up. They may not arrive 'til Saturday.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Whaaaaaaaaaat?! [hyperventilating] You mean... [breathes] I have... [breathes] to wait... [breathes] another whole day?! I don't know if I can!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Pinkie Pie, do you have something you need to say? You seem like you've been keeping something in.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: We're here to listen.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Well, go on then, sugarcube.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: We're not going to judge you, darling.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: You'll feel so much better once you get it off your chest!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Come on.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Whatever it is, you can tell us! We're best friends! [with reverb] Friends! Friends! Friends!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [with reverb] Tell!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Okay, okay, you win! [inhales] Shining Armor and Cadance are gonna have a<U+0097>

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: An awesome weekend with the best little sister in all of Equestria!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [giggles] Hi, everypony.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Shining Armor, Cadance! You're early! I thought something had come up and you weren't gonna make it until Saturday!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: So did we. Turned out we weren't needed in Maretonia until next week. And the summit we were supposed to attend today had to be rescheduled, so... we got here even sooner than planned!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Surprise!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: It's wonderful to see you all again!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Well, the pleasure's all ours, Princess.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I'm so glad you're here! I have a big surprise for you!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Oh, yeah?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [hushed] Lucky we came when we did, huh? I'm guessing you saw the scroll we sent to Mr. and Mrs. Cake? Hey, I'm impressed you've been able to keep our secret this long!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: So you're gonna tell Twilight now?!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [hushed] You're gonna have to wait just a little bit longer. We have something special planned. It'll be worth it, I promise.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: It'd better be.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: So, do you think Shining Armor liked his surprise?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Didn't you see him? He couldn't stop raving about it!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Where did Shining Armor and Cadance say they'd meet us? [stomach rumbling] I'm starving!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: In the town square. I wish they'd waited to walk over with us, but they said they had something to take care of first!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [through gritted teeth] They're gonna have a lot more to take care of soon...

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: What?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Nothiiiiiiing!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: That's odd. Usually they're quite punctual.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Ughhh! I need a hayburger in my belly right now!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: What does it say?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: A scavenger hunt! Shining Armor used to set these up for me when I was a filly! At the end, there was always a big prize, like a new book, or several new books, or<U+0097>

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: We get the picture! You like books!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: So what's the first clue?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I hope it's something about eating lunch!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [reading quickly] "You've got a scroll, you're on a roll, why don't you take a peek where young ones spend their week? A piece of paper will continue this caper."

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I've got it! "Where the young ones spend their week."

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I'm not quite followin'.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: It's the Ponyville Schoolhouse!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: "A piece of paper will continue this caper." [gasps] It's in the Foal Free Press!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Ooh, look at that dress Mayor Mare is wearing in the social report! Why, it's stunning!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Uh, didn't you make that, Rarity?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Yes, what is your point?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Focus, everypony!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: You know, there's really no time limit on these scavenger hunts, Pinkie.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [reading] "Though this hall is rather small, in it you'll find files of all kinds. Take a look on the back of the birth certificate of Applejack."

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I don't like where this is goin'.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Baby! A royal ba<U+0097>!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: A-hem?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Does anypony know where the birth certificates are kept?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Ooh! I do, I do! Go down that hall, then you take a left, then a right, then another right, then a slight left, and it's the third door from the right!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Wow, Pinkie. I never knew you knew so much about town hall.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: There's a lot of things I know! That you don't know I know!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Oh, you're so cute.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [reading] "This next place is where you can buy a table or chair, or some comfy beds to rest little heads"?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Ugh, really? None of you? [groan] It's obviously the furniture store! Go in, go in, go in!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I don't know...

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Daagh, fine!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Wow, you're scary good at this, Pinkie Pie.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [reading quickly] "It seems we've saved the best for last. We hope that you have had a blast. Now it's time to take a break where you can get a slice of cake!"

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [scoffs] That was an easy one.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Surprise! Twily, did you like the scavenger hunt?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: It was perfect! Just like old times, except even better because this time I got to share it with my best friends! There's just one thing missing, isn't there?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: What's that?

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Mmmm, the book prize at the end!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [laughs] There's still a prize, but it's a little different this time.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Oh. I don't understand.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: All the places we sent you today had something in common.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: First we went to the schoolhouse...

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: And then we read the Foal Free Press... After that we found Applejack's birth certificate... And then the last clue was under a crib.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Hmmm... School... foal... birth certificate... and crib... [gasps] Can it be? Are you two...?!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: A baby, Twilight! It's a baby! Woo-hoo!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: You mean... I'm going to be an aunt?! This is the best prize ever!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Oh, I love you guys! And I can't wait to meet your little foal!

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: Neither can we.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: I did it, I did it, I did it, I did it! [squee] [pop] Go, Pinkie.

title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
dialog: [giggles] You did it, Pinkie Pie! You kept it a surprise! Thank you! Was it much trouble?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Happy Hearth's Warming Eve!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Shucks, Twilight! Y'all done it up nice and cozy in here.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: We're about to hang our Hearth's Warming dolls if you wanna join us.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Oh, that's mighty sweet of you, but we're just stoppin' in to wish y'all a happy Hearth's Warmin' before we go.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I think it's sweet that your families are spending the holiday together.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Picture the most fun-tacular thing you can think of. Now multiply that times infinity! Whoo! It's gonna be great!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: That's us. See you later!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Now can we open presents?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: But tonight is Hearth's Warming Eve. Everypony knows you don't open presents 'til tomorrow.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: When Spike and I spent our first Hearth's Warming Eve together, he couldn't wait all night to open his presents! Ever since then, we've always opened them the night before!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: It's kinda like our tradition!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: That's not how our family does it, and I reckon it can't be how Pinkie's does it. Is it?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: No sirree!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: To each their own, I suppose.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Agh! Gotta go, bye!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Just what I always wanted! A book...

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: It's so excitin'! Related or not, it's gonna be a hoot havin' our families together under one roof!

title: Hearthbreakers
