dialog: Apples and Pies together again for the first time! Maybe. Unless we're related! Which maybe we're not. I think I just confused myself.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Friends or family, this here's about togetherness.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [mouth full] Have you tried the Equestria flag crepes? The blue is blueberry! And don't tell Granny I saw, but her trunk is full of presents!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Now hang on, sugarcube. You know Hearth's Warmin' isn't just about candy and presents, right?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Uh-oh. That's your boring sisterly lecture voice.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: 'Fraid so! [clears throat] A long time ago, the Earth ponies, Pegasus ponies, and unicorn ponies weren't friends.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [as unicorn pony] I don't like you! [as Pegasus pony] I don't like you either!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: But then, the icy chill of the Windigos almost iced up everythin'. So the ponies decided to work together, and their friendship drove them nasty critters away.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [as Pegasus pony] Beat it, Windigos!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Triumphant, they raised a new flag to celebrate all three tribes, and Equestria was born.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Uh, what happened to the flag?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Is that why we celebrate with a flag raisin' tomorrow?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Mm-hmm! And tonight, we'll have the traditional Hearth's Warmin' Eve dinner to remember the shared bounties of our ancestors.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: We do that too!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Then we'll hang our Hearth's Warmin' dolls over the fireplace to remind us of the warmth shared on that fateful night.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: That's what our family does too!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: And tomorrow, we open presents!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Ah! We do that too!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Sounds like the Apples and the Pies do everything the same way!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: "Rooftastic"?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: As in, I'm gonna stand on the roof and yell to everypony how rooftastic this is!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: What if our families don't like each other?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [deadpan] I'm so excited to see you, Pinkie Pie. You too, Applejack. I hope you had fun sledding yesterday.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: How'd you know that?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [deadpan] Isn't it obvious? There are specks of extrusive andesite on your hoof. It's a mountain rock.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [hushed] Oh, she's good.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: How's school going?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [deadpan] If you thought quartz was high on the Mohs hardness scale, wait 'til I tell you about corundum.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I missed you so much!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: This place looks amazin'!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Come on, everypony! Meet my super-mega-fun-derful family! Everypony, meet everypony!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Y'all gabbin' with words real funny-like. Wh-wh-what'd you say them names were? "Iggy"? And I'm just gonna call you "Big Mama Q"!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Aye aye, Captain Grumpy! No one's gonna mess with your precious mine!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [sighs] Everypony stay away from Holder's Boulder. There, you happy now?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: And you must be<U+0097>

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: This is Marble Pie, my baby sister who's only a few minutes younger than me but she'll always be a baby to me, isn't that right? She's so excited to meet everypony! Oh, and she wishes you all a happy Hearth's Warming!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [hushed, to Apple Bloom] Guess Pinkie Pie always did the talkin' for her.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [whistles] Attention!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I'll just be a second. Everypony get settled in! There's plenty of room upstairs. And then it's time for Hearth's Warming Eve dinner!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [hushed] So far, so good, cousin!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Hee-hee!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Oh, I can't wait to taste their fresh sweet rolls! They're my favorite part of Hearth's Warmin' Eve dinner.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I'm more of a six-layer bean dip filly myself!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I love that too! Oh, Applejack, do you think theirs'll be even better than ours?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Well, that's a mighty tall order, but it wouldn't surprise me in the least.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Are you excited for dinner time? Because guess who is! Spoiler alert <U+0096> it's me!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: What about hot rolls and mulled cider and double-baked pot pie?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Uh, what about six-layer bean dip?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [deadpan] We have rock soup.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Potato, po-tah-to. Double-baked pot pie, rock soup! Dinner is dinner. Am I right or am I right?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Yeah, um, you know what? This is what we were expectin'! Right, everypony?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [slurping, exhales] Is everything all right, Applejack?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: More rock, please!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Eat up, so we can get to our Hearth's Warming dolls!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Now that's somethin' I know all about!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Who wants a Hearth's Warming doll?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Are you sayin' that rock is a Hearth's Warmin' doll?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Don't be silly, silly!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Our dolls are these little pieces! Isn't that right, Marble Pie?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Our dolls are... rocks?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Uh... y'all don't have traditional crocheted dolls passed down in your family?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Aww, you're just a frown factory because you got a weird rock. Cheer up! I'm sure you'll do great in the flag finding mission!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: The what findin' what now?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Limestone Pie, you're the judge! Big Mac, Marble Pie, you're team one! Apple Bloom and Maud, you're team two! Ma, Pa, you're gonna be with Granny Smith. Don't think of it as team old. Think of it as team three! And I'm with Applejack of course, since we might be cousins!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: So now that we're all split up, mind tellin' us what we're doin'?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: As everypony knows<U+0097>

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Sheesh. When the three tribes united to form Equestria, the first flag was sewn by Nimble Thimble. It's tradition to raise a flag on Hearth's Warming to celebrate that famous day.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: But who gets to put the flag on Holder's Boulder?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: You mean on the flagpole?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: No, silly, it goes on the highest point! And who's the lucky pony?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Traditionally, it's the youngest<U+0097>

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [quickly] On your marks, get set, go!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Pinkie Pie, will you please tell us what's goin' on?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I'll explain on the way!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I still don't understand.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Earlier today, Limestone Pie hid an obsidian stone. Whoever finds it gets to raise the flag!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: It's all just so... complicated, and... rock-based.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Well, how else would we do it?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I don't know. I sure hope everypony else is havin' a better time.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Eeeeeeeeeyup.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: So, how'd you meet this Iggy feller?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Hoo-wee, I gots to look into this oldfangled choosin' stone thing. You reckon it knows any apple-farmin' hunks?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: What does the rock look like?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [deadpan] It looks like something that formed when volcanic lava cooled quickly.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Oh.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [deadpan] Have you ever wished you could turn into a rock?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I had a dream once I was an apple.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [deadpan] We have a lot in common when it comes to thinking about turning into things.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Found it, found it, found it!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: A picture? I've been lookin' for a real stone, Pinkie Pie!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Um, that would be weird. Do you know what this means? I get to raise the flag, and now it's time to hide the presents!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Y'all hide your presents?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Of course! What's more fun than getting a present? Finding a present! Although, most years, nopony finds one.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: So nopony gets presents?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Eh, not usually.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: So lemme get all this straight. You're only allowed to eat rock soup for dinner, then the pony who finds this rock gets to raise the flag, but not really 'cause you don't got no flagpole, and to top it off, you don't even get presents?!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Well, it doesn't sound very fun when you say it that way.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Well, how 'bout you picture this? Both our families, openin' presents, raisin' the flag...?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Picturing it... Loving it...!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Goodnight, everypony!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Goodnight, Pinkie Pie! [hushed] We've gotta do somethin', y'all! Pinkie Pie's family never had a real Hearth's Warmin'!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Is that really what she said?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Well, I-I'm sure it's what she meant.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: These are their traditions.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [sighs] I know they have their traditions and we have ours, but I just want them to see how much better theirs could be.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Hearth's Warming!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: It's Hearth's Warmin', Apple-style! We've been doin' everythin' your way, I thought we could mix it up a bit! Marble Pie, you could raise the Equestria flag up this pole, because you're the youngest Pie! Ma and Pa Pie, we'll cook you up a meal you'll never forget! And look, we all get presents without havin' to find 'em!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: ...Yeah, this is gonna be great! All the stuff she's said. Right, everypony?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Well, I wanna be one big family!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I, um, well, I-I don't know! [tearing up] Don't make me choose!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I didn't mean to cause a fuss... Why don't we just open presents around the flag pole? It'll be fun, you'll see!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Excuse me. You planted your pole on a fault line.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Oh, boy.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: You didn't have to ask them to leave!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: This was all a misunderstanding, everypony! I know Applejack, and she'd never do anything bad to anypony!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Then it's my fault too...

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Prob'ly best if we head back to Sweet Apple Acres. Maybe in time we'll be friends again, but for the now it's best if we give them a little space.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I wish we didn't have to. I really like Maud. She's sweet once you get to know her. They all are. Worst Hearth's Warmin' ever.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Eh, has anypony seen Applejack?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [sniffling] I really cracked the corn this time.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [sniffling] I really popped the pi<f1>ata this time.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Pinkie Pie?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [yelps] What are you doing here?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: What are you doin' here?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I'm too ashamed to go back up there. Your family, my family, they all must think I'm such a nincompoop.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Aw, no one thinks that! Pushy, aggressive, mean... Oh, I'm not helping. Sorry.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I'm sorry I forced my traditions over yours. I don't want you to have to choose between the family you were born into and the friends who love you like one. I really hoped we could be one big happy family. I guess not.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Don't say that!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I wish I could stay, but I have a train to catch.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [crying] H-Ha... Happy Hearth's Warming.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [tearing up] You too.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: You want to know why Holder's Boulder's so danged important? [exhales] Well, now their great-great-great-great-great-great-grandfather Holder Cobblestone <U+0096> he found that boulder in a dragon's nest, older than time itself! He built the family farm around it, even though it was just an ordinary rock. It always brought them good luck.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Aw, crickets! That is important! I got so caught up in the things they were doin', I never asked why they did 'em!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [reading] To Applejack, from Pinkie Pie. Cousins forever.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: You just found your first Pie Hearth's Warmin' present ever!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [laughing] Only Pinkie Pie could hide a present on a movin' train. ...What a great tradition. [beat] Stop the train!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [straining] Come on... you... boulder, come on... agh!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [deadpan] I'm pushing as hard as I can too.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Need a little help?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [gasps] Apples!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I wasn't tryin' to take your traditions away, I was tryin' to share ours. I was so focused on us bein' one big happy family, I thought we needed the same traditions right away. What I should've done was learn about yours and teach you about ours. And over time, we'd make new traditions together. I'm sorry, y'all.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: I think we've just invented our first combined tradition! Pushing Holder's Boulder out of the quarry! [squeals] I can't wait for Applejack to knock it over next Hearth's Warming!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Marble Pie, you want to wish Big Mac a happy Hearth's Warming, don't you! And you too, right, Big Mac?

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [short giggle] Eeyup.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Eh, lemme see here, uh... 'If thou ask-eth me, uh, thou two art, eh, okay-eth in my book'.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Happy Hearth's Warming!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Happy Hearth's Warmin', Pinkie Pie.

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: Attention, everypony! Maud wants to sing some Hearth's Warmin' carols that she wrote!

title: Hearthbreakers
dialog: [deadpan] The first one is about rocks. They're all about rocks. [reading, deadpan] Hearth's Warming is great. Like calcium silicate. What a wonderful day. As good as mica or clay.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Fuzzy Legs, do you think you could secure those windows?

title: Scare Master
dialog: And you'll alert me if anything scary comes close to the cottage?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, who am I kidding? When something scary comes close to the cottage! Please tell me my hiding place is ready.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, look, you've filled it with everything I need to survive this awful night. Thank you. Thank you all! Now I don't have to step a hoof outside until this whole thing is over.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, no! You don't have any carrots? Do we have any other fresh veggies you may enjoy?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Or maybe some hay? But that means I'll need to go out... on Nightmare Night!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Fluttershy? What're you doin' out and about? It's Nightmare Night, remember?

title: Scare Master
dialog: How could I forget? Oh, I don't suppose I could borrow a few pieces of hay from you? I forgot to stock up on food for Angel, and you do seem to have quite a lot.

title: Scare Master
dialog: We need it for the Apple Family Haunted Maze. [spooky voice] The scariest maze that there ever was. Who knows what lurks inside?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, I'm sure I don't.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Is that a mummified pony that just leaped out at ya?

title: Scare Master
dialog: I don't know. Is it?

title: Scare Master
dialog: And what's that crunchin' sound beneath yer hooves? Maybe it's the bones of ponies that didn't make it out alive!

title: Scare Master
dialog: B-B-B-B-Bones?!

title: Scare Master
dialog: And are those peeled grapes or a thousand slimy eyeballs starin' at ya from beyond the grave?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Please tell me they're grapes!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Huh. I wonder what got stuck in her craw.

title: Scare Master
dialog: You think it's scary now, just wait until it's done.

title: Scare Master
dialog: That's okay. I'll take your word for it.

title: Scare Master
dialog: [grunts] Hey, wait a minute! It's Nightmare Night and you're here and not holed up in your cottage! Does this mean what I think it means?

title: Scare Master
dialog: That I foolishly forgot to stock up on food for Angel and had to go out to get him something but got spooked in town so I came here hoping Twilight had some lettuce I could give him?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh. I thought maybe you decided to come out with us tonight.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Goodness, no! I couldn't be out tonight. I just couldn't.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Technically speaking, you already are out right now.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh. I guess that is true.

title: Scare Master
dialog: So what if you stayed out a little longer with your friends? I know they'd be super excited.

title: Scare Master
dialog: You think so?

title: Scare Master
dialog: You would make them so happy if you joined in. They wouldn't believe their eyes! Come on, Fluttershy, what do you say?

title: Scare Master
dialog: And then it got very, very quiet and suddenly they realized the balloons had never been inflated!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Did I ever tell you about the night that the mannequin came to life and haunted all the costumes?

title: Scare Master
dialog: What happened?

title: Scare Master
dialog: I just told you, darling. A mannequin came to life and haunted all the costumes.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Hi, everypony.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Fluttershy, what are you doing here? Is everything okay?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Everything is fine. In fact, it's more than fine. I've decided to join you in your Nightmare Night festivities.

title: Scare Master
dialog: [scoffs] Seriously? You? Out? Tonight?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Every Nightmare Night, I shut myself in my cottage and refuse to come out until morning. But it's just like when I was afraid to sing in front of anypony. If I hadn't given it a try, I never would've found out how much I enjoy it.

title: Scare Master
dialog: And we'd have missed out on how great you sound.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Fluttershy with us on Nightmare Night? Why, that's positively the most wonderful news I've heard in ages!

title: Scare Master
dialog: You can get dressed up in a costume with us and play Nightmare Night games with us and eat candy apples with us!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Don't forget the best part. Goin' through my family's corn maze!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, right. The maze.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Uh, only if you're up for it.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, I am! I am ready to take on Nightmare Night!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Mummy? No. Headless pony? No. Vampire fruit bat? Ugh, definitely no. You see, Fluttershy, the beauty of Nightmare Night is that you don't have to dress up as something scary.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Ooh! Yes. This one will look gorgeous on you. Period costumes are all the rage this year. What? No good?

title: Scare Master
dialog: What if we encounter something terrifying and need to get away quickly? All those layers could slow me down, or worse, make me trip!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh. I never... considered that. Never fear!

title: Scare Master
dialog: [hums] Ooh, now this is a real stunner! I call it "Masquerade"! Just a simple black dress underneath but with this ornately decorated mask!

title: Scare Master
dialog: A mask?

title: Scare Master
dialog: No?

title: Scare Master
dialog: They can just be so difficult to see out of.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Yes, but this one has eyeholes.

title: Scare Master
dialog: W-What about being able to see what's to the left or right of me?

title: Scare Master
dialog: I suppose your vision would be somewhat obscured. It's your first Nightmare Night out and about, and we do want you to be comfortable.

title: Scare Master
dialog: What if I just wear the dress?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, sure, dear. That's... fine. [to herself] It's so plain, it's frightening. [out loud] Oh, my! Look at all of you! My costumes fit you to a T!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Hoo-wee, we're gonna have the best time!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Hey, Fluttershy, where's your costume?

title: Scare Master
dialog: I'm wearing it.

title: Scare Master
dialog: [gasps] I get it! You're a robber escaping into the night! You're a ninja escaping into the night! You're black licorice escaping into the night!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Close. I'm going to a masquerade ball. Without the mask.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, that's great! Isn't it great?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, yeah.

title: Scare Master
dialog: So creative.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Great costume.

title: Scare Master
dialog: I figured I'd save the really scary games for next year when Fluttershy's more used to it.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Okay... go!

title: Scare Master
dialog: [grunting] Good luck beating that, Fluttershy!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Well, um, it's just that if I'm blindfolded and somepony were to leap out in front of me, I'd never have the chance to defend myself.

title: Scare Master
dialog: That's fine, darling. You don't have to do anything you don't want to.

title: Scare Master
dialog: We're just glad you're here.

title: Scare Master
dialog: We don't have to finish that game. I have another one I know you'll love! Bobbing for apples!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Fluttershy, what's wrong?

title: Scare Master
dialog: It's just that, um... What happens if, when my head is deep down in the water, some kind of scary monster appears? How would I even hear to know I was under attack?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Time for candy!

title: Scare Master
dialog: It is?

title: Scare Master
dialog: I made candy bags. Each bag has been made with each of you in mind, complete with each of your favorite candies!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Ha! Awesome!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Here. Take it. Take it! What are you waiting for?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Well, it's just... What if when I'm eating one of these chewy taffies, my mouth becomes glued shut and I can't scream for help?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, goodness. We've only just started to celebrate Nightmare Night together, and I'm already taking all the fun out of it, aren't I?

title: Scare Master
dialog: You're not taking out all of the fun.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Just, like, ninety per<U+0097>

title: Scare Master
dialog: ...Some of it.

title: Scare Master
dialog: I really wanna do this. But there's just so many things that terrify me about tonight. I couldn't possibly predict what might upset me.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Unless... you were the one doing the scaring!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Her scaring us? [laughing] Oh. You're being serious.

title: Scare Master
dialog: The thing you hate is being scared, but if you're the one doing the scaring, then...

title: Scare Master
dialog: Then I can help you all have fun and I can still be a part of Nightmare Night!

title: Scare Master
dialog: So you like that idea?

title: Scare Master
dialog: I think I do! And I don't want to get ahead of myself, but I think I have the perfect idea for how I'm gonna do it!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Really? Oh, this is so exciting!

title: Scare Master
dialog: [spooky voice] Meet me at my cottage in an hour. [normal voice] Oh, I'm excited to see everypony soon!

title: Scare Master
dialog: [spooky voice] Welcome to Fluttershy's tea party!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Did she just say "tea party"?

title: Scare Master
dialog: It sounds like it's a scary tea party?

title: Scare Master
dialog: [spooky voice] Have a seat. Don't be scared of what awaits you. Go on. Pass the sugar. Oh, no! There is none! You're a terrible host! Rarity, put your coat on!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Why would I do that?

title: Scare Master
dialog: [spooky voice] You need to cover up because no one has complimented your dressssssss! Pinkie Pie, look to your left and ask your best friend to pass the cucumber sandwiches!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Huh? I can't. There's nopony there.

title: Scare Master
dialog: [spooky voice] That's right. Because she didn't care to show uuuuuup.

title: Scare Master
dialog: What?

title: Scare Master
dialog: [spooky voice] A friend who didn't come through. That must scare you to the coooore. Quick, everypony, look behind you!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Uh, what are those?

title: Scare Master
dialog: [spooky voice] They're unplanned guests. Your woooorst nightmare. You don't have enough food for them! Oh, no! There's a tiny kitten that needs a home! But you are over-scheduled right now. You don't have time to help! I said, "You don't have time to help!" This should appear to scare you! [normal voice] Why don't you look terrified? You showed up to a party and everypony was extremely disappointed in you. Can you imagine anything more upsetting?

title: Scare Master
dialog: It was a really good try, darling, but the scares at Nightmare Night are of an entirely different nature.

title: Scare Master
dialog: It was really creative, though. I never would have thought of... all this.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, I'm just not cut out for this. Just go on without me.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, no. We couldn't possibly.

title: Scare Master
dialog: You have to. This is the night you look forward to all year.

title: Scare Master
dialog: We could... stay here?

title: Scare Master
dialog: It's okay. I really want you all to have fun. This is how I spend every Nightmare Night. Please go. I'll be fine.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Eh, it's funny. I actually thought she had an idea for something really scary for a second there.

title: Scare Master
dialog: She definitely tried her hardest.

title: Scare Master
dialog: I did try my hardest.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Or... maybe not. I suppose I could have gone with something a bit scarier. You're right! I've been taking baby steps! I think it's time for grown up ones! I don't suppose you have any ideas how I could do that?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Everypony's linin' up for the corn maze, y'all! Let's go!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, yeah! I can't believe we're finally doin' this!

title: Scare Master
dialog: It's a good thing Fluttershy isn't here because she would never be able to handle this!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Boooo... Eeyup.

title: Scare Master
dialog: What. Is. That. Sound?

title: Scare Master
dialog: It looks like... bones!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Looks like a bunch of dried sticks painted white to me.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Hey, try to keep up the illusion, would ya?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Whoo!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Agh! What was that?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Don't you know?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Uh, o-of course I do. It was, uh...

title: Scare Master
dialog: [grunts] Fluttershy had a point with the layers on the dress.

title: Scare Master
dialog: What is this? Is it a tunnel? Where does it lead?!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Which way are we supposed to go now?!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Uh, I don't know! I don't know what's goin' on!

title: Scare Master
dialog: [grunts] What do you mean? Didn't you help plan this?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Applejack, didn't you know about any of this?!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Alright, I got to admit I didn't know about any of this, but maybe they're just tryin' to make it interestin' for me, too! I'm sure Granny Smith or Big Mac is behind this.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Scare Master
dialog: [teeth chatter] That's what we were supposed to do! I don't know why we're down here! This is really scarin' me now!

title: Scare Master
dialog: How did that get down here?!

title: Scare Master
dialog: RUUUUUUUUUN!

title: Scare Master
dialog: I can't see!

title: Scare Master
dialog: I can barely move!

title: Scare Master
dialog: It's like glue!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Oh, my! I'm so, so sorry. Can you ever forgive me?

title: Scare Master
dialog: Fluttershy?

title: Scare Master
dialog: It was you the whole time?!

title: Scare Master
dialog: I can't believe it!

title: Scare Master
dialog: That... was...

title: Scare Master
dialog: It was way more terrifying than the most terrifying thing I could have thought of!

title: Scare Master
dialog: You out-nightmared the scariest part of the corn maze!

title: Scare Master
dialog: How did you do all this?!

title: Scare Master
dialog: After you left, I realized that I wasn't ready to give up on Nightmare Night. So I asked Granny Smith if I could try to make the maze even scarier for my friends.

title: Scare Master
dialog: You came up with all of this?

title: Scare Master
dialog: I had some help. Angel was the scary figure that kept scurrying after you in the maze. Fuzzy Legs made the sticky wall that made it difficult for you to see and move. And, of course, Harry was the especially scary monster.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Wow! That was inspired!

title: Scare Master
dialog: You have to do this every year!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Uh-huh!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Absolutely!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Every year!

title: Scare Master
dialog: Yeah!

title: Scare Master
dialog: We could celebrate Nightmare Night together every year. But the truth is I really don't want to.

title: Scare Master
dialog: You don't?!

title: Scare Master
dialog: But you've done it. You found a way that we can all have a fabulous time together.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Yes, but I've also realized something. You all may love Nightmare Night and I may be good at being a part of it, but it's no fun for me to see my friends feel like they're in danger, even if I know they're not. I really don't like it. It's just not my cup of tea.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Spoooooooooky tea?

title: Scare Master
dialog: No. Just regular tea. We do lots of fun things together, but I'm afraid this just isn't gonna be one of them. Actually, I'm not afraid. I'm perfectly fine with it.

title: Scare Master
dialog: Then we are, too.

title: Scare Master
dialog: [sighs] I don't know why I doubted myself for a second. Now this is what I call a perfect Nightmare Night.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [sighs] Didn't we just shelve all the books in the library a few months ago?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Yes, but that was because we needed to! This is just because I want to! I call it my "book-sort-cation"! Three uninterrupted days of reorganizing books. Can you think of anything more relaxing?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Well, claw massages, back rubs, bubble baths... You weren't really looking for an answer, were you?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I've even devised a better system for organizing them. It decreases the amount of time it takes to find a book you're looking for by nearly three quarters of a second!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [flatly] Whoa. That much?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Look at them all. Why, there must be at least twenty thousand books to organize!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Best long weekend ever! I'm sure we can make some time for a claw massage and a back rub too.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Yes! Best long weekend ever!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Whoa! That strange yellow orb in the sky! What is that?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Alright, alright, so it's been a little while since we've seen the sun.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: A little while? We've been in that library for three straight days!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Yes, but they were three very productive days! Even if you did take that two-hour claw massage break.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Hey, you promise a claw massage, I'm getting a claw massage.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: It's not like we missed anything.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Hi, Rainbow Dash. Good to see you, Discord.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Did you rehearse before you found us?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Come on, Rainbow Dash. What's going on here?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [laughing] Sorry. Me and Discord are just messin' around. Like we do.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Since when?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [laughing] Sneaky snake!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [laughing] Just snaking around!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: It is?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Kind of an inside joke from this weekend. You wouldn't really get it unless you were there.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Oh. Okay.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Cool. Well, uh, catch you later, Twilight!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [laughing] Catch you later, Twilight.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: That was strange, right? Since when have Rainbow Dash and Discord had inside jokes?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Since sometime in the last three days, I guess.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Hey! Nopony made you join me on my book-sort-cation.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I'm jokin', I'm jokin'!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Rarity?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [gasps] Twilight! You've returned from your book sorting sabbatical! All that organizing has done wonders for your complexion!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Thanks! It was very relaxing. And we were able to clear a shelf for those old-fashioned books you wanted to donate.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Oh, pfft, they're not old, darling. They're vintage, and they're over there! I've even included my favorites by former Canterlot designer to the stars Rococo Froufrou!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Oh, I love her!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Him.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [laughs nervously] Both.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Twilight! This makes twice I'm seeing you in one day! Aren't I lucky?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Weren't you just with<U+0097>

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Hi, Twilight! Hi, Spike! How was your book-sort-cation?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: It was good!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [giggles] Orange you glad you did it?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Oh, please. You'll make me blush.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: You do seem to be turning a shade of... [gasps] orange!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Oh, sorry, darling. You see, we were at Sweet Apple Acres and, uh, ooh, how to explain...

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Well, let me try and paint her a picture, dearest.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [to himself] "Dearest"?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [imitating Bob Ross] You see, we were all at Sweet Apple Acres, and I ended up turning the trees into the most<U+0097> [normal] Oh, who am I kidding? I simply can't do it justice. You really had to be there.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: We would've invited you to come along too, but we didn't want to interrupt your organizing. We know how important it is to you.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I appreciate that... Speaking of books, I should get these on the shelves.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Hmm. Rainbow Dash bonding with Discord, Rarity finding something he did genuinely funny... Must've been some weekend.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Somepony sorry she missed it?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Of course not.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: What's got you two in hysterics?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [gulps] Oh, we were just reminiscing about the best weekend ever!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [hushed] He's everywhere today, isn't he?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Oh, now where was I? Ah, yes, we had just finished our soup, and then Applejack said, [imitating Applejack] "Peanut butter hoof? Yuck, not even with jelly!"

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Eh, I don't get it.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [laughing] It was hilarious! I wish we'd taken a picture for you!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Oh, well, this should do!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I guess that's funny?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [within laughter] Sticky situation!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Aw, shucks, Twilight. We haven't even asked how your weekend went.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: It was fine!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I am not glum. I'm glad! I'm glad you all had such a good time together. Having inside jokes can really create a lasting bond between friends.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I'm just sorry that all this bonding happened while you were holed up in your castle.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Heh. Oh, don't you worry about Twilight. Bet you were in hog heaven organizin' all them books. Again.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I'm sure I had just as much fun as the rest of you.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I can't believe I missed out on all that bonding!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [gulps] I knew it! You are jealous!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Spike, I'm the Princess of Friendship. I don't get jealous. I'm sorry I missed out because sharing that experience would've helped me with my Princess of Friendship duties!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [chewing] [mouth full] Come again?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: If our friends could enjoy three full days with Discord that much, it must have something to do with the specific things they did together! If we could find out what those things were, it could be a real breakthrough in the science of friendship!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Hm. I guess so.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I know so! You thought our book-sort-cation was fun? This is gonna be even better!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Thank you for coming. I wouldn't have asked you here if it wasn't important.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I love important!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I want to know how these funny moments you shared came to pass. I can use this data to help advance friendships all over Equestria.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Well, I like the sound of that!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Perfect. Let's start with the snake.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I don't know if I can get it out! It's too funny!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Oh, but we must! It's for the greater good! It started when we were helping Granny Smith with her garden...

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Uh, I reckon you mean my sister Apple Bloom.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Eh... All you Apples look the same. And then Rainbow Dash saw a snake!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I think it was a garden hose.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: It was a hose snake. Super deadly.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I recall it bein' a large stick that looked like a hose that, in turn, did in fact resemble a snake.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Point is, we galloped away.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: And it chased after us!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: The hose? A snake? A stick?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: A snake!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: A hose!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: A stick!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: We literally trotted for our lives. Isn't that hilarious?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I guess you had to be there.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I do need to be there.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: But you weren't! And it's already happened! Ooh, are you suggesting...

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Time travel?!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Absolutely not! Time travel is not something to be messed with. We simply need to recreate everything that led to these jokes.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Oh, what a brilliant idea! Shall we begin with the lunch date that kicked off the glorious weekend you missed out on?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Are you sure it was this table?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Uh, does it really matter?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: When it comes to science, everything matters. One change to the equation could ruin the experiment.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Ohhhhhh... it was this table here.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Alright, so you sat down at the table, and then what happened?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Oh, well, first I expressed my displeasure with the design of the menu. It<U+0097>

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I'm sorry to interrupt, but I just noticed something.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Yes?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: The tablecloth. It isn't the same color as the one the restaurant used on the day in question.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: ...Really?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: He's right! The tablecloth was red! I remember because it clashed with the font on the menus.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I don't suppose that means we're gonna need to get a new tablecloth, does it?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Oh, most definitely.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Ooh.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Wowee!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: One change to the equation could ruin the experiment. Twilight said so herself. Anything stand out as being different? Anything at all?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Um, I've noticed a couple of things.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Me too!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Excellent!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: A little to the left! No, my left! A little bit more... Oh, no, no, no, no, no, a little more right!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: The cloud over our table looked like an ice cream sundae!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Perfect!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: No-no-no-no-no, this is barely room temperature! Gar<e7>on! Gar<e7>on, over here!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: No? Nothing?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Are you sure there's not something you've missed? Some other detail about your lunch together that you're forgetting?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Well, I don't know about the rest of you, but I feel we've been pretty exhaustive in our attempts to recreate every single detail of our previous encounter.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Yeah, Twilight. If you don't get it by now, I don't think you're ever gonna get it.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: But it is really important that I figure this out. It's for the good of all Equestria!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Well, perhaps we should have another look at the data we've collected. [gasps] Of course! There is one last variable that we haven't accounted for.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: What?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: You!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Me?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: You weren't there observing us. No matter how hard we try, we can't possibly recreate our weekend of fun exactly as it happened because you'll always be watching, and you weren't there.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: He makes a good point.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: It has only served to prove that moments of levity and bonding between friends simply cannot be recreated so that others might share in the experience.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: He makes another good point!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Oh, don't worry, darling. I'm sure there'll be plenty of other chances for you to share in the kind of [starts giggling] frivolity we had with Discord while you were away.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [laughing] Absolutely.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I'm not buying it. Not for a second. There is definitely something else going on here, Spike!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [gulps] Or maybe there isn't, and you should just drop this whole thing and admit that you're a little jealous!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Even if I'm not able to laugh at what happened, I should be able to figure out why they find it funny. Why they think they had this amazing and hilarious time together. But I can't figure it out! It doesn't make sense!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Some things just can't be explained.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Our friends think something great happened to them while I was away, but no. It was something awful! If we don't break the spell they're under, who knows what terrible things could happen?!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Spell?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Come on, Spike! There's no time to lose!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Zecora, what do you think? Can you undo Discord's magic?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: In what way can you tell that they are indeed under a spell?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: They're having fun with Discord, that's why!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Ah. A friendship with Discord is truly a shock. But who says it is something that we must block?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Trust me, they would never laugh like that unless something magical was involved. It's not that funny. I know funny.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Alright. This potion will break the spell, then you will be able to tell.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Wait. If that's the potion, then what's brewing in your cauldron?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: It ties the room together and emits a warm glow. But if I am to be honest, it's just for show.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [yawns] I wonder why she asked us here so bright and early.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Another map adventure, perhaps?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Nope, no glowing tushies here!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Or maybe it's more of a non-adventure. Maybe she just wants to tell us how last night's slumber went?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Hey, gang!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Ooh, you look excited!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I am excited! We're gonna have fun today!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Yes!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Just one tiny, minuscule, microscopic thing before fun times. I need everypony to sip this potion to break Discord's spell on you!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: A what now?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Don't be embarrassed. So what if Discord cast a spell on you so you thought you had a great time, and now you have all these inside jokes that you seem to be constantly laughing at? Don't worry! You didn't have your defenses up. I get it.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: You're kidding.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Twilight, darling, we simply had a nice time with Discord. As I recall, we spent much of yesterday afternoon reenacting it for you.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Uh-huh. Or you reenacted what you thought was fun but really wasn't because you were under a spell that made you think what happened was fun!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: What kind of fertilizer have you had your nose in, Twilight?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Be honest. The only reason you won't drink the potion is because, deep down in your hearts, you know there's a chance that Discord has you under his power!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Twilight, how could you say such a thing?! I know Discord still makes mistakes sometimes, but you're accusing him of being downright evil!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Yeah! And to top it off, you're accusing us of not being able to tell he was up to something! What do you take us for?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Yeah! [glug] What do you [glug] take us for?!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Dee-licious! Got any more, Twilight?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Hi, Twilight! The gang mentioned we'd all be hanging out together today!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: "The gang"?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [laughing] It's still funny!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: [hushed] So much for that whole "spell" theory.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Ugh. But it's still not funny!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: It's funny if you were there.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: But I wasn't there! I wasn't included! Maybe it's my own fault for staying in and having a book-sort-cation when I could have been making jokes and memories and having a great time with my friends! But I didn't do that, did I?! You all did! You were all there, but<U+0097>! [sighs] I wasn't there. I missed out. And seeing you having all these jokes I wasn't a part of and couldn't understand made me...

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Jealous?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: No. The Princess of Friendship can't get jealous.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Sure you can, Twilight, and none of us begrudge you for it.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: We're sorry if we made you feel left out.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: You didn't do anything wrong. You're allowed to share things that don't include me.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: And you're allowed to feel a little jealous about it. You just have to be able to admit that that's what you're feeling so you can let it go.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: And, you know, not try to make us recreate everything that happened when you weren't around.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Of course none of this would've happened if I hadn't encouraged everypony not to invite you this weekend.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: They wanted me to be there? And you convinced them to not invite me?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Well, I didn't think that they should interrupt you. But now I see that we should have. Oh, I feel just terrible.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: You don't look like you feel terrible.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Better?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Wait a minute. You didn't suggest not inviting Twilight because you wanted to make her feel left out, did you?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Of course not. That whole jealousy thing was just a happy accident.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Certainly we can all agree that Princess Twilight learned a valuable lesson here <U+0096> that even she can have feelings of jealousy, that she should recognize said feelings rather than trying to pretend that she doesn't have them. Mm-hmm. Did I get the tiniest bit of glee out of watching her try to recreate our weekend of fun in the name of science? Oh, most definitely! But what's important here is that it was never my intent to make Twilight feel jealous. That's something that the old me would have tried to do. Orange you glad I've changed?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I said, Orange you glad I've changed?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Orange! Like the ones at the Applejack farm! I-I mean, from this weekend!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: No? Nothing? Really? I thought you'd find this hisss-terical!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: ...Yes, no. Discord, I think these jokes have run their course.

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Only way we'd find them funny now is if you put us all under some kind of spell!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Come on, you'd have to be a complete crazy pony to think he'd do something like that! What are you gonna say next, Pinkie? That we all have to drink some weird potion to break the spell?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: W-W-What's so funny?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Come on, Discord, do we really have to spell it out for you?

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I-I-I don't get it. Somepony want to tell me what's so hilarious? Anypony? Hello?!

title: What About Discord?
dialog: I'm talking to you! You! And-and you and you! W-W-What's funny about spells? I mean, really, I don't get it, I feel left out and I feel really bad about that...

title: What About Discord?
dialog: Sorry, buddy. Guess you had to be there.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Does everyanimal have their copy of Wuthering Hooves? Hooray! I love Furry Friends Book Club! Now, let's discuss the theme of nature as it applies to Hoofcliff's love.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Did somepony leave a light on? Oh, it's me. Oh! It's me!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: We'll continue this discussion when I get back!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: You're here!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Isn't this exciting?!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Oh! You were called, too! Thank goodness. I feel so much better going with a friend.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: I was about to come and get you, but then I got distracted.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Oh.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Ever since the map called us, I've been doing a ton of research.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Testing out potential friendship problems.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Diversifying my solution portfolio.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Ever since the map called us? But that happened five minutes ago.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: I know! But I wanna be one hundred percent prepared! I mean, I'm the Princess of Friendship. How would it look if I couldn't solve a friendship problem?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Oh, I'm so lucky I'm being sent with you. Speaking of which, where are we going?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: The Smokey Mountains!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Oh, I've never been there before.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Neither have I. And there isn't a lot of information on them. All I could find was this. The Smokey Mountains harbor the most beautiful valley in all of Equestria between its two majestic mountain peaks.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: That's gorgeous. And where there's nature, there's a ton of animal friends!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: I can't wait to get started! I'm a little nervous since that's all I could find. I usually like to be a bit more prepared.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: You seem pretty prepared to me. Are those for us?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Yep! I've prepared our things. Snacks, books, blankets, books.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: You said "books" twice.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: There are a lot of books.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Ooh!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: What do ya think our friendship problem's gonna be?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Do you think it'll be a problem about lying?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: [grunts] I'm sure we'll find out when we get there.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: You're right.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Ooh! Could it be about when two friends just randomly decide to do something together, but they forget to invite the third friend, and the third friend feels left out?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Or where one friend tells another friend's secret after they asked them not to?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: [exhausted] We'll know very, very soon. Since we're almost there.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Here. Lemme get that.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: [sighs] Thank you.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Sorry I've been a little skiddly-bopty-boo. I just can't believe this is finally happening!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Whoa!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Whoa! What in Equestria is happening?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: It's nothing like your book said it would be!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Oh, boy. I'm feeling very unprepared. Where do we even start?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Maybe by figuring out where the flying pumpkins are coming from?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Um, hi. Hello. Excuse us, but what are you doing?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Yes, but, um, why are you... "pumpkining" your neighbors?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: I am Twilight Sparkle, the Princess of Friendship. And I am here to solve your friendship problem.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: I'm Fluttershy, and... um... I'm here, too.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Well, maybe there could be if we figure out what the McColts did to make you so mad.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Oh, no!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: I know what to do. We're gonna talk with these McColts and hear their side of the story. Once we have all the facts, we can put an end to this using reason and rationale.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Good plan. [to mice] That's why she's the princess.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: In the meantime, could you please call off the pumpkining?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Thanks. C'mon, Fluttershy.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: There are four Alicorn princesses in Equestria now. I am Twilight Sparkle, the Princess of Friendship.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: And I'm Fluttershy.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: We are not spies! [to Fluttershy] Why does everypony assume we're spies?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Well, actually, that's why we're here <U+0096> to solve your problem with the Hooffields.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: No! That's not what I meant at all!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: We are not on anypony's side. We're here to help you become friends again.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: But you could be! They're just really upset you ruined their farmhouse.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Have you tried meeting at a neutral location, talking about your problems, and really listening to each other?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Well, they'll listen to me. I'm an impartial third party.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: [voice amplified] Attention, Hooffields and McColts! I'm not on anypony's side, but I can see you're both wasting time and resources on being mean to each other. Ponies are supposed to help each other and be kind. So let's stop this senseless fighting! [speaking normally] There. That should do it. Ready to go home, Fluttershy?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: I'd love to. But if we solved the problem already, shouldn't our cutie marks be glowing again?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Oh, yeah. They should be glowing any minute now...

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Or not.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: So much for potential friendship solution number twenty-eight.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: I guess we should find out why the Hooffields are launching tomatoes now.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: What are you doing? I asked you to stop fighting.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Bleh!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Well, that didn't work. I was so sure it would.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: [gasps] It was a good plan. We need to think of another one. And soon. This fight is really affecting the animals around here.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Not to worry. I'll just, uh...

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: ...find the root of the problem and work from there.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Pardon us, Ma, but do you remember what started this whole feud in the first place?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: I'm starting to think neither of you know what either of you have done.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Okay, backup plan to the backup plan. Maybe we can find some common ground that you can bond over. What do you do when you're not fighting?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: What do you hope to get out of fighting?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Of winning what?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: The best at what?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: So the only thing they have in common is that they both want to win a fight, and neither of them know what it's over. How can I end this feud if I don't know what it's about?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Ooh! Maybe somepony just needs to say they're sorry.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: That's a good idea. And friendship solution number forty-eight. But we can move it up.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: I'm so glad you agreed to do this. This apology cake will go a long way to making amends between you two. Which part of my argument changed your mind? The part where I said the benefits of friendship outweigh the cost of war, or the part where I said forgiveness is an investment in happiness?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Wait. Are you even listening to me?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Think of this as more than just a cake. It's the first step in the long road to forgiveness.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Nothing says "let's be friends" like a cake that says, "Let's be friends!" [hushed] I wrote that in icing on the top.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Ma Hooffield, you planted ponies in that cake?!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Um, if you could just not yell so much or maybe stop saying words altogether...

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Wah! Twilight?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Um, Twilight? We should probably get back there. I mean, if you need a break, that's fine, but I really can't do this without you.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: I don't know if we can do this at all. Even if I make things right, they're just gonna fight again.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Hey, little fellas. Oh, that's okay, you can come out.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: What was that?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Oh, you poor things! There isn't enough food here for you! Oh, brrr, and you're freezing! I'm gonna take you all home with me and get you all hot cocoas. How do you feel about book clubs?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: I don't get it. This was supposed to be the most beautiful valley in all of Equestria. What happened?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: What's that? Oh! Uh-huh... Twilight! They know what happened here!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: What?

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Stop! You have to listen to me!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: [straining] Fluttershy! You have to tell them! [strains] It's a lot harder to freeze an army of ponies than just six of them!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: [raised voice] Before you keep fighting, there is something you should know! Long ago, there were two best friends...

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: [voiceover] ...Grub Hooffield and Piles McColt. When they found the valley between the Smokey Mountains, they knew it was something special. So they made a promise to each other to protect and preserve the valley for all its adorable furry inhabitants. But they disagreed on how to go about it. Grub wanted to start by planting crops so that everypony would have something to eat. But Piles thought it would be better to start by building a shelter to protect them against the cold and wind. The two ponies were unable to come to an understanding, so Piles went ahead and built a shelter anyway, exactly where Grub was gonna start his farm! Grub was upset, so he tore down Piles' shelter so he could plant his crops!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: [voiceover] They kept fighting back and forth, until it turned into a feud!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: [voiceover] The valley suffered from the constant destruction, until finally the Hooffields and McColts moved to separate mountains.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Even then, the valley and all the animals in it continued to be caught in the crossfire. You see? By fighting, you're destroying the very thing that brought you here in the first place! So it's time you both put your differences aside and come together! If not for yourselves, then for the sake of these cute and cuddly guys!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: They say they accept your apology.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: [straining] Oh, right!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: This is wonderful! I am so proud of you two!

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Yay! I told you we'd figure it out.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: We did, and we didn't need my friendship portfolio to do it. We just needed each other. So, what do you think will happen next? We've all been called by the map now.

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: Oof! [straining] I'm sure we'll find out when we get home...

title: The Hooffields and McColts
dialog: What if it summons all six of us to another place? Or another pony we weren't expecting? [gasps] What if it wants us to solve other kinds of problems, like quantum physics, or why the apple doesn't fall far from the tree?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Wow, Applejack! Are you sure you've never managed a concert before?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Well, it turns out doin' up a concert's the same as settin' up a rodeo.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: And thanks to Pinkie's connections organizing the Ponypalooza Rock Concert, we've got quite a lineup for the Helping Hooves Music Festival.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Twilight! Applejack! Rainbow Dash! Rarity! Fluttershy! Spike! Pinkie Pie! Oh wait, that's me. Everypony!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: What is it, Pinkie?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: I have the most amazing news ever! It is totally gonna freak your frizz!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Well, spill it, Pinkie!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: It wasn't easy. In fact, it was terribly difficult. But I have managed to book the biggest pony pop star in all of Equestria as the main attraction of the Helping Hooves Music Festival!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Sapphire Shores?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Sapphire Shores?! Please! Sapphire Shores is merely the second biggest pony pop star in Equestria. I have booked the one, the only, Countess Coloratura!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Who in the hay is Countess Coloratura?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: My frizz has been freaked!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Pinkie Pie, who is this Countess Coloratura pony?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Uh, I just told you that she's the biggest pony pop star in Equestria! How-how-how-how-how have you not heard of her?!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Don't know. Though I did know a gal named Coloratura when I was just a filly. [laughs and snorts] Wouldn't it just be the funniest thing if that Coloratura and this Coloratura were the same Coloratura? Heh.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Do you mean to tell me that you actually know Countess Coloratura?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Well, I don't think it's the same pony, since my friend wasn't any sort of high-falutin' countess.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Do you remember her cutie mark?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Sure do. It had this super colorful bunch of musical notes that just shimmered in the light.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: You mean... like this?!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Well, fancy that! That there's the very same cutie mark!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Do you have any idea the number of hoops I had to jump through to get her to perform at the festival?! A whole lot of hoops! That pony is very demanding!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Nah.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Yah!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: I completely understand. We artistes require certain necessities in order to do our best work.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: This was clearly some sort of misunderstandin', 'cause Rara was just as down home as me!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Even that big name was too fancy for her, so I shortened Coloratura to "Rara"!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: [voiceover] We had the best time at Camp Friendship!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: [voiceover] Rara was just so easygoin'! We were like two apples from the same branch.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: [voiceover] Rara and I prepared this song for the camp talent show. When we performed, she belted it out, singin' in the most colorful, clear voice I'd ever heard!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: [voiceover] After camp, we wrote to each other for a bit, but...

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: ...then we lost touch. But Rara always did want to go to Manehattan to try and make it big. But a demandin' diva? Just you wait, Pinkie. Once Rara gets here, you'll see she's just a plain old pony like you and me.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: I don't have to wait <U+0096> she's here!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Really?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Rara?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: [squealing] Countess Coloratura!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: No... that can't be her. [clears throat] Um... hi. Remember me? We met at Camp Friendship? I gave you the nickname "Rara"?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Yeah! Heh. Howdy, Rara!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Ooh, you got hoofsies from Countess Coloratura! Look! Ooh, she clearly thinks you're very special!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Yeah... real special.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Ooh! I'm the pony Pinkie Pie, Mr. Manager, sir!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: I have twenty glass containers full right here!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Uh, I don't think so. But lucky for you, I have the biggest straw collection in Equestria! I call this straw Fernando.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Ooh, we shall!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Abso-toot-ly!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: See, Applejack? Demanding!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Pinkie's right, Rarity! The Rara I knew didn't hide behind a veil givin' out fake stamp kisses, sippin' up imported water, and needin' her cherries separated.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Oh, I do understand. Sometimes it's hard to see our friends change.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: She's become a whole other pony!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Trust me. Once you see Countess Coloratura perform, you simply won't believe it!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Rarity was right! I don't believe it!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Correct me if I'm wrong here, but that feller isn't actually complimentin' Rara. He's complimentin' all the bells and whistles he's piled on to make her Countess Coloratura.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Oh, no-no-no-no-no, you don't understand, Applejack. Creating all those elements is a lot of work, and Countess Coloratura's performance wouldn't exist without them.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: If you ask me, that wouldn't necessarily be a bad thing.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Actually, right now you're scheduled for your meet and greet with the schoolponies!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: The schoolponies'll be so happy to hear that, Rara!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Now that's more like the Rara I remember.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: [distant] But... I got everything you requested!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Oh! Well, we have lots of tasty oats right here in Ponyville!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: [gasps] But that's impossible!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Applejack! Svengallop just made all of these new demands and he said<U+0097>

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: I heard, Pinkie. But don't you fret. I'll talk to Rara and fix things right up.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Did'ja see, sis?! Did'ja see?!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Hold on, Applejack. You wrote to Countess Coloratura about me?!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Alright now, you'd best get along, little ponies.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Uh... Hey, Rara, you mind if I talk to you about your manager?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Well, while you were meetin' with the schoolponies, he was demandin' all sorts of stuff from Pinkie Pie.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Well, do you see somethin' wrong with him tellin' Pinkie that if she doesn't get those things by tomorrow, he'd pull you from our charity festival?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: I'm afraid Svengallop doesn't give a pickled pippin about your charity work.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Jealous of what? A pony who hides behind a veil so thick she can't see when somepony's usin' her? No, I'm not jealous of that, Rara!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: It just ain't right! He's manipulatin' her, and she's just not seein' it!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Enough stewin', more peelin'!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Sorry, Pinkie, but there is no way I'm lettin' that lousy Svengallop use my friend like that!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Countess Coloratura!

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: I said your new name, but I saw the real you hangin' out with those schoolponies yesterday. And I know somepony that'd prefer if you stop doin' those little events.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Come on now. You've just got to give me a chance to prove what I'm sayin' is true.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Do exactly what I say. We'll see if that Svengallop truly has your best interests at heart.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Oh, Rara, I'm so sorry. Are you gonna be okay for the concert tonight?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Can you give us a minute, Rarity?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Certainly.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Now, why's it gonna be so terrible?

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Now, now, don't go gettin' yourself into a tizzy there, Rara. Svengallop turned you into Countess Coloratura and acted like your friend so he could enjoy the perks that came with bein' a star. But the real perk of friendship is gettin' to see your friend bein' true to their self. And Rara, when you're simply yourself, you're the brightest star I've ever seen shine.

title: The Mane Attraction
dialog: Good evening, everypony! Welcome to opening night of the Helping Hooves Music Festival! Now it is my great honor to introduce you to our headlining act <U+0096> Countess Coloratura!

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: If somepony had told me when I was a blank flank that one day I'd give a speech to a class at Celestia's School of Magic, I wouldn't have believed it, but...

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: I hope that I have been up to the task, because I can tell that all of you are and that the future of Equestrian magic is in good hooves.

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: Eh, I don't know, Spike. I'd like to be able to get through the whole speech without looking at the cards.

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: Come on, Twilight! You can't be nervous about giving a speech to a bunch of magic students!

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: Oh, I'm not nervous, Spike, but I do have to set a good example, especially for magic students. That's why this speech has to be...

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: [sighs] Perfect?

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: Exactly. Let's go through it one more time. [clears throat] When Princess Celestia asked me to speak to you today, I was honored to have the opportunity to talk about my favorite subject: magic.

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: Obviously, the long term effects of...

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: ...the simultaneous acquisition of cutie marks has yet to be determined, but... [sips water] Ahem. Next slide, please.

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: [snoring] Huh? Huh!

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: I can speak from my own experience that the power of Cutie Mark Magic is very real, and in the instance of my friends and I, it can be traced to a single event! Without Rainbow Dash's race to defend Fluttershy's honor, this rainboom wouldn't have happened. Fluttershy might never have discovered her love of animals. Applejack might never have realized that she belonged on her farm. And Pinkie Pie might never have decided to leave hers. It might be hard to imagine Rarity without her sense of fabulousness. But it's even harder to fathom what my life would be like. Without this rainboom, I might not have gotten into magic school. Celestia wouldn't have taken me on as her pupil or sent me to Ponyville to meet my friends. And the most powerful thing about Cutie Mark Magic that I found is the connection I share with them.

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: But, um...

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: The real question about... Cutie Mark Magic is... who it seems to affect.

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: Starlight Glimmer?

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: I was sure I saw her, Spike. But when I looked again, she was gone! I'm just worried what she could be up to.

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: Nothing good, I bet. I heard she wasn't very happy the last time you saw her.

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: Forcing everypony in her village to have the same cutie mark wasn't right. We had to do something!

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: And now she's coming back for revenge. Uh, or she was just really interested in your speech!

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: Honestly, Spike. I'm not really sure what I saw. But as long as I have my friends, I know everything will be all right.

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: Maybe I was just more stressed about that speech than I thought.

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: Yeah. That sounds better than Starlight Glimmer coming back with an evil plot for revenge.

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: Well, when you say it like that, it does sound kinda silly.

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
dialog: Or it's totally true!

title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1
