title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Ogres & Oubliettes is a fantasy role-playing adventure game. Our goal, defeat the evil Squid Wizard, or... [stifling laughter] as we call him... the Squizard!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [chuckling] [clears throat] The Squizard has laid siege to the last free city in Spiketopia. That's the name of the land. He's kidnapped a beautiful unicorn princess named Shmarity. [beat] Uh, which is like a normal name in Spiketopia, so, you know, don't think about it too much.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Fear not. Your romantic delusions are safe with me.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: First things first <U+0096> you've gotta create a character! Name?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: How about... Discord?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [sighs] The whole point of the game is you get to use your imagination to be someone you're not. I'm Garbunkle, a famous magician. Everyone treats me with the utmost respect.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Just like in real life?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: And don't get jealous, but I'm a level 30 Enchanter with major skill points assigned to Intellect and Perception.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [not listening] Go on, I'm listening.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Big Mac's character is Sir McBiggun, a level 27 Black Knight Unicorn from Castle Chadwick!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [still not listening] I'm listening.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: When his king aligned himself with the Squizard, Sir McBiggun would not besmirch his honor.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Nnope!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [clears throat] [mumbling] I'm listening.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: And so it came to pass, the magician and black knight vowed to rid Spiketopia of the evil Squizard.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: So, your character's name?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: I already have the best name in the universe. Why would I change it for something like "Captain Wuzz"?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Captain Wuzz it is!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: What class are you, Captain Wuzz? There's Archers, Mages, Rogues...

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [snorts] Can I suggest we take a break and, I don't know, go out and have some fun? Ponyville's not going to paint itself red.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: You'll love it once we get started! [rolls die] How 'bout an Archer?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Sounds just as miserable as the other options. So fine.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Sir McBiggun, are you prepared to enter the world of Ogres & Oubliettes?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Discord, or should I say, Captain Wuzz, are you<U+0097>

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Oh, get on with it.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [rolls dice] We find ourselves trapped in the dungeon of the evil Squizard. The bars are locked tight.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: The bars exist in our imagination.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Really? You describe things, and then we pretend it's real?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: It is real. In our imagination. It's your turn first. What do you wanna do?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Curse myself for attending this infernal evening? Ohhh, no, you mean in the game.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Well, you can do whatever you want. Then, I roll this twenty-sided die and see if you're successful.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: I stick my head through the bars and demand for the immediate release of the Lord of Chaos.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: That's a big risk. You have to roll a seventeen or higher to succeed. [rolls die] Ooh, bad idea. The guard gets mad.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: This spell here. I transform him into a parsnip.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: You need eleven Intelligent points to cast a Transform Into Root Vegetable spell.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: I'm not intelligent? I cast it anyway because this game is stupid.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [rolls die] The spell backfires. So [stifling laughter] your claws grow leaves and transform into parsnips!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: The guard laughs. He calls his friends over, and they laugh too.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Don't you laugh at me, Big Mac! Does it really say that? Let me see.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [rolls die] [laughs] As you get angrier, everypony laughs harder!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: I seal Sir McBiggun in a magic bubble until he stops laughing!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: I told you, you can't do magic!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Whoaa! Nope! Nope! Nope!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: "Not intelligent enough." Please.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Cut it out, Discord!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Oh, this game is insufferable! Let me show you a real guys' night!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [laughing] This is the life! Jazz, dancing, the best table magic can buy! This is what guys' night is all about. Am I right, fellas?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: I know you probably didn't do this on purpose, but this table's the perfect size and shape!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: I don't think so. Let's have a drink. Chocolate milkshakes?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [sighs] No, we want to go back to Ogres &<U+0097>

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Oh, how 'bout a different game? [magic zap] Those are very bad cards.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Stop messing with us! We wanna<U+0097>

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: A dance contest?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Surprise! We won!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Discord!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [sinister] Yes?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Look, we don't wanna do these things. We wanna play our game. If you don't want to play with us, you can, I don't know, sit and watch.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Sit and watch? Fine. We'll play your game. [reverberating] Are you ready to enter the world of Ogres & Oubliettes?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Sir McBiggun?!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: And I'm... Garbunkle? That means... Sweetness! We're in the game! Check it out! Ka-zam!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: It's guys' night!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Oh, yeah!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Yup!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: In the game now!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Yup!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Oh, yeah!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Oh, yeah!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Discord, where are you? This is great! You made the game real!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [reverberating] [laughs] Aren't games fun?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Should we be worried he's using his scary voice?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [reverberating] [chuckles] You're welcome.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Run!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [reverberating] You find yourself on the battlefield. A barrage of arrows rains down on you. If you roll a fifteen or higher, the shield protects you. Fourteen or lower and, well... [laughs] You get the idea.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Seventeen! Lucky you!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Boo.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Boo.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Discord!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Sir McBiggun, I'd cover the entrance if I were you.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: This isn't funny!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Isn't this what every gamer wants? To live the game? Like this?!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Ugh!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [groans] This kinda hurts! Like, real pain!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Oh, how kind of you to notice. It's the little details that really bring alternate dimensions to life, wouldn't you say?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Discord, this is awful!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Why are you doing this? You're the worst!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: If I'm the worst, then why did you invite me?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Because we felt bad for you!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Because you... what?!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [panting] We're okay, we're okay! No thanks to you, Discord!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: You felt sorry for me?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Who wouldn't? Fluttershy told us you practically begged her to stay! And then at the train station, you were just standing there, all alone!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: This can't be. I'm supposed to feel sorry for you because I'm me and you're you.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [sighs] We only invited you to be nice! I mean, you're kind of a... weirdo!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: I ruined your night, and you don't even think I'm cool? Ugh. [zap] [muffled] How embarrassing. I should go. [normal] I have a lot of other friends I need to see tonight.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Good!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Yes, so many other friends. [whimpers] Farewell, Garbunkle the magician and brave Sir McBiggun. May providence smile upon thee in thy quest to rid Spiketopia of the dreaded Squizard... [sighs] When I say it that way, the game doesn't sound half bad.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Oh, well.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [sighs] It... it's better this way, right?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Because... now he can't bother us, 'cause he's off somewhere by himself... all alone... with no friends.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Yup.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [sighs] [clears throat] [unenthusiastic] We find ourselves in the dungeon of the evil Squizard. The bars are locked, and... Ah, who am I kidding? We should give him another chance. [clears throat] Captain Wuzz? Can you hear me?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Oh! You realized how amazing I am and that I make you cooler just by being around me?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Uh... [stammering] No, no, actually, that's not what I meant to say... I'm... sssssss...

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: What?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: I'm ssssssss<U+0097>

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Can't hear you.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Nope.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: I'm trying to say I'm sorry, all right?! I'm sorry for ruining your game, and I'm sorry that I thought I was better than you! [pants] [quickly] Now let's play before this evening gets any sappier, shall we?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Huh? Yeah, yeah! Okay! What if we forgot the board and the pieces for a minute? I mean, the whole game coming to life was completely terrifying, but also kind of the best thing ever! So, uh, Big Mac and I were wondering... What if you toned it down just a teensy bit?

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: I've got your back, Captain Wuzz!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Wha-hah!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: [accented] Garbunkle! Follow my lead!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Bull's-eye!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Nice one!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Eeyup!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Oh, yeah!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: We should just close the door and let them finish... whatever this... is.

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: No way! Did you see Big Mac's sword? I totally want in!

title: Dungeons & Discords
dialog: Yeah! I don't know what it is, but it looks like super duper fun!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Hey, Applejack! Whatcha doin'?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Whoa! Oof! Ugh! Well, I was practicin' my distance buckin'.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Uh, distance bucking? What for?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Because Cousin Braeburn and the rest of the Apple family in Appleloosa seem to think that their team can beat Ponyville at buckball.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: What?! Ha! That's ridiculous! Nopony beats Ponyville! I mean, I could beat the whole town of Appleloosa at buckball with one wing tied behind my back!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: So I can count on ya to join the Ponyville buckball team?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Oh, yeah! I am so there! I've just got one question.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Hmm?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Uh... what's buckball?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: So, basically, buckball is the coolest game ever. Offense, defense, teamwork, nonstop action! It's got it all!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Wow, Rainbow Dash. You sure seem to know a lot about this game. I've never even heard of... buckball.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Yeah, I'm kind of an expert.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Hmph. An expert who hadn't heard of the game either until I told you.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Well, it's a new game. I probably know more than most ponies, so that makes me an expert.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I don't know anything about it at all. But it sounds like there's a ball and bucking, so I'm betting it's super duper fun!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: The point is, my cousin Braeburn somehow convinced a Pegasus and a unicorn to come play with him on the Appleloosa team, and he can't stop braggin' about how his team is gonna beat ours!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: But, um, we don't have a team.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Well, between Applejack and me, we've got two-thirds of a team. All we need is a unicorn. That's where you two come in.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [whispering loudly to Fluttershy] Uh... they know we're not unicorns, right?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Uh, obviously. You're gonna be on my team, and Fluttershy is gonna be on Applejack's team.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: We'll play against each other along with whatever unicorns want to try out until we find the best one.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Ohhhh! Phew! That's a relief because I left my unicorn costume at home!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I know a lot of you are here because I told you what an amazin' game buckball is. And even though it's already an Apple family favorite, most o' you probably don't know anything about it. So I thought we'd give you a quick demonstration. The two Earth ponies are on offense. They meet in the middle of the field for the buckoff. They both try to be the first one to kick it.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: And the Pegasus is on defense. She tries to keep the ball from going in the goal and passes it back to the Earth pony on her team. Just give it a little kick, Pinkie.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Yaah!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Aah!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Ohhh. I get it.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: And all the unicorns have to do is float these here baskets around the outside of the field and catch as many balls as possible for their team. [to Pinkie and Fluttershy] You two get the idea?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Absolutely!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Oh, I don't know. That ball moves pretty fast.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: All right. Now let's see which of you has what it takes.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: When the ball comes towards you, catch it.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Okay, just try your best, Pinkie. I have been doin' this a lot longer than you.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [grunts] Aah!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [dazzled] Nice kick.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Great save, Fluttershy!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Coming your way, Pinkie!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Somersault kick!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Hey, this game is easy!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Ooh! [giggles] It actually is kinda fun!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Where did Pinkie Pie learn to buck like that?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: And Fluttershy's spinning tail catch is pretty amazing.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Um... okay. Well, let's see what the rest of you can do.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Now, don't expect to be able to beat me twice in a row.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Well, hello there, Mr. Ball. Whee!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Hiya!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Hurry along, butterflies, before that ball comes and hits you.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Nope. Um... okay. Let's see what the rest of you can do.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Nope.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Definitely not.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: No.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Not a chance.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: No.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Nope.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Aaaand... no.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [groans] This didn't go how I thought it would.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Whee! [giggles, grunts] Yeah! Ha! [giggles] Whee! Ha ha!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: It sure didn't.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: This game is a whole lot more fun than I thought it would be.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: It's exactly as much fun as I thought it would be! A whole bunch!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Carryin' my water My water, my water Carryin' my water On my shoulder pole

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Snails! Look out!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Hmm?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Amazing!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: You should be more careful with these. You could lose them.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Hey, Snails, can you float one of those baskets over here?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Hmm? Sure. What do you want me to do with it?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Catch!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Anything else?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Wow, Snails. You're a natural at buckball.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: It's a good thing, too. We were running out of unicorns.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Do you think you'll be ready to play with Applejack and Rainbow Dash against the Appleloosa team?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I guess I'll find out. Plus, after I deliver this water, I don't really have anything else to do.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Well, Snails, with you on the team, Ponyville is one step closer to crushing Appleloosa!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Huh. And after today, it's pretty clear who the other two players should be.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: W-What do you mean? I thought you and Dash were gonna play.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Yeah! If you're not crushing Appleloosa, who is?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [laughs] Uh, you two, obviously!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Um, you want us to play buckball against Appleloosa instead of you?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Mm-hmm.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: That's "uncredible"!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Unbelievable and incredible? [scoffs] Come on!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I can't explain it, but you two are really good at this game. And if it means beatin' Appleloosa, I'll give either one of you my spot on the team quicker than Granny Smith can core an apple.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Me, too. I'd normally be so pumped all of Ponyville was counting on me to win, I'd run right over the competition. But you still flew rings around me.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Oh, I'm sorry. I was just having fun.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Well, you can have all the fun you want as long as it's while you're beatin' the hide off of Braeburn's team.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I do like fun!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Honestly, the game was a little scary at first, but once I got the hang of it, I had a pretty good time.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Let's get this party started!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: All right. But if we really wanna beat Appleloosa, we're gonna have to get serious.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Serious?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Serious how?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: With serious practice!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [gulps] Wow. This looks pretty intense.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Well, duh! You two are gonna be representing all of Ponyville. And, more importantly, us!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: That's why, before we leave for Appleloosa tomorrow, you two are gonna practice just as hard as we would.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: So let's hop to it! Snails already has a head start on you!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Okay, if you wanna win, you totally gotta get this drill down!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I-I-I do?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: It's all about ball control.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [gasps] Whoa!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Ready? Go! Come on! Faster! You don't want Ponyville to lose because you can't get into high gear, do you?!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [gasps] Whoa! Ugh!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: All right. Bein' able to buck a ball into a goal from any direction is the most important thing in the game.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Eh, if you say so.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Whee! Woo-hoo!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Keep it up! Just one miss'll ruin the Apple family's buckball reputation forever!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Whoops.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Come on! Push! Push! Push!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Come on, now! Every shot is for Sweet Apple Acres! And me! And Dash! And all of Ponyville!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Whoa! Uhh! Ow.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Faster!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Whoa!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Come on now!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Wh-Wh-Whoa!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Come on!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Keep it up!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Whoa!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Come on!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: What in the apple happened to those two?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I don't know. They mopped the field with us before.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: All right! That's it for today, y'all!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I thought practice was supposed to make us better.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Maybe we just need a little rest.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Or a whole lot of it.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Just be sure to get your heads in the game before tomorrow. All of Ponyville is countin' on a win.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I really don't want to let Applejack and Rainbow Dash down, or anypony else, but after that practice, I'm not feeling very confident.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Maybe we weren't that bad!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I guess I was hoping you saw something I didn't.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I know our friends want us to win, but how can the whole town be counting on us if most ponies have never even heard of buckball?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I know! How can we disappoint a pony who doesn't even know we have a team?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Or that we're gonna play Appleloosa?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Pfft. Yeah. I don't think we need to worry. I'd be surprised if anypony in this town cares about this game at all.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Whoa. The whole town really seems to care about this game a lot.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Heh. We kinda went around town and talked up the team a little.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Yup! We wanted to make sure you two knew that all of Ponyville was behind you!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [nervous] Greaaaaat...

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I hear the whole town's already plannin' a parade for when you get back after whuppin' Appleloosa! That should feel pretty good!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [nervous] It should...?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Totally! Just spend the whole ride to Appleloosa thinking about everypony cheering for the victorious Ponyville buckball team! [gasps] I bet Princess Celestia even comes to congratulate you! If that doesn't get you in "the zone", I don't know what will!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I don't know what zone Rainbow Dash is talking about, but I'm pretty sure I don't want to be in it. Do you?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Hey! You two are supposed to be in the zone!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [squeaks] You see... the thing is... thinking about everypony... thinking about us...! Aah! There's just no way to...!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: There's no way that we can get in the zone, because the zone sounds like a horrible place since we are terrible at buckball and we are going to lose and let everypony down and we don't want to play anymore!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I'm still okay with playing, in case you were worried.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I don't get it. They're naturals! Why wouldn't they want to play anymore?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Maybe us telling them how much everypony was countin' on them messed them up somehow.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: What?! That's crazy talk! Having ponies depend on you is exactly what you need to focus! And<U+0097>

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Get serious and play hard and<U+0097>

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Get ready to totally smash the competition, and<U+0097> and... none of that sounds like Pinkie or Fluttershy, does it?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [sighs] Guess not. We got so wrapped up in what's important to us, we went and ruined what was fun about the game for them.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [groans] What do we do now?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Pinkie? Fluttershy?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: We know you're in here! We've looked in every other car on the train!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [muffled] Maybe you need to look again!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [muffled] Yeah! Because... we're totally not in here!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [muffled] And we're definitely not in here if you're gonna try and make us play against Appleloosa!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Or anypony else!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Oh... we're sorry to let you down. But it's better to do it now than during the game against Appleloosa.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: You don't have to play against Appleloosa.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: We don't?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Nope. We're gonna take your place. So you don't have to worry about that at all.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [sighs] Why didn't you say so?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: But... we can't take on Braeburn and his team without any practice. So we need you to play just one more time.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Against us.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Now I know we mixed up the teams before, but since Dash and I really need the practice, we'll play against the two of you.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Oh, I don't know how much practice you'll get against us. We've been playing just awful.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Don't worry about it. Applejack and I just need a little workout.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Yup. You two just do your best.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I can do that!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Ahem.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [grunts] Huh!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Looks like you two really do need practice!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Hee-hee! Ha! Whee!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [giggling] If you need more practice, we can keep going.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Yeah! I could do this all day!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [panting] No, thanks. Playing against you two is just as humiliating now as it was when we weren't trying to show you how awesome you are.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Wait... what?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Finally!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: You must've noticed how you aren't bad anymore.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Oh, yeah! Weird!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: But, um, why were we so terrible before?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I guess some ponies thrive on pressure and some ponies don't. And even though we weren't playing, we were treating you like us, which totally stressed you out.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: And that just sucked the fun right out of the game for you.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: And having fun is what makes you really, really, really good!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: But being good doesn't matter if we're too afraid of letting ponies down.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Yeah! What about all those ponies back in Ponyville counting on us to win?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: I'm sure folks want you to win, but not if worrying about it makes you miserable. Winning's never worth that.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: But how do we keep from worrying about it?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: You could do what I do and not think about it. Seriously. I don't think about anything. Ever.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Hm. Works for me!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: You guys are amazing!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [panting] Braeburn is really good!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: So is that Pegasus. Oh, I don't know if we can win.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: You know what I would do?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Not think about it?

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Not think a<U+0097> [beat] Oh, yeah. That.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Ha. And as long as you're havin' fun, it doesn't matter if you win or not.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: [giggles] I think it's more fun this way!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Huh. Looks like you three made quite an impression!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Well, cousin, I have to admit. Your Ponyville team played a pretty good game.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Hah! Good game? We bucked the hooves right off of you!

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Yup, you sure as shootin' did. I'm gonna have to get real serious about a strategy for our rematch.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Oh, I wouldn't get too serious.

title: Buckball Season
dialog: Yeah! Everypony knows the secret to good buckball is just having fun!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks

dialog: So Scootaloo's keeping Petunia busy like you asked. What did you two want to talk about?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: What's wrong?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Unsettling?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I don't get what you mean.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Hey! Check out what we found!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Of course! What'd you think she was gonna be, a pirate?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Woo-hoo! Another successful cutie intervention! You know, Crusaders, I don't wanna toot our own horn, but we've helped a lot of ponies figure out their purpose in life. Like Bluenote here. Nice saxophone, Bluenote!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Yep, everywhere you look, there's a pony we've helped find a purpose.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You've gotta admit. We've had a pretty good effect on everypony since we've discovered our destiny.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And started helping other ponies discover theirs! Could this get any better or what?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Now, Scootaloo, you do know there will always be challenges? Someday, somepony might even come to us with a problem that even we can't handle. Like, say...

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: A griffon?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Ha! Exactly! Like a griffon. But that's just crazy talk.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Or not!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Is that really a griffon?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You're darn tootin' it is! What do you think that griffon wants?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I guess we've gotta ask her, but aren't griffons supposed to be kind of mean and cranky?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Crusaders, looks like we've gotta step carefully.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [strained voice] Aah! Ooh! This... griffon's... not... cranky.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: How in the blooming apples did you know who we are?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Know who you are? Know who you are?! Why, I've heard about you from everypony in Ponyville! I'm so excited to meet you, I could just explode! I'm Gabriella, but you can call me Gabby since we're friends now! Pleased to meet ya!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well, howdy... um... Gabby.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [squeals] I'm just about the most excited anygriffon has ever been about anything!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Excited? But whatever for?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: What for? What for?! Everypony in town tells me of your amazing assistance! How you help ponies find their place in the world!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: It's a calling, but<U+0097>

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And that's why I'm here. I need help, too. I want you to give me a cutie mark!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Um, can a griffon even get a cutie mark?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I dunno, but I think we should probably find out.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: So, Gabriella...

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Gabby, 'kay?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Gabby, why do you even want a cutie mark?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: It doesn't seem like a very... griffon-y thing to want.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Right? Right?! Right?!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You're tellin' me! I don't know if you've heard, but griffons can be a little bit... unfriendly.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [voiceover] Most griffons don't pay much attention to each other. And if they do, it's not, y'know, the good kind of attention. As for me, I'm just a little mail delivery griffon who likes to spread a little bit of griffon-y sunshine on my rounds, which always makes me feel different from the other griffons.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [voiceover] I'd do anything for any old griffon in need.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [voiceover] But it just always seemed like the harder I tried, the less I fit in. It wasn't until your friends came to Griffonstone that I realized some creatures actually like helping each other, and I saw something so awesomely awesome <U+0096> how helping spreads from pony to pony and griffon to griffon! I knew then that I had to find out why I was so different from the other griffons, and I knew the answer just had to have something to do with those wonderful, amazing marks on the ponies' flanks. And I admit, hehe, I became, um, maybe a little obsessed. So first chance I had to deliver a letter from Gilda, I took it, so I could find the perfect pony to help me understand what those marks are. Everypony here told me one thing <U+0096> I just had to see the Cutie Mark Crusaders! They've helped everypony here get their cutie marks, and I knew, I just knew, that someday I'd have one, too! A cutie mark of my very own!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: That's why I flew all the way here! I want to find my own place in the world, and I know you can help me by giving me a cutie mark! So let's make with the cutie! [giggles] Whenever you're ready. Did it happen yet?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Uh, not exactly.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Howboutnowhowboutnowhowboutnowhowboutnow?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Um, Gabby, I hate to break it to ya, but it sounds like you might've heard some tall tales about what Crusaders can do.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I mean, we are kinda awesome and all, but nopony can just give you a cutie mark. It just sort of... happens.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Though I'm pretty sure it doesn't happen to griffons. Or if it does, we've never ever heard of it.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh. I hadn't thought of that. Sounds like a challenge! And who could be up to it but the world-famous Cutie Mark Crusaders? Cutie marks! It's in your name and everything, right? Right?! Right?! Now I have to deliver Gilda's letter to Rainbow Dash. I bet by the time I get back, you'll have it one hundred percent figured out! Toodles for now! Whee-hee-hee! Gonna get my cutie mark!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: What she wants... It's not possible, right?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I don't know. But I know someone who just might.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I've read every book on the subject, and I've never read a thing about any creature other than a pony getting a cutie mark.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But, Twilight, Gabby flew all the way here so we could help her. There's gotta be something we can do.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Say, is there some kind of spell you can whip up to make her mark appear?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Um, I don't know if any of you remember, but using magic to get a cutie mark never really works out all that well.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Ohhh. Right.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Crusaders, I'm sorry. While I can't say for certain that it's utterly impossible, the chances of Gabby getting an actual mark are... pretty slim. Everything I've ever learned tells me. It's just not gonna happen.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh, no! Poor Gabby! What the apples are we ever gonna tell her?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Crusaders, this is terrible! Gabby really believed in us. And now, we're gonna let her down.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But what else can we do?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Hmm. You know what, Crusaders? So what? Maybe we can't help Gabby get a cutie mark, but we can still do what we're best at. We can help her find her purpose!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And I reckon doing that is the same for griffons as it is for ponies or any other creature in Equestria.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: All we have to do is be extra-special clear with her. Like, Crystal Empire clear.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Yeah!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Incoming!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Hiya, you wonderful, wonderful Crusaders! I just know you've figured out how to help me because you're all so incredible!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well, Gabby, we've talked it over, and we think we may just be able to help you out. But not exactly in the way you think. See, here's the thing about you getting a cutie mark<U+0097>

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Wait! You didn't let me finish!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Um, I think maybe that could've been clearer.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: She's still going. Anypony know if griffons ever get tired?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: What do you think my mark will be? A lightning bolt? An erupting volcano? I don't care if it's a jar of marmalade! I know I'll love it, whatever it is!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Hold on just a hoofstep, Gabby. There's somethin' we need to clear up. We can definitely help you find your purpose, but that mark's probably not gonna happen.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: What?!?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: It's true. Twilight's never heard of a creature other than a pony getting a cutie mark.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh! [laughs] Is that all? You had me worried for a second. I-I mean, there's a first time for everything, right? And she didn't say it was impossible, right?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well, not exactly.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well, then if anypony can make it happen, it's you three. I mean, you haven't failed yet.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You know what, Gabby? I promise we're gonna do everything we can to help you get your mark.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Aaaaand... she's off again.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Why in tarnation would you promise somethin' that just can't be done?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I know what it's like to want something that's out of reach. And just because it hasn't happened yet doesn't mean it can't. Maybe trying for the impossible isn't so bad.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Guess we'll never know for sure unless we give it a try.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: All right, but where do we even start?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Where we always do <U+0096> with a good old-fashioned Crusaders chart.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: The first thing we gotta do is find your purpose.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Nopony gets a mark without one.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: All right. Let's do this.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: What are you good at? Do you play any sports?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Or like to dance?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Or how about singing? I just love to sing! La-la-la-la!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Wow! I kinda wanna just try everything! I mean, I don't even know what to pick!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Don't worry. That's what we're here for.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Like a racer at the starting line You're chomping at the bit

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You are here to find your purpose And a place you really fit

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And until you find your place in life You're never gonna quit

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We can help you find the purpose in your life

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: A griffon mixes lion's strength With winged eagle's might When I finally find my purpose Then my cutie mark's in sight

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: That's the spirit You ought to see what you do best Try it all, pick your fave And leave behind the rest

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I'll try anything To get my cutie mark Keep up with me, Crusaders We're just getting our start

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Can we help her find the purpose in her life?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Cheer you if you're feeling low Plant your garden, make it grow Write a piece for your quartet Filling in on clarinet

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: She's so good at things, it's frightening Cutie Mark Crusaders, I think we've got a problem!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Build a boat And sail it out across the sea Need some help? You know that you can count on me

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Now how we gonna do this?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Gabby's special purpose can't be everything, right?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: It may as well be. I don't know how we find what she's supposed to do when she can do it all.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [sighs] And if finding her purpose seems impossible, we can just forget about the whole griffon-getting-a-cutie-mark thing, which is actually impossible. I never should've gotten her hopes up!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I did... it... all! So, lay it on me, Crusaders. What's my purpose? And how do we get a mark on these here haunches?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Gabby, we... we don't.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Wait. What are you saying?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We're sayin' that since you can do everything so amazingly well...

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We just can't figure out what one thing you're supposed to do.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Gabby, we can't help you.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But, but... you're the world-famous Cutie Mark Crusaders! I can't believe it! I... I... I won't believe it!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Gabby, wait!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We're sorry! We're so, so sorry! This is just awful. For the first time ever, the Cutie Mark Crusaders are cutie mark failures.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I'm sorry, Crusaders. I really thought we could help Gabby.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I thought we could help anypony.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Maybe that's just it <U+0096> maybe we can only help ponies.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Or maybe we just plain failed.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Failed? Then what do you call this?!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: A cutie mark?!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: What? You got your mark after all! Even though we couldn't find your purpose? But<U+0096> What? Huh?! How?!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And what does it mean? A cauldron?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Uh... I don't know. Maybe it means my purpose is, uh, helping Zecora with potions. That was the first thing I tried. I guess it just took some time to appear. But here it is!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: This is awesome! We're not failures! Whatever we did worked! I had a feeling we could help you, and we did!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh! We've gotta go see Twilight right away! She'll wanna know about this!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Correction <U+0096> she needs to know about this! I bet she'll want to write a whole book about the very first griffon to get a cutie mark of her own!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh, uh, totally! Um, but, you know, Rainbow Dash asked me to pick up her answer to Gilda's letter. I better take care of that before I forget. Heh. Here's an idea. Uh, y-you head to the castle, and I'll meet you there, cutie mark and all! Um... toodles!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Wow! Can you believe it? We were able to help her get her mark after all! Come on, Crusaders, let's tell Twilight!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Gabby? You just missed her. She was in such a hurry, she didn't even come in. Just dropped this letter and zoomed away!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [reading] "Dear Crusaders, I'll never forget you. You really are every bit as awesome as I'd heard. I'm heading home to tell all the griffons how you did the impossible by getting me my cutie mark. Toodles."

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Wait a second. Cutie mark?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You actually got a griffon a cutie mark for the first time in recorded history?! You know what this calls for? A full-scale research project!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: This makes no sense. Gabby didn't come in and show you her mark?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You have got to get Gabby back here right away! I have so many questions! Oh, I hope I have enough ink and parchment to document everything! Spike! Guess what just happened!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Weird. Gabby didn't show Twilight her mark like she said she was gonna do? Somethin' in this here applesauce smells kinda fishy.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We'd better find her and find out what's going on. Come on, Crusaders.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Keep your eyes on the skies, ponies. Gabby can't have gone far.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: She's not in the air. She's right there! Gabby! Hold up, we're a-comin'!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Gabby, we're your friends. Why in Equestria are you running away from us?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Running away? Oh, I'm not running away. I'm just, uh, e-excited to show my lovely new cutie mark to everyone in Griffonstone!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You mean the cutie mark that's runnin' right off your flank?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [defeated] Yup... That's the one. I guess the one thing I'm really not good at is faking things.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Wow, Gabby. Painting on a fake cutie mark to make yourself feel better? You must have been really upset.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Sure, I was disappointed. But I didn't do it to make myself feel better. I wanted to make you feel better.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I couldn't bear you three thinking you failed after you tried so hard to help. That's why I had to leave before you or Twilight found out the truth. [sighs] I'm sorry I wasn't honest with you. I'll just wing my way back to Griffonstone. Thanks for trying.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You don't need to apologize for carin' about how other ponies are feelin'.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I'm just sorry we couldn't come through for you.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Hmmm... Maybe we can. Gabby, clean up and meet us at the Crusaders' clubhouse!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: I know you all tried your very best, but I guess griffons and cutie marks just don't mix. Maybe... I don't even have a special purpose.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Hang on a second. We were racking our brains trying to figure out your destiny, until we remembered how every time you did something new, you tried to help everypony around you.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Even us. How did it feel when you showed up with that fake mark, and the three of us thought we'd actually helped you?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Well... I was really glad I helped you feel happier.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: So maybe helping is your thing! You might even say it's your purpose!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But helping just feels good. I-It couldn't have anything to do with what I'm supposed to do with my life... right?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Gabby, finding your special purpose doesn't have to be about being good at something. It's about feeling good about something inside.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And it looks like your destiny is a whole lot like ours <U+0096> helping others. And you don't need a symbol on your flank to know that.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But since we are the Cutie Mark Crusaders, we made you one anyway. Behold!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Your very own cutie mark! Ta-da!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: We carved it to mark the moment we all figured out what you should do with your life.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You bet we do! You're one of us now! Gabby, today we dub thee...

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: The very first griffon member of the Cutie Mark Crusaders! Woo-hoo!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: You may not be able to get a cutie mark...

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: But you're selflessly dedicatin' your life to helpin' others anyhow. I can't think of anything more Crusader-y than that.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Awesome! My very own cute-cea<f1>era!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Oh, land sakes! You sure have earned it.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: And so have we! Scootaloo, you're pretty amazing. Even though things looked bleak, you still found a way to help Gabby in the end.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: 'Course! Helping's what we do, right?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: [laughing] I am so grateful! I'm gonna go home and do my very, very best to bring Cutie Mark Crusader values to Griffonstone! I promise.

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Promise us one other thing, too?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Come back soon!

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: After all, you're a Crusader now. Crusaders forever?

title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
writer: Ed Valentine; story by Josh Haber and Meghan McCarthy
dialog: Crusaders forever!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: The map is sendin' us where?!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Las Pegasus?!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: But Las Pegasus is a wild vacation spot! It's just one big party!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: All those lights and sounds, not to mention the crowds... Oh, just the thought of it is overwhelming!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I know Las Pegasus doesn't seem like either of your cups of tea, but I have total faith you wouldn't have been called unless you were the perfect ponies for the job.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Probably not as bad as we think. It can't just be a loud, obnoxious party all the time... right?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Uh, Applejack? It isn't as bad as we thought.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: You're right. It's worse!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Do you think the map could be on the fritz again? I mean, this place seems a lot more suited to Pinkie Pie or even Rainbow Dash.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: If Twilight trusts the map, then so do I. All we have to do is solve our friendship problem and get back home. 'Course, we have to find it first.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Wow. This Gladmane sure seems impressive.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Well, uh, it is a little embarrassing, but the crowds seem to like it. Uh-huh-huh.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Mr. Gladmane?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Just Gladmane'll do. And it's a pleasure to meet actual cohorts of the Princess of Friendship! Thank you for coming. Thank you very much.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: You know who we are?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I'm what you might call a friendship connoisseur, so naturally I'm familiar with the friends of the great Twilight Sparkle! Applejack, Fluttershy, it's an honor to have you here. Uh-huh-huh.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I have to admit you're not the type of pony I expected to find in Las Pegasus.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [laughs] Well, my guests may be looking for lights, music, and parties, but working hard and making friends is how I turned this hotel into what it is today, and how I plan to make it even bigger. Uh-huh-huh! Uh, excuse me for a second. [inhales] [through loudspeaker] Wise ponies may say the folks that come here are customers, but I can't help but thinkin' of each and every one of you as friends. That's why there's a three-for-one special on apple fritters in the cafe for the next hour! Enjoy! Uh-huh-huh!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Would you two like to take a tour of the place? I'm just about to do my rounds and check on my friends who work here.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [hushed] We do have a friendship problem to find.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Lead the way, Mr. Gladmane!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Just Gladmane now, you hear?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: New moves or not, I'm glad to have a star like you working for me, I'll tell you what.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Stellar! Uh-huh-huh!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Now, don't make a fuss for ol' me. I'm just gonna keep on giving a tour to my new friends Applejack and Fluttershy.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Howdy!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Hi.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Aw, shucks. Well, let's leave the artists to their work.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [hushed] Doesn't look like there's any friendship problems here.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [gasps] I've never seen a pink prairie dog before!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I like the folks that come here to have a unique experience. Uh-huh-huh.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Now this place is overwhelming in a good way!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Aw, glad you like it.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [clears throat] Fluttershy?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Hmm? Oh, um, coming!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: There doesn't seem to be anything wrong around here at all.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I figured lookin' for a friendship problem in Las Pegasus would be like tryin' to find a needle in a stack of needles. But everypony seems to be gettin' along just fine.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Ladies and gentleponies, despite what my competition might say, I know you've come to this fair city to be entertained, and I assure you there is nothing more entertaining than the astounding acrobatics in Gladmane's Ponet Fantastique!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Now, I suppose that might be true if it weren't for the existence, and far superiorly entertaining presence, of the show-stopping exotic animal act that Ponet Fantastique includes!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Those voices sound familiar.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: They sure do. Flim and Flam.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Why, I won't even dignify that assertion with a response! Except to say that if you were to consider buying your tickets from me, I might consider offering them to you at a substantial discount!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: But I've always thought you get what you pay for, and in my humble opinion, these tickets are a value at twice the price!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Don't let this price-gouging charlatan take you for a ride!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [gasps] Charlatan? How dare you!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Hah! How dare I?!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [simultaneous] Yes, how dare you! I was the one that...

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [simultaneous] I call 'em likes I see them, dear brother of mine!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [simultaneous, background] I'm two minutes older than you <U+0096> don't you forget that, brother of mine!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [simultaneous, background] I'm sick and tired of this...

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: They certainly don't seem to be getting along. [gasps] You don't suppose we've been brought here to help them?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Absolutely not!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I know you and the rest of the Apple family have had your issues with Flim and Flam in the past, but they're definitely having trouble, and solving a friendship problem is important, no matter who's having it.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Well, of course that's true... for anypony but them!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I'm sorry you had to see that. I don't know why, but those two have been fightin' ever since they got here. I thought giving them these jobs might help, but I... I guess it just made matters worse.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Trust me. I know those ponies, and you're better off with them apart. The two of them together will cheat the hooves right out from under you!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Yeah, I suppose you're right. Flim's such a showpony, and Flam has such a head for business. Why, if they ever did work together, they'd be running this place in two shakes! Ah, speaking of which, I'd better get back to work. Y'all enjoy your stay now, you hear?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I'm pretty sure we should help Flim and Flam...

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: And I'm pretty sure there's another friendship problem here, and I'm gonna search this resort top to bottom 'til I find it!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I hope you didn't travel all the way from Ponyville to try to get me to reconcile with my no-account brother.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Brother? I don't believe I have one of those.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: No! I already know what he thinks of me! All show and no substance! Well, if he's so smart, he should have no trouble becoming a big success on his own!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: "Ooh, why, he's the greatest salespony that ever lived, of course!" Just ask him. He'll tell you all about it.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I'm sure you could work out your differences if you just sat down and talked to each other.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Shouldn't somepony do somethin'?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Heh-heh. Now that sounds like a real friendship problem!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I thought you two got along.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Two friendship problems in the same theater? Now we're talkin'!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: If you count Flim and Flam, that's three big friendship problems all in the same place!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Well, I don't count Flim and Flam since those two not bein' friends isn't a problem.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: It certainly isn't for Gladmane. Sounds like he's better off with them fighting.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Actually, the other ponies' problems seemed to be good for Gladmane too. Both the trapeze show and the animal act would be better off if they left, but everypony's so busy arguin' that they can't.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Do you think he knows?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I don't know, but I'm startin' to think we should find out.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I just can't figure it! The only pony who benefits from all this feudin' is Gladmane, but by all accounts, he's the best friend any of these ponies have!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
