writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Well, Bernard <U+0096> that adorable bunny from the acrobat's act <U+0096> claims that every morning, Gladmane tells the director that the star wants control of the show, and every afternoon tells the star that the director wants to get rid of her! But neither is true!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: And the Flying Prairinos <U+0096> the pink prairie dog family <U+0096> say Gladmane keeps changing their act to make each trainer think the other is doing it!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: So all his talk about friendship is just a load of applesauce! He's gettin' them all to fight with each other on purpose!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: But how can we get everypony to believe that's what he's doing?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: There must be a way to trick him into telling the truth!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Gee, if only there was a pony who knew how to trick a trickster.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Or maybe a pair of ponies?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [sighs] Fine. Guess bringin' Flim and Flam back together might be why we're here. Maybe.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Sorry if I don't take the word of somepony off the street, even if that street is in Ponyville.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: But Gladmane is behind so many other friendship problems. How can you be sure he isn't the cause of yours?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Because the only problem I have is standing right there.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Same here, buster!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Do either of you even know what you're fightin' over?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Gladmane let me know that ex-brother of mine thinks I'm just a mouthpiece without a single good idea!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Gladmane assured me this former fraternal foal here thinks I couldn't sell heat lamps to yaks!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Sounds to me like neither of you said those things. Why'd you believe Gladmane when he said you did?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Why would he lie?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Because he's afraid that the two of you together could move in and take over his resort.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: And if I'm tellin' you he said it, you know it's the absolute truth because<U+0097>

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Oh, brother of mine, I think it's time for a little payback!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: The Canterlot Two-Step?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Mmm, we don't have the chickens. How about the Baltimare Flair?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Ah, my flair isn't what it used to be.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [over loudspeaker] Listen here, y'all! If you're a friend of mine, you're entitled to a free night's stay, and everypony is a friend of mine! Thank you. Thank you very much.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Are you thinking what I am?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: The High Roller Hustle!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: The what now?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Trust us. When we're done, there won't be a pony in town who doesn't know the Applejack-iest truth about Gladmane! That is, assuming you two are willing to help.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: What size gown do you wear?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Wh-What's all the fuss, now?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: It's the grand matriarch of the Rich family, Impossibly Rich! She's one of the wealthiest ponies in Equestria.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Well, why didn't somepony tell me? You know how I like to give VIP guests my personal touch.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Well, she's not exactly a guest. Word is she's planning a resort of her own. [hushed] I think she's here to scout the competition.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [hushed] Oh, really?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: And with her bits, she could take over the whole strip, hire away anypony she wants!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Uh, not me, of course! I love it here. My good-for-nothing brother, on the other hoof...

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [snorts] Impossibly Rich, what an honor it is to have you at my humble five-hoof resort. I'm sure Flam has done an excellent job showing you around, but nothing could beat a personalized tour from the mane himself. Uh-huh-huh.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: You'll have to excuse Ms. Rich. She saves the energy other ponies spend talking out loud and uses it to make more money.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: She'd love a personal tour! Say, in, uh, about an hour?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Well, that sounds right pleasant. And if you can break away for a moment, Flam, I'd love to see you in my office so I can get ready.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Are all of you sure this is a good idea?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Abso-tively!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Gladmane is one fish that's hooked but good!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I sure hope you two know what you're doin'.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Oho, don't you worry. When it comes to throwing ponies off their game...

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: No two ponies do it better than us!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Can't argue with that.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Hey there, boss, Impossibly Rich is just about ready for that tour. So what did you want to see me about?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Actually, there's something I want you to see <U+0096> the Grand Plan. Every hotel on this strip as amazing as this one, and every one of 'em mine.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: And all it'll take is a little salesponyship, like this.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [over loudspeaker] Hey there, friends. Uh-huh-huh. If you think my resort is fantastic, wait 'til you see Ponet Fantastique! Tickets are on sale now. Two for the price of one! Thank you. Thank you very much.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Now I know Impossibly Rich has probably made you a tempting offer to come work for her.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Well uh, now that you mention it...

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: And as your friend, I'd never tell you what to do. But nopony's gonna stand in the way of my plans, no matter how rich she is! And I sure wouldn't want you to end up on the losing side. Think you might consider staying here?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Um...

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Well all right then.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: They're comin'!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: And last but not least, Ms. Rich, the jewel in my crown.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Impossibly wants you to know she's very impressed but doesn't think you can keep a resort of this caliber going for long.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Oh? And why's that?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Because you've got the best talents in the industry. What stops them from just leaving to join any competitor?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [laughs] Well, you see I have a trick for that, I must confess. Uh-huh-huh. And it all has to do [also over loudspeaker] with how I handle my employees.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: And how is that?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [also over loudspeaker] Well, like friends, of course! And I treat every one of my employees with the kindness they deserve.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [stammering] That's it? That's your secret, heh-heh? There's... [clears throat] ...nothing else?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Nope, just friendship. But you know all about friendship, don't you... Fluttershy?!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: You knew the whole time?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Never try to con a con-pony. Uh-huh-huh. [laughs] Yeah!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I'd have thought you'd have hit the road by now.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Whether we were able to fool you or not, you can't just go on keeping ponies from getting along! It's just... mean!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Now, maybe it is. But it's a meanness that works. Unlike your pathetic little ploy. I practically invented the "High Roller Hustle". But I suppose I should be impressed. You're the only ponies to ever figure out the secret to my success. Takes a lot of work keepin' everypony fightin'. But as long as I keep 'em convinced that I'm their only friend, all of Las Pegasus will be mine. Oh, you can't trick a confession out of a pony like me! I'm always one step ahead.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Well, you better check your hooves, because you've just stepped in a confession!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Oh, no. No, no, w-w-wait, wait!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [over loudspeaker] Did that sound okay?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [over loudspeaker] Flim and Flam told us you'd see right through the fake rich pony bit, and that once you did, you wouldn't be able to resist gloatin' about it! This was all part of the plan!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Oh, now, now, friends! Listen, I-I can explain everything!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Gladmane has left the buildin'!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: I guess the map wasn't on the fritz after all.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: If it weren't for your history with Flim and Flam, you never would've been so determined to find somepony else to help, and we never would have found out what Gladmane was doing.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: And if it weren't for you wantin' to show even those two con-ponies kindness, we never would have been able to trick the trickster. [to Flim and Flam] Must've felt pretty nice to finally put all your connivin' and cheatin' skills to good use.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: In fact, we might think of it as a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Emphasis on "once".

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [suspiciously] What do you mean?

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [over loudspeaker] While this establishment undergoes a slight change in management, my brother and I want to assure you that it remains the pinnacle of Las Pegasus entertainment! Which is why we invite each and every one of you to experience the wonder of the Ponet Fantastique Theater <U+0096> at half the normal cost of admission!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: [over loudspeaker] And while you're appreciating this historic venue totally devoid of any performers of any kind, we invite you to use the wonder of your own imaginations to fill the space at no additional charge!

title: Viva Las Pegasus
writer: Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt; story by Michael Vogel, Kevin Burke & Chris "Doc" Wyatt
dialog: Flim and Flam!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [yawns] I've prepared a full day of spells. You've been doing great, but now it's time for a real challenge!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Oh-ho-ho! It is on! Where do we begin?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Teleportation! Multiple locations! Try to keep up!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Transfiguration!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Shields!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Whoo! I am on fire! What's next?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Maybe there is such a thing as too much studying.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: As you know, speed spells like Accelero are not easy. But if done correctly, they can allow you to be much more efficient with your day.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Way to go, Starlight!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [laughing] I'm not finished. I've discovered a very old spell, Similo Duplexis, when combined with Accelero in just the right way... [doubled up] ...you can literally be in two places at once! [normal] [sighs] Now I'm finished.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: I have to admit, your skills with magic really are nothing short of amazing. I'm very impressed.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [laughing] I've always been something of a natural.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: However, it doesn't look like you've tackled any friendship lessons since you met Trixie.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Are you sure? I could've sworn there were a couple in there somewhere...

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: I'm sure.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: I see... Well, I'm really quite busy this week. So many commitments. I'll try and find some time in my<U+0097>

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: No time like the present! Spike and I are headed to Canterlot. Princess Celestia wanted me to give her students a quick overview on the history of enchanted objects in Equestria. We'll be back after the presentation, which should be...

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Twenty moons from now?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Tonight. It's a quick presentation.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [to himself] Sure, keep telling yourself that...

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: You can tackle a friendship lesson today, and we can review your progress when I get back later this evening.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [nervously] Of course! No problem! Friendship lesson... On it...

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Great! Can't wait. Now, Spike, help me color-code these cards according to time, place, and object.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Huh? Huh! [humming and muttering to self] Oh, yeah. Mm-hmm.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Hey! Twilight and I are about to head to Canterlot. Just checking to see if you need anything before we left.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Nope, not at all! I'm good here. Oh, not good <U+0096> great! Not a problem in the world! Heh.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [disbelieving] Uh-huh. So... what are you doing, exactly?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: I... was... just trying to decide which friendship lesson I was going to tackle while you two were in Canterlot. Bap-ba-du... Oh, yep, right here, where I just left them a second ago.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [blows] [reading] "Bake a cake with Pinkie Pie," "scrapbook with Applejack," "sew with Rarity..."

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: "Help an animal with Fluttershy," "chillax with Rainbow Dash?" What is chillaxing?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: No idea.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: You know, uh, if you're nervous about your friendship lessons, it's totally okay to say so.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Nervous, me? [fake laughter] Oh, Spike, you really are hilarious, ha-ha. You think I'm nervous that I'm gonna fail something as simple as baking a cake?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Well, if you were, it'd be<U+0097>

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Silly! Twilight just said how impressed she was that I combined a speed spell and a duplication spell. That was a challenge. These? Pfft, hah! I could combine all five of these at the same time without breaking a sweat.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: I think maybe you're missing<U+0097>

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: An opportunity to really impress Twilight? [gasps] Great idea, Spike! I'm gonna get right on that! Good talk.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: And I thought Twilight was the master of the freak-out.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: So, with your help, I figure these should be done in no time.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Are you sure this is what Twilight would want? Seems like you might want to take your time with each of these.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: But by working as a team, we can get them done faster. And isn't teamwork a key factor in friendship?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: I... guess.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Super! Pinkie Pie, since we're baking, you will be in the kitchen.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Rarity, Applejack, you two can set up in the library.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Oh, I don't know that a dusty old library has the proper lighting. Perhaps we can stay out here in the foyer.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: I thought that Fluttershy and I could work with the animals right here in the foyer.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Oh, um, whatever you think is best.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Great. Now, Rainbow Dash<U+0097>

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: It might depend on the animal. For instance, this poor little eagle with a sprained wing might be better off up in one of the towers.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Yeah, yeah, yeah, sure.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: And these adorable little chipmunks might prefer a nook somewhere. Maybe if you spend some time getting to know<U+0097>

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: In a minute, Fluttershy.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Uh, I don't know if we can chillax properly in the castle. We need very specific conditions for optimal chillaxing.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Oh, I just assumed chillaxing could happen anywhere.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Heh. Shows what you know about chillaxing. Let me do some location scouting.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Okay... It seemed more efficient to start with the scrapbooking, so we can just get it out of the<U+0097>

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh-ooh! Can we start with me? We're gonna need time for the cake to bake! After all... It's a piece of cake to bake a pretty cake<U+0097>

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Uh, we're on a schedule, no time for a song. We can start with baking, then<U+0097>

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: But we can't design dresses after you've been baking with Pinkie. [hushed] She can be a bit messy.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Mmm!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Fine. We can start with the dresses, and then<U+0097>

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: While y'all figure that out, I'm gonna start layin' out the pictures for scrapbookin'. We got a whole lot of time to cover.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: How much is a whole lot?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: We've got at least eighty moons worth of memories to go through.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Eighty moons?!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Ugh. There is nowhere to chillax in this castle! We're gonna have to set up somewhere else.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Could you all excuse me for... one... second?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Wow. That pony really needs to chillax.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [hyperventilating] Okay, Starlight. You've got this. A handful of friendship lessons is nothing compared to the spells you've mastered. [nervous laugh] Maybe if I cast a little spell to help things along... Something simple and safe. Fiducia Compelus... That's not bad. They would barely notice it, but... is it enough? Oh... Maybe Cogeria so they're more... open to suggestion. Oh, or maybe Cogeria combined with Fiducia Compelus! Yes, that could work nicely! Oh, with a hint of Persuadere to be sure it sticks.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Everypony'll probably thank me for getting it all done so quickly. And Twilight will be thrilled I've completed so many lessons. Everypony wins!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Congratulations, Starlight. You're a genius. [gasps] Maybe the congratulations were a little premature...

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Cogeria... Persuadere... Fiducia... Hmm. Ah! Of course! Fiducia Compelus needs a trigger. [amplified] Ponies! Hear my voice and listen!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Pinkie, kitchen. Rarity, Applejack, library. Fluttershy, stay here. Rainbow Dash, find somewhere inside the castle and set up a place where we can chillax.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Let's get to work, Pinkie!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Okie-dokie! What would you like to do first?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Uh, what are we supposed to do first?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Whatever you want to do first, Starlight Glimmer.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [reading] In a medium-size mixing bowl, beat together eggs, sugar, and two teaspoons of vanilla... [beat] mix in flour... [beat] [quickly] add baking soda, salt and cinnamon! Hmm. I think you can take it from here.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Take what from where?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: The baking. Just keep following the instructions in the book until I get back.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Abso-tively! Instruction following starting... now!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Baking a cake <U+0096> check! Now on to sewing!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: What did you have in mind, Rarity?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Whatever you want me to have in my mind, Starlight Glimmer.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Can you make a dress exactly like that one?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Just like this one?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Just like it.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Absolutely. It will look perfectly divine.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: That's a whole lot of photos. How do you usually organize them?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] However you want me to organize them, Starlight.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Okay. Tell me about this one.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Sweet Apple Acres, twenty moons ago. Granny Smith was lookin' for her favorite pie tin. She looked in the kitchen, but it wasn't there. She looked in the barn, but it wasn't there.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Ugh. I don't need every little detail. Heh. Just sum up the story in one sentence.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Huh. Turns out Granny Smith didn't know how to make a pig do the backstroke.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Uh-huh... Why don't you keep putting these photos in chronological order, and when I come back, you can give me more... highlights?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Sure thing, Starlight Glimmer.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Fluttershy, where are all the animals?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] They ran away.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: And why didn't you stop them?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Because you didn't ask me to.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Obviously I wanted you to... Never mind. Can you please round up all the animals in the castle and bring them back here to the foyer?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] All the animals. Got it.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Did you find a place to chillax, Rainbow Dash?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Sure thing, Starlight Glimmer!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Great. Let me know when it's ready.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Yes, Starlight Glimmer.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Granny Smith knew she was gonna need a bigger boat, so Goldie Delicious says, "If you can't say anythin' nice about anypony, come sit by me!" Big Mac knew if he just covered himself in mud, the creature wouldn't be able to see him!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Starlight Glimmer. I have finished the dress. Isn't it gorgeous?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: What is that?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] You wanted me to make a dress exactly like the one in the book.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [sighs] Go make a real dress out of fabric, exactly like the one in the book.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Ah. I see. Yes, of course, Starlight Glimmer.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Rarity! Make it bigger than the one in the book.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Of course, darling. Bigger it is.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] She was just a pony standin' in front of another pony askin' him to love her.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Pinkie, what are you doing?!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Following all of the instructions in the cookbook in order, Starlight Glimmer!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: I meant just the one cake! I was only gone a few minutes! How in Equestria did you get all of this done so fast?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Think the baking lesson is done.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Oh, what now?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] They can take our farm, but they can't take our freedom!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: What's going on?!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] I gathered all of the animals like you asked, Starlight Glimmer.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Oh, yes, this will do nicely.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] A much bigger dress!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically, muffled] It was the best of apples, it was the worst of apples...

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [exhales] I can handle this. It's just magic, and I know magic. What's that?!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: What did you say?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] The cakes are burning. You left the ovens on.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: We need water!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Yes, Starlight Glimmer.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Storm clouds?!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [mechanically] Big Mac told me, "With a whole lot of power comes a heck of a lot of responsibility."

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [groans] This can't get any worse!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: What is going on?!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: I had no idea we had spiders in the castle! I'm never sleeping again!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Maybe if I had reversed the Fiducia Compelus and Cogeria... Or maybe I added too much Persuadere... What?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: You're really missing the point here.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [sighs] I finally untangled that mess of a spell and got everypony home. It was really powerful stuff. They're gonna feel that in the morning. Now please try to explain to me how in the name of Celestia things got this out of control.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Well, it was the first time I cast that particular spell, and I didn't fully think it through. I-I bet if I had reversed<U+0097>

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: I think you might be missing the point here.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Told ya.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: What made you think that casting a spell on your friends to do your bidding was even remotely a good idea?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Well, when you put it that way, it sounds really bad.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: That's because it is really bad!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Starlight, I'm not mad at you, but I am disappointed. You've been doing so well. I just don't understand how a friendship lesson turned into all of this.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Ugh, fine! I've been avoiding the friendship lessons on purpose.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Why?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: I can cast complex spells, but baking a cake with Pinkie Pie freaks me out! And yes, I know how ridiculous that sounds. That's why I didn't say anything. I thought if I just kept wowing you with my magical abilities, you might just... not... notice?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Baking a cake freaks you out?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Yes! Baking a cake, sewing <U+0096> all of it! What if I was bad at it? I didn't want to be a disappointment to anypony, and I ended up being a disappointment to everypony.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Starlight, do you think anypony cares if you can bake a cake?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: But the lesson<U+0097>

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Was to get to know Pinkie Pie better by doing something she loves. It was a friendship lesson, not a baking lesson.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Oh. You know, I think I might have missed the point here.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Told ya.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: So now what?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Now it's time for a pretty advanced friendship lesson. It's called apologizing.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [groaning] I don't know what kind of whammy Starlight put on us, but I feel like I got shoved through the Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Ugh, tell me about it.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [hushed] If everypony could speak in a whisper for the next few days, that would be delightful. My head is thumping...!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [tired] I was up all night calming the animals down.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [hushed] Fluttershy, please! Not so loud...

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Starlight's spell made me burn perfectly good cake! I never burn cake!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Yeah, about that... Things got a little out of hand last night.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Well, ain't that the understatement of the day.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Hmph! Tell it to the cake, sister!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [hushed] Can we all please argue at a lower volume?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: I really messed up. I cast the spell because I was nervous about working with you on the friendship lessons.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Well, here's a friendship lesson for ya <U+0097> don't cast spells on your friends!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Believe me, I know. What I did was wrong, a-and I can't take it back. You're right to be upset, and I hope one day I can make it up to you. But all I can say is... I'm sorry. Now, if you'll excuse me, I've gotta go clean the castle covered in wet cake batter and spiders.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: That was a pretty good apology.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Seems like she feels pretty bad.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Hey, Starlight! Most of the Apple family photos are still layin' around in the wreckage. I think I'll come along and hunt 'em down.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Oh, and I feel awful for disturbing all of those cute little spiders and bats. I should check on them.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Ah, yes, and I left some lovely fabric out. I should come and move it to that nice quiet library.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Uh, I'll come and get those storm clouds out of the bathroom.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Fine! Somepony has to bake a cake to honor all the poor cakes that sacrificed their batter in last night's tragedy!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: It seems your apology went well.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: [sighs] I'm just lucky to have such understanding friends, but it's probably going to be a while before I try to tackle those friendship lessons again.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: What do you mean? You've been doing them all day.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: What are you talking about? I've been cleaning up the mess I made by totally failing at friendship.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Really? But didn't I see you sewing with Rarity?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Yes, but<U+0097>

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: And you and Applejack did a great job collecting those photos and putting them in the book. Helping animals with Fluttershy, baking with Pinkie Pie <U+0096> those sound like your assignments to me. In fact, I think there's just one that you're missing.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Sun <U+0096> check. Chairs <U+0096> check. And thanks to a simple Catadupa Levitata spell, we've got water. Is that everything we need to chillax?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Nope.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: No? What did I miss?

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Quiet.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Ah! Right.

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: Hey! She completes the lesson when I say she completes it. So less learning and more chillaxing!

title: Every Little Thing She Does
dialog: So... How long do we sit quietly?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Sorry, Spike. It's just Pinkie Pie, Rarity, and Applejack are getting back from their Seaward Shoals boat trip, and I can't wait to hear all about it! It's such a shame Rainbow Dash and Fluttershy had to miss it for their Cloudsdale flight school reunion. Maybe the rest of us not going was for the best anyway. I know the three of them were really looking forward to getting out of their element.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Getting out of their element?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I think they all just wanted to try something new.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Huh. I guess a boat trip qualifies as that.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: My only worry is that they'll be so excited, they'll talk over each other, and I'll miss some of the details! Just to be safe, I may need you to take notes.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Uh... right.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: So how was the trip?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Well, at least you don't have to worry about them talking over each other.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I don't know what happened on that boat trip. But once Rarity, Applejack, and Pinkie Pie have some tea and talk it out, I'm sure everypony will feel better.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Come on in, everypony! Gummy, Opalescence, and Winona? This is a surprise!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Aren't Pinkie Pie, Rarity, and Applejack with you?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [reading] "Sorry, darling, but I must decline the invitation to your soiree. While I'm sure it will be positively resplendent, there are certain ponies I'd rather not associate with at the moment. Rarity."

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Rarity's not coming? Awww. So I polished my scales for nothing.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [reading] "Sorry I can't make it, but I'm still a mite upset about everything that happened on the boat. Applejack." "Sorry I can't make the tea party today, but there's a small problem with the guest list. Plus, I'm right in the middle of a very important cupcake. Pinkie." Come on, Spike! Since our friends won't come here and tell us what happened, we'll just have to go to them!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I'm sorry, but my mane wasn't made to support marine life! Ruined, completely ruined.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I don't know, Rarity. Maybe you could<U+0097>

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Throw it away? Yes, I agree. Just another innocent casualty of that disastrous boat trip.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: About that. Spike and I were wondering what happened out there.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: If it's too difficult to talk about, we completely understand.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Well, since you dragged it out of me... It all started at the docks. I knew Applejack and Pinkie Pie wanted to get out of their element, so I thought I would surprise them with an elegant cruise.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [narrating] I had brought a small bag with just a few key essentials. [in-world] All right, ponies! Prepare yourselves for luxury on the high seas!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: That sounds... fun?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [sea dog accent] The sea air carries a portent for trouble this day. 'Tis a treacherous and perilous journey that lies ahead of us! We sail to adventure... or our very doom.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I... have no idea what you just said, but your wardrobe is delightfully seaworthy.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [narrating] Despite Applejack's colorful seafarer attitude, I was still determined to get my friends out of their element by providing them with all the refinements of a luxury cruise. I made sure to bring the most delectable nibbles for them to enjoy.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Ooh, I brought food too!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Let's see, I've got cotton candy, taffy, circus peanuts, and lots of other super-yummy stuff!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Oh, Pinkie Pie, that all looks positively delectable. But you simply must try one of these cucumber sandwiches. Dig in!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Hmmm. Hmmm. Hmm. Hmm. Hmm. Hmm. Hmm.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [sea dog accent] Arrr! Get those off me ship!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Oh! I'm so sorry! I had no idea you had such distaste for cucumbers!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [sea dog accent] Yar-har-har-har, hardy-har-har-har!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Hmm... That doesn't sound like Applejack.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Huh.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Well, hold on, because it gets even worse. Pinkie tried to lighten the mood with some fun maritime games.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: It's pi<f1>ata o'clock! Wanna give it a whack, Rarity?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Oh, darling, of course!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [laughs in sea dog accent] I'll be chartin' a course to the very heart of that maelstrom!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Ahem. Er, Applejack? Just a thought, but maybe we should steer the ship toward calmer waters.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [sea dog accent] This be the only way to Plunder Cove!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Perhaps if I took a quick look-see at that map of yours, I could find us a more cruise-friendly path<U+0097>

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [sea dog accent] Yah! There'll be no mutiny aboard me ship!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Look at me! I'm the captain too!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [narrating] Clearly, Pinkie Pie had caught Applejack's sea madness.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Then what happened?!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: So Applejack got some sort of sea madness and caused the boat to capsize?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: After all the effort I put in to provide her and Pinkie with the exact luxury cruise they needed to get out of their elements, that is how Applejack thanked me!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: So you were stuck out in the middle of the ocean? How in Equestria did you get back?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [sighs] Spike, darling, you'll have to forgive me. I am far too emotionally drained to discuss the matter any further!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Rarity, I don't suppose there's any chance you might be... uh, exaggerating things? Just a little?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Well! I can assure you that that is exactly what happened! But if you don't believe me, you can ask Pinkie Pie. I'm quite certain her story will be the same.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: So that's what Rarity said happened on the boat, huh?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: We thought there was a chance she might have... [clears throat] embellished the story just a tad. So we wanted to hear about what happened from you! Did Applejack really capsize the boat?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Of course not! Pfft, that's just silly! There's no way Applejack could've sank the boat!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I knew it!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: That's a relief.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Because Rarity did!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: It all started on the docks. I knew Rarity and Applejack wanted to get out of their element, so I figured I'd throw them the funnest, silliest boat party ever! But I guess Rarity had other ideas.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [narrating] I thought I overpacked until I saw Rarity and her team of porter-ponies!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Prepare yourselves for a luxury cruise! A day of opulence, decadence, and extravagance!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [deadpan] That sounds fun.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Ahoy, mateys! Batten down the hatches, y'all, 'cause this here's gonna be a boat ride of adventure!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Eh, I can live with that.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Huh. They just keep coming.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [narrating] Now, you can't throw a silly boat party without snacks. So I made sure to pack the funnest party food I could find! [in-world] Rarity, would you care for some cotton candy? It's freshly spun!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Oh, Pinkie Pie, those all look simply... well, simple. But they're obviously unfit for a luxury cruise. Now, my cucumber sandwiches, on the other hoof... Try one, then you'll understand.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Ooh, are those chocolate chip?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Sorry! Cucumber sandwiches are so ten seconds ago.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Wait, wait, wait. That doesn't sound like Rarity.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Just wait until you hear how much more unlike her she sounds!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I thought I'd lighten the mood with some super-fun party boat games. But Rarity was a real wet blanket.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: It's pi<f1>ata time! Ooh! Wanna give it a whack, Rarity?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [exaggerated posh laugh] ...Oh. You were serious. Well, that's adorable.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I'll give it a go!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: That's the spirit! Let's get this boat party started!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Whoooooa! Heh-heh! Whoa, doggie!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Tug of war? Now we're talking! Whoever wins gets to be captain!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Or... one of us should just be captain now?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Oh, don't worry, dear. Luxury cruises never sink.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: What?!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: And that's why the boat sinking was all Rarity's fault.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: That seems... odd. I mean, we trust you, of course. But it's all so... extraordinary?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Oh, it's "extraordinary", all right. But that's exactly what happened! In fact, the only thing I might've gotten wrong was that there were even more porter ponies! But just to be safe, you should talk to Applejack. She'll know exactly how many porter ponies there were!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Okay, but if the boat sank, how did you all get rescued?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Oh, that's easy. We just<U+0097> [sniffs] My muffins!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [fed up] That's it. We've gotta go talk to Applejack.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Good idea. She'll straighten this out.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I just really, really wanna know how they made it back! But yeah, that'd be great too.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Hold on a tick. Pinkie Pie says it's Rarity's fault, and Rarity says I sank the boat? Well, that's plumb crazy! If you two really wanna know what happened, I'll tell you. Y'all know how Pinkie Pie and Rarity wanted to get out of their "element"? Well, I bought a treasure map to give 'em a rip-roarin' seafarin' adventure! But they had other ideas.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: La-la-la! Prepare yourselves for the most luxurious boat outing that ever outed a boat!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: And more fun than you can shake a stick at! [squee] Because I brought a stick!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Alright, mateys, but just y'all wait 'til you see the high seas adventure I've got planned!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [narrating] Unfortunately, they seemed less interested in a treasure huntin' adventure and more interested in snacks.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Oh, darling, that food isn't fit for a pony of proper breeding, darling, and refinement, darling! Now my cucumber sandwiches, on the other hoof...

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Bet you I can fit them all in my mouth! Ahh...

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Pinkie, darling, please!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: U-uh, Rarity, I<U+0097>

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Well, I never! Hum-ph!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Me neither! Hum-ph!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Do you want to say it, or should I?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I'll go. That sure doesn't sound like Rarity or Pinkie Pie!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Oh, it gets a sight worse than that!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: It's P.W.T. <U+0096> Pi<f1>ata Whacking Time!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Oh, darling, whacking is a base pastime for common ponies. Doesn't interest me in the least.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Meh. Hee-hee!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Huh?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Whoooooa!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Looks like we need to change course!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Ooh! Why, this will make a perfect tablecloth for my cheeseboard!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Maybe so, but it's also the only way to find Plunder Cove!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [narrating] And Pinkie Pie was just about as helpful as a weasel in a hen house.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Captain Pinkie Pie reporting for map duty!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Hold on, everypony!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Wait, so it was Rarity and Pinkie's fault?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Yup! And maybe if they ever apologized, I'll consider talkin' to them again.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: If they all blame each other, I don't know how we're gonna get them to talk again.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Neither do I, Spike. Neither do I.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: There's gotta be some way to fix this. If Applejack, Pinkie Pie, and Rarity keep not talking to each other, they could forget what good friends they really are!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I just don't get it! All of their stories are so different! [sigh] We're never gonna figure out what really happened.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Their stories were different, but they also had a lot in common.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I guess... They were all on a ship that sank, and... that's about it.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Not quite.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: A-ha! Not only do I think I know how the boat sank, I have a pretty good idea how to get Rarity, Applejack and Pinkie Pie back together!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I hope this plan of yours works.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [panting] Winona brought me your note about a friendship emergency! H-How can I help?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [panting] Opalescence delivered your message, Twilight! What's the emergency?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: It's a good thing it was time for Gummy's bath, or I might not have seen your note about the emergency, Twilight!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Sorry, but I just didn't know how else to get the three of you here together, and there really is a friendship emergency! Yours!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Oh, there's no emergency! I'm just waitin' for an apology.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: An apology?!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: What?! Why would you want me to apologize when it was Rarity's fault?!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: What are you talking about? Applejack clearly caused the boat to sink! She stranded us in the middle of the ocean!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [frustrated scream] Will somepony please tell me how you made it back?!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Well... Maybe it wasn't the middle of the ocean...

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Ugh.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Even so, I don't appreciate bein' hornswoggled into comin' back here.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: On that, at least, we agree.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Yeah!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I know you each have a different perspective on how the boat capsized and blame each other, but if you come on the boat with me I'll show you what really happened.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Well, not that I have any doubts, but it will feel good for everypony to see exactly whose fault it was.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I think we all know which pony's about to be proven right.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: We sure do.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Like I said, I sure hope this works.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [nervous laugh] [hushed] Whatever you're looking for, I hope you find it soon!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Don't worry, Spike. I've got it all under control. [to the others] While all of your stories seem very different, they all had something in common <U+0096> cucumber sandwiches.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: What in the hay does that have to do with anythin'?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: And why would you waste a perfectly good hors d'oeuvre?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: You also mentioned the bubbling water.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: And the swell. Cucumber just happens to be the favorite food of the tri-horned bunyip, and bubbles followed by a swell is what happens when they swim up to the shallows from deep water.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: So... we attracted a tri-horned whatchamacallit?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: With cucumber sandwiches?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Sounds like a stretch.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Hello, bunyip, sir!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: So that's a...

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: A tri-horned bunyip! Who's very sorry he accidentally knocked over your boat. Right?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Wait, the storm had nothing to do with the capsizing?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Nope!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: All right. Even if our friend the bunyip is responsible for sinking the boat, it still doesn't excuse a certain pony's behavior!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Me?! How about you and Pinkie Pie?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Pfft<U+0096> What? Who? Me? No<U+0096>

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I think I can explain that too. Each of you spent so much time trying to come up with the perfect way to get the others out of their element, that you didn't notice your friends were doing the same thing!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Wait a minute. You brought all those games and things for us?

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Of course! I figured the boat trip was the perfect time to do things that were silly and fun!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: And I was just trying to give the two of you the elegant cruise I thought you deserved.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: And I just wanted to give you two a high seas adventure, since that'd be somethin' new and different for y'all.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: That is so sweet. You must have gone through so much trouble.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Well, not half as much trouble as you did makin' all that fancy food, and bringin' all those games!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: I guess this just teaches us that even long time friends need to work at communication.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
