dialog: Well, there's something I'd like to communicate to you all right now! You girls are the best friends a pony could ever have!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Oh, let's never fight again!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: You got it!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: [simultaneously] Agreed!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: All right, you big softie! Bring it in!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: Come on, bunyip, sir! You got it!

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: One thing's for sure, Spike. There's nothing like a luxurious adventure boat party to get you out of your element.

title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
writer: Michael P. Fox & Wil Fox; story by Kevin Burke, Chris "Doc" Wyatt, Michael P. Fox, & Wil Fox
dialog: You said it!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, that's the last of it, Filthy Rich.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Just Rich, please. And on behalf of Rich's Barnyard Bargains, thanks for another season's shipment of zap apple jam.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Our pleasure. See ya next time.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Uh, Apple Bloom, did you pack up the cider into the same crates as the zap apple jam?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Sure did! Now that I'm gettin' older, I wanna prove I can handle more responsibility on the farm.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: But the crates aren't marked. You kept track of what went into which crate, right?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Oh. Um... y-yep. I totally kept track of everything.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Good. Because we wouldn't want Filthy Rich to get a shipment of cider when he's supposed to get zap apple jam. You know how Granny feels about sellin' cider anywhere but on the farm. Are you sure he got the right crates?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [huffs] Sure I'm sure! Now why don't you and Big Mac head on out to the house and let me finish up here?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: If you gave Rich the zap apple jam, then what's this here?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Um... extra?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Nnnope.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Granny knows I-I wasn't tryin' to make off with a shipment of cider, right? Because I would never do that.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Don't worry. We know exactly whose fault it was.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Now why in tarnation would you lie to me, Apple Bloom?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: I was kinda hopin' I could fix it before anypony found out.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Tellin' lies won't fix anythin'. Trust me. I know.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: What could you possibly know about it? You've never told a lie in your whole life!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: What's so funny?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Oh-ho, sugarcube. [laughing] Your big sister lied so much when she was a filly, the whole family ended up in the hospital.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: What?!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [laughing] Eeyup!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [groans] You might as well tell her the whole story. Might even do her some good.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: When Applejack and Big Mac were just a wee bit older than you are now, they both kept a-squabblin' over who would run the farm better.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: All I'm sayin' is that you may have plenty of brawn, but I'm the one with the ideas on how to run things better around here!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [laughs] Applejack, Applejack, Applejack, ideas are all well and good, but you can't plow a field with 'em. I don't know how many times I've told you that.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Too many!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: You two horned toads better stop jabberin' and get to workin'! Yeah, they'd better. I need you to go to town. The apple blight's been awful, and if we don't get more spray, cider season'll be shorter than a dwarf crabapple tree!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: It's like I was just tellin' Cousin Braeburn last week. Now there's a pony who knows how to put his back into a problem...

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [growls] Oh, hey there, Filthy Rich!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Just Rich, please. And I'd you to meet my fianc<e9>e, Spoiled Milk. Honey, this is Applejack and Big Mac, the two hardest workin' ponies at Sweet Apple Acres.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [chuckles] Oh, now, dear, be nice. Sweet Apple Acres makes zap apple jam. It's one of Dad's best-sellers.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [chuckles] Don't mind Spoiled Milk. She's just proud of me. Uh, but she's right. I'm in charge of the store now, and I'm just burstin' with ideas I wanna try!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Like what?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, how 'bout this? Cider season's around the corner. Why not let me sell it for ya?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: That is an interesting idea.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, maybe it's interestin', an' maybe it ain't. But it's definitely not a new idea. Granny Smith told us your grandpa, Stinkin' Rich, used to ask her every year if he could sell our cider in your store, and Granny told him every year about the tradition of everypony in Ponyville linin' up out at Sweet Apple Acres.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: So start a new tradition. Some day, one o' y'all will take over the farm just like I've taken over the store. I'm guessin' it'll the one with the best ideas.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, now, as I've said many a time before, ideas are all well an' good, but you can't plow a field<U+0097>

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Ya know what? How 'bout we give you three barrels of cider early, and if it sells well, we'll make a deal for the rest?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Oh, hey, now! Perfect! [to Spoiled Milk] Come on, honey. I've gotta get everything ready.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Hoo-wee! I tell ya, if the future means me runnin' Sweet Apple Acres and you bein' quiet, I can't wait!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: I just can't believe you'd make a deal with Filthy Rich without even talkin' to Granny!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Aw, Granny will love the idea. And then she'll decide that I'm the one who should take over the farm. You'll see.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: See what?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Applejack here had another one of her "big ideas", and I think we all know my position on ideas. You can't<U+0097>

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Ee... right.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Big idea, hmmm?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Actually, more of an opportunity. Y'see, we ran into Filthy Rich in town. Did ya know he's runnin' the family store now?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: And what does this here "opportunity" mean for Sweet Apple Acres?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, uh, since cider season is almost here, he<U+0097>or, I-I mean, I<U+0097>thought it'd be a good idea to give him a few barrels of cider to sell at the store before the season starts.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Oh, is that all? Absolutely not!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [scoffs] But, Granny, why can't we sell a few barrels o' cider early to Filthy Rich? And how is it any different than when you gave zap apple jam to Filthy's grandpappy to sell?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Your cider and your jam ain't the same thing! Zap apple jam jars preserve the flavor for moons, but cider starts to spoil the second it comes out the press. That is why every cider season, all of Ponyville lines up at Sweet Apple Acres. And first come is first served! Hmph!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: I get what you're sayin', Granny. But couldn't you make an exception just this once? I sort of promised.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Mm, meh-enh. Besides, cider-makin' is iffy business. And we're probably not gonna have a lot this year anyway, what with all the blight. I am sorry, Applejack, but you's just gonna have to un-promise.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [sighs] Oh.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: I hate to say I told you so, Applejack, but<U+0097>

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: You an' I both know you don't hate to say anythin'.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, I've always thought that the most important thing a pony can do is say exactly what's on his mind to anypony who'll listen, so everypony everywhere always knows everythin' they're thinkin', and<U+0097>

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: And you don't ever have to listen to anypony else.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: What?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Exactly.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, if it ain't my new business partner!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Uh, about the cider, Rich...

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Take a look at what I did last night after we made our deal!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Whoo! Ha! Pretty great, huh?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: The thing is, I-I don't think I can get you any.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: What? Well, I did all this work on your say-so! We shook hooves and everything!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, you see, at Sweet Apple Acres, we've always been about quality, and while your basic jam jar'll keep<U+0097>

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Plus it's been a tough harvest this year, what with all the blight.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Gah! Sounds to me like you're tryin' to make excuses! Whenever Granddad dealt with Granny Smith, she kept her word! If you can't do that, then maybe our families should stop doin' business together! Altogether!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Now, now, the thing is, Rich, it ain't really up to us. Y'see, Granny's<U+0097>

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Uh, sick!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Wait, Granny's sick? I-I had no idea.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Ee... yeah. Nopony did.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Uh, what Big Mac means is, uh, we've been tryin' to keep it quiet. Don't want people to make rash decisions about doin' business with Sweet Apple Acres just because we're, uh, a little short-hooved at the moment.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Oh, my! O-Of course, of course! I am so sorry. Please let me know if there's anything I can do.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Much appreciated. But right now, we-we only ask for your understandin' during this difficult time.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Mm-hmm.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: You were supposed to tell Rich the simple truth! But instead, you made things worse with a giant lie!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: W-W-What was I supposed to do? You heard Rich. If I told him the truth, he was gonna stop doin' business with us altogether.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Yeah, but that's only because I... I forgot to ask if we had any oat crumbles for this delicious-lookin' salad, Granny.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [hushed] That was only because you made promises you couldn't keep! But there's gotta be a better way out of this mess than by makin' up some story about Granny bein' sick!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [hushed] Well, it worked, didn't it?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Sorry to drop by unannounced. We just wanted to come by to wish Granny a speedy recovery.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [sarcastic] Look, sis. Our good friend, Mr. Rich and his fianc<e9>e... are here. Oh, and they brought flowers! For Granny! On account o' she's sick! Like you said. Ain't that sweet?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Uh, excuse me one second!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Aah!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Golly, what in tarnation?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Oh, I'm sorry, Granny. I-I didn't see ya there.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Ya came blastin' in so fast, t'weren't possible to see nothin'!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Can you go out to the barn? I, uh, I think I might've left a blight sprayer in the orchard.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Are you outta yer apple-pickin' mind?! It's suppertime, girl!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: I know, but, uh, if we forgot a sprayer, I'd wanna get it before dark. You go start countin', a<U+0097>and I'll tell Big Mac we'll be right back, okay?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: ...so from that moment on, I took to referrin' to myself as Big or Large or...

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Oh, Applejack! Your brother was just explainin' why he always wears his yoke.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Oh, well, you know how Big Mac can get to... to talkin', especially when he's upset. And right now, he's just as worried about Granny Smith as I am.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Oh, dear. Is she doin' that bad?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, one thing's for sure, she... she shouldn't be seein' anypony right now. In fact, I'm gettin' more upset just thinkin' about it. Excuse me.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: D'oh! What in the frilly fumidil has gotten into you?!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Sorry, Granny. I just decided if I helped you, it would go faster.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, you're too late. All the sprayers are here.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Oh, good. Uh, say, Granny, when did you first fight the apple blight again?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: It was my second year here in Ponyville. Uh, they was before I had the rick on the one knee.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: ...and others say that's how the trees got to growin' so tall. But to me, it's just how I got my cutie mark!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Uh, Big Mac didn't wanna be rude, but you just can't see Granny right now, because she's... got apple blight!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [gasps] I thought only trees got the blight!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Yeah, that's usually the case. [beat] The doctors think it's from workin' in the orchards for so many years. [beat] Y'see, we had to take Granny to Ponyville General. We just got back right before you showed up.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Oh, my. That is terrible!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Um, I'm sure you'll be fine, but you should leave... [coughs] ...just in case.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: You're right. We're gonna have to hurry if we wanna get there before visitin' hours are over.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: That's right. Wait. Get where?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Why, the hospital, of course. I'm sure we'll see you there.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Tellin' Filthy Rich that Granny's in the hospital just made everythin' a hundred times worse! What are we supposed to do now?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: I got it!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Dropped my second best teeth right in the pigpen, and that was the worst case of apple blight I have ever seen!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: I'd love to hear more, Granny, but we gotta get to the hospital right away!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: The hospital? Why? Who's sick?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: You are, apparently.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: What he means is you're needed at the hospital.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Heh. Whatever for?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: It's the apple blight! It's startin' to infect ponies now! The doctors need an expert opinion, and nopony knows more about fightin' blight than Granny Smith!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, what in tarnation are we waitin' for? Let's go!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [gasps] You know, we're supposed to go in, uh, in the back! Uh, to avoid anypony in the waitin' room with the blight.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Oops! I almost forgot!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Hrk!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: This is perfect! Now you don't have to worry about catchin' the blight.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [slightly muffled] If you say so, dearie.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Now you wait right here while I, uh... check on your presentation!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: What in the rotten rhubarb is goin' on here?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [nervous laugh] Fancy meetin' you two here!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, I'm glad we found you, because I can't seem to find Granny's room or any nurses who've even heard about a pony with apple blight.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Uh, aren't you comin' with us?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Uh, I'll catch up! I gotta find Big Mac!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Okay, Granny, just wait here one second and we can go.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Where are you two going?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Big Mac can't come! He, uh, might be contagious!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: All right, climb up here and I'll cover you up. Then I'll bring Rich in, tell him you're Granny, but you're not allowed to take the sheets off. You moan a few times, he leaves, and this whole thing is over.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: This is spinnin' way out of control, Applejack! Now I know you thought sellin' cider in Filthy's store was a good idea, but it ain't worth lyin' to him about Granny bein' sick and needin' to go to the hospital, or fibbin' to Granny about them wantin' her come here to talk about the blight, or<U+0097>

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Big McIntosh, please just listen to me for once! This ain't about my ideas. If Rich finds out about all the lies, he'll cut off ties with us and the farm'll go under! Now do you want that to happen, or do you wanna help?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Why can't you be Granny? You're her size, and this is all your fault in the first place.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: I would, but if I let you do the talkin', you'd just ramble on and on until we all got caught!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Just lay down, keep still, and promise me you won't say anythin' for once in your life!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [unconvinced] Eeeeyup.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Granny! [squeaks] [hushed] Granny!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: It's about time! What is goin' on around here?!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Uh, Granny, they need you to wait here! I'll come get ya!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [panting] There you are! We've been going in circles looking for Granny's room!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, you're in luck, 'cause it's-it's right over here, and this time I'll make sure you don't get lost.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: What in the dadgum<U+0097>?!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: He<U+0096> I mean, she was right here! Oh, no. We gotta go!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Where are they takin' her?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: You two, don't lose that gurney! [hushed] Granny, what are you doin'? You were supposed to stay there!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: It was a supply closet!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Oh. Uh... Well, okay, come with me, but be quiet! You know, save your voice for the big presentation!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: But-but-but-but that's my brother on there!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Now apple blight is a serious disease!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: And once your trunk turns red like this, the only thing to do is prune the branches.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [gasps] Oh, no! Granny!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, sure! What else you gonna do once the blight gets this bad?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Everypony, just stop! This is all a big misunderstandin'! [pants] Actually... it's a big lie.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Big Mac?!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [gasps] Granny Smith?! What is goin' on here, Applejack?!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: That is a darn good question.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [sighs] I'm not sure if I was worried that nopony was listenin' to my ideas or just nervous that I wouldn't be the one to end up runnin' the farm, but... I promised somethin' to Filthy Rich that I couldn't deliver, and I was too embarrassed to admit it.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: So Granny was never sick?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: And there ain't no apple blighted ponies?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Nnnope.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Those were all lies. A-And I thought if you found out, you'd stop doin' business with the farm. So I just kept tellin' more.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Please don't make Granny and the farm suffer for what I did! This whole thing is my fault.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: That's... not entirely true. Maybe if I paid more attention to what you had to say instead of talkin' all the time, none o' this would've happened in the first place. I just need to... talk less and listen more. Especially to you.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [sighs] Thanks, big brother. And whether it's me runnin' Sweet Apple Acres or you, I know it'll be in good hooves.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Well, that's nice, but I don't know what in blazes you two are talkin' about! I ain't goin' anywhere anytime soon! [blows raspberry] Runnin' the farm. Not after this display! Not likely! [to Filthy Rich] And don't you go gettin' any ideas about cuttin' ties with Sweet Apple Acres, or I'm goin' right to your grandpappy. Get me?

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: [stutters] Um, yes, ma'am.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Now, who here still wants to hear about the apple blight? Now, when I was a filly...

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: I can't believe you told all those lies!

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: It's not a story I'm proud of, but it taught me a lifelong lesson about bein' honest. I hope you learned somethin', too.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: I sure did. I learned that nopony starts out perfect and sometimes you gotta make a few mistakes to figure out who you are.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: But I think the most important thing I learned is who really runs Sweet Apple Acres.

title: Where the Apple Lies
writer: Dave Rapp; story by Meghan McCarthy & Dave Rapp
dialog: You're darn tootin'! Now everypony quit your lollygaggery and get back to work! Right after we have a glass of cider.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Spring training was awesome, but I can't wait to see my friends!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I'm gonna catch up on some Daring Do with Twilight, help Applejack make my favorite cider, and have a sleepover with Pinkie!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Meanwhile, I'm stuck here running trials week at the Academy.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: But you love yelling and blowing your whistle.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Yeah. I do.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: See you gals later!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Huh? Oh, the map!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Hey, Twilight! So where am I going? The Crystal Mountains? Vanhoover? Here? Please say here.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Well, the good news is we both got called by the map!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Awesome! [beat] Does that mean there's bad news?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: No. Well, not exactly.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [groans] I was just there!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Ooh!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Ahem.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: All right, newbies! Welcome to trials week for the Wonderbolt Academy! You'll be judged on your speed, strength, agility, and technique, culminating in a final evaluation. Will it be hard? Yes! Will you cry? Maybe. Will you fly so much your wings fall off? That has only happened once.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: You think you've got what it takes to be an elite flyer?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Yes, ma'am.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Well, lemme tell you. You don't!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [sighs wistfully] I remember when she said that to me.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [blows whistle] Quit your whispering and give me five hundred laps! Go, go, go!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Well, isn't that sweet? Now get going on those laps!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Welcome, Princess Twilight. [to Rainbow Dash] What are you doing back so soon?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Official friendship business.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Have you noticed anypony having a hard time with their friends?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Not really, but it's not my job to worry about their relationships. I'm here to make them elite flyers.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [sighs] Adorable. They're so full of hope and competition. Eh, their technique could use some work, though.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: You should tell them. I'm sure they'd appreciate any notes from you.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Nah. I wouldn't want to mess with their confidence.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: But they'll never get better if they don't know what to work on.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Sloppy wing placement, crooked lines... I'm gonna have to drill them on basic technique in the classroom portion.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Classroom portion?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Yeah, it's everypony's least favorite part of trial week, but it has to be done.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Maybe we can help!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: We can?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Absolutely! Between your flying skills and my teaching expertise, they could learn a lot! Plus, once they get to know us, they'll be more comfortable coming to us with their friendship problems!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Count us in!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: You have your work cut out for you.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Thank goodness I had time to whip up a few charts on flight patterns and wing symmetry! It's fresh in my mind from when I learned to fly! This is so exciting!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I'm pretty sure their thirst for knowledge will keep them bright-eyed and bushy-tailed.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [chuckles] Good one, Twilight.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Wake up, newbies! Class is in session!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Hello, students! I'm Twilight Sparkle, and this is Rainbow Dash.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: But you can call us "T-Sparks" and "The Dashinator"!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [laughs nervously] Just kidding.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: And we're here to go over basic flying technique.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Who said that?!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Me. I mean, we're here because we're amazingly awesome crazy-good flyers. We're way past basics.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: What's your name?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Sky Stinger. You've, uh, never heard of me?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: He set the record for the fastest vertical acceleration rate! Five hundred feet in two seconds!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [unimpressed] Huh. That's pretty impressive.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: It's amazing.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [clears throat] It is, and we can talk personal records after class, Ms...?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Vapor Trail. She's my wingpony. I never fly without her.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: But you'll have to in the solo trials.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: There are... [gulps] ...solo trials?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Yup. It's a part of your final evaluation.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [scoffs] We'll ace that test with our wings tied behind our flanks. My picture will go right up there, next to yours.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: That's a mighty big claim, considering everypony here is an amazingly awesome crazy-good flyer.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I know.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [clears throat] Okay! Let's get back on track. Now, who can tell me the best wing angle to achieve minimal air resistance?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [quickly] Wake up newbies! Class is in session!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Well, there were a few hiccups, but overall, that went pretty well.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [cricks neck, yawns] Yeah, nopony fell asleep. What? I'm not a student!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Hey, Teach!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Me or Twilight? Probably Twilight.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Um, uh, both. About the solo test. I'm actually kinda worried about it.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Aw, that's all right. We all have moments where we doubt ourselves.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: No, no. I've absolutely zero doubts about myself. I'm a strong flyer. Like, really, really, really strong. This isn't about me. I'm worried for Vapor.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Oh, well, that is very... kind of you?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Tell you what. It's almost time for your freestyle training. Why don't you grab her and show us what you got?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Yes! Prepare to be impressed!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: By me.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Like I said, Vapor still needs work.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Well, he may be full of himself, but I have to admit, Sky is an excellent flyer. He must have shot up two hundred feet!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: But did you see Vapor Trail? Her wing was under his. I think she gave him a boost.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I guess I didn't even notice Vapor. I was too busy watching Sky.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [gasps] I think you're right! Vapor just created a gust of wind that caught Sky's wing at a forty-five degree angle, propelling him into a flipping loop! [beat] Somepony paid attention in class!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Sky obviously has no idea he's not actually amazingly awesome.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: And Vapor's so busy making her friend look good, she's not focused on her own flying at all. [gasps] This must be our friendship problem! And there's only one thing to do!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: You don't want to tell them?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Of course not! Flying is like thirty percent skill and seventy percent confidence! You can't mess with a flyer's confidence!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: But you can't improve if you don't think you have to! Besides, Vapor's keeping a pretty big secret from Sky, and that could lead to trouble!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Yeah, but if we tell them that they've been holding each other back, that could be trouble too!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Ah, I nailed that flipping loop. I'm actually surprised you're still here. Thought I blew you away.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [out of breath] You were... great, Sky.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Come on, Vapor Trail! You're gonna have to build up your endurance if you want a shot at the Academy! Wonderbolts don't get winded! Angel Wings, you call that cloud-busting?! That cloud barely knew you were there! I love my job.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: We'll keep working, and who knows? One day, you might come close to being almost as good as me.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: You do have a really great sneeze.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Thanks, Sky, but I don't think I can sneeze my way into the Academy. [sighs] I'm pretty beat. I'm gonna hit the showers.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: You have to help her.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Actually, she's not the one<U+0097>

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Will do!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Hey, you did great. You're a really strong flyer.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Uh, me?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Vapor Trail, we know what you've been doing.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: You've been doing great!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [groans] You've been helping Sky!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Uh, I don't know what you're talking about! Sky doesn't need anypony's help. He's amazing.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [sighs] Not without you. And it's gonna be pretty obvious during the solo trials when he can't get enough air to do a flipping loop.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Oh, no! I can't let that happen! I mean, ah, uh... Aw, sugarcubes!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Why are you doing this for him?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [sighs] It started when we were kids. You have to understand...

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [narrating] ...Sky grew up with a lot of siblings. It was tough. He was always trying to get his parents' attention. Meanwhile, I was an only child who hated all the attention I got from mine.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [narrating] Flying together gave us both what we wanted! But I never told Sky how much I was helping him. It started with a small boost here or a little gust of wind there, but I didn't think my help could actually hurt his chances.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I understand. But now you're both in trouble!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: You need to work on your tricks, and Sky needs to be able to fly without you or he won't make it.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Oh, but he has to! Flying with the Wonderbolts has been Sky's dream ever since he was a colt!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: What about you?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I... I guess I haven't thought about it. I just want to be with my best friend.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Then we have to find a way to help both of you.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Starting with telling Sky the truth.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: No, you can't! Sky will be crushed! And without his confidence, he won't fly as well!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [sighs] Then I guess we'll give Dash's method a shot.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Yes! Hah-hah! I love being right! Okay, here's what we do. Sky needs to build his strength. Air drills, wing lifts, all that boring methodical stuff.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Sounds like my cup of oats.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: But how will we get him to do that? He doesn't think he needs practice.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: We'll just tell Sky that he should practice with Twilight so you won't feel so self-conscious about getting special training from me.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: With you? Really?! You'd do that for me?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Hah. You say that like it's not gonna be a blast.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Whooa... Ah!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Oh, you were awesome!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Really? Thanks! I can't believe I was able to keep up!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: That's the first nice thing I've heard you say about yourself.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Hey, can we switch now? I want to do tricks with Rainbow Dash!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: You can't! I mean, uh, you're already so good at the fancy stuff!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Heh. And the basic stuff. [beat] You're right, I don't need to practice at all.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Um, maybe, Sky, you should...

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I'm already the best and everypony's gonna know it when I'm asked to join the Academy tomorrow.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: But not if you don't practice...!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Heh. I wouldn't be surprised if they asked me to become a Wonderbolt straight out of the trials. Boom, dream achieved.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: What did you say?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [sighs] Sky, I want you to get in as much as anypony, and you're amazing, but...

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: But what?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I've been... helping you.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Gyuh...

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [panting] How can you do this to me? Did you all know? Oh, great. So everypony but me knows I'm a joke. Was this your plan the whole time? To embarrass me?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: What? No! Don't you know me at all?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I guess not, since it took me this long to find out you're a terrible wingpony!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [gasps] I can't believe you!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I can't believe I was ever your friend!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Thanks a lot.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Do you think they're still mad?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Yeah, they're still mad.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: This is all my fault. If we'd just done things your way, maybe we could have avoided this whole mess.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: No, it's my fault. It hit me when I was watching Sky train with you. He wasn't even trying!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Oh, no. He's lost his confidence.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Do you want to tell me why one of my most promising students is flying like a balloon with a hole in it?!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Uh, it's a long story, but we'll fix it.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [groans] We really messed up, huh?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I have a plan.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Hey, Sky. I thought I might find you here.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Well, apparently, I need a lot of practice. Guess I'm not the natural I thought I was.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: No, you're not.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [sarcastic] Thanks. Good pep talk.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I wasn't a natural at friendship. But with some practice and help from my friends, I got better, and now I'm the Princess of Friendship!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: So you're saying I can be the... Princess of Flying?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: You know, you're really good. You're lead pony material.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Hm. That's sweet of you, but no. I couldn't handle all the attention.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: But you'll never become a Wonderbolt if you're too afraid to shine. That is what you want, right?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Well, not at first. I just wanted to be with Sky. But learning to do all those fun tricks with you? It made me realize this is something I want for myself!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I was hoping you'd say that. Come with me.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: What's she doing here?

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Sky, Vapor was never trying to steal your spotlight. She thought she was helping you.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: And Vapor, you shouldn't have been so content to take a back seat.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Now, you can either stay mad, or help each other and become two of the greatest flyers the Wonderbolt Academy has ever seen! [beat] Please pick the second option. I don't want Spitfire to be mad at me.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: You got this, Sky!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Focus on a cloud when you spin! It'll help you fly straight when you come out of it!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Uh-huh!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Congratulations! You've both made it into the Wonderbolt Academy!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Whatever you did, it worked. They still have a lot of potential. Who knows? They might even be better than you, Crash.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [laughing] Okay, let's not get carried away.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Hey, I heard that!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: I can't believe we did it!

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: You were great! Even though you can out-fly me, you can be my wingpony anytime.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Aw. [chuckles] And you can be mine.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: Phew. It's good to be home.

title: Top Bolt
writer: Joanna Lewis & Kristine Songco; story by Meghan McCarthy, Joanna Lewis, & Kristine Songco
dialog: [sighs] You're telling me. Now we can finally catch up with some Daring Do, I can make cider with Applejack<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [grunting, yelps] Well, we don't all have magical horns.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I've been meaning to move these older books to my reference section for a while. Got to keep the new books front and center! Thank you both for your help.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Are you kidding? After all you've done for me, this is the least I can do.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Oh, please. I haven't done that much.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Nah. You just taught me the value of friendship. Not much at all.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I may have offered some guidance, but you are responsible for the pony you've become. I'm proud to call you my student and my friend. Now we just need to get rid of these boxes. Spike, can you<U+0097>? Spike?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: What's that?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Is it a bird?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Is it a parasprite?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: It's... it's... incoming!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Oh. I usually get letters by dragon.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: It is the fastest way to get mail!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: For me? Who'd be sending me a letter? It's... the ponies from my old village.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Are they in danger?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Are they upset with you?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: No... It's worse! They've invited me to the annual Sunset Festival!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [exhales] Uh, hey there, everypony.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I-I... I was invited. To the Sunset Festival?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Uh, yeah, but we didn't think you'd actually show up.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: But... I... apologized. I thought everything was fine.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Please...! Stop...! Stop!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: What happened? Is anypony there? Princess Luna? W-What are you doing here?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Dreams are my domain, Starlight Glimmer. I am here because you need me to be.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Oh. It's only a dream.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: It may only be a dream, but the feelings in it are real.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [sighs] Great. So I guess I'm more afraid of going back to the village than I thought. What do I do now?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I have been helped time and time again by six very special ponies. They helped me overcome my past. You're fortunate to have them as friends. I suggest you share your concerns with them. I see much of myself in you, Starlight Glimmer, and I can tell you from personal experience that things do indeed get better.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: ...and Princess Luna said I should tell you all how I was feeling. So... there it is. I'm afraid to go back to the village for the celebration.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: But why, darling? You went back to apologize. They accepted. Everypony has moved on.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: But have they? They don't really know how much I've changed. Or even worse, maybe I haven't changed as much as I think I have!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Trust me. You are a totally different pony now. I mean, you were pretty awful.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Rainbow Dash!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: What? She was! It's a compliment!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I don't think they would've sent the invitation if they didn't want you to come. I'm sure they'd be happy to see you.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: And getting an invitation to a party and not going?! That's like... I-It's like...! Well, I don't know what it's like, but it is definitely bad.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Just be honest with them. I'm sure they'll understand where you're comin' from.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I understand how hard this is for you. Maybe if you took a friend along, it might make things easier. Somepony you trust who would look out for you?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Thanks so much for doing this, Trixie. When Twilight said I should bring a friend, you were the first pony I thought of.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Great idea, Princess Twilight. Asking me <U+0096> Starlight's best friend <U+0096> to help her on this difficult journey really shows how wise a princess you have become.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [through gritted teeth] Thanks, Trixie. [hushed, to Spike] I was talking about me.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: The festival lasts a whole week, but I'm sure we won't stay that long.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: There it is! The town where you<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Magically stole everypony's cutie marks, replaced them with equal signs, and forced them all to hide their natural talents? Yes.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I was going to say where you came from, but yours is a more... emotionally traumatic answer.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [sighs] I just want to... blend in. Be just another pony in the crowd enjoying the Sunset Festival with my friend.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Sounds good to me! And if things get weird for you, just let me know. I've got your flank.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Is that a promise?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Not just a promise. A great and powerful promise!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Well, I couldn't ask for more than that. If we're gonna do this, let's do it.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Oh! Starlight, you came!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: How is it living in a castle?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: It is so<U+00A0>good to see you!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [small groan] It's good to see all of you, too.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: O-Oh, you don't need me to decide that. Heh. Whatever you think is probably best.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Uh, well, how about helping us with the routes for the relay races tomorrow? Can you take a look?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Oh, I-I shouldn't. You all go ahead. I-I just want to enjoy the festival.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: But you will be a judge for the baking competition, right?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: We had a few questions about the order of the acts for the talent show.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: The Great and Powerful Trixie would like to thank you all for being such an amazing audience. Sadly, it is time for us to depart. Good night, fillies and gentlefoals!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Ugh! I was horrible when I led that town! I was ready for them to not trust me, but... I wasn't ready for them to put me in charge again! With my past, I should never be in charge of anything!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: So you messed up. Big deal. [hushed] Don't you ever tell another pony I said this, but even Trixie's made mistakes. [giggles] I know! The trick is to just move on and pretend they never happened.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I feel like that's almost good advice.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Hey, uh, Pinkie Pie!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Hey... [beat] you!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: So... you're probably wondering why I'm back so soon.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Where were you?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I... went to my old village? For the festival?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Ooh, sounds fun! How was it?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: It was kind of a disaster. I came back early because I freaked out!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Ooh, sounds awful! Bye!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: That was... strange.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Isn't she always strange?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Yeah, but not like that. Hey! I'm back early.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Ah. Welcome back?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Have you two noticed Pinkie acting a little strange?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Pinkie Pie always acts strange.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Told you.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Anyway, I wanted to talk to all of you. Things didn't go the way I thought they were going to go at the Sunset Festival.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: What happened?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I kind of freaked out and ran out of the village.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: You freaked out and ran away from a festival? Ha! That's the funniest danged thing I've heard all day.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [laughing] Oh my. Let me guess. The decorations were terrifying!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [whispering] ...Applejack for friendship business.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Hello, ponies. We need Rarity and Applejack. Very important friendship business.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I have to say, I'm really not as impressed with your friends as the rest of Equestria is.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I need to talk to Twilight!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Twilight? Hello?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: What do you want? Twilight's very busy!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Spike, I really need to speak with her.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Make an appointment! She's a princess, after all!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: What's wrong with you? Why are you being so<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Rude? I think a certain dragon didn't get his nap today.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Yeah, right. Whatever.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Sorry. He's been acting a little off all day. I think he missed a meal or something.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: He's not the only one. Everypony's acting a little strange today.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Yes, it's definitely been one of those days! How are you?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Not great, actually. You're probably wondering why I'm back from the village so early.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I didn't want to bring it up, but yeah, it did seem strange. Did it not go well?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: The townsponies kept asking me things, like they expected me to be in charge again. But being a leader is the last thing I should ever be. So we left. Very suddenly. In a literal puff of smoke.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Wow, you should definitely never go back to that village.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: What?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: If you were worried about what they thought of you before, it's probably way worse now. I'd cut my losses.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: That's... surprising advice, coming from you.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Trust me. I'm the Princess of Friendship. You don't need those ponies. You can always make more friends.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Ah! Speaking of friends, if you'll excuse me, important business to attend to!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Cut my losses? That can't be right.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Hey, I wanted to apologize for my behavior earlier. Party Favor, can you hear me?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I told you you can never speak to them again!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
