dialog: What are you all doing here?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Making sure you do what I said! I'm your teacher, aren't I? Didn't I say to never come back here?!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Yes, but that just doesn't seem right. You aren't acting like yourself.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: A dream? This is another dream!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [whispering] Starlight Glimmer...!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Princess Luna?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Starlight Glimmer!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Princess Luna, where are you?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Starlight Glimmer, there is no time! You must get help!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: What? What are you talking about? This is just a dream!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Not here! In the waking world! They've taken my sister and I! It's worse than the last time! Your dream called to me, and I was able to break through! You must find help!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: What are you saying?! Who's taken you?!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Princess Luna!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [panting] They're back!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Trixie? Trixie, it's Starlight! Are you awake?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [muffled, bleary] Of course, Princess Celestia... I'd love to perform for peanut butter crackers...

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Trixie, wake up!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [coughing] [tired] Starlight? What time is it?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: It's late. I think I figured out what's wrong with my friends!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [yawning] I have a whole list of things that are wrong with your friends. We can go over it in the morning.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: No, Trixie, we're in danger!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [sighs] Okay, fine! Aside from lack of sleep, how are we in danger?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I think the<U+0097>! [beat] What did you tell me never to tell another pony?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Starlight, if you woke me up to play guessing games<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: After we left my village, what did you tell me to never tell another pony you said?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [sighs] [through very gritted teeth] That even Trixie's made mistakes.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Trixie, there's no time for this! What did you say?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: That even Trixie's made mistakes! Okay? Are you happy?!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [sighs] Yes. Sorry. I just had to make sure you weren't... [hushed] one of them!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [hushed] One of who?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: A changeling! I think they've taken Princess Celestia and Princess Luna!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: What?! Are you sure?! I mean, what do we<U+0097>? We have to tell Twilight!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: If I'm right, then it's too late for that.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Is it ready?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Just one more.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Queen Chrysalis!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Ugh. I can't take any of you seriously when you look like that.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Oh, right.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Much better. Now report!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Excellent. And I've just received word that the princesses from Canterlot have successfully been replaced as well.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [panting] I can't deal with this! I'm just a performer! This is... This is princess-level stuff! But the changelings have all the princesses... We're doomed!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Maybe not. Uh, Queen Chrysalis only said they took Luna and Celestia and obviously Twilight and the others... but maybe Cadance is still safe. Our best bet is to get to the Crystal Empire before the changelings do. That way we can<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: There's no help coming from the Crystal Empire.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Thorax?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Yes.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Your wings look... different.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I guess they do.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: How do I know you aren't some other changeling pretending to be Thorax?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: You were there when Spike defended me to the ponies of the Crystal Empire. Princess Twilight said<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: As the Princess of Friendship, I should set an example for all of Equestria. But today it was Spike who taught me<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Okay, okay. I believe you. We don't need the whole speech.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Trixie, this is Thorax. He's a reformed changeling. He's on our side. Understand?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Hi. It's a pleasure to...

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: If Starlight says you're on our side, I believe her. But maybe just stay over there for now, okay?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: What did you mean there's no help? Did the changelings get Cadance too?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: They took Cadance, Shining Armor, and Flurry Heart! Sunburst sent me here to get Princess Twilight's help, but... but it sounds like it's too late for that, too! So... what should we do?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Yeah, Starlight. What are we gonna do?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I... I don't know! There has to be somepony else who can handle this?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: There is nopony else! Everypony with powerful magic is already gone!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: You know whenever ponies talk about powerful magic, they always leave me out. If I weren't so evolved, I might decide to take it personally. Well, isn't this quite the combination of secondary characters? Where are Twilight and the girls?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: First, how do we know that you're really you?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Shall I continue?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Chrysalis and the changelings are back. They've ponynapped all of the most powerful ponies in Equestria! Celestia, Luna, Cadance, Shining Armor, Flurry Heart, Twilight and her friends. We need to<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [hushed] They took Fluttershy?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Yes!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [menacingly] Where?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: The Changeling Kingdom. With you on our side, I can<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: Odd. I was trying to take us right to Fluttershy, but there is no Fluttershy.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: [whimpers] I think I have a pretty good idea where she might be...

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1
dialog: I'd hoped never to see that place again. Now what?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: It's... the ponies from my old village.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Oh. It's only a dream.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: With my past, I should never be in charge of anything!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: They've taken my sister and I! It's worse than the last time!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Chrysalis and the changelings are back. They've ponynapped all of the most powerful ponies in Equestria!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: ...this is Thorax. He's a reformed changeling.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [hushed] They took Fluttershy?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [whimpers] I think I have a pretty good idea where she might be...

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Oh, this is so strange. We're here and that's there, and I clearly meant for us to be there and not here.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Oh, I-I can probably explain<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Oh, well. If at first you don't succeed...

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Maybe we should come up with a plan first?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [blows] A what?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: You know, figuring out the best way to do something before you actually do it.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [laughs] Oh, that's adorable. But you see, unlike you, I can do anything.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Uh, actually<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: That's all very nice, but really a waste of time. We have me. And what else could we possibly need?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: A draconequus with magic and half a brain might help.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Why are you here again? I mean, it's not like you're going to stop the changelings by pulling a rabbit out of a hat. At least my magic can do something.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: The thing about magic here is<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: I've been trying to tell you! Nothing other than changeling magic works here. Chrysalis' throne is carved from an ancient dark stone that soaks up outside magic the same way changelings soak up love. It's how she keeps the hive safe.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [to Starlight] So, uh, what kind of plan were you thinking?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Without magic, I have no idea. But nopony else is coming. So somepony better come up with something.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Anypony? Anything? Hmm. This throne <U+0096> if we get into the hive and destroy it, can we get our magic back?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Uh-huh!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Well, that's a terrible plan. How are we even supposed to get to the hive?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: We walk.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: I haven't walked that far in a millennia!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Oh, I don't know how any of you manage not being able to disappear and reappear whenever you want!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Well, I, for one, definitely miss you being able to disappear!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Give Discord a break. None of us knew we weren't going to be able to use magic.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: I did.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: If we get separated, it might make sense to have a way to make sure we are who we say we are.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: How about if we say "klutzy" and you say "draconequus"?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: "Klutzy draconequus". Works for me.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: I'll definitely remember it.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Okay. I am definitely glad you came. I don't think we'd be able to find our way without you.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: You definitely wouldn't.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Um, where's the way out?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: It's a changeling hive. It shifts and changes like we do, and we're the only ones who can navigate it. It's total chaos to non-changelings.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Well, it's decent chaos. I don't know if I'd call it "total".

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Are we sure that I'll get my magic back when we destroy this throne thingy?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: If Thorax is right, then yes.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [sarcastic] Well, that's reassuring.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: And how are we supposed to destroy the throne when we find it?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: I... don't know.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [sarcastic] That's reassuring.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: I don't suppose you brought any throne-destroying tools along with these useless sideshow props.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Asks the Lord of Chaos who can't go for a walk without whining nonstop!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Yes, but when the throne is destroyed, I'll be able to rip the very fabric of reality to save our friends, while you'll still be a self-absorbed, below-average illusionist!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Self-absorbed?! Why, you...!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Cut. It. Out! I'm just barely keeping it together, and it would be wonderful if you two could actually try to help instead of bickering like foals!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [defeated] Okay.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: How can we help?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Don't ask me! I couldn't even handle giving advice at the Sunset Festival, and I had magic then! And the three of us are as good as useless! At least Thorax knows where we're going.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Um, guys? I think we're lost.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Oh, great. We might as well just sit here and wait for the changelings to soak up all of our love or whatever gross thing it is that they do. How often do you all get hungry?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Actually, I haven't been since I met Spike. And changelings are always hungry. We can never get enough love.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Well, that's just super<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: But you aren't hungry at all now?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Huh. Once I made a few friends, I guess I just sort of forgot about the whole feeding thing.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Is that about the same time your wings changed?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: I guess so.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [hushed] Can you please lower your voice?! You're gonna get us all captured!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Oh, you keep saying that, but I haven't seen an actual changeling since we got into this hive.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: W-What's that?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: A changeling patrol!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: This seems like one of those moments where we need a plan.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: What kind of plan?! We have no magic, and it's not like my illusions are gonna save us!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Do you have any of your smoke bombs?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Are you kidding?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Looking for somepony?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Not exactly great and powerful, but effective.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Hm. I'll take it.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: "Klutzy"...

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Ugh. I really think we need a new code word!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: That was a pretty good plan.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: But we still don't know where we're going.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Actually, we might. Two of the changelings didn't go with the rest.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Oh! With an intruder in the hive, they went to protect the queen! Good thinking, Starlight!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Now what?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: We... go in.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Even if I wanted to, there's no way past the guards. We'll be spotted for sure.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: We need some kind of... distraction.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: I'm fresh out of smoke bombs.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Normally, I'm the most distracting thing I can think of, but without magic...

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: You shouldn't underestimate yourself.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [taps microphone] Hello, changelings and changelettes! Believe me, I was just as surprised as you are that I'm here! When I heard that I'd be playing for a bunch of changelings, I was beside myself! Then I realized, it was just one of you.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [nervous laugh] But, seriously, this isn't the toughest crowd I've ever been in front of. But it's definitely the easiest to bug!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Well, if you think that you can do any better, be my guest!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: It is absolutely ridiculous that that worked.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: It is certainly a pleasure to have such dedicated fans. I'll have to come back with some new material after I rescue Fluttershy.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Fluttershy!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Discord! I'm stuck!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: You certainly are. And I should probably help you get free. But... oh-ho-ho-ho-ho...

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: But what?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: But you are obviously not Fluttershy!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Oh.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: I mean, I'm separated from the group and just happen to come across the one pony I care most about? I can smell this setup a mile away.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [sniffs, crying] No. You're right. There's no way you should trust me. Just go find the others. [wailing] I understand!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Oh, come on!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: We can't wait for Discord. Between seeing him and Trixie, the castle will be crawling with guards soon.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: But if we do manage to destroy Chrysalis' throne, we'll need him. He could take on the entire changeling army by sneezing if he wanted to.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: He's probably already been captured!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: We can't stay here. We gotta find the throne.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: "Klutzy"...?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [whispering] You know that's not Discord, right?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Obviously.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: I know this trick. If he says to go left, we should definitely go right. He's leading us to a swarm waiting to attack!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [sighs] Okay, I'll handle it. You two just get ready to run into the other tunnel.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Wait, what?! Trixie, you can't! I won't know what to do! We've already lost Discord; I can't lose you too! Without magic, I<U+0097>

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Starlight. You got us this far with just my illusions and Discord's annoying personality. You don't need magic to figure out what to do next. I know you're afraid to be in charge, but you are really good at it! Listen to your best friend. Hey, Discord! Want to see the new trick I've been working on? I call it the "Changeling Catcher"! Run!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [nervously] Ta-da...

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [laughing evilly] One little pony all by herself. [joints cracking] Oh, how will I ever prevent this daring rescue?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Well, well, well. The Princess of Friendship's sole pupil. Honestly, I didn't think you were worth replacing with one of my drones.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [strains] You won't get away with this!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: I already have. Nopony is coming to save you. Your little squad was it. And now, there's just you.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Thorax is still out there.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Don't mention that traitor's name in my kingdom! He was a fool to leave and even more a fool to return! When I find him, he'll learn just what happens to those who betray the hive!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: And it seems I don't have far to look, do I...

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Thorax?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Very clever. And clearly Thorax revealed to you the secret of my throne. I can't have powerful ponies using their abilities against me. Even with your rather embarrassing little rescue attempt, everything has gone according to my plan.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: What plan? Why did you do all this?!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: What if you didn't have to?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Ridiculous! The hunger of changelings can never be satisfied!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Exactly! Thorax left the hive and made a friend. He shared love, and now he doesn't need to feed. You don't have to live your lives starving all the time!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: You know nothing of the changelings or what it takes to be their queen! I decide what is best for my subjects, not some mewling grub!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: I know what it's like to lead by fear and intimidation! And I know what it's like to want everypony to do what you say! But I was wrong. A real leader doesn't force her subjects to deny who they are! She celebrates what makes them unique and listens when one of them finds a better way!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: The only thing Thorax has found is what happens to those who turn their back on the hive!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: No! Stop!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Just as soon as I drain every last ounce of love from him and show my subjects what a real leader is!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [straining] I can feel the love inside me slipping away...! I can't hold onto it much longer...!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Then don't! Sharing love is what made you different to begin with! You should share yours with Chrysalis! Give her all of it!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: This is what happens when you give love freely instead of taking it!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Fluttershy?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: It's, um, good to see you, too.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Starlight? What happened?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: We defeated the changelings with no magic at all, they found a new leader, and... they're all kinda... good now.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Well done, Starlight Glimmer. It seems as though you've learned a great deal since we last spoke.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: When Twilight and her friends defeated me, I chose to run away and seek revenge! You don't have to! You can be the leader your subjects deserve.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: There is no revenge you could ever conceive of that will come close to what I will exact upon you one day, Starlight Glimmer!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Thorax, as the new leader of the changelings, I look forward to discussing how we can improve our relationship in the future. However, for the moment, perhaps it is best that we leave the Changeling Kingdom to the changelings.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Splendid idea! Now who's ready for some celebratory tea at Fluttershy's?!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Oh! Uh, everypony?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Actually, now that you can snap your claws and send us absolutely anywhere again, I think I have a better option.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: You left in such a hurry before, we kinda thought you didn't wanna come.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Yeah... I guess after the way I used my magic on all of you, I wasn't sure I was somepony who should even be in charge of a baking contest. I was afraid I might go back to being the pony I used to be. But I realize that sometimes you don't have a choice. You have to step up. And I have changed! I can handle it. Whether that means saving Equestria or helping friends out with the Sunset Festival. Speaking of which, I know the Festival's almost over, but I kinda invited a few of my friends to join. Hope that's okay.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: [laughing] Are you kidding? Of course!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Great! Now where's that baking contest? This pony needs a cupcake!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: So I'm able to rip the very fabric of reality again.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Yeah, yeah. And I'm still a self-absorbed, below-average illusionist, right?

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Actually, I was going to say a couple of those illusions were slightly above average. If you ever need a little chaos in your act, let me know.

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Ha! When pigs fly!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Whoa! Whoooooaaaa!

title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2
dialog: Somepony is really gonna have to catch us up on what we missed.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Hey, Spike. What's up?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Just, uh, wanted to make sure you're ready for your big ceremony today.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Yep!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Wow, I still can't believe my friends and I are getting medals...

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Shhh!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: ...of honor.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Are you kidding? You totally deserve it! After all, you... saved Equestria from... Queen Chrysalis! With the help of Trixie and Thorax and Discord and...

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Uh, yeah. I know what happened. I was kinda there.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Uh, right. Uh, so... what are you wearin'?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Not sure. Why? Am I supposed to dress up?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: What are you looking at?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: No, don't look!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: 'Cause there was a spider there, but it's, uh, gone now, so, uh... thanks, Starlight! Byeeee!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Huh?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Ha-ha! She had no idea. We're a good team, Sparkle!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: "Sparkle"? [laughs] Yeah, we are. So do you think she'll like it? I want this present to say, "I'm so proud of you both as a mentor and a friend. Equestria is safer thanks to you."

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Oh. I thought you were getting her a mirror like yours.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: I am.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Uh, maybe you should get her a card 'cause I don't think the mirror will say all that. But I think she'll like it.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: It's just what her room needs. The first thing she'll see when she wakes up is herself surrounded by all her friends. I plan on giving it to her after the ceremony.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Yeah, about that. Don't you need to get the castle ready for the celebration?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Nah. Pinkie Pie's got that covered.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Hmmm.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Phew!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Starlight, Trixie, Thorax, and Discord were brave in the face of danger, resourceful when things got challenging, and proved that the bonds of friendship, no matter how unlikely, are stronger than any adversity. By stopping Queen Chrysalis, not only did they save Equestria; they set the changelings free from her reign.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: And that's why we're proud and honored to give them the Equestrian Pink Hearts of Courage!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Yeah! Oh. Uh, no. Not quite. Uh... all right. There it is!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Yay!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: We are so proud of you all!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: It was the Great and Powerful Trrrrixie's pleasure to save you from your imminent doom.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Yes, because you did it all by yourself.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: I can't believe you managed to do it without magic.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Oh, I just did what anypony would have done.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: It's a wonderful feeling, isn't it? Watching your student shine the way you always knew they could.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [laughs] My cheeks are sore! I don't think I've ever smiled this much in my life!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: I can only imagine what that feels like.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Yes, Starlight is student of the year, isn't she? She has so much potential. So, what are we going to do with her? And by "we", I definitely mean "you". Being her mentor and all that, her destiny falls squarely on your haunches.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Oh, don't you worry. I've planned enough friendship lessons to cover the next three years.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: What's so funny?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: No, no. Clearly, Starlight is beyond basic friendship lessons. She just won a medal, for Equestria's sake. I thought you were joking. You are joking, right?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [nervous laugh] Of course I was.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Obviously, you should have a grand master plan for her, the same way Celestia set you on the path that eventually made you a princess.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Yep.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Oh, good. I'm sure she can't wait to hear all about it.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: So how's the whole ruling-a-kingdom thing going?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: It's a bit overwhelming. But we're adjusting.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Eh, not-not exactly.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Oh, Starlight. Princess Twilight has something very important to tell us. Well, just you, really, but I'm nosy and I want to hear.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Okay. Would you excuse m<U+0097>?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Never mind. What's going on?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Well, Twilight was just about to reveal her grand master plan for you.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Really? I was kind of wondering what we were gonna do next.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Yes. I'd say we were both fairly interested.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Starlight, come on! The Ponyville Chronicle wants to take our picture! Ugh. You, too, Discord.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Psst! I see what you're doing.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: You do?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: You already planned the perfect moment during the party to make the grand announcement to everypony about your plan. Brava, Twilight! I can't wait to tell your plan to Fluttershy and the others!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Discord, no!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Twilight, are you reading during a party... again?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: No, no, no! She's already good at that! She mastered this! She taught me about this one!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Wild guess <U+0096> something's wrong.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Whoa!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: I had years worth of friendship lessons ready to go, but when we were captured by Chrysalis, Starlight took charge and really stepped up. I don't think friendship lessons are enough for her anymore.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: So you have an overachieving student. Sounds familiar.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: That's why I had to talk to you. You, of all ponies, would know what to do. I mean, you were me and I was Starlight. But, for now, I need you to pretend you're you and I'm me.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Huh?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Heh. Go on.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: When I was your student, and you were in this place, you<U+0097> Oh, no! You sent me to Ponyville! Which means it's time for me to send Starlight Glimmer away!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: I can't believe it! It's really time for Starlight to go, isn't it?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Only you can make that decision. It's a difficult one, but your heart knows what's right, even as it hurts.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Where're you gonna send her? Uh, too soon?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: No. This is something I have to do. Oh, boy.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Oh, boy!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Whatever Twilight's planning for Starlight is going to be so exciting!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Hmm. Wonder why she didn't tell any of us about it.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Probably because you're not as close as you think you are. [laughs] Just kidding. She wanted it to be a big surprise. Just between us, she's getting ready to make a big announcement!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [squeals] That's so exciting! And surprising. Usually, you tell your party planner about all your plans for your party.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Well, she definitely has one. I mean when has Twilight not had a plan?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [low muttering] Gosh, I don't know... I just don't want to send her to the wrong place... [sighs] I just, I just don't know... [gasps] I got it! Since defeating Chrysalis, Starlight's given the changelings an opportunity to revolutionize their society. Maybe I can send her there.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Cool spell.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: If Starlight goes to the changeling hive, she can help them adjust to their new way of life.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Okay, Friendship 101. Thorax and I are going to show you how to compromise.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [stiltedly] I want to have honeysuckle nectar for lunch.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [stiltedly] I would like a sandwich. Oh, no. What should we do?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Or... Thorax and I can talk about it and come up with a solution that works for everypony.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [stiltedly] Starlight, how do you feel about honeysuckle and peanut butter sandwiches?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [stiltedly] Why, that sounds dee-licious!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Uh, this doesn't seem like something Starlight and Thorax would do.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Uh, this is Twilight's fantasy, Spike. There is no wrong way to fantasize.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Thank you.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Yep. Definitely a Twilight fantasy.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: This seems like a lovely path for Starlight. The changelings have so much to learn about how to enjoy love through friendships. Starlight would be busy for a very long time, but her work there would be very rewarding.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Or dangerous. It would only take one changeling to deviate from the pack.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Uh, that probably won't happen.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: But it could! I can't just send her off to Celestia-knows-where without thinking it through!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Hmm. I was not aware that I was an expression. An appropriate one, of course, for even I don't know the answer. This is a momentous decision. You must consider all the possibilities.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Rethink, rethink, rethink! What about the dragons? I can send Starlight to the Dragon Lands! She and Ember would totally hit it off!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Ember!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Starlight!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: You ready to do some death-defying dragon stuff?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Ah, totally!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Okay, that doesn't sound anything like Ember or Starlight.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Who knows what their dynamic would be, Spike?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Freaky.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Starlight will love it in the Dragon Lands. In her letters, Ember said dragons do a lot of fun things. The Feast of Fire, the Dragon Bowl, Claw-chella.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Starlight could be there for a really long time. But then again, not all dragons like ponies as much as Ember does.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Hey, Twinkle Star!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: It's, uh, Starlight Glimmer.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Star-kle Light-star?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Starlight. Glimmer.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Yeah, whatever. You wanna hang with us?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: What are we diving into?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Lava!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: What?!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Twilight, this is crazy!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Starlight's really good with magic. She could just stop herself from falling into a pit of lava.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: What if she didn't realize it was happening?! You just never know, Spike! I just need to think of someplace safe to send her! Someplace safe, someplace safe, someplace safe... I could send her to the Crystal Empire to continue her magical studies with Sunburst!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: It'll be perfect! Sunburst's knowledge of magic is only matched by Starlight's abilities.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: I've got it! Try placing your horn directly on the potion and picture the clock you wish to make.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: They could challenge each other into becoming the most talented unicorns Equestria's ever seen!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: We did it! Quick, what's next?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Of course, the study of magic is a lifelong pursuit, and Starlight could be there for a while, especially once they start attempting the really complicated stuff!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Three, two, one...

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: What if they become too ambitious?!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: I never would've thought to combine Star Swirl's apparition spell with Spacium Flexibus! But what would happen if we added Somnambula's Tempus Objectus?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: If we do it just right, it should allow us to materialize an object that was lost in the past.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: No! Don't do it!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Twilight, snap out of it!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Easy, Twilight. It didn't happen.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: But it could! I just don't think I can send her anywhere. What am I gonna do?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Are you laughing at me?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: I can't believe you're laughing at me.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Oh, Twilight, I'm not. I'm laughing because I had the exact same fears you're having.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: What?!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Let me tell you a story. Once upon a time, there was a very bright young filly.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [voiceover] She was truly one of my best students.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [voiceover] Are you talking about Twilight? I can't see what you're thinking about.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [voiceover] Yes, Spike. I was constantly surprised and impressed with her discoveries. But I noticed that her pursuit of academia was preventing her from reaching her full potential.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [voiceover] You mean it was keeping her isolated and alone?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [voiceover] Uh, yes, Spike. I had a decision to make. Oh, but it wasn't easy.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Maybe I could close the library or throw a party in the castle. Oh, she'd have to talk to the other fillies then! Oh. I must send her away.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [voiceover] I knew there was a special group of fillies in Ponyville, but I kept inventing all kinds of reasons why I shouldn't send you.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: What if she runs into a manticore? Or what if she gets pulled into Tartarus? Or, worst of all, what if she doesn't get along with anypony?!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [voiceover] I kept you in Canterlot longer than I should have.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Eventually, I realized all the anxiety I felt was because I didn't want you to go.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Really?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: I loved having you as a student. You challenged me and taught me just as much as I taught you. I am embarrassed to admit it, but I was afraid if you made friends, you wouldn't need me anymore.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Princess Celestia, that is so not true. I will always need you.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: I think Starlight Glimmer might feel the same way about you. If that is what you're afraid of.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Maybe it is. Just a little.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [chuckles] Oh, it definitely is. Like, a lot.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Here we are after all these years, Twilight. We are living proof that letting someone spread their wings doesn't mean you no longer have a place in their lives.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Thank you.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: And if you're still worried, you can always make her write you letters.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: I may have let it slip that you'd be unveiling your big plan for Starlight tonight. Silly me. But we're all very excited to hear what you've cooked up.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: You weren't coming up with a plan just now, were you? Oh, dear. This could be pretty embarrassing for you.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [sarcastically] Gee, thanks, Discord.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Anytime. I really do love being helpful.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: If I could have everypony's attention! As you all know, Starlight Glimmer's been my pupil for a while now, and I'd hoped she'd be my pupil for a long time yet to come. But it turns out that's just not meant to be.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Starlight, you have proved yourself to be a kind, loyal, strong, honest, and truly magical friend. Just looking around this room at all the new friendships you've made, I know there's nothing more I need to teach you. So we have a second reason to celebrate today. Three cheers for Starlight Glimmer on her graduation day!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [squeals, giggles] What a great surprise!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: [to Starlight] The future's in your own hooves now.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Wow. I was not expecting this!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Darn it. I was hoping you would send her to my realm. We could've been roomies. Way to not pick up what I was putting down.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: How do you want to celebrate? Girls' trip to Las Pegasus?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: We could throw you a changeling Gorbfest! Uh, it's more fun than it sounds.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Or we could go cause a little mischief. I know a trick that'll turn Celestia's castle into cheese. Do you think it's a "gouda" idea? [laughs] That's just the first of many cheese jokes if we go down this path.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Well, that all sounds wonderful. But, um, give me a minute, would ya?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Congratulations.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Thanks.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: So how do you feel?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Happy, surprised, overwhelmed. I mean, not that I'm not grateful, but are you sure?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Believe me. I've thought long and hard about this.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Of course you did.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Starlight, trust me. You're ready.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Yeah!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: No, I'm not.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: What are you talking about?

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: I'm not ready to leave!

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Oh, good! 'Cause I'm not ready for that either! Here! I got you this present. It was going to be a "congrats on getting a medal of honor" present, but then I was afraid it would have to be a going-away present, but now it's an "I couldn't be happier you're staying" present! It fits perfectly over your dresser! I know. I measured.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Thank you.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: I may not know what comes next for you, but whatever it is, I promise I'll always be there for you.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Oh.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Oh.

title: Celestial Advice
dialog: Phee-yew!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Come on, come on! Turn into a teacup!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: No! Teacup!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: No! Teacup!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [screeching] No! [normally] Oh, Starlight! I can't put a trick that's not working into my act! How come it's not working?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: It could be because you're just yelling "teacup!" and not picturing it in your mind.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Oh. Yeah, that could be it.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: What does your teacup look like? What shape is it? What color?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Whoo! Starlight, I did it!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Woo-hoo-hoo-hoo! I did it, I did it, I did it! Woo-hoo-hoo!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Hey!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Teacup! [giggles] Teacup! Teacup, teacup, teacup! Tea-cup! Teacup, teacup, tea-cup! You know what you need? A teacup!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Whoops! I guess I pictured a teacup poodle? Heh.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Trixie! You ruined my teacakes!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I just got excited! This is the first time I did a transfiguration spell! Real magic! Come on! Be impressed by me! [as Starlight Glimmer] "Yay, Trixie! You're so great at magic and having good hair!"

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [chuckles] Good job, Trix. But I was baking these to give to Twilight and the girls for their friendship retreat. Pinkie Pie gave me a recipe and everything.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Problem solved.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [exhales] Not exactly.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I am so excited for this friendship retreat! I can't remember the last time we all got to hang out without having to save Equestria.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Well, we are awesome. But technically, we weren't the last ponies to save Equestria.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I was speaking in a broader sense. Are you sure you don't want to come with us?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Yeah, I have three new comics to get through.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: And I promised Trixie we'd practice more magic. It might be better if the castle was empty, if you know what I mean.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [groans] Relax. If anything breaks, Starlight will just go back in time and fix it!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Kidding.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: We'll take good care of the castle while you're gone.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Have fun on your friendship retreat! [hushed, to Starlight] What in Equestria is a friendship retreat, anyway?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [hushed] They're gonna bond, share laughs, and if I know them, they're gonna sing a song.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [giggles] We are gonna have so much more fun than them!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [giggles] Shhh!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Twilight, wait! Starlight has something for you!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Huh?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [nervously] Here, I, um, brought you snacks...

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Oh, how... thoughtful, thanks. We will... not get hungry on the train.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: It was supposed to be teacakes, but... [sighs] it's a long story. Have a great time!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: You, too!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Okay, Trixie, what kinds of spells did you want to work on next?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Well, every self-respecting magician has a disappearing act, so maybe we could start with that?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Hmmm. Nothing just disappears, so that's technically a teleportation spell, and those are pretty hard. Maybe we should start with something smaller.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: No-no-no-no. The Great and Powerful Trrrrrixie goes big or not at all! Just tell me how you do it.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Well, I've always found magic is tied to my emotions. Whatever I'm feeling fuels whatever I'm doing, and the stronger I'm feeling, the stronger the magic.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Right. Like when you were so upset that cutie marks took away your friend, your magic was strong enough to enslave an entire village.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Yep. Thanks for bringing that up.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: See? I'm already learning. If anypony is gonna teach me how to do a disappearing spell<U+0097>

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Teleportation spell.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Whatever. I'm complimenting you. And me. We can do this, 'cause we're amazing, and magic is friendship and stuff.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [laughs] I guess we can give it a whirl. Now, we just need to find you something to teleport.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Spike! How about it?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Uh, let's pick something, I don't know, not living?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I mean it won't be as impressive, but okay. Teach away, mini-Twilight.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Ooh, I'm going to start with a facial, and then get my hooves done, and<U+0097>

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Oh, it's not that kind of retreat.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Isn't it called "Manehattan Escapes" because it's a deluxe spa where you can escape all of your troubles?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Nope! It's because we get locked in a room and we have to solve puzzles and riddles in order to escape!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Team-building!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Come on, girls. This could be fun.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Could be? Some of the brightest minds in Equestria put together these puzzles!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I'm just happy to be with all of you.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Me, too! I'm not great at solving riddles, but I'm super great at cheering other ponies on while they do it! Go, us! Ooo, ooo! Woo-hoo!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Yes, yes, woo-hoo. [clears throat] But just so we know, exactly how long will we be locked in here?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Hah! Griffons barely like each other! We're basically the poster ponies for amazing friendships! So get your quill ready, bub! You're gonna have to write down a new record!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: If you master this spell before the girls get back, you'd be setting some kind of record!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Challenge accepted!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Okay. What you want to do is concentrate on the object that you want to teleport...

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Yeah, I'm gonna go... all the way over here.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Concentrate on teleporting. Got it. Doin' the spell!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: No, Trix, wait, not just<U+0097>

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [weakly] Ta-da.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [hyperventilating] No-no-no-no-no-no-no! You made Twilight's friendship map disappear!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [clears throat] Teleport.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Really?!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Well, it was behind the apple. It was bound to happen. On the plus side, my magic is getting better! I made a whole table go poof! That was pretty impressive!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Trixie, we have to get that map back.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: We'll find it. No big deal.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Twilight's never gonna trust me to be alone in this castle again! What were you thinking?!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Teleport, like you told me to.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: No! You're supposed to concentrate on the object, not just teleporting!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [scoffs] Well, gee, you probably should have told me all the steps before you let me do the spell.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I tried. [gasps] I... need a minute.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Hey, are you okay?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I will be once I cast a spell to contain my anger in this bottle.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Wait, what?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Do you see this storm cloud? This has never happened before! All this magical energy has to go somewhere, and if I'm not using it to fight a magical duel or bend my friends' wills to obey my every command...

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Hah. I remember that.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: The point is, I don't know what my magic's going to do. So I'm hoping if I bottle up my anger, I won't do who-knows-what to Trixie.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Are you sure that's a good idea?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: What choice do I have? I've got to get that map back, and I don't wanna lose Trixie. If she knew what I was thinking right now, she'd probably never talk to me again.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Okay... You do what you need to do. I'll see if I can find the map somewhere in the castle.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Trixie!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Oh, there you are! For a minute, I didn't think you were coming back, and that you might be upset with me for some weird reason. But then I remembered <U+0096> you never get mad at me.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [exhales] Nope! [laughs nervously] Not mad at all! So, the map is probably in the last place you were thinking of. Where was that?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Ooh, great question. I wish you'd asked it, like, right after I did the spell. I don't remember anymore.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [groans] No worries. We'll just take a walk around town. Maybe that'll jog your memory.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Okay, that sounds fun. Ooh!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Did you remember?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Nope! But I did think we could stop for cinnamon nuts while we're out!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Cinnamon... nuts?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: That's a good idea!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Yes! I've been craving something sweet since I couldn't have any teacakes this morning.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [exhales] You got this, Starlight...

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Woo-hoo! Go, Twilight! you can do it!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Woo-hoo!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Hoo-wee! You solved that triangley thing mighty fast! Uh, does anypony need a purple jewel?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Ooh! Plum or boysenberry?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Don't both those fruits mean purple?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Yes, but one's a lovely purple and one's... well, icky.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [groans] Just put the gem in! We're trying to set a record here!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [cheer-singing] Yay! We solved another clue, 'cause our friendship is so true! Yaaaay, us! Woo-hoo!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Mmm, yes. I got them from the cart outside. They're delicious. Do you want some?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Have you seen a big table? Magical map on it, sometimes glowing cutie marks shoot out?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Well, I cast a pretty amazing spell that transported it to the last place I was thinking of, but I might have been thinking about how I'd treat myself to a nice brooch instead.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Sure!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: No! We don't have time for this! Twilight and the girls are gonna be back soon!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: But I'm not upset. What's our next stop?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Nope, I ain't seen it.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Are you sure? It's really, really important that we find it. And it might be here because somepony...

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: ...was craving apples.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I'm still craving them. They'd go so well with cinnamon nuts!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [sniffs] Oh, them nuts sure do smell good! Heh-heh.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Granny Smith, please. The table?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [confused muttering] Well, my eyes ain't what they used to be, but I'd know for sure if a big ol' table done appeared out of thin air.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Darn. I could've sworn it'd be at the ice cream parlor, because it was warm in the castle and I thought I wanted ice cream, and<U+0097> Ooh! Maybe we should check out the Crystal Empire, 'cause Twilight's castle is made out of crystals, so I totally had crystals on my mind.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [tired] Okay, we better start moving if we want to make it to the Crystal Empire.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Are you okay, Starlight? Because you seem a little, uh, what's the word... "lch-bh-ba".

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [tired] Nope. I am great.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Did your saddlebag just glow?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [weakly] No.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Gimme!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [weakly] No!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Give it here!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [weakly] Don't!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: What's in this?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Cinnamon nuts!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Ooh, I have had a hankerin' for these all day!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Um, why are they looking at me like that...?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Whoa!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: You ruined my teacakes!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Were they your pretzels? I don't understand.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: You don't pay attention when I'm trying to teach you!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Starlight, can you help me, please?!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Uh, Twilight, can you help me, please?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I've seen those symbols! Over here!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: You can do it!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Almost there.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I've got the key!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: This is it! I'm so impressed.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I'm not. I knew we were the best!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: You're the worst!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: That seems harsh.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Hiyaaa!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Whoa! Starlight! [panting] I don't know what's happening! Starlight, help!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I'm glad Twilight isn't here to see this.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I wish that Starlight was here to see how strong friendships can be when we trust each other and work together! You've all taught me so much.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Friendship used to make me so queasy, queasy But you made it all so easy, easy Now I don't have to say what I'm thinking You already know without even blinking

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: You girls are the apple of my eye

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: The race that doesn't end in a tie

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: You are the funnel cake at my fair

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: The warm hug of a fuzzy bear

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Starlight! A spark of magic could be very helpful right about now!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [grunting] I can't...!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I simply can't imagine there'd be a day Where I wouldn't want to be walking your way Whatever new problems there may be, may be Our friendship is always the door with the key

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: You are the jewels in my friendship crown

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: The sparks that make my world go 'round

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Gah!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [panting] Did we do it?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Aw, nuts!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Nuts!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: You just do whatever you want to do!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Starlight!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: And you don't always... [pants] ...have to bring up my dark past!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I didn't know you had one, Granny Smith!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I barely even know you! I don't understand why you're all so mad at me!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [weakly] They're not. I am.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: You are?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [sighs] I'm really... mad at you. You lost Twilight's map table. You make jokes like it's no big deal. It's like you don't even care you could get me in a lot of trouble. If we can't find that table, Twilight's never going to trust me again, and the worst part is you didn't even say you were sorry!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I... I-I'm sorry. I had no idea you felt that way.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Yeah! I do! [sighs] But to be fair, I don't know how you could have known. I did a spell and bottled up my anger, but when the bottle broke, it infected these three. I'm really sorry. I used magic so I wouldn't use magic. I should have guessed that would backfire.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Yeah, I was gonna get my dentures cleaned before y'all showed up.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Ah! Oh, no! My nut cart!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Yay! My nut cart!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [gasps] I'm late for my other job! What? I wear many hats.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Not gonna lie. Hearing you and those random ponies say all those terrible things about me wasn't easy. But I needed to hear it. Why didn't you just tell me how you felt?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: I didn't want to lose you as a friend.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Pfft! Come on! It'd take a lot more than that to lose me. Our friendship is stronger than a few angry words.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: And a magical temper tantrum?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Listen, I'd take that over the boring pony you were becoming any day. The Starlight I love is passionate, lively, and yeah, sometimes angry. Those are my favorite parts of you. That and the fact that you forgive me every time.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [giggles] I'll forgive you if you forgive me.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Deal. [gasps] I remembered what I was thinking about!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: You're kidding me.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: There's more to it than that. I was thinking about how glad I am to have met you, and I remembered our first meeting <U+0096> here at the Ponyville spa. And now I just have to teleport it back!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: No-no-no-no-no-no-no!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: A little to the left. Oh, now rotate it just a hair...

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Hey, girls! How'd it go?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: ...What?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Let's just say I learned a friendship lesson while you were gone.

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: You've barely graduated, and you're already taking initiative! [tearing up] Oh... So proud...

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: We learned about team building and problem solving...

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: And when not to sing songs!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: We certainly had a good time, but I really was looking forward to a spa day, and the Ponyville spa's still open. Anyone?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Sounds good to me!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: [simultaneously] I have a coupon!

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: We'll meet you there! [to Starlight] Quick! Do you have a spell that will make the spa ponies forget that the map table was there?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: Haven't you learned anything about using magic to solve your problems?

title: All Bottled Up
dialog: No. If we learned that lesson, how will we ever have fun?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I'm never too busy to visit sick foals. I can't believe a whole class just came down with the horsey hives!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: We'll do our best. We'll bring snacks, I'll read to them, and get them gifts!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Food and presents always cheer me up.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: We'll see you soon!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Okay, if we want to be at the hospital by lunch, then we have three hours to buy get-well presents, borrow a book from the schoolhouse, [sighing] and pick up treats.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: It's a lot, but if we stick to the schedule, I know we can get it all done.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Yeah, knock on wood.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Surprise!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [gasps] Oh, my gosh! How's my favorite niece?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [as Flurry Heart] "I'm good! I was hoping my favowite aunt could watch me for a few houwrs."

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Hope you're not too busy.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Busy? [scoffs] Would the best aunt ever be too busy to spend time with this adorable little one?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: No!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [blows raspberry] Flurry! I've got a surprise for you!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Just a couple of toys that reminded me of Flurry.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I'm excited to show you I've done some shopping for Flurry Heart.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Oh-ho-ho, you're so sweet. You didn't have to do all that.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I know, but I can't help myself! Best aunt ever! Open this one, Flurry.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: We'll just put Flurry's things over here, Twily!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Uh-huh. Totally.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Mashed peas, her favorite.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: And diapers. Uh, extra diapers. Oh, and backup extra diapers. Heh.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Mashed peas, her favorite. Wait, did I say that already?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Uh-huh.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Oops.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Oh, and this is the most important thing of all <U+0096> her Whammy.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I take it Flurry named it?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Yup. If she gets fussy, just give her the Whammy and she'll calm right down.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: You getting all this, Twily?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Whammy. Got it. Where are you guys headed, anyway?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: You remember my friend from the royal guard, Spearhead?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Honestly, all of your friends' names are very similar.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Well, he has a pop-up art show at the Ponyville Cafe, and we decided to go at the last minute.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: We're not exactly art enthusiasts, but we could really use a night out.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: You mean "day"?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: That's what I said! Isn't that what I said?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Mmm... Mm-mm.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Either way, are you sure you can watch her?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Uh-uh-uh!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Mmmmh...

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Have no fear! The best aunt ever has everything under control!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Thanks again, Twily.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Okay, let's grab that Whummy thing and go.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Oh, you want to pretend we're the bears. I suppose we have time for a quick game.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Do we, though?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Hey! All right! [growls like a bear] I'm gonna get ya!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Ugh! [sighs] You should catch her soon, 'cause we've got lots to do! Horsey-hives-covered foals counting on us, remember?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Got it! [growls like a bear] I'm catching up!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Uh-oh. Sorry, bug. Did that scare you? It's okay. It's just Auntie Twily!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: You know, that was a very advanced spell for somepony your age. Looks like you're already taking after your Auntie Twily.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: All right, that was pretty adorable. But now...

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I know, Spike, we're leaving.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I just have to feed her real quick.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Is this art or... a mistake?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I have no idea. But who cares? We're not changing diapers.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Of course! We're having a great time! Loving all the... art!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: So it is! I knew that!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Wow, I guess nighttime in a hallway can be pretty dark.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [baffled] Yeah. Totally.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: We're just so happy to be here. Usually we're covered in mashed peas by now.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: When they said mashed peas were her favorite...

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: ...did they mean her favorite thing to decorate a room with?!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Aw, come on, Spike. That wasn't too bad.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Yeah, and we're only twenty minutes behind schedule.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Twenty minutes?! [exhales] It's fine. We can totally do this.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Okay, we just need to grab some toys and we are outta here.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: You want to play, don't you? Well, I know a game that's even more fun! [aside to Spike] And more efficient. [to Flurry Heart] Playing race carts! Ha-ha!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Woo-hoo!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [panting] [out of breath] Hey, nice thinking, Twilight!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Best aunt ever! Hang on, Flurry. The race cart's taking a pit stop.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I'm not a detective, but I think we got a suspect.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Huh?! [sighs] Well, we'd better get to cleaning. We've got no time to waste!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [panting] Yes! We gained back a whole five minutes from running here!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Yeah, but if you add that to the forty minutes we were already behind... we're still... fifty five minutes behind!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I mean... [nervous chuckle] Yay, team?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Mm-hmm!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Thanks for helping us out, Cheerilee. Sorry we were late.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Oh, no problem. But I gotta say, I'm surprised you came to me for a book. Don't you have a huge collection?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Yes, but<U+0097>

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Sorry, one second.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I didn't think the foals would be interested in The Unabridged History of Amulets in pony Latin.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Yeah, it was good you came to me. How about the complete collection of Ponyville Fables and Stables?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Mmm, too long.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Alien Alicorns vs. Space Pirates?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Well, the science there is preposterous<U+0097>

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: How about Burnferno, Warrior from Within? It's about a handsome dragon warrior who slays evildoers with his breath and his snappy comebacks!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [giggles] Let's borrow that for you and keep looking.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Eh.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: What else?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Uh, how about Gusty the Great?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Ooh, that was one of my favorites when I was a filly! We'll take it!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Cheerilee, I am so, so sorry! I didn't even hear her leave!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: There, all clean.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Great. Now I'll just write it up again...! [slightly muffled] With my mouth.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Ehh...

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [unsure] Oh...

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: This reminds me of the time Flurry got into the chocolate pudding, and we found little chocolate hoofprints all over the carpet.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: That took forever to clean up! But remember how cute her little face looked when we caught her?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Yeah. She was like, [imitating Flurry Heart] "Uh-oh!"

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Honestly, Twilight, I don't even want to tell you how late we are. Should I just cancel our visit to the hospital?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: What?! Cancel?! We can't cancel, Spike! The sick foals are counting on us! And the B.A.E. would never throw in the towel like that!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: B.A.E.?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: "Best Aunt Ever"? Besides, this errand is gonna be different.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: How do you figure that?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Because Flurry can play with the Cake twins and stay out of trouble! Best aunt ever!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Wonderful! They're friends already!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Huh. I shouldn't have doubted you.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Thanks! Wait, you doubted me?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Spike, you watch Flurry. I'll take care of everything else. [quickly, to Pinkie Pie] Hi, Pinkie! How's it going? I need to pick up the cupcakes for the foals at the hospital! And can you do apology treats?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I'm good. Here they are. Of course I can!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Do you still have a giant file on everypony's favorite treat?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: In my secret party planning cave!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: BRB!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Hee-hee! Remind me to tell you later how amazing you are. Cheerilee?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Eh. I am pretty awesome.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Cherry oatmeal cookies with yellow sprinkles.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Great! Can you write "sorry" on them?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I've got a stamp for that!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Hey, you guys! No need to fight! Uh... Hang on! I'm sure there's another one! Ugh, no, not this one... Oh, that's cute...

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Hold on, sweetie. We'll play in a second.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: The salespony at the toy store...

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Apple strudel cupcake with caramel drizzle!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Oh, no. You're making the same face Cheerilee made. Pinkie, remind me what your favorite treat is.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Mmm... The sampler platter.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: We'll take three of those.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Uh... Twilight?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Out of the question! We are not cancelling! It's going to be okay! It has to be okay! It's been so terrible so far it can't possibly end up<U+0097> Oh...

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Uh, sorry.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [sighs] No, I needed it.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I was just gonna say, we're here.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: And we're only four-and-a-half minutes late!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Four and a half?!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [reading] "...and while nopony had ever tried to reach Cloudsdale on hoof, Gusty the Great was not deterred! She and her unicorn warriors marched up the hill. But suddenly, they encountered..."

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [gasps] What?! What was it?!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: "It was the treacherous Grogar..."

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: "...and Gusty could tell he was ready for battle. Gusty called out to the unicorn warriors<U+0097>" Ow! Not right now, Flurry. These foals really want to hear this.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [reading] "'We can fight Grogar together!' And the unicorn warriors shot magical beams into the clouds that wove into one! The beam, stronger than a thousand armies, shined down!"

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [reading] "It wrapped around Grogar and pulled him to the ground! 'Don't let him escape!', yelled Gusty!"

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [reading] "Grogar was strong, for fear gave him power, and he broke through the bonds!"

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I know! So good, right?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Twilight, look up!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Spike, you're floating. You're floating!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: So are you!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Flurry, honey, you need to stop this. Put us down, please.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Twilight, look out!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Nopony panic! Everything's gonna be okay!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Oh, I can't keep up with her!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Oh, yeah, where's her Snoozle?!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Her what?!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: You know, her Whacky Whompy thing? The snail? Where is it? Cadance said it calms her down.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: I don't see it!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Flurry Heart! Put us all down this instant!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Is everypony okay?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Flurry, that was very, very bad! You could have hurt somepony!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Oh, Flurry, I didn't mean to<U+0097>

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Sweetie, you don't have to be scared. It's just me, see?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
