dialog: You're scared of me. Because I yelled at you like a big scary bear. Flurry, I'm so sorry. I've been a terrible aunt today. All you wanted to do was play, and I've barely been able to pay attention to you. None of this is your fault. It's mine. So much for being the best aunt ever. But I hope you know how much I love you.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Oh, I take it you forgive me?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Thanks, Flurry. How about we head home? After we find your Whammy, of course.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [tearing up] This one kind of reminds me of Flurry's hair.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [tearing up] Uh-huh. And this one reminds me of Flurry too.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: It's small... like her! I-I can't do this anymore! Spearhead, this has been great, but<U+0097>

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: What...?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Flurry?! Where's our little foal?! Ah! Oh, we missed you so much!

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: But it looks like you had a great time without us.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Actually, not so much. Flurry got into some mischief, but it wasn't her fault. I shouldn't have agreed to watch her with such a jam-packed schedule. It was too much to juggle. But Flurry taught me an important lesson today. It turns out being the best aunt ever isn't about spending the most time with your niece, but spending quality time with her. And she taught me a really cool bear game, so I guess I learned two things.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Well, we definitely should've given you more of a heads up.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Yes! From now on, we'll give you plenty of notice.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Ohh, that would be great.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Hey, what are you doing next Tuesday?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: For dinner, not to babysit.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [chuckle] I'll have to check with Spike, but I think we're free.

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Where is Spike, anyway?

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: [reading] "The dashing dragon warrior breathed a scorching flame from his snout, then chuckled to himself as he flew into the sunset. 'If you can't stand the heat, don't fight a dragon!'"

title: A Flurry of Emotions
dialog: Thank you! Okay, now who wants more cake?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Go, Maud! Woo-hoo! Number one! Number one!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Whoo! Doctor Pie! Doctor Pie! ..."Rock-tor" Pie?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] I'm Maud.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Yeah, you are! Brilliant speech! Encore! Encore!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] There's more, Pinkie. I'm Maud. [flips index card] Pie. Thank you.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: You are so welcome! Brilliant speech! Encore! Encore! Encore!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [long high-pitched squeal, rapidly] You're moving to Ponyville! We'll live together and get bunk beds and I'll make us fuzzy slippers that say "Best Sister Friends Forever", although I probably can't fit all those words on a slipper, so maybe just "BSFF", but we don't have to decide right now because we'll be together all the time since when it comes to Ponyville, the doctor is in!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Slow down, Pinkie Pie.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Yooooouuuuu'rrrrrrrreeeeeeee mmmmmmmmmmooooooooovvvvvvvviiiiiiiinnnnnnnnnggggggg tttttttooooooo Pooooooooooonnnnnnnnyyyyyyyyvvvvvvviiiiiiilllllllleeeeeeeee....

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] I'm not definitely moving to Ponyville.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] I'm also considering Ghastly Gorge.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [laughs] Classic Maud sense of humor! You should do stand-up!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] I do. But that wasn't a joke.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [gasps] Ghastly Gorge? That terrible, awful, no-fun, all-alone canyon in the middle of nowhere?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] There or Ponyville.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: But Ponyville is so "eee-hee-hee-hee-hee!" and Ghastly Gorge is so "Blegh!"

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] It's a rock-based decision.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: But what about BSFFs?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] That's why I'm giving Ponyville a chance.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Phew! So all I have to do is prove Ponyville has better rocks than Ghastly Gorge? Challenge accepted. We'll drop your stuff off at my place, and then hold onto your world, 'cause it's about... to... get... rocked!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Okay.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Ghastly Gorge may have rocks, but our gem cave rocks!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Huh? Huh? Oh, and look! You'll never know who you'll see!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [gasps] Maud, darling! It's lovely to see you again! Oh! Congratulations on your rocktorate. What are you doing now?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Talking to you.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Oh, y<U+0097> Right. [laughs, clears throat] Well, if your trained eye happens to see a chartreuse gem, I'm desperate to find one.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] I found one.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Oh, you're an absolute darling! This will surely make my gown stand out at Countess Coloratura's album release party. Do you know how rare this is?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Just another day in Ponyville!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] That's actually a really common gem.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] These are all really common gems.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: They are? Uh, I mean, heh, come on! Of course they are! That's why I didn't bring you here to impress you! I wanted to make sure you had a chance to, heh, say "hello" to your old pal... Spike!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Hello, Spike.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Way to go, Maud! Cross that off the to-do list! Y'know what I'm sayin'? Check! Now, let's get moving, 'cause I'm about to show you something that'll make you yell "All right!"

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] All right.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: See? Ha-ha!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Ta-da! It's a castle... made of rocks! Whaaaat?! Did I just blow your mind? I think I just blew your mind.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] A lot of structures are made from rocks, Pinkie. They're a very stable building material.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: But this place grew out of nowhere after a magical key-build gem followed a rainbow and buried itself in the ground! I mean, have you ever seen rocks like this?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Yes.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: No, you haven't!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] We literally just saw hundreds of them in the gem cave.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: But... but... Oh, look at those rocks!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Those are sting-bush seed pods.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: So they are! But, uh... look at that rock! It's even got four smaller rocks around it like legs!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] That's a tortoise.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [sighs] I guess you won't be moving to Ponyville after all. Those rocks at Ghastly Gorge don't know how lucky they are to have you.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Actually, rocks aren't the only reason I'm considering Ponyville.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: You said it's a rock-based decision.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] I'm obviously passionate about exotic rocks, but I've always studied them... alone. I could handle some less exciting rocks if it meant I'd have somepony to talk to besides Boulder.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [gasps] Are you saying you want... a friend?!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] I wouldn't mind one.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] It isn't hard to meet somepony I like. It's finding somepony who gets me.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: I get you.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] You're my sister. It's different.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Maud, you are the best! You never know when the lightning of friendship will strike. Somepony could come barreling through that door at this very moment and become your best friend!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Y'know, I really thought somepony was gonna come barreling through that<U+0097>

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Uh.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Oh, my fault! Totally my fault! Are you okay? I should've been watching where I was going, and<U+0097> You look really familiar. Have we met before?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Yes.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: I knew it!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Whaaaaat?!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: No, no, don't tell me. Um...

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Yeah. See, I was really hoping you'd tell me while I pretended to remember.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] I traveled Equestria for my rocktorate dissertation.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Psst! Do you know a lot about rocks?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Yes.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Have you ever come across some kind of super-powerful stone that can store the cutie mark magic of... I don't know... an entire village?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Yep. In the big cave.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [laughs] Hey, I got an idea. Let's not tell anypony that part where you maybe, for sure, accidentally helped Starlight enslave a town! [laughs, seriously] Tell nopony!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] It's not like she's enslaved anypony lately.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [through the side of her mouth] Offer to help.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] What?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Offer to help!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: You wanna help?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Do I?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Of course you do! Go!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Okay.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [squeals] They're totally gonna be best friends and then Maud will choose Ponyville, and we'll get to wear BSFF slippers!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Rocks take on different properties when interacting with magic. With the right stone, you could rule all of Equestria if you wanted to.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: You're messing with me.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Am I?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [laughs, sighs] So other than rocks, what else are you into?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Minerals. Plate tectonics. Oh, and stand-up comedy, of course.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: I like... kites.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Kites are cool.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: The trick with an S.L.K. is not to make the spars too heavy. But if they're too light, you've got no ballast and then good luck tacking against the A.O.I.! [beat] I really like kites.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] They're starting to grow on me.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Pizza delivery! Oh! Maud and Starlight? You're here too? Whoa-ho-ho! What a coincidence! 'Cause I was just, y'know, delivering this pizza to, um... you!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: So how's it going?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Uh, just hanging out<U+0097>

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Hey! You could use this time to bond and talk about feelings! For example, do you feel like you're becoming friends?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Um... I feel... like I don't want to talk about feelings?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Great! I'll go next. I feel like I love that you two are becoming best friends! I mean, your friendship could be the friendship that makes Maud move to Ponyville! No pressure, Starlight. Um, hello? Where'd you two go?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Sorry about my sister. There's no half-excited with her.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Oh, I know. But she always calms down. Eventually.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Why do you find rocks so fascinating?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Each one has a different story to tell. Like Boulder here. This tells me he's over two thousand years old. [to Boulder] You don't look a day over six hundred.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Wow. You can tell that from a line?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] I didn't get a rocktorate because I can shred on guitar like nopony else.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Another reason I like rocks <U+0096> they don't exclude you if you're... different than other ponies.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: They're beautiful and strong, but they don't judge you or make you feel less than in any way. I think I'm starting to like rocks, too.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: It's hollow?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] It's granite. Hollow granite is highly unusual.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Wow! Have you ever seen anything like this?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] No. And that's unusual. For me.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: There you are! I thought you went your separate ways but you can't imagine how happy I am to find you both together and to witness one of your firsts as friends!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: First time discovering an underground cavern! [squeals] I can't wait 'til you're old and eating pistachios together and telling your grand-foals about this! Oh, no! They're not bonding!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: I got an idea!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [exaggerated] Whooaa! I'm tripping on a rock at this very moment! And now I'm falling down!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [exaggerated] Oh, no! My accidental clumsiness has trapped us here! Where you'll be forced to bond until we're rescued.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Oh, we won't have to wait for that. There's gotta be a spell that<U+0097>

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan, to Boulder] Get us out of here, boy.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Boulder, that was awesome!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] No. That was sandstone.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: More sand than stone, apparently.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: I'm thinking you wear these around your neck at all times so I don't lose you again, you sillies! That way, I can track your progress as friends!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Ooh! And tomorrow, we can have a friendship brunch! What's your favorite kind of omelette cupcake?! [hushed] Mine's jalape<f1>o red velvet!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Yeah, um, I-I don't know if I can make it.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: You'll change your minds when you smell the yummy food! Come on!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Oops.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Tomorrow's brunch is going to be the scrumptiest, brunchiest, munchiest brunch ever!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Yeah. About that...

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Zero times.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Oh, Maud, don't be so hard on yourself! You've got the best friendship-maker in Ponyville on the case! I'll be by your side the whole time! Speaking of which, your bell fell off, silly!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Pinkie Pie, I appreciate what you're trying to do, but<U+0097>

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Buuuuuut?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] [sighs] Never mind.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Don't worry, Maud. When you see this brunch, you'll realize everything's gonna be okay! And then, I have amazing bonding activities planned for the next seventeen days! You and Starlight will be besties in no time! Goodnight! [kisses] [clap, clap] [snoring] ...Cupcake omelette...

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Friendship brunch!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] [voiceover] Pinkie Pie. Thank you for trying so hard to help me make friends. But my decision has to be rock based. And Ghastly Gorge has such great rocks, I won't even have time for friends. It's better this way. Sorry it didn't work out. Maud.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Maud! Wait!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Maud! [tearing up] Maud...

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Starlight, wake up!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [yelps] Kites!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Huh? Oh. If this is about brunch, I-I, uh... You know what? Jalape<f1>o red velvet omelettes sound gross. I-I just can't.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Maud left in the middle of the night!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Oh. I guess Ghastly Gorge really does have the best rocks.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [sniffs] Why couldn't you two just be friends?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Pinkie Pie, I like Maud.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: You do?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Yeah. She's weird!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Hey!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: No, in a good way! She sees the world in a totally different way than anypony I've ever met. She accepts me for who I am. She taught me that a rock is never just a rock, and she could make anything funny. We never had to say it, but we got each other.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: You really were becoming friends?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: I think so, but you kinda sorta... got in the way.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [gasps] You're right, too harsh. Let's go with... You ruined everything all the time?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Mmmmh, that's worse. What I'm trying to say is<U+0097>

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [tearing up] I have to go!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Sigh.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Emerald jasper? This must be my lucky day.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [sniffs] [licks] [chews] Maud tracks!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Hello, Pinkie Pie. I found emerald jasper.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Are you okay, Maud?! That eel almost ate you!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] What eel?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] You didn't need to come. I'm having a great time on my own.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] I even made a new friend.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Is it a rock?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Yes.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [shrieks] Maud!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] I don't belong in Ponyville. It only proved I'm better off all by myself. Like I always have been.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Don't say that! It was all my fault! I<U+0097> [shrieks] I thought I knew everything about making friends, but I didn't even know my own sister! I forced you to do things my way, but my way isn't your way!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] This way.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Exactly!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] No. This way.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Maud, I thought you couldn't make a friend without my help, but it turns out you couldn't make a friend with my help. I underestimated you, and I'm sorry.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] I know you did it out of love. You're my best sister friend forever.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] And you melt my heart more easily than sodium-rich plagioclase feldspar.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [sniffs] I don't know what that means, but please please please please please give Ponyville another chance! But more importantly, give me another chance... to leave you alone.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] What do you think, Boulder?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: You're back!

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Mm-hmm.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: For good?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Mm-hmm. This doesn't mean we need to start talking about feelings, does it?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Heh. No way.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Maybe after this we could decorate my new place.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Totally! Where is it?

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: [deadpan] Well, it's not in Ponyville. More like Ponyville-adjacent.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: It's perfect.

title: Rock Solid Friendship
dialog: Sorry, sorry, I'm leaving! I promise. I'm not even here. Aah, you're wearing the slippers! Okay, now I'm really leaving. Buh-bye!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Oh! Be careful!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: [gasps] Are you okay, Angel?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I told you that entering the Ponyville Parkour Contest was a dangerous idea. You just rest here, and I'll have you all fixed up in no time. Oh, dear. I'm all out of bunny foot braces. I think we need to pay a visit to Dr. Fauna.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: [straining] Oh, I was sure she would be here today.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Hello? [knocks on door] Is anypony there?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: [straining] I wish I could say the same, but the door's stuck, so I, um... can't see you.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: [gasps] You really have your hooves full here.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I just can't believe all these poor little animals are hurt. What happened?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Oh, dear.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: They do seem to have made themselves right at home here.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Don't be silly, Dr. Fauna. You're the best vet pony in Equestria. At least that's what I've been telling everypony.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Oh, no. Do you suppose it's my fault? I'm so sorry. I didn't mean for this to happen. I just know animals feel safe and happy under your care.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: That is a big problem... that I'm going to fix for you! I already have the perfect solution that'll make the critters happy and give you more space. Then you'll have all your ducks in a row!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I'm on it!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I want to thank you all for rushing right over when I called.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Dr. Fauna needs my help with a serious problem.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: A friendship problem?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: No. Her vet clinic is a bit... maybe, um... overrun with adorable critters in dire need of a safe place to lay their heads, and... they don't have anywhere to go!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Oh, that's just awful.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I know!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Yeah. Dr. Fauna's always fixin' Winona up when she ain't feelin' too fine, so helpin' her out is A-okay by me.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Hah! Yeah!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: You can count on us!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: [simultaneously] Okie-dokie-lokie!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: [simultaneously] Okay!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Oh, that's great news! Because it means you'll all be helping me with something special, too. Something that's been a dream of mine for a long time.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Oh, goody! Is your dream to make a bouncy castle shaped like a gigantic bundt cake?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Um, no. Not exactly.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Huh. Just me then.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: So? What is it, Fluttershy? Spill!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: My dream is to build a real animal sanctuary.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: A beautiful habitat where every animal <U+0096> whether sick or scared or even just lonely, feathered or furry, scaly or slimy <U+0096> every critter would be welcome. My sanctuary can be the one place in Equestria they call home 'til they feel ready to take on the world.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Wow, Fluttershy! I've never heard you speak with such conviction.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Oh! That was exquisite!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Pretty awesome.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Oh, thank you, everypony. You all taught me so much about building my confidence over the years. It's because of your friendship that I finally feel able to make my dream project a reality. But I can't build the sanctuary alone. Will you join me?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I'm happy to offer my extra hooves to ya. Huh. But come to think of it, I actually know a filly who'd be more help than I would. She's a friend of mine from Winona's sheep-herdin' competitions <U+0096> Wrangler! Heh. She's an expert in animal enclosures.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: How lovely!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Ooh-ooh-ooh! I know somepony, too! Hard Hat is the best construction pony in Ponyville. He can build anything you could ever, ever, ever want!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Is it you, Rarity?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: [chuckles] No! No. Um, I was referring to the premiere interior designer of the Canterlot elite <U+0096> Dandy Grandeur. He helped me when I was setting up my Canterlot boutique. I know that he'd be thrilled to work with you.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Wow, everypony! Thank you! I can't wait to meet all of them and hear their ideas. We're right on track to building the most wonderful sanctuary in Equestria!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Thank you, Rupert. Ahem. It's wonderful that you all could join me to discuss the Ponyville sanctuary project. My friends have so many nice things to say about each of your talents. This is a big project, so I'm happy to have such experienced ponies working on it with me.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I-I think so.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Of course.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Um, not exactly. It's more of a dream board.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Well, that's because it's not. It's a sanctuary. A place that is safe but not restrictive. Cozy but natural. A place where the animals can come and go as they please.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: So, can you build it?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I want the sanctuary to have an open floor plan. No walls. More like an enclosure that melts into the trees. With a gate in the back. That way, the animals can return to the forest right when they feel ready.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Sneaky! I like it!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: But I don't want to clear the trees. I want to use them.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Critters don't live the same way ponies do. I know this is unconventional, but that's because we're trying to do something that's never been done before. I really believe it'll work.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: See, Fluttershy? Whatever you want.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Good.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Ooooh! Loving the print on those!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Um, not to be rude, but there must be some mistake. We have no need for curtains at the sanctuary.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Everything is gonna look natural in the animal habitats, not like it was made for ponies.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Drab? You're calling the colors of beautiful trees drab?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I appreciate your input, but I just know the animals would be happiest with dirt brown pillows and leaf green accents.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Thank you.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Hmm.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Uh, what is it, sugarcube?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I'm looking for something less like a cage and more like a nice hug. Maybe if we lose that part.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Exactly! Ooh! This is the perfect base for a little nest. I'll take a bunch of these and anything else the animals can burrow into.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: She does have a point there. You wouldn't want a bunny wanderin' into the wrong cave, would ya?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: No! No cages. I want to give the animals the freedom to come and go. It's the only way they'll feel comfortable.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Well, she's the boss.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I... I... [angry] I don't love it! This is not going to work at all! A giraffe can't fit through this door! With these curtains blocking the light, how are the birds gonna sing in the sunshine? And this is the opposite of a nice hug! I know you all worked hard, but none of you did anything I asked for!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I may not know much about construction or interior design or wrangling, but I am an expert at one thing: the care of animals! And what animals need is a sanctuary, not this!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: My vision isn't the problem here! I told you all exactly what I wanted, and none of you listened to me! So while I appreciate your efforts, I no longer require your services!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: No. I'm the one who should be sorry. This didn't go at all like I had imagined.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Sleep tight, little one. It's going to be okay. I promise.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Now, now, every mouse has gotta wait their turn.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: [sighs] I'm so sorry. I thought I'd have a beautiful sanctuary for you all to stay in by now. But I put my trust in the wrong ponies.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: No!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I won't give up! These animals need me! And I'm gonna solve this once and for all! If this little lady can crawl all the way here from Western Equestria, I can find a way to build her a safe place to rest!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Oh! [joins in laughter] Oops. Everyone back to sleep now.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Thanks for coming, everypony. As you know, building the sanctuary didn't go quite as planned.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I know, right? Who would've guessed that Hard Hat wouldn't build whatever you want?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I never would've invited Dandy to help if I thought he'd act in such a manner.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: [sighs] And Wrangler sure made a fool outta me, too. I'm sorry, Fluttershy.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: It's okay. You were all just trying to help. But I know that letting all the experts go was the right call.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: So what are you gonna do now?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Try again. I'm going to rebuild the sanctuary and do it my way this time.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: All right, Fluttershy!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: [simultaneously] You show 'em, filly!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: [simultaneously] That's the spirit!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: How about putting an awesome flying course for the birds right there?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: And a carrot cake stand here?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Ooh, a library cave?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Everypony, stop! I appreciate you sharing your thoughts, but I need everypony to respect mine. Other ponies may be experts in their fields, but animals are my field of expertise. And if I say this is what I want, then this is what needs to happen! Oh, um, for the animals of course.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Wow! We should call you "Flutterbold" now!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: To get things back on track, I called in a favor from an old friend. He'll be here any minute.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: I thought you said no more experts.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: This is one expert I know I can trust to put the animals first. Plus there's nopony better at building.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Big Daddy McColt! [to the others] We met each other back when the map called me and Fluttershy to the Smokey Mountains!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: And he certainly knows his stuff when it comes to buildings and caring for animals.

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Are you ready?

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Okay, you can open your eyes! Welcome to Sweet Feather Sanctuary, a safe and cozy retreat for everycreature!

title: Fluttershy Leans In
dialog: Now you should have plenty of room at the clinic. Because once you've treated them, they can recover here! With my help, of course. It's okay, Lola. We all move at our own pace. Sometimes, all we need to do is believe in our dreams. And when we finally reach our goal, we'll know that it was worth what it took to get there, because the view will be even better than you imagined!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [panting] [muttering] Oh, I have to... Oh! I can't believe the winter-to-spring transition is almost here!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Ohhh. I like that. [sighs] I'm going to have to relabel all my binders. Right after we finish... everything! We still have so much to do! Oh, my bustles and bows! Rarity, did we<U+0097>?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Already hemmed, ruched, and cut, my dear.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [sighs] Oh. Rarity, no reason to panic, but, um, we seem to be temporarily low! And when I say "temporarily low", I mean "completely out of"<U+0097>!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: The baby blue sapphires? They arrived this morning.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh. Heh. Wonderful. [sighs] Oh! What about the design for the<U+0097>?!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: And done!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Wow. You are good. And you've really outdone yourself this time! The Morning Sunshine Tulip Frock is gorgeous!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Ooh, thank you. Look, I know you're worried about something slipping between the cracks. But with your managerial skills and my fabulous designs, we have everything covered.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: You're right. You're right. There are no cracks.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Would you be a dear and fetch me some vermilion satin from the back? And I'll start on the Eternal Elegance Empire Silhouette evening gown.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: My most certain pleasure!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Rarity, we're running low on vermilion satin.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I... I can order more!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [continues bawling] And this is when we pretended we were storybook princesses. And here we pretended we were on a dangerous yet stylish safari. [sobs] So many wonderful memories! [sobs, blows nose, resumes sobbing] Not to put too fine a point on it, but... [bawls harder] Sweetie Belle loves playing dress-up. I miss her so much!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Then why don't you go visit her?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [through tears] I wish I... could, but... between... running... three stores and the spring-sition... I couldn't possibly...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: But you've already done almost all the work. I can handle the rest.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: B-B-But... but...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Rarity, go. I have everything well in hoof.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [sobs, calmer] Mm, point taken. [excitedly] I am going to visit my sister!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Way to immediately turn that around.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: We can spend the whole day together! And we can do all her favorite things!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I'm sure she'd love that.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh, Sassy, thank you!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Of course! Now get out of here!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I'm going! I'm going! Hang on, sis! I'm coming!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Excuse us!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Comin' through!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Cutie Mark Crusaders mid-mission here!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: That was fun! Let's do it again!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Scoot, we've got a job to do.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Later?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: All right, Chipcutter. We've done our part. The rest is up to you.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Yup!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Because you said you weren't good at anything except getting in trouble for making sculptures out of your lunch, right?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Well, what is this slab asking you to turn it into?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Wow! T-That's incredible! It looks just like us!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: We knew you had it in you, Chip!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Chip, we're proud of you.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Woo-hoo! All right!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Yes!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Way to go!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [sighs] Not a bad way to start a day.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Not a bad way at all! Helpin' ponies is just about my favorite thing to do.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Another satisfied client!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: So who's up next?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Pretty sure it's Zipporwhill. She needs help reconnecting with her cutie mark <U+0096> three puppy paw prints.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: When is she swinging by?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Well, I think she should be arriving right about...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: ...now.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Wow. You are good.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Come on in, Zipporwhill.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Okay, so what seems to be the problem, exactly?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Don't you worry. You've come to the right place! The Cutie Mark Crusaders are on the job!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Trust us. Before you know it, you and your puppy will be back to bein' besties!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: You have the CMC guarantee! No matter what it takes, we promise you'll have our full attention.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [singsongy] Guess who's here to spend the whole day with her little sister?!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Mmmm!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Rarity, what are you doing here?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I am here to spend the day with you! I'm so excited, I could practically faint! You don't happen to have a fainting couch in here, do you?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: No!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh, pfft, of course not. It's a treehouse! That would be tr<e8>s gauche!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Right... Well, I sure am happy to see you, and spending the day with you does sound like a lot of fun, but... I'm kind of right in the middle of something important. I have responsibilities and...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Go on, Sweetie Belle. We've got this covered. How often do you get to spend time with your sister?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Yeah! Go have fun.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: You sure you two can handle our client here?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: "Client"? Oh, that is so adorable!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Uh, thanks? I think?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Are you sure you two got this?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: We have it handled.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh, my! Look at this wall of satisfied customers! [gasps] You girls really have come a long way.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Well, all right then. [to the other Crusaders] But, lemme know if you need me or run into any trouble.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Ooh! So fun!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [indignantly] What?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [giggles] It's just I know how much you love these puppet shows.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I did.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh, it's just like old times! You, me, greasy popcorn. It's like no time has passed at all.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Ooh! Ooh! Ooh! It's your favorite part!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: What's the matter, darling?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I, um, guess I just prefer black box experimental theater.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: What?! Since when?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [sighs] I dunno. It's no big deal. This is great.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Okay. We're here! Ta-da! [laughs, clears throat] Aren't you excited to be back here again? Do I know my baby sister, or do I know my baby sister?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Uh... Yeah... Where is "here" exactly?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh, pfft! Stop being so silly! You know this is your favorite ice cream shop!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh. Right. From when I was a little filly.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Huh. I remember it being much bigger.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Well, go ahead. I know you're dying to dig in.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Well?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [laughs nervously, sighs] That was, uh... one tasty bite. Still a little hungry, though.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [gasps] We can get another sundae! Chocolate with rainbow sprinkles, perhaps?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I was thinking something more like a salad.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: A salad? When did you get so practical?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh, um... I guess another scoop would be fine!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [gasps] One more Filly Clown Surprise, please!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Look at me! Over here!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I know you must be bored, darling. This is a very long line for one of Twisty Pop's balloons.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: But just be patient. We'll get you your favorite balloon bouquet, and it'll all be worth it.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Come on, Ripley! Like this!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Good Scootaloo! See?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Maybe if the ball tasted better?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I don't think that that's it, Scoot.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Doesn't look like it's going so well. I'm just gonna do a quick check with the CMCs.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Well, I guess duty calls, and-and you, you have that now...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: What?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh nothing, nothing. Go on.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Hey, Sweetie Belle. How's your day with Rarity going?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Well, it's not exactly great...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: What do you mean?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I don't know. It's like Rarity doesn't even know me anymore.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I wish we could say our day is going better.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: But we can't.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Seems like Zipporwhill's puppy doesn't want anything to do with her.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Hmmm. I see what you mean... [gasps] You know, it's an awfully big puppy...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Sweetie Belle, hurry! He's making it!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Gotta go...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [gasps] I know just what to do with this!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: And pose!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: And pose!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Love the camera!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Hate the camera.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Love it again!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Sweetie Belle, you did "hate the camera" for all these shots! [sighs] Let's do it again.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: No!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Come on, Zipporwhill, you can do this!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: W-What do you mean, no?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Rarity, this is hard for me to say, but... um...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Sweetie Belle, what is it? You've been acting weird all day. You used to love doing these things with me.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: That's just it! I used to! That's not who I am anymore!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: But it is you! You love puppet shows and dressing up and taking silly photos and tiny little clown-shaped ice creams!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Really?! If you still think I like doing this stuff, then maybe you don't know me at all!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [sobbing] I can't believe Sweetie Belle talked to me like that. [indignant] And after everything I did to set up a whole day of doing her favorite things! I mean, accusing me of not knowing her?! I know her better than anypony! Um, thank you, Twisty, but the hard truth is, my sister is being unappreciative right now! And I'm going to go and give her a piece of my mind!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Hey, Zipporwhill. What are you doing here? Where are Apple Bloom and Scootaloo?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Now, I'm sure that's not true.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I think that might be your problem right there! Come on!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [groans] Find Zipporwhill, Ripley!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Woof, woof! It's Zipporwhill! Woof?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [sighs] It's hopeless.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Sweetie Belle!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Zipporwhill! [sighs] We're sorry we haven't figured this out yet.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Don't worry, girls. I think I cracked this one.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Aha! There she is! [gasps] Oh, dear. Really should have changed. [huffs] No matter! I'm going to give her quite the talking to! ...Right after she's done with her conversation. Anger is no excuse for poor manners, after all.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Okay, Zipporwhill. What do you see?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: That's not what I see. I see a full-grown dog.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: He's not just bigger. He's older, too.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: You don't still play with the same toys from when you were a foal, do you?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I understand. But doing things like you used to won't turn him back into a puppy.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Treat him like the dog he is, and find new favorite things to do together.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I know so!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Rarity?!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh, Sweetie Belle. I heard what you said, and you are so right.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: About the dog?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Yes, but about us, too. The truth is, I know you're not a little filly anymore. But it's just... the last time we did all of those things together, I... I didn't realize it was gonna be the last last time. I loved doing those things with you. It's hard for me to let that go.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Aww, Rarity! I love being with you too! That will never change! But... maybe we could just try to do different things together?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: No problem!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Sweetie Belle, I'm so very proud of the pony you've grown into.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: And I'm proud that no matter what, I'll always be your little sister.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I, uh, have a little bit of time before I have to head back to Canterlot. Could we spend it together? What would a grown pony like you want to do?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Well, I do have one idea...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Heh, I didn't realize your idea would be such a delicious one! [giggles] I don't know how I'm going to finish this.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh! I'll help you!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [straining] Scootaloo... is this such a... good idea?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: What are you talking about? This is the best idea I've ever had!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [grunting] It's just...

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: You wanna come. But we talked about this. Non-Pegasus ponies fall through the clouds.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Right, but...

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I think we're good.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: We are? Scootaloo, I know you have to go to Cloudsdale to finish your report. I'm just wonderin' if this is the best way to get there.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: It'll be fine. Besides, how else could I get there?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: A Pegasus chariot?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: A flock of birds?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: A hot-air balloon?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Huh. Those do seem a lot safer. Maybe I should try to find another waaaaaaaaayyyyyy!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Woo-hoo!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [grunts, weakly] Nailed it.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [echoing] Uh, little ma'am, are you all right?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [gasps] You're... You're... You're... Rainbow Dash's dad!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Uh, yes. Bow Hothoof at your service.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Uh, honey? Somethin's goin' on out here!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Oh! Heavens to Celestia, what's wrong with her?!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I don't know, but you just made it worse.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: She's doing it again!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Oh, dearie, please! You might shatter my Princess Celestia commemorative plates! Ow!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Our Rainbow Dash?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: The report's on an inspirational pony in my life, and nopony inspires me more than she does! I'm putting together this scrapbook for my report! I'm her biggest fan!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Now, little trotter, what you say is impossible. [excitedly] Because nopony is a bigger fan of our Rainbow Dash than us!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Whoa! You always wear that shirt?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Heh. Actually, it's, uh, laundry day. But pretty great, right?!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Yeah!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: My name's Windy Whistles, and I just have to say that it is a total blast to meet somepony that loves Rainbow Dash as much as we do!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: What can we help you with?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Well, I know all about Rainbow Dash's time in Ponyville, but I don't know anything about her life before that.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Well, you came to the right place!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I can't believe I'm eating Rainbow Dash's favorite food made by Rainbow Dash's mom while sitting in Rainbow Dash's childhood kitchen! This is the greatest day of my life! [munches loudly] Mmmm!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I think it's time for a tour of the house.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [mouth full] Okay.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Our little Dashie was an early learner and so rambunctious. The combination was<U+0097>

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [singsongy] Exciting!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Whoa... Is that... her room?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [screams] Rainbow Dash's linen closet! Her carpet! Her inspirational poster! [reading] "When the going gets tough, the tough don't notice because they have hard shells." That's so Rainbow Dash!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Woo-hoo!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Scootaloo, wanna see something really cool?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Pretty great, huh?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: So great!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: And look at this! She was wearing it when she spoke her first words.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: So cool!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: And this broken lantern is from when she first learned to fly.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: And this bitten apple is from when she grew her first tooth! [gasps] So many memories!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: You're so lucky to have all of these!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Well, I may have a ton of Dash-mentos, but I don't have any of those "Rainbow Dash Saves Ponyville" headlines like you.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [gasps] Trade-sies?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Deal-sies!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: So where's all the Wonderbolt stuff?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: You mean Rainbow Dash's personal collection of Wonderbolt memorabilia?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: No. I mean, where's all the stuff about Rainbow Dash getting accepted into the Wonderbolt Academy and then getting chosen as a Wonderbolt? Wait, you don't know that your daughter's a Wonderbolt? And I got to tell you?!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Oh, wow! You should see your faces right now!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: See? That's what your faces look like.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Great timing.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Great door.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I just... It's... Unbelievable!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: You two were kind enough to show me the Rainbow Dash you know. Now please, allow me to show you the Rainbow Dash I know.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Let's make some thunder!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I was born to make thunder!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Our baby's a Wonderbolt!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: We've got turbulence!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: How? Where's it coming from?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I'm so proud!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Oh, no.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Okay. Which pony broke protocol and invited guests to our training exercises?!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I guess they're with me. [groans, embarrassed] Mom, Dad. So... good... to see you.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Oh, honey, it's so great to see you, too! And wow! You were so amazing up there with all of that flying!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Uh, how did you know I was here?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Scootaloo filled us in on everything, you modest pony you!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I can't believe I'm documenting the moment your parents first saw you as a Wonderbolt!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: And these must be your Wonderbolt friends! Hello, team! I'm Windy Whistles, the mom of the best Wonderbolt ever! Yeah! Just kidding. You guys were great, too! Go, team!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Moooom!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Hello, ma'am. Nice to meet you.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Nice to meet you as well, and love those goggles! Love 'em! You know, I have goggles, too. But they're mostly just for swimming. Oh, and bath time.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Mom, please! They don't wanna hear about your bath time!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I can't believe it! My daughter, a Wonderbolt! [sobs] So proud!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Dad, hold it together. We're in public.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: All right, Wonderbolts! Let's hit the showers and give Rainbow Dash some time to spend with her family.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Okay, yeah! Uh, great practice! I'll, uh, eh, catch up with you guys in a minute!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Oh, no! [straining] Tears... welling up again!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Dad!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Could you give us a sec?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Is something wrong?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Yeah. You should've warned me that you were bringing my parents! Or talked to Twilight or something! Not just shown up!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Why?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Ugh! It's just my parents and I have a delicate relationship. I love them very much, and we're really close, but there's a reason I didn't tell them I'm a Wonderbolt! They can be a little bit... embarrassing.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Huh? Really?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Yeah, really! And now you've invited a whole lot of crazy into my life!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: What's wrong with a little support?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Bow and Windy, I'd like you to meet Apple Bloom and Sweetie Belle.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Hi!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Hello.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Greetings, small ponies.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Are you excited to see Rainbow Dash?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Oh, my, yes! And to think we never bothered to come to a Wonderbolt event!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: We said if Rainbow Dash isn't a Wonderbolt, then what's the point? But now, she is!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: And she earned it! Did you know it all started when she won a spot in the coveted Wonderbolts Academy, training under Spitfire?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I didn't know that! How wonderful!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: But then, she had some heavy competition. Especially against another Pegasus named Lightning Dust.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Oh, no!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: But, of course, Rainbow Dash proved to be the best and later made it into the Wonderbolt Reserves!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Hooray again!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: But jealous ex-Wonderbolt Wind Rider was worried that Rainbow Dash might break his speed record. And so, he framed her for a crime she didn't commit.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Oh, no!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: But thanks to Rarity, Rainbow Dash proved her innocence and became a backup Wonderbolt until Fire Streak retired, and she became an official Wonderbolt!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Hooray! Wow, what a gripping tale!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: You really know your Rainbow Dash history. You're going to do great on your report.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Show's about to start.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Come on, Bolts! Let's start this thing!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Wonderbolts' Big Showcase! Here! We! Gooooooooo!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Rip it up and tear! It! Down!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Then build it back up again and tear it back down again! Yeah!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Woo! Yeah! Uh-huh, uh-huh! Go go go! Yes! Go, Rainbow Dash! Best Wonderbolt ever!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Woo-hoo! That's my daughter! Go, Rainbow! Go, Dashie, go-go-go-go-go!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: You go, girl!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Whoa! Since when did we add fireworks to the show?!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Uhhhh, we didn't.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Go, Rainbow Dash! You sign that photo! Whoo!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Now, let's do the pyramid! Scootaloo, get up there! You're the top!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [to Rainbow] You really do got yourself your very own mega-fans. Lucky you.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: You hung that towel!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Yeah!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Greatest towel hanger of all time! [chanting] Towel!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Stop! This is ridiculous! Mom and Dad, you are both too supportive! This is exactly why I didn't tell you I was a Wonderbolt! You're just... too much!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Did... Did we do something wrong?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Yes! The fireworks, the cheerleading, and-and how do you even compare who is better or worse at hanging up a towel?!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: We're just trying to be supportive.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Well, I'm tired of it! I've had enough of you two being so proud of every little ridiculous, insignificant thing I do! [pants] I think you should leave.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: First of all, great job yelling at us, sweetie. No one [sniffs] can make their parents feel more worthless than you!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [through tears] Your words were direct, clear, and... so painful! Is there nothing you can't do?!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Why?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Scootaloo, you don't understand!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I met your parents hoping to learn more about you, but I don't like what I found out! I'll find somepony else to do my hero report on.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [panting] Scootaloo, wait! I know I wasn't myself back there, and I shouldn't have snapped at my parents! That's exactly why I didn't tell them I'm a Wonderbolt!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I don't understand. They're so proud of you.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [sighs] Can I tell you something?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Sure.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Okay, but you might wanna hold onto your wings because this could rock you to your very core. Believe it or not, there was a time when I wasn't the best at everything.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: See this picture? It looks like I won something awesome, but actually...

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Greatest participant ever!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Granted, I was the youngest pony in the senior competitive circuit. Most other ponies my age were still in the Junior Flappers' Club. I thought it was utterly mortifying having my parents cheer me on even when I lost!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [voiceover] But then, when I started to win competitions <U+0096> which didn't take very long, by the way <U+0096> things got even worse!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [voiceover] Being the best came with consequences. Very loud, very embarrassing consequences.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Ya know, some ponies would dream of having parents like that.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Yeah, right! Name one!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [sighs] Me. Growing up, I never thought I'd be the best at anything, because nopony ever told me. But your parents told you over and over again. Look! Best bath taker ever. Best carrot eater under three. Greatest napper of all time!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [scoffs] I am pretty good at napping. I can fall asleep anywhere. [snores] Huh?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: For your entire life, your parents gave you the confidence to believe in yourself.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: You're right. I was always so embarrassed by my parents that I didn't realize their support actually made me the awesome, confident, amazing, awesome, and awesome pony I am! [sighs] And I took them for granted.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: And you yelled at them.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [groans] I gotta make this right. I have an idea, but I'm gonna need your help. That is, if you're willing to help me after I acted like that.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Now, that's a great picture! "Rainbow Dash learns the error of her ways"!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: I'm telling you, I just can't see a thing. Scootaloo, you are just so great at blindfolds!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: It's true. You must tell me what kind of knot you used. Uh, falconer's knot? Wait, no! A farmer's loop!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: What's this all about, anywho?

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: [over loudspeaker] Windy Whistles and Bow Hothoof, please be seated for a super private Wonderbolt event! [clears throat] Mom and Dad, welcome to the... [quickly] "I Love My Parents and I'm Sorry That I Took Them for Granted and I Know That They Made Me Who I Am Today So I Really Wanna Make It Up to Them"... [normally] event. Enjoy!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Thanks for doing this.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Happy to help.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Mom and Dad, I want you to know that I'm your biggest fan.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Oh, honey, thank you. But you didn't have to do all this. It's kind of [whispers] embarrassing.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Eh, it is a bit much.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: And that's why Rainbow Dash is the most inspirational pony in my life!

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Thank you, Scootaloo. Very well researched! But a little heavy on the pictures, and there was a moldy sandwich in your report. [chuckles] Um, I'll give you a B.

title: Parental Glideance
dialog: Yeah! Greatest report giver of all time!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Hey, Apple Bloom! Rarity's reorganizing her shop, and look what she found! Old costumes from the talent show!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: We thought they'd come in handy in case we ever help a pony put on a play or need to make a quick escape disguised as clowns.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Here ya go, Big Mac.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Whoa, that sure is a lot of apples!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Are you makin' another delivery to Starlight's old village?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: That's an awful long way for a pony to go, isn't it?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: You've been goin' there a lot lately. What is this, your fifth trip this week?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: [laughs nervously] Eeyup.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Okay, well, have fun. So what other costumes did you bring, Sweetie Belle?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Are you crazy?! We can't talk about costumes at a time like this!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Time like what?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Your brother is hiding something. Did you see the way he was acting?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Yeah. He totally blushed when you brought up how often he's been going to Starlight's old village.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Something is definitely going on. There can be only be one reason a pony would travel so far, so often.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: ...and he wants to get away from the smell!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Maybe he's a spy on a mission to thwart an evil villain with a secret weapon: an apple cannon!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: No, that's crazy! I think it's my broccoli thing.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Why don't we just ask him?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: You saw how shifty he was acting earlier. There's no way he'll tell us what he's doing. Plus, I really wanna go undercover. We already have costumes! Call me "Agent Rainbowhead".

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: I'll be "Shimmering Spectacles", a librarian with a mysterious past.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: And I'll be a pirate spy! Arrrgh! A spy-rate!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: [gasps] Avast! Our ship be leavin' port!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Huh?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Big Mac's leavin'! If we're gonna be spies, we gotta go! Now!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Big Mac's a-comin'! Quick! Act like apples!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: What? How?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Who's that pony?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Let me see! I dunno. Shouldn't have taken the binoculars. I don't know anypony here.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: That must be Sugar Belle. Applejack told me about her bakery. Obviously, she's just been orderin' a lot of apples.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: So nothing fishy's going on.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: No way! We came here to be spies! And no spy I know has ever solved a case that quick!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Mmm, how many spies do you know?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: That's... not important. What's important is that we do more recon. Follow my lead!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Whoa. She sure likes her apples.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: What is she doing? Making the biggest apple pie in Equestria?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Thanks for coming all this way, Big Mac.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: It sure is nice seeing you again so soon.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: All I used to bake were boring old muffins, but thanks to your apple deliveries, I get to bake all kinds of delicious treats! Apple pies, apple fritters, apple turnovers, caramel apples, caramel apple cakes... [sighs] I just wish I had more room to display it all. My shelves only hold so much.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: I'm tellin' you, this pony reeeeaaally likes her apples.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: [gasps] Or Big Mac!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Just look!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Sweetie Belle, I-I think you're right! [loudly] I think my brother has a crush!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Shh!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Psst! Big Mac! [to the Crusaders] Now remember, my brother's super shy, so he's probably gonna be embarrassed about his crush. Just try and make him feel comfortable. Hey, Big Mac, it's me! Apple Bloom!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Mm-hmm.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: I'm gonna ask you a very personal question, and I want you to answer honestly. Do you... have a crush on... Sugar Belle?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Well, that was easy.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: This is so excitin'! My big brother has his very first crush!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: First crush? What about Cheerilee?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: It doesn't really count when you trick a pony into drinking a love potion, does it?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: [angrily] Nnope!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: [singsongy] My brother has a crush! My brother has a crush! My brother has a crush! [normally] Wait! Does Sugar Belle even know you like her?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Uh-uh.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Then you gotta tell her!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: O-Oh... eh... ehhhh...

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: We're pretty sure she likes you! I mean, she keeps ordering apples just so she can see you again.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Eeeyou think so?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Totally! But you'll never know if you don't try.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Okay!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Go get her, Big Mac!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Oh! Heh. Thanks, Feather Bangs.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Um, is it possible to have two crushes at once? Because it looks like Big Mac may not be the only pony Sugar Belle likes.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Hey, Big Mac! Where ya goin'?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Home!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: You can't let that Feather fella get in the way of your one true love!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: You've gotta take him down!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: What can he do that you can't?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: That!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Seriously? That line worked?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: She'll never pick me.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Sure she will, 'cause we're gonna help you.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: No love potions!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Don't worry, Big Mac. We learned our lesson the hard way.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Yeah. We're never gonna do that again.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Besides, I know exactly what to do! When I was younger, I read all the fairy tales.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: When you were "younger", huh?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Well, I was younger on the way here!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: It was a long ride! Anyway, as long as we do what the book says, you're pretty much guaranteed a happy ending. Uh, how about this one? "Rescuing a damsel-pony-in-distress." That's perfect! Of course, we'll have to improvise without a dragon.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Huh. Too bad Spike isn't here. Not that he's very threatening.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: So what should we do? Wait around for Sugar Belle to get herself into a scary situation?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Or... we bring the danger to her.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: All right. Scootaloo's gonna pretend to take Sugar Belle's things, then you swoop in and stop her. Ready?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Nnope.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Come on! You're gonna be her hero! In fairy tales, the knight in shining armor always gets the girl.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Hmmm... Mm-hmm.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Oh! Somepony, help!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: [sighs] Thank you, Feather!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: That smooth-talkin' pony stole our rescue! And it totally would've worked!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: [angry] Eeyup.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: We're just gonna have to keep trying! Big Mac, are you ready to take it up a notch?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Oh, yup!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Oh, nope.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Trust us! There's nothing more romantic than waking your special pony from a sleeping spell with a magical kiss! See? "They rode off into the sunset."

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Any sign of Feather Bangs?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Negative! Coast is clear!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: It's now or never, Big Mac!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Hey! That's our metaphorical sunset they're riding off into!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: All right! This ends now! Feather Bangs may have good timing, and... a good mane... uh, but let's see him compete with a song!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: S-Say what now?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Of course! Why didn't we think of it before?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Every great love story hinges on the romantic musical number. Big Mac, you've gotta write a song for Sugar Belle!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Come on, Big Mac!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Come on! You can do better than him! Just like we practiced!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: We'll take a walk down by the river Watch the sunset from the field We'll plant the seeds of love together And water 'em right for a really good yield

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Sugar Belle, when I look in your eyes [clears throat] I see the color blue And it reminds me of the sky above Uh, which is also... blue

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: I've been writin' this song for you Searchin' for the perfect rhyme For the words I wanna say Somethin', somethin', somethin', somethin'... Be mine

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Sugar Belle! Roses are red and violets are blue!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Sugar Belle!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Sugar Belle!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Sugar Belle!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: What in Equestria has gotten into you two?! If you think I'm the kind of pony that likes all this nonsense, then you clearly don't know me at all! I wish everypony would just... leave me alone!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Big Mac? Oh, Big Mac?!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Well, nopony's seen him.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Aw, I feel terrible. I've never seen my brother so upset before. Oh, Big Mac?! Big Mac!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Are you okay?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Nnope.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Sorry it didn't work out with Sugar Belle.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: We don't get it. Big, grand gestures always work in the fairy tales.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: But Sugar Belle's not a fairy tale princess. She's a real pony. She's kind, and she works hard, and she's sweeter than everything in her bakery.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: That's it! We shoulda been thinking about what would mean a lot to Sugar Belle!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Hmmm... [gasps] I know just the thing! But I'm gonna need your help!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Really? Even after we messed it up?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Eeyup. Come on!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Oh, okay. I'm... Wait a minute. You look familiar.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: [fake voice] I shouldn't. Um, uh, I'm new in town. Mind showing me around?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Uh, sure. That's the whole town. It's just the one street.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: [fake voice] Oh, no! Clumsy me! Here, let me help you clean it up!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: I don't think Scootaloo can hold her off much longer.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: [fake voice] Uh, n-now hold on a minute. Are you sure I can't buy you a new bag?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: I'm good. It's no big deal.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Okay, what's going on?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: [normal voice] Ahhh! The cupcake has landed! Repeat <U+0096> the cupcake has landed! Oof!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Big Mac! You made me a new display case?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Eeyup.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: And you made it bigger! You remembered! [gasps] Now I have twice as much room for all my desserts! [gasps] Which means... I can make even more! I've been dying to try baking cream pies and whoopie pies and icebox cakes and, of course, more apple treats! Oh, Big Mac, thank you so much. This is the sweetest thing anypony's ever done for me.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: [chuckles] Uh, y-y-yeah or-or nope or...

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: [giggles] I like you, too.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Awwwww!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: That was the most romantic thing ever!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Wait a minute. I recognize you fillies. [to Big Mac] Have they been with you this whole time?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: I'm Big Mac's little sister, and these are my friends. We're sorry for everything we put you through today, Sugar Belle. Big Mac never would've gone through with all of those crazy...

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: ...over-the-top...

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: ...downright ridiculous...

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: ...attempts to impress you if we hadn't put him up to it. But we learned our lesson. Romance isn't about impressin' somepony. It's about doin' somethin' that means somethin' special to that pony you love<U+0097> Heh... [clears throat] like a lot.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Uh, Apple Bloom, I think they get it.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Sorry, Feather. You're a little too late.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Yeah! Sugar Belle's already picked her special somepony!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: But don't worry. You've got three not-so-secret admirers right behind you!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Uh, you're askin' us for advice?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Gee, I don't know about this.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: He just needs a little nudge in the conversation department. Besides, I don't think Big Mac's ready to leave just yet.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Let's do it!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Feather Bangs, the Cutie Mark Crusaders are...

title: Honest Apple
