dialog: No. [chuckling] It's a call for submissions. Fashion contest I'm organizing. A showcase for aspiring young designers.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Oh, wow! What an awesome idea!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Thank you. I remember how difficult it was to break into the fashion industry when I was starting out. That's why the winner of the contest will get to debut their line in the Carousel Boutique!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: [dreamily] So selfless... So generous...

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I've also managed to get esteemed fashion critic Hoity Toity and iconic fashion photographer Photo Finish to come to Ponyville and judge the show. And... [squealing] Wait until you hear who else will be a judge.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Countess Coloratura?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Sassy Saddles?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Spike?!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: No! [chuckling] The third judge for the Carousel Boutique's Couture du Future Fashion Contest is none other than... Applejack!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: What?!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: What?!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: What?!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: ...What?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: What?!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: You already said that, darling.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I know. But I had to say it again because that's how confused I am. You want me to judge a fashion show?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I'm sure Rarity has her reasons, and once we hear them, all of this will make sense.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I admit, Applejack is an unorthodox choice. But that is precisely what makes her an inspired choice!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: See? Now it all... still doesn't make any sense.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Hoity Toity has expertise in fabric and stitchwork. Photo Finish has an artistic eye for shapes and colors. But sometimes, we designers forget about practicality. That's where you come in.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Uh, I think I might be a little too practical. My closet's nothin' but twenty versions of this hat.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Which tells me you're a pony who knows what she likes. Besides, a judge must be honest, and you're the most honest pony there is. Ask any pony <U+0096> they'll tell you.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Ooh! Ooh! Lemme try! [to Cherry Fizzy] Excuse me. Have you ever heard of Applejack?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: See? So what do you say?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Well, if I'm bein' honest, I don't think I'm the right pony for the job. Fashion just ain't my bag of oats.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Aw, booooo!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I do understand your hesitation. But before you say no, sleep on it?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Sure, I... guess I can do that for ya.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I mean, heh, can you imagine? Me, judgin' a fashion show?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I'd do it! It sounds like fun gettin' to see all those pretty outfits!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Although... Rarity did say I just had to focus on practicality. She already has experts for the... uh, fashion-y stuff. Eh, but I still wouldn't know what to say.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Come on, Apple Bloom! You're doublin' our workload here!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Sorry. I wanted to wear a signature hat like yours, but it's makin' it harder to see.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Wow! That is a lot better! Thanks, Applejack!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Sure thing. You know what? I am gonna help Rarity judge her show! I think my sensible "everypony" take on fashion is exactly what the pony community needs!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Rarity, I thought about it some more, and if you still need me, I'd love to be a judge.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: [squeals] I just knew you'd come around!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I, Photo Finish, have arrived!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: As has Hoity Toity.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: [gasps] It's wonderful to see you! Mwah! Mwah! Mwah!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: [simultaneously] Kiss! Kiss! Kiss!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Thank you both so much for doing this. Mwah! Mwah! Mwah!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: We missed you at Miss Pommel's debut in Manehattan last week.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Miss Pommel is showing? I thought she was still making costumes.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Oh, my, they're absolutely stunning!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: It sure is great to hear Miss Pommel is doin' so well.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Who is this?! Who speaks?!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Oh, uh, this is Applejack. Another one of the judges.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: So, judge, what do you think?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Oh. Wow. Uh, that is just... wow. These are clothes?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Ze photo is upside-down!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: This is... [scoffs] She looks like a disco ball! Hah! D-Did they have to roll her down the runway?! [laughing] I can't believe anypony would actually wear this! [laughing] Am I right?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Oh, my!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I faint! Ugh...

title: Honest Apple
dialog: [nervous chuckling] So funny... Ahem.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Oh, gosh. I didn't mean to make her faint.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Oh, don't worry about it, darling. Uh, it happens all the time. Besides, that dress did look a bit like a disco ball. Although, Miss Pommel is making the point that, no matter what we wear, it is a costume of some kind or another.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I have no idea what you're talkin' about.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: And... that's okay. Let's go meet the designers and help them get ready for the show!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Designers, welcome! Today you will work on your designs, and we judges will offer our guidance and advice as you prepare for tomorrow's big show.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Lily Lace, tell us about your inspiration.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Powerful yet at the same time fragile and delicate.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Uh... Huh?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Next up, meet Starstreak.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Mmmm... Tomorrow's fashion belongs to those who hear it coming.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: You have a very focused vision! A strong sense of what you want! It's gut!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Applejack, you've been rather quiet. What do you think?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Well... it's a lot of black. It's kinda... depressing.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Makes a world of difference!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Maybe to fashion experts like you. But to ponies like me, it's still black.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: And I'm not sure how you wear singin' birds or the future. [to Rarity] I don't think they liked what I had to say.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Ah, well, that's why you're here. Fashion needs a healthy dose of practicality now and then.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Are you puttin' holes in the clothes?! On purpose?!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: More like an old and tattered look! When a pony's old clothes get holes in 'em, they don't wanna go to the store to buy new clothes with holes in 'em!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Okay, yes, not a very practical choice. Fashionable, but not practical.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Simply shtunning!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Sure, it looks pretty, but that's a lot of fabric. With the way it drags behind, it'll be covered in dirt in no time. Thank goodness I'm here. Otherwise, we'd have had holes in clothes and dirty dresses.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: But of course, no look is complete without mane and makeup!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: So, uh... when are you gonna do her mane?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: You know what? Uh, I think we've given the designers enough guidance for today. Let's, uh, let them finish their work.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Uh, can't wait to see what y'all do for the big show tomorrow!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Hey, Applejack! On your way home? How'd the first day of the contest go?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Heh! Great! At first, I didn't think I'd be much help. But thank goodness I signed on! Without me, they'd be doin' all kinds of crazy fashion-y things!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Hey, Rarity! Applejack says the contest is going great! Good thing she's there, huh?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Yes, of course... Some of her thoughts are tough to swallow, but hopefully her candor will help the designers achieve the best designs possible.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Sure... Hmm.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: [sighs] Much better.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: [inhale, exhale] I can meet my goals. Today is a fresh start. Good morning, everypony! Time for final adjustments before the show!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: If buttons could convey sadness, you've done it.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: To me, they convey wakin' up an hour early just to button 'em all! And that's if you could reach most of 'em!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Heh. There you go! Now when it's cold, you just slide it on ya, and you're set. Like a poncho!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Um... poncho?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Ohhhhh. You used hoof-cross-double-over stitches! [chuckles] They're perfect!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Who cares if it's stitched perfectly? You don't need feathers on your head!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Gasp!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: My little sister tried to add some flair to her hat, and guess what it got her <U+0096> an extra hour of work pickin' apples off the ground!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: A good start, but it needs more. No. No. No. Yes!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I'd go with this one.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: No, this one!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Something is funny?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: What? Oh, no. Uh, it's just, I mean... Those belts look the same.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Well, that one completely changes the look. This one complements it.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: You're kiddin', right?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Is everything okay?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: They're havin' a heated debate about those two belts.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Ooh! Both good choices.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: No! There is no choice! They're the exact same belt! Ugh! This is so silly! Fashion is ridiculous!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: You don't mean that!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I do! I'm sorry, but that's my honest opinion!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Well! I never would've come if I knew we were going to be insulted!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: We go!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: No! Please! Come back!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: What? I was just bein' honest!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Stop everything! There is no show! Take it all down!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Rarity, what's going on? Is everything okay?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: No! It is the opposite of okay! The judges have quit! The designers have dropped out! The show is cancelled! All my good intentions squashed! [sobbing] And it's all Applejack's fault!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Why are you mad at me?! I was just sayin' what I thought! And isn't that why you wanted me to be a judge?! For my honesty?!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Of course! But you said fashion is ridiculous!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: But it's my opinion! And I'm not gonna lie!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Oh<U+0097>! [scoffs] Come with me!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Hello, Strawberry Sunrise. This is Applejack. I was wondering if you could tell her how you feel about apples.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: What?! Why?! They're crunchy, they're sweet, they're delicious.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: You're right! Apples are better than strawberries!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: [stammering] You'd better apologize!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Applejack, why are you so angry? It's just Strawberry's honest opinion. What's wrong with that?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Well, that's fine if she doesn't like 'em! But if she knew how hard we worked to make our apples perfect, maybe she wouldn't be so mean about<U+0097>! ...Ohhhhhhh... Oh, boy.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Mm-hmm. Doesn't feel so good, does it?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Nope. No, it does not at all. [sighs] I am so sorry, Rarity. I got so carried away with bein' honest, I guess I didn't think about how I was makin' others feel. [sighs] I'm a real rotten apple.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I appreciate that, Applejack. That means a lot. I just wish you'd realized it before you ruined the fashion show.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I need to get some of these.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: It's the only way to travel.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: What are you doing?!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Canterlot is that way.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Yup. But you're not goin' back to Canterlot yet.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Hey!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Whew... Listen, y'all. I thought I was just bein' honest when I said all those things. But somepony helped me realize I was actually bein' hurtful. So for that, I apologize.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Zo! You don't think fashion is ridiculous?!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Uh... Well, I, uh... I still don't understand it. But I appreciate how much it means to y'all and how much hard work you put into it. I also know this contest is important to Rarity. So what do you say?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Well, I'd hate to have come all this way here and not see what you can do.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Anything.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Show's back on, fellers!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: [grunting] Ahhh...

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Aah!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: ...And then, Applejack found me and told me to distract you for an hour. But the hour's up! Ta-da!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: B-B-But how?! They were all leaving. This was all coming down.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I don't think that word means what you think it means. But I did bust my tail because I know how much this means to you.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Ohhhhh! Thank you, Applejack.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: We start now!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: First up, Lily Lace!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Starstreak!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Inky Rose!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: And now, it's time to vote. I am drawn to the beauty and drama of fashion, and nopony does drama better than Lily Lace, so I vote for her.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Simplicity is the keynote of true elegance. That is why I vote for Inky Rose.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Fashion is the art! I, Photo Finish, vote for Starstreak!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Well, it all comes down to you, Applejack.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Can you believe it?! After everything that's happened, Applejack is the deciding vote! [screams] This is so exciting! Eeeeee!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Well, Applejack?

title: Honest Apple
dialog: [sucks air through teeth] Uh... Heh. U-Uh... Uh...

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Lily Lace's clothes go here, Inky Rose's will go there, and Starstreak's there.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Sorry, but I couldn't pick just one. They all did great, and in my opinion, they all deserve to win.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: And I agree. I told you your perspective would be beneficial.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Is, uh, this one of your new designs, Rarity? It's, uh... Uh, the form is... reminiscent of, uh... I mean, it conjures up images of... uh... well, uh... I-I mean...

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Oh, that? No! I totally messed that one up! It's ghastly! Horrid! Absolutely terrible!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Hah. Oh, thank goodness. 'Cause in my honest opinion... it's awful.

title: Honest Apple
dialog: Pffft!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: When you're right, you're right!

title: Honest Apple
dialog: I am relieved!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I know! I can't believe it either! The map has never called me before!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I'm sure that's not why she looks... like that.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I also wasn't nervous before, but now...

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Don't worry. For all we know, it's something small. Like maybe the cooks are fighting over who has the best butternut squash soup. Or the royal hairdressers are fighting over a comb.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Or, you know, maybe the royal sisters aren't seeing eye-to-eye on something.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: No! That's just crazy! Luna and Celestia would never fight. [beat] Again.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: So the map sent you to solve a friendship problem?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Yes, princess.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Well, there's nothing wrong here. Right, sister?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [sourly] No. Everything's perfect as usual, sister.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Psst! Pssst!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Twilight? Is that you? How are you here?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [quickly] I'm not. I'm still home. It's an easy spell. I'll show you later. Anyway, enough about me. I had to check on you. Not in a meddling kind of way! In a friendly "how's it going?" kind of way. So, how's it going?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [sighs] Not great. I think the problem might be between Celestia and Luna.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Oh, no, that's terrible! I mean, what makes you say that?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: You know how some ponies say nothing's wrong but you can tell something's definitely wrong?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [nervously] Noooooo... Heh.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: That's basically what the princesses did when I said there was a friendship problem. Only they did it more, you know, regally.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Oh, I wish I could help you, but I can't <U+0096> both for map reasons and because I have no idea! This is big! Like, really big! But I'm here if you ever need to talk. Or listen to music.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Heh. Comforting, right?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Thank you so much for breakfast, princess. I can't believe you cook it yourself.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Of course, Starlight! I really enjoy doing it. It's a small way to say I care.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Good morning, sister! Join us?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [sourly] Too tired. [chomp] Please excuse me.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Wow. Last night must've been really hard on her.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [sighs] Perhaps. But she is like this every morning.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: So I think Luna may be hurting her sister's feelings without even realizing it.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Poor Celestia. That's so sweet that she makes her sister pancakes every morning.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: She's your mentor. I think you might be biased.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Fair enough. So what are you gonna do?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Nothing, yet. I have to get all the facts. I asked Luna if I could spend some time with her this evening.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Good luck, Starlight!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Wow, Princess Luna. You do this every night?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Lavender's calming scent is known to aid dreamers in achieving a restorative sleep.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [sniffs] That's so thoughtful!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I try my best to make sure the ponies in this castle sleep peacefully.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [laughs] Oh, you really are a card!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [sighs] But as always, my sister is too busy having fun with dignitary ponies to acknowledge anything I do. Hmph!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: So, both princesses are hurting each other without realizing it. And instead of talking about it, they're just getting colder and more distant.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: And they're Celestia and Luna. So it's not like you can just confront them.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Actually, that's exactly what I was gonna do.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: What?! Are you crazy?! I mean, heh, you do whatever you think is best. This is your mission.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [sarcastically] Gee, thanks for believing in me, Twilight.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I do. But the last time the princesses fought, Luna turned into Nightmare Moon, and Princess Celestia had to banish her for a thousand years! That can't happen again!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Well, I can't do nothing. The princesses aren't the best at communicating with each other.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [gasps] Sorry. It's just, you said "princesses" and "aren't the best" in the same sentence, and it's making me nervous!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I'm not much help, am I?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: No!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Wow. I almost feel bad eating this. It's adorable.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Like I said, I enjoy this part.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [sourly, mouth full] Hi.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Uh, Princess Luna! Wait! [deep breath] As you both know, the map sent me here for a reason, and I... think I found out what it is.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Really? Oh, that is wonderful, Starlight! What is it?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: You two.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Excuse me?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [simultaneous] I beg your pardon?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I think you're accidentally hurting each other's feelings without realizing it. Princess Celestia, does it bother you that Luna never notices the wonderful breakfasts that you prepare for her?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Uh... Y-Yes. It does.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Princess Luna, tell Celestia how you feel about the fact that she never acknowledges the work you put into lining the hallway with lavender every night.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I... Well, I... I-It's not the best feeling. [to Celestia] I'm sorry I never noticed that you make fruit faces on pancakes, but nights are long for me. You might be a morning pony, but I am half-asleep.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: You think I don't get tired? I'm exhausted! Oh, I apologize for not noticing flowers in a wall sconce. But by the time I get to retire for the night, I can barely see straight! Even so, I still make an effort to smile!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Like smiling is so hard.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I-I-I'm sure that's not what Princess Luna meant to say.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Is that what exhausts you? Smiling and being adored by everypony?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: And you have it so much worse, do you?! You've spent your evenings flitting around giving ponies lovely dreams! Oh, it sounds just awful!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [chuckles] Okay! I feel like we should step back, take a deep breath...

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Don't presume to know what it is like to govern the dream realm!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: And yet you know exactly what it's like to be me?! Oh, please!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Enough!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [gasps] What have you done?!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I... went with my gut?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Switch our cutie marks back this instant!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: My apologies, your majesties! But I can't, even if I wanted to. The spell lasts twenty-four hours. I-It may have been extreme, but, uh, I think it's still a good idea?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [serious] What?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Y-You said it yourselves! Neither of you believes your sister knows how hard it is to be you. So this is your chance to prove it.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Well, I could use an easy day followed by a good night's sleep.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: You can try. I haven't had an easy day in, well, ever! But now, I get to sleep, and tonight will be a breeze. All right, Starlight Glimmer. We will do this.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I'm gonna stop talking now.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [hyperventilating] You switched their cutie marks?! The actual princesses' cutie marks?!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [groans] I thought we moved past this. It was the right call! I hope.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I-I'm good! Just, uh... reading an exciting book! [whispering to Twilight] He's gonna think I'm nuts!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: He's not the only one.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: As you can see, Celestia and I are switching places today.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I assure you, I am more than capable of handling all of Celestia's, heh, duties. Dismissed.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: So, what is first on my dear sister's to-do list?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: It says you have a few public appearances. Store openings, judging the royal rose contest... You know, that sort of thing.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [chuckles] Oh, I knew today would be easy, but I didn't think it would be that easy.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: "Princess Luna Unhappy with Student Fundraiser"? But I wasn't unhappy!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Um, you are scowling.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Well, I-I didn't mean to! I've been smiling all day! My cheeks hurt! I stopped for one second! And that's when he took the picture!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Guess smiling all day isn't as easy as you thought?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: It says here that, because of me, the school didn't raise enough funds to go on their field trip! I-I didn't mean for that to happen!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I know. But you can't dwell on that now. According to the list, some delegates are about to arrive for a luncheon. You need to dispel rumors of timberwolves in the White Tail Woods. The nearby towns have been in a state of panic for weeks.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: B-B-But I have to fix this!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: You can't. You need to put on a brave face and help these ponies. It's what Celestia would do.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [deep breath, shouting] Hello! Great news! There are no timberwolves!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I'm sorry. But I couldn't stop thinking about those poor students. Normally, I have all the time in solitude I need to work through my problems at my own pace.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Well, your sister doesn't get that luxury.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Ready for the town hall?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: You made it to the end of the day. Yay?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Oh, hello, Starlight. I don't know about you, but I feel very well-rested. Where's Luna?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Um, uh, she already turned in for the night.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Did she now? It seems my duties were harder than my sister expected.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Moon raised! It's even easier than raising the sun. [chuckles] What's next?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: All right. Everypony's asleep. You're talking to yourself, Celestia. Heh. But there's nopony else to talk to! [chuckles] Yet. I can talk to ponies in their dreams!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Now, to save some ponies from their nightmares. Which aren't real, so it shouldn't be too hard, right? Right. Good call, Celestia! And I'm talking to myself again.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [screaming] Ugh! No!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: This is big! Like, really big!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Starlight! I'm here now. Tell me what's wrong.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [panting] Going with my gut was the wrong call! I was supposed to bring you two closer together! But I've only driven you apart! If you two can't see why you need each other, then<U+0097>!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Don't worry, Starlight. I know how to handle Nightmare Moon.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: This can't be!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: No! I'll never turn into you!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: That's not true! Even when we were apart, I knew I needed her!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: No, you can't do that! Day, night, sun, moon <U+0097> Equestria needs both of you!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Without balance, there's no harmony!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: You can't get rid of me so easily, sister! Unless you plan on smiling me to smithereens!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Enough!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: This is all my fault! I never should've gone on this mission! Now Equestria is doomed!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [through teeth gaps] I don't...!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I mean, I do!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Celestia! I'm so glad you're...!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [speaking normally] I've seen a lot, but I haven't seen this before.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: It's Starlight Glimmer's. She's afraid this is what will happen if we continue to fight!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [sobbing] What was I thinking?! I'm never going with my gut again!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: If you don't fix this soon, it could have a grave consequence on Starlight's psyche.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: But my magic isn't powerful enough! I thought if we worked together...!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I have your magic, remember? It doesn't work in the dream realm. It has to be you!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Oh, Luna, I can't do this! I was wrong! Your job is so incredibly hard! You have to battle nightmares and work in the darkness and do it all alone! It takes such a brave, strong pony to do what you do!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: And that pony is you. I walked a day in your shoes. I thought all you had to do was smile and be adored all the time, but I was wrong. There is so much more to it than that.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [screams] Ugh!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Don't do this to each other!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: In order to defeat Daybreaker, you need only to trust in your strength as I do.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: No, you're not! You are not real, and you will never exist again!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: You did it!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Only because you were here. I don't know how you do this alone.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: So, um, did you talk to yourself?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Um, a little.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Is this really happening, or is this still a dream?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Welcome back, sister! I know you had a long night, so I made you some pancakes!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Oh! Heh. H-How... eh, nice. Ahem. [chews, gags, gulps] They're... delicious. Heh. Thank you.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [laughs] I know that face! They're not. I know you have to be perfect for everypony else, and you do an amazing job. But you don't have to do it for me.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: In that case, they are terrible!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I know!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [sighs] But it means a lot that you tried. I love you, sister.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I love you too.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: So... this was real. [yawns] Or... was it not real, and this just happened now and-and not in my dream? I'm so confused.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [laughing] It's all real. It was the right call going with your gut.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: The map was wise to send you, Starlight. Nopony else would have been so bold as to do what you did.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: That's a nice way of saying I came dangerously close to messing everything up.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: It was just what we needed. The experience has made us closer than ever.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Wait. I'm not doing this.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: I believe that one means your mission is complete.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Wow! I can't wait to tell Twilight!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: [quickly] I already know! I mean, I don't know everything. I just got here to bring you your toothbrush! So this is just a friendly visit! Not interfering because I was worried! I wasn't! I knew you could do it, and I'm so, so, so, so, so proud of you! Tell me everything! Start from after I hyperventilated, and don't leave out any details!

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Oh, uh, by the way, there's a field trip you need to make happen and a <U+0096> ahem <U+0096> timberwolf issue you need to address.

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: W-What?

title: A Royal Problem
dialog: Oh! Look! There's the sun! Time for me to turn in!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Oh, wow! Oh, my gosh!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Oh-my-gosh-oh-my-gosh-oh-my-gosh-oh-my-gosh! Oh-my-gosh-oh-my-gosh-oh-my-gosh! Sorry, Applejack!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Twilight! Twilight! Where are you?!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: I'm in here, Pinkie! What is it?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: You'll never guess what I just got!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Is everythin' okay? We heard a lot of "oh-my-gosh"-in', and we weren't sure if it was a good thing or a bad thing.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: A good thing!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [reading] "To pink pony who lives with baked goods." It's from the yaks! [reading] "Yaks cordially invite pink pony to Yickslurbertfest. Come. Now."

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Prince Rutherford is officially inviting me to Yickslurbertfest in Yakyakistan!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: What is Yickslurbertfest?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: It's a sacred yak holiday. How did you get Prince Rutherford to invite you?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: I subtly hinted for an invitation in my letters to him.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [voiceover] May I please come to Yickslurbertfest? Pretty please? Pretty please? Pretty please? Pretty-pretty-pretty-pretty-pretty please?!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: You know, we still don't know a lot about the yaks. So I think you should definitely go to Yickslurbertfest, Pinkie.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Fostering friendships is what ponies do.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: I won't let you down! It's an honor to be the official friendship ambassador to the yaks!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Um, that's not an official position.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yet. You're the princess of friendship. [singsongy] You can make it happen.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Okay, you got it.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Ahem? You have to make it official!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [sighs] Right. I hereby make Pinkie Pie the official friendship ambassador to the yaks!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: This is officially the most exciting day of my life!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yoo-hoo! Gummy! Pay attention! We're in the middle of an official friendship ambassador road trip game!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: That's better. Okay. I spy with my official friendship eye something that is blue!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [gasps] We're here! Oh, and by the way, the answer was sky. I win!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yeah, I know. That was a hard one, Gummy. You're the best official friendship travel companion ever!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: What is going on?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yaks destroy!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yikes!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [laughs] Pink pony!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: It's an honor to [grunts] be here, prince. Uh, did something terrible happen? Is Yickslurbertfest cancelled?!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: No! This Yickslurbertfest, where yaks come together to stomp.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Ohhhhh. I didn't know that was part of the sacred holiday. So this angry display of destruction is part of the festivies. Huh. And here I thought you yaks were just in a bad mood.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: No. Stomping relaxes yaks. [grunting] Yaks' head never been so clear.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Stop!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Pink pony better check self before wreck self. That is century-old sacred yak twig, passed down from generation to generation.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [gasps] Oh, no! I'm so sorry! I was just trying to get into the spirit of Yickslurbertfest. [distressed noises] Maybe I can fix it!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Phew! Oh, you sure did, Prince Rutherford. [chuckles, to Gummy] That was a close one, Gummy! This trip has to be perfect! After all, we're not just visiting as friends. We're on official friendship ambassador business!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Less talking, more stomping!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Stompie-stompie-stompie-stompie!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Now, I take pink pony on Yakyakistan tour.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Thanks, Prince Rutherford, but, heh, I've been to Yakyakistan before.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yak know. But thought pink pony might not recognize town since decorated for Yickslurbertfest.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Oh, yaks not just have eye for decorating. Yaks also amazing builders!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [gasps] No way! I thought you hired professional contractors!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Here. Uh, let me help you with that.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: This ceremonial yak fire pit, where yaks tell stories.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Oooh! I have so much to officially tell the ponies when I get back.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: This yak eating hut. Hut where yaks eat.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [slurp, chomp, gulp] Mmmm! The perfect balance of vanilla extract.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yak sleeping hut. Hut where yaks sleep.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Huh!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yak music hut. Hut where yaks enjoy beautiful music.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: This is beautiful and<U+0097>!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Shhh! Pink pony ruin with talking!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: ...And that how yaks defeat evil and save world!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [claps, in deep voice] Pink pony like yak story!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Ho-ho! Yak impressed! Pink pony can almost be honorary yak.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [speaking normally] Official friendship ambassador and honorary yak?! [squeals] Pink pony's title card is full! [in deep voice] Horn bump! [speaking normally] Oh, wait! I don't have a horn! [gasps] Prince Rutherford, can I get some honorary yak horns?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: No. Yak horn too heavy for small pony head.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yickslurbertfest stomp time!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Stomp harder! Yaks extra happy! Ponies and yaks friends!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Is this part of the festival?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Pink pony ask too many questions.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Everything is buried in snow! What are we gonna do?!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Uhhh... Y-Yaks fine! Snow falls from mountain all the time!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: All the time?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Every Yickslurbertfest.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Okay. Avalanches like this completely bury all your homes every Yickslurbertfest? Really?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: This is... big avalanche. But not a problem, for yaks are tough! Yaks dig through snow! Won't take long.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Oh, good. You have an emergency plan in place.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Here, let me help!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Whew. I'm tired. We must be almost done. There's still snow everywhere?!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yaks keep digging!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yaks stop digging! Make situation worse!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Okay. Don't worry, Prince Rutherford. I'll go back to Ponyville and ask for help. Twilight and the others will be happy to come dig the snow away. After all, "many hooves make light work." Right, Gummy?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yaks no need pony help!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Oh. Well, I'm sure it'll be okay, 'cause you probably have a Plan B.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yes. Yaks wait for snow to melt.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: All this snow?! It'll take a thousand moons before it melts!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yaks known for their patience.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Well... be that as it may, in the meantime, what will you eat? Where will you sleep?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Dah! Yaks can make this work! Hardship make yaks the strong yaks that yaks are! If pink pony disagrees, then she can leave Yakyakistan and never return!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [yelps] Uh, of course pink pony agrees with you! [nervous chuckle] Hey, let's try out some snow recipes! [grunting] Snow cakes! Snow spaghetti! Snow sandwiches! [nervous chuckle, chomp] Mmmm! Yaks can make this work!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [yawns] Yak tired. Yak retire to new sleeping hut.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [gulps] Snow cake good!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [chomp, gulp, shiver] Mmmm! Just the right balance of cold and water!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Aah! Stop! Yak eating new eating hut!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [whispering] Psst! Prince Rutherford. What are we doing?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: It's obvious. This new music hut.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Oh. So we're swaying to<U+0097>

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Shhh! Pink pony ruin snow music with talking!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [gasps] Gummy, did you hear that? They can't make it work!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yaks stop swaying! Music over!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: If Twilight and the others knew what was going on, they would be here to help in a pony's heartbeat. We have to convince Prince Rutherford that asking for help is okay. Will you help me, Gummy?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Thank you! And see? Asking you to help wasn't hard at all.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Pink pony has gathered you around the new ceremonial yak fire pit to tell you a story! A yak tradition, right?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yay! This is a story about a group of... uh, goats!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [voiceover] Who lived in the desert. There was a sandstorm, and their entire village was buried in sand. There was nothing they could do. They knew they could not survive by only eating sand...wiches!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [giggles] Get it?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: ...Okay. Anyway...

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [voiceover] Finally, the goats' brave, wise leader <U+0096> let's just call him Prince... uh... Drutherford [giggles] <U+0096> decides that they couldn't do it by themselves. So he asked the neighboring town of, uh, Bovineville to come help them. [giggles] Yeah! Cows! The magical cows helped the goats, everyone survived, and lived happily ever after!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Because they asked for help. The end!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: So what is the moral of that story? Is it <U+0096> A <U+0096> asking for help is okay? B <U+0096> asking for help saves the day? Or <U+0096> C <U+0096> asking for help is good for everypony?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: D <U+0096> goats weak and horrible! Magic bovines need to stay out of goats' business!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Um... [nervous chuckle] Not quite. Any yak wanna shout out another answer?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Hey, Prince Rutherford. I wanna talk to you about something. Uh, what are you doing?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Uh, yak's snow bed got a little melty last night.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Okay, yeah. That's what I wanna talk to you about. You know, these yak snow beds are the fluffiest I've ever slept in. They're so comfortable, you forget that it's just a cold block of ice. And the yak snow sandwiches? Mm-mmm! I hate it when food burns your mouth or overwhelms it with flavor!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Ah! Yak hates that, too!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: You know who would really, really enjoy these snow sandwiches? Twilight Sparkle and the other ponies! Oh, hey! I have an idea! Why don't I go to Ponyville and bring them back here?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Ponies like snow sandwich?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Oh! Ponies love snow sandwiches! And hey, while they're here, you can ask if they'll clear the snow away. Fun, right?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: When prince was little yak, prince stomped on ground too hard. Made deep hole and fell into hole. Ice froze over hole. Prince waved to friends and family from inside frozen hole. Waited for spring thaw. Prince survived on own.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: W-W-Wait a minute. You spent the whole winter in a hole?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yes. And yak never asked for help!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Okay. First of all, how did you make such a deep hole from stomping? And how did it freeze over so fast? And how could you see your family and friends to wave to them from inside a frozen hole? Even if all that was possible, how did you breathe in there?!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yaks don't ask for help!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: But the yaks are hungry! And who knows when the snow will melt? I just don't understand why<U+0097>

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Ah, yes. Is clear now that pink pony does not understand yaks. Honorary yak status rescinded! Bang! Pretend there is door! I just slammed it!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Fine! Be stubborn!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [groans] Those yaks are so stubborn! They refuse to ask for help, even though they need it! Well, this official friendship ambassador is gonna take matters into her own hooves! I'll show them!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [sighs] You're right, Gummy. I am too worked up. Road trip game would officially calm me down. I know! Let's play Twenty Million Questions! You think of something, then I'll ask you twenty million questions until I can come up with what you're thinking of! Let's go! Is it blue? Is it green? Is it red? Is it greenish-red? Is it reddish-blue? Is it bigger than a bread box? Is it smaller than a bread box? Is it a bread box? Is it bread?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: ...Is it teeth? Is it Granny Smith's dentures? Is it you? Is it a rooster? Is it a red rooster? Is it a red rooster eating corn? Ah! Used up all twenty million questions! Oh, well. We're here anyway.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Official pony balloon still here? Pink pony gone because pink pony not tough like yaks! Horn bump in agreement! Now!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [chomp, chewing] Pleh! Snow sandwich lose novelty! Snow couscous for dinner!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Then Prince Rutherford said, [imitating Prince Rutherford] "Bang! Pretend there is door! I just slammed it!"

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Pinkie Pie<U+0097>

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: So then pink pony said, [high-pitched] "Fine! Be stubborn!"

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Pinkie Pie, we have to help the yaks.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: So in conclusion, we have to help the yaks!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Hmm?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Just go with it, hon.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Great idea, Pinkie. We'll be happy to help the yaks. This is what friendship is all about.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Hey! I'll bring apples. This season's batch are extra juicy.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: And I shall provide the yaks with Equestria's finest textiles. They'll be silky and warm with hints of gold to complement their horns<U+0097>

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Stop! We can't bring the yaks any pony stuff!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Why not?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: The yaks are very proud. They won't ask for help. You know what they say <U+0096> "you can lead a yak to water, but you better not let him know you're doing it."

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Nopony says that. Do they?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Okay then. This'll be an official covert friendship mission.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: You got it!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Is it yellow? Is it slimy? Is it slimy yellow?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: We're not playing that!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: These walls are high. Sneaking in will not be easy.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Or it's super-easy 'cause I'm awesome.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Go ahead! I'll catch up! You all know what to do!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [yawns, gasps] What happened?!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [laughs] Yaks tough! Yaks wait patiently! Yaks win!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Hoo-wee! Helpin' to fix an entire yak village sure takes a lot outta ya.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Let's get out of here before<U+0097>

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Oh, pink pony!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [nervous gasping] Just play it cool! [to Prince Rutherford] We didn't help fix Yakyakistan! [nervous chuckle] No, no! We're just here for the snow sandwiches! But then we got here, and the snow was gone, so we thought we'd hit a diner on our way back to Ponyville! Bye-bye!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Wait. Yak not mad at pink pony.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yak not?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Pink pony help yaks without yaks asking. Means pink pony understand yaks.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: I do? Huh! I do!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Pink pony the best kind of friend. Officially honorary yak!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yippee! My own honorary yak horns! Now I can officially horn-bump! Whoa!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Yeah... You know, this is a little heavy for my small pony head.

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [chuckles] Need some help with that, Pinkie Pie?

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: [deep voice] Pink pony no need apple pony's help! [giggling and snorting, normally] Just kidding! Pink pony got apple pony good!

title: Not Asking for Trouble
dialog: Seriously, this is heavy.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Care for a carrot-ginger sandwich?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh! You remembered to cut off the crusts for me.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Of course I did. I know how you like them.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: You really do make the best finger foods.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: What do you say?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [scoffs] I really can't take them anywhere.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Can I trouble you for another sugarcube?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh, no. I'm so sorry, but I seem to be out.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Well, I can just pop us in some more.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh, that's all right. I need to go to the market anyway. I have to restock my pantry for our tea party next week.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh. I never realized how much work you put into hosting these tea parties.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh, it's really not that much.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: No, no, no, no, no! I've been taking advantage of your hospitality for far too long. It's high time I do something about it. What to do, what to do...

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: I've got it! Why don't I host the next tea party at my place?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Are you sure? I wouldn't want you to go through any trouble.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Then count me in. I'm already looking forward to it.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Me, too! I'm so excited! I can't wait! No, really, I can't! How about we have the tea party tomorrow afternoon?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Sounds good to me. You know, Discord, I've never been to your house before.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Well, that's okay, because I've never hosted a tea party before.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh! I've never hosted a tea party before! So much to do! [sips tea] Thank you so much for the tea and nibblies, but I really must be going!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Uh, Discord? Before you go, would you mind helping me tidy up?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: There you go. Back to normal, just the way you like it. See you tomorrow!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: I can't wait!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Okay. Since Fluttershy always goes out of her way to host the perfect tea party for me, how do I make my tea party for her even more perfect?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Actually, madam, I'm talking to myself.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: It's for Fluttershy!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: You don't have to tell me that. She gave us a chance when no other pony would.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Of course! I should get her the best of everything. Why didn't I think of that? ...Well? Are you going to answer me or not?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Excuse me. Is this where Fluttershy usually buys her tea?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh, wonderful! I'll be enjoying her company tomorrow, so I will be needing your very best tea, please. Something especially special.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [chuckling] Oh, interesting. Does it decorate your hips in roses or turn you green?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: How boring. Pass. Hold on! Ginseng tea! Now that sounds promising. What does it sing? I'm partial to something upbeat and jazzy.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: So... all of this is just tea you simply drink?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [laughs] Singing ginseng! I'll take it!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Well, of course we're friends! She gets me, and you obviously do not! [imitating "Jasmine Leaf"] "Are you sure you're friends with Fluttershy?" [scoffs] The very nerve!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: I'm sorry. Do you validate?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Hello!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Yes, you can. Your finest tea set, please. I want only the best for my friend Fluttershy.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Yes... judgy... clerk... pony! Why is it such a surprise? Sure, she's on the quieter side, and I'm a bit, well, more showy. But I'll have you know we're besties. And that's why I need the [echoing] best tea set!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: A teapot that just pours tea? How positively dreadful!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Now, let's see. I have the perfect tea and the perfect tea service. What else do I need for the perfect tea party? Oh! Decorations, of course!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [chuckles] Better. Oh! I'll need napkins. I'll simply make them... ah, well, I could... or... No. I've got nothing. How do I make these better? What should I do? Make them... [gasps, snaps fingers] Make them glow! Oh, that's not good enough for Fluttershy. Should I make them fly? Glow, fly, and [chuckles] and fold! Glow, fly, fold into fun shapes, perhaps?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Uh, Discord? Are you okay?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Pinkie Pie! Just the pony I need. [snaps fingers] As the party pony and Fluttershy's close <U+0096> but not best <U+0096> friend, I need your advice. I'm hosting a tea party for her, and it has to be perfect. No! It has to be even better than perfect!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh, Discord. You're waaaaaay overthinking things. All you have to do is make Fluttershy feel comfortable. It should be pretty easy for you. You know her so well!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: And that's why you're the party expert. Thank you, Pinkie Pie. I feel so much better now.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Eh, it's what I do.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [to Cherry Fizzy] Excuse me! Where can I find the glowing, flying, self-folding napkins?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Make Fluttershy feel comfortable, make Fluttershy feel comfortable, comfortable, comfortable... Well, I mean, that shouldn't be a problem.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh, dear. That might be a problem.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Maybe it's not as bad as I think. Maybe Fluttershy would be comfortable having a tea party here.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Maybe I just need another set of eyes on this. What do you think?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: That bad?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: What to do, what to do, what to do... Oh!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Got it! We know Fluttershy, and we know what she likes. First of all, we need to get rid of all the new stuff.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Enjoy your all-expense-paid trip around Equestria!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Well done, everybody, but there's still more work to do.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: We need to make this place more Fluttershy and less, well, me.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: And I'm almost certain she likes stairs...

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: ...that lead somewhere.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Phew!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Thank you!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: But we're not done yet.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Mm-hmm.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Okay, let's give these conversation cards a whirl. [clears throat, reading] "It is very nice to see you today." "Have you read any good books lately?" "Your garden looks positively lovely."

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Huh. Quite strange. For the first time in my life, I don't feel quite strange. In fact, I feel... completely normal. Everything is finally perfect for Fluttershy.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Discord! I'm so excited to finally see where you live!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: G-Greetings, friend. Please do come in.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: I can't wait to see how... uh... Oh.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Is something amiss?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Um, no, no, not at all. It's just not what I expected. It's quite... lovely.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Please have a seat.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Where is it?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Right here.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: I think you'll be quite pleased with the green tea I've selected for us today.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oooh! Does it actually turn us green? Is it really envious of the other teas? What's it do, what's it do?!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Uh, well, it tastes delicious.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh... Okay.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: What particularly nice weather we're having.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Yes... Yes, we are.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [sips tea] It did rain the other day, however.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Uh-huh...

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: But the weather today is particularly nice. ...As I previously mentioned. Would you care for some milk toast?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Uh, Discord, you don't seem to be yourself today. Are you feeling all right?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Whatever do you mean?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Well, it's just... what you're wearing. And also what you're saying. And also the way you're saying it. And, um, pretty much everything else.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh, dear Fluttershy, worry not. I can assure you that for the first time, I'm feeling perfectly normal. Now, let me top you off.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oops! Butterfingers! How embarrassing.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Uh, what's going on?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: I have... no idea.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [gasps] Discord! You're starting to fade away!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Huh. Have you tried the scones? They're positively delectable. The secret is in the extra butter.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: What is wrong with you?! You're acting so normal, which is not so normal for you!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Well, whatever do you mean? This is just me being me.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: No, it's not! It's you being like everypony else!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Eeeek! The more you do it, the more you fade away! Of course! You're a creature of pure chaos! Being normal is destroying you!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [laughs] How interesting. That reminds me of something I heard at the market today.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Stop it! Please! You need to go back to being your not-normal normal self! Quick, Discord! Uh, do something chaotic before it's too late! Please!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Do something chaotic? I'll try...

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Ohhhh, that's not good...

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh, no! I tipped over that cup! That's pretty chaotic, right?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [whimpers] What if I... [chomping, mouth full] Oh, my! Talking with food in my mouth after taking a bite from every sandwich! [gulps] How wacky! Doing anything for ya?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [whimpers] Okay. Hmm. Maybe I need to start thinking like you. Ohhh... What would Discord do? Well, I guess he'd probably make another version of himself to bounce ideas off of.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: But one wouldn't be enough. He'd need more! Way more!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [to her reflections] Hey there, Fluttershys! Any ideas on how to Discord up this tea party? [higher-pitched] Hi, Fluttershy! Thanks for asking! First of all, you gotta redecorate this place. I mean, this is where Discord lives! And you're telling me there aren't any stairs that lead to nowhere? [speaking normally] On it!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Better... but it still needs something. Now, that's more like it!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [gasps] It's working! Okay, what else? Furniture on the ground? So predictable! Let's put them where they don't belong!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: And he'd have a chaise lounge that would actually chase you! Because he's funny like that! Bet you can't catch me!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oh! And Discord would have a special kind of tea! Like a ginseng that could really sing!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: And he'd serve it on a floating table! We never talked about it, but I'm pretty sure Discord hates gravity!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [laughs] Now this is exactly what I was hoping for!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: This is what you were hoping for? But this is the complete opposite of your tea parties.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: I wouldn't expect you to throw a tea party the way I would. We're different!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: I know. I was afraid that if you saw exactly how different we are, you wouldn't want to be friends anymore.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: What?! Why would you ever think that?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Because you and I don't make sense to anypony else.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: That may be true, but we make sense to me. I never would've thought to make singing ginseng before I met you. But you've opened me up to so many more possibilities and impossibilities. So I guess what I'm trying to say is I like you because you're so different from me.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: You do?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Of course I do, silly! Besides, what's discord without a little chaos?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [chuckling] Well! In that case, I certainly don't need to be wearing this.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Oops! [laughs] I forgot that I still had this on!

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [giggling] Now, about that tea party...

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: You know, your garden really is looking lovely.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Why, thank you for noticing. I also couldn't help but notice that you need a refill.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Gesundheit.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: It really is nice having you here.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: I'm happy to be here. And I really do like your place. Because it's so you.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Why, thank you, Fluttershy.

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: Now, how about we try some of those delicious-looking sandwiches?

title: Discordant Harmony
dialog: [chuckles] You read my mind!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Hmmm.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [gasps] Thank you! You must be new. I'm Apple Bloom.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Welcome to Ponyville!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Really? Why'd ya move back?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Huh. [chomps] This is delicious! [chomps] I can't believe I've gone my whole life without ever havin' this.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: How much?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Wow! Thanks, Mr. Grand Pear, sir! It was real nice meetin' you!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Glad you're back, sugarcube. Just in time for breakfast for dinner.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: I got the perfect topper for flapjacks at the market today.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [gasps] Pear jam?! What were you thinkin'?!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Quick! Hide it!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Huh?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: What's the big deal? It's just pear jam.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: The big deal is that there is a long-standing feud between the Apples and the Pears!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Eeyup!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Why?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Why?! ...Well, uh, a-actually, I-I'm-I'm not really sure. You have any idea, Big Mac?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Uhhh... nope.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Then I guess we should ask Granny?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Ask me what?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Uh, what goes better with apple fritter flapjacks <U+0096> caramel syrup or praline!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [blows raspberry] Praline.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [sniffs] Oh-ho-ho, that smells great, Applejack. I'ma go wash up for supper. Be right back.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Listen, sugarcube. Anytime Big Mac and I ever asked Granny about the feud or the Pears, she'd get so upset she couldn't talk. Best not bring it up.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: O-Okay, but that Grand Pear was really nice to me, even though I'm an Apple. I wonder what happened.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Me, too. But if we can't ask Granny, I don't know who<U+0097> We can ask Goldie Delicious! If anypony knows about the feud, it's the family historian!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: I'm in! What do you say, Big Mac? Siblin' trip first thing tomorrow?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Eeyup!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Now, that's how you make an entrance! Or is it an exit? [laughs] Well, anyway, it's so wonderful to see you three. To what do I owe the pleasure?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Well, Goldie, we were hopin' you could tell us about the, uh... feud with the Apples and the Pears.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Oh. Oh, dear. Well, does Granny Smith know you're here?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: No, ma'am. But I ran into Grand Pear yesterday, and he was real nice. Maybe the feud was a misunderstandin' or somethin', and we can fix it?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Oh, well, I don't know about that, little one. But if it's a story you're after, I suppose you have a right to know. Now, let's see, I got a stack of books here someplace... Oh! Apple Family History, Volume 137! Hmm, hmm... Here we are. "Feud with the Bears". I mean, "Pears". My eyes ain't what they used to be. A long time ago, Sweet Apple Acres wasn't the only farm in Ponyville. In fact, there was another one just right next door.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [voiceover] And so it went. Granny and Grand Pear were always at each other on who was the best farmer or who took better care of their trees. If Granny read to her trees at night...

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [voiceover] ...why, then Grand Pear had special blankets made for his trees so they wouldn't get cold.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [voiceover] In fact, all the Apples and the Pears were rivals to the core! The only Apple and Pear who ever got along were Bright McIntosh and Pear Butter.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [voiceover] Wait an apple-pickin' minute!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Bright Mac and Buttercup? Those are our parents' names!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Of course Buttercup was just a nickname your father gave your mother. Pear Butter <U+0096> well, that was her given name.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Are you sayin' our mother was a... Pear?!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: So we are half-Pear?!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: I can't believe it! How did we not know?!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Well, uh, nopony called your mother Pear Butter.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: And her cutie mark was a preserve jar, but pear butter don't look too much different from apple butter, so no clues there.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [sighs] Is there a-anythin' else you can tell us about them?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Anything else?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Hmm... I'd need Volume 138 for that.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: I'm sure I could wrangle it... in a, in a couple of days.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [sighs] That's all right, Goldie. It was... nice just to hear<U+0097>

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Ooh-hoo-hoo! I just remembered somethin'! Your dad and his buddy Burnt Oak would get in all kinds of trouble together as colts.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Burnt Oak? The firewood salespony? I haven't seen him in ages.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: He and your dad were thick as thieves back in the day. Y'all should talk to him.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: You're right. We're not here for that.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Uh, eeyup.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: So Dad was super honest! Apple doesn't fall far from the tree, huh, Applejack?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Did you know our mom, too?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Mrs. Cake?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Then let's go! Thanks, Burnt Oak!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Uh, would it be okay if we stopped by again sometime to hear more stories?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Mrs. Well, cinnamon sugar on toast! All three Apple siblings!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Hi, Mrs. Cake. We heard you and our ma used to be real good friends, and we were hopin' you could tell us a bit about her.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Mrs. Oh, I would love to. I never knew the right time to bring it up. But I'm so glad you came! [laughs] Uh, for starters, did you all know that it was your mom who convinced me to pursue baking?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: But isn't your name Mrs. Cake?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Mrs. Not always. Back when I was Chiffon Swirl, heh, I had no idea what I was supposed to do. But one day, your mom brought me some candied pears, eggs, flour, sugar, and vanilla, and told me to just be creative! Next thing I knew, I was whipping up pear upside-down cake, and I got my cutie mark! It was like she knew what I was supposed to do long before I did.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [to Apple Bloom] Just like you, sugarcube! Or rather, you're just like her!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Mrs. That was the first of many cakes for me, and Buttercup was with me through it all.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Mrs. [voiceover] She'd be my taste-tester, help with the decorating, and prep new ingredients. Over the years, I perfected my recipes. Your mom did so much for me. One day, I wanted to surprise her with a cake.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Mrs. [voiceover] Then Pear Butter told me the sweetest love story I have ever heard.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: I mean, I figured the Pears moved, but I didn't know all that stuff happened before with Granny and Grand Pear.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: It must've been really hard on our parents.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Mrs. Oh, it was.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Mrs. [voiceover] Pear Butter was devastated. But seeing no way out of it, she did what she had to do.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Mrs. [voiceover] Then Bright Mac did the most romantic thing I've ever seen anypony do.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: What?! What?!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [simultaneous] What?! What did he do?!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [simultaneous] Tell us! Tell us!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Mrs. We're gonna need one more pony to tell that story.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Mayor Mare, you knew our parents?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Not as well as Mrs. Cake, but I did play a part in their love story. The night before the Pear family moved, Bright Mac asked me to meet him at the edge of Sweet Apple Acres.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [voiceover] I had the honor of officiating your parents' secret wedding, and it was perfect. Bright Mac knew Buttercup wouldn't want a big splash.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [voiceover] Reminds me of somepony else I know.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [voiceover, chuckling] Eeyup.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [voiceover] So they had a special way to seal their vows.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: What is goin' on?! What's with all these here candles?!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: What are you talking about, married?! You two can't be married!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: I can't believe Grand Pear just up and left Ma like that! No wonder Granny never told us about any of this.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Mrs. These things are never easy.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: And it's hard to know when it is a good time.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: It seems to me that now's as good a time as any.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: To talk to both our grandparents.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Excuse me? Grand Pear?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: I'm Applejack, and this here's Big McIntosh. But you already know who we are, don't ya?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Did you really move to Ponyville just for a change of pace?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Then you came here because you're sorry and that you wanted to get to know us, too?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: It's in the past, Grand Pear. Oh! Can I call you Grand Pear-Pear?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Now where'd you all get to? I ain't seen hide or hair of ya's all day.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: We've been all over. Learnin' about our parents.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Guh... Y-You have?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: And our grandfather.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: So... you're back, huh?

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Findin' you and learnin' all about Mom and Dad, I feel like I found a piece of me I didn't even know was missin'.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Hearin' their story makes me feel closer to them somehow.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: I'm sorry. I should've told you all about 'em sooner.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Nothing's keepin' ya from us now. Let's not miss anythin' else.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Applejack's right. Welcome back, prickly old pear. Heh.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: Now that we're all together, there's somethin' we want to show you. Mom and Dad left us somethin' to remember them by. Come on!

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: [sounds of awe] It's beautiful.

title: The Perfect Pear
dialog: If anything's gonna make it through, it's apples and pears.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: Whoa!

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: Toola Roola, Coconut Cream, what are you doing?!

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: Both of you, stop!

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: ...So you see, friendship isn't always easy, but there's no doubt, it's worth fighting for.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: [humming and hmm-ing] No... Aha! Here it is.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: What is that?

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: Come on, Starlight, don't judge a book by its cover. This is the friendship journal my friends and I used to keep. It's filled with all the things we've learned, like: "Friendship isn't always easy, but there's no doubt, it's worth fighting for."

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: I'll judge a book by its cover just this once.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: Thanks for coming, everypony. I've got a surprise for you.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: What is it, Twilight? Do I need to prepare myself?

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: It's this!

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: Ugh, what is that thing? Why is it so smelly?

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: Wait a minute. [gasps] Is this our old friendship journal? I haven't seen this thing in forever!

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: Hoo-wee! It's lookin' a little, uh... overripe.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: I'll say!

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: There's a smushed apple in Applejack's lessons.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: Fluttershy's lessons are so small, you can barely read them.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: I, uh, wanted to leave room for all of you.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: I-I don't even know what this is.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: It is called calligraphy, darling. If you're going to make words, at least make them fabulous.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: Looks like you got a little aggressive with your friendship lessons, Rainbow Dash.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: What can I say? When I learn something, I learn it hard.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: [unimpressed] I found Pinkie's page.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: [giggles] Well, I am surprised!

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: That wasn't the only surprise.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: Ta-da! Starlight and I decided to make one for each of you!

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: That's amazin'! A perfect copy!

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: I learned the spell years ago when I needed to make copies of a certain<U+0097> [long pause] [clears throat] ...manifesto.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: [sniffs] Ahhh! Even better than a perfect copy.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: Oh, I'd forgotten all about this lesson.

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: [laughing] Remember this one from when I helped Daring Do? "Never underestimate the power of friends who always got your back."

title: Fame and Misfortune
dialog: Aww, Cheese Sandwich! Party cannon! Ah! Birth-iversary!

title: Fame and Misfortune
