dialog: I do wish Zecora lived in town. One shouldn't have to brave the darkest part of the forest for shampoo.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Do you think Photo Finish would want to take a picture of my mane?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Well, uh... Hmm...I'm not sure that your style is quite right for this particular photo essay. Photo Finish travelled everywhere in her search for the most beautiful of manes.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Even Yakyakistan?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Well, yaks don't have manes, per se, and I'm not sure their style is quite what she's looking for either.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Though at this moment, neither is mine.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Don't worry! Zecora will abso-tively be able to help!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I'm sure you're right.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Listen, spooky eyes! Why don't you take a picture?! It will last longer!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: On second thought, don't. Getting my picture taken in this state is what I'm trying to avoid!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Are you certain that's safe?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I'm sure they seem strange, but my methods are mine. After all, I've been doing this for quite a long time.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I'll have those cupcakes cleaned off in no time!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: You really should bake new ones.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Nah!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: For your mane, of course, just soap will do, so use my super-sudsy shampoo.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: You were right to be concerned. Manes are tricky, I have learned.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Oh! [scoffs] Tell me about it!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Cleaning is simple, but a magical fix could cause any number of troublesome ticks.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Really?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Oh, there are tales I could tell to make your hair stand on end. Horrifying, terrifying attempts to mane-mend!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Well, I do enjoy a good yarn, but I'm not sure I could take anymore mane fright today.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: There's the contagious frizz that spreads friend to friend, or the story of the infinitely splitting end!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Uh-huh, hmm, yes, well, very entertaining. Uh, thanks for the shampoo. Ta-ta!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Anything about curls that keep on curling until your whole body is one big curl?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: [laughs] There is one story I nearly forgot: of an Earth pony who needed to clean up her shop.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Wow! That's just what I have to do! Huh, weird.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Perhaps it'd be better if I were more clear. You can't clean up Sugarcube Corner from here.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Geez, Zecora, I can take a hint.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: With just a few drops, any mess you'll improve if you focus on that which you want to remove.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: It won't be hard to focus on the super-sticky celebration string. It's kinda the only thing you can see.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Zecora says it would only take a few drops, but I figured we should all chip in. Just in case! Remember to only focus on the party string. We don't wanna accidentally remove anything else.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: It's important that you know that I am not pointing hooves, but<U+0097>

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I don't understand. Is that you, Rarity? Why would you think to point your hooves at me?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Let's just say I understand why your shampoo hasn't made a splash in the marketplace.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Goodness, Zecora! You could at least pretend it isn't that bad!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I'm sorry, my dear, but there is nothing to say. You just took the wrong potion from here yesterday.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Oh, thank goodness! I thought maybe your shampoo had triggered early-onset mare pattern baldness!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: No, this lack of hair was put into motion when you mistakenly washed with remover potion.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: [laughing] Oh, what a relief! Well, if you could just whip up a cure, I'll be on my way. So much to do before the shoot tomorrow.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: As I mentioned before, there's no easy fix. Mane-mending magic's the trickiest of tricks.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: [mumbling] Sorry?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I doubt that your mane has left us forever. There is a chance we can fix it, I think, if we're clever.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: W-w-w-w-w-w-wait, there's, there's a chance?! You think?!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I need to focus if I'm to work any faster. One wrong ingredient spells utter disaster. You should go finish your list of to-dos. Keep your mind off of all of these mane-losing blues.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: [exhales] There's nothing to worry about. Zecora will have a cure before I've even finished my to-dos. But I don't know if I can even show my face looking like this!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Uh, sorry. I, uh, believe it was my turn, and I-I-I-I just need to pick up some<U+0097>

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Oh, so kind of you to say. I-I<U+0097>

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: N-Non-fabulous?!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Oh, thank you, Davenport. Um, perhaps I can pick it up once everypony leav<U+0097>

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I can't believe how differently ponies treat you when you can't command their attention.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Are you sure that's what happened?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Wait. You can't command ponies' attention because your mane's messed up?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: "Messed up"? Does this look "messed up" to you?!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Honestly! How hard is it to pretend it's not so bad?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Hard.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: If today is any indication of how ponies will treat me from now on, I can't simply wait to see if my mane grows back!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I'm sorry, Rarity. I'm sure nopony means to make you feel worse than you already do.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Didn't you say Zecora was working on a cure?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Yes, well, even if everypony isn't utterly indifferent to my presence, Zecora might not be able to fix this in time for the shoot. Can't you do a spell to restore some semblance of my mane?!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: The thing is, it's pretty much like Zecora said. Fixing manes with magic is<U+0097>

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Tricky! I know! I don't care! Make with the tricks!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Huh?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: This won't do! I need an actual mane!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: But it has to come from somewhere.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Oh, you can't just make a mane with magic. The results could be disastrous.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: More disastrous than this?!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: [sighs] I don't think there's anything else we can try.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: [panicked stuttering] B-But Zecora said there was still a chance!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: At last, Rarity, I have searched for so long! What I told you before was totally wrong!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Zecora, you found a cure? That's amazing!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: [sighs in relief] You mean I'll get my fabulous mane back in time for the shoot?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Oh, no. I'm afraid I can't fix it before the big shoot. But in time, the hair will grow back from the root. There's no magical cure to hasten us through it, unless you went backward in time to undo it.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Uh-uh. I think we can both say that's not a good option.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I have always believed that the right outfit can make up for any other areas that are lacking. But I will need your honest opinions. [nervous ta-da] How awful is it?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Oh, come on! Can't anypony pretend it's not bad?!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: We could, um, try.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Maybe...?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Well, if any of you have an idea how to make this disaster look good enough for Photo Finish's piece in Vanity Mare on the most beautiful manes in Equestria, [sobbing] I'm open to hearing it!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Is that all?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: No problem!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Hm?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I don't understand, Applejack. How is milking a cow going to help?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: That's just it. It looks like we hired a new milkmaid...

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: This is pretty close to my color as a young'un!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Just a little down-home ingenuity.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: It's a good idea, Applejack, but Photo Finish is looking for the most beautiful manes, not bonnets.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: This'll do the trick. Just you wait!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: [gasps] You know, this is really quite fetching!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Yes! Nailed it!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: ...Just not portable.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: There!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Oh, let's face it. I'll just have to call Photo Finish and cancel.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I think we all know how bad Rarity's been feeling, but I never thought she'd cancel her shoot with Photo Finish.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: You saw her mane, right?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: But it's Rarity. If anypony can turn lemons into lemonade, it's her.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I guess it's harder for her when she feels like the lemon.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Well, she's not a lemon <U+0096> she's our friend. And right now, she needs our support.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: [muffled] Come in.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Would you mind closing the door? I'm more comfortable in the dark.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Okay, Rarity, you've done just about enough sulkin'! Havin' a fabulous mane is a wonderful thing, but it ain't the only thing!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Yeah! And we're here to remind you how awesome you are, mane or no mane!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: [sighs] It's lovely of you to say, but it's hard to argue with cold, hard facts.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: What facts are those?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: That without my mane, I simply can't shine as I once did, and ponies treat me like the sad, invisible pony I've become.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Rarity, you're not invisible. You're our friend. A friend that started a fashion empire.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: A friend who made us all feel beautiful in her lovely creations.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: A friend who stuck by us, no matter what!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: A friend so generous that she once chopped off her own tail to help a sea serpent.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I know you lost some confidence when you lost your mane, but unlike your hair, confidence is something you can get back right now.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Goodness... You're right! The only pony behaving differently today was me! Besides, what doesn't shine from the outside in...

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Um, Rarity, what are you doing?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I'm preparing to shine from the inside out!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Awesome!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: It's my own fault. I shouldn't have bought flowers without asking Spoiled what she likes.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Um, uh... purple?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I have a solution!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Thank you. Although I'm afraid I missed my chance at Vanity Mare, which means I have quite a few lavender arrangements to spare.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Uh, is lavender purple?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Mm... The windswept look is very last-season. Perhaps you could set this up outside. It's sure to draw in the hoof traffic.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Photoshoot or no, you can always use a chaise!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Well, Rarity, if you wanted to shine from the inside out, I think this afternoon, you became the brightest filly in Equestria!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Oh, pshaw, Applejack. I'm simply making up for all the time I wasted feeling sorry for myself.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I don't know why you were so upset. Your mane looks awesome!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I'm just glad I have all of you to remind me that even if I accidentally use magical remover potion on my mane, I can look good on the outside as long as I feel good on the inside.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: How'd you end up using remover potion on your head, anyway?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: [gasps] Pinkie!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: If I had the remover potion this whole time, that means Pinkie must have the<U+0097>

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: ...shampoo.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Shampoo? Wow! That explains why our manes are all so bouncy and soft!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Uh, perhaps I'll fetch the rest of that remover potion.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Great! Hey, is there something different about you? New hoof polish?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: So you're sure? You're sure it's fully recovered?

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Yes, Rarity. It's been months. Your mane looks fine.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Oooh, look! It's the "Most Beautiful Manes in Equestria" issue of Vanity Mare! You should read it.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Oh, honestly, Pinkie? After all I went through, I'm not sure it even matters what mane graces the page<U+0097>

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Read it!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: But I... I cancelled the shoot.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: We had a little talk with Photo Finish.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: And explained just how beautiful we thought you were. Inside and out.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: While you were shining from the inside out, Photo Finish took a few pictures.

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: I don't know what to say!

title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
dialog: Luckily, you don't have to say anything. Your style speaks for itself.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Thank you so much, Zecora. I never would've found the crisscross moss without you.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Of course. I know where it grows, so it's not much to ask. Though retrieving it has been a difficult task.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Oh, but the oxen visiting Sweet Feather Sanctuary next week will surely appreciate it. It really adds a shine to their coat.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: There we go. Now, that wasn't so tough. Fluttershy, tell me, will this be enough?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Gee, I don't know. It's a pretty big pack. So maybe enough to fill up this sack? [gasps, laughs] Oh, my! You're rubbing off on me, Zecora!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Whoa. Whoa!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [screams] Oh, no, oh, no, oh, no!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Zecora, are you all right?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: No need to fret. I only got wet. At least now I can easily grab all the crisscross moss there is to be had.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [gasps] What's happening to you?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Honestly, it's hard to tell. But suddenly, I don't feel so well...

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Do you think it's serious, doctor?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: I can't believe a flower did this. I take back thinking it was pretty!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Tell me, doctor. What should I do? I've never heard of Swamp Fever, mind you.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Oh! Is there anything that can be done for such a terrible conundrum?!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Hmmm.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Zecora, this is all my fault! If you hadn't been helping me get the crisscross moss, you wouldn't have gotten Swamp Fever. I'm so sorry.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Fluttershy, you are not to blame. These things happen all the same.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: I refuse to accept that! There has to be somepony who can help you!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Oh. There's a healer of legend who never would fail. But I only know her from ancient folktales. Mystical and masked, she came in the night and cured everything from hoof cough to fur blight. What became of the healer, nopony knows, for she disappeared ages and ages ago.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: The Mystical Mask! Of course! My parents would tell me about her whenever I was sick in bed.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: There's so many accounts of her power to heal. She can't just be a legend. I think she's real.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: If that's who we need to cure you, then I'm going to find her! And I know just the pony who can help!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [pants] Oh.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Twilight? Twilight? Twilight! Oh, I'm so sorry to bother<U+0097> Are... Are you cooking?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Yeah! Spike and I are having a cook-off!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: My cauliflower bites blew her sweet potato muffins out of the water!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: I'm glad you're here, Fluttershy, because we're gonna need a second opinion about that.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [grunts, gulps, grunts, gulps] Um, they're both delicious, but... [quickly] Zecora-has-Swamp-Fever-and-there's-no-cure-and-it's-all-my-fault-and-the-only-pony-who-can-cure-it-is-the-Mystical-Mask-and-I-need-your-help-to-find-her!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Uh...

title: A Health of Information
dialog: So, what'd she pick? The cauliflower bites, right?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [sighs] That's the last book on ancient ponies, and still no mention of the Mystical Mask.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Hmm. Did we check the unabridged versions?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Yes, and the books on rare diseases, the books on rare plants, and the entire section on bog habitation.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Well, we might have to look through every book in the entire library, but I know we'll figure it out.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Oh.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [sighs] Another dead end. Have you found anything yet, Twilight?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Twilight?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Aah!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Goodness! Are you okay?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [sighs] I'm fine. Fluttershy, you know that I want to help Zecora. But I think we'd be a lot better off if we got some sleep. We've been at this for hours.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Oh, I'm so sorry. I didn't realize how late it had gotten.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: No problem. I'll grab you a pillow and<U+0097>

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Oh, no-no-no. I meant you should sleep. I can't rest until Zecora is healed.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: I understand how you feel, but I still think we'd have more luck if we tried again in the morning. Just promise me you'll take a break soon.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [not listening] Mm-hmm.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [yawns] Good night, Fluttershy.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [snoring] 9-by-13-inch pan...

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Twilight!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [awake] Nonstick pans!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [groans] What's all the commotion in here, ladies?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Sorry, but I figured out who the Mystical Mask is!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [gasps] You did?!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: All I had to do was cross-reference a book about masks with another book on ancient Equestrian healers, then use a third book to translate it all from Olde Ponish, and there it was! Zecora was right! The Mystical Mask wasn't just a legend. The Mystical Mask was Mage Meadowbrook!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [gasps deeply] The ancient sorceress from Hayseed Swamp? We studied her at Celestia's school! Are you sure?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Absolutely! Mage Meadowbrook wasn't just a sorceress. She was also a healer, and back then, healers wore masks so they wouldn't get sick themselves!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Fluttershy, I am so incredibly proud of you for using your research skills to figure this out! But Meadowbrook lived ages ago, and didn't she disappear?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Mm-hmm. But if we go to Hayseed Swamp, maybe we can find something she left behind! Something that could lead to a cure!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: It seems like a long shot, but I guess it's possible.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [grunting] We have to try! I've got a route all planned out, and on the way, we can check up on Zecora, and then<U+0097>

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Whoa, whoa, whoa. We're leaving now?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Of course! Every second we spend waiting is a second Zecora is coughing bubbles!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: But Fluttershy, you haven't slept! And that's a long journey!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: There's no use trying to talk me out of this, Twilight! [grunts] We've got no time to waste!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Can we at least grab some breakfast?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: I packed cauliflower bites.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Aw. No sweet potato muffins?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: And that's when I realized the Mystical Mask was actually Mage Meadowbrook!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [coughs] That's marvelous, Fluttershy. I am quite impressed. While you are gone on your journey, I'll try not to be... worried.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [gasps] Oh, no. Zecora, you didn't rhyme! You must be getting worse.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [gasps] That's it! We have to go now!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Lead the way, Fluttershy.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: So... [chuckles nervously] where do you think Meadowbrook lived?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [yawns] I'm not sure. Maybe there's somepony we can ask.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: I think we might be the only ponies here.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Wait! I recognize that tree! [gasps] Yes! This has to be it! It's just like the illustrations of her home!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Anypony who lives in a tree is okay by me.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Or we could try the handle.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [laughs nervously] It really blends in with the bark.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Easy to miss.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Wow. It looks like this place has been abandoned for years. [gasps] Twilight, look! It's the same kind of lilypad that gave Zecora Swamp Fever! Hmm. I wonder if Meadowbrook was looking for a cure for Swamp Fever, too. [gasps] Do you think she found it?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: I hope so, but let's not get ahead of ourselves.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: That's exactly what I'm talking about. You're making your excited squeaking noise!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Uh, I wasn't making my excited squeaking noise.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Scare ponies or rock creepily in the dark?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Likewise, but, um, may I ask, why are you in Mage Meadowbrook's home?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [gasps] You're related to Mage Meadowbrook?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Oh, my goodness, Twilight, we did it! Not only did we find Mage Meadowbrook's old house <U+0096> we actually found one of her descendants!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Honestly, I would not have guessed it.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Library?! Now we're talkin'!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Oh. Well... [chuckles] Libraries come in all shapes and sizes.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: This is good. It'll take us less time to go through everything.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [blows air, reading] "Today, my mom made me eat peas. Peas are yucky." And we can probably skip this one, unless she found a cure when she was a foal.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Wait! Listen to this! [reading] "Today, I tried again to brew an unsniffle elixir..."

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [reading] "It was the greatest feeling I've ever experienced, and I promise to dedicate my life to curing ponies all over Equestria!"

title: A Health of Information
dialog: So all we have to do is find those aggressive flash bees and get them to give us their honey! Of course, it doesn't say how she did that...

title: A Health of Information
dialog: What? Is my mane messy? I know I haven't slept in a while, but... [gasps] Oh, no! I've caught Swamp Fever!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Huh?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [slightly muffled] Are you sure these are necessary?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: What?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: I said, are you sure these are necessary?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Yes! I won't risk infecting you or Cattail!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: What you can't risk is getting any sicker! If you don't rest, your symptoms will only get worse!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Um, you don't know this about me, but I'm pretty good with animals. And besides, Dogtail<U+0097>

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Um, Zecora is counting on me. I have to help her, just like Meadowbrook helped her mother and all those bayou ponies long ago!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: But Fluttershy, as much as Meadowbrook took care of other ponies, I'm sure she also took care of herself.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [strained] You're not gonna change my mind, Twilight!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Are you sure you don't want me to come with you?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Hello, flash bees! I was hoping I could get some of your honey.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Oh! I see. You don't let others have any. Well, I'm sorry, but I really need it.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [squeaks] I didn't want it to have to come to this, but I'll just have to use... the Stare!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [groans] What happened? Where am I?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [exhales] I'm so glad you're okay. You're still in Meadowbrook's tree.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Goodness gracious! [coughs] Have you heard from Zecora? Is she okay?

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Uh...

title: A Health of Information
dialog: She's already turning into a tree?! I thought we'd have more time!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Actually, you've been asleep for three days.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Three days?!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Mm-hmm. You were asleep so long, we were afraid you wouldn't be able to move when you woke up. But thankfully, you just wore yourself down!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Oh, dear. We have to get back to the hive! I've wasted so much time, and<U+0097>!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Cattail's right. I can't even use magic to calm them down. We'll have to find another way to get the honey.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: He's been through a lot these past three days.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Wait... Disguises...

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [gasps] That's it! I know how she did it! I know how Meadowbrook got the honey!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: This is how Meadowbrook got the honey from the flash bees!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: No. The male bees aren't aggressive around the queen bee, and this mask has the same stripes that she does.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Fluttershy, that's brilliant!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: There's no time to waste!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Hooves crossed!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: [coughs] Mind over matter!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Twilight... It's working!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: I think she's cured now, Fluttershy.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Ohhh, I do feel fine, and this honey is divine.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Oh, you're rhyming again! Welcome back, my friend!

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Thank you, Fluttershy, for all you endured. If not for you, I would not be cured.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Oh, if it wasn't for me, you wouldn't have been sick in the first place.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: Regret is not what you should feel, because on this journey, you've learned a great deal.

title: A Health of Information
dialog: That's true. I certainly learned that if you don't take care of yourself, you won't be able to take care of anypony else. In fact, if I had rested like Twilight had suggested all along, maybe I would have thought to use Meadowbrook's mask sooner.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Okay! let's see how your still life's comin' along, Kettle Corn!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Well, that certainly is... round.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: I'm afraid that's all the time we have today. We'll try somethin' else tomorrow.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: And on the way to figuring out what you're meant to do, you'll find a ton more stuff you like. That's what makes looking for your cutie mark so great.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Sorry, everypony. We're closin' up shop. We'll have to help you out tomorrow.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: I don't know if we can help them tomorrow. Working with blank flanks one at a time takes forever.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: If only there was a way we could help a whole herd of them at once.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: That would be perfect! We'd save time and they could help each other!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Just like we used to! Oh, but it'd have to be somewhere big enough to handle all those blank flanks.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Somewhere outside, with tons of activities to try.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Are you two thinkin' what I'm thinkin'?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Cutie Mark Day Camp!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: And I know just the place, Applejack used to go there when she was little.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Camp Friendship! Oh. Sorry. I thought we were all gonna yell that one too.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Attention, all blank flanks!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: And blank flank affiliates! Come to our cutie mark day camp to find out what you're truly good at!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Bond with other blank flanks and find out what you're meant to do together!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Hey, Rumble!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Oh, hey, Crusaders. Look, I can't stop. I've gotta meet my brother for... something.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: No problem. Just wanted to make sure you heard about our cutie mark day camp. The first session's tomorrow.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: What? Oh, nothing. Come on! I want to show you a new dive roll I'm trying.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Come one, come all! Cutie Mark Day Camp is for blank flanks of all kinds!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Welcome, cutie mark campers!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Who's excited to be here?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Well, we're excited too! At Cutie Mark Day Camp, you'll be able to try all kinds of things!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Kayaking!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Horseshoe-tossing!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: You can try 'em all! But the most important thing is that you'll be tryin' them together.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: That's what worked for us!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: I thought you said we were gonna go practice for the Wonderbolts Ponyville Extravaganza show.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: And we're glad to have you!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: U-Uh, Rainbow Dash is practically my sister, and she's a Wonderbolt too!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Do you know Spitfire?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: All right! Looks like we found the first activity of the day <U+0096> the horseshoe toss!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Come on, Rumble!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Step on up and show us how it's done!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Egh.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: [unenthusiastic] Whoops. Aw, it looks like I won't be getting my cutie mark in the horseshoe toss...

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Don't worry about it, Rumble. Hardly anypony finds their calling on the first try.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Eh, I wasn't worried.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Good! 'Cause there's a ton of other stuff to try. We'll find you something you're good at.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Whoops.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Whoopsie.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Whoops.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: [spits] [unenthusiastic] Whoops. I've tried it all. Time to tell my brother this Camp isn't for me.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Come on, Rumble. Isn't it fun just trying stuff?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Not really.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: That's what Cutie Mark Day Camp is all about.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Working together and helping each other.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Of course! Let's all meet right back here tomorrow.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Wow. I can't believe we got a cutie mark on the first day!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Yup. This camp was a pretty swell idea. Everypony's really enjoyed it.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: [sighs] Everypony except Rumble. He didn't have much luck with anything.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Trying to find out what you're meant to do can be frustrating. You remember how long it took us to get our cutie marks?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: [shivers] I remember the nightmares.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Well, we can't let Rumble quit camp just because he didn't find something he's good at then.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: We'll just have to convince him to come back and try harder!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Mm-hmm!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Hey, Rumble!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: What are you all doing here?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: We just wanted to apologize for not finding anything you liked today.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Oh. Whatever. It's fine.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: It's not fine. It's frustrating, and we know what it's like.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: I'm not frustrated!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: It's okay! We've all been there. But we won't give up on helping you.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: We know you'll get your cutie mark. Everypony does.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Actually, I don't need your help. Because I don't want to get my cutie mark!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: What?!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: I... I must have hay in my ears, because I thought I just heard Rumble say<U+0097>

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: You heard right! I don't want my cutie mark!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: [gasps] He said it again!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Not wanting a cutie mark is like not wanting to breathe!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Everypony wants to know what they're meant to do!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Hmph! Not this pony.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Why?!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Because cutie marks are silly, and... a-and they just force you into one thing your whole life!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: That's silly. Having a cutie mark doesn't mean you can't do other things.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Yeah! Our cutie marks are in helpin' other ponies with their cutie marks, but I still like makin' potions with Zecora.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: And when was the last time you did that?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Um... I-I-I think it was, uh... Well, we've been pretty busy helpin' other ponies lately.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Oh. You mean doing the thing you got your cutie mark for? The thing you're stuck doing for the rest of your life?!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Okay. Maybe we will be doing that more than anything else. But we love being Cutie Mark Crusaders!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Well, that's fine for you, but I'm not gonna be put in a box!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: A blank flank who doesn't want a cutie mark? That's gotta be the strangest thing I've ever heard.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Granny always says, "Some ponies have to find their own hay."

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Are you sure she didn't mean "find their own way"?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Oh. That would make more sense.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: I can't believe Rumble isn't interested in getting his cutie mark either, but we can't force him.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: And we've got a whole camp full of ponies who are interested in getting cutie marks.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Mm-hmm.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: [sighs] Here he comes. The fastest, most elite flyer in Equestria!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Whoa! [yelps] Urgh... I was gonna say me. You're not the only Pegasus in the family, you know.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: [scoffs] That camp is for losers who can't do anything.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: I'm not worried about that. I just don't want to get a cutie mark in any of their ridiculous activities.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Huh...

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: All right, cutie mark campers, that's it for jam-making!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: But this is fun, and I didn't get my cutie mark yet. What if I'm not good at anything else?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: You don't get a cutie mark just because you're good at something or even because you like it. There's more to it than that.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: So you can't get a cutie mark in something you like?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Now, we didn't say that.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: You don't have to!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Rumble, you came back!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Say bye-bye to painting circles. You'll be too busy haiku-ing from now on!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Come on, Rumble. That's not how cutie marks work.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: So that's how cutie marks work?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Am I speakin' Olde Ponish?! I just said it wasn't!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: "Cutie marks are great," they say Pfft, yeah, right! They make you special in your way But that special mark that's just for you Will erase the stuff you liiiiiiike... to do

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Rumble, stop! That's just not true!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: So you're good at charming snakes Too bad! Or you bake delicious cakes Oh, well! Maybe there are lots of things That you like to do Well, your options get pretty stark Once you got that cutie mark

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: You say there's nothin' you can do?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: A blank flank is the way for you It's no work to just be who you are No hunt to be some cutie star You're perfect just being you Don't bother with what you cannot do

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: ...are better Nopony to tell you who you have to be

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: ...are better Keep your spirit soarin' free

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: ...so why keep tryin'? If you like just bein' you Then keepin' that blank flank blank Is the thiiiiiiiiiing to do!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Whoopee!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Now wait just an apple-pickin' minute, Rumble. Where do you think you're leadin' our campers?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: They're not your campers anymore! I'm starting a new camp!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Everypony on this side of the line is in Camp Blank Flanks Forever!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Whoa-whoa! You can't be a blank flank forever!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: That's just the kind of talk I'd expect to hear from Camp Cutie Mark! Which is why blank flanks need a camp where we can enjoy being blank flanks and appreciate our blank flankiness without being pressured to get a cutie mark!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Now hold on, everypony.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Blank flanks forever!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: What just happened?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Has everypony gone mad?!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: In a word: yes.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: I just can't see what we did wrong. I thought everypony was having fun.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: They were until that Rumble came and made a mess of things. What are they doing now?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: It looks like whatever they want.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Honestly, it's not all that different from what they were doing here.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Then what was the point?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Point is that Rumble is a madpony who must be stopped!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Now calm down, Crusaders. We just need to talk to him again. The key is to remain calm.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: [yelling] Cutie marks... make you... special!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: By putting you in a special little box!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: [yelling] Special!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Box!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Come on, Sweetie Belle. I think you've "remained calm" long enough.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Kettle Corn, you covered your cutie mark?!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: You just haiku'd right then!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Don't let them get in your head! You're an open-ended question! Blank flanks forever!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Blank flanks forever! Blank flanks forever!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Whoa! You're cracking great!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Then you'll be stuck doing it forever! Blank flanks, no more potential cutie mark activities!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Well, Cutie Mark Day Camp is a bust.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: No, it isn't! It's a swell idea! We just can't seem to talk any sense into that... that Rumble.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Maybe we can't, but I bet I know somepony who can.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Well, that doesn't make a lick of sense. Unless... he was bein' bad at stuff on purpose!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Afraid of what?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: I don't understand. If Rumble wants to be a Wonderbolt someday, what's wrong with that?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Sounds to me like Rumble isn't afraid of bein' put in a box at all.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: It doesn't?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Nope. I think Rumble's already picked out a box. He's afraid he'll get a cutie mark that'll keep him from it.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: I don't know how to say this, Rumble, but Blank Flank Forever Camp is kinda...

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: If we wanna stay blank flanks, we can't risk doing stuff.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Attention, blank flanks of Cutie Mark Day Camp!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: The Cutie Mark Crusaders are pleased to announce today's special guest <U+0096> Thunderlane!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Anypony who's interested, gather 'round for a day of activities with a genuine Wonderbolt!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: All right, campers. It's time for our last activity of the day.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: A Wonderbolt obstacle course! Just like the one they'll fly through in their upcoming show!

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: But on the ground, since not everypony has wings.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Thunderlane, aren't you gonna run the course?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Since when?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: You do?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: That haiku pretty well sums it up.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Looks like Thunderlane was right about the obstacle course getting Rumble to come back over.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Hey, Rumble. Aren't you gonna do our Wonderbolt course?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: I'm cooking today. Maybe I'll do the course tomorrow.

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: So you're comin' back tomorrow?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: You're not worried about getting your cutie mark?

title: Marks and Recreation
dialog: Nah. I already know I'm a good flyer. It kinda runs in the family. I guess it's time to see what other stuff I can do.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Oh!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [belches, sighs] Aw, thank goodness. I thought I had too many deep-fried gems.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [mutters] It's from my parents! Spike, they won a zeppelin cruise and get to take the whole family! [sighs] I wish I had time to go with them, but there's just too many princess duties I have to take care of.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Come on, Twilight. Even Princess Celestia takes a break sometimes, and she raises the sun.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: You need a vacation! I can keep track of the friendship log, boost community morale, and answer fan mail for a few days.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: But, Spike, you're as much a part of my family as anypony. I can't just leave you here to do all that work.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [loudly] What?! I can't hear you! You're on vacation!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: I guess I could use a little time off from being a princess. You're the best, Spike!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: I know.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: I'm gonna go pack everything neatly into one suitcase!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Wait for it...

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [shouting] Cruises have activities, right?! I should probably make a schedule?!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: There it is.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Oh, I can't wait to get on this zeppelin and fly like a Pegasus!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Really? I remember you getting airsick on Admiral Fairweather's Wild Ride at Pony Island.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Oh, please! I grew out of airsickness a long time ago.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [over loudspeaker] I hope you ponies feel welcomed aboard, because you are!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Well, that was an... assertive welcome.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Wait. You don't know where this prize came from?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Well, I did categorize the ship's activities and make a schedule organized by each of our interests. Dad, you're easy. Bingo competition right here.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Shining Armor, they've got a tiny boat race in a tiny pool here.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Aw, sis. Only you would remember I love tiny things.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: And Cadance, there's a Peewee Princess Playtime here that Flurry's gonna love!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Oh, wonderful!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Eh. I just want to see you all have a good time. And this works out perfectly, because we have room for the one thing I wanna do! Our ship passes the Frozen North at sunset, which is the only time you can see the astrological phenomenon known as the Northern Stars. It's like the stars are shooting out of the setting sun!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Well, we definitely don't want to miss that.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Then it's settled. Hmm. But we don't have anything to do right now. Any suggestions?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [over loudspeaker] Attention, cruise ponies! Don't let this zeppelin be a bore! Leave your room and see the tour!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: A tour could be fun.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: I'm afraid Flurry may be airsick. Since I know that isn't a problem for you, would you mind taking her below?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [over loudspeaker] Far to our right, you can just make out the white tufts of Cloudsdale, where Princess Twilight Sparkle once toured the weather factory.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: How'd he know that? And why announce it on a cruise?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Why don't we move to the other side of the deck?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [over loudspeaker] We are now high enough to see all of Canterlot, even the royal tree where Princess Twilight and her brother Shining Armor were born!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: What? That's not right.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Um, you guys know that's not where we were born. What are you so excited about?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Um... yeah. Us, too.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [over loudspeaker] On our route north, we will pass the spires of the Crystal Empire, where Princess Cadance rescued her Alicorn baby Spike from a monster made of fire!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Well, that doesn't even make sense.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: What?!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Uh... Oh!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Okay, that's it! Does anypony know where the cruise announcer is?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Excuse me, sir.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: You can call Iron Will "Iron Will"!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [gasps] What are you doing here? And why do you keep announcing random things about me and my family?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: The assertiveness seminar market dried up, so Iron Will started a new career organizing themed vacation packages!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: And the theme of this vacation is...

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [over loudspeaker] Everypony, stomp your hooves if you are here for the premiere Cruise of the Princesses Experience!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Iron Will, I'm not sure it was entirely honest of you to offer this cruise to my family without telling us that ponies bought tickets just to see Cadance and me!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Iron Will outlined all the details of the cruise in the Prize Acceptance and Consent Form that you signed.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Iron Will prides himself on providing a quality vacation experience. But if Twilight Sparkle and her family don't want it, Iron Will can cancel the cruise and break the hearts of every princess-adoring pony on board.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: As much as I want a family vacation, I don't think I could entertain all these cruise ponies. My hooves are pretty full taking care of Flurry Heart.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Wait! Iron Will, what if I offered you a deal? If I agree to do whatever princess activities you want, will you promise that my family gets to do the activities they want?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Sis, you don't have to do that. We want you to enjoy yourself, too.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: I don't want the vacation to end now or let down all these ponies who were looking forward to seeing us. So what do you say, Iron Will? Do we have a deal?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Princess Twilight has a deal!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Great! So it looks like we have some time before Dad plays Bingo.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Actually, we have just enough to pick the winner of our grand-prize raffle.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Oh. Well... [chuckles] who doesn't like prizes?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: All right, cruise ponies! When the zeppelin flies, it's time for a prize!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Thank you all for being so gracious and respectful to me and my family. And now, without further ado, the winner is...

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Star Tracker!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Congratulations, Star Tracker! Enjoy your prize! Okay, Dad! Bingo time!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Uh... Oh. I'm sorry. I don't have the prize.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Congratulations to Star Tracker, who wins the grand prize <U+0096> spending the day with Twilight as an honorary member of her family!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: That's the prize?!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Okay, well... I guess you should come with us, honorary family member.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [amplified] Ahem! Is everypony ready?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Dad? [amplified] What did you say?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Oh. Um, thanks.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [amplified] I-19!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Did you get that one, Dad? [amplified] Can anypony tell me how my dad is doing?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Phew! Just made it!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: And I'm ready to give you the tiny boat race of your life!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Are you sure you're not airsick, big brother?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: I don't think that's how it works. But I'm ready if you are.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Technically, Princess Twilight Sparkle should officiate the princess paddle boat race.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Oh. Well, as long as Shining Armor gets to race, I'm happy.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: On your mark, get set<U+0097>

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [nauseous] Just so everypony knows, I'm getting out of this boat because of how not sick I feel.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [through microphone] That was just the first heat! Of ten!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Now, who's ready to see a princess face when they win their race?!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Cadance, I'm so glad you got in the Peewee Princess Playtime!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Flurry is having a wonderful time.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: That's great. I'm just on my way to take some old-time Appleloosan photos!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: And then do a quick question-and-answer session on becoming an Alicorn before Mom's barrel ride at Neighagra Falls! I really hope I don't miss that.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Twilight, are you sure you don't mind doing all of these princess activities?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Mind? What? Absolutely not. I mean, you guys are having fun, right? [sighs] Besides, I have to make sure these cruise ponies are happy if I want to be a good princess.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: You're already a good princess, Twilight.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Honestly, as long as I get to see the Northern Stars tonight with everypony, I'll be happy. But right now, I gotta go take some pictures. See you later!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Uh... I am so sorry, everypony, but it looks like Flurry needs her nap.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Oh, why did that last question have to be a two-parter? I just hope I have time for one barrel ride with Mom!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Disappointed? No! I've just been answering some detailed questions about Alicorns! You know how much I love details!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: How can I when it's a totally successful vacation?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Iron Will lived up to his side of the bargain, and Princess Twilight only has one more thing to do for the day.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [through microphone] It's your last chance. Come get in line if you want the princess to sign!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [sighs] How long have you been waiting?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: You were right, Twilight. They were breathtaking.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [suddenly indignant] Oh, yeah. The cruise ponies are happy. My family is happy. Even Iron Will is happy.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: You know who isn't happy? Me!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [insincerely] I'm sorry. But maybe that wouldn't have happened if you weren't practically standing on my tail! Not even my real family stands so close! Rrgh!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Twilight?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: I only made that deal with Iron Will so my family and the cruise ponies could have the vacation they wanted.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: What about what you wanted?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: I just want everypony to be happy.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Well, sometimes ponies want more from a princess than you can give, and it can be hard to know where to draw the line.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: You seem to know pretty well.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Once I had Flurry Heart, the line was easier for me to see. You will always have obligations as a princess, but you also have an obligation to yourself.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [sighs] You're right. I think I need to set some boundaries. But first, I owe somepony an apology.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: No, Star Tracker. You should stay. I have something to tell you. All of you. I'm glad you all got to do the things you wanted, but I should have stood up for myself so that I could do what I wanted, too. [to Star Tracker] It wasn't fair of me to lash out at you. If I felt like you were standing too close, I should have said something. I'm sorry. [to everypony] What do you say we do something off the schedule?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Yup! We're gonna do something I want us to do, as a family. Honorary members, too.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Ohhh!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [through microphone] Attention, cruise ponies! If it's your dream, come to the deck for ice cream!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: What did you say to Iron Will?

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: It's okay, everypony. [through microphone] [clears throat] First, I want to thank all of you for coming. It means a lot that you'd spend your hard-earned bits just to be with us. But I honestly came on this cruise to take some time off from being a princess. I'm just a pony, too, after all. And even though I want everypony here to be happy, I'd really like to spend the rest of the cruise relaxing with my family.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: [whistling] Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses makes no guarantees as to the participation of actual princesses.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: But Iron Will learned his lesson before. Satisfaction not guaranteed. No refuuuuuuunds!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Wow. He may be pushy and manipulative, but nopony can say that minotaur isn't prepared.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: There's still plenty of activities. We pass Fillydelphia on the way back. I could give Flurry Heart a quick history tour.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: That's very thoughtful. But right now, the family and I have something scheduled for you.

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: You did all this for me? This is amazing! Thank you. And Shining Armor, I can't believe you're up there even though you're airsick!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: I am not air<U+0097> [gurgles] [nauseous] Oh, okay. Maybe I'm not feeling great!

title: Once Upon a Zeppelin
dialog: Now this is the only activity I need.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Okay. All we need is a dot of salt, a dab of sugar, and a spritz of ginger.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Uh... Are those real measurements? How do you keep track without a recipe?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Pie baking is more art than science. And this will be my masterpiece! It's to celebrate Rainbow Dash's seventy-third Wonderbolt training session!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Seventy-third? That's specific.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I know! The pie is blueberry because Wonderbolt outfits are blue. The crust is rainbow, for obvious reasons. But the most special part is the seventy-three super secret sweets and spices that represent each training session! [giggles] Could you please pass the... [quickly] brown sugar, pink sugar, sweetroot, apple jelly, berry mash, and a towel?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: You sure are going to a lot of trouble for Rainbow Dash's pie.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Phew! That's because I know how much she loves them! My pies are her favorite! It's worth all the trouble to see her happy. Now I'm going to need some cocoa powder, cocoa flakes<U+0097> Ooh! Cocoa bar! [chomp] [mouthful] Want some?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Isn't that for the pie?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: [gulps, laughing] Oh, Twilight! That's hilarious! You don't mix chocolate into a blueberry pie! This is my mid morning, pie-making chocolate fuel that keeps this pie baking train chugging down the tracks! [chomp, babbles, gulp] Break time's over! Now let's finish this pie! Chugga-chugga, chugga-chugga, choo-choo!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Good training, everypony. Nice work, Crash. You really added that sparkle to that pressure diamond-drop.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: My seventy-third training session? That's specific.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I know! I'm just so proud and happy for you, and I've been counting all your training sessions, and I was going to wait until your hundredth, but I got too excited, and I know how much you love pie, so happy seventy-third training session!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Whaaa?! You didn't have to do this.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I know I didn't have to, but I reeeally wanted to! [squealing] Have a bite.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Whoa! What's that?! Huh. Guess it was nothing. But wow, heh. This pie is the best I've ever had! Mmm! Is that cinnamon?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I knew you'd love it! Have more. I made the whole thing for you.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Really? Oh, that's so great! But I need to go change. A-And then I have to take Tank to the vet. Heh. His sensitive tortoise tummy's been acting up again. Do you mind if I take this pie with me?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Of course not! I gotta get back to my shift at Sugarcube Corner anyway. Congratulations again!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Heh. Thanks.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: [sighs] I knew she'd love it. [gasps deeply] Is that...? Is that...?!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Stop!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: You didn't see a blueberry rainbow-crust seventy-three-ingredient pie with a slice eaten out of it in here, did you?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Right. Of course you didn't. That would be ridiculous. Because I made it for Rainbow Dash, and she loves my pies. She would never throw them away like trash in the trash with other trash, right? Right?!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Hmmm... That pie couldn't have been the one I made. I must be seeing things. I did have a lot of chocolate this morning. [chomp, gulps] But what if I wasn't seeing things? What if that was my pie? [scoffs] That would be bananas! [chuckles, laughing crazily] [gasps] Unless Rainbow Dash's been replaced by an imposter who throws delicious pies away!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Or... has she been brainwashed by a pie-hating evil queen?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: You make a good point. Rainbow Dash is too stubborn to be brainwashed. Plus she hates washing. Hmm. There's something else going on here. Let's look up a few of the more recent pies I've made for her. The boysenberry pie I made for her birthday... and her three half-birthday lemon meringues... and the "It's Not Your Birthday But Here's a Pie Anyway Day" custard pie! She ate all of these... Right?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: [gasps] Another pie!? Thank you so much! Whoa! What's that?!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: [chewing noises] Huh. Guess it was nothing. Heh-heh.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Awesome! Three lemon meringues? Uh... Hey, what's that over there?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: [chewing noises] Oh, never mind. Heh. Great pies!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Happy "It's Not Your Birthday But Here's a Pie Anyway" Day!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Thank you! No way! Check that out!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Oh, sorry. Guess it was nothing. [slurp] Mmm! But that custard was everything!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Have I ever really seen Rainbow Dash eat one of my pies? And do I always look when somepony points behind me? What's there?! Heh. Good one. But I need answers.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I've sent Rainbow Dash a pie every month she's been a Wonderbolt, and you're telling me you've never seen her eat one?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Uh, affirmative. Or, uh, negative. Um... I-I-I mean, she wasn't seen eating one.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Hmm... Interesting. Very interesting.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Are we under investigation?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: As chief detective on the pie case, I've labeled you all ponies-of-interest. So it's best you tell me everything you know.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Well, we have been getting mysterious monthly pie donations.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: [gasps] Would you be able to pick these pies out of a line up?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I hear Rainbow Dash's pet tortoise Tank has been having tummy troubles. When did it start?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Hmmm... And this all happened the day after I made Rainbow Dash a "Thanks For Lending Me Your Jacket" peach pie. It seems the pieces of the puzzle are plopping into place, but the picture isn't pretty. [gasps] Note to self <U+0096> P. Alliteration Pie. Is that everything, Doctor?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Interesting. Did you have the lab analyze the flavor of that pie?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Perhaps. And I just might know Pony Patient Zero!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Dr. Fauna's right. I do always have to remind the foals and fillies not to share the pies with the class hamster. Animals just can't digest pony food.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Indeed. But where do these pies come from?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Well, they're from Rainbow Dash. She drops off her "Day After Rainbow Dash's Half-Birthday" pie every year.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Did you say the day after her half-birthday?! Very, very interesting. Because I give her a pie on her half-birthday every year! And I have a feeling it's the same pie.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Well, wherever it comes from, the students just love it.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I'm so glad. At least I can be sure somepony is.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: She didn't eat the blueberry. She didn't eat the banana. She didn't eat the cream, and she didn't eat the chocolate. She didn't eat any of 'em! Why?! And don't tell me this all just started recently! It's been going on for years! Cheerilee said so herself. If there's one thing I know, you can't escape the truth!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Pinkie Pie?! Pinkie Pie!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Whooooaaaa! [grunting] Oh. Party-planning cave. Right. You okay? Or are you just screamin' for fun?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Screaming is fun. But I'm not okay! I've been making Rainbow Dash pies for years, but she doesn't even like them. She's been lying to me!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: But everypony loves your pies. they're the greatest thing since sliced apples.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Thank you!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: And I could swear I've seen her eat one of your pies before.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Have you reeeaaally?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Um, I... thought I had. That's why I said it?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Are you sure?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Maybe I haven't...?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Exactly! Because it's all been a sham! Rainbow Dash has been laughing at my pies behind my back and scheming of a way to get rid of them for years!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Bring forth the worst-tasting food in all of Equestria!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: And now I will destroy Pinkie Pie's horrid abominations, freeing the land of these disgusting pies forever!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Nooooooo!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Good riddance, strawberry cream and peaches 'o plenty! Begone, apple crumble and lemon surprise!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I really don't think that's what's happening.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I don't think so either. I know so.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Well, I've got just the thing to get your mind off all this madness. We've had a great apple harvest, so I was hopin' you could whip up a few of your delicious pies.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Yes. I will make pies. Lots of pies. I'm going to make Rainbow Dash so many pies, it'll force her to admit the truth. Or I'll catch her in the act of getting rid of them. Operation: "Pie of Lies" is a go. Thanks, Applejack. I knew I could count on you to come up with a plan.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I don't think that's what I did. Also, uh... how do you get out of here?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Surprise!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: [yelps] W-W-What's happening?!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Happy unofficial "Wake Your Friends Up" Day!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Ugh. I've never heard of "Wake Your Friends Up" Day.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Well, it's unofficial. But I made you your favorite pie in celebration! Ta-da! Gifts are the second most important part of "Wake Your Friends Up" Day.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: What's the first most important part?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Accepting the gifts and enjoying them immediately.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Uh... Well, I'm sorry I forgot about "Wake Your Friends Up" Day. Let me make it up to you. Here!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: [sneezes] The pie! Where'd it go?!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: What do you mean where did it go? Heh-heh. Mmm-mmm.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Congratulations on your seventy-fourth Wonderbolt training session! Here's a pie. Now eat it!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Okay, this is getting a little out of hoof. I haven't even trained yet.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Well, I wanted to pre-celebrate because I already know how great you're gonna do. Eat the pie!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Pinkie, look out!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Pinkie! Are you okay?!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: [grunting] Get me down!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: But the pie! What happened to the pie?!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Oh! The pie was delicious! You just get better!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Noooooooo!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: [unconvincing] Ah! Somepony help me! Rainbow Dash, thank goodness you're here! I was trying to fix the top pie on my pie pyramid, but the whole thing became unstable. And there's only one way to save me! You have to eat the pies!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Don't worry, I got ya!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Oh, right. Or you could save me that way.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: You gotta be more careful, okay?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: [growls] Rrgh!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Rainbow Dash! I wanted to thank you for saving me from the pie pyramid, so have a pie! Have three! Have fifteen! I know how much you love them! Now eat up!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Uh... Thanks!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I can't wait to eat [loudly] all these pies!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: What!? Where did they<U+0097>?! How did you<U+0097>?!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Delicious! You did it again, Pinkie!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Rainbow Dash, there you are! I made a pie for everypony, and you're the only one who hasn't eaten hers yet. So here. Your pie. For you to eat. Now.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Are you okay? You seem to be staring more than usual.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: You sure you don't have to blink?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Me? Nope. I'm not much of a blinker. [licking] Don't mind me. Go ahead and take a bite.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Well... Do I want to take a big bite or a small bite...? I just don't know... Or maybe medium? No, no, no. Definitely not medium.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: [panting] [strained] Just try some.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Ahhhh... Do you have any milk?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Ah, never mind. Your pies are just too good to resist.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: What?! No! No! That's it! I can't take it!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Uh, everything okay, Pinkie?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: No! Everything is not okay! You hate my pies!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: What are you talking about?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: You know exactly what I'm talking about! I saw what you did! Well, I didn't see what you did. But I know that you've been fake-eating my pies! You threw away the pie I made for your seventy-third Wonderbolt training session, and I know you secretly somehow got rid of all the other pies I gave you! Admit it!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: That's crazy! What do you think I did? Somehow make them all disappear into thin air?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: [nervous chuckle] Okay. So maybe I made one of them disappear into thin air.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: How could you?!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: What?! I, uh... I-I just wanted to share these amazing pies with the folks of Cloudsdale! So I, uh... I was trying to send them up via... balloon mail.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: But you just said they were delicious.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Well, obviously that's because... I have amnesia!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I've been brainwashed!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I-It's Opposite Day?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Your memory is working fine, you hate washing, and I know today's not Opposite Day because I baked you a pie for it every year. A pie that you'd probably just throw away. Or give to charity. Or destroy with your laser eyes while laughing at me!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Laser eyes?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Oh! Oh! So you admit it!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: What? No! I can explain!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: I don't want to hear it!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: She won't listen to me. She won't let me apologize. [sighs] I feel terrible.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Well, you have been lying to her. To all of us, actually.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Yeah. Is there anything else you're lyin' about that we should know?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: No! Well, not that I can think of off the top of my head. Is it my fault that I don't like pies? And not just Pinkie's pies. All pies! I know how much she loves making pies, and if I told her I didn't like them, it would have crushed her.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Uh, you kinda crushed her anyway.

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Oh, but I...! [stutters, sighs] You're right. I guess I should've just eaten the pies in the first place. [gasps] Wait! That's it! I know how I can make it up to her!

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Pee-yew! Gummy, is that you?

title: Secrets and Pies
dialog: Huh. What is that? Oh. It's you.

title: Secrets and Pies
