dialog: Take a breath, look around, it's amazing I can't believe that it's real Students galore, new ideas to explore Can't contain the excitement I feel

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Wait, hold on! Not like that! Just a second! I'm not sure if that method's approved Let me take a look <U+0096> yup, right here in the book

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Come on! We just got in the groove!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Can't mess up, can't afford a mistake now We are shaping young minds to ignite Do it like it says in the book Now make sure you're doing it right

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: There's not an equation on how to have fun

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: The students look bored now <U+0096> oh, what have I done?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Can't teach bein' honest, not sure what to do

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: I'm quite certain I'm lost

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: No way to have fun

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Oh, what have I done?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Make sure to do things by the book now

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Is this what boring is? Am I bored?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Ugh, please. These ponies are the heroes of Equestria?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Listen, these ponies saved all of us from the Storm King.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: How? By boring him into surrender?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Our teachers are a little different than I expected.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Ugh! Pony school waste of time! Yak school teach how to braid yak hair! Braiding yak hair is best! Whoa!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Oof! Is there anything in Yakyakistan that isn't the best?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Yes! Wait. No! Yaks best.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: No claws, no wings, no fire. What is it exactly you're proud of?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Whoa, cool it. No need to harsh Yona's love for her heritage, okay?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Awww, are we not being sweet and friendly enough for you, pony?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: That was sarcasm, right? Because you weren't being sweet or nice!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Maybe dragons and griffons are just too tough for friendship.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Yaks tough, just not nasty.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Who you calling nasty, klutz?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Okay, break it up! Break... it... up!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: What is going on here?!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Just a friendly discussion about the magic of friendship amongst friends.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Everypony<U+0097> I mean, everyone, go to your next class! I just can't believe it. Fights breakin' out when they're supposed to be learnin' friendship?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Things definitely aren't going as "by the book" as Twilight planned.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: That's because we're terrible teachers! Face it. This school isn't gonna work.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: [fading in] ...fights breakin' out in the hallway...

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: ...putting myself to sleep!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: I don't look like that, do I?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: I get it. Things are getting off to a rougher start than expected. But that's okay!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Who are you, and what have you done with Twilight Sparkle?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Every school in Equestria follows these rules. As long as we do too, we'll be fine.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Maybe we should... try something new?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: The EEA will be here this afternoon for Friends and Family Day. They need to see a school that follows their guidelines.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Even if those guidelines aren't working?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Well, then we have to try harder and make sure they do.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Another morning, another chance to inspire our students!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Hey! Professor Dash's class is this way.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Where are you going? You're not [gasps] skipping, are you?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: That's exactly what we're doing.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: But Friends and Family Day<U+0097>

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Is after class. Relax. This is just a quick... mental health break.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: That sounds legit! We're in!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: I guess I'll tag along, too. Make sure you don't get into... trouble.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: This way, Angel!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Professor Fluttershy! We're busted!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Oh, my! What are you all doing? Aren't classes that way?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Ah<U+0097> [clears throat] A generosity field trip, daaaaarling. [giggles] I'm taking the students to the lake to look at our divine reflections.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Oh, that sounds nice. Have fun!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: I take back everything I said about you! That was cool!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Thanks! Wait, what did you say about me?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: You're sure sticking to the book is gonna work?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: My friends can handle anything. They'll have these problems turned around before we know it.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Problems?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Chancellor Neighsay! You're here!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Yes. And you seem unprepared. If there are problems...

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Problems? Ha! Of course not! We can't wait to show you around!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: And that's why griffons breathe fire when we get mad.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: They do not! Wait! Do they? No! Really?!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Griffons just full of hot air!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: And yaks are actually good at jokes. How about that?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: What are dragons good at?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Competition! Who's up for a race?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Rainbow Dash! Why aren't you in class teaching?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Because my students are gone! Uh, g-gone somewhere else! Doing a loyalty lesson! And-and I was just going to grab, uh... this pencil! Because they need it. Wherever they are. Which I know, 'cause... I'm the teacher!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: I see. [laughs nervously] Well, Chancellor, we have other classes. We can just<U+0097>

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Let's follow the professor. I'm quite curious about this lesson in loyalty.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: [voiceover] Of course, we want to instill a sense of loyalty towards others. We encourage acts of generosity and kindness.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Figured we shouldn't be the only ones enjoying the view.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Waaaah! Yak not best at flying!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: [voiceover] And appreciation for the value of laughter...

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Flying is best!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Congratulations, Yona! You are officially the weirdest thing I've seen so far!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: What do you say, Ocellus? Can you be weirder than a flying yak?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: ...and to always be honest in any situation.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Honesty is imperative. Princess, are we going in circles?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Uh, look at the time! We'd better head to the lake for Friends and Family Day. I'm sure all the students and faculty will be there.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: What is that?!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Aah! The school is under attack!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Uh, maybe skipping class wasn't the best idea?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: How dare you! This act of aggression against ponies<U+0097>!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: I-I'm so sorry, Chancellor. We clearly had some students get a little carried away.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Those are students? But you said you were opening this school to protect Equestria! To defend ponies from... dangerous creatures who don't have our best interests at heart!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: My school teaches for all of us to work together through friendship.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: And how do you know these creatures won't take what they have learned here and use it against us?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Friendship isn't just for ponies!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: It should be.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Unicorn think yaks no need friendship? Maybe yaks no need pony school!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Well, perhaps you should return to your kind.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: "Your kind"?! Smolder, let's go!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: [despondently] It's fine. We know not every pony sees us the way you do. We're used to it.

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Princess Celestia helped me reach out to all the kingdoms! When she hears you closed the school because<U+0097>!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Because you failed to meet the EEA's standards?

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: What?!

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: Irresponsible teachers, students skipping class, endangering ponies! Your school is a disaster. Perhaps if you had had higher standards for who was admitted, this could have been avoided. Regardless...

title: School Daze - Part 1
dialog: By order of the EEA, I am shutting this school... [stomps] down!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: This happened while we were gone?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Friendship quests beyond Equestria?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: We're gonna open a school!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: We expect you to do things by... the... book!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: We have a huge responsibility, and I need you all to do this by the book.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: These ponies are the heroes of Equestria?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: This is just a quick... mental health break.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: The school is under attack!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Those are students?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: I am shutting this school... [stomps] down!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Twilight? You feeling okay?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [sighs] Look on the bright side. Sure, the EEA closed your friendship school. But now you've got time to do other stuff! It's like being on vacation!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Whoa!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Okay, then. I'm gonna need backup. Operation Cheer-Up is a go!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Come on, Twilight! You can't sit around in the boring dark all day!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Exactly! What you need is a double dose of Granny Smith's apple mash.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Whenever I'm sad, a hug from Angel Bunny always makes me feel better.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: I find that nothing brightens my mood like a new ensemble!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [whispering, to Spike] You didn't tell me this was a pity party! I would've brought ice cream!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: I appreciate you trying to make me feel better, but not everything can be fixed with dresses and cupcakes.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: What?!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: I just need some time to be alone and think.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Oh...

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: I wondered how long you'd take to get tired of pillow-fort pouting.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Everypony's already tried to cheer me up. It won't work.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [short laugh] I'm not gonna cheer you up. I'm gonna tell you what you did wrong.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: What?!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: You gave up too easily.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Hey, you made me a guidance counselor. That means tough love.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Neighsay was right. I failed. The school was a disaster.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: So was I when you met me. But you showed me that when you know in your heart something is right, you stand up for it. You did that for me. Why not for this?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: I can't go against the EEA! They're in charge of all the schools in Equestria!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: And you're in charge of all the friendship in Equestria. Why should you let somepony else stop you from doing your job?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: But the EEA rulebook<U+0097>

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Doesn't matter! You can write your own rules! Because you are doing something new. Something important!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: You're right! Why we're doing this is way more important than how we're doing this! And we are doing this!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Now, that's the Twilight I know. How can I help?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: You already have.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Guess what? The School of Friendship is back in business!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: What?!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: But why?!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Oh, no.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Bad idea.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Do we still get to guess?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: No offense, Twilight, but teaching at that school was the most boring, horrible, awful thing ever.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Uh, pretty sure she's gonna take offense to that.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: No, Rainbow Dash is right. I owe you all an apology. I was so focused on doing things the EEA way, I didn't listen to any of you. I'm sorry. I promise, this time, we'll run the school the way friends should <U+0096> together.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: So... we'd be allowed to teach however we want to?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: No more scary pop quizzes?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Confetti cannons for everycreature?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Whatever you need to teach the Elements of Harmony.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Yippeeeee!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Well, in that case, we're behind you one hundred percent, Twilight.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [clears throat] Just two small problems. The school is still unaccredited...

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: ...and we don't have any students.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: I'll take care of the first part if you five can round up our class.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Totally! Uh... how?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Roundin' up the pony students ain't gonna be an issue, but...

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: The creatures from the other kingdoms seemed pretty upset with us.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Pfft! Nonsense! I'm certain we can win them over with our charm and style!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [singsongy] Cupcake-gram for Prince Rutherfoooord!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Why pink pony here? Yaks mad at ponies!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Because... you don't have to be mad anymore! We're reopening Twilight Sparkle's School of Friendship! And it's gonna be super-uper-duper better than before! We're<U+0097>

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: <U+0097>ever so sorry about the misunderstanding. All creatures are, of course, welcome.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: We would be really happy if you sent your student back to class.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: It won't be the same without 'em. We're open and ready to start teachin'<U+0097>

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: <U+0097>right now! So, what are you waiting for? Get your student and let's go!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Where Yona?! This all pony's fault!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: You're pretty quick to blame them! What are you hiding, yak?!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: C-Can... Can we just focus on finding our lost students?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Please, everycreature! If you can just explain what happened...

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: I can't believe it! They did learn friendship!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Sorry.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Yeah? Well, my dragons will burn every kingdom until we find which of you is hiding Smolder!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Yaks fight griffons and dragons!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: The Changeling Empire can't afford an international incident. If any creature blames the changelings for this<U+0097>

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: What are you up to, shapeshifter?!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: B-But we're friends!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Find the students quickly, Twilight, or I fear our world will be at war!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Okay. Let's review what we know.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Smolder, Ocellus, Silverstream, Yona, and Gallus disappeared together.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: That's all we know.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: They're probably just off hidin' somewhere.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Unless they used some kind of spell to disappear.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Ooh! Or went undercover!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Maybe they were attacked by a ferocious shrimp! Nopony ever expects that!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [gasps] Shrimps can attack?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Nope! That's why nopony expects it.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Whoa!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Hi, Sandbar! Are you having a party?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [incredibly nervously] No! I'm just, um... really hungry? Yeah?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: We need to think like our students. If someone told us we would never see each other again, what would we do?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Go someplace we could all hang out and eat lots and lots of cupcakes!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: What?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Sandbar was friends with all of the missing students... and he just got plenty of cupcakes.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Huh. He was at the farm this mornin' pickin' up a wagonload of apples...

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: And I saw him in a shop buying pillows and blankets!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [gasps] He must be taking all that stuff to the other students! We've gotta follow him!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [laughing] Huh. This place is way cooler than I thought it'd be.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [chewing] Even I'm impressed. What's it called again, Ocellus?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: The Castle of the Two Sisters. I remembered it from class. Princess Twilight's "History of Pre-Equestrian Friendships".

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Huh. Who knew? School was actually good for something.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Yona not really like school. But Yona like new friends!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [grunts] [strained] Smolder... like breathing!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Hey, you guys! Sandbar's back!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Cupcakes are best cakes!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Aah!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [sighs] Thanks for the assist, Gallus.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Pillows! How nice! The castle is gonna be so much more comfy.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: And fun! Pillow fight!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: You guys! I just found stairs!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Aaaand we care because...?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Stairs are awesome! We don't have anything like 'em underwater, 'cause you know, [magic zap] no way to climb 'em!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: This place has everything! If only my family back home could see it...

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: I wish the other changelings could meet you all. You're not nearly as strange as the stories say.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Gee, thanks. But yeah, hanging out with other creatures is actually... not bad.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Uh, most other creatures. What is that thing?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [sighs] Am I the only one who didn't sleep through Professor Fluttershy's "Critters of Comfort and Conflict" class? It's a puckwudgie. Maybe I can make friends with it!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Oops.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Think, Ocellus! Did Professor Fluttershy say anything about how to beat puckwudgies in her lecture?!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Uh... I'm sorry, I can't remember!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: I'm gonna go ahead and guess it's not pillows, apples<U+0097>

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: ...or cupcakes.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Wouldn't class have been about how to make friends with them?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Uh, guys? They're getting really close...

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Yona not scared! Yona have friends!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Is that Professor Egghead?!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Aw, yeah!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Oh! Don't hurt them! Just ask them to leave nicely.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Not bad! [quickly] For pony.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Wow! They're amazing!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: I had no idea our teachers were actually cool.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [chuckles] I've been trying to tell you!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Did you see that?! Rainbow Dash was like voooooom and then werrrrr, and the puckwudgies went flying! And then the birds came and<U+0097>!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Yeah, we all just lived it. But you're right. That was pretty amazing. Even by dragon standards.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Is everycreature alright?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: [panting] You're lucky we got here in time!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: You know, this probably isn't the safest place for a campout.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Does that mean you're going to send us back to our homes?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Not exactly. We have another option in mind.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: We're listening.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: It's pretty clear you've already started learning friendship without your teachers. But we'd like to show you even more... if you'd come back to school?

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Not much of a choice.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: To be honest, we felt exactly the same way when Twilight told us she was reopening the school.

dialog: Yak pass if yak say! Hmph!

dialog: This is for the greater good. The school was disorganized, the teachers unqualified! And those dangerous and unpredictable "students" put ponies' lives in danger!

dialog: Hold on, please! I'm sure Princess Twilight Sparkle has a good explanation for all of this.

dialog: Then it is not a school!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: It's not an EEA school. It's a friendship school with its own rules. I should know. I wrote the book!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: These students reminded me that every friendship is special, so the way we teach it has to be just as unique. My school is going to do things differently.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Allowing all of these creatures to attend your school, changing the rules for them <U+0096> it simply won't work!

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: I seem to recall something about Earth ponies, unicorns, and Pegasi doing something similar, don't you?

dialog: I promise you, Chancellor. My school will help protect Equestria.

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Or destroy it!

dialog: This brand new school of friendship Is home to everyone

dialog: We're learning how to trust

dialog: There's a griffon in the garden

dialog: And a yak or two or three

dialog: That might have been a changeling

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: But it kind of looks like me

dialog: Some things you just can't teach with books Some things you only know So trust your heart and let us lead And your friendship's sure to grow

title: School Daze - Part 2
dialog: Wahoo!

dialog: Uh, if dragon stay, yak stay.

dialog: I know you will make the changelings proud, Ocellus.

dialog: [gasps] It is?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Mm-hmm. As you well know, the real focus at Rarity For You is on the customer!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Care to give it a try?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Um, okay. [quietly] Hello. Um, welcome to Rarity For You. What can I help you with?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Um, aren't all those things opposites?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: But how can I<U+0097>?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: No! But I just, um<U+0097>

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: If I may, I'm thinking noir-esque minimalist but with a twist. Perhaps a tapered hem.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Hmm. The inseams say, "Yes!"

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Wow. You make it look so easy.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Oh, darling, come now. You've conquered your shyness a thousand times over. You can't let a few fashion ponies undo all that progress.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: I guess not.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: You simply must access your inner strength and allow it to shine through!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: How?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Uh, daily affirmations? Meditation? Ooh! Power posing works wonders whenever I feel intimidated. Try these. Confident warrior! Gold medalist! Showpony!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [clears throat] Or... not.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Oh, goodness, look at the time! Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, go, go! I'm right behind you!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: You're not gonna be here? In your work room?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: But, darling, I simply can't. The fashion show is in Canterlot tomorrow, and I'll be up all night, even with the help of all of my assistants!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Well, not all my assistants.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Smoky! Softpad! Smoky Jr.!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Ever since you convinced me to let them live in the shop, these beastie sweeties have been nothing but helpful.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: And I'm sure they'll help me let my inner strength shine through!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Oh, I wish I could stay and offer more help. [gasps] Why not try a new outfit? Think of it as the costume for your role as... Shop Pony! Ha ha! You know what they say <U+0096> "clothes make the pony".

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Um, who says that?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: You know, "them". All right. I'm sure you and your furry friends will do just fine. Ta-ta!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [sighs] I hope she's right.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Whew. Here goes nothing.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Welcome to Rarity For You. What can I help you with?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Um, thread... count? Um... Well, I'm not sure. Let's see... Um, one, two, three, four...

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Oh, I'm afraid I don't know much about fashion to satisfy these customers. What am I gonna do?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Oh, I've never tried to act before, but... I suppose it's worth a shot.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [clears throat, snooty voice] Severe but not unapproachable. Acceptable business attire. [normal voice] Oh, does that sound like a shop pony to you?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] So sorry for the wait. The shop has some... staffing issues today.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Here at Rarity For You, our merchandise defies typical attempts to quantify its quality, but rest assured, it will make you the envy of all who see it.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Ta-ta!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [normal voice, sighs, faints, pants, sighs] Smoky Jr., I can't believe it worked! [snooty voice] I suppose clothes really do make the pony after all.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Oh, darling, I'm afraid I can't stop. Potential emergency at the boutique.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Oh, well, I always knew Fluttershy had it in her. [laughs] And there's still time to catch the train to Canterlot!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] It's an unique play on the old standard. We call it a Rarity cut with a triple-cut stitched hem and a guacamole chevka pattern fabric.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: If I had meant "chevron", then that's what I would've said.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [normal voice] Aw, thanks, everyone. But I feel I should push the snootiness further.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: If you really wanna help, I suppose serving tea would be nice. Oh, if you don't mind.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] I'm afraid bold and shiny won't work with your whole... modelle. Perhaps... pointy.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Not everypony can pull off a found object, but you... nearly get there.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Yes. Casual chic pr<ea>t-<e0>-porter is very branch<e9> this season.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Um, one moment, please.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [normal voice] Oh, I think I need a new character.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [hipster voice] Okay, I've got, like, this high-key savage look for you? It's a totally live ensemble with a little, like, thingies that sparkle and make the whole squad go, "Whoa! That pony is 'woke'!"

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [hipster voice] Can you, like, chill for one sec? BRB.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [goth voice] It's not like the futility of shopping can be made better with black leather and metal studs, but they help.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] This tea must always be at a precise temperature! See that it doesn't happen again!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [hipster voice] Whoa, that color is, like, almost too lit for you? [goth voice] The blackness of this vest is a reflection of your soul. [snooty voice] This hemline is nothing short of an inspiration of craftsponyship. Are you sure you deserve it?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] I don't know what's worse <U+0096> that you spilled the tea or that it's still cold! Either get it right or go back to the forest!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Oh, it is so hard to find good help these days.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Okay! Okay! Slow down, everyone! I'm doing my best!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: So, Rarity is busy at an important fashion show, and Fluttershy is running her shop in Manehattan, but to do it, she's playing different shop pony characters that are all mean?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: How in the world did you figure that out, Spike?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: I'm not Dragon Charades champion for nothin'!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: I can't imagine Fluttershy would ever be mean to her animal friends. This sounds serious. Spike, tell everyone it's time to head back to Saddle Row!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] I wouldn't think it was possible to make something so dowdy even more matronly, but here you are. [goth voice] It's like a scream in the void, empty and ultimately meaningless. [hipster voice] I would srsly help you right now, but, like, I don't wanna, you know?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: You weren't kidding. This is worse than we thought! She's being horrible to everypony!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Uh, are you sure that's even Fluttershy?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Maybe it's just three really, really fast ponies that really, really look like her!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Well, let's find out! Hey, Fluttershy? Are you running the shop or performing in a one-pony show?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] If you don't mind, I can only improve the taste of one customer at a time. You'll have to wait your turn. Ugh, honestly! These small town ponies come to the big city and think they can behave any way they please!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: What?! You are a small-town pony! And your cottage isn't even in the town!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Look, Fluttershy, we came here because we were worried and we care about you.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [goth voice, to Neigh Sayer] Let's get out of this aura of positivity before it consumes us.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: As fun as this Fluttershy switcheroo game is, Smoky, Smoky Jr., and Softpad are really concerned.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Yeah! They came all the way to Ponyville to get us.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [hipster voice] They should have, like, stayed there? The shop is, like, a no-rodent zone now.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: She called them "rodents"?!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Fluttershy, I understand why you think you have to act this way for these customers, but there's gotta be a better way.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] [sarcastically] Goodness! You are so right. Please, step this way so that we may discuss your concerns.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: I knew you'd come to your senses!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] Indeed.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Ugh, the centerpiece of my collection, and it's still not right! Oh, darling, I'm afraid we've literally run out of time. It's up to you! Go out there and sell it! Now, attitude!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: I don't understand. When I left Fluttershy, she had everything well in hoof.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Well, things might have seemed all right when you left, but they're definitely not all right now.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: She's actin' worse than the worst Manehattanite I ever saw!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: She kicked us out of the shop!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: She called Smoky, Smoky Jr., and Softpad... "rodents"!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Wh-wh-wha... Rodents?! Well, why didn't you say that from the start?! She obviously needs help! Come on!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [goth voice] Your melancholy is way too shallow for a look with this much unfeeling depth.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [hipster voice] Ugh! Your style isn't even on the same page? Turn away. Don't even look at it, okay?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] I think not, dear! This is all far too fashion forward for the likes of you!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [sighs] Told ya it was bad.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Bad? This is worse than I could've possibly imagined!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] Rarity! I'm so glad you're here! [kissing noises] Finally, a pony who understands that the couture in this shop is far too brilliant to even consider selling!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Whaaat?!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [hipster voice] You, like, totally get how lame customers are? Ugh! [goth voice] Watching them leave filled me with a sweet sadness. [snooty voice] And you'll be pleased to hear that I've taken care of your rodent situation.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Will somebody tell her to stop saying that?!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: That's it! Fluttershy, I'm afraid you've left me no choice! You are terminated!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] Well! Good luck replacing me! Humph!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [goth voice] I always thought she was too controlling.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: You<U+0097> you<U+0097> you are terminated, too!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [goth voice] Whatever.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [hipster voice] I know, right? I mean, uh, ugh?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Actually, you're, like, totally terminated as well!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [hipster voice] Like, okay.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [normal voice] I guess I owe everypony an apology.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [sighs] You think?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: I got so caught up trying to please all of your customers that<U+0097>

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: What customers?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: I might have taken my salespony characters a little too far.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [to raccoons] I'm sorry if I hurt your feelings. You know I was only pretending, right?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: But, Fluttershy, why did you think you needed to be somepony else to run the shop?

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: I guess acting like the ponies of Saddle Row gave me the confidence to interact with them.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Darling, I'd never trust some horrible Saddle Row pony to run my shop. That's why I wanted a friend to do it.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Well, I'd definitely rather be myself anyway, even if I don't exactly have what it takes to be a shop pony.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: I wouldn't sell yourself short. Those salespony characters all came from you!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Yeah! I think you totally have what it takes.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Maybe a little too much.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Indeed. You have all the inner strength you need, but I think we prefer it coming from our sweet, regular Fluttershy.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: And that's just given me the inspiration I'm looking for!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: And last one... There! The missing piece for my new collection <U+0096> the Warrior of Inner Strength!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Oh, it's lovely, Rarity! I'm just sorry you had to leave the Canterlot Royal Fashion Show early.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: Oh, darling, making the perfect dress is scads more satisfying than showing it off.

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: What? No, I<U+0097>

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] Have you considered the possibility that the Royal Fashion Show is trying to undercut Rarity's by continuing on in Canterlot and not moving the whole affair here?! Hmm?! Have you?! Hmmm?!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [snooty voice] Hmph! Just as I thought! Hmmm!

title: Fake It 'Til You Make It
dialog: [to Rarity] Oh! [giggles] Inner strength.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: I'm sooo glad I made it to Las Pegasus before the fastest, most thrilling ride of all time closes for good!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Wait. The fastest, most thrilling ride of all time?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [scoffs] Of course I have! It's that one where, uh... All right, you got me. What is it?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Only the coolest rollercoaster ever!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: It looks incredible!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Oh, it is. First, you strap yourself into the cloud rocket car, and then you're catapulted straight through a...

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: ...series of daring dips and terrifying turns...

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: ...flipping upside-down so many times you don't know which way is up!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: 'Til finally you climb to the highest peak on the rails! Then drop towards the ground at lightning speed...

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: ...before coming up to a screeching halt! It's the coolest ride ever to exist in the history of Equestria!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: So, when did you ride it?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Oh. [laughs] I haven't.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: The ride closes this week! Forever! But I can't go to Las Pegasus because I have to teach at Twilight's school. I'm gonna miss out on the coolest rollercoaster of all time! Unless...

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Why do I feel like you're about to ask me a mighty big favor?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Absolutely!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: On one condition. You tag along with a few other ponies goin' to Las Pegasus.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [laughs] Surely you don't mean Granny Smith!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: No, no, of course not. I mean Granny Smith and the rest of the Gold Horseshoe Gals.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Hurry your haunches, hinnies!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Grand Auntie Applesauce, cousin Apple Rose, and cousin Goldie Delicious.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Why, I'm sure they'd be plumb tickled to have you join their annual grandmares' trip to Las Pegasus. It'll be perfect. I'll teach your classes, and you can look after them for me.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [scoffs] Look after them?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: So they don't get too carried away. Usually Big Mac goes along as a chaperone, but I'm sure he'd love a break.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: There is no way I'm going to Las Pegasus with a bunch of old, slow grannies!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: So you don't mind missin' your only chance to ride the Wild Blue Yonder?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Ugh, fine! I'll go!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Ha! That's the spirit! Now skedaddle so I can help them get ready.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Applejack! Have you seen my cranky flank cream? I can't find it in this whole tootin' farmhouse.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: It's, uh, gonna take a while.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [groaning] Why is this taking so long? The Wild Blue Yonder's gonna close before we even get to Las Pegasus.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Here. I made a list to help you keep the grandmares out of trouble. Don't wanna have to bring 'em back home before you get to go on your rollercoaster.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: That could happen?!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Only if you don't follow the rules. These grannies need a lot of care. If one of 'em overdoes it, it's bye-bye Las Pegasus for the lot of ya.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [reading] "Make sure they get their naps". "Eat only soft foods". "Careful when dancing"? "Don't get too excited"? Seriously?!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: And don't let 'em out of your sight. Ever.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Wait. Then how am I supposed to go on the rollercoaster?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: You'll find time. And you might even learn a thing or two about havin' a good time from these old gals.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Yeah. That'll happen.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: All right, y'all! Time to get this show on the road! [chuckles] Or in the sky, in this case.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [groans] Come on, come on, come on!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Go, go, go, go, go!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Argh! Everypony okay in there?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Dandy as a pansy in a plant pot!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [echoing] They said they've heard the tree story!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Here we go again.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: The Wild Blue Yonder is in our hotel?! Uh, I bet you grannies are feeling super tired from your journey.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Nope! How about a trot down the avenue to see the sights, girls?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Oh, forget the sights! I came here to play some serious horseshoe toss!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [gasps] Oh-my-gosh-oh-my-gosh-oh-my-gosh-oh-my-gosh! There it is! The best rollercoaster ever!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Aaah! Warm up those withers, ladies! There's a horseshoe-hurlin' trophy with our names on it!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [gasps] Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa. That sounds a little too exciting. Why don't we get you checked in first?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Ha-ha! You sure your name's not Applesaucey? Better find the brakes on that buggy, sugar. We just got here.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Uh, Granny Smith's right. Let's not overdo it. How about a nice nap so you can really enjoy Las Pegasus?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [yawns] Good idea. We could use some shut-eye, hmm?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: You go along now and explore while we rest, sugar booger. Yawn.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Uh, if you say so! [to Lemon Squeezy] What? They'll be in here sleeping the whole time I'm gone!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Quit judging me!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [clears throat] One ticket for the coolest rollercoaster of all time, please. [gasps] But... But... this line never ends!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Enjoy the ride.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Heh. They didn't even know I left.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Whoa!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Aah! [gasps] They're gone!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [panicked whimpering] Granny Smith! Apple Rose! Are you here?! Applesauce? Goldie? Oh, I'm the worst chaperone ever!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: I know, I know! Excuse me, sir. Have you seen a group of old mares around here?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [groans] This place is huge! They could be anywhere!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Now that's how you hurl a horseshoe!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Ha! No way! Goldie's totally got game!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Yeah! Go, Goldie!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Huh? Uh-oh!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Oh, oop!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Uh, mind if I try?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Whoops. Guess I'm no good at this game. Sorry.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Oh, I'm so glad I found you! Everypony feeling okay? Not too excited?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Pretty much the opposite right now.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [sighs] Good. From now on, I'm not letting you grannies out of my sight.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Ooh! We could play more games!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: That's what we ought to do!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Really?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Hit the buffet! All that horseshoe tossin' sure works up an appy-tite.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [sighs] Uh-huh...

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: I love me some nachos. I'mma set my dentures loose on these vittles until the crumbs cry uncle!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Come on, Granny. You know you can't have those. They're super crunchy.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: How about some nice soft carrot soup, instead?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: I thought you was supposed to be the fun one.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Wait. I am fun!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Sounds kind of intense. Aren't you all exhausted from your big day?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Heck no! We save up our energy all year for Las Pegasus weekend, isn't that right, girls?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Ugh. Dancing it is, then. I'll be there.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Ugh! Stop doing that! Uh, that's probably enough dancing for now! Right, Apple Rose?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: So gross.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Oh, come on! You said you were going back to the room after dancing! So each pony could have some alone time?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Oh, now don't be a stick in the mud! Trust me, you'll loooove this show! It's the best thing in Las Pegasus!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Hey, where are you going? Come back!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Release those grannies, right now!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: What'd ya go and do that for?! That was our big star moment!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Y-You were in danger! I saw the water! You were trapped!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Oh, pish-tosh! This is a magic show! We've seen it a thousand times! Everypony always escapes.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: You keep ruinin' our fun! I had a hot hoof goin' in that game you decided to lose for us!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: And I wanted to eat those nachos at the buffet!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: They're bein' too polite to say it, so I will! Rainbow Dash, we thought you'd be a hoot, but I ain't never met a wetter hen!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: What?!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: She's right! You've had your mane in a twist ever since we arrived!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: I'm so sorry, everypony. The truth is, all I wanted to do for this whole trip is ride the Wild Blue Yonder. I mean, it's why I came to Las Pegasus in the first place! Applejack told me not to let you out of my sight, or you might overdo it and we'd have to go home early.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Well, now it's too late. I ruined your trip, and it's the last day ever to ride the Wild Blue Yonder! The line is so long, I'll never get to go on it.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Hey, what's so funny?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: [chuckling] Is that all you wanted?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Well, fish-flavored kitten kibble. Why didn't you say so sooner? Come on, girls!

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: We're Gold Horseshoe members. The most exclusive club in Las Pegasus. And she's with us.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: We've been comin' here every moon since we can remember. Even some we don't remember.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Like fancy suites and rollercoaster rides?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Um, yes! [squeals] This is amazing! Isn't this amazing?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Sugar, you probably want to hold on 'bout now.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: I'm sorry I misjudged you for being older ponies. You mares are actually pretty cool.

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Rainbow Dash?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Yeah, Granny?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: Ha-ha! Really?

title: Grannies Gone Wild
dialog: I wouldn't miss it for anything!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Princess Twilight!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: We're glowing!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: [giggling] That's what happens when you're summoned by the Map.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Somepony needs our help?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: We're being called by the Map?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Did I mention we're glowing?!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: So where exactly in Equestria are we needed?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Actually, where you're going isn't even in Equestria.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Wow! That's almost... off the table!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: But what's way out there?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Mount Aris, the home of the Hippogriffs! And that's where you're headed!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Whoa...!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: You really don't need to come with us, Twilight. We can take care of this mission just fine on our own.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Mm-hmm.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Yeah!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Oof!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Ugh!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: I know that. But I'm not so sure the ponies who care about you want you going off so far on your own. Besides, there's some school business I need to take care of on Mount Aris. This permission slip is for Silverstream. It's very important that her mother and father sign it, or else no field trips.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: [whispering, to Apple Bloom and Sweetie Belle] Sounds like somepony just wants a vacation.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Okay, yes, I have been wanting to visit Mount Aris ever since the Hippogriffs moved back. But it's purely research. Silverstream's brother is gonna meet us there and take us to their houses.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Wow! They have more than one house?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: I guess so. The social structure of the Hippogriffs and seaponies is a bit of a mystery.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: I don't know if I'd like being a Hippogriff. Part bird, part pony...

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: I'm happy with just my pony parts, thanks.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: I think Hippogriffs are pretty neat. I learned all about them from Applejack. The Hippogriffs all once lived happily on Mount Aris. But when the Storm King invaded, they used a magic pearl to turn into seaponies and escape to the underwater safety of Seaquestria. Then, in the Battle of Canterlot, when Applejack defeated the Storm King<U+0097>

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Wait, what? She told you she defeated him? By herself?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Uh, maybe she didn't say that exactly. But it makes for a better story.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Whoa!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: All right. So what kind of cutie mark-related friendship problem do you think we're supposed to solve.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: I don't know. But Hippogriffs don't have cutie marks. So it might not have anything to do with that at all.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Huh. Still, the Map called us, so it must be a kind of problem that only we can solve.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Go, Crusaders!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: But how do we know exactly who we're supposed to help?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Ahem. Attention, please! Anygriff here have a problem?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Eh. That's all I got.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Maybe if the Map could be a little more specific about our mission, like maybe... an address?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: The Map doesn't really work like that. But I'm sure you and whoever needs help will find each other.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: A Hippogriff can have a seapony for a brother? How does that work exactly?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Shhh! It's rude to ask a question like that!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Whoa!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Can I ask now?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: But others got used to living under the water and stayed in Seaquestria.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Well, I'm pretty eager to see the Hippogriff village. You know, to... get this form signed. And... research! So...

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Hey, Terramar? Does anygriff you know up there have a problem they need help with?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Whoa! This looks amazing! Last time I was here, it was a ghost town!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Wow! We picked a good day to show up!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Aah!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Absolutely! And to have you sign a form for Silverstream.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Eh. Research. See you later! And good luck! I know you'll find your mission!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Well, your dad's certainly... outgoing, isn't he?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Wait, stop.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: What's that wonderful sound?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Woo-hoo! Yeah! Awesome! I love this!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: This is absolutely the best place ever! You are so lucky!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: And you get to swim in the ocean! You have two great places to live!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: How do you make up your mind which one to stay in?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Did you say... "problem"?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: You have a problem?!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Yes!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Woo-hoo! We discovered our mission!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: All right!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: We did it!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Sorry. You were talking about your problem?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Ohhhh. I-I didn't know that.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: No wonder you're having such a hard time deciding.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: When in doubt, chart it out!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Now, we put down everything great about each place and everything not so great. Compare them, and... your decision is made for you!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Well, it's obvious, isn't it? Mount Aris is the best of all possible worlds. Pro <U+0096> it's beautiful. Con <U+0096> too far from Equestria. I think that pretty much sums it up.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Terramar's right, Sweetie Belle. It'd be fair if we visited both places before we decide.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Hey, everypony! This festival is fantastic! Look what I won at the ring toss booth! Ahem. But of course, I'm really here on business. Sky Beak's already signed the form. Now I just need your mom's signature. Is she around?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Um... she's a seapony. In Seaquestria.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: That's what Silverstream meant by "houses"!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: And how exactly are we gonna visit underwater?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Whoa! [giggling] Woo-hoo! Yeah! [giggling] Whoa! This must be just like flying! Woo-hoo!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Where's your mom's house, Terramar?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: This is awesome!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Well, she is one of our most hardworking students. In fact, I brought this form for you to sign so that<U+0097>

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: That sounds adorable! I'd love to! And you know, to find out about aquatic pony early development and, uh...

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: [giggling] Research.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Look out! [giggling] Can't catch me!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Huh. Not much sunlight down here, is there?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Boom-ba-da-boom-ba-da-boom-ba-da-boom-ba-da-boom-ba-da-boom-ba-da-boom!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: [bubbly] Everything sounds funny down here!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Okay. I've seen everything I need to. So, uh, why don't we find Twilight Sparkle, finish the chart, and, uh, head back up the mountain? I have some serious field twirling to do.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Why not? Could be another trophy in my future! Be back soon!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: All right! Let's add some positives to the Seaquestria side!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Uh-huh!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Swimming is like flying, multi-color fish, and did I mention the flying thing?!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: You forgot the cons. Dark, wet, sea monsters...

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: I don't remember any sea monsters. Apple Bloom, looks like it's up to you.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Me? Well... Both places have a lot of good things about them. I can understand why it's hard for you to decide.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Your heart is in two places, you can only live in one You're torn between the hilltops and the tide

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Thank goodness that the Cutie Mark Crusaders have begun To give you hope and help you to decide

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Well, on the other hoof, I can think of a place that's way more exciting and cool, not to mention more you! Come on, you know exactly where I mean!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Build your nest here on Harmonizing Heights

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Live it up here in Seaquestria

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Nothing compares to Harmonizing Heights The eagles are regal

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: But the schools are cooler

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Their claws are so awesome

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: With their sweet maneuvers

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Star wishes every night

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Starfish by eel light

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Better

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Wetter

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Shinier

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Brinier Seaquestria!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Harmonizing Heights!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Seaquestria!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Harmonizing Heights!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Terramar, where're you goin'?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Hmph!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Sweetie Belle said to tell you it's your fault that Terramar ran off.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Well, you tell Sweetie Belle that if it weren't for her, our mission would've been over by now! And a success!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: [sighs] Scootaloo says this whole thing is your fault.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Well, tell her that I'm not the one who dashed all of Terramar's hopes and made him give up on the world! Both worlds!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: [sighs] Sweetie Belle says it's your fault that Terramar ran<U+0097> Oh. Wait. I already told you that, didn't I?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Uh, what's going on? Where's Terramar?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Uh, well... he... he kinda left. He wanted to be by himself.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Which was not my fault!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Mine, either!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Well, of course not. Why would you think that?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: All we had to do was help him choose which world to live in.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: And we let him down.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Whoever said that he had to choose?

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Well, he did.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Hmmm... Maybe Terramar's making it harder than it has to be.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Actually, we're right in the middle of<U+0097>

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Thank you, really. I've had a great time in both places today, but... [whispering, to Cutie Mark Crusaders] Wow. This must be how Terramar feels all the time.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Hmmm... This gives me an idea.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Huh. I thought for sure he came this way.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: [gasps] He did.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: We're sorry. We were supposed to help you, and...

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: ...we just ended up confusing you more. It's all our fault.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: We might have somethin' worth comin' down for.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: We thought we'd get every creature together for a picnic on the beach.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: And we mean every creature!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Something we forgot to add that both places have <U+0096> family and friends who love you.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Yes! We did it!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Congratulations! Your first map mission is a success!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Guess that means we're officially done here. I hope you come visit your sister in Equestria.

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Yeah, come see us! You'll love it!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Who knows? You might even want to live there!

title: Surf and/or Turf
dialog: Yeah, that was a joke.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Princess Celestia, I have an idea for your ones-versary.

title: Horse Play
dialog: My... "ones-versary"?

title: Horse Play
dialog: The one-thousand, one-hundred, eleventh year anniversary of when you first raised the sun.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Good thing Pinkie Pie reminded us, or we would have forgot to celebrate.

title: Horse Play
dialog: You're not the only ones. What did you have in mind?

title: Horse Play
dialog: To commemorate your first sunrise, I've written a play. We'd like to perform it at my School of Friendship, if you don't mind.

title: Horse Play
dialog: [giggling happily] Mind? Oh! Of course not! Oh! I think a play is a fantastic idea!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Did she just... prance?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Oh, uh, forgive me for getting so excited. It's just, when I was a filly, my friends often put on plays. [sighs] It was so wonderful. Everypony coming together to create a magical experience to share with others. I've always believed theater brings out the best in us and forges a special bond of friendship.

title: Horse Play
dialog: [gasps] I didn't know you used to act!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Oh, not me. I was always too busy with my magic lessons to be part of any plays myself. But still, it's something I always wished I could experience.

title: Horse Play
dialog: And you still can! Princess Celestia, we would be honored if you would be the star of our play!

title: Horse Play
dialog: We would?!

title: Horse Play
dialog: You want me to star in your play?!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Yeah... When did that happen, exactly?

title: Horse Play
dialog: If you'll excuse us for a second... [whispering] Don't you see, Spike? It's perfect! Princess Celestia has always wanted to be in a play, and this one's about her!

title: Horse Play
dialog: [whispering] I guess, but how are we supposed to give her directions? She's the ruler of Equestria!

title: Horse Play
dialog: [whispering] She's also our friend. Celestia's always kind to everypony. So if we have a chance to finally do something for her, we should.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Hmmm...

title: Horse Play
dialog: [whispering] Come on. How many times has Celestia helped us? Guided us? Been a warm, calming voice over our shoulder?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Twilight.

title: Horse Play
dialog: <U+00A0>Yes, Princess Celestia?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Your invitation is very kind, but are you certain it's wise? I have no acting experience at all.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Experience? Pssh! You'll be playing yourself. And we'll all help you. Please? It'd mean so much to the students if you were in our show.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Well, if you're sure...

title: Horse Play
dialog: Yeah, what she said.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Then I would be delighted to join your theater troupe!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Woo-hoo! Confetti is ready! Woo-hoo!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Puh! Wormy apple cores, Pinkie! How many times have I told you to keep your special effects away from my sets?!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Ugh.

title: Horse Play
dialog: I can't believe you've memorized your lines already, Fluttershy.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Once you get past terrifying, paralyzing stage fright, the rest is easy. Now I just hope Princess Celestia says we can do our play.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Oh, as soon as she sees these fabulous costumes, all she'll be able to say is "Brava!"

title: Horse Play
dialog: Heads up! Here comes our answer!

title: Horse Play
dialog: [panting] Wonderful news, everypony!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Yeehaw! We get to put on our show?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Even better. Princess Celestia is gonna be our star!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Yeah, that's how I felt, too.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Celestia? Starring in our play? This is huge!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Well, she was a little nervous at first, but I told her not to worry. With us helping, it will all go smooth as<U+0097>

title: Horse Play
dialog: Silk! I must find the silk! If Celestia's going to be in our play, we have to take everything up to the next level! None of these old ideas will do!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Yeah! Forget my regular party cannon! For princess-sized effects, we're gonna need Big Bertha!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Grrrr...! Pinkie!

title: Horse Play
dialog: What?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Our play is gonna be amazing! I gotta tell everypony I know! And even the ones I don't!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Why in tarnation are y'all gettin' so starstruck? We've met Princess Celestia before. Plenty of times.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Those were formal things <U+0096> galas, world-saving. This is different! Imagine doing sweaty warm-ups with a princess, blowing your nose in front of a princess, sitting around just... talking with a princess.

title: Horse Play
dialog: I'm a princess. You talk to me.

title: Horse Play
dialog: That's different. You're not a "princess" princess.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Uh, thanks. Celestia wants to experience the special friendship that theater ponies have. To give her that, you just need to be yourselves.

title: Horse Play
dialog: You... You really think so?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Heh. Aw, quit frettin'. It's only a couple o' pals gettin' together to put on a ones-versary play. What could go wrong?

title: Horse Play
dialog: [amplified] Places, everypony! We're here to rehearse "A New Day in Equestria"!

title: Horse Play
dialog: [amplified] Directed, written, and produced by Twilight Sparkle.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Page one, act one, scene one. Action!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Once upon a time, before Celestia, Equestria was suffering terrible hardship. Raising the sun every morning was so hard, it took five great sorcerers plus Star Swirl the Bearded to do it.

title: Horse Play
dialog: And every day, the unicorns helping Star Swirl would use so much magic, they lost their powers forever. Things looked bleak. Soon, Equestria would lose all its magic users! Then, the land would be covered in darkness for eternity!

title: Horse Play
dialog: [to Spike] Even I can't believe how good my play is! The sets, the props, the outfits <U+0096> they're all great!

title: Horse Play
dialog: And... here comes the best part.

title: Horse Play
dialog: But then, a student named Celestia discovered she had the power to raise the sun herself without draining her magic!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Um, that's your cue, Celestia.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Oh! Uh, right! Of course! Heh. [clears throat] [quietly] It is time for a new day in Equestria.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Um, what?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Oh, uh, I said [quietly] it is time for a new day in Equestria.

title: Horse Play
dialog: And your delivery was... great! But maybe you should try it a tiny bit louder for the ponies in the back row.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Oh, yes, yes. My Royal Canterlot Voice. Thank you for the reminder, Twilight. [booming] It is time for a new day in Equestria!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Oh! Goodness! This theater does have strong acoustics. M-My apologies. I'm still learning to hone my craft.

title: Horse Play
dialog: No, no! You're doing... fine! Why don't we try it one more time? Just like you're talking to me.

title: Horse Play
dialog: [flat and stilted] It is time for a new day in Equestria-aaa.

title: Horse Play
dialog: A bit more energy.

title: Horse Play
dialog: [rushed and hyperactive] It's time for a new day in Equestria! [normal] Uh, how was that?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Uh, honestly?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Great! Wow! It's hard to believe you've never done this before! Let's move onto the dance number!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Again! Step, buck, leap, touch! Again! Step, buck, leap, touch! Got it? Movin' on! Five, six, seven, eight!

title: Horse Play
dialog: [with wildly varying tone] Come on, Star Swirl. Throw off that must-Y hat and let's have a... a dance!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Oh, dear. I think we have a problem!

title: Horse Play
dialog: [whispering] Yeah. Our lead actress is a disaster!

title: Horse Play
dialog: [hyperventilating] What are we gonna do?! If I tell Celestia she's terrible, it'll hurt her feelings, and I'll be a bad friend. But if I keep her in the show, she'll be the laughingstock of Equestria, and I'll be a worse friend.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Ya need to tell Celestia the truth, Twilight.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Any other suggestions?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Why don't we just cancel the show?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Real suggestions?

title: Horse Play
dialog: No, think about it. Right now, most of Equestria doesn't even know we're doing a ones-versary play. If we shut it down...

title: Horse Play
dialog: ...Nopony will ever miss it!

title: Horse Play
dialog: So they'll never find out Princess Celestia's a bad actress!

title: Horse Play
dialog: And she won't be embarrassed!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Ah! It's the perfect plan!

title: Horse Play
dialog: All right! I just finished telling everypony to come to our play!

title: Horse Play
dialog: You... did?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Yeah! You should've seen how excited they got when they found out Celestia was in it! They said they'd tell their friends, and then their friends would tell their friends! Everypony in Equestria's gonna see this thing! Uh... did I miss something?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Just the bright light of hope being snuffed. But that's okay. If we can't cancel the show, I know what I have to do.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Be honest with Celestia and give the lead role to somepony else?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Not a chance!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Twilight, you know truth is a huge part of friendship.

title: Horse Play
dialog: And so is making another pony's dreams come true. Look, I promised Celestia that this time, she could be a part of the play instead of just watching it. And I plan to keep that promise.

title: Horse Play
dialog: But how?

title: Horse Play
dialog: You want to give me acting lessons?

title: Horse Play
dialog: No-no-no-no-no-no-no. More like a special workshop with other actors. To... take your performance from good to flawless.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Thank you so much, Twilight! This is what I always knew theater must be about <U+0096> that special stage pony bond of shared trust and honesty.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Yeah. Heh. That's what it is. Ahem.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Princess Celestia, meet Method Mare performers On Stage and Raspberry Beret!

title: Horse Play
dialog: The pleasure is all mine! If there's anything I can do to become a better Equestrian thespian, I will! What do you have planned?

title: Horse Play
dialog: What box?

title: Horse Play
dialog: How's it going over here?

title: Horse Play
dialog: That sun will never rise again.

title: Horse Play
dialog: That's why I have something even better!

title: Horse Play
dialog: [gasps] It's the perfect substitute!

title: Horse Play
dialog: It was the perfect substitute.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Please give me something to be happy about.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Should I get you a blanket?

title: Horse Play
dialog: It is? But I don't see anything.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Mmmm... nothing. Oh! The classroom floor under my hooves! Does that count?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Do I wanna know?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Wait for it...

title: Horse Play
dialog: Pinkie Pie!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Whaaaat? It's realistic! The sun is just like a burning marshmallow!

title: Horse Play
dialog: What are they doing now?

title: Horse Play
dialog: [sighs] The simplest acting exercise they could think of <U+0096> a game of charades.

title: Horse Play
dialog: My love for Equestria and all the ponies in it! Twilight, you felt what I was emoting, didn't you?

title: Horse Play
dialog: [stuttering] Yeah!

title: Horse Play
dialog: [to On Stage] Now, that's the best acting we've seen all day.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Okay! I tried and tried and tried! But we have to face facts. We can't make Celestia an actress. So there's only one thing to do!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Tell her the truth finally?

title: Horse Play
dialog: No!

title: Horse Play
dialog: I've rewritten the script to give Celestia a more artistic part with no lines.

title: Horse Play
dialog: And to make sure the show's a hit, I've whipped up the biggest, bestest, flashiest fake sun ever!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Uh, Pinkie? That looks unsafe.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Why would untested magic fireworks that I bought in a back alley from Trixie at midnight be unsafe?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Twilight, if you honestly thought I was a bad actress, why didn't you tell me?

title: Horse Play
dialog: I-I'm so sorry! I didn't mean to insult your acting! It's just, I-I got so stressed! But... that's no excuse for what I said. You have every right to be upset with me.

title: Horse Play
dialog: I'm not upset because you insulted my acting.

title: Horse Play
dialog: You're not?

title: Horse Play
dialog: I'm upset because, in all the time we've known each other, I thought I taught you about the importance of friendship, trust, and honesty!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Celestia, wait!

title: Horse Play
dialog: No!

title: Horse Play
dialog: You can't fly away now! Look!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Ponies are taking their seats for the show.

title: Horse Play
dialog: [laughs] Standing room only! Did I do a good job of advertising for this thing or what? Sorry.

title: Horse Play
dialog: We can't put on a show with no lead actress!

title: Horse Play
dialog: You go find Celestia. We'll figure out a way to stall this thing 'til you get back.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Good luck. Nopony's gonna volunteer to try to tame that.

title: Horse Play
dialog: No pony indeed.

title: Horse Play
dialog: So... [chuckles nervously] Ahem. Uh, who likes juggling?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Princess Celestia! Please wait! Can we talk?

title: Horse Play
dialog: I'm afraid I haven't much to say, Twilight.

title: Horse Play
dialog: All right then. Just listen. You've guided me since I was a filly. You've given me knowledge and advice and friendship. Just once, I wanted to be able to give something back to you. I know what I did was wrong. I should've told you the truth. But I promised you could be in our play. I had to make it work. Nothing would make me feel worse than knowing I disappointed you.

title: Horse Play
dialog: You really mean that?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Of course! I look up to you more than any pony I've ever met! I hate to let you down. Like I did.

title: Horse Play
dialog: [sighs] You had good intentions, Twilight. But you know that the truth is always better than a well-meant lie. Didn't Applejack remind you?

title: Horse Play
dialog: [sighs] About a hundred times. And now, because I didn't listen to her, I've ruined your whole ones-versary.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Well... I don't know about that. Isn't there an old saying? "The show must go on"? There may be a way for us to save the play yet.

title: Horse Play
dialog: But how? I mean, if I'm being completely honest... you're not an actress.

title: Horse Play
dialog: No. But I am a princess.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Ugh! Good news <U+0096> free food. [chewing] Bad news <U+0096> this play is officially a disaster.

title: Horse Play
