dialog: Fortunately, I know a thing or two about how to deal with those.

title: Horse Play
dialog: You came back!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Yes. But let's celebrate later. Right now, we have a show to do!

title: Horse Play
dialog: But... but... but how?! The audience is about to riot! We have no backdrop! And our lead actress is<U+0097>!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Uhhhh...

title: Horse Play
dialog: No longer in that role. Rarity, Applejack, Pinkie, Twilight, go calm the audience. Let them know the play will start in just a minute.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Rainbow Dash, bring us some clouds and place them behind the stage. There, that's our new backdrop. Starlight, do you have a copy of the script?

title: Horse Play
dialog: Spike, you narrate the play. Fluttershy will be our new lead.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Visualize with me. You're a princess. Regal. Commanding. Confident. Feel the rising sun's warmth. Equestria needs you.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Once upon a time, before Celestia, Equestria was suffering terrible hardship. Raising the sun every morning was so hard that it took five great sorcerers plus Star Swirl the Bearded to do it.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Oh, no! Hecklers! What should we do?

title: Horse Play
dialog: [whispering] Spike! Improvise!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Y-Yes. And, uh... raising the sun each day was super draining. But you can see that for yourselves, right? I mean, do these guys look beat-up or what? Star Swirl's so stressed, he's got kinks in his horn!

title: Horse Play
dialog: But that's okay. 'Cause it turns out Celestia had a special power to raise the sun all by herself!

title: Horse Play
dialog: It's time for a new day in Equestria!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Ah! In all the commotion, we forgot we don't have a sun! What do we do?!

title: Horse Play
dialog: We play charades.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Judging by how many flowers the audience threw, it seems our play was a success.

title: Horse Play
dialog: I just feel bad you never got a chance to actually be in it.

title: Horse Play
dialog: You shouldn't. I never felt I had to be on stage to be a part of the show. All I ever wanted was to share an honest bond of creativity, artistry, and happiness with my friends. And that's exactly what I got to do.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Thank you for saving our play, Princess Celestia.

title: Horse Play
dialog: You're welcome, Twilight. But from now on, none of you will have to call me "Princess" anymore.

title: Horse Play
dialog: Wait, what? We don't?

title: Horse Play
dialog: No. I had so much fun tonight, I've decided to give up my crown, step down from the throne, and devote all of my time to the theater!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Y-You... what?!

title: Horse Play
dialog: Gotcha! Maybe I'm not such a bad actress after all.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: What? Oh! Hi! [chuckles nervously] You know, no matter how many times I read it, Houyhnhnm's Guide to Magical Arcana never gets boring.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Mm-hmm. Sure thing.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: What's this? Could I be experiencing the cerebration transmogrification effect described in chapter seventeen<U+0097>?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Oh. My cutie mark is glowing. My cutie mark is glowing! I know what this means! Why am I yelling?!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Princess Twilight, what an honor this is! I-I mean, it is, right? I'm called for a friendship mission?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: You sure are. And it must be a special one. Nopony outside of Ponyville has ever been called before.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: If you need some pointers, let me know. I've been on my fair share of missions.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: You've been on one, Spike.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: And that's my fair share.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Starlight! You mean we've both been called? This is great!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [depressed] Yeah... Great...

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Aren't you excited? You and me on a mission together!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I'm... sorry. Are you not excited to go on a mission with me?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: No. Uh, no! I mean, yes. Heh. Totally excited about us going together. Just... not so excited about where.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Sire's Hollow?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Yep. Home.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [deflated] Oh. Great.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: You know, I can go if you two don't want to. I am kind of an expert.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [sighs] It's not that I don't want to go home. It's just that whenever I do, my dad treats me like a filly. Like nothing's changed since I was a foal.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Huh.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I know. I'm a horrible daughter.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: N-No, no! My mom actually does kind of the same thing.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Really?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I don't even have to go home. She sends me letters constantly asking about my plans for the future. [imitating Stellar Flare] "You're a grown-up pony, Sunburst! You need a plan!" [sighs] I haven't been home in a while either.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Hmph. We'll just have to explain to our parents that we're on an important friendship mission so they can't bother us.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Do you really think that will work?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Nope!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [sniffs, sighs] The great thing about home is it always stays just how you le<U+0097>

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Augh!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Where did that come from?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Essence of what?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: What is it?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Uh... chocolate maybe?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Didn't this used to be a fruit stand?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: The Sire's Hollow Development what? Where do ponies buy fruit?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: All the shops are different. Everything's changed!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Not everything. That's the same as it ever was.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: What?!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Preservation Society? What is happening around here?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I'll explain it to you, sugarplum! [chuckles] You are just as cutesy-wutesy as ever!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [muffled] Dad! [normally] Quit it! What is going on?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Dad, you promised no "pumpky-wumpkin"'s in public!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [whispering] Sorry, chipmunk cheeks.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Don't. You're preserving the whole town? That's crazy!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: That's exactly what I told him! I said, "Firelight, you're crazy!"

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Mom?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Our village needs the same thing you do, Sunburst <U+0096> a clear plan for the future.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: That's why I started the Sire's Hollow Development Committee. And I've got plans for this little town. Big plans!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Listen here, Stellar Flare! I'm not gonna let you turn our historical heritage into Las Pegasus!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: And I'm not gonna let you turn it into a museum!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: W-Wait. Are you two fighting over this?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Like having a friendship problem?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Oh, there's no problem.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Because there is no friendship!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Well, the good news is we know why we're here.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [sighs] Maybe we should've sent Spike after all.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Sunburst and I were called here to do a job, and it looks like you two are it.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: You mean your success depends on us?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Uh...

title: The Parent Map
dialog: And you have to hang out with us the whole time you're here?!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Um...

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Well, I'll hear what you have to say. But every plan I've made for this town is perfectly reasonable.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Good luck convincing me my preservation efforts don't make sense.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: So we can't hold the books?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Can you hold the books?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: So nopony can read the books?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [sniffs] Fruity.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Too bad there's nowhere to get actual fruit.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: In the future, all ponies will drink their fruit!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Okay, it's annoying. I get it.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Maybe my preservation efforts were a little over the top.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: And I might have been trying to turn the town into a shopping mall.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Well, whatever direction the town takes from now on, how about we work together on it?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Deal! Sunburst, you should move closer to Ponyville. After this success, I'm sure the Princess of Friendship will want to send you on more missions.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: That's not really how it works. Oh, look at the time! We should get going now that we solved the friendship problem, right, Starlight?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Yeah... The thing is, I don't think we did solve it. When we solve a friendship problem, our cutie marks are supposed to glow.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Aw, don't be disappointed, puddin'. Your papa will work this out for ya.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Heh. My papa wasn't called by the map in Twilight's castle. I was.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: How are you gonna explain this to the princess? What's your plan if she fires you from friendship quests?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Mom! She doesn't<U+0097>! It-It's not<U+0097>!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Use your words, Sunburst.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I guess you two weren't the problem we were sent to solve after all.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: So now you don't even know why you're here? Ah! We have to figure this out before we run out of time!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [sighs] Mom, there isn't a time limit.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: So you're here for an extra long visit? [laughs] You can stay in your old room, punkie wunk! It's just like you left it!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [whispering] We need to find this friendship problem now!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Now, I know you have your little job to do, but Stellar and I know the town a lot better than you two.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: That's right! Neither of you have been home in ages. You're gonna need our help to succeed!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I guess that makes sense...

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I already have some ideas!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Me, too!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I think I liked it better when they were fighting.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Okay! Now that I've explained how Sire's Hollow was founded, we can start to explore all the possible friendship problems that might have developed over time.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [inhales] I appreciate the history lesson, Dad, but I need to find the problem now. In the present.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Aw, now, hon-bun. How are you gonna do that without all the backstory, huh? Oh! Of course I know how hard it is for you to sit still and focus, soooo... would it help you pay attention to hold on to your bwankie?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Now, you've had a little setback. But don't worry. I know exactly what you need to do.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Make a plan?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Already got one! Step one <U+0096> interview the suspects. Step two <U+0096> use your talents to solve the issue. Step three <U+0096> get the Princess of Friendship to send you on more missions!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Mom! It does not work like that!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Uh-huh.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: This is what happens when we don't rehearse! Ugh!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Starlight? Sweetie? I found a really old town bylaw that nopony agrees on. Apparently, we're not supposed to prance or canter after dinnertime. Could that be the problem? Silly-filly?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Whew! What are you doing?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [sighs] Hiding from my mother. She started making up friendship problems for me to solve.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [scoffs] My dad won't even let me talk to anypony in case they're "strangers". I'm a grown mare!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [sighs] We're never going to find the friendship problem with them around, let alone solve it.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [whispering] Okay! So we wanted to talk to all of you, you know, in private.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [whispering] Just to see if there were issues any of you had with your friends.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: No. Not avoiding. Just... taking a break.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Yeah. We needed to focus. B-But we're definitely not avoiding them.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Mm-hmm.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Uh, but they definitely can't hear us in here, right?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: There you are! But what are you doing in here? [gasps] Is the friendship problem in my favorite section of the bookstore?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: ...And then, I thought the best way to look for a friendship problem in the present...

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Dad!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: ...was to look back in our town history even farther!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Sunburst! Oh, finally! Now, I know you don't want me to make up a problem, but what if I start one?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: That's not how this<U+0097>!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I mean, nopony ever became a success by following all the rules, right?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [to Firelight] How are things on your end?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Couldn't be better! New leads and such!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Guys...?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: We really are providing excellent assistance, aren't we?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Guys!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I dare say our children should be grateful for our help.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Guys!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I'm sorry. You don't want our help?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [chuckles] That's... That's ridiculous! What reason could you possibly have for that?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Because you're driving us crazy!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Oh, really? And just how am I driving you crazy?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: By always coming up with plans! I don't need a plan! I mean, maybe I do, but it'll be mine, not yours!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: And you're not any better! I'm not a filly! I'm a grown pony with a job to do, and I'll do it on my own!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Well. I'll let you get to it then.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Great. Now we have to smooth things over with our parents on top of finding and solving a friendship problem.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: It's almost like our relationship with our parents is the friendship problem.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: You don't think that's it, do you?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [groans, collapses] Why couldn't we have been sent to stop a war or something?!

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Dad?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Hello, Ms. Glimmer. How is your friendship problem search going? I only ask as an interested observer, since I know you are an adult who's capable of doing things without help from anypony else.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Actually... I think Sunburst and I figured out what it is.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: So Stellar and I weren't really helpful after all.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Well, we haven't actually solved it. And I don't think we can. Not without you.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [coughing] Pungent. Ugh. [to Sunburst] Oh. Did you come by to be driven crazy by more of your mother's plans?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: No, I came to apologize.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Well, it's going to take more than an apology to make up for telling me you don't want my help finding your friendship problem.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Oh, I'm not sorry for that. Starlight and I already figured out what the problem is.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: This is a terrible apology.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Well, if you come with me and help fix it, I'll give you a better one.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Usually, Twilight or one of our other friends gets called to a place with a friendship problem to fix.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: But Starlight and I realized we came here to fix a friendship problem we already had.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I'm sorry I've been avoiding coming home, Dad. But you can't keep treating me like a foal.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I'm sorry, sugarbun. [sighs] I just know how hard things were for you when you left home. I guess I wanted you to feel safe, like... when you were young.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Dad, I know I've made some mistakes, and I'll probably make a bunch more. But I learn from them. I think that's what growing up is.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I'm sorry I never told you how much your plans bothered me, and I know you just want me to succeed. But I need to do that on my own.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I remember how lost you were when you flunked out of magic school. I thought as long as you had a plan, you'd never feel that way again.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: You don't have to worry, Mom. I need to find my own way. And I definitely don't feel lost anymore.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: The glowing cutie mark is such a symbol of accomplishment. I don't suppose there's a way for you to get it to glow all the time.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: [chuckles] Pretty sure it doesn't work that way.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Not unless we solved a friendship problem every few seconds, and I kinda hope this one will be it for a while.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: You know, it seems to me your map is saying we're not just your parents. Heh. We're your friends, too.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I guess so.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: So if I promise to treat you less like a little filly and more like a friend, will you visit more?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Absolutely. Mmm.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: And if you start to drive me crazy again, I'll tell you instead of never coming home.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: That's lovely of you to say, dear. But you know, I can always visit you.

title: The Parent Map
dialog: Stellar, you're a genius! [laughs] How do you feel about a road trip?

title: The Parent Map
dialog: I might have a few plans for that.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Huh?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Whoa!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Did I miss the Teacher of the Month announcement?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: You're just in time. But it's gonna be me.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Yeah, right. I got this one nailed.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: And the Friendship School Teacher of the Month is... Fluttershy!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [groans] Again?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Come on!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Oh, my! I don't know how I keep winning.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Yeah. Me, neither.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: The award is based on the students' vote. They must really like you.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Congratulations, Fluttershy!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Next item of business <U+0096> I've been looking into a new activity for our friendship classes. Spike?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Section one-forty-seven, paragraph two states that teamwork is a key part of friendship. And section two-two-nine, paragraph nine says outdoor activity reinforces learning. Add that together, and what do you get?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Ooh, ooh! Okay, let me see. One-forty-seven, two-twenty-nine, carry the two... Three hundred and eighty-seven?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Mm-mm. A teamwork field trip. Leading it is a Teacher of the Month-type job, so I thought I'd ask<U+0097>

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I'm your pony, Twilight! Sweet Apple Acres has taught me a thing or two about workin' together.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Yeah, but being a Wonderbolt's the definition of teamwork.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [chuckles] I'm sure you're not sayin' fancy flyin' makes ya a better choice than me.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [chuckles] I wouldn't say "better". Just a little more qualified. No offense.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Maybe you can lead the field trip together.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Of course! Who better to model the importance of working as a team?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Um, Rarity? Fluttershy? Me? Spike? This flowerpot?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Both of you are teamwork experts. If the students see the two of you teaching together, they'll learn even more. I know you've been competitive in the past, but I'm sure you'd never let that get in the way of friendship education.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Of course!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Totally!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I've never been on a field trip before.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Yeah, what's the point of this exactly?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Getting out of the classroom. Duh.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [chuckles] Pretty sure the headmare has something else in mind.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: All right, class. Today you'll learn how important working together is for building a strong friendship.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Hey, y'all! Ready to get out there and do some learnin' the Apple family way?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: This is basically gonna be the best field trip in the history of ever! With me in charge, that is. Whoa!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [chuckles nervously] With us in charge. Meanin' mostly me.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Yeah. Good one.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: And what teamwork activity do you two have planned for today?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: No... way. We get to do both?!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I bet that's exactly what your teachers had in mind. Why don't you start with shed building first?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Heh. Don't mind if I do! Everycreature, follow the leader!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I'll check in later to see how it's going. Remember to work together!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [deep inhale] Now take a good, deep breath. What do you smell?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [inhale] Uh, yak?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [sniffing] Mm-hmm!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Nope. Try again.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Um, apples?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: And...? Anyone? Anyone? No? The promise of... teamwork! That there's an apple shed. And this here is what we're gonna use to build it. Nothin' brings friends together like a little hard work and honest sweat.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [laughing] Sweat? Seriously? That's supposed to be part of friendship?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Not everypony would know that, Rainbow Dash. Just "Teacher of the Month" kind o' ponies.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Whatever. Let's just get this done so we can move on to my activity.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: That's it! Measure twice and cut once! Haste makes waste! Slow and steady!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Emphasis on the slow.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Rainbow Dash! Ya can't build an apple shed like that!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [scoffs] Oh, yeah? I just did!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Whoa! No way!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Impressive... if you can call an apple shed impressive.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Just 'cause it's fast don't mean it's good!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Don't count your pictures before they're snapped, Rainbow Dash.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Oh, come on! These students are totally gonna vote for a teacher who gets things done!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: No! They're gonna vote for a teacher who gets things done right!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Yeah... This isn't awkward at all...

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Steady... Steady... Take 'er nice and slow...

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Little to the left...

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Uh, a hair to the right...

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Now, a hoof shavin' higher...

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [growls] Just bring it down already!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I'll give ya one guess whose side is still standin'.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [chuckles nervously] Uh...

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Um, professors? I'm a little confused about teamwork now.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: That's because you need a different teacher. Follow me! Last one to the stream is a rotten apple shed!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Who's ready to smash the all-time Equestria speed record for river canoeing?!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Is that even a thing?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: First I've heard of it.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: We need to get to the finish line before this alarm goes off. That means you gotta move fast! Any questions?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Uh, Yona has questions.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: No time for 'em! Get in the boat!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: You really think winnin' some canoein' record is gonna get you that Teacher of the Month trophy?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I'm pretty sure everycreature's gonna like it a lot better than pounding nails and cutting wood.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Yak not like water.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Sometimes, when I'm scared to try something new, I whistle.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: We got you, Yona.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Way I see it, Twilight's gonna give that teachin' trophy to a teacher, not a racer.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: We'll see about that.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Stroke! Stroke! Stroke! Harder! Put your backs into it, newbies!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Stroooooke... Stroooooke... Stroooooke... Slower... Focus on your paddle technique, y'all.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Woo-hoo! We're really going now!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: So... when do we get to the part when we move?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: When everycreature starts listening to me, the leader of my activity, Applejack! Now stroke!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Dig in, team! We can still beat that record!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Stop!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Go!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Which way do we go?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Left!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Right!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Aye-aye, captains! Wait, what?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Left! I can see the finish line from here!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: If we go left, we'll be headin' straight into the bite-acuda fish!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Who cares about a few fish?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Uh, professors?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: You'll care plenty when they bite ya!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Guys?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: We'll just go around them!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Rock!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I love field trips!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I hope you're happy.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [scoffs] Obviously not! Because there goes our new speed record!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [panicked whistling, coughing] Help! Yak not swim!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: That's okay! Your friends can change into creatures that do!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: How's the canoeing... going?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: About as good as the apple shed building.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I totally had things under control until Applejack messed 'em up!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I did not!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Did too!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Did not!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Yup. It's been like this all day.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I wouldn't say all day. Just... ninety-nine percent of it.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I can't believe this! You're not teaching teamwork! You're competing with each other! I thought you were past that!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: We are! Mostly.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: We got carried away with wantin' to be the Teacher of the Month is all.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: The Teacher of the Month wouldn't care about being the Teacher of the Month! I know Fluttershy would be thrilled to see another pony win. That's it! I'm taking over this field trip!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: H-Hold up, Twilight. Don't count Rainbow Dash for the award just yet. You shoulda seen her fire up those students to build a shed.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: No way! You're the one the students listen to. Besides, you saved us from those pony-eating fish.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Uh, long story. But Applejack should definitely be Teacher of the Month.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Hmmm... Maybe you two have learned something, after all.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Field trip?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Well...

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Come on, Twilight. We get it. No more arguing. Right, Applejack?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Right as rain and twice as fresh!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Fine. But I'm picking the next activity you two lead. A nature walk. Nopony could possibly argue over that. Right?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: See? We're agreein' already.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Well, look at that. The path splits up ahead. Left or right?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Ugh. Here we go again.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Where to, Rainbow Dash?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I was thinking right... unless you want to go left. Because what makes you happy makes me happy.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Aw, heck. Forget about me. You want to go right, we'll go right.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: But teamwork means listening to other ponies, so it's up to you.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Well, aren't you as sweet as sugar apple pie? But it's up to you.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Ugh! Follow me! Yak know best way!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Hey! Where are y'all goin'?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I think we've gone in the same circle five times.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Only because someponies won't make up their minds about which way to go.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Do you want to keep going in a circle, Applejack?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Up to you, Rainbow Dash. I insist.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [chuckles] No, no. I insist.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Heh. But I insisted first.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Are we still on a field trip? 'Cause this just feels like being lost.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Ugh.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: We can still get back to school before dark if we cross that ravine and stop doubling back.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: We knew that. All part of our plan. Right, Applejack?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Uh, yup! All we have to do is, uh... build a bridge 'cross that, uh, giant canyon, and we're home free. That is, if-if you think a bridge is a good idea.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Only if you want to build a bridge.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Stop! Listen. We can just fly everyone over and be done.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Nope! There's still plenty o' time to teach y'all a lesson in teamwork.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Cooperation!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Togetherness!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: You are so right!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Only as right as you are!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Okay! We'll build a bridge! What do we use?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I'm goin' with your idea! Vines! No buts about it!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I-I'm building with your idea! Branches! End of story!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [muffled] Why use a branch when you can use a vine? [grunting] Whoa!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Why didn't I think of branches to begin with? They're so<U+0097> [yelping] ...easy to work with.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [muffled] Come on now... [grunting] These here vines are just the thing, Rainbow Dash!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Uh, at least now they're agreeing on something.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [grunting] I can't get out!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Let me guess. Bite-acudas?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Mm-hmm.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: And they look mighty hungry.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: We gotta get our professors out of there! Anycreature have a plan?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Leave 'em hangin'?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: What?!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I'm kidding! ...Kinda.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: We need to work fast! And together!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: But mainly fast.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I hate to admit it, but<U+0097>

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: ...this whole mess is kinda our fault.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Yeah. No trophy is worth getting eaten over.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: So what do ya say? You want to team up and get ourselves out of this here pickle barrel?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: I thought you'd never ask.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Aah! Don't worry. I'm just the distraction.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Ocellus?!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [sighs] You nearly scared the cutie marks off us!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Need a lift?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Welcome back, professors!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Now, that was a rescue!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: And y'all did it together!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: No big. Those fish weren't even a thing.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [chuckles] Oops. Sorry.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [giggles] Best... field trip... ever!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Huh? How was the field trip? What did you all learn?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Yak learn ponies smart!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Yeah! Professors Applejack and Rainbow Dash were such good teachers!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: It was kind of crazy genius. They showed us what not to do so we'd figure out what we should do.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Really...?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: It took us a while to get it.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Especially at the ravine. It would've been so much easier to just fly home.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: But instead, our professors built bridges the wrong way just to show us how important teamwork is.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Yeah. That was super dangerous. Talk about commitment.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: We know it's too early to pick the Teacher of the Month. But we'd like you to consider Rainbow Dash and Applejack.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Thank you for telling me. I'm so glad to hear your field trip was a success. I'll make sure to schedule another one right away.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [to Rainbow Dash and Applejack] You were actually just competing the entire time, weren't you?

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: To tell you the truth... yeah.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Well, not all the time. I agreed with you for the whole nature walk.

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: Only 'cause you were anglin' for that Teacher of the Month award!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: You were the one doing the "angling"!

title: Non-Compete Clause
dialog: [scoffs] You were more like fandanglin'!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: You said it, Big Mac. This is taking forever! I know it's wrong to cut corners when it comes to gifts from the heart, but this is an emergency, right?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Eeyup.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Discord? A little help? Discord!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Yeah? Oh! Good idea! [clears throat] Captain Wuzz! Are you prepared to enter the world of Ogres & Oubliettes?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Huzzah, fellow adventurers! Shall we storm the ramparts of Squizard's castle to reclaim Calico's Ring of Imperceptibility?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: You did summon me for a rousing Guys' Night of Ogres & Oubliettes, did you not?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Uh, sort of. But do you think you could magically hurry up this pie real quick first?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: You seem to be mixing up [poof!] the Lord of Chaos [poof!] with a second-rate clown magician for hire.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Eee... wait!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: This needs to go in the mail today, or it'll never get to Sugar Belle in time for Hearts and Hooves Day!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Please. Can't you see that that holiday is a commercialized ruse pushed on you by the greeting card industry?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Keep your eye on the pie. [<e0> la Doug Henning] It's magic time!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [sniffing] This smells... uh... palatable.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Well, pies really are Sugar Belle's thing. But I think that makes this all the more special. It shows you're interested in what she cares about.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Eeyup!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: And he's planning a big romantic Hearts and Hooves dinner. It was my idea to bake the invitation inside.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [reading] "Happy Hearts and Hooves Day, Sugar Belle. Meet me in my barn at sunset for a surprise."

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Pretty clever, huh?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Awww. "Sugar Belle". See?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Well, you two certainly have bought into this romance nonsense hook, line, and sinker.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: For a formerly friendless immortal despot, you're pretty cynical.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I'm a realist. And love, like all things warm and fuzzy, isn't real.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Aw, come on. You act tough, but deep down, you're a softie. I mean, you don't have tea with Fluttershy every weekend because you like tea.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: But I do like tea! Every tea! All the teas! Chamomile, Earl Grey, green, white, yellow, mate, lemon, ginger, chai, spearmint, peppermint, hibiscus... [inhale] ...cinnamon, pumpkin spice.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Tell you what. While Big Mac mails his incredibly romantic gesture, I'll show you the splendors of Hearts and Hooves Day in Ponyville. I bet I can prove you believe in love.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Fine. Call it a gentleman's wager. Loser mows my lawn for eternity.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Is it, like, a riding mower or...?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Tweezers!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Hear ye, hear ye! This special Hearts and Hooves Day meetin' of the Cutie Mark Crusaders is now in session! First order of business <U+0096> helpin' my big brother decorate the barn for his big date with Sugar Belle tonight, and... Hello?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: It seems like everypony's got somepony special but us.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: When's it gonna be our turn?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Huh?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [gasps] Who's it from?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Can't tell. It's all smudged, but it looks like it's addressed to... "Belle"? Hmmm...

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [gasps] "Sweetie Belle"!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Somepony certainly went through a lot of trouble for me! On Hearts and Hooves Day!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [gasps] You don't think...

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Could it be...?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Hang on a minute. Mysterious package, smudged address, no idea who it's from... Hm. I know what this is. You've got a secret admirer!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [sighs] Another Hearts and Hooves Day. Love is in the air, Discord. Look at all these happy couples.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: How can they be happy if they aren't playing Ogres & Oubliettes?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: As a great dragon poet once wrote to his beloved, "I love you with the utmost clarity. I love you, dear. My sweet, sweet Rarity<U+0097>" Are you even listening?!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Of course. "Love is... something-something, and Discord is great." I don't know. Can we play O&O now?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Sure, after you admit you believe in love and... Sugar Belle!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Big Mac's girlfriend. What's she doing in town so early?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Mrs. Well, Sugar Belle, I'm sure Big Mac won't be expecting it.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [gasps] She's planning her own romantic surprise for Big Mac? What if she goes to Sweet Apple Acres before Big Mac's ready with his surprise? We've gotta warn him!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [singing] ...ffle, cookin' a souffle...

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Aah!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Whoa!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [slurring] Mig Bac... Mig Bac...! [groans] I mean, Big Mac! We just saw Sugar Belle! She's at Sugarcube Corner! But I think she's on her way over here now! You gotta keep her away from here until the barn's finished!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [gasps] Eeyup!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I wonder what she has planned for him.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Aah!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Ugh! Will you warn me next time you do that?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Ohhhh. She hasn't seen him yet. Take note, Discord. This is what love is all about.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: "Spike <U+0096> Love is about spying in the bushes."

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Make fun of me all you want. But look at Big Mac's face and tell me you don't believe in love.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I hope he'll be okay without me.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Oh. Hey. We're just... not spying<U+0097>

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Hush!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I mean, he has been on his own before. So he'll be fine, right? [sighs] How should I tell Big Mac tonight? "You won't need to come visit me in my village anymore"? "We need to talk."

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Mrs. Just be honest with him.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: You're right. Okay! "We're finished."

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: You're right. She did surprise him.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Ugh.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Okay. Things seem bad. Maybe they're really not. Maybe "we're finished" was about the day. Ponies say that, right? Like-like, "Hey, remember yesterday? That's finished, 'cause it's today!"

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Maybe not that. Oh, I know! Maybe Sugar Belle has a wacky cousin who's never been on his own, and she has to leave him in charge of her shop while she apprentices with Mrs. Cake, who does that, like, two days a week. N-No, no, three. That's why she won't need you to come to her village anymore, because... she'll already be here!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Nah. I don't even buy that one.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Oh, I hate seeing you like this, Big Mac. And over a girl, no less. I'm calling an emergency Guys' Night [poof!] right now to cheer you up.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Class is now in session.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Lesson one <U+0096> nothing can break your heart if you only love yourself. You've got to show everypony that you're too cool to be bothered with so-called love. Observe.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: This is how cool guys lean against things. When you see a guy leaning against a thing looking this cool, you think, "Wow! That guy doesn't have a care in Equestria. Not a guy who leans on things that cool."

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I don't think leaning's gonna help. Am I doing it right? Whoa!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: We're not like you, Discord. We can't put on a front and pretend not to love. It's impossible.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Lesson two <U+0096> plenty of ponies in the pasture. Right, Big Mac? I know just the gal to make you forget all about Sugar Belle.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: You... said... her... [wailing] naaaaaaame!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Okay. We finished decoratin' the barn for Big Mac, which means we got the rest of the day to ourselves. There's a whole town of possible admirers out there and only three of us. But together, we're gonna get to the bottom of this! Ready? Break! Excuse me! Pipsqueak? Mind answerin' a few questions? No? Late for somethin'? Are you Sweetie Belle's secret admirer?!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [to Button Mash] Excuse me! I'm doing a research survey about sending pie in the mail anonymously. Would you say you're pro-that or anti-that?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [to Snips and Snails] Happy Hearts and Hooves Day! Did you boys happen to send any packages to me recently? It's okay to say no! I won't be offended! [whispering] Please say no, please say no, please say no.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Wow. You're really going all out to cheer up Big Mac. I'm impressed.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Yes, yes, I'm amazing. Anyway, since we're in the neighborhood, care for a quick game of Ogres & Oubliettes? Like I've been wanting to play all week?!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I take it back.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I'm helping our friend first and foremost. See for yourself.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I think he's showing her a picture of Sugar Belle.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: What?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: And now he's crying.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: No-no-no-no-no-no-no-no-no. No, he's not. Let me see that.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Don't touch it! I'm looking!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Give me that!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Cut it out! Discord, quit it!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: She used to do this thing where her-her nose would wrinkle when she laughed. Right there, in that hole where your nose used to be. I never told her how much I loved wrinkle-nose cutie-face... [wailing] and now I never will!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Okay. I think we've had enough of the aloof master of chaos remedies for a broken heart. You know what I do when I have a problem too big to solve? I hide from it! When she can't find you, she'll realize how much she misses you. Plus, if she can't find you, she can't break up with you.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Eeyup. Hup!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Ha!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [sighs] I don't get it. We asked every stallion in Ponyville.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [groans] There's gotta be somepony we're missin'. Somepony obvious. Somepony right in front of our noses.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Oh, well. At least the barn's looking great for Big Mac's date.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Too bad there won't be a date.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Sugar Belle is so lucky to have a non-secret admirer like Big Mac.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Well, she certainly doesn't seem to have appreciated it.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I bet she's gonna take one look at this barn and say, "What did I ever do to deserve this?"

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [whispering] Yes, what did she do to deserve this?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: She broke my heart.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Well, not yet, technically. In fact, she can't break your heart if you break hers first.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [angrily] Eeyup!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Thanks for the tour of Ponyville, Mrs. Cake.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Mrs. Oh, my pleasure.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I'm off to surprise Big Mac with the news. Imagine the look on his face when I tell him, "We need to talk."

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Mrs. Oh, dear me, no! I told you, don't say it that way or he'll think you're breaking up with him.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Break up with him? Never! Why, without my favorite delivery pony, I couldn't imagine being happy ever again. He knows that.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: He's a good listener, that pony. I promise you, no mix-ups.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Ah! Big Mac!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Sugar Belle... we need to talk.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I know why you're here.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: You do?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: But I have somethin' to tell you first.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Oh, can I go first? I'm gonna be<U+0097>

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Stop.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Oh. Why don't we tell each other on three? One<U+0097>

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: It's over!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: What's over?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: You and me. It's over.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Ah... What?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: We're breakin' up!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I... don't understand. Why are you breaking up with me? And why are you leaning like that?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I... don't know!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Big Mac, please. Talk to me.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I... You... [loud groan] This is why I don't like talkin'! Words can hurt! Words hurt! Goodbye, Sugar Belle!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Big Mac! Oh, thank goodness! You gotta help us with this.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Ugh. Dude, how long have you been not hiding?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Oh. I should probably have said something.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Y'all should go.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Did ya...? Did she...? Are ya...?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Big Mac, what's goin' on? Where's Sugar Belle?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Just go!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: But we worked so hard on this chart. I think we've almost cracked it. If you could just<U+0097>

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Not right now!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: But I can't stand having a secret admirer who's too scared to tell me who he is!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Maybe he doesn't like talkin'!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: But that doesn't make any sense!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Maybe he used to talk too much, and it only ever got him into trouble!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [sighs] What if you're right, Discord? What if love isn't real at all?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I'm sorry, Sweetie Belle. I'm just mad, and I'm takin' it out on you.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: That's okay. I bet it felt good to get it out though.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Actually, it did. Tellin' you how I felt just then... I gotta go!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Big Mac! Where are ya goin'?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I gotta talk to Sugar Belle!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Discord, you gotta use your magic and...! Guess you have better things to do. Big Mac's gonna need a miracle.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Oh. All the rotten luck...

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Caught ya just in time! We both know I don't like to say much, but I'm gonna say somethin' now. [sighs] Even though I'm hurtin', I wouldn't trade this feelin' for anythin'. Because it'd mean givin' up the good times we had, too. I only broke up with you because you were gonna break up with me. I respect your decision, and you should know you'll always be in my heart.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I didn't want to break up with you.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: But... you said you didn't need me to visit anymore. You said I'm gonna be on my own. I-I heard you said "we're finished" when I was hidin' in the bushes.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: That sounds worse than it is.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Oh, Big Mac! I was talking about my cousin! I have this wacky cousin who's never been on his own, but I have to let him run my shop on weekends. Which is why you won't be delivering to my village anymore because I'll already be here apprenticing with Mrs. Cake, who does that two days a week. No, three.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Wait 'til I tell Spike!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: I'd never break up with you! I suppose there's a lesson here somewhere about communication, talking instead of assuming, or eavesdropping is wrong. Wouldn't you say?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Eeeeyup!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Hee-hee. Wrinkle-nose cutie-face. [kisses] You must've been awful confused at my breakin' up with you after you got my pie.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: What pie?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: You didn't get the pie I sent?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Mm-mm.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Or the invitation?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Uh-uh.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Well, in that case... allow me to escort you to a Hearts and Hooves Day surprise!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Mind if we join ya?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [chomp] [reading] "Happy Hearts and Hooves Day, Sugar Belle. Meet me<U+0097>"

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Sugar Belle?!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: You have got to be pulling our hooves!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: It was all a mix-up?!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Oh, it's funny. I've been sitting here feeling sorry for myself for not having a special pony on Hearts and Hooves Day. But remembering all the fun we had, I think I have two special ponies <U+0096> my two best friends.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: [sighs] And so ends another Hearts and Hooves Day. Despite a bumpy start... and middle... and ending... lot of bumps today... love was in the air.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: So was confusion, apparently, and a fair number of assumptions.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: But you have to admit, after seeing everything Big Mac went through, love is a hundred percent real.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Seriously?! Discord, come on! I can't believe you!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Who do you think broke Sugar Belle's wagon wheel?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Ta-da! Happy Hearts and Hooves Day!

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: You old softie. [laughs] I knew you had a heart.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Calico's Ring of Imperceptibility isn't going to reclaim itself, you know.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Ogres & Oubliettes? I thought you'd never ask! Oh, and... just wondering. No biggie, but... is Skellinore gonna be there?

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Spike, she's an imaginary one-dimensional paper cutout skeleton.

title: The Break Up Break Down
dialog: Well, nopony's perfect.

title: Molt Down
dialog: I do appreciate you showing me the way to the phoenix nests, Spike.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Anything for you, Rarity. Besides, I've been meaning to visit Peewee.

title: Molt Down
dialog: He really was an excellent pet. I can't imagine why you set him free.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Phoenixes aren't meant to be domesticated. Even in the wild, they like to keep to themselves.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Well, they are beautiful. A few of their feathers will add just the right splash of color to my latest<U+0097> Spike! What are you doing?

title: Molt Down
dialog: Uh, nothing!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Is there something wrong with your face?

title: Molt Down
dialog: [sighs] It's a stone scale. It isn't magical or anything like the call of the Dragon Lord. It's just... red. And itchy. [groans] And embarrassing.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Ooh, precious pants, that does look uncomfortable. But even I get the odd blemish from time to time. It's nothing to be embarrassed by. You could pay Zecora a visit. She makes a cream that works wonders. Just don't get the shampoo.

title: Molt Down
dialog: There's Peewee's parents! But I don't see Peewee.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Oh, maybe he moved out. Everypony has to leave the nest at some point.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Peewee!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Perhaps you should pay Zecora a visit sooner rather than later.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [sighs] I don't want anypony else to see this. Besides, I'm sure it'll clear up after a good night's sleep.

title: Molt Down
dialog: I can't believe you're still asleep!

title: Molt Down
dialog: It's nearly noon, and you promised to help me with my lecture for class today!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Noon? Whoa! I slept like a rock! Which reminds me <U+0096> all that sleep probably cleared up my stone scale!

title: Molt Down
dialog: [gasps] Um, on second thought... [chuckles nervously] You can go back to sleep if you want.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Spike, what are you doing?

title: Molt Down
dialog: Hiding from my hideous face!

title: Molt Down
dialog: I'm sure it feels terrible, but it's just a breakout. It's not the end of the world.

title: Molt Down
dialog: I used to get terrible breakouts any time I had a final exam with Celestia. Who probably never had a blemish her whole life.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Well, I'm not in magic school.

title: Molt Down
dialog: No, but these things can be stress-related. And you did spend yesterday with Rarity.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [chuckles nervously] What could possibly be stressful about that?

title: Molt Down
dialog: [groans] You could try Zecora. She makes a cream that<U+0097>

title: Molt Down
dialog: Fine. But you're still gonna help me practice my lecture.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [clears throat] The element of generosity and its importance in relation to the other Elements of Harmony<U+0097>

title: Molt Down
dialog: [gasps] My lecture!

title: Molt Down
dialog: ...indigestion. I'm so sorry!

title: Molt Down
dialog: [sighs] It's okay. I'm sure I can rewrite the lecture from my notes. I have a lot.

title: Molt Down
dialog: I can help you with<U+0097>

title: Molt Down
dialog: Maybe you should leave the castle after all. And go somewhere less... flammable?

title: Molt Down
dialog: Hey there, not handsome.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [singsongy] Oh, Spike! My, what a fetching ensemble you put together. Very noir-esque. [giggles] I believe Shadow Spade herself would approve.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Uh, thanks.

title: Molt Down
dialog: But I wonder if you wouldn't mind taking it off.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Sorry, you'll have to speak up. My ears are a little bit clogged or something. It's just that I absolutely must have a model for my phoenix feather dress, and nopony else is available.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Sorry, Rarity, but I... I am super busy all day giving... tours of the school!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Really? I thought I was giving tours today. Guess not. Free day! Whee! Woo-hoo!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Classrooms are that way. [groans] Dorms are that way. [groans] Twilight's office is up there. This is a fountain.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Oh. Um, yeah. [wincing, scratching] Sorry.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [low voice] I don't know.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [low voice, straining] I don't... know!

title: Molt Down
dialog: [echoing] This is the school library! It's one of the most serene spots on campus, where students can spend time in quiet reflection or study! What?!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Could you please stop shouting? We're trying to do our homework, and it's kind of distracting.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [loud voice] Was I shouting?!

title: Molt Down
dialog: If you're trying to hide, you need to do a better job. All I had to do was follow the smoke.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [low voice, straining] Leave me alone!

title: Molt Down
dialog: What?

title: Molt Down
dialog: [low voice, straining] Leave! Me! Alone!

title: Molt Down
dialog: I can't under... Was that "sleeves made of foam"?

title: Molt Down
dialog: [laughs] Wow! I have seen some pretty bad molts in my time, but yours takes the cake!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Molts?

title: Molt Down
dialog: The molt? Super painful stone scales, fire burps, uncontrollable volume shifts? It's all part of growing up dragon. Congrats!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Oh. Sorry.

title: Molt Down
dialog: No-no-no-no-no. The last time I grew up, I turned into a giant greedy monster.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Greed-induced bigness. That's totally different. The molt is completely normal. Every dragon goes through it. Pretty soon, you'll leave and strike out on your own.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Why would I do that?

title: Molt Down
dialog: Have you been living with ponies your whole life?

title: Molt Down
dialog: Uh-huh.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Oh. Well, in the Dragon Lands, a molter's loved ones kicks them out at the first stone scale.

title: Molt Down
dialog: What? Why?

title: Molt Down
dialog: I think it's biological. We call it the "molt effect". I haven't even told you about the smell.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Smell? [sniffs] Ugh!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Yeah. I mean, I love my brother and all, but one whiff, and I was all "See ya!" [sniffs] Speaking of which...

title: Molt Down
dialog: Wait! Does the molt effect happen to ponies too? [gasps] Twilight already asked me to leave the castle today. If she kicks me out, where am I gonna live? I'm too young to grow up!

title: Molt Down
dialog: I'm sure you'll find a nice...

title: Molt Down
dialog: ...hoard of gems to guard or a village to terrorize. Oh, now that dragons and ponies are friends, I guess that's off the table.

title: Molt Down
dialog: So no creature's gonna wanna be around me?

title: Molt Down
dialog: Oh, I didn't say that. That molt stench is a magnet for predators. Tatzlwurms, hydras, rocs...

title: Molt Down
dialog: Dragons are scared of rocks?

title: Molt Down
dialog: R-O-C-S. Rocs? Humongous birds of prey that can snack on a molting dragon like candy!

title: Molt Down
dialog: [low voice] So Twilight's kicking me out, and the only creatures who don't find me disgusting want to eat me?

title: Molt Down
dialog: Seriously, I heard none of that.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [loud voice] Twilight's kicking me out, and the only creatures who don't find me disgusting want to eat me?!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Congrats!

title: Molt Down
dialog: [shouting] Hey! Is this the shouting closet?! Because I've got a free day, and I'm totally up for some shouting! [sniffs] [normal voice] Also, where's that brussel-sprouts-covered-in-cotton-candy smell coming from? Because it is really interesting.

title: Molt Down
dialog: I didn't know where else to go. I can't take the chance that Twilight will kick me out. You aren't feeling any molt effects, are you?

title: Molt Down
dialog: [nose plugged] When it comes to breakouts, I've seen all circumstances. But as with the molt smell... let's not take any chances.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [scratches, sighs] Is there anything you can do to cure me?

title: Molt Down
dialog: The ailments you have aren't something to cure. The molt's a condition that dragons endure.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [scratches] But if anypony sees or smells me right now, they'll be so grossed out, they'll avoid me forever!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Perhaps we can lessen this strange molt effect. The smell is the most likely cause, I suspect.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [low voice] It's all so embarrassing.

title: Molt Down
dialog: I know you are speaking, but I can't hear a thing. Are you talking about teaching asparagus to sing?

title: Molt Down
dialog: [low voice] I said it's [loud voice] embarrassing!

title: Molt Down
dialog: If the goal is to not have your friends all depart, perhaps your volume is where we should start.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Zecora! Hello? Are you there?

title: Molt Down
dialog: [loud voice] I can't let Rarity see me like this! Please don't let her know I'm here!

title: Molt Down
dialog: [loudly] Oh, dear! I'm talking even louder than I thought, aren't I?!

title: Molt Down
dialog: I have volume concerns today by the scores. But it seems that I'm ready to help you with yours.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [loudly] Eh, I-I'm sorry?! I can't seem to hear anything! I was hoping you could help! I have no idea what happened! One minute, I was sewing phoenix feathers onto a dress, and the next I couldn't hear my own voice!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Ah, the feathers of that bird can affect ponies' ears. It's a magic ailment I've treated for years.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [loudly] I only know you're talking 'cause your mouth is going up and down. [sighs, sniffs, coughs] [normal volume] Oh, goodness! I hope that incredibly pungent odor belongs to some sort of magical curative. [loudly] I hope you're not busy, but I must have my hearing back! It turns out that I talk to myself while I sew, and without that conversation, I simply can't think!

title: Molt Down
dialog: It's a simple cure, and the directions are clear. Just one or two drops in each of your ears.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [sighs, normal volume] Oh, thank you. You're an ear saver. [loudly] Oh, and while I am here, do you have any blemish cream?! Spike is having some scale issues!

title: Molt Down
dialog: [loud voice] You have no idea!

title: Molt Down
dialog: [gasps, normal voice] I think I heard something! [loudly] Your cure is working already!

title: Molt Down
dialog: The cream that you want is just over here. It's a popular potion for all creatures this year.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [sighs, normal voice] Thank you, Zecora.

title: Molt Down
dialog: [loudly] I don't mean to be rude, but I do think your hut could use an airing out!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Rarity's gone. There's no need to hide. [sniffs, groans] Though I wonder if we should continue outside. Can't treat your symptoms down there on the ground. It's safe to come out. There's no ponies around.

title: Molt Down
dialog: I'm not hiding from ponies. I'm hiding from that!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Did I forget to mention the molt smell attracts predators?

title: Molt Down
dialog: That's something that would've been quite nice to know! But it's not worth discussing right now! We should go!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Okay, maybe this wasn't a good plan.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Oh, Spike. What are you doing here?

title: Molt Down
dialog: Rarity! You have to get out of here! There's a giant roc trying to eat me! It's got Zecora!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Yes, what? [loudly] I was just at Zecora's, but I'm heading back! I can't read these instructions! Does this say "two drops once a day" or "one drop twice a day"?!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Rarity, there's no time! We have to get help!

title: Molt Down
dialog: [loudly] Yes, my ears are completely clogged! Why, Spike! Your stone scales look worse! Oh, here! I picked up just the thing. Ah<U+0097>

title: Molt Down
dialog: Oh, I wish you'd escaped either claw of this bird! But the both of us trapped in the same one's absurd!

title: Molt Down
dialog: [loudly] What?!

title: Molt Down
dialog: [groans] Let my ponies go!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Spike, what are you doing?

title: Molt Down
dialog: If my stone scales didn't itch so much and we weren't in immediate danger, this would be [chuckles] really embarrassing!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Danger?

title: Molt Down
dialog: Well, I was headed to Zecora's to get some cream for your scales. I had no idea you were<U+0097>

title: Molt Down
dialog: Molt smell?

title: Molt Down
dialog: [high-pitched] Twilight!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Whoa!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Was that Rarity?

title: Molt Down
dialog: And Zecora! I tried to save them, but it's all I can do to stop scratching long enough to dive out of the way when that bird attacks!

title: Molt Down
dialog: [gasps, sighs] Finally! I didn't think that itching would ever stop!

title: Molt Down
dialog: What's happening?! I... I can't move!

title: Molt Down
dialog: What just... happened? Did I just sprout wings? I just sprouted wings!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Whoops.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Spike?! How did you get wings?!

title: Molt Down
dialog: I don't know! But they're pretty aweso<U+0096> Whoa!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Do you think you can fly up and distract him while I work on freeing Zecora and Rarity?

title: Molt Down
dialog: Hey, giant chicken! If you like dragons so much, come and get me!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Greetings.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Spike!

title: Molt Down
dialog: I know that the molt produced surprising things. But I'm glad that the last was a new pair of wings!

title: Molt Down
dialog: [loudly] Yes! And also, I'm glad you've got wings!

title: Molt Down
dialog: This is amazing! I didn't know if you'd ever get wings. I'm so happy for you. Does it have something to do with this molt you were talking about?

title: Molt Down
dialog: [sighs] It's what's been going on with me. The breakout, the fire burps. The molt is when dragons get older and start to change. I wish I could stop it, but I can't. I-I should go.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Go? What are you talking about?

title: Molt Down
dialog: In the Dragon Lands, families make molters leave home. It's called the molt effect.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Well, this isn't the Dragon Lands, and molt effect or no, I don't want you going anywhere.

title: Molt Down
dialog: But I'm growing up. What if something even worse happens?

title: Molt Down
dialog: You're supposed to grow up, but you'll always be you. And whatever happens, we'll get through it together.

title: Molt Down
dialog: Woo-hoo! Yeah! Woo-hoo! Look at me! Let's go home!

title: Molt Down
dialog: Uh, I don't need to carry you anymore, do I? You have wings.

title: Molt Down
dialog: They are new, and I don't want to overdo it.

title: Molt Down
dialog: I can't believe you thought any of us would send you away because of some silly molt effect. [sighs] Even if the symptoms were slightly unsettling. And let's face it, the odor wasn't pleasant. Nopony would stop caring for you just because you were getting older. Everypony goes through changes, but sometimes change can be wonderful. Like being able to model for any length of dress! [giggles] Uh, a bit higher, darling, please?

title: Molt Down
dialog: I'm glad to help, Rarity. But don't you think there's wonderful things about flying that don't involve dresses?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Whoa, whoa, whoa!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Almost... there...

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Ah! I can't wait! Twilight's school is supposed to be amazin' inside!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [whispering] Rarity says there's never been a school like it!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [grunting] I heard the students get to do tons of awesome stuff!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Do ya see anything yet?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Uh, yeah. It looks like a broom! And a dustpan and some buckets.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: That sounds like a closet.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Try another window.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Whoa, whoa, whoa!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Whoa...

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Whooooo's ready for cupcakes?!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Oh, they're not for you, silly. They're for sharing! First, say something nice like this. Ocellus, you are a great listener! Now you get to keep one cupcake and share one with another creature.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Yona, you're really strong!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Ugh!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Whoa!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: All right, students! It's time to meet some new friends!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: That's friendship in action, y'all!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Wow! And I thought our school was fun!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Yeah! Miss Cheerilee never lets us play buckball in class. I know. I've tried.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Hey! Why don't we go here instead? It's still school, right?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [cheering] Great idea!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [sighs] What could be better than learnin' friendship with your best friends?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [clears throat] Good morning, class. Today, we're going to learn about friendship through the ages. Spike, slide one, please.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Back in the days of Chancellor Puddinghead... Uh, Spike?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Huh? Sorry, Twilight. Still getting used to my new wings. They're pretty great, huh?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Yes, Spike. As I was saying... Huh? What are you three doing here?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: We wanna go to your school!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: But why?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: We wanna learn friendship!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: And play buckball!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: I see. Why don't you three come with me? Spike, you're in charge.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Yes!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Hi, Twilight! Looks like you could use a guidance counselor's help! Hint, hint.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: No, thanks, Starlight. I've got this.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [sadly] Great. Well, I'll just... go dust my office for the seventieth time.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [to Cutie Mark Crusaders] I'm sorry to have to tell you this, but... you can't be my students.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Why not?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Isn't this place for everycreature?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Yes, but we teach friendship lessons here. You already know all about helping ponies in need and being there for each other.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Can't you just give us a chance?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Pleeeeeeeeeeeaaaase?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: You need Cheerilee's classes, not mine. Hurry up. You don't want late marks on your permanent record.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Spike?! What did you do?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [sighs] Well, I'm not giving up! I know we can prove we belong in this school!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Yeah! Um... how?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: By showin' Twilight we've still got lots to learn about friendship. And I know just where to start.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [grunts] What in tarnation? Apple Bloom! You know better than to leave our good tools out like that! And aren't you supposed to be on harvest duty right now?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Eh, it's not like the apples are goin' anywhere.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [stammering] What's gotten into you? Those chores are your responsibility! Farm work is family work!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Sorry, Applejack. Maybe if I went to Twilight's school, I'd learn to be better at helpin' the family.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Ahhh. So that's what this is all about. Well, if it's learnin' you want, I'd be happy to give you a private lesson right now... [angrily] Startin' with cleanin' up all this equipment!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Hmph!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Please can I go to Twilight's school?!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Please? Please?!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: How 'bout now?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: So there I was, leading the Wonderbolt formation into a super dangerous Sundown Spiral, when suddenly... [imitates whooshing] There was a huge storm cloud in our way!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: My genius happened! I changed the routine on the fly! And because my crew are such tight friends, they followed me!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Only the coolest thing ever! I flew up and<U+0097>

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Did a super-amazing half-twist into a backflip sonic rainboom?!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Hey! I never told that story to my students before. Scootaloo!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: They're coming! Get ready!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Look out!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [stiltedly] Look out! Whoa!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [stiltedly] Hey! Watch where you are going!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [stiltedly] I was watching! Watching you drive like a crazy pony!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [stiltedly] Well, maybe if you did not drop apples all over the street, I would not have to!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Ooh. I've never seen Apple Bloom and Scootaloo argue like this.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Yeah. They usually go together like candy canes and stripes.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Whoa! Oof!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [stiltedly] My apples? This is all your fault, Scootaloo!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [stiltedly] Hey, Sweetie Belle is the clumsy one!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [stiltedly] I'm not talking to either one of you ever again!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Goodness. They seem really upset.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: It's almost like they forgot they're friends.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [quietly] I think it's working!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [stiltedly] You are so careless! [quietly] Good plan, Apple Bloom!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [stiltedly] Careless? I will show you who is the one who is careless! [quietly] And great acting, Sweetie Belle!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [out loud] We're an awesome team!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: All right!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Yay!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Oops.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: You're friends again! I knew you would be! Candy cane stripes forever!
