title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Now they'll never let us into Twilight's school.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Okay, we've tried shirkin' chores, pesterin', disguises, fightin'.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Hmmm... We need to do something new. Something unexpected.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Great idea, Scootaloo! We haven't tried cryin' yet.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Yeah! It always works for Rarity.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: I wasn't crying. I think it's coming from outside.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Aww. She looks so sad. We better go see what's wrong.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Hey. Are you okay?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Oh. Thank you for asking. But no. I'm having real trouble with... [sniffling] ...the School of Friendship.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Twilight won't let you go either, huh?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Really?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: I just moved here to go to school, but everything's so new and different. I don't know anypony.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Well, now you do. I'm Apple Bloom. This is Sweetie Belle and Scootaloo. We're the Cutie Mark Crusaders.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [sniffs] I'm Cozy Glow. It's very nice to meet you, but I don't know if I'll stay long. I'll probably flunk out. I'm having so much trouble with my friendship lessons.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: We can help with those!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: We know all about friendship!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: And studyin' with you would be almost as good as bein' in class!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: But why would you help me? What's in it for you?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: That's how friendship works. When you give from your heart, you don't expect anything back.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Well, golly, if you really mean it...

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Uh-huh!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: I could use some help with my homework. I have to do something nice for each of these ponies. But I don't know anything about them. And it's so hard to talk to ponies you've never met.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Well, you're in luck, 'cause we know all of those ponies!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Get ready for a friendship A-plus!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: That's Bon Bon. If you wanna do something nice for her, first you gotta figure out what she needs.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Well, how am I supposed to do that?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Just pay attention. Friendship is about listening to others.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Ow. Ow.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Uh-oh. That cactus keeps pricking her every step she takes. Hmm, if only there was something to protect her from those spines.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Thank you! That's so thoughtful.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: I did it!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Good job! But, uh, next time, maybe don't give away my helmet.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Oopsie.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Green, purple, yellow. And one more purple. Whew. Sorting all those took longer than I thought.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: You really think Mrs. Cake will like these new sprinkle shakers?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Mm-hmm. Now she won't have to use rainbow sprinkles all the time. She can just pick the color she wants!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Mrs. Ooh! I'm sorry, I was out to lunch. Were you fillies waiting for me long?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: No. Um, these are for you!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Mrs. Oh, well, what a lovely surprise! I can't wait to try them out!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Mrs. Look! I made rainbow sprinkles! Aren't they wonderful?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: At least she likes her present?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Uh-huh...

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Golly. How'd you know that would make him so happy?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Friendship means pitchin' in to help others' chores go faster. 'Specially when their special somepony's waitin' for 'em.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [groans] That class was so boring!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Not even Miss Cheerilee can make the history of radishes exciting.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: I bet they don't have to learn about that stuff at Twilight's school.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Guess what! I got an A on my homework!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Nice goin'!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: And I never could have done it without your help!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: No problem!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: We just wish we could have done more.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Actually, you can. Headmare Twilight is giving us a big test at the end of the week, and I could really use your help studying.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: We wanted to go to Twilight's school more than anything. But helpin' you has been even more fun! You can count on us!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Um... intelligence?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Laughter?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Yes!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Is it... control?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Kindness! Loyalty! Honesty! Generosity! Laughter! Magic!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: How'd the test go?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Were there essay questions?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Did you remember what we taught you?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: But how could Cozy Glow fail her friendship test?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Ahem. I'd like to see you three in my office!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [quietly] I know we wanted to be invited inside, but it kinda went different in my head.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: I can't believe you'd do something like this!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Like what?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: You are Cozy Glow's tutors, aren't you?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: We've been working with her for days!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: That's what she told me. So you've been setting her up to fail?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: I know you're upset that I won't let you come to my school, but to teach Cozy all the wrong things out of spite... That's just cruel!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: But we taught her all the right things!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Then how do you explain these friendship test answers? [reading] "What are the six Elements of Harmony?" Five turtlenecks and a cheese grater? "Who is the Princess of Friendship?" Your mom?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: I... I don't understand.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Me neither. I never thought you three would pull such a mean prank. I'm afraid I'm gonna have to ask you to stay away from my school. And my students.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Oh, no!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Hmm? [dryly] Yay. Now I'll alphabetize them in reverse order. [sighs] Not much need for a guidance counselor at a school of friendship.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Aah!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: How much of that did you hear?! Uh, never mind.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [laughs nervously] Welcome! Can I get you a comfort pillow? Security blanket? Empathy cocoa?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Uh, I just need some advice.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Oh! Well, I have plenty of that! Anecdotes, insight, midnight confessions... I'm babbling. [clears throat] Go ahead. I'm listening.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: I think I got my friends in trouble. They helped me study for my friendship test, and I failed it... on purpose.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Well, the Cutie Mark Crusaders wanted to go to this school more than anything. So I thought if I showed Headmare Twilight they're bad at friendship, she'd let them come here with me.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: I guess I still have a lot to learn about friendship.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Actually, I think you're doing all right. Sure, that was a really, really bad way to try to help your friends, but what matters is you wanted to. The reason the Cutie Mark Crusaders don't go to this school is because they'd make better teachers than students.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: So you do have a place for them here?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Hmmm...

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [groans] I bet there's no "Wonderful World of Cleaning" lesson at Twilight's school.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [coughs] We'll never find out now.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [sighs] I still don't get how Cozy failed her test after all that studying.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Or how Twilight could blame us for it!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Or how gum can be so sticky!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Sorry to interrupt, Miss Cheerilee. But can I borrow Apple Bloom, Sweetie Belle, and Scootaloo?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: We didn't do anything wrong! We promise!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: I know that. Now. Which is why I wanted to talk to you.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Wait. So we're not in trouble?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Just the opposite. Cozy Glow, is there something you'd like to say?

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: This is all my fault. I messed up my test on purpose so we could all go to school together. I'm sorry.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Thank you, Cozy Glow. Honesty is one of the pillars of friendship. [to Cutie Mark Crusaders] But you already know that. Which is why I'd like to give you these.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: They're honorary diplomas, makin' y'all official graduates of this here school.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: You've more than earned them.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Without even having to study!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: [chanting] We are graduates! We are graduates! We are graduates!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: And if you're interested, I think Starlight has a place for you at my school after all.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Woo-hoo!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: We could use some friendship tutors on staff. And I hear you're the best out there.

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: Then what are we waitin' for? Let's get tutorin'! Come on, Cozy!

title: Marks for Effort
dialog: And that's why this school needs you as our guidance counselor.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [sighs] I've been planning this retreat for weeks, and we're already ten minutes behind! Where is that photographer?!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Of course. I'll help you set up your<U+0097>

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Ow! Hey!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Waaaait! You forgot Starlight! She needs a picture, too!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Yes, I know! We have been planning this for quite some time. [laughing evilly] Oh, thank you, Applejack. My spell can create a copy of anypony I desire. All I need is an image and a piece of the pony. [sniffs] Oh, and this.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Why copies, Rarity? Because Princess Twilight and her friends control the Elements of Harmony, the most powerful weapon in all Equestria.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Which means you - will - be - able - to - use - them - too!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: And serve me!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Together, we will destroy Twilight Sparkle and her meddlesome friends!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: With the Elements under my control, I'll build a new hive of Earth ponies, unicorns, and Pegasi, and I will rule as Queen once again!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Hmm. At least our retreat isn't too far behind schedule. Get ready for fun!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Are we talking fun fun, or learning pretending to be fun?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Both! We've all been so busy teaching, we've hardly had a chance to hang out with each other. And I may have scheduled some friendship activities as well!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Count me in! We can do friendship trust falls and pony pyramids! Oh! And hide and seek! Quick! Find me!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Well, I love the idea of some quiet time with my best friends.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [screams] You found me!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Rarity, why is Applejack carrying all your stuff?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Oh, that's not mine. Yes, I used to overpack a tad, but now it's just the essentials for me. I'm a simple filly.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Normally I wouldn't lug so much gear, but did y'all know this is Starlight's first time campin'?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: I just never really felt the need to... "hang out" in nature.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Home has books, tea, fewer bugs, a roof...

title: The Mean 6
dialog: That attitude right there is why I brought the whole kit and caboodle. I'm givin' Starlight the full Apple family campin' experience!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Um, where are we camping?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Right next to the Elements that brought us all together in the first place <U+0096> the Tree of Harmony!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Listen to your queen! We must retrieve the Elements of Harmony!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Excuse me?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: They've defeated my army. I know better than to strike alone. I need<U+0097>

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Servants! And the power of the Elements!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: The location of the most powerful weapon in Equestria isn't something made known to just anypony. I learned they were hidden somewhere in this forest.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Everypony, stop! And smell these roses! [sniffs] Ahhh! Oh, yeah!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [nervous giggle] Right. Roses. Fun. Now, let<U+0092>s try and stay on schedule.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Applejack, darling, anything in that wagon for mane maintenance?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Uh, let's see here. Uh... all right. I got a bandana!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Ugh, an entire wagon and no anti-frizz? Darling, you're not even prepared.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: I am! For campin'? How ya doin', Starlight?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Whoa! Ugh. [flatly] Great.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Oh, no! You and your sister fell out of your nest and got separated? That's terrible! Here. I'm sure your home isn't too far away.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [yelps] Pinkie! If we keep stopping to have fun, we're never gonna get to the fun things I've got planned!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [gasps] Good point! Last one to the Tree of Harmony is a parasprite! Whoo-hoo!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: The quicker we search the forest, the quicker we find the Elements.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Where... are... the others?!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Turn around. We're going back.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Very well. You have my permission.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: You're it! Hey, how'd you get ahead of me? You're fast.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Aren't they back there?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Sure! Unless they're already at the Tree of Harmony.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Oh-ho-ho. This is one of your "activities", right? Like a friendship quiz? It's the crystal tree that holds the Elements of Harmony. Boom!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [imitates buzzer] It's at the bottom of the stairs in the ravine by the Castle of the Two Sisters. Double boom!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Mm-hmm. Honestly, Twilight, these questions are super easy.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Right where you belong.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Oh, dear. This isn't where I belong. Oh, Rainbow Dash! I'm so glad you're here. I was lost.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: What just happened?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Oh, fantastic. First Pinkie races ahead of us, and now Fluttershy's lost somewhere behind us. My retreat is off to a great start!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: It's not like Fluttershy to disappear like this.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: We'll split up and search for her. We can all meet back at the Tree. Starlight, take the navigation gear and<U+0097>

title: The Mean 6
dialog: I'll find Pinkie Pie.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: This is ridiculous! Where are my other minions?!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [growls] Enough!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: You will go out there and find the others, you will bring them back here, and we will steal the Elements of Harmony so I can destroy Starlight's life like she destroyed mine! [through gritted teeth] Understand?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Hello again, little friend. I think I may be walking in circles.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [gasps] Oh, my! Where did you learn that kind of language? Um, excuse me?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Me? We're looking for Fluttershy!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Where's Starlight?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [grunts] Hey!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Rarity, what in the hay are you gonna do with a fishin' rod?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Starlight, darling, you're a gloriously bad camper. And coming from me, that is saying a lot.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: I know. Want to break it to Applejack for me?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Very funny, Applejack. Still me under all this gear. Starlight.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Applejack, darling, are you all right? You look a little peaky. And where's your wagon?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Pinkie! There you are! What are you doing?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: I thought you were racing to the retreat.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: What? Rainbow Dash! I think something's wrong with Pinkie!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Fluttershy! What's wrong?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [crying] Everycreature is mad at me!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [gasps] What?! That can't be right!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Twilight, your schedule can wait! Fluttershy's upset.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Oh, great. You upset Fluttershy, too?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: You know what, Twilight? Maybe if you weren't so worried about schedules, you'd realize you're the one ruining the retreat for your friends!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [gasps] Well, if my friends don't care about the retreat I planned for them... maybe they should've stayed home!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Your plan?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Grub-sitting you six is nothing like controlling my hive! Give me one good reason why I shouldn't just destroy you all and start over!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [to Applejack] I'm guessing some kind of curse? Maybe poison joke?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Well, somethin' sure ain't right.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Hang on. I got a shovel we can use to whack those vines out of the way.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Really? I can't believe you've never told us that story before.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: She's making a point. We get it. You're the greatest camper in the history of Equestria.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Uh, the things you gave me are silly?!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [gasps, tearing up] Glad I was so entertaining for you!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [to Mean Applejack] I'm going to make sure that she doesn't break a hoof out there, and then you and I are going to have a serious talk!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Finally! There. That's all of you. Nopony leaves without my say-so.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Starlight! Oh! Please stop running!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Ugh!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Of course I care about Fluttershy!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Then you've got a super weird way of showing it!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: W-What in Equestria's going on here?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Twilight is so into her retreat that she doesn't even care if her friends are upset! She just wants us to "stay on schedule"!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Well, I'm sorry, Pinkie! If I knew you thought this was a "boring, lame, no-fun retreat", I wouldn't have invited you in the first place!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: I never said that!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Sorry, y'all. We would've been here sooner, but we had to take the long way after Rarity ran off with all my stuff.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Wha<U+0097>?! I most certainly did not!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: What?! You know I ain't no liar! [to Starlight Glimmer] Where's all your gear?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Why? So you can laugh at me some more?!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Hey, hey, we're all friends here!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Everypony, quiet! Listen. We know each other really well <U+0097> the great stuff and how to get on each other's nerves, too. I wanted a fun trip with my friends. But instead, I got carried away with plans and ruined everything. If you want to forget it all and head home, I won't be offended. I just want us to stop fighting.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [to Starlight Glimmer] Hey, sorry if I got carried away with all that campin' stuff.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: I'm sorry, too. I should've just told you I'll never like camping. Also, I'll never like camping.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Well, if we're all being honest, I can't survive with just this tiny yet fashionable little saddlebag! I miss my things!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [to Twilight Sparkle] I'm sorry that you thought that I thought your plan was lame. Your plans are the most un-lamest!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: And I always have fun when we're all together. Even if it's learning pretending to be fun.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: So... does that mean you still want to have the retreat?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: If everypony likes me again.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Let's get to that Tree. I have the whole campsite set up and ready.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Just! Retrieve! The Elements!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: How dare you! I created you!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Servants always fail you in the end! Just wait, Starlight. I will have my revenge!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [gasps] Are you kidding me?

title: The Mean 6
dialog: [laughing] This was... the worst... day... ever!

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Come on, everypony. We can fix this campsite in no time.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Spoken like a true camper.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: Eh, don't push it.

title: The Mean 6
dialog: You know, if we can survive a day like this, I think our friendship is strong enough to handle anything the world can throw at us.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Who can tell me what these are?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Whoa...

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Me likey...

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Shiny!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Treasure?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Nope! They're all legendary magical artifacts!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Heh-heh. I've read ahead in Equestrian Cultures and Camaraderie: Volume Seven.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: You're right, Ocellus. This is the Amulet of Aurora, the Talisman of Mirage, the Helm of Yksler, the Crown of Grover, Knuckerbocker's Shell, and Clover the Clever's Cloak.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: And the gems are real! Eh, not that I... tasted them.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Princess Celestia gifted these to our school, since they each represent one of the cultures our students come from. And we'll learn all about them in a Spell-venger Hunt!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [aside, to Sandbar] Is that a pony thing?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Eh.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: It's a magical scavenger hunt. Each of you will work in pairs to try to find where in the school these artifacts are hidden.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: The team that finds the most wins a private tour of the Canterlot Archives with Princess Celestia.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [excited squeal] Learning and fun?! Does it get any better than that?!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: You've been underwater a long time, haven't you?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Gallus and Silverstream, sounds like you're our first pair!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: What? They'll make a great team.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Um, why pony glowing?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Wait. You all were called on this friendship quest, too?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: It must be a really important one.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: And terribly far away.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Just getting there will take days!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Do y'all know what this means? There won't be any teachers left to run the school!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Should we send our students home?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: I say we take 'em with us! Road trip!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Problem is we don't even know how long we'll be gone.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Don't worry, everypony. I already have a seventy-point plan in place for this very situation.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: You want me to be headmare?!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: You're the perfect choice! You're a good leader and an expert in friendship. I trust you to run this school exactly as I would.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Uh, that's a pretty big responsibility, Twilight.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Which is why I've prepared everything you need.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: The curriculum, rules for the Spell-venger Hunt, dining hall menus for the next six months...

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Six months?! You're not really gonna be gone that long, are you?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: ...and Spike. Anything that isn't covered in my files, he'll be able to help you with.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Then why not put him in charge?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: No-ho-ho, thanks. Eh, being a princess for Twilight was hard enough.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: I'm gonna pretend that made sense. But if you're sure it's what you really want, I promise I won't let you down.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: I knew I could count on you.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Great. What could possibly go wrong?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Goodbye, Rarity! A-And everypony!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Come back soon! Please!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Huh?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [through mock tears] I hate goodbyes, don't you? I just go to pieces.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Discord! What a... heh... nice surprise! This is your first time at our new school, isn't it?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Well, at least you're here now. Um, why are you here now?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: To fill in for Twilight, of course, as head-draconequus. I seem to recall a whole song about how this school is where you make your own rules. Now, who better at that than me?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Then you also must've heard Starlight is in charge now.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Really? I thought there must be some mistake.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Nope. Twilight picked me for the job. And she left pretty detailed instructions for me to follow.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [writing] "Item one <U+0096> Gravity is optional."

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Whoa-oa!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: "Item two <U+0096> The school's new mascot is an ambidextrous marmoset."

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: "Item three<U+0097>"

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Not gonna happen. I promised Twilight I'd handle this her way. So thanks, but no thanks.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Uh-oh. When we play Ogres & Oubliettes and he puts that many E's in "really", the things don't usually end well.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Don't worry, Spike. Discord and I are old "save Equestria" buddies. He'll be fine. Now, what's next on Twilight's list?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Okay. I hid the artifacts for the Spell-venger Hunt and ordered school supplies for the week. All you have to worry about is teaching class.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [sighs] Thanks, Spike. Maybe we will get through this okay.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Twittermites?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Ow!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Discord! What are you doing?!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [gags] We'll take it from here, Discord. Go relax. Have a cup of tea. At home.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Oh! Some thanks for all my help. And after I hired all those substitute teachers for you.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Actually, that does sound kinda helpful. And it was next on our to-do list.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Which teachers did you hire?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: They call it "making friends", because you have to make creatures be your friends! Show me what you've got, yak!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [clears throat, quietly] Be my friend.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: If you're quiet, I don't buy it!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [louder] Be my friend!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: I've heard pudding that's more convincing!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [huffs, even louder] Be! My! Friend!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [quietly] That's not how Twilight teaches friendship.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Some field trip! Where's my iced tea?! [sips, gulps, spits] This is too cold! [sips, gulps, spits] Now it's too hot!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [sips, gulps, spits] Now it's too tea-flavored!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: You call yourselves friends?!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: That is definitely not how Twilight teaches friendship.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: You hired a tree as a teacher?!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Its schedule was free.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Uh, guys? That's not just any tree.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [blows nose] It's a dragon-sneeze tree.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: W-W-W-Wait! Calm down, everycreature! It's gonna be okay!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [yells] BE MY FRIEEEEENNNND!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Mmmm, my, my, my. You do seem like you're in over your head. Won't Twilight be so disappointed with how you're ruining<U+0097>I mean, running her school?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Discord!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: This is all your fault!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Mine? I thought you were in charge here. But I'm happy to pitch in if you need me.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: What I need is for you to leave!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Happy now?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Come on, Discord. You know that's not what she means.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Fine! From now on, I won't try to help. At! All!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [groans] Thanks, Spike. Let's just hope he stays gone.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: I wouldn't count on it. I think Discord's trying to test you.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: But why? I thought we were friends.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Well, it's kinda what he does. Even to ponies or dragons he cares about.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Oh, well, I'm ready for him. I told Twilight I'd run her school right, and I'm gonna keep that promise. No matter what.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Good morning, students! I know there's been a little bit of adjustment since the professors left for their trip. But I've brought in new new teachers. And now everything should run smoothly. Now it's time for class. And don't forget, this afternoon is the Spell-venger Hunt!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [California accent] Yo! Greetings, fellow creatures!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Is this seat taken?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Welcome, class! You may call me the Great and Powerful Professor Trrrrrri<U+0097>

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Shhh! Really, that's so inconsiderate!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Oh, I better take this. Hello?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Oh, he did not! And what did you say?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [gasps] You did not!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Discord! Why are you here?!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Why, I'm a student of friendship, of course. Unless you don't think you're good enough to teach me.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Of course I am! No fruit calls in my class!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Magic is the most important element of friendship. So, today I, the Great and Powerful Trixie, will put on a magic show!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [chuckles] I'm learning so much. Aren't you?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [growls] Discord!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Eh, hello?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Um, what exactly is a long-distance plan?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Take a lap, team!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Uh, actually, we just finished Professor Spitfire's workout.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: I've never run so fast in my life! Oh, this is great!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [pants] Hey, coach, we need a break.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Discord, that's enough! Endangering students crosses the line! I don't know why you're trying to ruin this school, but it stops now!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: I wouldn't be so sure.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: This is your last warning.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Hey-hey-hey! Take it easy, Starlight! Discord's your friend, remember?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Well, he's not acting like it!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [huffs] She's right, Discord. What's your problem?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: My problem? How is the fact that Twilight decided to put an incompetent, power-hungry unicorn in charge of her school my problem?!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [nervous laughter] Don't worry. I just banished him from school grounds forever. He's fine.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: That probably made things worse. Why didn't you just talk to Discord?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Because he's right about one thing. I've been doing a terrible job as headmare.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: No, you haven't. Discord is just bein'... Discord.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Maybe. But I wonder why me being in charge bothers him so much.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: We can figure that out after the Spell-venger Hunt. C'mon!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: For this afternoon's Spell-venger Hunt, you'll need to use the artifacts' history to find where they're hidden in the castle. When you spot one, touch it with a magic shield to keep track of your score.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Twilight left the list of your hunt partners before she left. I'll pass out the shields.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Ready... set... Spell-venger Hunt!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: C'mon! We can use Twilight's observatory to watch the teams!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: I hope you know where you're going.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: To the Helm of Yksler!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Eh, works for me.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: In our book, it says Yksler was an honorable yak warrior. Any enemies that saw him put down their weapons in peace. I think his artifact must be in one of these suits of armor.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: I'm guessing that one.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Yes! One down, five to go!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Awww, Ocellus and Smolder found their first artifact! Wait. What's that?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Uh, I don't think that's part of the Spell-venger Hunt!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: The school is haunted!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: And not cool!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: We're totally gonna win this Spell-venger Hunt!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Yeah, I doubt that. But at least I know where one of the artifacts is. Saw Spike hide it yesterday.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: The Crown of Grover! Score!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: They say it's magic and King Grover used it to become the first ruler of Griffonstone. I know, pretty sweet, right?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: You paid attention in class!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: What?! I-If you ever tell an<U+0097>

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Whoa!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: 3D painting!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Yup, that's definitely Discord. This is not good.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: I thought you banished him from the school.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Only his body. Apparently, his ghost can come and go just fine. Let's go. We have to stop this.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: How? No offense, but I don't think magic is the answer against Discord.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: This time, I'm not using magic.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Hmm... What Yona look for?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: The Shell of Knuckerbocker. It's like a seashell, but if you blow into it, you call a dragon! There's a sweet poem in our book about it. "Climb to the heights with dragon flight." [gasps] Like flight of stairs!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Yona take pony word for it.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Huh?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [grunts] What's happening?!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Ugh! Yona not know! But Yona do know Yona not like Spell-venger Hunt!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [yelps] Whoa!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Everycreature, stop!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: B-B-B-But the school is haunted!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: It's not haunted. It's Discord.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Detention.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Discord, you can't keep messing up the school.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Then I have just one thing to say to you.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: I'm sorry.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: I had to stop thinking like a headmare and start thinking like a guidance counselor to finally understand. You felt left out.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Uh... [stuttering] I don't know what you're getting at.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Nopony ever invited you to the school. And when you offered to help, I didn't listen. I was so worried about doing things Twilight's way, I didn't stop to think about being a good friend. I'd like to apologize for that. And offer you the job of vice headmare.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Huh?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Really?!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: What?!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Why?!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: No!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Him?!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Totally confused.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: I accept! I mean, I-I-I suppose I can find some time in my busy schedule to help you out. But I will need my own office, expense account, parking space...

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: You're new to the world of education, aren't you?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Next time you want something, just ask for it, all right?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: But then we'd miss out on all those delightful misadventures.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Hey! Watch the wings!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Now, Vice Headmare Discord, if you'll help me get this Spell-venger Hunt back in order.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [snaps fingers] Everything is re-hidden.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [chuckles] Well, with a few surprises.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Discord! I can't believe you tricked us into going on a friendship quest that wasn't real!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Oh, back so soon?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: A glamour spell on our cutie marks?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: A fake summons from the map?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Hey, at least we got to go spelunking in that really creepy cave with all those eyeless worm creatures chasing us.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Oh, Yona so glad ponies back!

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Uh, y'all get the feelin' we missed somethin'?

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Thanks for taking care of the school, Starlight.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: It was a challenge. Heh. But I think things turned out just the way you'd have handled them.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: [to Discord] Guess this means you're not vice headmare anymore.

title: A Matter of Principals
dialog: Oh, poo! I just ordered business cards!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Ponies' voices fill the night Hearth's Warming Eve is here once again

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: La-la-la-la, la-la-la-la La-la, la-la, la-la, la-la

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [hesitantly] La-la-la-la... la...

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Not everycreature celebrate same way, you know.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Yeah. Dragons don't do pony holidays.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Sure we do! I love Hearth's Warming Eve! It's all about friends and presents and family and... presents!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: It's also about putting aside differences to come together, like the Earth ponies, Pegasi, and unicorns did on the first holiday.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Oh! Is that why you put their Fire of Friendship on top of the tree? To help us remember their unity?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: And 'cause it looks cool.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: This is my favorite day of the year! [giggles] Not that I don't like the other ones. Tuesdays are great!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Yona like any day that is start of winter break.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Two whole weeks without classes. How will Ocellus survive?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: I think you'll all enjoy the time off to be home with your families. To celebrate your own traditions. Attention, everycreature! School is officially out! Happy holidays, and we'll see you after the break!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: And for those of you traveling outside Equestria...

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Yeah, shouldn't you guys be getting ready to go? If you miss that train, it's a really long walk.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Go pack up, and we'll take you to the station.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: It's that new bowtie I wanted, isn't it?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: You'll have to wait and see.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: I'm waiting! But in the meantime, I'm shaking!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Wha... What happened?!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Everything's ruined <U+0096> that's what's happened!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: And I don't think it was an accident. Somepony was up here!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Over there!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Outside!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: That's the students' quarters!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Might as well give up, whoever you are! We got ya cornered!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Hello? Is anypony there?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: I'll check the back door!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: What's happening? [gasps] Another decorating party?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Has anycreature come in here?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Well, yeah. All of us did. To pack? Like you told us to?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: After that. Did you hear anything?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: What's up?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Yona done packing!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Is something wrong?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [grunts] The back door's locked! No way out!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: But whoever did it had to have come in here! We saw them!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Whoever did what?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Whoa... That is so not cool.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: And whoever did it ran into your rooms. No one came out, and all of you are still here.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: One of you must have done this! But... why would any of you want to sabotage Hearth's Warming Eve?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Ugh! Yak not do this! Yona offended by accusation!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: We don't know what happened. Maybe this wasn't even on purpose. But I want to give whoever caused this mess a chance to tell the truth and explain themselves. I'll make it easy for you. Close your eyes. Now, if you did this, raise your hoof. Or claw. Or whatever.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [sighs] Come on, Spike. Looks like we have to<U+0097> Spike, you can open your eyes.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: What? Oh!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Uh, what about me?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: You all can.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: But since nocreature took responsibility for this mess, you're all gonna have to help clean it up before you can go home.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Why do I have to stay?!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Aw, but the holidays!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: While you're cleaning, we'll bring you into my office one at a time. Since honesty is one of the Elements of Harmony, we want to give you each a chance to tell us the truth.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: And once we find out who did it, just you wait! We're gonna...! We'll...! What are we gonna do exactly?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [sighs] The guilty party won't be going home over Hearth's Warming break. She or he will stay here for some one-on-one friendship lessons.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: But what if none of us confesses?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Then... [sighs] I guess there's no holidays for anycreature. You'll all stay over the break.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: All right, let's get to the bottom of this. Who wants to be interviewed first?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Eh. I'll go. Beats mop duty.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Hey, I know! We can make a game out of this! See who finishes cleaning up first!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Let's save time and cut to the chase. Which one of you did it?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: I would never do something this horrible! I love Hearth's Warming Eve! And I do not want to miss going home for it.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Huh. I didn't even know changelings celebrated Hearth's Warming.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Oh, yes! It's our favorite holiday! Well, since Headmare Twilight shared it with us last year. She gave our hive very clear instructions.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [clears throat, reading] "Welcome to the traditions and fun of Hearth's Warming! Here's a guide to help you enjoy this celebration of pony history. Families start the holidays by putting the tree up!"

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [reading] "Thirsty? Dive into some holiday punch!"

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [reading] "Just before bed, everypony exchanges gifts."

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: It doesn't say how long we keep doing this.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [reading] "And to finish celebrating, you can build a fire, light it up, and sing carols."

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: You might have misunderstood things just a little.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Eh. We may not have done everything exactly the way you do. But we made our own traditions! And I can't wait to do it all again this year!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: If we ever get out of here.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Ocellus? Your turn.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: What happened?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: What do you think happened? I told her I didn't do it.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Ugh! Yona tired of waiting! Yaks always home for holidays!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: How do you celebrate Hearth's Warming in Yakyakistan, Yona?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Yaks do not. Our holiday much better. Is called Snilldar Fest. Night before, yaks gather things to smash and put them in big pile. Then in morning, we smash them! In afternoon, we smash them again! In evening<U+0097>

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: So it's just about smashing stuff, like all your other holidays.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: No! How griffon get that idea? This holiday about so much more. Last year, for example. Most perfect Snilldar ever.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [voiceover] Whole family <U+0096> grandpa, grandma yak, Yona's brother, sister, mother, father yak <U+0096> all go to woods singing yak song.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [voiceover] Calves in family pick out perfect smashing log. Then yaks smash it!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [voiceover] Then yak family build perfect snow fort... and smash it!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [voiceover] Then we hang perfect things on perfect moss pile and<U+0097>

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: What you think yaks are, barbarians? Moss pile is for special family rituals. Last year, ritual for Yona.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [voiceover] All yak family gather around Yona and braid Yona hair for first time.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: So, to recap... Your holiday is about smashing things and family.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Happy Snilldar to you too, Yona! It's so cool to learn new traditions from new friends!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Yeah, well, one of these new friends has gotten us all in trouble. And they'd better confess soon.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Sandbar? Sorry, but they said they want you to go in next.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Why the rush to get home, Smolder? Like you said, dragons don't really have holidays, do they?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Meh.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [gasps] That's so sad! You must do something in the winter for fun.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Well, we do have the Feast of Fire. Everydragon gets together and tells stories. The best one wins a pile of gemstones.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Ooh, what story won last year?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: It was called "A Dream Come True".

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Come on, now you've gotta tell it!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Ugh, fine. Once upon a time, there was this sad little dragon.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [narrating] Her name was Scales. She lived alone in the wilderness with nothing to eat.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [narrating] But one night, as she sat alone in a storm, she heard something. It was the Dragon Lord! Scales was scared, but the Dragon Lord told her not to be afraid, that he was taking her to the Dragon Lands for a great feast.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [narrating] Scales sat with the Dragon Lord's family and friends and had the biggest, best dinner of gemstones she'd ever eaten! Then, while the dragons were telling stories, Scales thought it would be so easy to seize power from this feeble and sensitive Dragon Lord. She saw her chance... and took it!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [narrating] She claimed the Bloodstone Scepter and took over the Dragon Lands! [as Scales, evil laughter] And forced the Dragon Lord to live out in the cold, just as she used to!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: That's a horrible story!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Maybe to you. But dragons like hearing about weak, kind creatures getting defeated.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Silverstream! You're up! Let's go!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: So, did you tell them you did it?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: What?! No way! Why would I say that?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: You already live in Ponyville. Staying here over break is no big deal.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: School of Friendship good place for pony to have pony holiday.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: I'd still rather spend it with my family at home. Oh! That reminds me! I have the best holiday story ever! It's called...

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [voiceover] "The Day My Hearth's Warming Doll Almost Fell into the Fire!"

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [voiceover] Just before we went to bed, my mom, my dad, and my sister all put our Hearth's Warming Dolls up on the mantel, just like we do every year. But this year, I put my doll too close to the edge, and it fell!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [in slow motion] Nooooooo!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [gasps] And?!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: My doll hit the floor. But it could have gone in the fire!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [sarcastic] That's a great story. And you told it really well.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Yeah. It was a Hearth's Warming miracle.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Next! Smolder, come with me. Yona, Twilight's waiting for you.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: The last two. So if neither one of them confesses, that means...

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: We're never going home!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: We'll be here forever!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Beyond forever.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: But I can't miss the Three Days of Freedom Celebration!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [sarcastic] How long does that last?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: It used to be only one day, but now to commemorate our escape from the Storm King, we're adding two more days of awesome! See?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: There's a book?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Mm-hmm! Queen Novo had these made for the Mount Aris board of tourism to explain it all to guests!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [voiceover] We'll spend the first night in Seaquestria, thanking the ocean for protecting us from the Storm King. Sea-dancing, whale-singing, shell-stringing... Lots of "ing"'s.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [voiceover] The second day will be on Mount Aris, with sky-dancing and a wind song in the Harmonizing Heights to celebrate the Storm King's defeat. Then the third day, everycreature will party together, on land and sea! Grandparents and parents and sisters, uncles, brothers, acquaintances, neighbors, and cousins. And at the end of the night, Queen Novo is gonna give out presents!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Wait. Hold on. "Cousins"? What are those?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Your aunts and uncles' children. You know, part of your family. Heh. Oh. You're teasing us again, right?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: I'm guessing neither one of you confessed.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [sighs] Headmare Twilight say wait here.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Maybe they're changing their minds about sending us home.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Why would they? Face it. We're stuck here.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [sniffles] But-but-but I have to go home!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: My mom makes the best kelp fritters.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: How can you be so cool about this?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: We're mad. We just show it differently.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: More like you don't show it at all.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: What pony getting at?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Maybe it wasn't just one prankster. Maybe there were three of you. And you're trying to hide your guilt by not being upset!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: It does make sense.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Guys, stop it.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Or maybe whoever did it is only pretending to be upset to throw us off.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Me?! But I didn't!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Come on, let it go.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Come on! Ocellus, you know you did it! Just fess up!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: I said, stop fighting! That's not what the holidays are about! No matter what you call them or how you celebrate! D-Do you know how lucky you all are? With your stories about sharing and-and kindness and getting together with everycreature that you care about?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: But griffons do that too, don't they?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Some holiday about a moon?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [sighs] Blue Moon Festival. The one time of year when griffons are nice to each other. Well, as nice as we can be.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [voiceover] Families get together to eat and then complain about the food and give each other presents they don't like and mostly just try not to yell at each other.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Well, at least you get to be with your family.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: No... because I don't have a family.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [voiceover] What about Grampa Gruff?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [voiceover] That's just his name. He's not anygriff's actual grandpa. I felt like I never had a place in Griffonstone.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Then I came here and, well, met all of you. So I don't want to go home for the break. And that's why... I did it!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [gasps] Griffon mess up decorations?!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Yeah. It was me. I put goo powder in the Fire of Friendship.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: So it wasn't Ocellus?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Why would you ruin things for us?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: I didn't plan to! I just figured if I made a mess, our teachers would make us stay to clean up. We'd be together a little longer.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Well, it worked, didn't it?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Better than I thought. And when Headmare Twilight threatened to cancel winter break, that meant I would get to be with all of you through the entire holiday. That's why I didn't confess.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: So, why are you admitting this now?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: I hated seeing all you fighting and-and blaming each other. That's the opposite of what all your holidays mean. Except maybe yours, Smolder. I can't keep all of you from the happiness of your homes and families just because I feel bad. I'm sorry. Don't worry. You won't have to tell our teachers. I will.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: You don't have to. We already know.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: We kinda guessed it was you. But we wanted to give you the chance to tell the truth.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: I'm proud that you did, and I'm glad to see you've been paying attention in Professor Applejack's honesty classes. But you're still going to have to make amends and stay over break for extra friendship lessons by yourself.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: I'll stay with him.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Me, too!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Yona stay also!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: I'm staying!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: What? All right. I guess pony holidays can't be that bad.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Now you can finally know what it's like to spend Hearth's Warming with friends who care about you.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: [whispering, to Twilight Sparkle] Looks like they don't really need any extra lessons.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Since you obviously know that Hearth's Warming is about coming together, I'd be honored if all of you would join my friends as guests at our holiday table.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: After we finish cleaning up.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Hey, this reminds me of another story! "The Time I Almost Spilled Grape Juice on the White Couch"!

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Does it have a depressing ending?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: I'm not sure pony stories work that way.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Gallus want Yona braid feathers?

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Uhhh... pass.

title: The Hearth's Warming Club
dialog: Hearth's Warming Eve is here once again!

title: Friendship University
dialog: [voiceover] Dear Twilight, it is difficult to express how grateful I am to you for teaching me the power of friendship.

title: Friendship University
dialog: [voiceover] You would think after more than a thousand years, there would be nothing left to learn.

title: Friendship University
dialog: [voiceover] And yet, even a pony as old as I can continue to be surprised by how much there is to know.

title: Friendship University
dialog: [reading] "I hope you find these postcards enjoyable, and I look forward to seeing you again, though I can't say when my journey will be complete. Your friend, Star Swirl.

title: Friendship University
dialog: It must be gratifying to have your idol writing to you about the friendship lessons he's learning.

title: Friendship University
dialog: I'm not sure I'll ever get used to it. Of course, if he really wants to learn about friendship, he could just come to our school.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Professor Sparkle? The mailpony just came with, uh, a few things.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Ooh! The sewing machines I ordered for my class!

title: Friendship University
dialog: These came, too. I wasn't sure what to make of them.

title: Friendship University
dialog: These machines were costly, but I am quite certain the friendship lessons I can teach my students with them will be invaluable.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Oh, don't worry, darling. I'll think of something. And I didn't use the school funds to buy these. I made the purchase entirely with my own bits.

title: Friendship University
dialog: It's not that. It's this!

title: Friendship University
dialog: [reading] "Why waste your time at a friendship school that's just a school? Learn everything they teach and more at Friendship University"?!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Who would open another friendship school?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Oh, pfft! I'm sure it's nothing to worry about. You're the Princess of Friendship. What could this other school possibly offer?

title: Friendship University
dialog: It isn't just another friendship school. It's a university!

title: Friendship University
dialog: It says they teach the same lessons of competing schools in half the time. That's twice the learning!

title: Friendship University
dialog: And it's in Las Pegasus? If Professor Rarity lets us skip her sewing class <U+0096> road trip!

title: Friendship University
dialog: I think we need to look into this school.

title: Friendship University
dialog: I don't like to judge solely on appearances. But... what kind of friendship school is this?

title: Friendship University
dialog: There's more ponies in here than at our whole school. Who is running this place?

title: Friendship University
dialog: [echoing] Welcome, friends! You are about to embark on a journey of amazing magnitude! One that will change your lives forever!

title: Friendship University
dialog: [echoing] Prepare yourselves to embrace a new path and become students of...

title: Friendship University
dialog: Flim and Flam. Of course.

title: Friendship University
dialog: If you're alone and you can't make friends We understand your plight

title: Friendship University
dialog: Until now, there was just one way Your friendships could take flight

title: Friendship University
dialog: There is a school real far away That'll teach you what to know But if you live here, you couldn't stay

title: Friendship University
dialog: You'd learn you have to go-o-o-o

title: Friendship University
dialog: Now, there is an alternative to all of that adversity

title: Friendship University
dialog: Not just a school, I'll have you know

title: Friendship University
dialog: That's it, everypony, you heard correct!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Friendship U, the one and only university of friendship!

title: Friendship University
dialog: As you can see, we're a success By any kind of stat

title: Friendship University
dialog: That may be so, for all I know But I still smell a rat

title: Friendship University
dialog: Everypony, lookie here That other school's headmare

title: Friendship University
dialog: Her presence is a testament To the mutual respect...

title: Friendship University
dialog: What?! No, it isn't!

title: Friendship University
dialog: It really is the final piece To make our work complete

title: Friendship University
dialog: To have the Friendship Princess Bless our school is such a treat

title: Friendship University
dialog: We're so honored!

title: Friendship University
dialog: How can anypony learn friendship in half the time?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Our coursework is so accelerated, to take longer would be a crime!

title: Friendship University
dialog: The lessons that we teach have been Reviewed and checked and edited

title: Friendship University
dialog: Which might explain why our new school's

title: Friendship University
dialog: That's it, everypony! Let's hear it! Tell us again why it's the best!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Accredited?

title: Friendship University
dialog: It means officially recognized or authorized.

title: Friendship University
dialog: We know what it means. But who would accredit this place?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Why, the EEA, of course.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Chancellor Neighsay?!

title: Friendship University
dialog: The Equestria Educational Association has taken an interest in institutions that teach friendship in a pony-first environment. Surely you didn't think your school has a monopoly on the concept?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Well, she did write the book on it.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Ah, yes. How to teach friendship to creatures who will one day use it as a weapon against us.

title: Friendship University
dialog: How could they use friendship as a weapon?!

title: Friendship University
dialog: You tell me. It's your book. Meantime, this university appears to be a promising option for ponies who'd prefer to stick to the EEA book on the subject.

title: Friendship University
dialog: You can't be serious. They're obviously up to something. It's Flim and Flam!

title: Friendship University
dialog: [gasps] Well, that certainly wasn't friendly.

title: Friendship University
dialog: One would think the headmare of a school of friendship <U+0096> albeit an unaccredited one <U+0096> would behave differently. Unless she was trying to undermine the competition? Hmm?

title: Friendship University
dialog: I<U+0097> No! What?! I-I am not!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Now, now, fillies and gentlecolts. Let's show the princess just how friendly we are by signing up for some classes!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Why don't I show you around?

title: Friendship University
dialog: I'm sorry, but approval from the EEA won't convince me that this school is what you promise.

title: Friendship University
dialog: And what would it take to convince you?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Well, somepony whose opinion I respect, for one.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Really? Somepony like... this?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Twilight?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Uh-oh.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Star Swirl? What are you doing here?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Why, studying friendship at Flim and Flam's wonderful school!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Oh, please. I think I know a disguise when I see one. Take off that ridiculous beard... Flam!

title: Friendship University
dialog: How's it going in here?

title: Friendship University
dialog: [groans] It-It's really me.

title: Friendship University
dialog: I'd heard rumors you've returned, but I didn't believe it until now. And if a pony of your stature is studying here, there really isn't anything else I need to see. I, Chancellor Neighsay, hereby confer upon Friendship University complete and unreserved EEA accreditation!

title: Friendship University
dialog: I... I don't understand. Why would you come here and not my school?

title: Friendship University
dialog: My travels brought me to Las Pegasus. I didn't come for the school, but Flim and Flam convinced me to try it out.

title: Friendship University
dialog: You can't trust Flim and Flam! They tried to con the Apples out of their farm! They sold fake health tonic! They run a resort in Las Pegasus!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Technically, our resort is a legitimate business.

title: Friendship University
dialog: I spent a thousand years thinking the worst of a "bad" pony. You taught me to look for the best in him. Whatever Flim and Flam's past may be, starting this school shows they want to change for the better.

title: Friendship University
dialog: I wish I could believe that.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Besides, what's untrustworthy about opening a school of friendship? They don't even charge for classes.

title: Friendship University
dialog: I don't know. But I know they're up to something. And until I find out, I'm begging you, come to my school instead.

title: Friendship University
dialog: I understand feeling threatened by competition, but my word, Princess. I wonder if the ill manners of the creatures at your school aren't contagious. I think I will take my leave before I become infected.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Twilight, I promise I'll visit your school soon. But for now, perhaps it's best if you return there.

title: Friendship University
dialog: You don't think they're running an actual friendship school, do you?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Darling, of course not. Which is why we have to investigate!

title: Friendship University
dialog: But we can't go poking around the school. Everypony'll think I'm still just "threatened by the competition".

title: Friendship University
dialog: Only if we do it as ourselves.

title: Friendship University
dialog: In these disguises, we could pass as students at out own school.

title: Friendship University
dialog: [muffled] I don't know, Rarity.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Ah-ah. What did I say about using our real names?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Sorry, "Plainity". But I'm pretty sure this isn't enough of a disguise.

title: Friendship University
dialog: [blows bubblegum] We sure are. Completely new.

title: Friendship University
dialog: [squeals] Now, I've read enough Shadow Spade to know the key to going undercover is rehearsing your backstory. [clears threat, in affected voice] I'm "Plainity". and I love bland old normal stuff. No frills for me. [normal voice] Okay! Your turn.

title: Friendship University
dialog: [groans] My name's Eyepatch. I have an eye patch.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Perfect! Now, how do we start our investigation?

title: Friendship University
dialog: I think we should split up. You enroll in some classes and find out what they're actually teaching. I'll look around and see what I can find, assuming I'm not recognized.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Welcome, newest students! Let's dive right in, shall we? One of the most important elements of friendship is being thoughtful. True or false?

title: Friendship University
dialog: If by "thoughtful" you mean "generous", I'd say true.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Correct! [laughs] It was a trick question. Very impressive, Miss...?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Plainity.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Well, well, well, Miss Plainity, keep it up and you'll be ready for our next level in no time!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Now, let's see if you can demonstrate for the class. What's something generous you could do for... me right now?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Class, Plainity here is now my star pupil. If any of you want a chance at studying with Star Swirl, I'd take notes on her every action.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Hello? The door is open, so I'll just assume it's okay to come in and look around. Unless somepony says it's not. All right, then.

title: Friendship University
dialog: [reading] "The Element of Laughter and its applications." Okay, that seems pretty genuine. "When to support your friends' decisions and when to talk sense." Huh. That's actually kind of interesting. Aha! "Friendship University's true goal... is to help friends become better friends"? [groans] Where is the proof that it's all a scam?

title: Friendship University
dialog: There isn't any!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Twilight Sparkle! Did you really think an eye patch was enough of a disguise?

title: Friendship University
dialog: No, I didn't!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Well, then we agree that everypony will recognize the Princess of Friendship in this photo of you sneaking into our office.

title: Friendship University
dialog: I can see the headline now! "Princess of Jealousy! Twilight Sparkle Bent on Ruining Her Competition!"

title: Friendship University
dialog: So sad. A news story like that would destroy your reputation. Nopony will want to go to your school after that.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Just wait until the papers get a hold of this!

title: Friendship University
dialog: "Princess Unhinged!" It'll be the talk of Equestria!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Well, gentleponies, I've finished another stack. The lessons in these worksheets are quite fascinating. Twilight? What's going on here?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Oh, just your prot<e9>g<e9> getting caught snooping in our office in disguise! Well, sort of.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Oh, honestly, Princess Twilight, envy does not look good on you.

title: Friendship University
dialog: I'm not envious! I know these two are up to something. I'm just trying to find out what.

title: Friendship University
dialog: The only pony I see who is up to something is the pony in this picture, and it is not the princess I know.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Well, it's about to be the princess all of Equestria knows.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Unless... you decided to drop the whole "uncover the scam" thing.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Then we'll rip this silly picture up and not let it completely and utterly ruin you and your school.

title: Friendship University
dialog: You can be generous with all sorts of things. Gifts, compliments, your time.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Hey, Eyepatch! Where's your eye patch? [gasps] Was your cover blown?

title: Friendship University
dialog: You could say that. Flim and Flam took a picture of me sneaking into their office.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Were we wearing our eye patch?

title: Friendship University
dialog: If I don't stop investigating, they're going to tell everypony that I'm trying to sabotage their school because I'm jealous.

title: Friendship University
dialog: But-But-But that's ridiculous!

title: Friendship University
dialog: I don't know. Maybe I am just upset that Star Swirl came here instead of my school. Flim and Flam may have turned over a new leaf. We should probably just go home.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Twilight, you are not the kind of pony to let your emotions cloud your judgment. If you think Flim and Flam are up to no good, you can't give up, even if their lessons really are impressive.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Wait, what?!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Flim and Flam are charging for these?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Well, they have to cover expenses, and Flam insists that everything extra goes to improving the school and<U+0097>

title: Friendship University
dialog: This is the scam, isn't it?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Let's find out.

title: Friendship University
dialog: These lessons are so valuable. Are you sure I can't give you more?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Ah-ah-ah! Unnecessary! Being able to share them with a pony like you is our real reward. [to Destitute Pony] Oh, my. And you want to study alongside Star Swirl, hmm?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Come back for the rest when you can afford it.

title: Friendship University
dialog: And that's the kind of determination that'll get you to the next level, student whose... name I know!

title: Friendship University
dialog: [whispering] Twilight, maybe I should take over the investigation. Think of your reputation!

title: Friendship University
dialog: My reputation isn't worth much if I won't risk it for what I think is right. Besides, I have a plan.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Well, brother of mine, we've got almost all the bits we need to expand our resort. If we add another level of classes and worksheets, we'll be there.

title: Friendship University
dialog: Maybe we should add two levels, just to be safe.

title: Friendship University
dialog: [sighs] It's a thing of beauty. But I was thinking. What if we added another extreme pool slide here?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Mmmm... Sure, as long as the pipes for the musical chocolate fountain go through... here.

title: Friendship University
dialog: But shouldn't it go closer to the pudding hot tub here?

title: Friendship University
dialog: Fair point, but<U+0097> What?!

title: Friendship University
dialog: I knew your school was a scam!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Well, well, well, if it isn't the Princess of Jealousy. I guess we'll be going to the papers after all.

title: Friendship University
dialog: And I suppose I'll just lead your students into this secret room of bits and resort expansion plans!

title: Friendship University
dialog: Uhhhh... l-let's not get hasty. You have something on us. We have something on you. Let's just call it even.

title: Friendship University
