dialog: I guess things will have to stay the way Twilight wants them. Which includes leaving me in charge.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Okay. So maybe we need a new plan.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Oh, oh, not too tight. We don't want to hurt the Chancellor.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: I'm sure Twilight will know what to do with him when she gets back. Now, back to class, everyone. We let the EEA disrupt our friendship studies long enough.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: [grunting] Why are you doing this? I thought you wanted to have somepony in charge of the school.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Oh, I do. You just aren't the pony I had in mind.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Hey, Cozy Glow! What's so funny?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Are you just happy to be running the school?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Oh, I'm just keeping Twilight's seat warm.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Still, it's pretty impressive.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Is there anything we can do to help?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: We can hang out with you all day if you want.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: You know, there is something I need help with.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Oh, wonderful. I suppose you've all come to gloat?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Actually, we've come to undo all these chains and free you!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: But... But why?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Now that nasty pony met even nastier pony, maybe nasty pony not be so nasty.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Also, we'd kind of like to stop Cozy before she drains all the magic from Equestria.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: She's behind that as well? I must get word to Celestia and Luna.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: How? Without magic, it'll take forever to get to them.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: While it's true that unicorns have lost their ability to cast spells, the most potent magic in Equestria is housed in our... artifacts. The EEA medallion allows me to travel throughout Equestria. Its magic worked when I chained you up. Perhaps it still has enough to send me to the princesses.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: I hope he makes it.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: I hope he doesn't come back and lock us up again.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: If he comes back.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Everything's gonna be fine! Twilight and the others are probably already on their way!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Um, are you sure there's magic in Cerberus? Clarissa the pig has two tails, and while her singing voice is lovely, I don't think it's magical.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: We need to try everything if we want to get out of here.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: I don't know. Tartarus isn't so bad. I could hang out here for a while!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Eh. Maybe not forever though.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: But that is just what it will be! If my prot<e9>g<e9> has followed my instructions, by sunset tonight, every last vestige of Equestrian magic will disappear into the ether forever!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Have you even thought about what losing magic would mean?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: It means the six of you will be trapped here! Like me!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Seven!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Exactly. It means you're trapped here. Forever. With us.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Uhhhh... I hadn't thought of it like that.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: So, what do we do, Twilight?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Dash and Applejack nearly have Cerberus tired out. If Rarity pitches in, I think they can get him to sit still long enough to try what I have in mind.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: I'm sure I can get the other monsters to help. [whispering, to Spike] Besides, I would never call them monsters.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: What about Tirek? He's probably got some magic, too, right?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Leave him to me.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: [to Cerberus] Down!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Okay, everyone! Time to show Equestria that you aren't monsters! You're wonderful, mystical creatures!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: I know it's not your birthday, so You get a party, even though We'll sing and dance from one to ten And then we'll do it all again!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Fine! I'll help you leave! Just please stop!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Tirek's in!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: It's just so excitin' to have a foal our age runnin' things. We should have an ice cream social every day!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: That's a splendid idea, Apple Bloom. But to tell you the truth, the thing I need help with most is cleaning.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Say no more. Just take us around the school and show us everything you want cleaned.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Well, actually, you could start right in here.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: It looks pretty clean already.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Do you three think you can fool me?! I know a diversion when I see it!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Uh, why pony lead us back down here?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: We obviously can't handle Cozy on our own. But we can't just sit around and wait for help. So, there's one more prisoner I think we should free.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Ooh! I guess Starlight! Is it Starlight?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Counselor pony, come out! We need help with nasty pony!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: She can't talk to us from in there. We'll have to figure a way to get her out.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Hey! This is just like chapter twelve in "Kanthaka's Facts and Artifacts" from Twilight's class!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: What? I've been studying. Finals are coming up, you know?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Actually, I remember that, too! Cozy must've linked these artifacts to act like a mystical magnet, attracting all the magic in Equestria into that orb.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: So, we can shut it down by yanking one of these things out, right?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Sure, though that would probably cause a magical feedback loop and destroy the whole school!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Destroy the School of Friendship?! Oh, dear! Chancellor Neighsay was wrong about a lot of things, but I guess he was right about all of you!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: All right. Is everypony ready?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: [to Cerberus] Sit! Good! [to Twilight Sparkle] I can't say for how much longer.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: All eternity!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Yes, by all means, please! Just get on with it!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: There's your cue, you evil centaur, you.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: That's it! I think it's working!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Come on! I don't know how long I can hold it!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: [to Cerberus] Good boy!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: [to creatures] Bye, friends. Hopefully, we'll be able to turn you all back into your normal, wonderful selves soon.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: [to Lord Tirek] Thanks for the assist, your redness!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Yay! Twilight did it!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: I couldn't have done it without all your help.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: I'm not sure we did!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: No!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Tirek said all of Equestria's magic would be gone at sunset.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Without magic, there's no way we'll get back to the school in time!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: What does that mean?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: It means... we've failed!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: After everything Twilight's done for you, why would you want to destroy her school?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: We don't! You're the one using these artifacts to drain magic from Equestria!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Me?! We all just saw you with your claws all over them! [gasps] It all makes sense. These creatures want magic gone from Equestria because it's the only thing ponies have that they don't!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Technically, there's a magical component when Silverstream and I transform.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: And Yona's friends' friendship is magic! Twilight said!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: And you repay her by sending her to Tartarus on a wild goose chase so you could destroy everything she built! [gasps] They've even trapped Starlight in that-that thing! We have to defend this school!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: No! No, don't listen to her!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Gallus!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: They brought this on themselves. There's nothing we can do.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Yeah, yeah. The Elements of Harmony are very important. They're just not applicable in every circumstance. And with magic gone from Equestria, I'm not even sure the Tree of Harmony will be as helpful as it once was.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: What's happening?!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Guess our friendship is pretty magical after all.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Hurry! Grab the artifacts!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Um, didn't you say that could destroy the school?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: But if we don't try, we could lose magic forever!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: You all better get clear!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Wait! Where are you going?! Stoooooop!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: [laughs] Counselor pony<U+0097>!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Uh, it's nice to see you, too.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: I guess magic is back.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: You've ruined everything! Now Twilight and her ridiculous friends can escape from Tartarus!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: I mean... Yay! All my friends are safe!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: You can drop the act, Cozy Glow! Your pen pal Tirek told us all about how he helped you suck up all that magic!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: But I still don't understand why.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: [growls] Why?! Because friendship is power! You might be the Princess of Friendship, but as headmare of this school, I can collect even more friends than you!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: You're the one who doesn't get it, Cozy. Friendship is powerful, but power isn't why you make friends. I'm sorry I couldn't teach you that.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Well, you taught us.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: You can't let one bad apple make you think you failed.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: And we never could've stopped her if we hadn't learned what you taught us about friendship.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Honesty? Loyalty? Generosity? Blah-blah-blah! I can make more friends without using any of them! And if I can't do it here, I'll do it somewhere else!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: [sighs] I'm glad you're back in charge of the School of Friendship, Princess.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: It's clear to me now that there is nopony better suited for the job.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: What's going on?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Hi, Headmare Twilight! We're just practicing for graduation!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Graduation?

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Now that we've saved Equestria, we figure we're done with school.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Saving Equestria is nice, but I'm afraid it'll take more than one semester to learn all there is to know about friendship.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: [belches] Told ya.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Your headmare is right. I thought friendship was something only ponies should share with each other. But you all taught me how wrong I was. I suppose true friendship can take a lifetime to understand.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: If it were easy to learn, we wouldn't need a school.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: [yelps] We held her off as long as we could!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: But she locked us in this closet!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: What happened?! Is everything all right?! Where's Cozy Glow?!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Everything worked out just fine.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: As for Cozy Glow, I can assure you <U+0097> where she's going, she won't be causing any more trouble.

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Of course it's boring here now! But at least you're not in a cage!

title: School Raze - Part 2
dialog: Hey, neighbor. Wanna be friends?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: 'Scuse me! Dragon on the move! Important princess documents comin' through!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Ommmmm... Ohhhhhhh mmmmy goodness, I can't handle this! Ooh! Nothing is working! I just have to get it together! Just go in there! And ask! This is your Friendship Festival! Everypony's happiness rests in your hooves. [facehoofs] Ohhhh!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Okay, Twilight. Got all your charts and graphs.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Oh, thank goodness you're here, Spike! I'm just so nervous about this meeting!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Whachoo talkin' 'bout?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: [sighs] I'm about to ask the three most royal princesses of Equestria for a huge favor! What if they reject me?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: It'll be fine. Just remember the most important thing.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Smile?!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Eh... no. You're a Princess, too.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Right! [exhales] Good morning, Princesses. Thank you all for seeing me. I have an idea that I think will make our Friendship Festival the most wonderful celebration Equestria has ever seen!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Yes, Twilight! We are very excited!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Ponies have been arriving from all over all morning.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: I'd like to think it's to see us, but Songbird Serenade might be the bigger attraction.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Yes, she is the... "mane" event! [giggles] And to make it extra special, I could use your help. Spike?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Songbird Serenade's performance is not scheduled to start until after you begin the sunset. And based on my precise calculation, to get the very best lighting for the stage, Princess Celestia, I was hoping you could make sure the sun stays about 28.1<U+00BA> to the south, and, Princess Luna, if you could raise the moon 62<U+00BA> to the north at the same time, it would reflect the sunlight on the other side and really frame the entire stage perfectly!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: But wait! There's more! Cadance, if you could use your crystal magic to create an aurora above the stage, the sun and the moon will shine through it and create a truly amazing light show!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Presenting Songbird Serenade! Yeah, yeah, yeah! Whoa-ho!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: [weakly] Ta-da...

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: So you're saying you want us to move the sun and the moon for the party.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Twilight, each of us uses our powers to serve Equestria in our own way. You are the Princess of Friendship. You already have all the magic you need.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: So... that'd be a no?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Yes!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Sky's cleared and ready for the festival!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Whoa!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Whoa! Heads up, Fluttershy! Out of control balloooooon!!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Hoo. I don't think it's the balloon that's out of control, Pinkie Pie!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Hey, y'all!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Anypony up for some free samples of my family's apple cider?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Ah! Thank you! Loved it!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Wow, Rarity. It's a fine job you're doin' there. 'Course it might not get done 'til after the concert.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Applejack, darling, anypony can do "fine". Twilight asked me, so clearly, she's going for fabulous, and fabulous takes time.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Fabulous takes forever! But "awesome"...

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Whoa!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: ...can get done in four seconds flat! Faster if I do my sonic rainboom!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Aah! Nono, oh no! Don't you dare, Rainbow Dash! It looks wretched enough already.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Oh come on, it's fine!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: If you were raised in a barn! Ahem, no offense, Applejack.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: None taken. Especially since I wasn't raised in a barn. My family just happens to have a barn. Where I was born. And... spent most of my formative years...

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: [very quickly] Raised in a barn!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Okay, just two hundred and eighteen things left to do and we're ready.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Hello, Spike.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Uh, hi, Rarity. Heh heh.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: How'd it go with the other Princesses? They like your idea?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: I bet they loved it!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: [sighs] Not exactly. They think I can make today perfect without their magic.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: And they are absolutely right, darling. This festival is your brilliant idea and we know you're up to the task!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: But what if I'm not?! What if Songbird Serenade hates the stage?! Or nopony makes a new friend?! And if I fail at the festival, then who am I?!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: But you have us! So stop worrying.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Ah!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: It's time to show 'em what you've got

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: It's time to go and get things done

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: But you don't have to do it on your own

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: 'Cause you've got friends right here to make it fun

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Huh?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Whoa!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Sometimes the pressure gets you down And the clouds are dark and grey Just kick them off and let the sun shine through

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: You got this

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: With friends and family, you are never alone If you need help, we've got your back You can be honest, let your problems be known

title: My Little Pony The Movie

dialog: Eeyup!

dialog: Takin' one or two to taste

dialog: Inside and out, beautiful throughout Generosity is what we're all about

dialog: [mouthful] You got this

dialog: You got this

dialog: Today needs to be perfect, it all comes down to me I don't know if I'm ready For all the things they need me to be I am the Princess of Friendship But that is more than just a crown It's a promise to bring ponies together And never let anypony down

dialog: Oopsie! Guess my easy bake confetti cake cannon needs a little bit more fine tuning!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: [nickers] Hmmm...

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Ms. Songbird Serenade? Um, I was just going to check on you. [laughs nervously] I'm Princess Twilight, and sorry about the mess. I'm usually not so...

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Heh heh.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: [gasps] Storm clouds? I ordered perfect weather! Rainbow Dash?!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Uh... I... don't think those are storm clouds.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Ooh! I bet those are the clowns I ordered!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: ...Or definitely not the clowns I ordered.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Is that a... unicorn?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: I think so, but what happened to her horn?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: "Tempest" is it? How may we help you?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Oh, I'm so glad you asked. How about we start with your complete and total surrender?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Hi there. Princess of Friendship. Not exactly sure what's going on, but I know we can talk things out.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Oh, goody. All four Princesses. Here's the deal, ladies. I need your magic. Give it up nicely, please, or we make it difficult for everyone!

title: My Little Pony The Movie

dialog: Oh. There you are. Here's the deal. I'm in the middle of a big re-brand here. "The Storm King" is tracking well as "intensely intimidating", but you know what? I need to back it up. You know what I need to back it up with? A storm! That would be great! You promised me magic that could control the elements, and right now, I'm holding a what? A branch. A twig. Bleh!

dialog: Huh?

writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]

writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: I didn't make these bubbles!

writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: The Storm King?! I'm so glad I saved you guys! I'm totally taking you to my mom!

writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: [gasps] Does your mother know where they are?

writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Hoo-hoo!

writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: We're almost there!

writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Mother, look what I found!

writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Mm-mm.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: No no n-no! M-M-Mom, please! It is so not like that! The Storm King is trying to destroy their home, too!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: We need to find the Hippogriffs. Do you know what happened to them?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Oh, oh, it's such a good story!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Once upon a time, like, a while ago, the Hippogriffs did live on Mount Aris.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Fine! I can't tell you! But if I could tell you, I'd say that that horned beast did show up to steal their magic!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: But, to keep it out of his clutches, their brave and majestic leader, Queen Novo, hid them deep underwater where he could never go! We are... Well, we were the Hippogriffs! Ta-da! [laughs] [whispering] But I totally did not tell you that!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Hold on now. Lemme get this straight. When the Storm King came, you just abandoned your entire city and fled?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: We didn't flee! We swam! Y'know, in order to flee.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: But... how?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Oh! Can we show them? Huh? These are the first guests we've had in, like, foreveeerrr! Can we, can we, can we, can we, can we, can we, can we, can we, can we?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Wow!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: These fins are divine!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Hey, Applejack, I'll race ya to that coral!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: You're on!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Woo-hoo! [giggles] Ooh! Try it, Fluttershy!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: [giggles] Yay.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Guys? Guys? What is... [puffs] ...happening?!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Aw, so cute!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: This is amazing! With this, we could transform everypony at home into something powerful enough to face the Storm King's army!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: But...

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: But we've come all this way. And you can't just hide down here! Trapped forever! There's so much you're missing!

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: So that's it? We left home for nothin'?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Oh, my gosh! Best... idea! You can stay with us! Forever! [laughs] There are so many things we can do! We can make friendship bracelets out of shells and... picture frames outta shells and... decorative wastebaskets out of shells... Oh, I have so many projects that involve shells, haha! Now I have someone new to share them with! I mean, aside from my friends, Shelly and Sheldon. Right? "Shelly"?

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Ooh, ooh...

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: That sounds lovely, darling, but you must realize, we can't stay.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: We've gotta get back to our families.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: Oh, no. Of course. Of course. Heh. Of course you have your own friends back home. It's fine. It's fine. Heh. [whispering] Shelly and Sheldon get jealous anyways. Heh. It's probably for the best. [sighs] Yeah, I'll just, um... [sadly] I'll get Mom to, uh, turn you back so you can go home.

title: My Little Pony The Movie
writer: Meghan McCarthy, Rita Hsiao, & Michael Vogel; story by Meghan McCarthy & Joe Ballarini[25]
dialog: I know we have to go, but you guys saw how disappointed Princess Skystar was. Couldn't we stay for just a little longer?

dialog: Pinkie, we just don't have time for<U+0097>
